1b1(rgyud): Ar a mo grA pA sha
1b2(rgyud): // drug skang du/ 
1b3(rgyud):
2a1(rgyud): // sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
2a2(rgyud): 'tshal lo// dang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phag
2a3(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tsha'o// 'di skad bdag gis
2a4(rgyud): thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri bo bo Ta lan spyan ras gzigs
2b1(rgyud): dbang phyug gi po drang shing sa la dang / ta ma la dang / tsam pa ka dang / mya ngan 'tshang dang / a ti mug+na/ sna tshogs
2b2(rgyud): mang pos legs par brgyan pa na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po brgya stong dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa ya
2b3(rgyud): bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris
2b4(rgyud): lha'i bu brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas pa na/ dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen
2b5(rgyud): po dang / tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu rnams kyis dbang du mdzad nas chos ston par mdzad do// de nas byang chub
3a1(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las
3a2(rgyud): langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar ba btud
3a3(rgyud): nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga/ del ba de log su 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyisadabacom ldan 'das la 'di skad
3a4(rgyud): ces gsol to// bcom lda na 'das gang 'di don yod pa'i zhags ba'i rgyal po'i snying po zhes
3a5(rgyud): bgyi ba mchis te/ bdag gis bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi sngon log su 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par blta
3a6(rgyud): bar de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po las mnos nas/ 'di ltar bdag gis dbang phyug dang / 
3b1(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / gnas gams 'i lha'i bu brgya stong phrag mang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
3b2(rgyud): 'dzin du stsal nas/ bdag gis rmongs pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes bkod pa la sogs te ting nge 'dzin brgya stong phrag bcu thob par bgyis lag so// 
3b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar yang sa phyogs gang du snying po 'di spyod pa'i sa phyogs der yang dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa la sogs
3b4(rgyud): pa lha'i bu khri nyis stong srung ba dang bskyab pa/ dang sba ba'i slad du gnas par rig par bgyi lag so// / bcom ldan 'das gang na don yod pa'i
3b5(rgyud): phun sum tshogs pa'i snying po 'di spyod pa'i sa phyogs de mchod rten du yang bkur bar 'gyur lag so// bcom ldan 'das seMn de dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba
3b6(rgyud): khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur lag so// gang zhig don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di mnyan par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'dra/ 
3b7(rgyud): sdig pa spyod pa'am/ sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa'am/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa 'am/ dam pa'i chos spong ba'am/ mnar med par gzhol
4a1(rgyud): / ba 'am/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad spong ba de 'gyod par gyur cing // 
4a2(rgyud): ma 'ongs pa na sdom pa thob par 'gyur lagaso// bcom ldan 'das re shig de nyid kyis zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te bzlas brjod bgyis na tshe 'di
4a3(rgyud): nyid la las de rnam par dag pa dang / gtu gus pa dang / bsal bar 'gyuraro// rims nyin gcig pra'o/ nyin gnyis pa'am/ nyin gsum
4a4(rgyud): pa 'am/ nyin bzhi pa 'am/ de bzhin du/ rim nyin bdun pa'am/ mig nad dang / rna ba'i nad// dam/ sna'i nad dam/ so'i nad dam/ 
4a5(rgyud): mchu'i nang ngam/ lce'i nad dam/ dkan gyi nod dam/ snying nad dam/ lto nad dam/ ro rgyab dang / rked pa'i nad dam/ yan lag dang nying lag gi
4a6(rgyud): nad ngam/ gzhang 'brum 'am/ pho ba'i nad dam/ tshad pa'am/ lag pa dang / rkang pa'i nad dam/ sna nad dam/ klad pa'i nad dam/ sha bkra chen po 'am/ 
4a7(rgyud): sha gzigs gu'am/ 'dze'am/ rkang shu'am/ 'brum bu phra mo 'am/ lhog pa 'am/ mtshan par rdol ba 'am/ 'brum bu'am/ brjed byed dam/ byad dam
4b1(rgyud): gzhan gyis bgyis pa'i gsod pa 'am/ 'ching ba 'am/ rdeg pa 'am/ skrod pa 'am/ bden pa ma lags pas skur pa 'debs pa 'am/ bcom ldan 'das mdor na lus kyi gdung ba 'am/ 
4b2(rgyud): sems kyi gdung ba 'am/ rmi lam ngan pa'i las de yongs su gtugs par 'gyur na/ sems can dag pa lhag pa dad pa rnams kyi yongasu byang bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom
4b3(rgyud): ldan 'das gal te 'khor bzhi 'am/ rigs bzhi las gang dag sgyu dang / g.yos bdag gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di nyan par bgyid/ 'dzin par bgyid/ 'chang bar bgyid/ klog
4b4(rgyud): par bgyid/ 'dri bar bgyid/ 'drir 'jug par bgyid/ kun chub par bgyid/ sems can gzhan la yang sgrogs par bgyid cing / tha na dud 'gro'i skye gan su gtogs pa rnams
4b5(rgyud): kyi rna khung du gtad de rna bar bzlas brjod bgyid la rdo rje'i tshig 'di rnams sems par bgyid de/ skur ba ma mchis pa dang / gzugs ma mchis pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa dang
4b6(rgyud): kun tu 'byung ma mchis pa dang / ring du 'gro ma mchis pa dang / bgyid pa ma mchis pa dang / gos pa ma mchis pa dang / sems mnyam pa nyid dang ma bral ba dang / phung po lnga dang bral ba ste/ rnal
4b7(rgyud): 'byor 'dis sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa sgom par bgyid na// de la phyogs bcu nas sangs rgyas stong zhal ston par mdzad par 'gyur zhing nongs pa 'chags par 'gyur ba la sogs pa rgyas
4b8(rgyud): par sbyaro// glegs bam du bgyis te khyim du 'chang bar bgyid dam/ rje dpon gyis skrag pas sam/ gzhan gyi ngor ram/ bzhang gad tsam gyis rgyus mnyan par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das
5a1(rgyud): mkhas pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mthus de dag gi rna khung du sgra de grag pa lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das dper na skyes bu 'ga'
5a2(rgyud): zhig gis tsan dan nam/ ga pur ram/ gla rtsi zhig la khros sam/ yongs su smad de rdo la btags nas bdag nyid la byugs na tsan dan nam/ ga pur ram/ gla rtsi de 'di snyam du 'dis bdag la khros
5a3(rgyud): sam/ yongasu smad pas dri mnam par mi bgyi'o snyam du mi sems kyi/ gzhan du na de nyid la dri bda' bar bgyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di yang
5a4(rgyud): gang su yang rung bas bzhad gad tsam gyis zhes bya ba rgyas par sbya ro// bcom ldan 'das g.yo dang / sgyus mchod par bgyid na yang de nyid sen dmu rgod de dag gi dge ba'i rgyur 'gyur lag so// 
5a5(rgyud): gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur bar tshul khrims dang / ting nge'/ dzin dang / shes rab dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi dri dang / bral bar mi 'gyur te/ tshul khrims kyi dri bda' bar bgyid pa
5a6(rgyud): lag so// bcom ldan 'das gang yang rigs kyi bu pho 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong pha dang / dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen pa 'am/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ de las gzhan pa'i sen su yang rung bas don
5a7(rgyud): yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cheng du yar gyi ngo'i chas brgyad la bsrung ba bgyis te/ gzhan mi smra bar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas brjod pa/ bcom ldan 'das des tshe 'di nyid
5a8(rgyud): phan yon nyi shu rtsa gcig thob par 'gyur te/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gang zhi na/ 'di lta ste/ de'i lus le nad rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro// de'i lus la las kyi dbang gis nad rnams byung na yang myur dun/ 
5b1(rgyud): bar 'gyur zhing lus mdangs dang ldan pa dang yid du mchi bar 'gyuraro// skye bo mang po'i snying sdug pa dang dbang po sbas par 'gyu ro// de'i don rnams 'grub par 'gyuraro// de'i don grub pa yang chom rkun gyi
5b2(rgyud): mi 'phrogs te/ zhugs kyis mi tshig/ chab kyis mi 'tshal/ rgyal po'i mthus dbrog par rngo mi thog par 'gyu ro// de'i las kyi mtha' rnams rgyas par 'gyur te/ ser bas ma lag so// chab sa
5b3(rgyud): 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rlung dang char gyi 'jigs pa ma lag so// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po thal ba dang / chu la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis nas zhing gi phyogs mtshams dang steng
5b4(rgyud): 'og tu bcing ba bgyis na gnod pa thad nye bar zhi bar 'gyuraro// gzi brjid dang mdangs dbrog par rngo mi thog par 'gyur zhing seMn thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang yid du 'thad par 'gyuraro// 
5b5(rgyud): de la dgra'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de la dgra'i 'a// jigs pa 'byung yang myur du zhi bar 'gyu ro// de la mi ma la/ gas pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// byad kyi 'jigs
5b6(rgyud): pa ma lags/ mkha' 'gro ma'i 'jigs pa ma lags te/ de la nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dgra bo 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro// me dang / mtshon dang / dug gis 'gum par mi 'gyuraro// de la
5b7(rgyud): yang lha rnams kyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbeng ba'i phyir gnas par 'gyuraro// gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur bar byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyom
5b8(rgyud): dang / 'bral bar mi 'gyur te/ de la phan yon nyi shu rtsa gcig po 'di dag 'thob par 'gyur lags// gzhan yang chos brgyad 'thob par 'gyur te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'gum pa'i dus 'phags/ 
6a1(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dge slong gi gzugasu mngon sum du zhal ston par 'gyuraro// bde bar 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par 'gyuraro// lta ba 'khrul par mi 'gyur ro// lag pa mi g.ye/ 
6a2(rgyud): pa dang / rkang pa mi g.yob pa dang / bshang gci ma mchis pa dang / khri'i steng du 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyuraro// dran pa shin tu nye bar gnas par 'gyu ro// khas phub du 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par mi
6a3(rgyud): 'gyu ro// 'gum pa'i dus na yang spobs pa mi bas par 'gyuraro// de yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du smon pa der skye bar 'gyur zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang yang 'bral bar mi 'gyuraro// nyin
6a4(rgyud): cig bzhin du dus gsum lan gsum bzlas brjod bgyi/ da'o// chang dang / sha dang / rkun dong dang / ke'u dang / sgog skya dang 'dres pa dang / lhag rol dang / 'di rnams khyad par du
6a5(rgyud): don du gnyer bas spang bar bgyi'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa 'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang sems can rna/ mas la mthu mchis pa dang / mthu ma mchis par 'tshal
6a6(rgyud): bar bgyis nas bsgrags par bgyi'o// slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud mi bgyi'o// 'di ltar dri ma dang bral zhing phrag dog ser sna spangs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams lags te/ sems can rnams
6a7(rgyud): kyi don bgyi ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'thob par 'gyur bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshogs kyi nang du gtog so// byang chub ces bgyi ba ni shes rab lags/ sems dpa' zhes
6a8(rgyud): bgyi ba ni/ thabs lags te/ chos 'di gnyis sems can rnams kyi don gyi srang kho nas thob pa lag so// gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjesu gnang na/ 'di ltar bdag gis snying po
6b1(rgyud): 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'khor bzhi rnams dang / gzhan sdig pa spyod pa rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang bde srang du bsgrags par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
6b2(rgyud): dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems can dag pa de'i dus la bab par shes na smros shig/ de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su yi rang bar mdzad
6b3(rgyud): zin te/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can rnams la pa'i bya ba byed par 'gyu ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig mi 'dzum
6b4(rgyud): par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyagabagyis pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor skye bo mang po la
6b5(rgyud): sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thu/ gas brtse ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i don du bdag/ la gsan du gsol/ dus gsum du gshegs shing / 
6b6(rgyud): bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung
6b7(rgyud): ba thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo// yang dag par song ba rnams dang / yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// sha ra dwa ta'i bu la phyag 'tshalo// byams pa la sogs te byang chub sems
6b8(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshalo// dkon mchog
7a1(rgyud): gsum la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ oM tsa ra tsa ra/ 
7a2(rgyud): tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ e h+ye hi ma hA ka ru Ni ka/ tsau ra tsi ri/ mi ra mi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ si ri si ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ pi ri bi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ ma hA pad+ma haste/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ 
7a3(rgyud): ku lu ku lu/ ma hA shud+d+ha satwa/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ d+hA ba d+hA ba/ ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni/ ku Nu ku Nu/ ba ra ma shud+d+ha satwa/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ ma hA s+thA ma pAp+ta/ tsa la tsa la/ sany+dza
7a4(rgyud): la sany+tsa la/ bi tsa la bi tsa la/ e Ta Ta e Ta Ta/ b+ha ra b+hA ra / b+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ e h+ye hi/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA/ da ma hA pa shu pa ti be Sha d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ tsa
7a5(rgyud): ra ha ra ha ra/ ha hA ha hA/ hi hI hi hI/ hu hA hu hU/ oM kAprah+ma beSha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ sa ra sa ra/ pa ra ba ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ rasmai sha ta sa
7a6(rgyud): ha sra pra ti mat+ti ta/ sha rI rA ya/ dzA la dzA la/ tA pa tA pa/ b+ha ga wan som A di h+ya/ ya ma/ ba ru Na/ ku be ra/ brah+man+da ri Shi de ba ga Na/ a b+h+yA rtsi ta tsa ra Na/ su ru su ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ mu ru
7a7(rgyud): mu ru/ pu ru pu ru/ sa nad ku mA ra/ ru dra/ bA sa ba/ biSh+Nu d+ha nang / de ba/ ri Shi nA ya ka/ ba hu bi bi d+ha/ be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ tha ra tha ra/ g+ha ra g+ha ra/ ya ra ya ra
7a8(rgyud): la ra la ra/ ha ra ha ra/ mar ma ra/ ba ra pa ra/ bar ba ra/ ba ra dA ya ka/ sa man+ta/ a wa lo ka te/ bi loka ta/ lo ke shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ mu hu mu h+ya/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ya mu ya/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ 
7b1(rgyud): ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dpalas gsum gyi lha rnams bdag dang / sems can thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / 'tshe ba thams
7b2(rgyud): cad dang / gdon thams cad las bsrungs shog/ bsrungs shig/ bsad pa dang / bcing ba dang / brdeg pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / rgyal po dang / chom po dang / rkun po dang / me dang / chu dang
7b3(rgyud): dug dang / mtshon las yongasu thar par mdzad pa/ ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni/ ku Nu ku Nu/ tsa ra tsa ra/ in+d+ri ya/ ba la bo d+h+yaM ga/ tsa tur Ar+ya sat+ya saM pra kA sha ka/ tA pa tA pa/ da ma da ma/ sa ma
7b4(rgyud): sa ma/ sa ma sa ma/ ma hA ta mo/ a d+ha kA ra/ bid+hA ma na Sha na pA ra mi tA pa ri pU ra ka/ mi li mi li/ Ta Ta Ta Ta/ dza dza dza / Ti To To Ti/ Tu Tu Tu Tu/ ai ne ye tsarma kri ta pa ri ka ra/ 
7b5(rgyud): e h+ye ti/ i shwa ra ma he shwa ra/ ma hA b+hu ta ga Na saM b+hany+dza ka/ ku ru ku ru/ pa ra pa ra/ ka ra ka ra/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ma Ta ma Ta/ bi shud+d+ha/ bi Sha ya/ bA si na/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka shwe ta
7b6(rgyud): ya dz+nyA pa bI ta/ rat+na mu ku Ta/ mA lA d+ha ra/ sar+b+ba d+hA shi ra si kri ta ma ku To/ mA lA d+ha ra/ ma hAd b+hu ta/ ka ma la a la kri ta ra d+ha rA ya/ d+hu na sa mA d+ho/ bi mo k+Sha A pra ke pya/ ba hu satwa san+ta ti pa ri pA tsa ka/ ma hA kA ru
7b7(rgyud): Ni ka/ sarba karma A wa ra Na bi sho d+ha ka sar+b+ba byA d+hi pa ro mo tsaka sar+b+ba A shA pa ri pU ra ka/ sar+b+ba satwa sa mA shA san ka ra na mo sta te swA hA// // bklags pas las thams cad 'grub par 'gyu ro// dus
7b8(rgyud): gsum du bzlas brjod bgyis na mtshams med pa lnga 'byang bar 'gyur zhing las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang yongasu dag par 'gyuraro// mtshams gcad pa la ni a ga ru'i bdug pa 'am/ thal ba'am/ 
8a1(rgyud): chab 'am/ yungs kar dang / seng ldeng gi phur bu la sogs pas so// rims thams cad la ni skud pas so// nad thams cad la ni mar ram/ 'bru mar ram/ chab la/ 
8a2(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyis te gtor bar bgyi'o// byang dgrol bar la mtshon gyis so// lto ba la ni srung ba'i skud pas so// dug bsad pa la ni sa 'am chab gyis so// mig nang la ni skud pa
8a3(rgyud): dkar pos rna ba la gdags par bgyi'o// so na pa la ni shing ka ra bi ra'i so shing gis so// mtshams bcad pa ni mtshon sna lnga'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ 
8a4(rgyud): seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi la bcings nas phyogs bzhi gzugangs par bgyis na mtshams chen po bcings par 'gyur ro// thams cad srung ba ni skud pa'am/ chab bam/ thal
8a5(rgyud): bas bya'o// gdon thams cad la ni tshen sna lnga'i skud pas/ so// rims thams cad la ni skud pa dkar pos so// g.yan pa dang / khyi rdo dang / lhog pa dang / mgrin pa
8a6(rgyud): 'gags pa thams cad la ni sbrang rtsi dang / pi pi ling bsres pas so// mig nad la ni dri chu dang / shing pa la sha'i chu'am/ shing mngar gyi chus so// rna ba'i nad la ni 'bru mar gyis// 
8a7(rgyud): 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa 'gyed pa dang / bskur ba 'debs pa thams cad la ni/ chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te kha bshal bar bgyi'o// dpung dang / yul dang / rgyal srid
8a8(rgyud): dang / yul 'khor rnams srung ba la ni bum pa gang ba bzhag la gos gtsang ma bgos pas mchod pa rgya chen po bgyis nas bklags par bgyis na zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// des yang chab
8b1(rgyud): kyis gtor bar bgyis te/ sems can thams cad la srung ba bgyis par 'gyu ro// yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'che ba thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa dang glags lta ba rnams la ni tsan
8b2(rgyud): dan la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te snying kar byug par bgyi'o// mtshams ma mchis pa'i las thams cad bas par bgyi ba ni rtag tu bzlas brjod kyis so// khyim srung
8b3(rgyud): ba la ni pad+ma'i sbyin sreg gis so// sems can thams cad bskyang ba dang / 'byung po'i 'jigs pa dang / gdon thams cad las srung ba la ni tsan dan gyi sbyin sreg gis so// dza ya dang / bi dza ya
8b4(rgyud): dang / na ku la dang / gan d+ha na gu li dang / ba ru ni dang / ce'i dra ba ru Ni dang / a b+ha ya ba ni dang / in dra ba ni dang / gan d+ha pri yang ku dang / rgya spos dang / tsakra dang / ma hA tsakra dang / 
8b5(rgyud): biSh+Ta krAn+ta dang / so ma ra dzi dang / su na na rnams la lan pa/ rgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ nor bur bgyis// nas spyi bo 'am/ dpung pa la gdags pas/ bsrel
8b6(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// khye'u rnams la ni mgul par ro// bu mo rnams la ni sta zur nas te/ dpal dang ldan par bgyid pa dang / bkra mi shos pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa'i nor bu 'di bsres na thams
8b7(rgyud): cad las srung ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// dug dang mes mi tshugs lags so// dug gis gnod pa skye bar mi 'gyur ro// skyes na yang gnod pa skyed par mi bgyid cing myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro// 
8b8(rgyud): gdon rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro// rlung dang 'brug dang / ser ba bcad pa/ chab kyi rgyun dang / ser ba bzlog pa la ni shing ka ra bi ri'i lcug mas te/ las thams cad bgyid pa
9a1(rgyud): // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po grub pa dam pa ma bsgrubs par las 'di rnams bgyid par 'gyur lag so// de nas sgrub par
9a2(rgyud): 'tshal na thang sku'i cho ga ni ras lo lhag ma ma yin pa'i tshon rtsis sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzugs brnyan ral pa'i thor
9a3(rgyud): tshugs dang / e na ya'i lpags pa dang / phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan po bri bar bgyi ste/ ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can 'drir stsal bar bgyi'o// de/ 
9a4(rgyud): nas sgrub pa po sku gzugs de'i spyan sngar ba'i lci dba'i dkyil 'khor bgyis te/ me tog dkar po'i sil ma bkram la/ spos kyis bkang ba'i snod brgyad bzhag par
9a5(rgyud): dgye'o// sna brgyad pa 'am/ drug cu rtse bzhi dang / 'am/ gzhan yang lha ba shos sha dang khrag dang ma 'dres pa bsha mas shing drangs la a ga ru'i bdug pas
9a6(rgyud): bdugs te/ lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// nyin zhag cig gam/ nyin zhag gsum du bsnyung ba bgyis nas zas dkar gsum 'tshal te/ dus gsum du khrus bgyis
9a7(rgyud): nas gos gtsang ma bgos na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid mchis nas bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bgyid do// ldong ros sam/ mig sman
9a8(rgyud): la bzlas brjod bgyis te mig la bskus na/ de nas mi gda' bar gyur nas na mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur zhing don yod pa'i ye shes bkod pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par
9b1(rgyud): 'gyur te/ ci 'tshal ba de bgyid par 'gyuraro// de nas 'grub pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
9b2(rgyud): dang gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po'i lha'i bu rnams yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das
9b3(rgyud): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// don yod pa'i zhags pa rdzog so// / de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho rab 'byam thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// de nas
9b4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs tebla dgos phrag pa gcig tu gozar nas/ dbus mo
9b5(rgyud): g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ nyi ma'i/ 'od ltar 'od zer stong 'phro zhing 'od zer sna tshogs 'gyed pa'i lus kyis/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de log su
9b6(rgyud): thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ zhal gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas shing rdzogs la zhi ba bzhin 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis byams pa dang / snying rje chen po'i mthu yid la byed pas rigs bzhi'i
9b7(rgyud): 'jig rten la phan pa dang / snying rtse bas don thams cad grub par rig sngags 'chang rnams kyis bla na med pa'i de kho na nyid grub pa/ mchog sbyin pa thob par bya ba'i phyir bcom
9b8(rgyud): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la don yod pa'i rgyal po'i chos zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po'i snying po 'di mchis te/ 'di pad+ma rgya chen po'i dkyil
10a1(rgyud): 'khor de nyid chen po snying por 'phags pa snying por gyur pa/ de kho na nyid grub pa pad+ma dam pa dkyil 'khor chen po 'di phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / snying
10a2(rgyud): po rim par phye ba gsang ba dam pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor dam tshig dang sgrub pa gsang ba 'di bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bsgrags par bgyi'o// lha dang / klu dang / 
10a3(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang mi mang po'i 'khor chen po'i mdun dang / rig sngags grub pa'i lha'i
10a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi mdun 'di yang bsgrags par bgyi'o// / gang yang dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang // tshangs pa dang / lha dang / gshin rje dang / chu dang / 
10a5(rgyud): lus ngan dang / drang srong gi tshogs dang / zla ba dang / nyim dang / skar ma'i tshogs dang / rgyu skar dang / rig sngags 'chang grub pa'i lha mo rnams kyi mdun du kho na
10a6(rgyud): nyid kyi snying po yang dag pa 'jig rten las 'das pa/ dngos grub sgrub pa glags pas grub pa dang / sgom pas sgrub pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rig sngags chen po 'chang
10a7(rgyud): nga'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba'i mdun du de kho na nyid kyi snying po gsang ba dam pa bsgrags shing brjod par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa
10a8(rgyud): bsod nams stong gis rgyan pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad rnams kyis rnam par spras pa/ phyag dpung pa'i mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu 'od zer 'phro ba du mi'i 'phreng ba dang / spos kyi glang po
10b1(rgyud): tshe'i sna lta bu'i phyag brkyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyi bor bzhag nas klang ba la blugs te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
10b2(rgyud): sems can dag snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod smros shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs te/ ngas kyang da ltar byin gyis rlob kyi khyod gsang ba dam pa'i dam
10b3(rgyud): tshig spros shig/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rje su yi rang bzhin byin gyis brlabs pa gang+gA'i klung 'bum phrag bye bo brgya stong gi bye ma'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi de bzhin
10b4(rgyud): gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang byin gyis brlabs shing rje su yi rang bar mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dadapa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
10b5(rgyud): dbang phyug gis phyogs bcur bltas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rang gi snying po de kho na nyid gsang / ba'i gsang sngags 'di dag gsol to// oM pad+ma ha s+t+ra
10b6(rgyud): ma hA a mo g+ha pA shA sA d+ha ya sa ma ya hr-i da ya/ tsa ra tsa ra hUM/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rang bzhin gyi gzungs kyi snying po yin no// byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzig
10b7(rgyud): dbang phyug gis gsang ba'i snying po 'di brjod ma thag tu ri'i rgyal po po Ta la 'di brag dang nags tshal dang / rtsa shing du bcas pa dang / ri rab khor yug dang / khor yug chen po dang bcas
10b8(rgyud): pa rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos shing lha'i gnas rnams kyang ldeg par gyur te/ thams cad 'dar por gyur to// klu'i gnas dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gnas rnams kyang
11a1(rgyud): 'khrugs par gyur to// rgya mtsho chen po'i rlabs kyang 'khrug par gyur to// chu gter rnams kyang 'khrug par gyur to// de ma thag tu phyogs bcun sangs rgyas kyi sku
11a2(rgyud): gzugs brnyan bzhugs pa rnams legaso zhes bya ba byin te/ 'di skad ces kyang bka' stsal to// rgyal ba'i bdag nyid du skyes pa don yod pa gsang ba'i snying po bklags pas 'grub/ 
11a3(rgyud): ba bla na med pa smras pa leg so legs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems dpa' dag pa khyod kyis gsang ba klag
11a4(rgyud): pa'i cho ga de kho na nyid sgrub pa rgyas pa dang bcas par spro das shig/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gso le pa/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i snying po'i gzung
11a5(rgyud): 'di lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis de'i mod la phyogs bcu tha dad pa nas gang+gA klung sa ya bye ba brgya stong gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag brkyang ste spyi ba la
11a6(rgyud): bzhag nas leg so zhes bgyi ba'i sgra gsungs te/ gsungs pa tsam gyi mod la mngon bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i sgrib pa rnams nyams par bgyid/ zhig par bgyid do// 
11a7(rgyud): sdig pa thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / de bzhin du gnod pa zhi bar bgyid do// sdig pa dang / sems can gdugs pa rnams dang / phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba rnams
11a8(rgyud): 'jig par bgyid de/ 'di la the tshom mi bgyi'o// rtag tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin blta 'tshal bar 'gyur lag so// rig sngags 'di yi cho ga sgrub pa ni 'di
11b1(rgyud): yin te/ rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas shin tu/ gos gtsang ma bgos par bgyi'o// khyams pa dang / snying rje yid la bgyis pas 'byung po thams cad la mchog tu snying brtse bar
11b2(rgyud): bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mo'i gzugs la mchod par bgyi'o// me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mar me dbul bar bgyi'o// 
11b3(rgyud): tshes brgya dam/ tshes bco lnga la sgrub pa'i bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bgyi'o// ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du thog mar skyil mo dkrung bcas nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya
11b4(rgyud): rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// tshig gzhan mi smra bar khro/ dbo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te chab dang / yungs kar gyis dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// phyag
11b5(rgyud): rgya bcing bar bgyi ste/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu gdon pa/ ra bgyi'o// gsang sngags kyis ni dbang bskur bar ba gyi'o// phyag rgyas kyang dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// de'i
11b6(rgyud): 'og tu don yod pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig gi snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// bzlas brjod pa ton pa tsam gyis de'i modado la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po khro bo'i rgyal
11b7(rgyud): po dang bcas pa 'bum 'gyur du bzlas brjod bgyis par 'gyuraro// bzlas brjod rdzogs nas ri mo'i gzugs 'bar zhing sa yang g.yo bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
11b8(rgyud): phyug gi lus las 'od zer sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa lag na thogs pa'i zhags pa 'bar bar 'gyur zhing rig sngags 'chang snying dga' ba dang spyi bo'i gtsug 'bar
12a1(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// 'di ni grub pa'i rtags yin no zhes grub pa'i rtags dang leg so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i phyag rgya grub par
12a2(rgyud): 'gyuraro// de nas dgos pa thams cad dang las thams cad brjod pa tsam gyi de'i modo la 'grub par 'gyur lagaso// de bzhin gshegs pas ya bye ba brgya stong gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang ma
12a3(rgyud): pa'i phyag gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba'i spyi gtsug tu 'jog par rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rang bzhin gyi lus shin tu dri ma dang bral zhing yongs
12a4(rgyud): dag pas dri ma med pa'i bdag nyid kyi lus rang bzhin gyi ma dun na mchis par 'gyuraro// mchog thams cad stsol pa/ ra 'gyu ro// rnam pa thams cad grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro// 
12a5(rgyud): don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo'i phyag rgya gru ba pa stsol bar 'gyuraro// ji ltar snying las skyes pa'i bu ba zhin du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob kyi bar du yongasu skyeng bar
12a6(rgyud): bgyid do// de lta bas na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi dkyil 'khor mtha' dag yongasu rdzogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing legs par rgyan pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor
12a7(rgyud): ba dang bcas pa na/ khang brtsegs ma legs par brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri mchog la 'phags pa rgyal ba 'od dpag med 'od zer brgya stong phrag 'bum 'phro ba'i skus bzhugs shing tshes
12a8(rgyud): ston pa blta bar 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des legs par bkrus te/ gtsang mar gyur pas gos gtsang ma dgos te/ cho 'phrul gyi zla ba yar gyi ngol byams pa'i sems dang snying
12b1(rgyud): rje'i lhag pa'i bsams pas gus pa dang / dang ba dang / zhe sa dang / bla mar bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la ci 'byor pa me tog dang / gdugs pa dang / dri dang / 
12b2(rgyud): phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / lhab lhub dang / ba dan gyis mchod par bgyi'o// tshes brgyad nas tshes bcu gsum gyi bar du zas dkar gsum 'tshal bar bgyi'o// ri
12b3(rgyud): me'i gzugs kyi mdun du nyin gcig bzhin dus gsum du don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / tshig gzhan mi smra bar khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po brgya
12b4(rgyud): rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas ri mo'i gzugs de nyid kyi mdun du mchis nas nyal bar bgyi'o// mchod yon dang yon cha ba dus gsum du dbul bar bgyi'o// a ga ru dang / tsan dan
12b5(rgyud): dang / du ru ka dang / gu gul gyi me tog khu ba dang bcas pa gla rtsi dang lhan cig bsres nas bslang bar bgyi'o// dgug pa'isngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi te/ don yod khamra
12b6(rgyud): gsum rnam par grags// bdug pa'i rgyal po bla na med// gang phyir bdugs pa tsam gyis ni// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnamasu bdug pa'i
12b7(rgyud): sprin chen po 'khrigs pas rgyas par 'gyur ro// de 'khrigs pa de dag gis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin
12b8(rgyud): dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams la dri chen po'i mchod pa dang / bdug pa chen po'i mchod pa bgyis par 'gyur zhing de dag thams
13a1(rgyud): cang dga' bar 'gyur ro// gang yang dud 'gro'i skye gan su gtogs pa'i sems can gang dag gis bdug pa'i dri tsher na de dag thams cad ngan song du skye bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib
13a2(rgyud): pa rnams yongs su gtugs par 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / mu ge dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / nang 'khrug pa dang / 'khrugs pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / yams
13a3(rgyud): kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / gdung ba dang / mi bde ba thams cad dang / nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// rlung dang / ser ba dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba'i sprin thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// 
13a4(rgyud): sdig pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro// byang dang / g.yengs dbyed dang / sngags kyi sbyor ba thams cad dang / dug dang / dbyig dug dang / dug sbyar ma thams cad ni bar 'gyur ro// 
13a5(rgyud): gdon thams cad dang / brjed byed thams cad dang / rims dang bza' nyes dang / bsgoms nyes dang / gnod sgrib dang / gnod bltas thams cad bdug pa'i dris 'bros par 'gyur ro/ 
13a6(rgyud): 'jigs par 'gyur/ 'gyes par 'gyur te/ byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du lan 'ga' yang tshugs par mi 'gyur ro// bdug pa'i rgyal po 'di rtag tu sbyar bar bgyi'o// 'di ltar ches
13a7(rgyud): bcu bzhi'i nub mo mchis la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad dang / khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// zas dkar gsum gyi gtor ma ci 'byor pa dbul bar bgyi'o// 
13a8(rgyud): snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la dri dang 'bru mar gyi mar me dbul bar bgyi'o// ri mo'i gzugs de nyid mdun du nam langs kyi bar du mchis nas nyal bar bgyis te rmi lam/ 
13b1(rgyud): du dbyig gi mdzod mthong ngam/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal med khang dang bcas/ rin po che'i shing dang bcas/ rin po che'or dang bcas/ rdzing dang bcas/ gnas dang / 
13b2(rgyud): khang pa brtsegs ma dang bcas/ rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa mthong ngam/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis
13b3(rgyud): yongs su bskor cing khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhugs la lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lte 'phye chen po 'khor dang bcas pa
13b4(rgyud): mthong ngam/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra ba bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag med de yang rig sngags 'chang de la dbugs
13b5(rgyud): 'byin par mdzad cing leg so zhes bgyi ba yang stsol bar mardza/ da de/ kye skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis rig sngags 'chang / gi skyes bu'i byed pa mang du byas pa dang / khyod kyis dge ba'i
13b6(rgyud): rtsa ba mang du bskrun pa dang / khyod kyis lhags par mang du byas pa dang / khyod kyis bya ba gang yin pa byas pa dang / khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor
13b7(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po dang / gsang sngags rnam par bye ba'i snying po sgrub pa ni grub zin te/ legaso legaso// khyod rig sngags 'chang gi sangs rgyas nyid du gyur cig/ khyod 'di nas ma 'ongs pa'i mang
13b8(rgyud): gyi skye ba blangs te che rjes nas nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes phyag g.yas pa klad pa'i spyi bor 'jog
14a1(rgyud): par 'gyur 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub thams cad stsol cing 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyi dngos grub sgrub pa ste/ 'di ni dam pa sgrub pa yin no zhes bdag nyid sang / 
14a2(rgyud): nas dga' bar mthong ste ca/ sgrib pa thams cad dang bral zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bram ze'i gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur/ 
14a3(rgyud): zhing 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog stsol bar 'gyuraro// gzugs kyi ri mo de yang 'bar zhing 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyuraro// yon tan brgya stong mang po gzhan yang 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten
14a4(rgyud): pa'i phun sum tshogs pa yang 'thob par 'gyuraro// skye bo dang rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing mcher mchod par 'gyuraro// dge
14a5(rgyud): stong dang / bram ze rnams la don yod pa'i grub pa chen po la// thob par 'gyuraro// grub pa chen po bla na med pa yang 'gro/ ba par 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin dus gsum du phyag
14a6(rgyud): rgya bcing bar bgyi'o// de nas ches bcu bzhi la thog mar dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams la ci 'byor pa'i yon dang bcas pa'i mchod ston stsal bar bgyi'o// de nas bdag nyid long spyad par
14a7(rgyud): bgyi'o// gang gi tshe yang sangs rgyas la blta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' la blta ba dang / lha rnams la blta bar 'tshal ba na/ de'i tshe bdug pa'i rgyal po la dgug pa'i gsang
14a8(rgyud): sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bdug par bgyi'o// bdug pas bdugs pa tsam gyi mdo la zhal ston par 'gyur zhing dge ba'am mi dge badzang
14b1(rgyud): ngam nyams pa'am bri ba de dag thams cad gsung bar 'gyur ro// ji tsam tshe'i mthar thug gi bar du gsungs pa'am/ 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba gsung bar 'gyur ro// de nas gsang sngags kyi tshe/ 
14b2(rgyud): ga dang / sgrub pa'i don dang / las kyi cho ga yang ji lta ba bzhin du bshad par bgyi'o// oM pad+ma d+ha ra/ a mo gA dza ya de tsu ru tsu ru swA hA/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po'i nye ba'i snying po'i gas
14b3(rgyud): sngags so// oM pad+ma pA sha d+ha rA ya/ a mo g+ha ba ra sa ny+tso da ya hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / 
14b4(rgyud): lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / dalto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa da bskul ba'i gsang sngags te/ bdug pa'i rgyal pos btug
14b5(rgyud): nas chab dang / yungs kar bsres la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas phyogs bcur gtor na thams cad bskul bar bgyis par 'gyur ro// oM trai lokya a b+ha hA/ 
14b6(rgyud): naHa mo g+ha pA sha/ pad+ma bi lo ki ta A yan+tu/ b+hu ba ne su ra/ su ru su ru/ bi ma la hUM/ dgug pa'i gsang sngags te/ gu gul gyi bdug pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis
14b7(rgyud): nas chu dang me tog bsres pas phyogs bcur gtor bar bgyi ste/ thams cad nas dgug pa dam pa grub pa lags so// oM pad+ma b+hu dze ma hA pA sha d+hA ra Ni man+t+ra ya mi/ a mo g+ha pA sha yan tu b+hu ba
14b8(rgyud): sra mu ru mu ru hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad na gnas pa'i lha tshogs
15a1(rgyud): la sogs pa spyan drangs pa'i gsang sngags te/ ril ba spyi blugs dang / chab dang me tog dang / tshems shing la bdug pa'i rgyal pos bdugs te/ thams cad la lan brgya/ 
15a2(rgyud): rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ thams cad spyan drang ba'i rig sngags so// oM pad+ma a mo g+ha badz+ra a d+hiSh+ThA na ku ru ku ru swA hA// sa'i dkyil 'khor bcing ba ste/ chab dang yungs kar la lan/ 
15a3(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas sa la gtor nas dpag tshad sum brgyas kun nas 'khor ba'i sa'i dkyil 'khor rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de thams cad bsrungs pas ni
15a4(rgyud): rdo rje sra ba'i sems su 'gyur ro// dgra rnams kyis mi mthong ra ba dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / gnod spyi na dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / brjed byed
15a5(rgyud): dang / ro langs dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / 'dod dgur bsdu/ ra ba'i gzugs can thams cad kyis mi mthong ste/ rnam/ pa thams cad du mi mthong bas/ rnam pa thams cad du
15a6(rgyud): mi mthong bas rdo rje sra bas 'gyur ro// oM a mo g+ha pA sha pad+mo tA ra si hA/ san+na Ti si ri si ri hUM/ gdan gyi gsang sngags te yungs kar la stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod kyis te sa la gtor
15a7(rgyud): na pad+ma chen po'i gzhal yas khang gi gdan du byin gyis brlabs nas legs par phul bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i seng ge'i gdan
15a8(rgyud): du byin gyis brlabs nas legs par phul bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gis rang gi stan la chab dang / yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas gtor te/ rig
15b1(rgyud): sngags grub pa'i pad+ma'i stan gsang ba'i gsang sngags so// oM ma hA ka ru Ni ka pad+ma a mo g+ha pA sha dri D+ha badz+ra a d+hiSh+Thi ta b+hu ru b+hu ru ban d+ha re swA hA/ dkyil 'khor mtha' dag na khyim dang / nags
15b2(rgyud): tshal na/ kun dga' ra ba dang / gtsug lag khang dang / sti gnas dang / 'chags dang / phug dang / dgon pa dang / gnas gsang ba'i phyir dri chab dang / yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa
15b3(rgyud): brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas gtor bar bgyis te/ gnas su gtogs pa thams cad gsang ba chen po bgyis par 'gyur ro// nyes par bgyid pa dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren dang
15b4(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad 'gro/ das par 'gyur te/ gnas gsang ba'i gsang sngags// oM pad+ma a mo g+ha pA sha na sa man+ta da sha su drak+Shi si mA ban d+ha
15b5(rgyud): yang tu ru hu ru hUM/ lcags kyi pur bu sor brgyad pa'i changalnga la tshon sna lnga'i skud pas dkris te lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas phyogs bzhir gzugs par
15b6(rgyud): bgyi'o// lnga pa ni dbus kyi gzhir gzugs par bgyi ste/ rgyang grags bdun 'khor bar mtshams bcing bgyis par 'gyur ro// ji srid du pur bu ma byung ba de srid du mtshams chen po
15b7(rgyud): bcings pa bgyis par 'gyur ro// oM a mo g+ha maN+Da la ban d+ha ya sa man+te na/ pad+ma ma hA pad+me/ d+hu ru d+hu ru swA hA/ dkyil 'khor bcing ba ste/ dri chab dang / yungs kar la lan brgyaH
15b8(rgyud): brgyangad bzlas brjod bgyis nas dkyil 'khor mtha' dag dang / de bzhin du 'og dang / steng du yang gtor te dkyil 'khor chen po bcings par bgyis par 'gyur ro// bgegs dang log 'dren dang
16a1(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang // srin pongs dag tha mchi bar 'os pa thams cad kyis mchi bar mi 'gyur ro// sems can gdug pa dang / lA 'am/ klug dug pa gang su yang
16a2(rgyud): rung ba de dag thams cad zil gyis mnan par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa'i bgyi ba ngan pa dang / sngags ngan pa dang / sems can ngan pa dang / bgyid ba ngan pa thams cad yongs su spangs
16a3(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// oM a mo g+ha pa ri shud+d+he sho d+ha ya sa man+te na/ d+hi ri d+hi ri shud+d+ha satwa ma hA pad+me hUM// 'dis pa'i rnam lnga la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i cha
16a4(rgyud): mtha' dag na btsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa 'am/ byaskyibs sam/ tshang tshong ngam/ 'chags 'am/ gnas sam/ tshal lam nags tshal lam/ bskyed
16a5(rgyud): mos tshal lam/ kun dga' ra ba 'am/ brangs 'am/ skyabs sam/ khang pa la gtor na stong pa 'am/ mi stong pa 'am/ 'dam rdzab dang / mi gtsang ba dang / phyag
16a6(rgyud): dar gyis gang ba dang / 'byung po dang / sha dang / yi dgas la sogs te/ rigs ngan po thams cad yongs su spangs par 'gyur ro// gtsang ma dag par 'gyur ro// gnas gtsang
16a7(rgyud): mar 'gyur ro// bdag nyid la dbang bskur na/ bza' nyes dang / sgom nyes dang / gnod bltas dang / gnod sgrib kyis gnas ngan pa thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// gtsang
16a8(rgyud): ma dag par 'gyur ro// mi gtsang ba gtsang bar 'gyur ro// tshangs par spyod pa ma lags pa tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ro// bsnyen gnas ma bgyis pa ni bsnyen gnas bgyis par
16b1(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de la lha thams cad srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba bgyid par 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / khyab 'jug chen po dang / 
16b2(rgyud): gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan la sogs pa srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i slad du rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang / mchod
16b3(rgyud): par 'os par 'gyur ro// tshig brtsan par 'gyur ro// nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / gnod pa la sogs pa thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur/ 
16b4(rgyud): phyogs bzhir kun tu gtor na 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / mu ge dang / mi ngas dang // yams dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / 'khrug pa
16b5(rgyud): thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin du bdag nyid la dbang bskur ram/ reg par bgyis nas rigasngags dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gyi rim par
16b6(rgyud): dbye ba dang / las chen po 'grub par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i grub pa chen po 'grub par 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du mchis pa de dang der mchod par 'gyur ro// thams cad kyis mi bzlogs
16b7(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin gzhal med khang rgya chen po bkra zhing rnam par bkra ba chen po rmi lam du mthong ba dang / rnam pa thams cad du mchog rgya chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// dge sbyong
16b8(rgyud): dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / khyim bdag dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhes mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro// 
17a1(rgyud): rtag tu gtsang mar spyod par gtsang zhing zhing dag par 'gyur ro// rtag par dus kun tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug blta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// 'dod pa thams cad
17a2(rgyud): kyis mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med rmi lam du rtag tu mthong zhing shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde
17a3(rgyud): ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// oM pad+me sa ra sa ra/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha ma hA a mo g+ha sa ma ya swA hA// gsang sngags so// oM pi pu la pad+ma a mo g+ha pra sar pra bi sha tu/ ku ru ku ru swA hA// 'jug pa'i gas/ 
17a4(rgyud): sngags so// oM a mo g+ha a nu sha ya ma hA pad+ma ban b+hu re hUM/ slob ma'i gsang sngags so// oM a mo g+ha pad+ma shi ge tu ru tu ru/ tiSh+Thi badz+ra ban d+he swA hA// spyi gtsug gi bcing ba'i gsang
17a5(rgyud): sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM a mo g+ha pad+ma dza long k+She pa/ b+hi ri b+hi ri hUH/ chab bteg pa'i gsang / sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM a mo g+ha bi ka
17a6(rgyud): TaM b+ha ra pad+ma a sa Ne dza la ba ti/ ku ru ku ru hUM/ bum pa'i gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM pad+mo pra sa ra a mo g+ha bi ma le b+ha ra b+ha ra swA hA// chab kyi rgyun gyi gsang sngags te lan nyi/ 
17a7(rgyud): shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM a mo g+ha pad+me su pad+me/ pUr+Na ka re d+hi ri d+hi ri bi ma le swA hA// lag pa'i gsang sngags te/ lag pa gnyis la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas dkyil
17a8(rgyud): 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / sgrub pa'i dgos pa thams cad bgyi ste/ sgrub pa thams cad la bsgrub par bgyi zhing las thams cad la dus thams cad
17b1(rgyud): dubagyi'o// oM a mo g+ha bi ma le dzi hA gra sa sho d+ha ni pad+ma ka ma la dziH/ saM sho d+ha ya d+ha ra d+ha ra su bi ma le swA hA// lce sbyang ba'i gsang sngags te/ dri chab la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis/ 
17b2(rgyud): te kha bshal la lce'i dri ma yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// pad+ma dang ku mu da'i mdab ma dang 'dra bar lce gnyen par 'gyur ro// so dang / dkan dang / mgul pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// 
17b3(rgyud): oM a mo g+ha ga na d+ha ba ti su ru su ru/ pra b+hu ru di bya gan+d+he pad+ma pra b+he swA hA/ gsang sngags 'dis khar stsal ba'i ril bu dang tsan dan dang / na la da dang / s+thi ka dang / ut+pa la dang / gur gum dang / 
17b4(rgyud): gla rtsi lhan cig bslang ba bgyis la phye ma zhib mor btags na/ sa ril bu zho gnyis tsam pa'i tshad du sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig/ sbyar la gsang sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te
17b5(rgyud): zangs kyi snod du stsal nas/ bzlas brjod bgyid pa'i tshe kha ra stsal nas skad cig tsam zhig bsdad pa bgyis na rtag tu/ kha nas ut+pala'i dri 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rgyang grags tsam
17b6(rgyud): du the tsom med/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / de bzhin byang chub sems dpa'ang dgyes/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin mgon po mchog tu dga' bar
17b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// 'phags pa don yod pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// // bam po gnyis pa// bzlas pas bde bar 'grub 'gyur bas// don yod rig sngags bla na med
17b8(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang dang gtam bgyid pas// dus kun rul dri spang bar bgyi// mkhris pa bad kan snabs dag dang // de bzhin kun 'jig myur du ni// kha nas lha yi dri dag 'byung // su la
18a1(rgyud): tshig dag smras pa ni// de ni myur du dbang du 'gyur// lha rnams dbang du mchis pa dang // bde sogs bdag po dbang po dang // gshin rje chu lha lus ngan dang // tshangs pa
18a2(rgyud): khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag dang // zla ba nyi ma nyid dag dang // thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis// 'di ni kha na mur bgyid na// tshig ldan lce yi rtse mo la// 
18a3(rgyud): mchis pas tshig ni gsal bar 'gyur// rtag tu mi men dbyangs 'gyur te// dri ma'i skyon ni rnam par spangs// tshogs bcad stong ni klog pa dang // sngon bklags pa ni nyams mi 'gyur// 
18a4(rgyud): hUM zhes bgyis pas lha kun dang // lha gang dkyil 'khor gnas pa'ang mchis// phaT ces bgyis pas gtug da pa dang // bgegs dang log 'dren rnam par 'jig/ gnod
18a5(rgyud): sbyin srin po sha za dang // brjed byed 'byung po gsang ba pa/ thams cad mod la 'byor 'gyur zhing // khas bub tu yang 'gyel bar 'gyur// ril bu kha na thogs na ni// dus
18a6(rgyud): kun tu ni mkhas par 'gyur// grub pa myur du thob 'gyur te// thams cad du yang tshe ring 'gyur// tshig mnyen 'jam zhing snyan par 'gyur// ril bu 'di ni bcang bgyis na// don yod pad+ma
18a7(rgyud): dri ma mang // ril bu zhes bgyi 'grub par 'gyur// oM ma la bi ga te/ pad+ma bi ba re/ s+phA ra ba ba tsa re swA hA// a mo g+ha sid+he/ sho d+ha ya hUM/ na ga pus pa'i shun pa dang / u shi ra dang / 
18a8(rgyud): tsan dan dang / pad+ma ge sar dang / li shi dang / ka ko la dang / spang spos dang / rgya spos dang / gur gum dang / pra pu na da ri ka dang / e la dang / sa ma ka dang / u gra dang / su gan+d+hi ka'i
18b1(rgyud): rnams cha mnyam par bgyis te zhib tu btags nas gsang sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas char pa'i chab dang bsres pas khrus bgyis shing 'tshal ba 'am/ chab dron pos khrus bgyi ba 'am/ 
18b2(rgyud): 'tshal bas shin tu khrus bgyis pa gtsang ma dag pas bag tsha ba ma mchis pa gton pa tsam gyis/ sngon gyis drag po'i las rnams dang // gdon kun 'joms pa 'grub pa dang // nang
18b3(rgyud): kun rnam par nyams pa dang // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gi/ mun pa mi zad spong bar gsungs// bkrus 'tshal tsam gyi mod la ni// dri ma kun zhi som nyi med// dpal gyis lha yi/ 
18b4(rgyud): bzhin du 'bar// bsod nams phung po rnam par 'phel// gzi brjid phung po rtag tu 'bar// zla ba nyi ma bzhin du mdzes// gtsang ma'i lus su gyur pa na// lus ni lha
18b5(rgyud): yi bzhin du 'gyur// mi gtsang ba ni gtsang bar 'gyur// ma dag pa ni dag par 'gyur// tshangs par spyod min tshangs spyod 'gyur// thub min thub pa kho nar 'gyur// 
18b6(rgyud): tshangs par me spyod tshangs spyod 'gyur// mgo skya gnyer ma spangs pa dang // rtag tu bro nang ma mchis 'gyur// lus la lha yi dri rnams 'byung // pad+ma ku mu mnyen pa'i lus// sngon
18b7(rgyud): gyi dri ni rab spangs te// lha yi can dan dri dag ni// mda' rgyang gang du som nyi med// rtag tu bde bar nyal ba dang // bde bar yang ni sad par 'gyur// gnod sbyin srin po 'byung po dang // 
18b8(rgyud): lha min gdugs pa log 'dren dang // gdug pa'i bgegs kun mthong mi 'gyur// mi bzad dgra rnams kyis kyang min// lus nyid sbyangs pa bgyis nas su// bzlas brjed brtson pa'i
19a1(rgyud): sgrub pa bgyi// legs pa'i sgrub pa'i las bgyis na// de nyid bde bar 'grub par 'gyur// rgyal ba byang chub sems dpa' kun// de bzhin mod la gzigs par 'gyur/ lha
19a2(rgyud): rnams kun dang gang dag gzhan// dkyil 'khor gnas pa myur du mchi// ci 'dod yid la bzlas pa yi// rtag tu don yod grub par 'gyur// thog mar lus sbyangs cho ga bgyi// de nas
19a3(rgyud): gsang sngags legs par spyang // oM a mo g+ha pad+ma lo tsa na dbyi/ driSh+Ta pa ri shud+d+he/ su ru su ru pad+ma a k+Shi sha b+hu ru b+hu ru sa man+ta bya ba lo ka ni swA hA// ldong ros gi bang rgya mtsho dbu ba sa ha dza/ 
19a4(rgyud): ut+pal sbrang rtsi lhan cig reng bu 'di bgyis la// gsang snga dgas sum steng rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i mig sman 'di/ de de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mchog tu bzang zhes
19a5(rgyud): gsungs// 'di ni 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin gyis// kun pas bkra shis shis 'di mig nang kun// 'jom sa par bgyid de g.yar lam bzang po rmi// yid du mi mchi/ 
19a6(rgyud): ba nyid mthong mi 'gyur// ngan par snang dang ngan par blta// nam yang mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// gtum po 'joms pa gtum po dang // lhag ma spags pa sgom nyes dang // bza' nyes
19a7(rgyud): gnod bsgribs gnod sbyin dang // srin po dang ni sdig sbrul dag/ thams cad nyin dang mtshan dag tu// mi snang bar ni the tshom med// mig gis bzang po mthong ba dang // rmi lam bzang po
19a8(rgyud): mthong bar 'gyur// zla ba srid du rab sbyar bas// lha rdzas dag ni mthong bar 'gyur// mig yongasu sbyong ba'o// oM bud d+he bud d+he/ bi bud d+he pad+ma a mo g+ha mu khi// ba ra ba ra ba ra de swA hA/ 
19b1(rgyud): rig sngags 'dis gi wang la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// don yod pa'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o// khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyi'o// snying / 
19b2(rgyud): bopodang / nye ba'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// bzlas brjod bgyid pa'i tshe yang 'di blangs te dpral ba'i dbus su thig le bgyis te/ thig le lan cig bgyis pas dpral
19b3(rgyud): ba'i steng na skar ma'i dbyibs lta bur gnas par 'gyur ro// gdugs pa thams cad dbang 'gyur mchis// gnod sbyin 'byung po gang dag dang // srin po bgegs dang log 'dren nyid// 
19b4(rgyud): thams cad 'jig 'gyur the tshom med// sems can gdu ga pas gdugs bsams kyang // phyir zhing bzod par da mi nus pas// de dag thams cad 'jig 'gyur te// me la/ 
19b5(rgyud): phye ma leb bzhon no// rtag tu rgyal po skye bor bcas// 'khor bcas blon por bcas pa dang // blon po che dang / mdun na 'don// btsun me tshegs bcas dbang du 'gyur// 
19b6(rgyud): dge sbyong dang ni bram ze dag/ thams cad dbang du mchis par 'gyur// rgyal rigs dmangs rigs nyid dag ste// thams cad dbang du mchis par 'gyur// mchod pa chen po'i 'os su
19b7(rgyud): 'gyur/ rig sngags la ni thams cad dang // gang dag dkyil 'khor gnas pa ste// de dag thams cad dam tshig gi/ rjes su sgrub cing skyong bar 'gyur// phyogs bcur srung ba bgyid
19b8(rgyud): 'gyur zhing // rtag tu grub pa bla med stsol// theg le 'di bgyi grogs med rgyu ba dag/ chom rkun dang ni chom po g.yon can dang // g.yul 'gyed nyid kyi 'jigs pa gang yin pa// kun
20a1(rgyud): nas bsgral bar 'gyur te som nyi med// seng ge stag dang ngom dag dang // glang chen khro ba mi bzang dang // wa dang gdug bcas srog chags dang // so gdugs sprul
20a2(rgyud): kun mgo nas za// gang dag srog chags gdug par bcas// de dag thams cad nub 'gyur te// nam yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// ser ba me dang tshig pa dang // char pa mi bzang mtshan
20a3(rgyud): chu byang // mkhas pas thig le 'chang ba'i lus// khyim rdzib bas kyang non mi 'gyur// mkhas pa rig sngags 'chang ba'i don// thams cad 'dis yis bgyid par 'gyur// shin tu ma grub
20a4(rgyud): gsal bar yang // 'grub par 'gyur te the tshom med// bcom ldan 'das rig stegs 'chang gis bdag dran par bgyid cing don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dran par bgyid na
20a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de ma thag tu rig sngags 'chang de'i mdu nan bdag mchis nas yid la bsams pa yong su rdzogs par bgyi'o// thams cad kyi mchog thams cad ji skad
20a6(rgyud): gsungs pa bzhin stsal bar bgyi'o// dgos pa thams cad sgrub par bgyi'o// don yod grub pa rjesu stsal bar bgyi'o// bden par dam bcas pas dam tshig rje su bskyang bar bgyi'o// bcom
20a7(rgyud): ldan 'das gal te rig sngags 'chang gis ji skad gsungs pa'i tshig zhib mo sgrub par bgyid na de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkas rjes su gnang
20a8(rgyud): bang dag thams cad bdag gis stsal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te rig sngags 'chang sgrub pa dang bral bar gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag gis ma nongs so// de lta bas na
20b1(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gis ji skad gsungs pa'i cho ga dang / cho ga zhib mo sgrub pas gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya sgrub par bgyi ste dgos pa de dag thams cad the tshom ma mchis par 'grub par 'gyur/ 
20b2(rgyud): de nas gsang sngags bzlas te/ oM a me gA pA sha d+ha ra pra sa ra hUM/ mchod phyir thogs pa'i skud pa'i gsang sngags te/ gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i skud pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
20b3(rgyud): brjod gyis nas mdung pa gsum dor bar bgyi'o// oM a mo g+ha pra ba ra Na/ mu ru mu ri di bya ka shaM ke/ saM b+ha ba tu ta ra ta ra swA hA/ gos kyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla so// oM
20b4(rgyud): a mo g+ha bstas+t+ra d+hod k+Shi pA mi bo d+he ni pad+me swA hA// gos bteg dpa'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla so// oM dpyo da ka saM b+hU ta a mo g+ha ba ru Na tsi re b+hi k+Shin ts+ya hUM// khrus
20b5(rgyud): kyi sngags ti lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM a mi ta a mo g+ha pad+ma a sa ne/ baR+Sha ni/ tsu ru tsu ru swA hA/ nye reg gi sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// 
20b6(rgyud): a mo g+ha rak+Sha Ni/ ku ru ku ru swA hA// bdag srung ba ste/ yungs kar dang / chab la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas rang gi lus la dbang bskur ro// oM a mo g+ha sa ma ya/ 
20b7(rgyud): ma hA pad+me tiSh+Tha tiSh+Ti hUM/ dam tshig gi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM sar+b+ba tra a mo g+ha ba ba ti tiSh+Tha rak+Sha tu hUM/ slob ma dang grogs bgyid pa srung ba ste/ thal ba la lan
20b8(rgyud): bdun bzlas nas dpral bar thig le bgyi'o// oM trai lokya pad+ma a mo g+ha kra ma ne mi li mi li swA hA// gem pA dor ba'i sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM pad+me ma hA pad+me sa ras
21a1(rgyud): ra sa man+te na pa ri beSh+TA ya/ a mo g+ha pa she na su ru su ru swA hA// tshon skung sna lnga la lan bdun bzlas te dkri bar bgyi'o// oM bi tsi tra a mo g+ha bstan/ raMg bi shud d+hA ya/ 
21a2(rgyud): ki Ni ki Ni swA hA// ba dan gyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM a mo g+ha sha ra badz+ra tun+ta tha ra tha ra swA hA// mda'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM bi bu la a mo g+ha
21a3(rgyud): ma hA d+ha ra bi shud+d+he/ si ri si ri swA hA// rta babs kyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// su dag der zhugs nas mtho ris kyi sgor zhugs par 'gyur ro// sdig pa dang sgrib pa
21a4(rgyud): thams cad yengasu byang bar 'gyu ro// oM nA nA bi tsi Ti/ a mo da g+ha puSh+pa/ pha la tA kIr+Na pU ra ya/ pa ra pa ra hUM/ bum pa dgang ba'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM a mo/ 
21a5(rgyud): g+ha rat+na bi ma Na/ ka Ta tsa/ a driSh+Ta bi bya gan d+ho dza s+pha ra Na/ sa man+te na dz+wa la dz+wa la swA hA// pog por gyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM dz+wa la ba ti/ rat+na g+ha ta/ si ri Ni
21a6(rgyud): tu Ti tu Ti swA hA// gtor ma'i snod kyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM di bya b+haM dza na/ a mo g+ha tsa na a mo g+ha pad+ma ba re pU ra ya hUM/ kham por gyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlaso// 
21a7(rgyud): oM a mo g+ha se pur Ni dro Na gan+d+ha pa ta swA hA// thig le'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzla so// oM sa ra ni sA ra ya/ a mo g+ha b+ha dza ne mA da ne hUM/ ril ba mgrin rings kyi gsang sngags te lan
21a8(rgyud): bdun bzla so// oM rat+na di bya rat+na kum b+ha ba ti sA ga ra/ saM pU ra Ni swA hA// bum pa'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlaso// oM bi tsi tro dz+wa la nA na raM ga bi b+hak+ta ya saM sho d+ha ya tu Ti swA hA// mtshon
21b1(rgyud): rtsi'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlaso// oM bya a wa lo ki ni bi b+hu dza ye tus gnasas 3/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te so sor dbye bar bgyi'o// oM na nA pra hA ra Na a mo g+ha/ 
21b2(rgyud): mu drA dz+wa la dz+wa la swA hA// phyag mtshan bri ba ste lan bdun bzla so// oM a mo g+ha rat+na su tra d+ha re/ ka Ni ki Ni swA hA// thig skud kyi gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te dkyil/ 
21b3(rgyud): 'khor ram/ ri mi bri ba'i ras sam/ gzhan gzhi ci yang rung ba la yang gdab par bgyi'o// oM bi bu la ba re pra be sha ya/ oM mo g+ha pad+me hUM/ sgo'i cha bye ba'i gsang sngags ste sgo re rer yang
21b4(rgyud): lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla so// oM su d+hi b+hak+ti su me ga la dA da pA ban ti/ oM di bya bA dzA na/ a mo g+ha bA sha na pa na ba raM dgi ri gau ri hUM/ oM sa~M pUr+Na/ rU bying bya ba dza ni/ oM mo g+ha
21b5(rgyud): pad+me sA hA// lan bdun bzlas par bgyi'o// oM bi bi d+har+m+ma pa hA ro pa kA ra Na/ tsa la tsa la/ a mo g+ha ba ti swA hA/ la na nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM di bya gan+d+ha nu sa ra Ni a
21b6(rgyud): mo g+ha ba le d+ha ra d+ha ra swA hA/ mchod yon gyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM gan+d+ha s+pha ra Ni sa man+ta/ a mo g+ha pre s+phu ra hUM/ dri'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM nir ma la
21b7(rgyud): kA ya sho d+ha ni di bya gan+d+ha pra pu ra Ni pU ra ya hUM/ byug pa'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlaso// oM gan+d+ha tsAn+d+ha pra pU ra Ni/ tsu ru tsu ru swA hA// dri'i phye ma'i gsang sngags te/ lan bdun bzlas so// 
21b8(rgyud): oM sems mnan/ bau ma le gan d+hi ti ta re swA hA// bskul ba'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// i de bya gan+d+ha pra pUr Ni sA gar ji la ba gyis d+hiSh+Ti te ka la she d+har/ pUr+Na pU ra ya dza ya si ng+yas
22a1(rgyud): bum pa 'dri chub kyi gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// soras swa grab te/ sar+b+ba bi d+ha yang+gi wAn a d+hiSh+NI tes pU ra ya hUM/ gtor ma ro sna tshogs can gyi gsang sngags
22a2(rgyud): te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM dib bya b+ho dza na/ saM pU ra ya/ bi pu la pra b+he swA hA// kha zas kyi gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM tri shukla b+he dza na/ ba li bi pU la ra sA gra ba
22a3(rgyud): te sur pra su hUM/ bas dkar gsum gyi gtor ma 'am/ gtor ma gzhan la yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM phal ba ti sA ra ba ting ba bya na swa ti/ ta ra tar tu ni swAhA// 'bras bun
22a4(rgyud): gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM dpe bya ku su mod dpa la nA nA pUSh+pa pra b.rA ni b+ha ba swA hA// me tog gi gsang stu dgas te lan bdun bzlas so// oM bi bi d+ha la ta pud+d+ha ba kuH
22a5(rgyud): dzi ta ba na swa te a ha ra sa pUr+N+Na/ ku b+de swA hA// me tog gter na gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM ma hA d+hu n-i/ gA baT lasan+na dA ya/ sa man+tan hUM swA hA// bdug pa'i gsang / 
22a6(rgyud): sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM a tha ra pa Ni dz+wa la dz+wa la/ de ba mu khe swA hA// me'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM bi bi d+ha ma Ni kan ka rat+ne dz+wa la pU Sh+Ti ma Ni a mo g+ha ma Ni saH
22a7(rgyud): cha zhing brgyan pa'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM pad+ma ka re bi ma lan kha/ ang gu li/ sa ma sa ma sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA// thal mo sbyar ba'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu
22a8(rgyud): gcig bzlas so// oM sarba gu Na pra Na ta/ shi ro ban d+ha nA ya na ma ska ro mi/ mi li mi li tu ri Ne swA hA// phyag bgyi da'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oMd sha di sha a b+hi ban d+han pra
22b1(rgyud): sar tu hUM/ bskor ba'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM bi bi d+ha yu d+ha dz+wa la ti pa ni/ pra dz+wa la pra s+phu ra hUM/ thal mo'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// 
22b2(rgyud): oM di ba bya a mo g+ha bi pu la swa re ma d+hu ra nir g+ho Sha ru te na ra Na ra Na hUM/ dril bu'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// yang na brgya rtsa brgyad do// oM ra sh+mi dz+wa la sa man+te na a ba
22b3(rgyud): b+hA sa ya ma hA ma Ni rat+na shi khe swA hA/ mar me'i gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM d+hu ru d+hu ru a pa ha ya shI g+ha dza be hUM/ dgugs pa'i gsang sngags te gu gul gyi bdug
22b4(rgyud): pa lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM duSh+Ta sa do bi bo d+ha ni/ sa ma sa ma ya ba re swA hA// dam tshig gi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM be tsi tra ma Ni bi bu
22b5(rgyud): la pra ba ra ta ni hUM// bgrang phreng gi gsang sngags te lan pa rgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM bi tsi tra rat+no dz+wa lo dbi bya/ ku su ma ba re puSh+pa ra ti swA hA// me tog phreng ba'i gsang sngags
22b6(rgyud): te lan bdun bzlas so// oM dipe bya lo tsa ne a mo g+ha pra ba re/ sarba dib bya a d+hiSh+Thi ta sid+d+he shud+d+ha bi lo ki te swA hA// dgug pa'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM a mo g+ha pad+me
22b7(rgyud): sa ma na ta shu b+ha ne ta ra ta ra gats+tsha swa b+hA ba na ma swA hA// slar gshegs su gsol ba'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM di ba bya saM pU ra Ni/ nA ga bi lo kin hUM/ 'khar
22b8(rgyud): bsil gyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM pa Ta sU ra Ni sU ra ya/ a mo g+ha bi ta sa man+ta pra b+he swA hA// lhung bzed kyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM
23a1(rgyud): dur b+ha saM s+pha ra bi d+h+ya a tiSh+Thi ta pra sa ra/ su ra su ra/ ri Shi pU dzi te swA hA// rtsa gding ba'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM dz+wa la du ma dz+wa la shi kha ri shI gar/ 
23a2(rgyud): b+he swA hA// sbyin sreg gi gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM pad+ma ni pad+ma sa ne ba re nA ga b+hu ba ne swA hA// 'bab chu dang / mtsho'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM kha
23a3(rgyud): ga tsa ri Ni/ ga ma ga ma ya pad pra tsa ri Ni hUM// len pa'i gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM sarba tra a mo g+ha b+hi She ka ma hA tsU Da bi ma le// a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu mAn// pra bar bA
23a4(rgyud): Ni b+hu dze pad+me d+ha dze swA hA// dbang bskur ba'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// rig sngags 'cha rang gis gsang sngags 'di dag thams cad so sor cho ga
23a5(rgyud): zhib mo'i sgrub pa ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad so sor skya/ ra nas cho ga bsgrubs na dgos pa rgya chen po'i 'byor/ pa'i mthu 'di dag dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / 
23a6(rgyud): dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / rin po che'i snod sna tshogs dang / nor bu sna tshogs kyi gzhal med khang rgya chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lha'i me tog dang / bdug dang / 
23a7(rgyud): ngan sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ro brgya dang / ldan pa'i kha zas kyi mchog dang / ro sna tshogs kyi mchog rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gtor ma bzang po rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba
23a8(rgyud): 'gyur// ji tsam de bzhin gshegs pa la 'os pa'i gzhal med khang dag 'thung bar 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' gzhal med khang ji lta ba de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyuraro// lha rnams kyi
23b1(rgyud): gzhal med khang ji lta ba de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyuraro// klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / na mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams
23b2(rgyud): la/ so so'i gzhal med khang ji lta ba de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyuraro// mi rnams kyi khang pa ji lta ba dang / kha zas kyi mchog ji lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de lta bas na dgos pa'i rnam pa
23b3(rgyud): thams cad bgyi ba dang / de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i ji skad gsungs pa'i cho ga zhib mo dang / cho ga dang gsang sngags sgrub pa rnams bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis grub pa bla na med pa thad
23b4(rgyud): 'thob par 'gyur ro// gal te rig sngags 'chang gis la das yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ste don yod pa'i zhags pa/ 'i snying po 'di brjod pa tsam gyis rig sngags 'chang gi mdun
23b5(rgyud): du bdag rang gi gzugs kyis nye bar mchis nas bsam pa dang re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / gnod pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur
23b6(rgyud): yongs su dag pa'i lha chen po ltar lus dag par bgyi'o// cho ga zhib mo dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / snying po dang / dkyil 'khor dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rgyal po'i
23b7(rgyud): rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor grub pa'i mchog thams cad stsal bar bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// de kho na nyid yang
23b8(rgyud): dag par sgrub pa'i grub pa stsol bar bgyi'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa sgrub pa'i grub pa chen po stsal bar bgyi'o// shin tu rgya che zhing bag tshab ma
24a1(rgyud): mchis pa dang / mchod ba dang / bkur sa chen po 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchog khyad par du'angags shing nor 'du ba'i dkra shis dang dpal stsal bar bgyi'o// 
24a2(rgyud): 'di la yid gnyis dang som nyi bskyed par mi bgyi zhing dngos po gzhan du yang yid la mi bgyi'o// sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyis
24a3(rgyud): brtse ba la mchog tu brtson par bgyi'o// bu gcig pa bzhin du sems can du gyur pa thams cad la mchog tu brtse bar bgyi'o// bden par smra ba dang / bden par dga' ba dang / snyan par smra ba
24a4(rgyud): dang / snying rje'i lhag par bsam pas dmigs nas don ye/ dad pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas par bgyi'o// bzlas pa/ rjod kyi cho ga bgyi zhing phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyang bzlas
24a5(rgyud): par bgyi'o// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yid la/ bgyis nas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom par bgyir
24a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag bgyi'o// 'phags pa mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag bgyis nas mngon sum du sgom par bgyi'o// bcom
24a7(rgyud): ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la phyag bgyis te mdun du rtsa'i gding ba gting nas skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas gzhan mi smra bar bzlas pa bgyi ste
24a8(rgyud): 'di ni gsang ba'i de kho na nyid sgrub pa'o// de nas phyag rgya dang gsang sngags brjod par bgyi'o// bdag la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i de kho na nyid grub par gyur cig/ 'jig rten dbang / 
24b1(rgyud): phrug mgon po thugs rje can sems can la byams pa dang / sems can dag pa lag na pad+ma can/ sems can thams cad la byams pa'i bdag nyid can gyi byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyi/ 
24b2(rgyud): brlabs dang / phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa kun dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / srin po lha min gsang ba pa dang / 'jig rten skyong dang tshangs pa dang // drag po khyab 'jug
24b3(rgyud): gzhon nu sogs// gshin rje chu lha lus ngan dang // drang srong tshegs dang de bzhin du// zla nyi kun bged gzhon nu dang // de bzhin dbang phyug dbang chen dang // phyag rgya bcing ba tsam gyis ni/ 
24b4(rgyud): de dag myur du 'du bar 'gyur// sbrel ma bdun ni 'du bar lagyur// de bzhin pha rol phyin bcu dang // mgrin sngon de bzhin gos dkar can// de bzhin pad+ma gar gyi dbang // rgyal
24b5(rgyud): dang rnam rgyal nyid dang ni// lcags sgrog rdo rje lcags sgro/ gas dang // lha mo khro gnyer mA ma ki/ dpe med po nya mo/ dang ni// 'jigs med dpal dang dbyangs can dang // pad+ma/ 
24b6(rgyud): ko ti ut+pa la// pad+ma'i so can de bzhin du// ti se yi ni rtse mo na// 'phrog ma 'byung po'i ma dag dang // de bzhin lag na rdo rje bcu// mthu chen ji bzhin rigs 'dzin dbang // rdo rje 'chang chen de
24b7(rgyud): bzhin du// bcu gsum lha dbang lhan cig dang // sum cu gnyis nas lha dag ni// gsang sngags phyag rgya bcings tsam gyis// de dag thams cad 'du bar 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin
24b8(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyis rnam par gzigs shing ston par mdzad do// de'i mod la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rnam par gzigs shing rtag tu mchog stsol bar 'gyur// rtag tu/ 
25a1(rgyud): mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong spyan stong pa dang / phyag rgya sna tshogs 'dzin pa blta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis na/ 
25a2(rgyud): bram ze'i cha lugs don yod zhags// mthong bar 'gyur te som nyi med// mgrin sngon dang ni rta mgrin dang // de bzhin rgya mtsho'i grong dang ni// mgon pa'i zhal ni bcu gcig dang // de bzhin
25a3(rgyud): zhal ni bzhi dag dang // mgon po 'jigs pa brgyad 'phrogs dang // de bzhin gzigs pa bsam mi khyab// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dang ni// sgyu ma lnga bu'i ting nge 'dzin// phyag rgya bcing
25a4(rgyud): pa tsam gyis ni// mgon pos thams cad ston par mdzad// bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams// rgyal ba 'dren pa'o// dang dpag med// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bskor ba/ 
25a5(rgyud): mgon po mod la mthong bar 'gyur// gzhan yang sangs rgyu/ sa zhing ni stong dag gi/ chu bo gang ga'i bye ma dang mnyam/ pa'i// de bzhin gshegs 'bum bye ba brgya phrag stong / 
25a6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bcas yongs bskor mgon// phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis mthong bar 'gyur// mthong ba chen po'i rnam par gzhan mthong ste// nyin gcig bzhin du
25a7(rgyud): byang chub snying po dang // chos kyi 'khor lo de bzhin rdo rje'i gdan// de dag rmi lam snang ba mthong 'gyur bas// de la yid gnyis som nyi the tshom med// sangs rgyas rnams kyi gshung
25a8(rgyud): pa'am mtshams med lnga// mgon po che la gdugs sems nyid dang ni// byang chub sems dpa' bar chad 'phags pa la// kha zer nyid dang dam chos srub dang // rgyal bas gsungs
25b1(rgyud): spong mnar med gzhol ba dang // mi bzang dmyal ba bcu drug gnas pa dang // bskal pa 'bum po thams cad skad cig grol// phyag rgya gsang sngags bzlas pa tsam gyis sam// thos/ 
25b2(rgyud): sam mthong ngam ming ni bzung bas kyang // sdig pa de kun 'jig 'gyur som nyi med// don yod zhags snying phyag rgya mthong ba yang // 'jig rten mgon dang mtshungs te khyad par 'phags// 
25b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'bum phrag stong dang gang ga yi// bye ma brgya stong dag ni mthong bar 'gyur// byang chub snying por gtogs pa thams cad dang // chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar mtshungs// don
25b4(rgyud): yong rgyal po'i snying po phyag rgya dang // gsang sngags ma thong nas bsod nams phung chen gyis// bsod nam das phung po 'di dag 'phel bar 'gyur// de'i tshe yang rnam
25b5(rgyud): par 'phel bar 'gyur// de ni dpag tu med par so nyi ma da// de nas rig sngags 'chang ba gtsang gyur nas// ga tsang ma'i gos bgos nas ni thog mar yang // yo byad sgrub
25b6(rgyud): pa gtsang zhing spyod pa gtsang // rtag tu yan lag spos ni sna tshogs dang // sna tshogs bdug pas rab tu bdugs bgyis shing // dpung pa lag pa lha'i spos kyis byug/ gtsang ma'i sa
25b7(rgyud): phyogs gtsang ma'i stan bshams par// skyil mo krung bcas nas ni byams sems dang // snying rje'i lhag bsam de nyid mnyam gzhag nas// phyogs bcu'i dus gsum gshegs
25b8(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas dang // rtag tu 'jig rten dbang la phyag bgyi zhing // rtag tu bla ma mchod nas chos la brtson// shin tu rig pas tshig gzhan mi smra bar// shin tu rig pas srung ba'i tshe/ 
26a1(rgyud): ga bgyi// shin tu bkra shis bla ma de nyi dgus// bden par smra zhing snyan par smra ba dang // sems can kun la snying rje'i bdag nyid can// lhan cig rjes 'thun gyur nas de nas ni/ 
26a2(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di bcings par bgyi ste// lag pa pad+ma'i tshul du banag la sor mo rnams mnyam par bcings te mthe'u chung zla ba'i tshul du snying kar bzhag go/ phyag rgya 'di ni don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying bI
26a3(rgyud): rtsa ba'i phyag rgya ste byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du stsol bar bgyid do// mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug dgug pa'i gsang sngags 'di brjod do// oM a me g+ha bi ku ra bi ta/ sa man+ta a wa lo ka ya/ 
26a4(rgyud): nam s+t+rai ya d+ha/ ad+hiSh+Thi ta a mo g+ha pad+me tsar sany+tsa ra hUM hUM// de ma thag tu dus gsum la rnam par blta ba don yod po'i rgyal dpo pad+ma 'bar ba gsal ba'i cho 'phrul dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya'i
26a5(rgyud): rgyal pos shin tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i dus gsum du/ gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po mtha' dag rje ra g.yos par 'gyur ro// dus gsum du gshegs shing
26a6(rgyud): bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sku las 'od zer sna tshogs 'bum phrag brgya stong du ma dag byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad rab tu dgyes shing sangs
26a7(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing la mdzad pa'i thugs rje chen pos phyag gser gyi kha dog lta bu brkyang nas rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur ro// grub pa dam pa don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i/ 
26a8(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa stsol bar 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / khyab
26b1(rgyud): bdag dang / kun bgeng gzhon nu la sogs pa lha rnams srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa bgyid par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyi mod la sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad dang / 
26b2(rgyud): 'jigs pa brgyad rnams dang / chang pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro// de'i grub pa yid du mchi bar 'gyur ro// las thams cad bgyid pa'i phyag rgya thams cad du mchog
26b3(rgyud): lags par grags pa lags so// don yod dam tshig mchog grags pa/ pad+ma rgyas pa'i phyag rgya bcing / mdzub mo gung mo rnams pad+ma lcags kyu'i tshul du bgyid la sen mo mnyam
26b4(rgyud): par gzhag pa'i phyag rgya 'di bstan te rnam par grol ba'i da dkyil 'khor brtse ba'i phyag rgya 'dzin pa'i gsang sngags 'di brjod do// oM a mo g+ha pad+me ku sha sa ma yA na/ 
26b5(rgyud): gr-ih+Na grah+Na/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma hA satwa hUM/ phyag rgya bcings te bcings ma thag tu 'am/ gzung ba tsam gyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
26b6(rgyud): thams cad kyis legs so// zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thad dgyes pa dang / mnyes pa dang / rab tu dgyes pa dang / tshim pa dang / thugs dgyes
26b7(rgyud): pa skye bar 'gyur zhing rig sngags 'chang la thugs rje chen po rgyas pa'i snying po grub pa dam pa stsol bar 'gyur zhing / yang nas yang du mthong ba stsol bar 'gyu ro// mchog thad stsol bar 'gyur// 
26b8(rgyud): don yod pa'i dam tshig grub pa stsol bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyis gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags 'dzin pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil
27a1(rgyud): 'khor bzung ba tsam gyis dam tshig gi rjesu 'jug par 'gyuraro// thams cad du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo phyag rgya / 
27a2(rgyud): dam tshig 'tshal bar 'gyuraro// thad du dgos pa'i gsang sngags grub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa rtag tu blta ba 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// lag mthil
27a3(rgyud): pad+ma ltar bgyis la mdzub mo gung mo rdo rje ltar bgyi zhing mthe'u chung brkyang ba'i phyag rgya ni// pad+ma 'chang la bdug pa dang // me tog la sogs dri rnams dang // phreng ba byug pa phye ma dang // ba dan gos
27a4(rgyud): dang rgyan dang ni// gtor ma mchod yon rab tu dbul// bum dpa gang ba'i dri srogs dang // tshon skud sna lnga tshon bye'o// gzhan yang zas ni sna tshogs la// phyag rgya 'di ni kun la
27a5(rgyud): mchog/ 'di ni dbul ba'i phyag rgyar gsungs// thad du ni ro/ na yod mchog/ go bar bgyid pa'i phyag rgya ni// pad+ma'i/ phyag gis byin gyis brlabs// gung mor nor bu dkris pa
27a6(rgyud): ltalnga bu'i phyag rgya 'di ni bag tsha ba med pa'i pad+ma rin po che'i phyag rgya lags te 'di ni grub pa dam pa lag so// spyan drang ba'i gsang sngags ni// oM a mo g+ha pad+ma ma hA satwa a ya tu mi ha ma ta le/ Shi
27a7(rgyud): ri bi ri pad+ma b+hu dza swA hA// dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// gsol ba gdab pa'i gsang sngags te// byang chub sems dpa' thad dang // phyag na pad+ma gsol gdab dgug/ lnga
27a8(rgyud): rnams kun dang de bzhin du// dkyil 'khor gyi ni lha rnams dgug/ phyag rgya 'di ni bcings pa yis// phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas dang // de bzhin byang chub sems dpa'ang 'du// lha dang / 
27b1(rgyud): dang gnod sbyin dang // dri ba lha min de bzhin du// namakha' lding dang mi 'am ci// lto 'phye chen po nyid dag ste// de kun skad cig 'du 'gyur zhing // srung ba'i phyir ni som nyi med// lag pa rdo rje'i tshul du// 
27b2(rgyud): bzhag la// lag pa'i mthe'u chung rnams pad+ma'i mtshamasu bya ste// gung mo rnams yid tsam bskum pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa ni// grub ldan 'di ni phyogs bcings dang // dkyil 'khor bcing
27b3(rgyud): bar bgyi ba yi// srung ba'i las las bag tsha med// phyag rgya 'di ni bcing tsam dang // gsang sngags stong ni bzlas tsam gyis// dpag chad bdun ni khor yug tu// mtshams bcing dkyil
27b4(rgyud): 'khor bcing ba dang // srung ba'i las ni bgyis par 'gyuraro// oM a mo g+ha badz+ra dr-i D+ha pad+ma ban d+ha sa man+te na ma hA sa ma n+t+ra rak+Sha n+yA mAM/ tsu ru tsu ru hUM phaT/ de nas don yod phyag
27b5(rgyud): rgya ste/ grub ldan sems can kun smra na// don yod pa yi phyag rgya ni// khyad par 'phags pa gzhan yang bstan// rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas sor mo rnams mnyam par gzhag ste
27b6(rgyud): srin lag kha gdengs la sor mo rnams yid tsam bskums pa ni// don yod sna tshogs rgyal po yi// pad+ma'i phyag rgya chen por bsgrags// phyag rgya 'di ni las kun dang // 'jug pa'i las
27b7(rgyud): kun sbyar ba dang // dkyil 'khor phyag rgya mchog kun gsungs// phyag rgya 'di ni bzung tsam dang // gsang sngags dam pa srung bgyis na// rig sngags 'chang ba 'jug par 'gyur// dus
27b8(rgyud): gsum gshegs pa rnam thar pa'o// dkyil 'khor dam pa grub par 'gyur// oM badz+re badz+re/ ad+hiSh+Thi ta pad+me bi shwa rU pa d+ha re/ d+ha ra d+ha ra hUM/ pra be sha tu s+t+rai ya d+hA nu ga tan d+hi ri tu Ta~M swA hA// phyag/ 
28a1(rgyud): d+ha 'dzin bcings tsam gyis// de nyid grub pas phyogs bcu yi// sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam drug tu// g.yo bar 'gyur bar som nyi med// phyag na pa d+ma'i lus 'bar nas// ma
28a2(rgyud): bachen po 'thung bar 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang la/ 'dzum bzhin gyis// rtag tu lta nang mdun na mchis// sangs rgyas kyi ni ning kun dang // mtho ris sgro rnams 'byed par 'gyur// sum cu rtsa
28a3(rgyud): gnyis gnas rnams ni// gnas pa'i lha rnams sgo 'byed cing // sum cu rtsa gsum gnas sgon// gnas pa thang sgo 'byed do// bde chen 'jig rten khams dag ni// sgon gnas pasgo 'byed do// phyag
28a4(rgyud): 'di ni bcings tsam gyis// gnas kun tu ni 'jug par 'gyur/  / phyag rgya sdig pa thams cad 'phrog/ nye ba'i nyon mongs dathang 'joms// sdug bsngal kun las rnam par grol// gnod
28a5(rgyud): pathang 'jigs par bgyid// dmyal ba bcu drug rnams la/ sa thar// phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni// mi bzanga'ajigs pa brgyad rnams dang // nyes byas thaMd 'jigs par
28a6(rgyud): bgyid dmyal ba'i sgo ni bcad par 'gyur// mi bzad 'jigs las bsgral bar 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di ni mthong tsam gyis// mtshams med lnga ni bgyis pa dang // sdig pa kun las rnam par thar// / 
28a7(rgyud): sems can kun la rtag tu sdug/ de bzhin gshegs kun byin gyis rlob// phyag rgya 'di nyid mthe bo'i rtse mo cung zad bkug la bzung ste// gung mo pad+ma'i ral pa'i tshul du bgyis te// spyi bo'i ral pa sa la
28a8(rgyud): bzhag pa ni pad+ma'i ral pa'i phyag rgya lags te// 'di ni don yod pa'i lag pa zhes bsgrags te// sems can thad la sman pa'i srad du gsang sngags 'di brjod par bgyi'o// oM a mo g+ha pad+mo dza le bi sho d+ha ma
28b1(rgyud): cung bar ba bi ma le swAtwa// phyag rgya spyi bor bzhag nas chab dag gis// dkyus nas gtsang mas gsang sngags ni// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas nas// phyag rgya gsang sngags dogs med pas// rtag tu
