28b2(rgyud): bkrus pa'i modo tsam gyis// mi gtsang ba ni gtsang bar 'gyur// mi gtsang spyod pa gtsang ba dang // tshangs spyod ma yin tshangs spyod 'gyur// mi thub pas ni thub par 'gyur// bsod nams phung
28b3(rgyud): bos lha bzhin 'bar// zla ba nyi ma bzhin du mdzes// 'jig rten kun snying rtag tu sdug/ gsang sngags blan med pa 'grub// grub pa den yod zhags pa yi// don yod do nyid 'grub par 'gyur// 
28b4(rgyud): rnams kun ni 'du 'gyur te// srung ba'i phyir ni som nyi med// mgon po'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs// sems dpa' mchog sbyin dag pa po// mchog sbyin rgyun tu thams
28b5(rgyud): cad du// nyi ma re re mthong 'gyur zhing // cho 'phel rtag tu nang med 'gyur// de bzhin mgu dang rgyas par 'gyur// tha mas cad du ni las 'grub ste// gnod pa kun las rnam par
28b6(rgyud): grolabasdig pa kun las rnam par thar// thams cad du ni bkra shis mchog/ khrus kyi rnam pa 'di dag ni// don yang khrus kyi mchog yin no// lag gnyis bsdams la 'og tu bstan// srin
28b7(rgyud): lag gnyis yid tsam bskum pa ni pad+ma'i nor bu phyag rgya lags te// kun nas kyang ni mnyam par gzhag/ phyag rgya ting 'dzin lta bu 'di// skyil mo krung bcas mchis nas su// phyag rgya 'di
28b8(rgyud): dag bcings bgyis zhing // mnyam par bzhag nas gsang sngags bzlas// bcings pa tsam gyis mod nas ni// skyil krung rdo rje lhun mnyam 'gyur// kun nas go char gyur nas ni// bgegs dang
29a1(rgyud): log 'dren thams cad dang // gnod sbyin srin po 'byung por bcas// lha min mkha' lding gis mi mthong // phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams dag tu// de dag thams cad rgyud
29a2(rgyud): ring 'bros// bgegs med par ni las 'grub pas// bzlas pa'i las la som nyi med// oM a mo g+ha badz+ra dr-i D+ha pad+me shwa ra hUM/ thal mo mnyam par sbyar la mdzub mo dang gung mo bkug nas mthe bong / 
29a3(rgyud): pad+ma kha bye ba ltar bgyi ste// don yod pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du gsang sngags dang phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi'o// oM pad+me shwa ra a mo g+ha
29a4(rgyud): bar da/ b+hai ri b+hi ri swA hA// 'dis thog mar bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsagacig bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu phyag rgya bcings nas don yod dpa'i zhags pa'i snying po de kho na nyid sems dpa'i bsam pa
29a5(rgyud): rtse gcig pas bzlas brjod bgyi'o// lan cig bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la dus gsum du rgyun du gshegs pa'i sang sa rgyas 'bum phrag brgya stong gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam
29a6(rgyud): pa g.yo bar 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis rig sngags 'chang de la leg so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyuraro// dbugs 'byin
29a7(rgyud): par mdzad do// rig sngags 'chang de la 'od zer sna tshogs gtong bar mdzad do// mgon po 'phags paspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dran par bgyis pa tsam gyi mad la mdun du mchis pa
29a8(rgyud): 'gyur ro// 'di ltar bcings pa tsam gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yong su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang ldan par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ldan par/ 
29b1(rgyud): 'gyu ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan par 'gyuraro// mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'thob par 'gyu ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su dag par 'gyu ro// phyag rgya 'di bcings/ 
29b2(rgyud): la don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po dran par bgyis pa tsam gyi modo la yon tan dang phan yon rnams 'thob par 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis la phyag rgya brgya rtsa brgyad bcings nas
29b3(rgyud): zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te bzlas brjod bgyis na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin du mdun du mchis nas rig sngags 'chang la leg so zhes bgyi ba
29b4(rgyud): stsol te/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so// 'di ni/ bzlas brjod kyi dam pa yin no zhes dpung pa g.yasadapa brkyang ba'i lag pas rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor
29b5(rgyud): bzhag nas dbugs 'byin par 'gyur te/ tshur shog bu gang 'dod pa'i mchog slongs shig dang sbyin no// khyod rje su bzung zhing byin gyis brlabs pas nga'i bu rig sngags
29b6(rgyud): 'chang gi thu bor gyur cig/ rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po grub pas rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya rim par dbye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po la
29b7(rgyud): brtan par gyis shig/ snying rje chen po'i sems kyis sems can thams cad la goms par gyis shig/ khyod 'di nas ma 'ongs pa'i mngal du gnas nas shi 'phos te 'jig rten gyi khams
29b8(rgyud): bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur zhing khyod pad+ma'i nang du rdzus te skyes nas rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan cing mtshan dang dpe byad kyis rab tu brgyan pa byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du che dpag tu
30a1(rgyud): med par 'gyuro// 'di ltar tshig gzhan mi smra bar lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ phyag brgya rgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ phyag rgya brgya rtsa brgyang bcings pas/ 
30a2(rgyud): lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang nas na mkha' la mchi bar 'gyuraro// don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang 'bum
30a3(rgyud): brag bye ba brgya stong phrag bco brgyad kyis yongasu bskor bar 'gyuraro// tshe dpag tu ma mchis par 'gyuraro// don yod rgya cher snang ba zhes bgyi ba'i rdzu 'phrul 'thor bar 'gyuraro// rdzu 'phrul gang
30a4(rgyud): gi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kha mas su dpung pa bskum pa las brkyang ba tsam gyis ma chi zhing slar ldog par 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod brgya stong bgyis
30a5(rgyud): la phyag rgya brgya stong bcings na tshe 'di nyid la 'phags pa/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rol pa'i don yod
30a6(rgyud): pa'i mig yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu dang / drag po dang / dbang po dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / gzhon nu dang / 
30a7(rgyud): gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lung ngan la sogs pa'i gzugs sna tshogs mthong bar 'gyuraro// klu'i rgyal po'i gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bar du mthong bar 'gyu ro// ji lta ji ltar sems
30a8(rgyud): can rnams 'dul bar gyur pa di lta de lta bu'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni 'jig rten po'i bzlas brjod sgrub pa 'bum lags so// 'bum bzlas pas 'jig rten las 'das pa
30b1(rgyud): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du snang ba'ang mthong bar 'gyuro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lung bstan pa 'thob/ 
30b2(rgyud): 'gyuraro/ byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du phyir mi ldog par byin gyis brlangs par 'gyur// phyag rgya bcings te sbrul makrung bcas nas sems can thams cad la brtsa ba dang / 'byung ba
30b3(rgyud): thams cad la byams pa dang snying rje ba'i sems kyi rang bzhin gyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan cig bzlas brjod bgyi'o// bzlas brjod bgyis ma thag kho nar lan drug brgya bzhi
30b4(rgyud): bcur bzlas brjod bgyis par 'gyur ro// de bzhin ga/ shegs pa thams cad dbugs 'byin par mdzad dran pa dang / blo gros dang / gzi brjid lus la 'jug par
30b5(rgyud): bgyid ngo // bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyis mod la pha rol/ tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// ri mo'i/ gzugs de la yang 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyuraro// 'phags pa
30b6(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyur ro// mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongasu dag par
30b7(rgyud): 'gyu ro/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongs su bsal ba dang gtugs par 'gyuraro// nad thams cad spangs par 'gyuraro// 'jig rten pa'i dgos pa sgrub pa rnams kyi dam pa thams
30b8(rgyud): cad 'grub par 'gyur bas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom par bgyi'o// 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib me'i rgyal po// / bam po gsum pa// thal
31a1(rgyud): mo lhan cig bsdams te sbrur la rtse mo yang tsam bkug ste khar gtang la/ srin lag gnyis phyir 'gyed cing gung mo pad+ma lta bur bgyis te sngags 'di brjod do// oM tu ru tu rungaH/ 
31a2(rgyud): a mo g+ha sid+d+hi hUM// phyag rgya 'di ni don yod grub// las rnams grub dang ldan pa yi// 'di ni bcing ba bgyis pa yis// kun rig myur du 'grub par 'gyur// myur du ston pa stsol 'gyur te// rnyed
31a3(rgyud): dka' don yod grub pa mchog/ mchog kun rab tu stobs par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'das de 'jig rten pa// sgrib pa thams cad las ni rnam par grol// bsod nams phung po dag ni rtag tu
31a4(rgyud): 'phel bkra shis sgra ni 'thung bar 'gyur ba'o// lha rnam das rtag tu srung bar 'gyur// rdo rje bcing ba shin tu bci dang // rtag tu sems ni bstan por bgyi// mdzub mo dag ni
31a5(rgyud): ying bskums nas// snying kha dag tu rab tu brkyang // don yod pa'i pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang // snying po gsungs pa dang / pad+ma'i dbang phyug gi phyag rgya las dang
31a6(rgyud): don thams cad grub pa'i gsang sngags de dag gsungs nas de nas don yod pa'i rgyal po gsungs pa/ oM a mo g+ha hr-id ya/ bad+me d+ha ra d+ha ra pad+ma d+ha ra ma hA maN+Dal hr-id ya hUM// snying po phyag/ 
31a7(rgyud): rgya 'di ni bcings pa yi// pad+ma 'chang ba'i don yod snying po yi// grub pa de nyid yang dag som nyi med// thams cad du ni las rnams thams cad dag/ de ni grub par 'gyur te sem nyi med/ 
31a8(rgyud): shin tu gsang ba'i phyag rgya bzung // shin tu gsang ba'i gsang sngags bzlas// shin tu bkrus pas go gtsang bgo/ gtsang ma'i sems kyis 'chang bgyid cing // sems can kun la
31b1(rgyud): brtser gyur nas// rtag tu bla ma gus par sgom// rtag tu shin tu dang bgyi zhing // pad+ma'i phyag la dga' bar bgyi// myur du las 'grub myur du ni// pad+ma 'chang dang sangs rgyas 'thob// myur du
31b2(rgyud): 'jig rten dbang phyug 'thob// myur du sems can kun phan ldan// lag pa g.yon po tsam gyis khar pad+ma'i tshul du bzhag la lag pa bsgyur nas mdzub mo gyen du sgreng / mthe bong yid
31b3(rgyud): tsam bkug la lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ sor mo rnams pad+ma'i tshul du bzhag la mthe bong yid tsam bkug ste/ gung mo ngon yong po'i nags pa bgyi ba ni don yod pa'i zhi ba'i cho ga
31b4(rgyud): chen po'i mig sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sa/ rnams dang / snying rje'i bdag nyid can lags te// gas sngags 'di brjod do// oM ba shu pa ti pA shA d+hA ra sa ha srar
31b5(rgyud): shrI pra ti ma na Di ta kA ya/ A ka ri Sha ni/ so ny+tsod ni/ d+hUb+hu ru/ a mo g+ha pA sha sid d+hihU~M// phyag rgya 'dis gas bsngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// de nas don
31b6(rgyud): yid ba'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas nas lag pa g.yas pa zhags pa'i phyag rgya'i tshul du bdeg cing slar yang rang gi gnas bzung zhing gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas te/ lan bdun
31b7(rgyud): du yang bdeg go/ don yod rgyal po bzlas pa ni// bsam pa mchog tu dag pas bgyi// bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la ni// don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya yis// byang chub thams cad dgug pa
31b8(rgyud): dang mod la sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur// gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs dag/ ji ltar yid la bsam pa bzhin// mong la grub pa bla med dang // mad la thams cad dgug par 'gyub/ 
32a1(rgyud): dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // dri ba lnga man na mkha' lding // mi'am ci dang lto 'phye che// rig sngags 'chang la blta ba'i phyir// thams cad de yi mod la 'dra// phyogs bcur
32a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad dag/ de nyid gzigs pas gzigs par 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang la phyag bgyi'i phyir// byang chub sems dpa' 'du bar 'gyur// mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras
32a3(rgyud): gzigs// mchog sbyin spyi bor phyag 'jog 'gyur// yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid kyi// rang bzhin mod la ston par mdzad// gang dag mnar med song ba dang // sems can mtshams med lnga bgyid
32a4(rgyud): dang gang dag 'phags la skur 'debs dang // gang dag dam chos spong ba dang // phyag rgya 'di mthong 'dzin bcug dang / bcing bas mod la sdig pa kun// 'jig 'gyur mod la
32a5(rgyud): 'dren pa mthong // phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni// dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di ni ma thong tsam dang // gsang sngags bzlog par bgyid pa dang / 
32a6(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang ba mthong ba de// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang ni// mngon du mthong bar blta bar bya// tshe rabs brgyud par bskal pa ni// brgya dang stong du bsags pa yi// sdig
32a7(rgyud): pa las kyi sgrib pa rnams// phyag rgya bcings sam mthong tsam gyis// de kun 'byung 'gyur som nyi med// thal mo lhan cig dam du sbyar te// mkhas pas pad+ma'i tshul du bgyis la mdzub me ner
32a8(rgyud): bu bgyis te/ gung mo yid tsam zhig bkug pa ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo ste/ lag pa spyi bor brkyang nas spyi bor dbang bskur ba stsol ba'i gsang sngags 'di brjed
32b1(rgyud): oM s+thA d+ha nug tA/ a d+hi la ts+tsha t+ya/ sarbam+b+had+ha/ ma g+hi ye/ badra ma Ni su d+d+he/ a ma g+has rbarba thA ga ta/ ad+g+haSh+NI hen+tu/ 'dis dbyung bsgyur btsam gyis rig sngags 'chang la de bzhin gshegs/ 
32b2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag gis dbang bskur bar 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po chen por 'gyuraro// rig sngags
32b3(rgyud): 'chang thams cad 'grub par 'gyuraro// nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad kyi gtso bo gcig po'i gnas su 'gyuraro// spyi gtsug rdo rje pad+ma bcing
32b4(rgyud): rtag tu ser me'i rtse mo brkyang // mdzub mo lcags kyu'i tshul dadu bgyi// rang gi gdong gis khro gnyer bzhin// khro rgyal po'i phyag rgya che// las kun sgrub par bgyid pa yi/ 
32b5(rgyud): thams cad sgrub bgyid phyag rgya ste// kun sgrub dam pas ga sang sngags pas// 'di dran grub pa kun gyi mchoga.oM kro d+ha rA dzA d+ha ma ma hA a mo g+ha ha na ha na/ sarba duSh+TAn hUM/ 
32b6(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di dran tsam gyis kyang // mthu chen po yi gsang sngags kyis// gdugs pa kun ni rnam 'jig ste// ri rab kyang ni snyil bar bgyid// phyag rgya bcing bar bgyis pa yis// sdig pa thad
32b7(rgyud): 'jig par bgyid// sems can gdug dang gdug pa'i klu// bgegs dang log 'dren bdug pa ste// de dag thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni// thams cad
32b8(rgyud): dbang du gyur nas mchis// lha dang mi dang dge sbyong dang // bram ze rgyal rigs gang lags pa// thams cad dbang du gyur nas ni// mchis par 'gyur bar som nyi med// rgyud ni rtag tu maH/ 
33a1(rgyud): gzhag la// mthe bong mnyam du bteg nas ni// glang mo yis ni gung mo nyid// yid tsam bkug nas sbreng bar bgyi// 'di ni pad+ma chen po yi// lha mo sgrol ma'i phyag rgya / 
33a2(rgyud): grub pa bla na med pa yi// thams cad kyi ni dam pa lags// thal mo pad+ma'i tshul du sbyar// mthe bong nyid ni brkyang bgyis la// mthe'u chung yid tsam bkug pa ni// dkar sha ma chen mo'i phyag rgya
33a3(rgyud): steng 'di ni kun grub bla na med// rdo rje'i tshul du thal sbyar dam bcings shing // shes rab can gyis g.yas pa'i lag bsgyur la// khro gnyer bzhin ni de bzhin khro ba dang // phyag rgya chen po
33a4(rgyud): kun 'dod rab tu spyan// lag pa gnyis kyis thal sbyar ba rkyang nas ni// gsang bde brkyang gung mo bskum nas// mthe chung brkyang nas lcags sgrog pad+ma yi// tshul du snying
33a5(rgyud): ka'i gnas su bzhag par bgyi// phyag rgya 'di ni phyag rgya che// phyag rgya 'di ni bcings pa yis// dkyil 'tsha ra kun nas lha dag dang // dkyil 'khor lha kun dga' bar
33a6(rgyud): 'gyuran thams cad tshogs shing 'du ba dang // kun gyis srung bgyid som nyi med// phyag rgya 'di nyid bshig nas lag pa ni// thal sbyar pad+ma'i tshul bzhin du byas te// snying kar bzhag pa
33a7(rgyud): gnod sbyin pho nya mo// 'di ni phyag rgya lags par legs par bsgrags// dang po rdo rje khu tshur legs bcings la// gung mo lhag ma bskums zhing mthe bong bzhag/ pad+ma'i tshul gyi bzhin
33a8(rgyud): dral sgrol mdun gyi// grub pa kun gyi phra med phyag rgya 'di// sdig pa thams cad 'jig cing nyon mongs kun// nad kun nye bar zhi bar som nyi med// don yod pa'i 'grub pa bla na med kyis// chos
33b1(rgyud): zhib mo thams cad rab tu 'grub// lag pa gnyis ni mnyam gzhag ste// rdo rje'i tshul du pad+ma bcing // mdzub mo bskum pa bgyis nas ni// mthe bong yang ni dgug par bgyi// 'di ni rta
33b2(rgyud): mgrin phyag rgya ste// che ga zhib mo'i pad+ma lags// pad+ma'i tshul du thal mo sbyar// mdzub mis mkhyud la gung mo ni// lcags kyu'i tshul du sgreng bar bgyi// don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya
33b3(rgyud): 'di / rgya mtsho'i klong gi kha lta bur// rdo rje za ba nyid kyis gsungs// 'dzin las kun bgyid pa'o// grub pa kun gyi bla na med// phyag rgya 'dzi na mdzub me'i mthe bong gnyis// lcags sgrog
33b4(rgyud): lhag ma bskum nas pad+ma'i tshul// snying ka'i gnas su ba dazhag pa mgrin sngon gyi// 'di ni dgas med las sudapyag rgya lags// lag gnyis pad+ma'i khu tshur te// gas
33b5(rgyud): g.yon du ni bzhags nas su// kun nas zhi ba'i bzhin du zhag/ byams pa'i mig gnyis bgyi ba ni// zhal ni bcu gcig phyag rgya ste// de bzhin kun gyis mi thub pa'o// 
33b6(rgyud): mthe bong mnyam par mnyam gyis la// sor mo'i rtse mo bskums pa dang // mdzub mo gnyis ni pad+ma'i tshul// rig pa'i dbang phyug phyag rgya las// phyag rgya 'di nyid dbus su ni// 'khor
33b7(rgyud): le'i tshul du mdzub mo bskum// g.yon pa brkyang ba dbang chen gyi// phyag rgya 'byung po thams cad 'joms// lcags sgrog dam du bgyis nas ni// lag pa gnyis po brkyang nas kyang // snying
33b8(rgyud): dkar bzhag pa'i phyag rgya ste// 'di ni rgyun tu gshin rje lags// lag pa g.yon pa brkyang nas su// sor mo sgreng ba'i thor to dgugs// g.yas pa snying kar bzhag nas su// mthe bong
34a1(rgyud): dang ni mthe chung dgug/ lhag ma rnams ni brkyang bgyis te// 'di ni chu lnga'i phyag rgya ste// klu kun dgug pa'i mchog lags so// lag pa gnyis ni bsdams bgyis la/ 
34a2(rgyud): sor mo phying ga log tu sbrel// g.yas pa dang ni g.yon pa dag/ snying ka'i gnas su bzhag bgyi ste// phyag rgya 'di ni lus ngan gyi// gnod sbyin thams cad skrag par bgyid// lag pa g.yas
34a3(rgyud): pa spyi bor yang // mthe bong mdzub mo dgug bgyis la// lag pa g.yon pa brkyang nas su// mdzub mo gyen du sgreng ba ni// 'di ni tshangs pa'i phyag rgya ste// thams cad du ni las sgrub pa'o// phyag
34a4(rgyud): rgya 'di nyid g.yas pa yi// mthe chung sor mo dgug bgyis te/ 8/ drang srong tshegs kyi phyag rgya 'di// lha rnams kun gyis phyag bgyis pa'o// lag pa gnyis ni dam bcings la// 
34a5(rgyud): blta sdug 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ste// lha min thams cad dgu/ gas pa yi// khyab 'jug phyag rgya 'di zhes gsungs// g.yas pa bi dza pu rar bgyi// g.yon pa rtse gsum tshul du bgyi
34a6(rgyud): mthe bong mthe chung bskums pa ni// 'byung po thams cad skrag bgyid pa// 'di ni drag po'i phyag rgyar gsungs// g.yas pa khu tshur bcings nas su// mdzub mo brkyang nas g.yon pa ni// bkur bstan
34a7(rgyud): khu tshur bcings nas bzhag/ sor mo rnams ni brkyang bar bgyi// drag po rgyun tu blta bgyid pa// de bzhin lha yi sde dpon gyi// gzhon nu phyag rgya 'di zhes gsungs// gyen du lag pa gnyis sgreng nA/ 
34a8(rgyud): sor mo gsum ni brkyang bgyis te// mthe bong mdzub mo bkug pa ni// 'od zer stong dag 'phro bgyid pa// 'di ni nyi ma'i phyag rgya lags// phyag rgya 'di nyid sor mo gsum// bkug nas som
34b1(rgyud): gnyis gnyis brkyang // skar ma'i tshogs kyis mdzes gyur pa// 'di ni zla ba'i phyag rgyar gsungs// gsang sngags chen po phyag rgya 'di dag ni// las dang don kun grub pa sgrub par bgyid// sdig pa thams
34b2(rgyud): cad spong zhing nyon mongs kun// nyams par bgyid cing sgrib pa thams cad 'byung // las kun zad par bgyid cing don yod pa'i// las sgrub don yod 'grub pa 'grub par 'gyur// oM pad+ma tA re tAr
34b3(rgyud): ya pad+ma b+hu dze dz+dza/ oM ma hA pad+be shwe te ge hu ru hu ru sA hA/ oM b+h+r-i ku Ti pad+me tar ta ra hUM/ oM pad+me pAN+Da ra bA si ni kuN+Da kuN+Da swA hA/ oM a mo g+ha pad+ma ba ra re sad+d+hi sid+d+hi tu hU~M// oM sarba trag mi ni a b+hA ya/ 
34b4(rgyud): ro dr-i Ni hUM/ oM a mo g+ha na tA re tA re ya pad+me b+hu dze hUM/ oMd dud ru la pad+me a mo g+ha hUM/ oM ba Da ba mu khai naM krin ta yaHSh+TA na hUM/ oM pad+d+ho nI la kraN+Te sha ra/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ oM so mya
34b5(rgyud): ba da re pra sing shU sa ma ya hUM/ oM pad+me shwa ra sI d+ha ya hUM/ wa~M/ a mo g+he shwa re hUM/ oM sa ma ri ta re ta re hUM/ oM n+d+ra/ ga pad+ma ni hUM/ oM yak+Sha d+hi pa ti mu ru mu ru hUM/ oM a mo g+haM
34b6(rgyud): brah+ma ra te hUM/ oM shi ri ba ra de a mo g+ha b+hu dze hUM/ oM a mo g+ha rA dza pad+ma nA b+he/ sa ra sa ra sa man+ta b+hu dze swA hA// oM ru dra ru Ti mi li mi li swA hA// oM sha ka ti d+ha re a mo g+ha ba ti swA hA/ oM
34b7(rgyud): sa ha sra ki ra Ne hUM ru ti swA hA// oM so ma pra b+hA hUM// de bzhin phyag rgya gsang ba yang // phyag rgya tha dad gsang sngags tha dad sgrub// gsang sngags 'chang gis ji skad gsungs pa'i las/ 
34b8(rgyud): rtag tu kun gyis mdor na thams cad bgyid// gtsang ma spyod pa gtsang ma dag/ legs bkrus gtsang ma'i gos bgos nas// dri zhim dri yis dpung pa dang // lag pa yan lag blugs
35a1(rgyud): nas su phyag rgya lan re bcings pa na// gsang sngags lan re bzlas par bgyi// phyag rgya dag ni bcings pa dang // gsang sngags bzlas pa'i mod la ni// brgya stong phrag
35a2(rgyud): ni 'bum phrag 'bum// phyag rgya dag ni bcings par 'gyur// phyag rgya bcings pa bgyis pa na bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
35a3(rgyud): thams cad kyis lung bstan pa dang // byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyis legs par bsrungs par 'gyuraro// 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchod gnas gcig pur
35a4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla ma gcig pur 'gyuradar ro// dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba dang / dam tshig thams cad la zhugs par 'gyuraro// 
35a5(rgyud): tshe dpag tu ma mchis par 'gyuraro// don yod pa'i rig snga/ gas grub par 'gyur ro// tshig btsan par 'gyur ro// / dran pa dang blo gros bag tsha ba ma mchis par 'gyu ro// blo
35a6(rgyud): gros thogs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin rtag tu lta 'tshal bar 'gyuraro// rtag tu dam pa stsol bar 'gyu ro// rtag tu dgra dang pas
35a7(rgyud): kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba dang / gdugs pa dang / rab tu gdugs pa thams cad pham par bgyis par 'gyur ro// rtag tu thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyuraro// gnod sbyin dang / 
35a8(rgyud): srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / lha ma yin dang / klu thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa chen po thams cad la bag tsha ba ma mchis pa
35b1(rgyud): 'gyu ro/ rgyal po dang / blon po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyuraro// thams cad gtso bo gcig pur 'gyuraro// thams cad du bla ma'i gan/ 
35b2(rgyud): gcig pur 'gyur ro// tshe ring bar 'gyur ro// nad thams cad las thar par 'gyuraro// skyon gyi dri ma dang / ser sna dang / phrag dog thams cad dang bral bar 'gyuraro// legs par dran zhing lus
35b3(rgyud): shin tu yengasu dag par 'gyuraro// 'chi ba'i dus kyi mod la de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur zhing de dag thams cad kyis
35b4(rgyud): dbugs 'byin par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu khyod 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du song shig ces shin tu dran pa nye/ dbar gzhag nas dus bgyid par 'gyur ro// dmyal ba'i sgo thang
35b5(rgyud): bcad par 'gyuraro// ngan song gi 'gro ba thams cad las yo/ ngasu grol bar 'gyu ro// 'di nas ma 'ongs pa'i mngal/ du skye bar mi 'gyuraro// skye ba na rtag tu skye ba dran par 'gyuraro// 
35b6(rgyud): thams cad du pad+ma la rdzus te skye bar 'gyuraro// byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyuraro// de nas 'jig rten dbang phyug sprul pa yi// phyag rgya'i rtags ni brjod par
35b7(rgyud): bgyid 'khru gang kho na'i tshad dag gi/ dkyil 'khor lham gyis bri bar bgyi// gang zhig mthong ba'i mod tsam gyis// dga' ba dang ni mgu bar 'gyur// sdig pa kun las grol ba dang // de nyid
35b8(rgyud): dag ni 'grub 'gyuraro// rgyun tu gang gis go cha yis// rtag tu go cha bgos par 'gyur// go cha'i go ni 'bar ba dang // mdzes pa rtag tu stsol bar 'gyur// cho ga zhib mo legs grub ste/ 
36a1(rgyud): gsang sngags bla med thams cad 'grub// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bras tsam gyis// gnod sbyin srin po 'byer bar 'gyur// mthong ba tsam gyis gdon kun kyang // 'jig
36a2(rgyud): par 'gyur te som nyi med// gnod pa kun las grol 'gyur te// nang kun las kyang de bzhin no// pha rol dpung ngam rang dpung ngam// mi thub pa'i dgra kun las// rtag tu legs par rgyal bar
36a3(rgyud): 'gyur// rtag tu gdon las srung ba dang // dus kun tu yang 'grub par 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang rnams bde bgyi'i phyir// de nyid dam pa 'grub 'gyur zhing // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
36a4(rgyud): dbang gis// phyag rgya'i mtshan ma mtshon cha dag/ dgos pa dkun gyi rjes 'thun par// gang dang gang du bkod pa dag// de dang der ni phyag rgyar 'gyur// pad+ma kha bye zhes bgyib/ 
36a5(rgyud): pad+ma mdab mas mdzes pa dang // kun nas 'khor bar 'dra/ ra ba'i phreng // rnam par rtog pa med par bgyi// phyag/ rgya 'di kun srog las byung // 'di nas thams cad 'bras
36a6(rgyud): bu stsol// rdo rje rtse gsum rdo rje'i mnga'// dkyil 'khor pad+ma rdo rje dang // pad+ma'i phreng ba rdo rje'i mtshan// pad+ma rab gnas pad+ma gnyis// rtag tu pad+ma legs par bgyid// pad+ma'i khu tshur
36a7(rgyud): de bzhin du// pad+ma'i mdzub mo pad+ma'i lcags kyus thal mo sbyar// pad+ma'i lcags sgrogs pad+ma'i gzeb// rtag tu pad+ma sems pa dang // nor bu pad+ma rdo rjer gsungs// don yod pad+ma de bzhi/ 
36a8(rgyud): duHpad+ma'i ral gri pad+ma'i dril// rtse gsum zhes bgyi gtun shing 'chang // nor bu dbyug pa me tog dbyug/ de bzhin zhags pa gtun shing dang // chu srin 'dzin dung 'khor lo byed// bId/ 
36b1(rgyud): pU ra tu se'u 'bru// zla 'dzin nyi ma 'dzin pa dang // thob 'dzin dang tshems shing dang // me tog pur ma bgrang phreng dang // rdo rje rtsa lnga don yod zhags// don yod grub pa de dag ste// thams cad/ 
36b2(rgyud): pad+ma'i steng du dgod// lag pa'i phyag rgya 'di bri ba// gang dang gang du dgod pa ni// lag pa'i phyag rgya bzhi bcu thams// 'di dag kyang ni bri bar bgyi// kun nas kyang ni 'bar bar bgyi// nor
36b3(rgyud): bu'i rgyan gyis klubs par bgyi// dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i ras sam ni// rab 'am rtsig par bgyis pa'am// ci yang rung ba de dag ste// de dag mthong ba tsam gyis sam// mthong ba tsam gyis
36b4(rgyud): modo la ni// rtag tu sdig pa thams cad spong // mnar med gnas su gtogs pa dang // mtshams med pa ni lnga nyid de// thams cad skad cig tsam gyis 'byang // 
36b5(rgyud): sems can dag pa dran bgyid na// phyir mi ldog pa nyid du/ 'gyur// sems dpa' sa bcur rab tu gnas// 'aM nga ni phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas// gang lag dkyil 'khor
36b6(rgyud): mthong ba ni// spyan ras gzigs dbang mchog sbyin ni// rgyun tu spyi bo lag na thogs// gang gis phyag rgya 'di mthong ba// rgyun du mchog sbyin 'jig rten dbang // rtag tu mngon sum mthong ba
36b7(rgyud): yi/ de dang mtshungs te khyad par 'phags// gsang sngags sum cu rtsa lnga'i tshig/ rtag tu dran bgyid thams cad 'grub// de ni dus rnams kun tu yang // ngan 'gror mchi bar mi 'gyur ro// rnam/ 
36b8(rgyud): grol dkyil 'khor rab mur bar// myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'thob 'gyur// 'od dpag med kyi sras po yis// thu bor 'gyur bar som nyid med// 'jig rten mgon gyi thugs zhal nas// skyes
37a1(rgyud): sras rtag tu thu bor 'gyur// 'dren pas 'di ni chos nyid dang // chos las skyes par lung ston 'gyur// gang ga'i klung sa ya bye ba brgya stong dang mnyam pa'i bye ma snyed kyi
37a2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// tshad med grangs meng dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'thob par
37a3(rgyud): 'gyuro// gang gi sug par phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di mchis par gyur na phyag rgya 'di 'di lta bu'i phan yon mang zhing che ba mchis par bsgrags so// de la gsang sngags ni// oM a
37a4(rgyud): mo g+ha ma dza li mi li me li tsi li hUM/ oM a shA sa yak+Sha Na bi ga te hUM/ oM a b+ha ya ba re de Di hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ a ra d+hiSh+Thi te/ d+hi ri d+hi ri hUM/ oM pad+ma hr-i da ya muSh+Ti hUM/ oM bi sa ra bis
37a5(rgyud): ra sarba mA lAn tanA dza ya hUM/ oM badz+ri mA hu ru d+ha ru d+d+ha/ oM aHshaM a mo g+ha A kaR+Sha yan+d+he/ oM ka btsas tu ru d+ha ru d+ha/ ma a mo g+ha sha ka la~M mi la hUM/ oM a ma g+na tsan tA ma Ni tati
37a6(rgyud): oM a mo g+ha ma Ni tsi li tsi li hUM/ oM badz+re tu Ti tsi li hUM/ oM a mo g+ha hr-i da ya tsa ra tsa ra shud+ha satwa hUM/ oM g+ho Sha ba rti ts+yai Ti ts+yaiTi hUM/ oM bid+yA khang ga tsin tA ya sha tru na hUM/ oM tri ma la be ri shud+d+he d+hIHb+h+rU~M
37a7(rgyud): Ti hUM/ oM su ru su ru hU~M/ oM ma Ni ma Ni hUM/ oM puSh+pa ba ti dza ye hUM/ oM tsa d+ha tsit+ta pA sha d+ha ra d+ha ra hU~M/ oM pad+ma pA sha bi shud+he hUM/ oM brje pa she b+ha ba tu mu ru mu ru d+h+waM/ oM tsin+ta ma Ni bA sha
37a8(rgyud): bar dzi nu/ oM kra ThA sha swa ni ra g+ha taka d+ha ru d+ha ru dzu/ a hA shu lA~M pA sha bi loka tA ra ya hUM/ oM nA ga pA sha ban d+ha ya kar+b+ha ya duSh+Ta na ga nA bA sha pA ta ya trA~M/ oM dzaM lang b+ha ba d+ha madz+ra/ 
37b1(rgyud): oM tsan+d+ra bi ma le bi sho d+ha ya an d+ha kA ra ra sh+mi ba re rU/ oM shrI bo d+ha ya hUM/ oM ba dzi ya puN+Da ba re hUM/ oM pha long bye be tu ri hUM/ oM pUr+Na maN+Da le dza ya hUM/ oM sa ha swa ra shI ki ra Na hUM/ oM
37b2(rgyud): sarba duSh+TA na pra ha ra shA sA ya hUM/ oM man bi sha d+ha ya mA lA bi ma le hUM/ oM puSh+pa ba ti su gan d+ha ba re hUM/ oM pA sha sa ha sra gu Ni ta kA Na k+Sha Na hUM/ oM badz+rod k+She ba su tsi mu kha tsi Ti tsi Ti hUM/ 
37b3(rgyud): oM a mo g+ha a pra ti ha ta pA sha ha ste hUM/ oM sarba tra a mo g+ha sid+h+ya sid+d+ha sA d+ha ya hUM/ lag pa'i phyag rgya 'di dag dang // de bzhin gsang sngags phyag rgya ngag/ lhan
37b4(rgyud): cig bzlas pa tsam dang ni// phyag rgya mthong ba kho nas kya // sdig pa thams cad mong la 'joms// myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'thob 'gyur// cho ga zhib mo myur du 'grub/ 
37b5(rgyud): don yod zhags pa rnams grol ba'i// dkyil 'khoradam pa 'grub par 'gyur// de la mtshon cha'i phyag rgya ni nor bu rin po che dang / me tog dang / pad+ma dang / 
37b6(rgyud): ril ba spyi blugs dang / nor bu'i phreng ba dang / bgrang phreng dang / dung dang / 'khor lo dang / dbyug tho dang / mdung thung dang / rdo rje dang / rtse gsum dang / rtse gsum kha gdengs dang / 
37b7(rgyud): mtshon sha ka ti dang / rdo rje dang / dgra sta dang / rtse gsum pa gnyis dang / nor bu dang / rdo rje dang / mtshon shu li dang / las kyi rdo rje dang / yid bzhin nor bu dang / mtshon cha dang / 
37b8(rgyud): con dang / dbyug pa dang / dbang phyug chen po'i rtse gsum dang / ral gri dang / zhags pa dang / lcags kyu dang / sbrul dang / ljon shing dang / byi ru dang / dgra sta dang / 'khor lo dang / dgra/ 
38a1(rgyud): sta yu ba sbom po can dang / lag pa dang / gtsug pung dang / nor bu sgron ma dang / 'od dang / 'od zer dang / gtun shing dang / 'phyang mo nyug pa dang / dgra sta dang / 
38a2(rgyud): snod zlum po dang / bum pa dang / brag dang ri dang / lhun po dang / sbrul 'khyil pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / chu srin dang / nya dang / ru sbal dang / g.yung drung 'khyil ba
38a3(rgyud): dang / rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor dang / rig sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / rtse gsum dang / dkyil 'khor dang / ral gri dang / gri dang / pad+ma'i phreng ba dang / rtse gsum dang / mu sun
38a4(rgyud): di dang / mtshon rtse gcig pa dang / phyag rgya bzhi dang / ma/ che ba bzhi dang / zlum po dang / dung dang / 'khor lo dang // rdo rje dang / rtse gsum dang / dung dang / nor bu'i dung dang / 
38a5(rgyud): pad+ma'i dung dang / urda dang / gos dang / seng ge'i gdong/ dang / shang shang te'u dang / ka la bing ka dang / ngang pa dang / bzhad dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / gshin
38a6(rgyud): rje'i dbyug pa dang / gdong bzhi pa dang / dkyil 'khor bzhi dang / rtse gsum dang / bum pa gang ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang / zla ba'i 'od dang / pad+ma bzhi dang / pad+ma
38a7(rgyud): gsum dang / rgya mtsho dang / me tog dang / pur ma dang / glegs bam dang / ri dgas kyi g.yang bzhi dang / rdo rje lcags sgrog dang / rta babs dang / lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / 
38a8(rgyud): mkhar bsil dang / so mangs dang / kha khyer dang / ska rags dang / gtsug phud dang / mchod phyir thogs dang / phreng ba chen po dang / gru gsum dang / kun nas rdo rje sde dang / phyag rgya
38b1(rgyud): mtshon cha 'di dag ni/ 'jig rten 'dren pas gsungs pa bzhin// rnam grol dkyil 'khor gsang ba 'di// don yod zhags pa'i cho gar dran// ras sam gos sam rtsig pa 'am// 
38b2(rgyud): yang rung ba 'dri bgyid pa// dogs med legs gsal legs 'byor pas// tshon gsal kun tu pad+mar bzhag/ phyag rgya kun nas 'bar bar bgyi// thams cad srog las byung bas
38b3(rgyud): ni don dang las rnams kun stsol cing // phyag rgya mod la sdig pa 'phrog/ de ni mod la 'bras bu ste// 'dren pa 'jig rten dbang phyug kun// phyag rgya 'di ni byin gyis brlabs// sangs rgyas
38b4(rgyud): kun dang shAkya yi// rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pas brla dbas// de lta bas na mkhas pas su// rtag tu kun nas dmatshon bcangs na// sangs rgyas rnams ni dgyes 'gyur
38b5(rgyud): te 'asras kyi thu bor som nyi med// phyag rgya rim byed dam pa 'chang ba gang // 'jig rten mgon po'i sras kyi thu ma ra 'gyur// don yod zhags pa'i snying po gsang ba yi// rnam
38b6(rgyud): par grol ba'i snying po bla na med// phyag rgya dang ni gsang sngags dam pa dag/ 'di 'chang ba la myur du grub par 'gyur// de nas don yod pa las thams cad pa dang // rjesu 'thun pa'i zhags
38b7(rgyud): pa bdun bshad par bgyi ste// de nyid grub pas ji lta bu yi// cho ga'i cho ga sgrub pa bzhin// so so so sor 'tsham pa yi// de dag kun ni rtogs par bgyi// de nyid grub pa'i ji lta bu'i// mtshan nyid
38b8(rgyud): gzugs ni ci bzhin pa// de nyid bsgrubs pa zhags pa ni// skud pa lnga las 'grub 'gyur te// gsang sngags 'dzin pas mod la ni// 'grub par 'gyur te som nyi med// ras skud pad+ma'i skung ba
39a1(rgyud): dang / arga kha che dar dag gi/ skud shun pa'i skud pa ste// skud pa 'di dag bkal nas de kho na nyid kyi cho ga dang // cho ga zhib mo sgrub pas zhags pas ras skud kyi rgyu las blangs te// tshang
39a2(rgyud): bzhin bkal nas rtag tu bsnyung ba bgyis la legs par bkrus pa/ gos gtsang ma can tshangs par spyod pas zas dkar gsum 'tshal nas gnas gtsang ma'i phyogs su don yod pa'i
39a3(rgyud): zhags pa'i snying po mdor na byams pa'i sems dang ldan pas dran par bgyi'o// de nas shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas brgyad sgril du bkal te don yod rgyal po thal mo sbyar bas pad+ma
39a4(rgyud): kha phye ba thogs pa/ ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis bzhugs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyi klubs pa'i lus phyed sor ba dazhi pa'i tshang du bgyi'o// bgyis nas gzugs rnam pa
39a5(rgyud): gsum du bgyis te/ nges pa'i gzugs dang / khro gnyer gyi bzhin dang / khro bo'i rgyal po'i gzugs te/ dbu la lam gser las bgyi'o// de nas zhags pa srid kyi
39a6(rgyud): chad khru bcu drug pa zhags pa'i thor to gcig rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang / skyur rur lhan cig sbrel ba gdags par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yar gyi ngo'i tshes bco lnga 'am/ 
39a7(rgyud): tshes brgyad la legs par bkrus te gos gtsang ma bgos nas zhag cig mchis te/ skyil mo bkrung bcas nas sangs rgyas la mchod pa rnams pa sna tshogs bgyis te/ tshig gzhan mi sna
39a8(rgyud): bar zhags pa la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas stong rtsa brgyad chang ba dang / stan bzang po bshams nas de'i steng du zhags pa bzhag par bgyi'o// don yod pa'i zhags
39b1(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// me tog dang / bdug pa dang dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang ba dan bzang po la sogs pas mchod par bgyi'o// a ga ru dang / tsan dan dang / du/ 
39b2(rgyud): ru ka'i gdug pa dbul bar bgyi'o// mar me yang dbul bar bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ zhags pa'i steng du gtor
39b3(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri me'i gzugs la yang ci 'byor pas mchod par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pa de'i mdun du skyil mo
39b4(rgyud): krung bcas te/ ma khrugs pas gdugs rtse ba'i bar du mchod pa bgyis nas bzlas brjod bgyi'o// yungs kar re re bgyis te/ zhags pa'i steng du gtor zhing stong rtsa brgya
39b5(rgyud): tshachang gi bar du gdugs re re mchis par bgyi ste/ rngo ci bro/ gas pas gdugs rtse ba'i bar du bzlas brjod brgya/ 'o// mchod par bgyi'o// kha zas ngan pa spangs par bgyi
39b6(rgyud): lhag ma dang sngags pa spang bar bgyi'o// gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// stong rtsa brgyad tshang nas zhags pa 'bar bar 'gyur te/ gal te 'jig rten pa'i grub na ni me'i kha dog tu 'ang
39b7(rgyud): bar 'gyu ro// gal te 'jig rten las 'das pa'i grub na ni kha dog sna tshogs 'bar bar 'gyuraro// don yod pa'i lus de yang 'bar bar 'gyuraro// sgra 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chab
39b8(rgyud): legase legs so// khyod kyis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi zhags pa 'di grub kyis khyod kyi byang chub kyi sems bla na med pa khug gcig/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang // 
40a1(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i khongasu gtogs pa yongs su rdzogs par gyis shig/ 'on te 'jig rten pa'i sgrub na ni yid bzhin gyi nor bus bsams pa ji lta ba bzhin du
40a2(rgyud): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// ji ltar yid la bsam shing smon pa bzhin lag pas 'phangs na gsang sngags kyis thams cad sgrub par bgyid te/ thams cad bkug par 'gyuraro// phyogs ga/ 
40a3(rgyud): dang gang du 'phangs pa de logasu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas par bgyis te/ mod la bsams pa thang 'grub par 'gyur ro// gal te mtshams med pa lnga bgyis pa 'am/ man
40a4(rgyud): med par mchi ba zhig na yang de'i legs par 'grub par 'a gyur te/ de la yid gnyis dang som nyi bskyed par mi ba gyi'o// khro gnyer gyi bzhin gyis gang du 'phangs na lha dang / klu
40a5(rgyud): dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' ldi nga dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams bkug nas rig sngags 'chang gi mdun
40a6(rgyud): du mchi bar 'gyur zhing ji srid mtshe'i bar du bran bzhin du mchis par 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang / blon po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad mchis par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thad kyis cher mchod
40a7(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// gang gi don du zhags pa 'phangs pa'i don de 'grub par 'gyuraro// khro bo'i rgyal po'i zhags pa la khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas 'phang par
40a8(rgyud): bgyi'o// 'phangs pa tsam gyi mod la bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / gdug pa'i sems can thams cad zhags pas bcings par 'gyuraro// gal te 'tshal na lo'am/ lo brgya 'am/ 
40b1(rgyud): stong ngam/ bskal pa brgya stong gi bar du zhugs pas bcings par 'gyur ro// nam byams pa dang / snying rje bskyed nas de'i tshe don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan gsum bzlas na phyir bkrol bar 'gyuraro// 
40b2(rgyud): dpung gi nang du 'phangs na dpung rnams zhags pas bcings par 'gyu ro// g.yul 'gyed pa'i dbusu 'phangs na mtshon dang / go mtshon dang / gzhu dang mda' dang / mdung dang / ral gri dang / gtun
40b3(rgyud): shing dang / mu se ni da dang / 'khor lo dang / thag mdung dang / mtshon cha thams cad dang / go cha dang / ya lang thams cad zhags pas bcings par 'gyuraro// chab dang / yungs kar lan bdun
40b4(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyis te/ gtor na grol bar 'gyuraro// dgas pa la gdugs gcig bzhin ci 'byor pas mtsho dad par bgyi'o// gang gi don du bsams pa de thams cad 'grub
40b5(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// don yod pa'i zhags pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// / na te mi snang ba sgrub par 'tshal na don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lag pas bcings te/ g.yas pa dang g.yon
40b6(rgyud): pas gang du ji skad gsungs pa bzhin zhags pas bzung nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na mi ganga' bar 'gyuraro// brgya rtsa brgyad lan gnyis bzlas
40b7(rgyud): brjod bgyis na na mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor lo bsgyur bar 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang brgya stong phrag 'bum gyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// lo
40b8(rgyud): bye ba bcur 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// skra cung zad 'khyil bar 'gyur ro// stobs dang / brtson 'grus pha rol gyi zil gyis mi non pa thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// char pa 'tshal bas mchod pa bgyis na
41a1(rgyud): ji tsam gsol ba btab pa bzhin 'bab par 'gyu ro// ha cang char ches pa dgag pa'i slad du mchod pa bgyis na char pa bkag par 'gyu ro// yams kyi nad dang / gnod
41a2(rgyud): pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / mi ngas thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'tshal bas rig sngags 'chang legs par khrus bgyis pa gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la
41a3(rgyud): lags pas zhags blangs te/ gnas mthon por 'dzegs nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang / zhags pa bcings te don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po phyogs bzhir lan
41a4(rgyud): bdun bzlas nas zhags pa 'phangs na de dag thams ca radu dran pa tsam gyis 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gye dad pa dang / rang gi dpung dang / gzhan gyi dpung thams
41a5(rgyud): cad dang / phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba thams ca/ da rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa dang / yam/ sa kyi nad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / mi ngas chen
41a6(rgyud): po dang / mu ge'i dgon pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zho bar 'gyur ro// ha cang char che ba dang / dus ma lags pa'i char dang / grang ba dang / rlung dang / tsha ba mi bzad pa'i 'jigs pa
41a7(rgyud): thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyuraro// dpag tshad brgya stong khor yug tu mtshams chen po bcings pa bgyis par 'gyuraro// ji lta ji ltar yid la bsams pa de lta de ltar thams cad 'grub/ 
41a8(rgyud): par 'gyur bas don yod rgyal po mchod par bgyi zhing bzlas brjod bgyi/ gsol bar yang bgyi'o// mchod pa dang / gsol ba bgyis pa tsam gyis mod la thad phun sum tshogs par
41b1(rgyud): 'gyur te/ de la yid gnyis dang som nyid bskyed par mi bgyi'o// cho ga zhib mo las ji skad gsungs pa bzhin las bgyid pa rnams kyis cho ga de bzhin du sgrub par bgyi'o// de nas skad
41b2(rgyud): cig de'i mod la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms sgom par bgyi'o// sems can thams cad la mchog tu brtse bar
41b3(rgyud): bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bgyi'o// dkon mchog gsum la gus par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gus pa dang / 
41b4(rgyud): bla mar yid la sgom par bgyi'o// mi gtsang ba spyod pa dgatsang bar bgyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i ngang tshul nan du sgom par bgyi'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa de kho na
41b5(rgyud): nyid kyi cho ga sgrub pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu byang chub dgu/ ga par bgyi'o// de nas zhags pa'i 'khor lo'o/ cho ga sgrub pa bshad par bgyi ste/ rig sngags 'chang de
41b6(rgyud): kho na nyid sgrub pas phug tu 'jug pa'i sgrub pa thams cad kyi mchog phug tu 'jug pa dang / lha ma yin gyi gnasu 'jug pa dang / mi 'am ci'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / dri za'i gnas su
41b7(rgyud): 'jug pa dang / lha'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / nam mkha' la rgyu ba dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du 'jug pa dang / klu'i rgyal po'i gnasu
41b8(rgyud): 'jug pa dang / thang la rgyu ba dang / nyi ma'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / zla ba'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / skar ma'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / rgyu skar gyi gnasu 'jug pa dang / nags su 'jug pa dang
42a1(rgyud): ri la rgyu ba dang / 'bab chu chen por 'jug pa ste/ ji lta ji ltar yid la bsams pa de lta de ltar 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga sgrub pa chog/ 
42a2(rgyud): chung ngus 'grub par 'gyur te/ de la yid gnyis dang som nyi bskyed par mi bya'o// rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pa legs par khrus bgyis te/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas zas
42a3(rgyud): dkar gsum 'tshal la/ gtsang ma de kho na nyid la gus pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom par bgyi'o// byams pa'i sems la mnyam par gzhag nas snying rje'i bsam pa dag pa'i
42a4(rgyud): yid kyis tshes bcu gsum nas brtsams te/ zla ba nya ba'i ba ra du gsal ba shin tu bkra shis pa la dus gsum du ci 'byor pa'i rnam pa rnams kyis mchod par bgyis la/ 
42a5(rgyud): rtag tu brgya rtsa brgyad pa yi/ dus gsum rgyun tu bzlas brjod bgyi/ nyin par dus gsum lan gsum ste/ mtshan mo'i dus su lan gsum bgyi// 'khor lo zhags/ 
42a6(rgyud): pa bla med 'di // skud pa gsum las sgrub gyi ste// ras skud pad+ma'i skud pa dang // arga'i skud pa gsum gyur du// de ni legs par tshang bzhin du// khru ni sum cu rtsa drug bgyi// 'khor lo rnam
42a7(rgyud): pa gsum las bgyi// rgyar ni sor bzhi'i chad lags te// snying por bcas shing mu khyud bcas// kun nas rtsibs dang ldan pa dag/ gser dang dngul dang zangs las bgyi// chos
42a8(rgyud): bstan legs par brgyan pa yi// bzang po'i bstan la bzhag par bgyi// spos kyi dkyil 'khor me tog gi/ sil ma bkram nas bum pa dgod // de bzhin mchod yon snod kyang bsham/ 
42b1(rgyud): ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du chos kyi stan bsham par bgyis pa'i steng du 'khor lo'i zhags pa bzhag ste// mchod pa bgyis la bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dus gsum du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
42b2(rgyud): brjod bgyi'o// de nas chos bco lnga'i zla ba nya la nyin zhag cig mchis par gyur pas rig tshig gzhan mi smra bar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la mchod pa bgyi
42b3(rgyud): zhing bdug pa rnam pa gsum po a ga ru dang / tsan dan dang / gu gul rnams dbul bar bgyi'o// ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun na chos kyi stan mchis pa la mngon du phyogs te mchis nas don yod
42b4(rgyud): pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ yungs kar re re la bzlas brjod bgyis pas zhags pa'i steng du gtor bar bgyi'o// stong rtsa brgyad chang nas zhags pa
42b5(rgyud): 'bar zhing 'khor lo na mkha' la mchis nas 'bar zhing lding / bar 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang gi lus kyi stod dang / spyi bo nas 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ri mo'i gzugs las
42b6(rgyud): legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i 'khor lo zhags pa'i cho ga rgya chen po 'di grub par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de nas
42b7(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gis mchod pa chen po bgyis la don yod khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pa blang bar bgyi'o// lag pa
42b8(rgyud): g.yon pa 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'i tshul du bcing bar bgyi zhing / g.yas pa zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang 'khor lo'i tshul la brten nas blangs te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po brjod nas phyogs
43a1(rgyud): bzhir 'phang bar bgyi'o// de nas phyogs bcur khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas bdag nyid kyi lus la dbang bskur ba'i tshul du lan bdun
43a2(rgyud): du bskur bar bgyi'o// de nas phyag rgya'i tshul du bskor ba tsam gyi mo la rig sngags 'chang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// dam pa chen po 'grub par 'gyuraro// 'khor los
43a3(rgyud): bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po legs mthong rang gi gzugs kyi mdun na mchis nas/ rig sngags 'chang gi rkang pa spyi bos blangs nas 'di skad ces kyang smra bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gi
43a4(rgyud): ci bka' stsal bde bgyi'o zhes ci bsgo ba'i don de dang de tham das cad bgyid par 'gyur// bran gyi rang bzhin gyis tham/ das cad du las bgyid par 'gyuraro// de nas rig sngags 'chab
43a5(rgyud): gi gnas su 'jug par 'tshal bas 'di ltar nub gsum du mchis par gyur pas zhags pa'i phyag rgya lag pas blang bar bgyi'o// phug gi sgo gang lags pa der zhags pa
43a6(rgyud): lan gsum du bskor bar bgyi'o// don yod pa'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyis te zhags pa gdab par bgyi'o// zhags pa btab pa tsam gyi mong la gnas kyi phug gi sgo thams cad phye bar 'gyur// 
43a7(rgyud): 'khrul 'khor dang gtan pa dang / phug dang / 'bab chu chen po dang / rtseg ma dang / 'bab chu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lam mi bde ba thams cad bsal ba dang / bcom pa dang bshig pa
43a8(rgyud): 'gyuraro// gtan pa dang / sgo glegs dang / 'khrul 'khor dang / lcags sgrog rnams dum dum bur chad cing gyes par 'gyur/ nyams par 'gyur/ 'jig par 'gyuraro// shin tu dag pa dang shin tu
43b1(rgyud): dri ma med pa dang / shin tu rgya che ba'i gzhal med khang 'byor pa rnam par 'phrul pa dag mthong bar 'gyur ro// rin po che sna tshogs kyis bkra ba/ rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa'i gnas/ rin po
43b2(rgyud): sna tshogs kyi ljon shing gis brgyan pa'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyur ro// me tog sna tshogs kyi rab shin tu dri zhim pa'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gi
43b3(rgyud): lag pa'i zhags pa dang / 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'i tshul mngon sum du bgyis nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas te 'jug par bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang gnas su zhugs pa
43b4(rgyud): tsam kho nas gnas mchog de yang rnam pa drug tu 'gul ba/ dang / g.yo ba dang / ldag pa dang / 'ur 'ur chem chen ste/ lha'i 'od zer gyi snang ba chen pos snang bar 'gyur ro// 
43b5(rgyud): de nas rig sngags 'chang 'jug par bgyi'o// de nas don yod pa rnam par dag pa dri ma med pa zhes bgyi ba'i sman bud med kyi gzugs lha'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ lha'i gos
43b6(rgyud): gyi rgyan gyis klubs pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ lha'i gzugs chen po 'chang ba bi dza pu ra thogs pa mchi bar 'gyuraro// sman bud med kyi gzugs 'chang ba de mthong ba rtsa
43b7(rgyud): kho nas dpag tshad gang tsam nas gzi brjid thams cad dang / stobs thams cad nye bar sgrub par bgyid // de nas rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i 'khor lo'i zhags pa mdun du
43b8(rgyud): bcing bar bgyi ste/ mthong ba tsam gyi mod la de'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / gzi brjid nyams par 'gyur ro// mthu chung bar 'gyuraro// de nas bud med de dgod pa dang / oM zhes bgyi bra/ 
44a1(rgyud): mnan par bgyi'o// khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas pa bgyi ste/ kha bab tu 'gyel nas chab 'byung bar 'gyur te/ chab de la reg par mi bgyi'o// don yong rgyal po bzlas pa/ 
44a2(rgyud): bgyi ste/ de nas mig tshugs kyis blta bar bgyid na rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pas bzhu bar bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu bdud rtsi'i chab 'byung ste/ thug par bgyi'o// kun tu blugs pa rtsa
44a3(rgyud): gyis na mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur te/ thog mar rlung gi phung po nas 'dzeg par 'gyuraro// mig la brug nas phyogs bcu thams cad du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems
44a4(rgyud): dpa'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dang / sang / sa rgyas kyi zhing de'i gzhal med khang dang / gnas kyi rnam/ par 'phrul pa dang / gang dag bzhugs shing bzhes la
44a5(rgyud): 'tshe ba dag ji ltar lag mthil na mchis pa de bzhin du mthong bar 'gyuraro// gang dag yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa dang / gang dag bzlas pa dang / gang dag ma byon pa dang / gang
44a6(rgyud): ngag da ltar byung ba dang / sangs rgyas rnams dang / gang dag ring bsrel snying po'i mchod rten chen po'i srog shing gi tshogs can dag dang / de bzhin du ji ltar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa de dag
44a7(rgyud): thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// bdag nyid la kun nas blugs te/ nges byugs pa tsam gyis lpags pa'i mdog lha'i gser dang 'dra bar 'gyuraro// skra sngol cung zad 'khyil bar 'gyu ro// 
44a8(rgyud): mig lha'i ut+pal sngon po mchog 'dra bar 'gyuraro// tshe lha'i bskal pa brgya stong du 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba 'bum phrag brgya stong phrag bco brgyad kyis yongs
44b1(rgyud): bskor bar 'gyur ro// lha'i bu mo brgya bzhi bcu dang / mi 'am ci'i bu mo dang / rig sngags 'chang gi bu mo gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma brgya stong phrag 'bum snyed kyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyuro// dza
44b2(rgyud): ltar yid la bsams pa dang / yid la rnags pa tsam gyis lha'i zas kyi mchog ro brgya dang ldan pa dag mdun du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lha'i btung ba chen po bdud rtsi'i ro bro ba dag 'byu
44b3(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po legs mthong mdun nas rgyug par bgyid do// dgra thams cad dang / bgegs dang / 
44b4(rgyud): log 'dren thams cad bcom pa dang / nyams pa dang / btungs pa dang / bshags pa dang / brtsal ba dang // gyes pa dang / phye mar bgyis par 'gyuraro// yang na sman
44b5(rgyud): gyi bud med de'i sgra kun bton te/ ska rags su bgyis nas bcing bar bgyi'o// gang du bcings pa de yang rin po che sna bdun du 'gyuraro// gang du zhugs pa thams cad
44b6(rgyud): mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de la lha thams cad gnas 'cha' bar 'gyuraro// klu thams cad dang / lha ma yin thams cad dang / mi 'am ci thams cad dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad
44b7(rgyud): de'i dbang du mchis par 'gyuraro// 'khor de thams cad byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du de'i phyi bzhin rjesu 'brang bar 'gyuraro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gnas su 'jug par 'tshal
44b8(rgyud): zhing slar yang ldog par 'tshal na sman gyi bud med de dang gtam mi bgyi/ reg par mi bgyi bar lag pa'i phyag rgyas gnas mchog tu 'jug par bgyi'o// de nas gnas thams cad na gnas
45a1(rgyud): nga'i bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang bu mo thams cad phyir byung nas mdun na sdod par 'gyur te/ kha cig gi lag na ni bum pa gang ba'o// kha cig ni lag na gdugs so// kha cig/ 
45a2(rgyud): gi lag na ni lha'i gos thogs so// kha cig ni lha'i nor bu rin po che thogs so// kha cig ni dri dag go/ kha cig ni me tog dag go// kha cig ni phreng ba dag go// kha cig ni rgyan dang lhab lhub sna tshogs
45a3(rgyud): thogs so// kha cig ni byug pa dag go// kha cig ni dri'i phye ma dag go// kha cig ni spos chu'i rin po che sna bdun gyi snod bkang ba dag go// kha cig ni lha'i 'bras bu sna tshogs pa dag go// kha cig ni lha'i me tog
45a4(rgyud): sna tshogs thogs te/ pad+ma dang / ku mu dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / mnang ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po dang / many+dzu sha ka dang / many+dzu sha ka chen po dang / mdog mdzes dang / mdog mdzes
45a5(rgyud): chen po dang / a ti mu ta ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / bar shi ka dang / mthon ka dang / mthon ka chen po dang / ka dam pa dang / sna mi dang / mu ti ka dang / klu'i me tog dang / kon ta dang / 
45a6(rgyud): gan d+ha bar shi ka'i me tog dag thogs so// kha cig ni lha'i tsan dan go shIr sha dang / sbrul gyi snying po'i bdug pa dang / a ka ru dang / du ru ka dang / ta ma la'i lo'i ma'i bdug pa thogs so// kha
45a7(rgyud): cig gi lag na ni rma bya'i bsil yab thogs so// kha cig gi lag pa na no ral gri'o// kha cig gi lag pa na ni mdung thung ngo // kha cig gi lag pa na ni rdo rje dang / dgra sta dang / mda' bo
45a8(rgyud): dang / mdu dang / gtan shing dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / gzeng la gnyis padag go// ba cag no go dang / ya~M lang bags nas srung ba'i phyi kun nas 'dun mche bar 'gyur ro// 
45b1(rgyud): cig ni rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod dang / gser gyi snod dang / dngul gyi snod dag thogs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog dang / gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog dag gis bkang nas
45b2(rgyud): thogs so// de dag thams cad rig sngags 'chang la dbul bar bgyid do// rig sngags 'chang gi byams pa dang / snying rje chen po yid la bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas yid la bgyis pas
45b3(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cha lugs 'chang ba yid la bgyi'o// mchog tu brtse ba yid la bgyid pas tshig gzhan mi smra bar dbugs dbyung bar bgyi
45b4(rgyud): zhing lam drang po nas 'jug par bgyi ste/ seng ge'i khril ma dngon du mchis nas don yod pa'i 'khor lo'i zhags pangag mar seng ge'i khri'i steng du bzhag par bgyi'o// 
45b5(rgyud): 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// // bam po bzhi pa// de'i 'og tu/ rig sngags 'chang rang nying mchis nas steng du gtogs
45b6(rgyud): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag bgyi zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa la yang phyag bgyi'o// des dgra thams cad pham par bgyis par 'gyur/ 
45b7(rgyud): gal te 'og tu phyogs nas phyag bgyis na de nas 'khor los rig sngags 'chang gi phyir rgol ba rnams mgo bcad par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang mchis ma thag tu gnas rnam pa
45b8(rgyud): drug tu g.yos nas sgra chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ca co'i sgra chen po 'byung bar 'gyuraro// lha'i rol mo'i cha byad yan lag lnga dang ldan pa dag 'bud par 'gyuro// na mkha'i lha rnams kyis kyang
46a1(rgyud): gnal med khang chen po nas dbu rgyan dang cod pan gyis rig sngags 'chang gi mgo bo la dbang bskur bar bgyid do// dbang bskur ba tsam gyi mod la rin po che sna bdun gyi
46a2(rgyud): char 'bab par 'gyuraro// gser gyi char dang gos kyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro// gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / lha'i me tog bkra ba sna tshogs kyi char dang / lha'i rgyan gyi char
46a3(rgyud): 'bab par 'gyuraro// de nas lha'i bu mos rin po che sna bdun gyi snod du bdud rtsi'i bcud 'tshal te mchis nas 'bul bar bgyid do// rig sngags 'chang gis blangs nas don yod pa'i zhags
46a4(rgyud): pa'i snying po bzlas par 'gyuraro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis reg par bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang gis reg pa tsam dgyi mod la lha'i lus rnam par dag pa thob nas lpags pa'i
46a5(rgyud): mdog gser 'dra bar 'gyuraro// skra lhag par sngo ba dang / mi ga ud pa la sngon po ltar lha'i mig yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// tshe'i tshad lha'i bskal pa 'bum phrag brgya
46a6(rgyud): stong du 'gyuraro// gal te phyir mi ldog par 'tshal na de'i bcud kyis len mchog las ji tsam 'tshal ba blangs te/ lha'i cha ba tsan dan gyi dri dang ldan pa'i nang du zhugs nas khrus bgyi'o// 
46a7(rgyud): khrus bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la phug gi sgo rang 'bye bar 'gyur zhing ji ltar dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs 'dra bar mthong na ni 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchod gnas kyi gtso bo cig pur 'gyur ro// 
46a8(rgyud): ji ltar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhin du rig sngags 'chang 'di yang mchod pa dang / bkur sti dang / bla mas bla mar bgyi ba de lta bur 'gyuraro// gang du bcud kyis len mchog 'dri
46b1(rgyud): rig na 'jam bu chu bo gser yongasu dag par 'gyuraro// rtsig pa'am/ ri 'am/ ka ba'am/ ljon shing ngam/ snod dam/ bum pa 'am/ rdza bo'am/ gos sam/ bong ba la reg na de dag thams cad
46b2(rgyud): 'dzam bu'i gser yongs su dag par 'gyur ba nas dgos pa'i bar du 'gyuraro// de nas rig sngags 'chang klu mo 'am/ lha mo 'am/ mi 'am ci mo 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang de gos
46b3(rgyud): gtsang ma bgos nas legs par khrus bgyi'o// ches brgyang ngam/ bcu bzhi 'am/ bco lnga la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri me'i gzugs la mchod pa bgyis
46b4(rgyud): nas nyin zhags gcig gnas par bgyi'o// 'khor lo'i zhags pa chen po 'di chos kyi stan legs par rgyan pa'i stan bzang po'i steng du bzhag par bgyi zhing mchod pa
46b5(rgyud): chen po bgyi ste/ de nyid kyi mdun du tshig gzhan mi smra bar la/ na stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te yungs kar re re nas bzlas pa rjod bgyis pa zhags pa'i steng du gtor bar bgyi'o// lan
46b6(rgyud): stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / zhags pa de yang sbrul bzhin du yongasu 'khyil la 'khor lo'i gdengs ka'i tshul du mchis par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pa blangs te klu/ 
46b7(rgyud): gnas pa'i 'tsho'am/ mi 'am ci gnas pa'i 'tsho'am/ lha mo gnas pa'i mtsho 'gram du mchis nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas te gnas kyi nang du zhags pa 'phang bar bgyi'o// 
46b8(rgyud): 'phangs ma thag kho nar slar yang dran par bgyi ste/ ji lta bu'i don yid la bsams pa'i don de zhags pas bcings nas ji ltar bsams pa de bzhin du bgyi bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang ji ltar yid
47a1(rgyud): la bsams pa'i nor ram/ dbyig gam/ gser ram/ nor bu 'am/ mu tig gam/ bai DUr+ya 'am/ shang ka shi la 'am/ byi ru 'am/ sa le sbram mam/ dngul lam/ gos sam
47a2(rgyud): chas sam/ rgyan nam/ gzhan yang gzhal med khang ji lta bur 'byor pa can dag don tu gnyer na zhags pa phang bar bgyi ste/ de thams cad 'dren par bgyid do// gang dang gang du 'phangs pa
47a3(rgyud): de dang der ji ltar yid la bsams pa de nyid shin tu gsal bar yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dngos po gzhan du mi 'gyu ro// rgyal po'i rigs sam/ bram ze'i rigs sam/ rgyal rigs sam
47a4(rgyud): khyim bdag gi rigs sam/ rje'u rigs kyi ci dang ci bsams dpa 'grub par bgyid do// skyes pa'i sa khyi'u 'am/ bu me'i ming nas brjod de zhags pa 'phangs pa tsam gyi mod
47a5(rgyud): la zhags pas bcings nas 'dren par 'gyuraro// tha na ri dag/ sa dang / bya dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / glang po che da 8/ ma he yang 'dren par bgyid do// gang gi ming nas brjod
47a6(rgyud): de g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du 'phangs na de yang zhags pas bcings nas mdun du mchis te/ ji ltar yid la bsams pa de bzhin du thams cad 'grub par bgyid do// zla ba dang nyi ma dbab par
47a7(rgyud): 'tshal na zla ba dang nyi ma'i mdun du mchis nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas te/ zla ba dang nyi ma'i mngon sum du zhags pa 'phangs nas slar yang drang bar bgyi ste/ zla ba dang nyi ma
47a8(rgyud): zhags pas bcings nas drangs par 'gyuraro// nam mkha' las babs nas rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis te/ ji ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin dgos pa thams cad sgrub par bgyid do// 'on
47b1(rgyud): te zla ba dang nyi ma'i gnas su mchi bar 'tshal na zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa lag pas blangs te don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po bzlas pa dang / rig sngags 'chang na mkha' la phur nas nyi ma
47b2(rgyud): dang zla ba'i stan la ji srid du 'tshal bar longs spyod par 'gyur zhing slar bde ba dang / ma snang pa dang / ma smas pa dang / legs par 'bab par 'gyur ro// nags khung du 'jug par 'tshal
47b3(rgyud): na gtsang ma legs par khrus bgyis pas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi zhing nags khang gi sgor lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te zhags pa 'phang bar bgyi'o// lag pa
47b4(rgyud): zhags pa 'phangs pa tsam gyis nags khung gi gnas kyi dgazhal med khang gi klu thams cad bcings nas tham sa cad rig sngags 'chang gi mdun na mchis par 'gyur
47b5(rgyud): zhing / rig sngags 'chang la phyag bgyis nas rig sngags/ 'chang khyod gnas chen po mchog tu zhugs shi/ ga ces smra bar 'gyuraro// de nas rigasapa 'chang gis don
47b6(rgyud): yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po bzlas te/ lag pa zhags pa'i phyag rgyas nags khung du 'jug par bgyi'o// zhugs pa tsam kho nas nags kyi gnas rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar 'gyur zhing dbus kyi
47b7(rgyud): nags kyi mtha' na rin po che sna bdun gyi rdzing lha'i chab dngas zhing rnyog pa ma mchis pa shin tu gsal ba/ lha'i tsan dan gyi dri dang ldan pa/ ha cang mi grang ba/ ha cang mi dro ba/ reg na bde ba/ ro dang
47b8(rgyud): ldan pa/ bdud rtsi'i bcud can mchis te/ 'di ltar don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas rdzing gi dbus su zhags pa 'phang par bgyi'o// 'phangs
48a1(rgyud): pa tsam gyi mong la bud med rin po che'i gzugs 'dra ba'i lha'i bu mo'i lus phyed byung nas lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan cing / rin po che sna bdun gyi bum pa gang
48a2(rgyud): ba thogs te rig sngags 'chang la dbul zhing spyi bo smad de 'dzum pa dang bcas pas rig sngags 'chang la smras pa/ rje btsun rig sngags 'chang khyod ma bzhengs par gnas su zhugs shig/ rig sngags
48a3(rgyud): 'chang gis grub pa'i tshig gsum brjod par bgyi ste/ 'jig rten pha rol gyi don dang / rig sngags 'chang nyid dang / 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub grub te/ bdag nyid kyi ma dang / sring mo dang / 
48a4(rgyud): mngag gzhugs ma zhes gar bde bar brjod la de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis smra bar bgyi ste/ sring mo kho bo la 'ji ga rten pha rol gyi don byin cig ces 'jug par bgyi'o// de
48a5(rgyud): yang rig sngags 'chang khyod rang gi gnas su snoms te zhug/ sa shig ces smra bar 'gyur// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis lag pa zhags pa'i phyag rgyas 'jug par
48a6(rgyud): bgyi zhing don yod rgyal po'i snying po bzlas so// de nas gnas chen po mchog rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang lha'i dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba dang / gser dang / gos sbyangs pa dar gyi chun
48a7(rgyud): 'phyang rab tu sbyangs par gda' ba nas bu mo de yang nor bu rin po che chen po thogs te/ rig sngags 'chang 'jig rten pha rol gyi don du rin po che chen po bzhes shig ces dbul bar bgyid do// de nas
48a8(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gis bstan bshams pa'i steng du zhags pa legs par yongs su bskyil te/ stan tu gting la nor bu rin po che chen po de zhags pa'i steng du bzhag cing me tog dang bdug pa dbul bar
48b1(rgyud): bgyi'o// don yong rgyal po bzlas par bgyi'o// bzlas pa tsam gyi mong la zhags pa nor bu rin po che dang bcas te 'phang bar 'gyuro// nor bu rin po che chen po de las yang 'o ma'i chab 'byung bar 'gyuro// rig
48b2(rgyud): sngags 'chang gis 'o ma'i chab de las blangs la sbyor chu lan du reg par bgyi'o// 'o ma'i chab kyis reg pa tsam gyi mong la lus thams cad dri ma dang bral zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// don yod/ 
48b3(rgyud): snang ba nor bu gzhal med khang kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'od zer gyi dra ba 'od zer zhes bgyi ba thob nas sa bcu la gnas te phyir mi ldog par 'gyu ro// bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyuraro// 
48b4(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin sgyu ma lta bur rnam par 'phrul pa thob par 'gyur zhing shin tu yongasu dag pa'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis don yod
48b5(rgyud): pa'i zhags pa'i cha lugs 'chang ba rig sngags 'chang gi/ mdun du mchis nas lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor bzhagaste/ nga'i rig sngags 'chang gi bu thu bo khyod kyis grol ba
48b6(rgyud): chen po'i dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su dag pa 'thob bo zhes dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong nas thams cad kyis leg so// 
48b7(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur te/ sems dpa' chen po legs so legs// khyod ni byang chub lam du zhugs// khyod kyis sangs rgyas nyid 'thob ste// grol ba'i lam zhes bya ba'i
48b8(rgyud): bsgrubs// 'on te rig sngags 'chang nyid don du gnyer na de'i tshe gser gyi me tog stsol bar 'gyur te blangs la bu mo de nyid kyi spyi bor bzhag nas/ oM zhes bgyi bas mnan par bgyi'o// oM zhes
49a1(rgyud): bgyi ba'i sgra brjod nas spyi bor bzhag pa tsam gyi mod la bu mo de'i mig mchog gnyis nas mchi ma 'dzeg par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis blangs te nye reg
49a2(rgyud): bgyid pa tsam gyi mong la rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro// skra cung zad 'khyil cing lag pa na 'khor lo'i zhags pa thogs te na mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur ro// rig
49a3(rgyud): sngags 'chang bye ba 'bum phrag bco brgyad kyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// tshe lo drug khri nyis stong du 'gyur zhing skye ba bdun stong rje su dran par 'gyuraro// 'on te gsang sngags 'chang 'jig
49a4(rgyud): rten pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga slong na de'i tshe 'di lta bur 'a gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gis bdag gi skra 'di sdom das shig ces de'i tshe bud med des skra'i ral pa bton nas rig sngags
49a5(rgyud): 'chang la 'bul ba na sgra thams cad blang sa te dum bu gsum du bkum nas srang bu la nyi shu rtsa gcig bkal te/ mgo la btags pas ni ji ltar yid la bsams pa de bzhin
49a6(rgyud): du mig 'phrul ston par 'gyur ro// 'bras bu dang me tog 'tshal ba thams cad ston par 'gyur ro// bden pa ji ltar 'tshal bzhin ston par 'gyur ro// mgul du btags pas ni mi gda'
49a7(rgyud): bar gyur nas gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi ma yin pa rnams dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyuraro// dpral ba
49a8(rgyud): la btags pas ni lha dang klu thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// dpung pa g.yas pa la btags pas ni glang po che bcu'i stobs dang ldan par 'gyur te/ phas kyi dgra bo dang / 
49b1(rgyud): mi mdza' ba dang / gdugs pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs pas stobs kyis 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro// dpung pa g.yon pa la btags pas ni rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten dbang du gyur
49b2(rgyud): nas mchis par 'gyur ro// lag pa g.yon pa la btags pas ni gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur zhing bdag gi nor du 'gyur ro// lag pa g.yas pa la btags pas ni grong khyer gyi shar
49b3(rgyud): phyogs kyi sgo nas rgyal po'i sgo la thal mo lan gsum brdabs na rgyal po'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dang / grong khyer dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dang / bud med ngang / 
49b4(rgyud): skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang ba cas pa bdag nyid dam/ nor dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// / tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs par bya dang / gcan zan
49b5(rgyud): dang / ri dgas dang / gdugs pa dang / gzhan yang gdugs pa dang bcas pa'i srog chags rnams dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyuraro// brla g.yas pa la btags pas
49b6(rgyud): ni tshal lam/ ser ga dang / ri 'or 'am/ phug gam/ dgon pa 'am bsti gnas gang du zhugs te zhugs pa tsam gyi modo la nor thams cad dang / sman thams cad dang / lha thams cad
49b7(rgyud): rang gi gzugs su mngon nas mchis par 'gyur ro// byin pa g.yas pa dang / rkang pa g.yas pa la btags pas ni rgya mtsho chen po'i pa mthar yang rgal bar 'gyur na chu klung chen po'i chab kyis/ 
49b8(rgyud): byin pa nub tsam du 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal byin pa g.yon pa la btags pas ni nyi ma re re zhing dpag tshad brgyar phyin nas dub pa ma mchis par slar yang ldog par 'gyur ro// brlarma
50a1(rgyud): g.yon pa la btags nas dur khrod chen por zhugs na dur khrod thams cad na gnas pa'i gcer bu pa thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyuraro// de nas rig
50a2(rgyud): sngags 'chang gnas de nyid na spyod na rig sngags 'chang des lag pa g.yon pas bum pa gang ba bzung zhing lag pa g.yas pas bud med de bzung nas gnas chen po'i mchog tu 'jug par bgyi
50a3(rgyud): gnas mchog de'i dbus na rdzing me tog gis chal bar bkram pa bgyi ste/ rdzing der gnyis ka khrus bgyi zhing chab kyis nye reg bgyi'o// bkrus shing leg pa tsam kho nas 'khor lo rig
50a4(rgyud): sngags 'chang zhags pa dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang 'bum phrag bdun stong gis yongs su bskor cing tshe bskal pa
50a5(rgyud): khrir 'gyur ro// skra cung zad 'khyil par yang 'gyur ro// / nags kyi gnas kyi gzhal med khang bdun bcu rtsa// gnyis kyi dpon po rgyal por 'gyur ro// gal te ma zhes
50a6(rgyud): bgyi bas don du gnyer ba ni bu gcig pa bzhin du yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro// 'bras dang / 'bru dang / gos dang / chos dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / byi ru dang / gser dang / 
50a7(rgyud): dngul yongs su grub par bgyid do// sring mo zhes bgyi bas ni dgos pa'i yo byad thams cad tshang par stobs par 'gyur zhing yan lag spong bar bgyid do// nyi ma re re zhing rgyan
50a8(rgyud): thams cad kyis klubs pa'i lha'i bu mo khrid de mchi bar 'gyur/ lha'i gzhal med khang 'byor pa stobs par bgyid/ lha'i khyim dang / gzhal med khang stobs par bgyid do// 
50b1(rgyud): mngag gzhugs ma zhes bgyi bas ni gang dang gang du mngags pa de dang der mchi bar 'gyur te/ lha'i gnas sam/ klu'i gnas sam/ gnod sbyin gyi gnas sam/ srin po'i
50b2(rgyud): gnas sam/ 'byung po'i gnas sam/ gzhan yang mngag gzhug pa'i sgrub pa rnam pa sna tshogs yid la bsams pa bzhin du bgyid do// nags sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// de nas rig
50b3(rgyud): sngags 'chang thang la rgyu bar 'tshal na gtsang ma khrus bgyis pas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi/ gnas dben pa gtsang ma'i sa phyogs su dkyil 'khor gru bzhir bgyis la dri
50b4(rgyud): sna tshogs kyis byug/ ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gtor ma bshams la a ga ru'i bdug pas sreg ste/ 8nub gsum du mchis nas 'khor la zhags pa'i lag pa
50b5(rgyud): phyag rgyas don yong rgyal po'i snying po'i bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bgyis te lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas dub 'byung bar 'gyur te/ khro
50b6(rgyud): bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas par bgyi'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas skyes pa nag po chen po'i tshul mi sdug pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa skra gyen du 'greng ba/ mgo 'bar
50b7(rgyud): ga mig dmar ba dang / mchu dang lce dmar ba/ ser mo dmar ba ka sgra sngo ba/ dpung pa mkhrang zhing brtan pa/ gsus pa 'phyangs po mchod phyir thogs pa dang ldan pa/ mgo lnga pa/ 
50b8(rgyud): sbrul ltar lce bsgyur ba/ stag gi sham thabs bgos pa/ lag dgra ste dang / dril bu thogs pa zhig lus byed tsam thung nas phyogs bcur blta bar bgyid do// de nas rig sngags/ 
51a1(rgyud): 'chang gis skrag par mi bgyi ste brtan par bgyi la/ khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas nas 'khor lo'i zhags pa 'phangs te mgo bcad la khrag mang du byung ba dang / rig sngag
51a2(rgyud): 'chang gis khrag des lus thams cad byug par bgyi'o// blugs pa tsam gyi mod la bdag nyid lus mchod pa dang / mi shig pas rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs par 'gyuraro// mig gnyis
51a3(rgyud): phyung la rang gi mig phyis nas mig la bskus na lha'i mig tu 'gyuraro// rkang skus te byugs na tshe bskal pa bcur 'gyur zhing thos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtshor 'gyuraro// bskal pa brgya stong gi skye
51a4(rgyud): ba'i skye ba dang / tshe rabs dran par 'gyuraro// snying phyung ste 'tshal na na mkha' la mchi'o// khrag gis snying khar thig le ba gyis na mi gda' bar 'gyur// lce bcad na ral grir gyur
51a5(rgyud): nas dgra thams cad brlags par bgyid do// gal te thang / la rgyu bar 'tshal na de'i tshe khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya/ rtsa brgyad zhags pa dang 'khor lo la bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 
51a6(rgyud): 'khor los zhags pa gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i tshul gyis thal mo so la brdabs par bgyi ste/ lan gsum du thal mo brdabs pa dang / de'i 'og tu thang gi sgo dbye bar 'gyuraro// ji ltar rang gi khyin
51a7(rgyud): bzhin du 'jug par 'gyur ste/ zhugs nas slar yang mchi zhing dgos pa gzhan thams cad bgyid pa dang / thang thams cad la gnas pa thams cad dbang du gyur nas gnas par 'gyur ro// 
51a8(rgyud): 'on te nam mkha' la mchi 'tshal na gyen du bltas nas don yod rgyal po'i snying po yungs kar la stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas bdag nyid la byugs te/ lag pa'i zhags/ 
51b1(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgyas na mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur zhing na mkha' go 'byed par 'gyur ro// lha'i gnas su mchi bar 'tshal na lha'i khyim du mchis nas zhags pas lha'i mgul nas bcing bar
51b2(rgyud): zhing don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas lha bcings pa gang lags pa de'i ming nas brjod na lha de babs nas rig sngags 'chang gi mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro// tshang/ 
51b3(rgyud): bdang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rig sngags 'chang la rig sngags 'chang ci zhig don du gnyer bde snoms shig ces smra bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gis lha'i
51b4(rgyud): gnas su 'gro'o zhes brjod par bgyi'o// gal te gzhan da bsams pa zhig mchis na mchog thams cad stsol/ bar bgyid do// de nas lha'i gnas nas mchi ba na lha
51b5(rgyud): gnas lha'i rdzu 'phrul gyis lag pa thogs te/ namakha' la mchi bar 'gyur ro// ji srid 'tshal bar lha gzhal med khang chen por longs spyod par 'gyur zhing
51b6(rgyud): 'on te mi 'tshal na lha'i gnas nas slar yang 'bebs par 'gyur ro// gzhan ji ltar rang gi blo gros dang / yid la bsams pa'i dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur
51b7(rgyud): zhing thams cad grub par 'gyur te/ de la som nyi dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bgyi'o// 'khor lo'i zhags pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// // de nas rig sngags
51b8(rgyud): 'chang pad+ma'i zhags pa sgrub par 'tshal bas rig sngags 'chang de gtsang ma legs par bkrus te/ gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// nub gsum mchis sam// nub lnga mchis sam/ 
52a1(rgyud): nub gcig mchis nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pa'i skud pa sgrub par bgyi ste/ ras kyi skud pa'am pad+ma'i skud pa bai DUr+ya'i kha dogs lta bur tshon gyi kha sbyar
52a2(rgyud): bar bgyi zhing khru nyi shu rtsa gcig bkal te/ de la yang pad+ma bgyi te/ rin po che sna bdun gyi mdab ma kha phye ba sor bzhi pa'i tshad kyis pad+ma gser gyi mdab ma dang / dngul gyi mdab ma dang / 
52a3(rgyud): bai DUr+ya dang / in+d+ra ni la'am/ rin po che rka ti ka la bgyi zhing mu tig gis bskor ba bgyi ste/ de nas zhags pa la gdags par bgyi'o// zhags pa'i thor to gcig la ni pad+ma'i phyag
52a4(rgyud): rgya gdags par bgyi'o// de nas legs par rgyan pa de'i chos kyi bstan bzang po bshams par bgyi'o// pa'i lci bas dkyil 'khor bgyis la dkyil 'khor gyi steng
52a5(rgyud): du dri'i pad+ma bsam par bgyi zhing dkyil 'khor gyi steng du tshe sa kyi gdan bshams la bum pa gang bas rgyan par bgyi'o// me tog gi sil ma bkram zhing a ga ru dang / tsan
52a6(rgyud): ngan dang / du ru ka'i gdug pa dbul bar bgyi'o// mchod yon dang zhabs bsil gyi snod kyang bzhag par bgyi'o// pad+ma'i zhags pa de yang chos kyi stan gyi steng du bzhags par bgyi'o// 
52a7(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du rig sngags 'chang gis skyil mo krungs bcas nas don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan khri bzlas te/ bzlas pa'i yungs kar re re nas
52a8(rgyud): de'i steng du gtor bar bgyi'o// lan khri rdzogs nas de nas tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nya'i nub mo mchis nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bgyi'o// zhags pa de/ 
52b1(rgyud): yang mchod par bgyi'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// de nas khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ nyin
52b2(rgyud): mtshan dus gsum du bzlas brjod dang mchod pa bgyi'o// de nas pad+ma'i zhags pa 'bar zhing kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// legs so legs so zhes bgyi
52b3(rgyud): ba'i tshig 'byin par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lus la kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang phyag rgya'i
52b4(rgyud): skyil mo krung gis mchis nas mig mi 'dzums zhing / bzhin 'dzums pas snying rje chen po yid la sgom par bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
52b5(rgyud): phrug gi gdong du bltas te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa 'a snying po lan sum stong bzlas par bgyi'o// de'i'o ga tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid
52b6(rgyud): kyi lha'i rang bzhin mdun du mchis nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor bzhag nas legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur zhing 'di skad ces kyang dbugs
52b7(rgyud): 'byin par bgyid ngo // rig sngags 'chang nga'i bu snying las skyes pa'i thu bo bzlas brjod kyi cho ga chen po dang / mchod pa'i cho ga chen po 'dis nga la mchod pa'i mchog byas pa dang bzlas brjod kyi/ 
52b8(rgyud): mchog dang grub pa'i mchog ste/ khyod kyis don yong rgyal po'i snying po grub cing khyod kyis pad+ma'i zhags pa chen po grub kyis ji ltar yid la bsam pa bzhin du mchog khyer cig/ khyod
53a1(rgyud): yid kyi brnags pa thams cad ni yongasu rdzogs par byas/ khyod 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa rgyu ba las ni grol/ khyod skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'a
53a2(rgyud): ba'i mya ngan mi bzad pa'i 'jigs pa las thar na khyod dmyal ba chen po mi bzad pa bcu drug la ni yongs su grol/ 'jigs pa chen po mi bzad pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba brgyad
53a3(rgyud): las ni yongasu thar/ 'di nas phyi ma'i skye ba'i mngal du gnas nas sdug bsngal mi bzad pa las shi 'phongs te/ rig sngags 'chang khyod byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du 'jig
53a4(rgyud): rten gyi khams bde ba can du pad+ma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// khyod kyis gang ga'i klung 'bum phrag stong brgya dad bcu rtsa bzhi snyed kyi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs
53a5(rgyud): pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba cher bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po dang ni ldan/ rig sngags 'chang/ khyod kyis lhag par bya ba mang po ni byas/ khyod rig sngags
53a6(rgyud): 'chang chen por ni lung bstan/ dmyal ba dang sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa mi bzad pa thams cad las ni grol gyis ji ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin mchog khyer cig/ de nas rig
53a7(rgyud): sngags 'chang gis ji ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin de'i tshe mchog thob par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis pad+ma'i zhags pa de blangs te gnas gtsang mar gus
53a8(rgyud): pas mchod pa rgya cher bgyi'o// nam dgos pa de'i zhags pa blangs par bgyid ste/ las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// pad+ma ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
53b1(rgyud): drug gi lag pa g.yon par bdag la lag pa g.yas pas zhags pa bzung ste/ don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ sems can nam lha gang gi ming nas
53b2(rgyud): brjod de bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' mdun du mchis nas 'dod pa'i mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang byang
53b3(rgyud): chub tu lung bstan pa den du gnyer bar 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas legs par khrus bgyis te/ gos gtsang ma bgos pas nyin zhag cig mchis par gyur pas
53b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la mchod brgya chen po bgyis nas pad+ma'i zhags pa de yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag tu dbul bar bgyi'o// 
53b5(rgyud): zhags pa'i thor to ya gcig gis ni rang gi mgul tu brta/ gsal/ don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang par bzlas brjod bgyi'o// stong rtsa brgyad
53b6(rgyud): tshangs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku gser gyi mdog can rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du bzhugs nas rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor phyag bzhag ste dbugs 'byin par mdzad/ 
53b7(rgyud): lung ston par mdzad/ yid kyi brnag pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad par 'gyur ro// sgrib pa dang / sdig pa tshe rabs stong du bsags pa thams cad gtugs par 'gyur/ 
53b8(rgyud): lhag ma ma lus par gtugs par gyur nas lus yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// dri ma dang bral zhing phrag dog dang ser sna spangs par 'gyur ro// de nas ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba'i mngal du
54a1(rgyud): gnas nas lha dang mi'i dngal nyams su myong bar bgyis nas sems can thams cad kyi tham gcig pur 'gyur// mchod par 'os pa dang / bla ma'i gnas su la
54a2(rgyud): 'gyur / nang rnams dang bral bar 'gyur ro// skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyuraro// 'gum pa'i dus su phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur/ dbugs
54a3(rgyud): 'byin par mdzad/ legs pa'i lam ston par mdzad par yang 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mdun na mchis nas dbugs 'byin par bgyid cing lags pa
54a4(rgyud): g.yas pa spyi bor 'jog par bgying ngo // de bde bas shin ba tu dran pa nye bar gzhag nas lus 'dor bar 'gyur ro/ bor ba tsam gyi mo la skal ba mnyam pa bde ba can gyi 'jig
54a5(rgyud): rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur te/ rgyan thams cad kyis/ brgyan pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad kyis spras pa'i/ wu sa pad+ma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs dran
