54a6(rgyud): pabar 'gyur te/ bskal pa brgya stong gi skye ba'i tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo 'di
54a7(rgyud): mtha' dag rdzogs par g.yar thon du bgyis nas sa bcu la gnas shing phyin ci log tu ma gyur pas phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / cho 'phrul
54a8(rgyud): chen pos lha'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / gnas mchog dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du byang chub kyi snyi
54b1(rgyud): bol drug ga bar du mchi bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba'i chos kho na la lta bar 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang gis gnas gcang
54b2(rgyud): ma'i phyogs sam/ gnas sam/ khang pa 'am/ dgon pa'i gnas sam/ 'khor gyi khyams sam/ 'chag sa 'am/ khang pa brtsegs ma'am/ skyil po gtsang ma
54b3(rgyud): phyi bdar legs par bgyis pa'i phyogs su dkyil 'khor gru bzhi dbyes pa khru gang btsam/ khru ngo ba'i dkyil 'khor bgyi ste/ gru bzhi lham pa/ grwa kun nas cha mdzes pa/ 
54b4(rgyud): so dang sbyar ba'i lcibs shin tu logs par phye bdar bdagyos la rtswa sngon po gnyen po lta bu la mkhas pas dkyil 'khor mtha' dag gi cha dbye ba'i thig gdab par
54b5(rgyud): bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying po la pad+ma rgya chen pos dbyes pa/ mdab ma brgya pa tshon sna brgya kyi tshon rtsis bkra bar bgyi zhing dbyes par bgyis la/ snying
54b6(rgyud): bo na rin po che ga ti ka las bgyi'o// pad+ma'i mtha' nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi bskor la/ grwa bzhi nas kha khyer so bzhi pa'i tshad du bgyi'o// pad+ma'i bar gyi zur zur du ud pal
54b7(rgyud): sngon po legs par bris la kha khyer gyi phyi rol nor bus 'khor ba'i mtha' de mchos bskor bar bgyi'o// lha'i chab rin po che sna tshogs kyi gzhal med khang gis mdzes par
54b8(rgyud): bgyis la chab la me tog sna tshogs kyi sil ma bkod pa bya sna tshogs gnas 'cha' ba/ ngang pa dang / bzhad dang / khrung khrung dang / ngur pa dang / shang shang te'u dang / ka la bing ka
55a1(rgyud): dang / bya'i tshogs kyis mdzes par bgyis la/ nya dang / chu srin dang / chu srin byis pa bsod kun nas rten 'cha' bar bgyid do// mtsho'i 'gram na rin po che'i
55a2(rgyud): ljon shing dang / me tog gi ljon shing dang / 'bras bu'i ljon shing sna tshogs kha khyer dang bcas par bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi kha khyer gyi phyi rol na lag pa dang / thal me'i phyag rgya
55a3(rgyud): bris la sgo bzhi rnams su rgyal po chen po bzhi bgyi'o// de nas dbus kyi dkyil 'khor la pad+ma'i gdan bzang po bshams te de'i steng du bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med dang / 'phags
55a4(rgyud): ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob pa/ zhag par bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor bum pa gang ba/ des rgyun par bgyi'o// me tog sil ma dang / dri dang drug
55a5(rgyud): ba yang dbul bar bgyi'o// ba dan bzang po sna tshogs kyis rgyan par bgyi'o// gtor ma dkar po dbul bar bgyi'o// yon chab dang zhabs bsil gyi snod dang / mar
55a6(rgyud): me'i phreng ba dbul bar bgyi'o// pad+ma'i zhags pa 'od dpag med kyi phyag tu dbul bar bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// legs par khrus bgyis
55a7(rgyud): nas pa'i rnam lngas nye reg bgyis la zla ba nya la nyin zhag cig mchis par gyur pas kha shar phyogs su bltas la skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas lag pas zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te bzlas
55a8(rgyud): brjod bgyi'o// byams pa dang brtse ba'i sems kyis lhag par brtson par bgyi'o// snying rje mchog tu brtse bar gyur pas sems can thams cad la brtse bar bgyis na don yod pa'i zhags
55b1(rgyud): pa'i skang po bzlas brjod bgyiste/ ci tsam na thun tha ma la 'od dpag med 'bar bar gyur nas dkyil 'khor chen po la yang 'ong zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang g.yo bar gyur/ 
55b2(rgyud): nas lus 'bar bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis su rengs shar tsam na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'phags pa'od
55b3(rgyud): dpag med gser spungs pa lta bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser gyi kha dog gis rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du bzhugs nas phyag g.yas pa rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor bzhag ste/ 
55b4(rgyud): dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing yid kyi brnags pa thams dang yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas mi ganga' bar gyur pa dang / shin tu rnam par dag pa dri ma meng pa'i snang ba tre
55b5(rgyud): bya ba'i gnyid thob nas ji ltar nyal ba tsam ma mig bcum ba tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gzhan med khang dang gnas dang / 'jig rten dang / yul
55b6(rgyud): ljongs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor mtha' dag dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par mthong bar 'gyur lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa de chos ston par
55b7(rgyud): mdzad pa yang mthong bar 'gyur lags so// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad dbug 'byin par bgyid pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul thams
55b8(rgyud): cang mthong bar 'gyur lags so// 'di nas ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba nas shi 'phos te 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du bskal pa mnyam par skye bar 'gyuraro// skye ba'i skye ba dran par 'gyur
56a1(rgyud): te/ skye ba bdun stong rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// de sang nas zhags pa la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas lag pa g.yas pas bzung nan mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyuraro// 
56a2(rgyud): lo khrir 'tsho bar 'gyuraro// zhags pa grub pa rnams dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur// 'khor khri brgyad stong dang ldan par 'gyuraro// pad+ma'i zhags pa/ 
56a3(rgyud): sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// // de nas rig sngags 'chang rdo rje'i zhags pa sgrub par 'tshal na shing shun dang / ras skud dang / kha che dar gyi skud pa mnyam du lhan cig bkal te/ khru nyi shu rtsa gcig
56a4(rgyud): gi tshad tsam du bgyis la tsan dan dkar po las rdo rje sor bzhi pa de'i tshang du bgyis te/ rtse lnga pa 'byung po la sogs pa'i mgo dang / sbrul gyi ska rags bcings la klu'i rgyal po
56a5(rgyud): dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo'i dra ba'i phreng bas dkri ba bgyis nas zhags pa la gdags par bgyi'o// de nasarig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi
56a6(rgyud): legs par khrus bgyi'o// ba'i rna lngas nye reg bgyi'o// rtsa'i stan bting nas ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du lag pa g.yas pa zhags pas mnan nas don yod pa'i snying po khri bzlas so// khro bo'i
56a7(rgyud): rgyal po'i snying po stong bzlas so// de nas zhags pa de 'bar bar 'gyur te de bzung nas na mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyuraro// rdo rje'i rigs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rig
56a8(rgyud): dang / pad+ma'i rigs gang dag lags pa de dag thams cad mdun na bzhugs par 'gyuraro// lag na rdo rje dang 'dra bar gzugs dang / mthu dang brtson 'grus pha rol gyi zil gyi mi non par
56b1(rgyud): 'gyu ro lag na rdo rje dang 'dra bar rig sngags 'chang gi dbang por 'gyur// lha'i lo khrizhes stong du 'tsho bar 'gyuro// las thams cad bgyid pa rdo rje'i zhags pa dgra thams cad 'joms
56b2(rgyud): par bgyid pa'i zhags pa steng ngam/ 'og gar 'phangs par yang la bsams pa bzhin thams cad bcings nas 'gug par bgyid do// phyogs bcur 'phangs te khro bo'i rgyal po
56b3(rgyud): bzlas nas skyes pa'am/ bud med dam/ gzhan gang ci yang rung ba thams cad zhag pas bcings nas/ myur du 'gugs par bgyi ste som nyi mi bgyi'o// gal te lnga'am/ 
56b4(rgyud): klu'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po 'am/ dri za'am/ lha ma yin nam/ na mkha' lding ngam/ mi'am ci 'am/ 'byung po'am/ lto 'phye chen po thams cad
56b5(rgyud): zhags pas bcings nas myur du 'gug par bgyid de som nyi mi bgyi'o// zhags pa la khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ mar gyi ngo'i
56b6(rgyud): tshes bcu bzhi'i mtshan mo nam phyed ni zhags pa phyogs bzhir 'phangs par bgyi'o// 'phangs pa tsam gyi mong la bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 
56b7(rgyud): gdugs pa thams cad zhags pas bcings nas/ rig sngags 'chang gi mdun na mchis shing ji srid mtshe'i bar du dbang du gyur nas mchis te/ bran bzhin du las thams cad
56b8(rgyud): bgyid par 'gyur// bltas pa tsam gyis gdon thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// zhags pa la khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ lag pas zhags pa blangs
57a1(rgyud): te dur khrod du zhugs na mi snang bar 'gyur zhing gnas thams cad kyi sgo phye bar 'gyuraro// phug gi sgor mchis nas rdo rje'i zhags pas brdabs na/ phug thams cad
57a2(rgyud): sgo 'byed par 'gyur zhing 'khrul 'khor dang gtan pa thams cad dum bur chag par 'gyur ro// lam ngan pa dang / mi ngan pa dang / mi ma yin pa dang / 'bab chu ngan pa dang / sbrul dang
57a3(rgyud): dbugs gdugs pa dang / srog chags go nas dang / gdug pa dang bcas pa'i srog chags su gtogs pa thams cad mi ganga' bar 'gyuraro// mi drang po dang / lam drang
57a4(rgyud): ji ltar rang gi gnas sam/ gtsug lag khang ngam / khang pa bzhin du zhugs nas dgos pa thams cad bsgrubs te/ slar yang gnas nas phyir ldog par 'gyur/ 
57a5(rgyud): rdo rje zhags pa las thams cad bgyid ba sgrub pa'i rgyaga'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang nor bu'i nag/ sa bsgrub par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des nor
57a6(rgyud): bu btsal bar bgyi ste/ rdo rje'am/ baiDUr+ya 'am/ shel rang byung ngam/ mar gang da 'am/ in drane la sor mo'i tshigs lhag tsam shin tu phyis pa shin tu yongasu dag
57a7(rgyud): par bgyis pa/ gser gyi me tog gi tshul du ma bgyis pa/ mu tig gis dkris pa/ ge sar kha bye ba/ tsam pa ka'i me tog ji lta ba de bzhin du bgyis la/ ras bzang po'i
57a8(rgyud): skung ba tshon rtsis dbye bas kha sbyar ba/ shin tu tshang la bab par bkal pa/ khru nyi shu rtsa gcig pa ser mo gung me'i tshad tsam gyi nor bus rgyan la thor to gcig shos su ni nor bu/ 
57b1(rgyud): 'am gser las bgyis pa'i lcags kyu gdags par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// legs par bkrus nas ba'i rnam lngas
57b2(rgyud): nye reg bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du spos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor tshang dang ldan pa bgyis la grwa bzhir bum pa gang ba bzhag cing / pog por gyi snod bshams
57b3(rgyud): nas a ga ru'i bdug pa dang / tsan dan dang / du ru ka'i bdug pa dbul bar bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su chos kyi bstan bzang po tshad dang ldan pa bshams la/ ba dan sna
57b4(rgyud): tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bskor bar bgyi'o// me tog sil ma dang / dri dang // rol mo cha byad dag dgod par bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang gis zas dkar gsum
57b5(rgyud): 'tshal bar bgyi'o// btung ba ngan pa dang / kha zas ngan pa dang / gnas ngan pa dang / lhag ma dang / sbags pa rnams yongs su spang bar bgyi'o// don
57b6(rgyud): yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po'i nyi khri gcig stong bzlas nas lag pa g.yas pas chos kyi stan gyi steng du bzhag pa'i zhags pa la mnan no// lan nyi khri chig stong tshang ba dang / de nas
57b7(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gis khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas te/ yungs kar re re nas dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / rig sngags 'chang
57b8(rgyud): gi 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la mchod pa rgya cher bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la yang
58a1(rgyud): mchod ba rgya cher 'gyira'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis chos bco lnga'i nya la nyin nag cig bsrung ba bgyis nas mchod pa cher bgyi ste/ mchod pa'i yo byad gang cing
58a2(rgyud): rung ba de dag thams cad la re re nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa re re bzlas brjod bgyis nas dbul bar bgyi'o// de nas skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas nyin mtshan
58a3(rgyud): kun tu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te yungs kar re re nas bdeg par bgyi'o// lan stong rtsa brgyang tshang ba dang sa cher g.yo bar 'gyuraro// 'phags pa
58a4(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs las/ kyang 'od zer sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyuraro// nor bu'i zhags pa de yang 'bar bar 'gyur/ rig sngags 'chang gi
58a5(rgyud): mgo bo yang 'bar bar 'gyur// 'bar ba tsam gyi ma/ da la rig sngags 'chang gi lag pa g.yas pas nor/ bu'i zhags pa blangs pa na sgra chen po 'byung bar 'gyuraro// den
58a6(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lha'i bdag nyid kyi rang rang bzhin gyis rig sngags 'chang gi mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med dang / de bzhin
58a7(rgyud): gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 'od kyi rgyal po'i sku gser gyi kha dog gis na mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis bzhugs nas rig sngags 'chang
58a8(rgyud): la legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur/ phyag dpung pa gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba brkyang ba'i phyag gis rig sngags 'chang gi mgo bor bzhags nas rig sngags 'chang la dbugs 'byin
58b1(rgyud): par mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang leg so legs so// khyod kyis yang bzhin gyi nor bu chen po don yod pa'i zhags pa rnam par dag pa grub bo// khyod kyis 'jig rten pa dang / 'dzag
58b2(rgyud): rten las 'das pa'i las sgrub pa'i cho ga bla na med pa grub ste/ rig sngags 'chang gis 'dod dgur sbyar ba thams cad de/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod grub
58b3(rgyud): ba yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i zhags pa thogs nas rig sngags 'chang gis 'bad mi dgos par yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i grub pa'i rang bzhin 'dis
58b4(rgyud): 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgos pa rnam pa sna tshogs bsgrub par byed pa la ltos shig/ yid la ji ltar bsams pa bzhin rdzu 'phrul dang // cho 'phrul
58b5(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs la ltos shig/ rig sngags 'chang khyod shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du song shig/ 'on te bde ba can lta bar 'tshal lam/ ji ltar
58b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa la 'os pa'i lha rdzas kyis mchod par 'tshal lam/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i sprin gyis mchod par 'tshal lam/ lha'i me tog dang / lha'i dri dang
58b7(rgyud): phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu dang / ba dan dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan dang / gos kyi de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod
58b8(rgyud): par bgyi bar 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang nges spyi bo'i gtsug tu dri'i dkyil 'khor bgyis la me tog dang / bdug pa yang dbul bar bya/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po ngan yod zhags pa'i
59a1(rgyud): mchog 'di lag pa g.yon pas mnan la/ lag pa g.yas pas don yod yid bzhin nor bu'i mchog bzung nas dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ 'di
59a2(rgyud): lta bu'i yid la bgyis pa chen po ji lta bu'i bsam pa yid la bgyid pa de lta bu yang bsams nas don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan bdun bzlas te phyag bgyi'o// yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po rgya
59a3(rgyud): chen don yod pa 'di bzlas nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po 'di lan rgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen pos yongasu gdungs
59a4(rgyud): pa'i snying gis sems can thams cad la mchog tu brtse bar bgyis nas gsang sngags bzlas brjod bgyi'o// / 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags
59a5(rgyud): pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// // bam po lnga pa// dus gsum du gshegs shing / bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
59a6(rgyud): rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad la phyag 'tshal// 
59a7(rgyud): yang dag par song ba dang / yang dag par zhugs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// blo gros chen po sha ra dwa ti'i bu la phyag 'tshalo// gnas kyi mchog dga' ldan na 'phags pa byams pa la
59a8(rgyud): sogs pa tshogs dang bcas pa'i mchog la phyag 'tshalo// bde ba can gyi dkyil 'khor na bzhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa 'od dpag tu med la phyag 'tshalo// dkon mchog
59b1(rgyud): gsum la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo// tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / 
59b2(rgyud): dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha'i bu gzugs sna tshogs mnga' ba spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ oM ma hA pad+ma tsan+d+ra ma Ni ma Ni/ a mo g+ha ma Ni su
59b3(rgyud): ma Ni/ ma hA ma Ni/ sarba ta thA ga ta a la kA ra/ ma hA a mo g+ha ma Ni / tsa ra tsa ra sany+tsa ra/ ni sha tsa tsa ra shwa ra ma hA/ pad+ma b+hu dza ba ra da/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ ma hA bi shwa rU pa d+ha ra/ pra
59b4(rgyud): bar ma hA bo d+hi sa to pad+ma d+ha ra pad+ma a san pad+ma ku Ta/ mA lA/ d+ha ra/ pad+ma gau ra/ pad+ma a la kri ta ta nu sa ha sa/ b+hu dza sa ha sra ne tra/ nA nA b+hu ta/ pra ba ra NA/ munga?
59b5(rgyud): b+hU Shi tra sa ha sra b+hu dza/ dza ya dza ya/ sha ta sa ha sra rash+mi pra ti maN+Di ta sha rI ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ bi tsi tra/ A b+ha ra Nad+ha ra/ ma Ni kan ka/ badz+ra bai DUr+ya/ ma ra ki ta/ in dra ni la
59b6(rgyud): pad+ma rA ga b+hU Shi ta sha rI ra/ tsi ri tsir/ bi tsitra/ tsa ra NA/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa pa rang brah+ma/ biSh+Nu ma he shwa ra/ rU pA d+ha ra/ pad+me shwa ra lo ke shwa ra/ a nan+te shwa ra/ ya ma pa ru Na/ ka be ra ri
59b7(rgyud): ga Na ku mA ra/ se nA pa ti be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ma hA da b+hU ta be Sha d+ha ra/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ a bi Sha na k+Sha sa ma ya nu sma ra b+ha ga ban/ pU ra ya ma A tA shAn+ta ra
59b8(rgyud): ya pA ran/ shA ya ya satAM/ ta ra dza ya duShA na bA ta ya big+h+nAn/ mA ra ya tri do sha mA la/ sa ra sa ra/ pA paM/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ sid+h+ya si d+h+ya/ ma hA tsin tA ma Ni/ a mo g+ha pA sha d+ha ra/ 
60a1(rgyud): / sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ bi pu la sid+hi/ ma ma tri b+hu ban de bya pra ya tsA ma hA kA tu Ni ka/ bu d+hu bu d+h+ya/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ saM bo d+ha ya saM bo d+ha ya/ ma hA pa shu pa ti pA shAd+ha ra/ a nan+ta
60a2(rgyud): ba kur bAn/ ri d+hi san+na rA ya/ tu ru tu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ ga ga ne bi pu la bi mA na/ san d+ha ri Shi ka/ na mo stu te bi pu la pu NA ko Sha d+ha ra/ ma hA a mo g+ha sid+he hUM hUM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu mA/ pi pu la
60a3(rgyud): kIr+Ni ka re swA hA/ b+hu ba swA hA/ b+hu ra b+hu ba swA hA/ a mo g+ha bi pu le swA hA/ ma hA tsin tA ma Ni sid+d+hi swA hA/ ma hA tsen tA ma Ni sid+d+hi ba ra de swA hA/ sarba sid+d+hi ba ra de swA hA/ oM bi pu le wa aHma hA tsin+d+ra
60a4(rgyud): ma Ni/ ma hA a mo g+ha sid+d+hi hUM phaT swA hA// don yod nor rang bu'i zhags pa chen po 'ang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas ma thag tu rig sngags 'chang gi lus thams cad 'bar bar
60a5(rgyud): 'gyuraro// don yod pa'i zhags pa lags pas mnan na/ na mkha'i ngos la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchi bar 'gyuraro// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul
60a6(rgyud): chen po ston par 'gyuraro// 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyang tshogs dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas/ byang chub
60a7(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang / gzhal med khang mchog dang bcas pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// bde ba can gyi gnas mtha' dag te
60a8(rgyud): mchod pa'i char gyi sprin chen po 'byung bar 'gyur zhing // de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi mthus mchod pa'i sprin chen por gnas par 'gyur ro// bde ba can na gnas pa de dag
60b1(rgyud): thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med nges rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyu ro// rig sngags 'chang des kyang sgra de dag thams cad thos par 'gyur zhing
60b2(rgyud): mchod pa'i char chen po yang mthong bar 'gyur ro// gal te rig sngags 'chang na mkha' las 'bebs par 'tshal na de'i tshe bsams pa tsam gyis 'bebs par 'gyur ro// 'on te/ 
60b3(rgyud): mi 'tshal nan mkha' de nyid nanam mkha' la grub pa dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi mchog don rgya chen grub pa yid bzhin nor bu lag pa zhes bya ba'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur/ 
60b4(rgyud): dpag tu ma mchis pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rig sdugadas 'chang gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyuraro// che ba skal pa chen po brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis su 'grus
60b5(rgyud): 'on te babs na lo khrir 'tsho bar 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang phyug dang 'dra bar mchod pa dang gus pa cher brgya/ dpar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad kyi gtso
60b6(rgyud): gcig pur 'gyur ro// lha rnams kyang babs nas rig sngags 'chang de la mchod pa'i mchog rgya chen po dag bgyid par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa
60b7(rgyud): bzhin du mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro// mchod pa'i 'os su yang 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyis kyang kun tu srung zhing phyag bgyi ba'i 'os su 'gyuraro// thos pa bsags pa'i rgya
60b8(rgyud): mtsho chen por 'gyuraro// gal te rig sngags 'chang phyogs bcu dus gsum thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba dang bcas pa/ rang
61a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / 
61a2(rgyud): mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa dang bcas pa la mchod pa bgyid par 'tshal ba 'am/ phyogs bcu dus gsum du gtogs pa thams cad kyi de bzhin/ 
61a3(rgyud): gshegs pa rnams la bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongasu rdzogs par 'tshal ba 'am/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'tshal ba 'am/ lha'i zas kyi mchog ro bro'i mchog dang ldan pa'i
61a4(rgyud): bza' ba dang / lha'i bcud kyis len gyi mchog gis de bzhi na gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' dang / rangs ngas rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thad
61a5(rgyud): la bstabs par 'tshal ba'am/ sbyin pa mang po dang // chen po gtong bar 'tshal ba'am/ nyen re zhing mtsho/ da pa'i sprin bgyid par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang des
61a6(rgyud): legs par bkrus te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos nas ci 'byor pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bgyis la bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du
61a7(rgyud): me tog dang / bdug pa yang dbul bar bgyi'o// dbus mo gtsugs te thal mo sbyar nas zhags pa bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la bgyi'o// yid bzhin nor bu
61a8(rgyud): chen po rgya chen don yod 'di yang mchod par bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po lan bdun bzlas par bgyi'o// yid la bgyid pa yangs pa rgya chen po mchod pa'i
61b1(rgyud): sprin chen po dang / sbyin gtong chen po dang / kha zas dang / btung ba dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gos dang / 
61b2(rgyud): rgyan dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan 'phyang dang / rol mo dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdo ba dang / rin po che'i ljon shing dang / 'bras bu'i ljon shing dang / me tog gi ljon shing dang / mar me'i ljon
61b3(rgyud): shing dang / dpag bsams kyi ljon shing yid la bgyi ste/ gsang sngags kyi gzungs bzlas nas ji ltar yid la bsams shing don du gnyer ba bzhin phyogs bcur 'phangs na/ de'i tshe
61b4(rgyud): phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshegs pa dkyil 'khor ma tha' dag tu gtogs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du ma kho ba'i yo byad thams cad ma tshang ba ma mchis par ci bsam
61b5(rgyud): pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi spyan sngar mchod pa'i char gyi sprin chen po/ 'byung bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin du mkho ba'i yo byad thad kyi/ 
61b6(rgyud): mchod pa chen po ma tshang ba ma mchis pa 'byung bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin du mthu chen po'i nor bu rgya chen don yod la mchod pa'o gzungs bzlas shing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
61b7(rgyud): phyug gi snying po'i gzungs 'di yang nyin gcig bzhin du thun gsum du lan gsum du bzlas par bgyi'o// des na rig sngags 'chang gis dus gsum du gshegs pa 'khor gyi dkyil
61b8(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas pa de dag mnyes par bgyis pa dang / mchod pa bgyis pa dang / rim 'gro bgyi bar 'gyuraro// bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshogs chen po dang dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed
62a1(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// dus gsum du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kyi rig sngags 'chang la dran pa dang / blo gros
62a2(rgyud): dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / gzi brjid bstsol bar mdzad do// nyin gcig bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs
62a3(rgyud): pa rnams kyis dgongs par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu rje su 'brang bar 'gyuraro// rtag tu mchog sbyin pa mthong bar 'gyuraro// mthong ba'i chos la 'khor ba'i
62a4(rgyud): sdug bsngal 'jigs pa 'jig su rung ba dang / skrag pa dang nga / sdang ba rnams rnam par zhi bar 'gyu ro// nad kyis kyang gnod par mi 'gyuraro// rims kyis ma lags dug gis ma/ 
62a5(rgyud): lags dug sbyar mas ma lags/ sbyor bas ma lags/ mtshon gyis ma lags/ mes ma lags/ chus ma lags te/ lus la ser ba 'bab par mi 'gyur ro// dgras
62a6(rgyud): 'jigs par mi 'gyur te/ pha rol gyi dpung gi 'jigs pas ma lags/ pha rol gyi sde'i 'jigs pas ma lags/ phas kyi rgol ba dang mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pas ma lags/ lha'i
62a7(rgyud): 'jigs pas ma lags// klu'i 'jigs pas ma lags te/ gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / 
62a8(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma dang / 'dod dgur sbyar ba dang / sbyor ba me'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro// dpag tshad gcig gi nang tshun chad gzung bar mi nus shing rgyang ring por 'bros par 'gyur te/ de la
62b1(rgyud): bgegs bgyid par mi 'gyuraro// gang dag mnar med par gnas pa 'gyur ba'i sems can nam/ mtshams med pa lnga bgyid pa'am/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa'am/ dam pa'i chos
62b2(rgyud): spong ba'am/ bskal pa bye bar bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pas lus yongasu dkris pa gang lags pa de yang mthong ba'i chos la thams cad lhag ma ma lus par yongs su gtugs par
62b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// yongasu grol bar 'gyuraro// gal te tshig gzhan mi smra bar lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyid cing bsrung ba la na cig bgyis te/ bzlas brjod byas na de bskal pa bye ba
62b4(rgyud): brgya stong du 'khor bar skye ba las phyir ldog par 'gyur/ de gzungs kyi bzlas brjod kyis las kyi sgrib pa snga ma rna/ mas kyang 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / bskal pa stong du bsags
62b5(rgyud): pa'i sdig pa rnams nyams par 'gyur// 'khor ba'inyas bas phyir yang gos par mi 'gyur te/ sdig pa dang sgru pa thams cad kyis pad+ma bzhin du gos par mi 'gyur/ 
62b6(rgyud): mthong ba'i chos las lnga pa thob par 'gyuraro// bsten pa tsam mam/ cho ga'i bzlas brjod la nges par gnas na phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas 'thob par 'gyur// dran pa tsam gyis pha rol
62b7(rgyud): tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur// pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i rje su mchi bar 'gyur// nyin cig bzhin du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na mthong ba'i chos la kun tu bzang ba
62b8(rgyud): 'jib par 'gyur// gosang sngags dang tshig zhib mo dang / dkyil la khang deng khrug rgya khams cad kyings su zhugs pa dang / dam chag thams cad la zhugs par 'gyuraro// yang dag par
63a1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang mthong ba tsam gyis mnar med par gnas pa rnams kyi sdig pa rnam par 'jigs par 'gyuraro// chung ngu ni rig sngags
63a2(rgyud): 'chang ngur khrod du zhugs nas gum pa'i rus pa'am/ gum pa'i sha 'am/ gum pa'i ro rul pa'am/ chung ngu na gum pa'i gos bor ba 'am/ rtsig pa'i ri mo la rig sngags 'chang de'i grib mas
63a3(rgyud): phog par gyur na sems can gang dang gang gis dmyal bar gzhol bar gyur pa de dang de nas mod la thar nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ de la yid gnyis sam som
63a4(rgyud): nyi bskyed par mi bgyi na/ gang dag ches mang du lhag par 'gyur pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal gang rigs kyi bu po 'am// rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ba 'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ 
63a5(rgyud): dge bsnyen pa'am/ dge bsnyen ma dad pa'i rjesu 'brang ba/ 'ga' zhig gzungs 'di 'chang bar bgyid/ brjod/ par bgyid/ klog par bgyid/ 'don par bgyid/ sems
63a6(rgyud): par bgyid/ sgom par bgyid/ mchod par bgyid/ 'drir bar bgyid/ 'drir 'jug par bgyid na de nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyuraro// / 
63a7(rgyud): mthong ba'i chos la yon tan chen po brgya stong mang po 'thob par 'gyuraro// 'di nyid bcings na mthong ba'i chos la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang rje su
63a8(rgyud): 'thun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// gzungs 'di nyid re shig kun chub par bgyis nas/ mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur na dgos pa mang pos grims
63b1(rgyud): bar bgying ba lnga smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de nas rig sngags 'chang don yod yang bzhin nor bu'i zhags pa sgrubs nas yid la bsams te/ bsams pa'i las thams cad bgyis na tha/ 
63b2(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyuraro// dgos pa dang bgyi ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyuraro// ji ltar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin mngon sum du mthong nas lung bstan pa bzhin du
63b3(rgyud): don yod pa'i yid bzhin nor bu'i zhags pa 'di de bzhin du blta bar bgyi ste/ 'di la yid gnyis mi bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pa mgrin par btags la lag pa
63b4(rgyud): g.yas pas nor bu blangs te/ lag pa g.yon pas lcag/ sa kyu blangs na mi gda' bar gyur nas gar dga' bde dar 'jug par 'gyur te/ mtshan mo yang nor bu'i 'od kyi snad
63b5(rgyud): bas nyin par ji lta ba bzhin du 'gyur ro// thams cad du lha'i gan su 'jug pa dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lA ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci'i/ 
63b6(rgyud): gnas dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas dang / ri sul gyi phug dang / ri dang nags tshal dang / zang gi sgo rnams 'bye bar 'gyur zhing / thams cad du mi mngon par zhugs nas slar ldog
63b7(rgyud): par 'gyur zhing ci 'chal ba de bgyid par 'gyuraro// mi rnams kyi nang du lha'i tshe lo brgyar 'tsho bar 'gyuraro// nyon mongs pa dang // nye ba'i skyon thams cad spangs par 'gyur// 'on te rig sngag
63b8(rgyud): 'chang gis grub pa'i don la brtag par 'tshal na zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyang dam bcu bzhi la legs par khrus bgyi'o// gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// gtsang ma'i gnas
64a1(rgyud): sam phyogasu pa'i lci ba ste ba'i rnam lngas yongasu sbyar bar bgyi'o// gnas de'i nang logs kyi dbus su dri'i dkyil 'khor bgyi'o// me tog sil ma bkram zhing bum pa gang pa
64a2(rgyud): rgyan cing spos sna tshogs kyis bgos pa'i gdug pa bzhag par bgyi'o// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du stan bzang po bshams te shin tu mnyam par gzhag
64a3(rgyud): pas zhags pa sbrul 'khyil ba'i tshul du zlum po bskyil nas bzhag par bgyi'o// dbus nor bu bzhag par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gi mchod par bgyi'o// don yod rgyal po'i snying
64a4(rgyud): po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas khro bo'i rgyal dpo lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas do ngan yid bzhin nor bu'i snying po lan rgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas de'i
64a5(rgyud): 'og tu tsan dan dang / a ga ru dang / du ru ka'i bdug pa da bul zhing nor bu la brtag par bgyi ste zhags pa dang / de thams cad nor bu'i nang nas gda' bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin
64a6(rgyud): gshegs pa gda' ba 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' gda' ba'am/ lha gda' ba 'am/ klu gda' ba 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding dang / 
64a7(rgyud): mi 'am ci gda' ba 'am/ 'byung po dang / lto 'phye chen po gda' ba 'am/ g.yul 'gyed pa gda' ba'am/ tshe ring ba gda' ba'am/ tshe nyams pa dga' ba chu 'phos pa gda' ba'// 
64a8(rgyud): rgyal srid gda' ba 'am/ grong 'thob pa 'am/ yul 'thob pa 'am/ grong khyer thob pa 'am/ dbyig dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / shang ka shi la dang / byi
64b1(rgyud): ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul dang / gos dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan gda' ba 'am/ nor rgyur ba smra ba'am/ mig 'phrul smra ba 'am/ zhing smra ba 'am/ gter smra ba 'am/ 'bru smra ba 'am/ 
64b2(rgyud): bud med 'phrog pa 'am/ las sgrub pa 'am/ gsang sngags 'grub pa 'am/ dbang du bgyi ba 'am/ ngo mtshar ba de dag thams cad nor bu'i nang na gda' bar 'gyur zhing dge ba 'am mi
64b3(rgyud): dge ba de dag thams cad kyang gda' bar 'gyuraro// lo 'am/ lo phyed ngam/ gnod pa'am/ 'che ba 'am/ yams sam/ mings sam/ mi ngas chen po'am/ phyugs ngas sam/ 
64b4(rgyud): gor ram/ rta nang ngam/ glang po che'i nad dam/ rang ging dpung ngam/ gzhan gyi dpung gi 'jigs pa dang / skrag dpa chen po de dag thams cad me long gi dkyil 'khor la
64b5(rgyud): ji lta ba de bzhin du gda' bar 'gyur lags so// gang bas mas shing gang gnyer ba 'grub pa'am/ mi 'grub pa 'am/ dge ba'am/ mi dge ba thams cad gda' bar 'grur
64b6(rgyud): te/ de la the tshom dang / yid gnyis dang / som nyi mi bgyi ste/ dngos po don yod gzhan du mi 'gyu ro// char mi 'bab pa'i dus su klu'i gnas nor bu bzhag na ci tsam 'tshal bar char gyi rgyun
64b7(rgyud): 'bab par 'gyuro// ha cang char ches nan mkha' la nor bu bstan na char chen po 'chang par 'gyuraro// nyi ma 'char kar nyi ma la bstan na nyi ma babs nas mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyuraro// 
64b8(rgyud): zla ba ches pa la bstan na zlab babs nas 'dod dgur thams cad kyi mchog stsol bar bgyid do// chu klung chen por bstan na rin po che rnams 'byung bar 'gyuraro// nags khung du bstan na sman gyi
65a1(rgyud): rdzas thams cad rang gi gzugs kyi mdun na mchis nas gang gnyer ba de len par 'gyur ro// ri phug tu bstan na sman thams cad 'bab par 'gyur te/ ci 'tshal ba de blangs
65a2(rgyud): par bgyi'o// 'bru'i phung po la bstan na 'bru thams cad 'du bar 'gyur te/ gang du 'tshal ba der 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ma mo'i gnas sam nag po chen po la bstan te/ spyi bo'i gtsug tu
65a3(rgyud): bzhag na nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs kyis 'khor dang bcas pa rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas dbang du 'gyur zhing dgos pa dang las thams cad bgyid par 'gyuraro// rgyal po'i
65a4(rgyud): mngon sum du bstan na yan lag bzhi'i dpung dang bcas pa / blon po'i tshogs dang bcas pa/ btsun me'i 'khor du dang bcas pa/ dbyig dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu
65a5(rgyud): tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / shang ka shi la dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lbub dang / rgyan 'chang dang / khang pa dang / ngo mtshar du
65a6(rgyud): bcas pa dbang du gyur nas ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyuraro// skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i nang du zhags pa 'phangs te/ don yod pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gzungs bzlas na
65a7(rgyud): ji ltar 'tshal ba yid la bsams pa bzhin me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / gzhal med khang gi char 'bab par 'gyur ro// rgyal mtshan sgreng ba'i rtse mor bzhag ste/ rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang
65a8(rgyud): bskur ba khyim gyi steng ngam khyamasu gzhag la/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyi bsnyen gnas kyis sems can thams cad la mchog tu brtse bar bgyi'o// don yod rgyal po'i snying po
65b1(rgyud): lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bgyi'o// de nas don yod yid bzhin nor bu'i gzungs lan brgya rtsa brgyad gsang bstod de bzlas brjod
65b2(rgyud): bgyi'o// lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang nas ji ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin du char 'bab par 'gyuro// nor bu dang / 'bru dang / gos dang / lhab lhub la sogs pa me tog dang / 'bras bu'i cha
65b3(rgyud): 'bab par 'gyuro// 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / mu ge'i dgon pa'i 'jigs pa dang / yams dang / gnod pa de dag thams cad 'phags pa spyan ras
65b4(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gi mthus pas par 'gyur/ thamasacang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad la/ mi 'jigs pa stsol bar 'gyuraro// 'jigs pa dang sha
65b5(rgyud): kho na thams cad las thar par 'gyuraro// gdug pa nas ga/ can zan khro bo thams cad kyi bar du yang byams pa la ga nas par 'gyu ro// sems can thang 'thun par 'gyid par 'gyur/ 
65b6(rgyud): yid kyi brnag pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// don yod yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i zhags pa chen po sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang ral gri dang zhags pa sgrub par 'chal
65b7(rgyud): na rig sngags 'chang gis lcags chen po las ral gri sor bcu drug gi tshad du bgyis la/ lagazungs kyi ngos dngul las bgyis te/ gser gyis 'bar bar bri'o// shing shun gyi skud
65b8(rgyud): pa dang / arga'i skud pa dang / kha che dar gyi skud pa lhan cig tu khru bcu drug byung ba shin tu tshang la bab par bkum pa/ sgrub pa 'di gos pa yongasu rdzogs pa la sum sgril du bkal bar bgyi'o// 
66a1(rgyud): de nas rig sngags 'chang gis legs par khrus bgyis te gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ zhags pa dang ral gri mnan la lag pa g.yas pas dkyil 'khon
66a2(rgyud): la bzhag ste bzung bar bgyi'o// khros pa'i khro gnyer gyi bzhin gyis skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri me'i gzugs kyi mdun du khro bo'i rgyal
66a3(rgyud): bo lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par bgyi'o// bzlas brjod lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang nas ral gri 'bar bar gyur nas/ rig sngags 'chang na mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur zhing / ral gri grub pa'i rig
66a4(rgyud): sngags 'chang thams cad kyi gtso bo 'khor los bsgyur bar ra'agyur ro// gzhan gyi mthus zil gyis non par mi 'gyur// / lo khri brgya stong du 'tsho bar 'gyuraro// 'on te lag pa g.yon
66a5(rgyud): pas zhags pa bzung la g.yas pas ral gri bzung ste/ khro/ sa pas hUM zhes bgyi bas mnan na mi gda' bar gyur na sa/ mi gda' ba dang / zhags pa dang / ral gri grub pa'i
66a6(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi gtso bo rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyuraro// tshe lo khri thub par 'gyuraro// 'on te rig sngags 'chang khros pas ral gri bskor na bgegs dang / log
66a7(rgyud): 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po gdugs pa thams cad dang / 'byung po thams cad kyi rig sngags bcad par 'gyuraro// g.yul gyi dbus su lan cig bskor na g.yul 'gyed pa'i mtshon cha
66a8(rgyud): thams cad btubs par 'gyur/ rengs par bgyis par 'gyur te/ thams cad phyogs bcur 'byer bar 'gyuro// dur khrod kyi nang du bskor na dur khrod na gnas pa'i gdug pa rgyu ba thams cad kyi
66b1(rgyud): rig sngags btubs par 'gyur zhing gnas thams cad songs par 'gyuraro// phug gi sgor bskor na 'khrul 'khor dang / sgo glegs thams cad btubs par 'gyuro// gtan pa thams cad btub/ 
66b2(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// gdug pa'i mi ma yin pa bar chad bgyid pa thams cad bcom par 'gyuraro// thal bar brlag par 'gyur// gzhan yang dgos pa thams cad du ji ltar 'chal ba bzhin du bgyid
66b3(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// ral gri sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang sbrul gyi zhags pa sgrub par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang des skud pa lnga las bsgrub ste/ tshon rtsis kha bsgyur ba'i skud pa tshang
66b4(rgyud): bzhin du btubs la/ sgrub par shin tu 'os pa las sgrubadapar bgyi'o// de nas zas bzang po'i phye ma dang / ma d+hu'i me tog dang / ra sa'i me tog dang / ldong ros dang / pad+ma ge/ 
66b5(rgyud): sar dang / nag pus pa dang / shing arga'i 'o ma lha na cig tu sbyar ba der btsag bsal te/ dus gcig tu lhan cig mnyam du btags shing / spyi bor legs par
66b6(rgyud): sbrus te/ de la don yong rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas sbrul 'khyil ba mgo gsum gyi gdengs ka nas yongs su 'khyil ba gser gyis g.yogs pa/ legs par
66b7(rgyud): spel ba ni zhags pa'i mchog lags so// rig sngags 'chang gi legs par khrus bgyis la/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos nas pa'i lci ba'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi tshang bzhin bgyis
66b8(rgyud): te dris mchod par bgyi'o// me tog gi sil ma dang bum pa gang bas rgyan par bgyi'o// ba dan gyis kun nas rgyan par bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi gnasu stan bzang po bshams te/ de'i
67a1(rgyud): steng du klu'i zhags pa stsal nas zhags par bgyi'o// sbrul gyi mgo'i gdengs ka dbus ma ni kha shar phyogasu ston no// dkar gsum gyis gtor ma bzhag par bgyi'o// ma
67a2(rgyud): yon zhags bsil dkar po'i snod dang / bdug pa rnam pa gsum po tsan dan dang / a ga ru dang / du ru ka rnams sreg go// 'bras yos dang / yungs kar bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor bgyis la 'phags
67a3(rgyud): ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du bzhag la mchod pa rgya chen po bgyis te/ rig sngags 'chang gis skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas bzlas brjod mang du bgyi'o// thog mar don yod
67a4(rgyud): zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas tshang ba dang khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i dayungs kar re re nas sbrul gyi mgo la gtor bar bgyi'o// sgrub
67a5(rgyud): bzang tshang nas ni// rgyun tu sbrul ni 'bar bar 'gyur// stan las zhags pa g.yo ba ni// sor bzhi tsam gyi tshad cu ma du// stan las gyen du 'phar bar 'gyur// de nas rig sngags
67a6(rgyud): 'chang gis bzung nas mi gda' bar gyur nas klu'i gnas su mchis te/ klu'i mtsher mchis na klu'i gnas kyi sgo rnams 'bye bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gis zhugs te don yod rgyal po bzlas
67a7(rgyud): nas sbrul gyi zhags pa lan gsum tu bskor bar bgyi'o// de nas klu'i rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa mchis nas rig sngags 'chang la mngon sum du smra bas rig sngags 'chang zhugs
67a8(rgyud): shig ces smra bar 'gyuraro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis sbrul gyis zhags pa bzung ste bskor nas 'jug par bgyi'o// des na rig sngags 'chang gis klu'i skyon de mi mthong zhing nub par 'gyur ro// 
67b1(rgyud): 'khrul 'khor dang / sgro glegs dang / gtan pa thams cad btubs shing bcag par 'gyuraro// zhugs pa tsam gyi mong la klu'i bu mo gzugs bzang mo mdzes ma/ rgyan thams cad kyi klubs ma/ 
67b2(rgyud): mdzes ma mchis nas rin po che'i phreng ba thogs te/ rig sngags 'chang la dbul bar bgyid do// rig sngags 'chang gis blangs nas spyi bo la bzhags ste/ bzhag pa tsam gyi mod la klu'i
67b3(rgyud): bu mo na mkha' la 'phur nas nu ma gnyis nas 'o ma zags pa dang / rig sngags 'chang gis zed nas btung bar bgyis ste/ tshe nyi khri thub par 'gyur// skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro// 
67b4(rgyud): klu'i rgyal po zhes bgyi ba thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyuraro// mthu dang / brtson 'grus chen dpos pha rol gnon par 'gyuraro// de nas rig sngags 'chang
67b5(rgyud): gis sbrul gyi zhags pa bzhag la don yod rgyal po'i sna nga po shing ka ra bi ra'i lcug ma la bzlas nas bya ba par bgyi ste/ gang dang gang gi ming nas drangs shing yid la bsams
67b6(rgyud): bas ming du thams cad 'grub par 'gyuraro// char mi 'bab pa'i dus su sbrul gyi zhags pa gnas mthon por bskor bar bgyi ste/ lan cig bskor ba tsam gyis char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab
67b7(rgyud): bo char ha cang che ba'i dus su sbrul gyi zhags pa gnas mthon por bzhag na char ha cang che ba las 'chad par 'gyuraro// grang ba'i rlung ngam ser ba 'bab pa'i dus su nang par sngar klu'i
67b8(rgyud): zhags pa phyogs bzhir bskor na dpag tshad brgya kho ra khor yug tu ser ba 'bab par mi 'gyur te/ grang ba'i rlung dang / ser drag thams cad bcings par 'gyuraro// lo khyung 'khor tshang bar
68a1(rgyud): mtshams chen po bcings par 'gyuraro// nyin cig bzhin don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas zhags pa lag pa g.yas pas bsdogs
68a2(rgyud): la/ lag pa g.yon pas bskrad pa bgyis na nyin cig bzhin lha'i zhal zas dang / btung ba 'dod dgu thams cad klu'i gnas nas byung nas skye bo stong stong 'tshal ma stsol bar 'gyuraro// de'i dug
68a3(rgyud): thams cad mthong ba tsam gyis dug ma lags par 'gyuraro// sbrul gyi zhags pa lag pa g.yas pas bzung la lag pa g.yon pas klu bzung nas/ dpyid ngam/ ston ka'am/ sprin chags
68a4(rgyud): pa'i dus su zhags pa bskor la khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas brjod pa dgyis te/ na mkha' la 'phangs na me tog dang / 'bras bu da dang / lo tog gang yang rung ba bzang po shin tu smin pa dang / 
68a5(rgyud): kha zas shin tu bzang po thams cad na mkha'i ngos las sa la' bab par 'gyuraro// gal te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bskor la khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyis na klu'i gzhal med
68a6(rgyud): khang dang / gos dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan 'phyang dang / rgyan thams cad sa la 'bab par 'gyuraro// gal te rig sngags 'chang gis lan nyi shu rtsa gcig las lhag par bskor cing khro bo'i rgyal
68a7(rgyud): po bzlas brjod bgyid na/ de'i tshe klu 'khor dang bcas pa gzhal med khang dang bcas par sa'i steng du lhung bar 'gyuraro// gal te rig sngags 'chang gis rgyal po btsun me'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang
68a8(rgyud): du bgyi bar 'tshal na zhags pa gzhag la yungs kar la don yod rgyal po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas bsnun la/ de nas sbrul gyi zhags pa blangs te rgyal po'i khyim gyi phyogs gang la lags
68b1(rgyud): bder lhag par zhags pa bskor na/ rgyal po'i btsun mo'o 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyu ro// g.yul 'gyed pa na khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyis
68b2(rgyud): nas zhags pa g.yul gyi dbus su 'phangs na sbrul gdug pa mig dgrad pa/ lce sgrub/ mig me mngag ltar dmar ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ mthong ba tsam gyi mod la dpung gi tshogs yan lag
68b3(rgyud): bzhi pa phyogs bcur 'byer bar 'gyuraro// gzhan yang ji lta ji ltar yid la bsams pa'i don de lta bur thams cad sgrub par byed par 'gyuraro// sbrul gyi zhags pa'i sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// de nas
68b4(rgyud): 'byung po'i dbang phyug gi zhags pa sgrub par 'tshal na 'bri'i rtsid pa dang / rtsing ba chen po lhan cig tu bkal ba dang / lcags las mdung rtsa gsum pa sor bzhi'i tshad tsam du bgyis la/ de/ 
68b5(rgyud): nas don yong rgyal po'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod// bgyis nas khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ nyin zhag gcig mchis la legs par khrus bgyi ste
68b6(rgyud): gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// zla ba mar gyi ngo'i tshe sa bcu bzhi'i nyin zhag cig gis sgrub par bgyi'o// de nas mdung rtse gsum pa'i zhags pa blangs na 'byung po'i dbang phyug gi
68b7(rgyud): gzugs 'dra bar 'gyuraro// 'byung po thams cad kyi bdag po lo brgya stong du 'tsho bar 'gyuraro// 'byung po'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyuraro// zhags pa lag par thogs na
68b8(rgyud): dur khrod du zhugs na dur khrod na gnas pa thams cad mdun du mchis te/ gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'bye bar 'gyur zhing khyod ci dgar zhugs shig ces ci 'tshal ba bgyid par 'gyuraro// ro'i mgul du
69a1(rgyud): btags nas khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas na/ de nas ro langs nas ci dris pa de smra bar 'gyur zhing ci bsgo bde bgyid par 'gyuraro// bkrol na mchi bar 'gyuraro// gnod sbyin gyi mgul du
69a2(rgyud): btags te/ khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas la khros pas drangs nas gnod sbyin de yang mdun du mchis nas rig sngags 'chang la rje btsun bka' stsol cig dang / thams cad bgyi'o zhes smra bar 'gyur
69a3(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gis khyod ji srid 'tsho'i bar du khro bo'i rgyal po mngag gzhug pa'i las gyis shig ces smra bar bgyi ste/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes de nas nyin cig bzhin bsgo ba bgyis na/ 
69a4(rgyud): las thams cad bgyid par 'gyuraro// gnod sbyin mo'i mgul nga du btags te khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas na/ gnod sbyin mo ma chis nas rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis te/ rig
69a5(rgyud): sngags 'chang la mig mi 'dzums par lta zhing rig sngags 'chang ci zhig don du gnyer zhes smra bar 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang gis kho bo la ma dang / chung ma dang / sring
69a6(rgyud): mos bsgrub par bya ba'i dgos pa gsum byos shig ces bsgo bar bgyi'o// gal te ma zhig tu bgyid na bu gcig pa bzhin du bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal cha dang / gos dang / nor dang / 
69a7(rgyud): 'bras yongasu skyong bar bgyid do// chung ma zhig tu bgyid na/ mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad kyi dbang phyug dang bdag por bgyid cing / de dang lhag par dga' bar brtse bas phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyu
69a8(rgyud): gal te sring mo zhig tu bgyid na yid la brnag pa'i 'dod pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bgyid do// dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyuraro// thams cad rgyug cing slar yang ldog par
69b1(rgyud): 'gyu ro/ nyin gcig bzhin lhab lhub dang / gos dang / rgyan rnams stsol bar bgyid do// nyin gcig bzhin gzhan yang lha'i bu mo dag rtsed mo'i don du dgug par bgyid do// rnam thos kyi mgul tu btags
69b2(rgyud): te khros pas drangs nas khro bo'i rgyal po'i bzlas brjod bgyis na/ de nas rnam thos mchis nas nyin cig bzhin dong rtse stong stsol bar 'gyur/ gser stong stsol bar 'gyur te/ des nyin gcig
69b3(rgyud): bzhin sbyin pa yang stsal/ bsod nams kyang bgyi'o// nag po chen po'i mgul du btags la khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te/ khros pas lag pa g.yas pa'i thal lcags/ 
69b4(rgyud): gis bdeg par bgyi'o// nag po chen pos sgra phyung ba na rig snga gas 'chang skrag par mi bgyid par slar yang khros pas pa reg par bgyi'o// de nas mchi ma zags pa dang / rig
69b5(rgyud): sngags 'chang gis mchi ma bzed de/ thig le bgyis na mi gang/ 'bar gyur nas gter thams cad mthong bar 'gyuraro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yang thal mos/ bdeg par
69b6(rgyud): bgyi ste/ de nas nag po chen po khrag tu skyug pa rig sngags 'chang gis blugs na na mkha' la mchis nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen por 'gyuraro// gu gul gyi bdug pas bdugs nas khro bo'i rgyal
69b7(rgyud): bo bzlas na nag po chen po rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas ci 'tshal ba'i mchog thams cad stsol bar bgyid cing ma mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du mchis par 'gyuraro// 
69b8(rgyud): gzhan yang ci 'tshal ba bgyid pas dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyuraro// mdung rtse gsum pa'i zhags pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// / de nas zhags pa dang rjesu mthun pa'i ri me
70a1(rgyud): cho ga de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i cho ga bla na med pa brjod par bgyi ste/ 'jig rten mgon pos sna tshogs pa'i// rnam pa'i kha dog gzugs bstan pa// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyi// cho 'phrul
70a2(rgyud): sna tshogs gzugs bstan te// lag pa stong dang mig stong dang // mtha' yas pa yi phyag rgya bstan// rnam pa sna tshogs pa yi gzugs// khams gsum dag tu bstan pa ni// gdul bya gdul phyir
70a3(rgyud): gzugs bstan to// gsang ba 'di yis gzugs bstan pa// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// rig sngags grub pa bla med pa// de nyid zhags pa sgrub phyiraro// de bas rig 'dzin shes rab can/ 
70a4(rgyud): 'jig rten pha rol rjes 'thun pa// sangs rgyas nyid don gnyer ba dang // de bzhin gshegs kun lta ba dang // bde can lta bar 'tshal ba dang // de nyid 'jig rten 'das pa yis// 'jig
70a5(rgyud): dbang mgon po mthong 'tshal la// mchog tu gus pas bgyi ba yi// cho ga'i rgyal po 'di brjod kyis// de nyid gus par/ dad pa dang // shin tu dang ba nyid du bgyi// grol ba sna tshogs
70a6(rgyud): 'tshal ba la// sna tshogs pa yi gzugs bsten te// sna tshogs thabs kyis grol bar 'gyur// don yod rgyal po cho ga'i mchog/ don yod grub pa'i 'jig rten 'das// don yod 'bras bu dam pa po// 
70a7(rgyud): don yod kun tu grub pa 'thob// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs// don yod 'jig rten 'jig rten mgon// 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa// don yod 'jig rten ci 'tshal ba// mchod
70a8(rgyud): 'tshal ba ni grub par 'gyur// don yod rgya chen rdzu 'phrul gyi// cho 'phrul rnam 'phrul rgyun mi 'chad// de lta bas na kun bsgrims te// bdag nyid yongs su dag bgyis nas// ji ltar cho ga bkod/ 
70b1(rgyud): pa bzhin// rjesu 'thun par ri mo'i gzugs// rtag tu ri mo'i gzugs blta zhing // zhags pa'i gzugs ni sna tshogs dang // de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po dang // rig sngags rgyal po de bzhin du// 
70b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor lha dang me lha dang // sbyin sreg rlung lha chu lha dang // khro bo'i gzugs dang zhi ba dang // lha dang klu yang ston pa dang // gnod sbyin srin po'i gzugs dang ni// 'byung po lha min dri za dang / 
70b3(rgyud): nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci// lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs kun tu// 'jig rten mgon pos mchog sbyin bstan// gshin rje dang ni lus ngan dang // tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// gzhon nu
70b4(rgyud): dbang phyug lnga dang ni// dbang phyug chen po nyi ma dang / zla gzugs nga rgyu skar tshes grangs dang // 'di dag rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i // gzugasu 'jig rten mgon pos brtan// sems
70b5(rgyud): can rnams la phan 'tshal bas// gdul ba'i don du 'gro ba'i lam// sems can rnams la bstan pas na// de bas som nyi nyid mi bgyi// mchog tu dang par bgyi ba lags
70b6(rgyud): ji ltar 'thun pa'i dgos pa rnams// ji ltar 'thun pa bzhin du sgrub// ji ltar 'thun pa'i ri mo'i gzugs// ji ltar 'thun pa'i zhags pa sgrub// gnas ni gang du 'os pa dang // gang du sems
70b7(rgyud): ni dga' 'gyur ba// goms pa gang gis phyag rgya dang // gang gi dkyil 'khor char 'bye ba// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang mgon// kun tu sgrol ba 'dren pa'i gtso// don yod 'bras
70b8(rgyud): bu stsol ba po// don yod pa yi grub pa 'thob// don yod dgos pa thams cad dang // thub pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo ni// mchog nyid la yang reg par 'gyur// zhags pa dang ri mo sgrub pa'i tshe/ 
71a1(rgyud): ga'o de nas don yod pa'i las dang dgos pa thams cad kyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga bshad par bgyi ste/ sdig pa thams cad mod la 'phrog pa// sgrib pa thams cad 'jig
71a2(rgyud): par bgyid pa// dgra thams cad 'joms pa// bgegs thams cad rnam par 'joms pa// gdug pa thams cad bzlog pa'i mchog/ sdig pa thams cad 'jig par 'gying pa// dmyal
71a3(rgyud): ba'i sdug bsngal bcu drug las grol bar bgyid pa/ 'jigs pa mi bzad pa brgyad rtag tu 'phrog pa/ mi mdza' ba rnams rab tu 'joms pa/ pha rol gyi dpung bzlog pa'i mchog
71a4(rgyud): nad thams cad 'joms pa mod la 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa zhi bar bgyid pa/ mu ge'i dgon pa 'jig par bgyid pa/ yams kyi nang dang
71a5(rgyud): gnod pa 'joms pa// lha'i bde ba 'dren par bgyid pa 'a mchog de kho na nyid kyi sangs rgyas sgrub pa/ sangs/ rgyas kyi byang chub bla na med pa'i mchog thams cad sgrub pa
71a6(rgyud): bgyid pa/ sems can thams cad kyi thun mong mchog sbyin shin tu rnyed par dka' ba/ lha rnams rtag tu mgu bar 'gyur ba// klu thams cad dga' ba 'thob 'gyur ba// de bzhin
71a7(rgyud): gshegs pa rnams rtag tu nyin mtshan du gzigs par som nyi ma mchis pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dga' bar 'gyur ba// dus kun tu shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas 'jig
71a8(rgyud): rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin rtag tu mchis par som nyi ma mchis pa/ rgyal po chen po bon 'khor dang bcas/ blon po dang bcas bsrung ba'i don du thams cad du rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur/ 
71b1(rgyud): lags so// de nas rig sngags 'chang shes rab dang ldan pas gtsang ma'i gnas su mchis nas sbyin sreg bgyis te/ gtsang ma yi ni sa phyogs sam// ca co ma mchis dben par ni// 
71b2(rgyud): zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang // drag shul spyod pa rnams bgyi'o// zhi ba sems can thams cad kyi// don du sdig pa thams cad 'joms// rgyas pa rgyas pa 'thob 'gyur te// thams cad
71b3(rgyud): phun sum tshogs par 'gyur// dgra dang log 'dren gdug pa dang // gnod sbyin srin po gsang ba pa// gdug sems can rnams dred pa dang // skrag par bsdigs pa drag shul spyod/ 
71b4(rgyud): gsang sngags sgrub pa'i sbyin sreg ste// gsang sngags sgrub pa'i bla na med// 'jig rten 'jig rten pha rol gyi// sbyin sreg gi ni las bgyi'o// me lha'i lha dang klu dag dang // 
71b5(rgyud): de bzhin rigs pa 'dzin pa'ang dgug/ khung brkos de la pad+ma'i tshul// pad+ma rtag tu bri bar bgyi// cho ga jib/ zhin khung nang gi/ pad+ma la ni ge sar bgyi// gru bzhi 'am
71b6(rgyud): ni zlum po ste// de lta bur ni brko bar bgyi// legs par byugs shing shin tu gnag/ shin tu sbas shing tshad la dbab tshes grangs rgyu skar nyid dag dang // shin tu bkra shis dag la bgyi// 
71b7(rgyud): bkra shis phyag rgya chen po dang // bzang pos gtor ma'i las bgyi'o// bdug pa me tog la sogs pa// bzang po dag ni 'khor bar dgod// thog mar me lha bkug nas ni// de nas
71b8(rgyud): sbyin sreg las rnams bgyi// rig sngags 'chang ba gtsang gyur pa// legs bkrus gtsang ma'i gos bgos nas// gsang sngags bzlas pa'i cho ga bgyi// de la 'tshams kyang bcing bar bgyi
72a1(rgyud): bdag srung gtsug tor bcing ba dang // gzhan srung dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang // de bzhin grogs bgyid srung ba dang // rgyun tu a ka'i shing sbar te// dri yi shing rnams nyid dag
72a2(rgyud): dang \u0f7fmar dang yungs kar 'bras yos dag/ nyi shu gcig dbul me tog bgyi// de nas me yi lha dgug go// oM na mo a g+ni dz+wa la ma hA dzA la/ dz+yed sna pra b+hA/ maN+Da la/ sar+b+ba bid A hA ti/ pra hU
72a3(rgyud): ti rak+Shi ni rata tuSh+Ta dz+wa la/ d+hu ma shwa sa/ a tsiSh+pa mu kha tIk+Sh+Na/ rash+mi pa a g+ni shu bi tu taSh+Ta hU ta sha na mu khan te/ sar+b+ba de bAn+da/ sar+b+ba yak+Sha ma hA bir+ya ma hA dza ya/ ma hA bA la ni ra ma ri shan/ 
72a4(rgyud): sar+b+ba daha na pra pu la A kar sha sa mu gad ka shru a ba pra saM kA/ da shan/ maN+Da la pU dzi to/ ma ni ta sar+b+ba tra di bya rU pa/ bi ShA ra da A bA hA na sar+b+ba tra gAn/ de ba hU ta/ shan du tra/ 
72a5(rgyud): shan ta ma si bi d+ha ma kan/ an d+ha kA rAn/ muk+Sha ra shrI ma pra yaM kugan d+ha pha lA ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ a gra dza/ sU k+Sh+mA su tIk+ShA shu mri ti san dzi bi na/ pri ye bash+ma puSh+pa basma bas+t+ra
72a6(rgyud): tsa ba s+tha bstA ni/ se ba kama?/ ba sma sany+tsa d+ha ni t+yan d+hu ma mA ku la/ dza ya se/ ba ka sid+d+ha ra sa d+ha ra sa grA tsa ra sarba tra pra d+ha ba ri shA/ sarba tri ni ra ma ri sha No// ni t+ya s+thiSh+Ta d+haSh+Ta na mun tsa si dA
72a7(rgyud): tra sha/ b+ha ba no ba ag+ni/ mu kha de bA ta/ a ru tsi ru dzA ba la ba da ka ma hA na ta/ a tha pa ra No/ de bde ba na/ bi shA rang / a yAn tu sA d+ha ya tad tra ta/ oM dz+wA la dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sa ma yan/ !/ 
72a8(rgyud): ru hu ru hUM phaT swA hA// gsang sngags 'dis ni lan bdun du// bzlas nas me ni dgug par bgyi// gu gul yungs kar mar sbyar ba// spar bdun spar bas me la dbul// mchod yon snod/ 
72b1(rgyud): rnams dbul ba yang // de bzhin spar ba'i spar bas so// dri rnams dang ni drug pa dang // bdug pa rgya chen dbul bar bgyi// de bzhin 'bras bu sbar bar dbul// de nas chab kyis gsang ba brgya/ 
72b2(rgyud): ji ltang lnga rnams rim bzhin du// nye rag dag kyang dngul bar bgyi// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis su// sbyin bsreg las ni yang dag brtsam// dri nam shin tu dag pa dang // brag sha u dum par
72b3(rgyud): dang sna ma'i me tog tsam pa dang // kar ni ka ra nyid dag dang // pad+ma ud pa la thang shing dang // de bzhin dri bda'i tsan dan dang // byang chub ljon shing shing dag dang // 'on te 'bras bu'i shing mang
72b4(rgyud): dang / sha mi shi ba'i las lags pas// mchod yon de bzhi dan rtsa dag ste// de dag gis ni me sbar nas// sbyin sreg dgi ni las bgyi'o// 'bras yos tsan dan phye ma dang // a garba
72b5(rgyud): dang du ru swa// kun tu ru la sogs pa dang // du ru skar bcas sgra ka dang // spang spos pri yang gu blangs te// de dag ldan rtsa ga sbyar bsres shing // mar ram mar sar lan cig brdzi/ 
72b6(rgyud): don yong rgyal po'i gsang sngags ni// brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas me la dbul// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du lan stong rtsa brgyad kyi sbyin sreg bgyi'o// lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang
72b7(rgyud): nam byed na me lha rang gi gzugs 'bar bar shin tu gnas pa langs nas phyogs bcur lta zhing kun tu brtags nas rig sngags 'chang la leg so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang
72b8(rgyud): leg so leg so// bdag tshim par byas pas rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis sbyin sreg gi cho ga grub kyis mchog spongs shig dang thams cad sbyin no// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji lta bu'i 'dod
73a1(rgyud): pa'i mchog rnams blangs par bgyi ste/ ji ltar bslangs pa bzhin thams cad stsol bar bgyid do// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mchod yon gyi snod dag dbul ba'i
73a2(rgyud): las bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mar dang bsres pa'i gong bu chen po dag gis sbyin sreg bgyi zhing 'bras bu'i shing la sbar nas don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad
73a3(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyi'o// stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / thab kyi dbus nas skyes pa zhig lus phyed tsam phyung nas dngul gyi gzhong pa kha zas kyis bkang ste/ dbus mo nub tsam du dbul bar bgyi// 
73a4(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gis blang bar bgyi ste/ blangs pa tsam gyis na mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur zhing rig sngags 'a dachang gis lus la me 'bar ba'i 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyuraro// 
73a5(rgyud): de 'tshal na che lo khrir 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i rig sngags gi' khor los bsgyur bar 'gyuraro// bskal pa bcu tshun cha da kyi sngon gyi skye ba dran par 'gyuraro// don yod rgyal po'i cho ga
73a6(rgyud): zhib mo rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor kha ton du gnas par 'gyuraro// gal te snod mi len na de'i tshe yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bgyis na cher g.yo bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras
73a7(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyi mdun du mchis na rig sngags 'chang la dbugs 'byin par bgyid de rig sngags 'chang legaso leg so// rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis sbyin sreg gi cho ga de bsgrub/ 
73a8(rgyud): zin gyis mchog slongs shig dang / sbyin no zhes de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gis ci bsams pa'i mchog smras pa de'i tshe thams cad stsol bar bgyid do// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
73b1(rgyud): phrug gis skyes pa de las snod blangs te/ rang gis lag na rig sngags 'chang la stsol bar bgyid do// rig sngags 'chang gi blangs nas zas kyi gong bu de bza' bar bgyi'o// 'tshal ba tsam gyi mdo
73b2(rgyud): la na mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchi bar 'gyuraro// lus las me'i snying po 'bar ba'i kha dog sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyuraro// don yod rgyal po'i rig sngags 'dzin 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur
73b3(rgyud): 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// / bam po drug pa// gang ga'i klung gi bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma dang mnya
73b4(rgyud): pa'i rig sngags 'chang ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba rnams kyi rig sngags 'chang gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyuraro// gang dga'i klung gi bye ba khri phrag brgya stong dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma dang
73b5(rgyud): mnyam pa'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang don yod pa'i rab tu gan sa pa'i rnams 'byung bar 'gyuraro// rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang ri dang / tshal dang / nags tshal dang
73b6(rgyud): bcas pa me tog dang / 'bras bu'i shing rnam pa sna tshogs yal ka dang / sbal mig dang / lo ma dang / rtsa ba dang / myu gur bcas pa kha cig ni gser gyi me tog/ kha cig ni dngul gyi me tog/ 
73b7(rgyud): kha cig ni rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i me tog dag go// gzhan yang lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dag dang / ta ma la dang tsam pa ka dang / lcug ma'i me tog dang / ta la dang / g+han dbar shi ka dang / 
73b8(rgyud): snam dang / yu thi ka dang / ta ra na dang / kub bya ka'i me tog dag dang / tshal dang / nags tshal dang / bskyed mos tshal dga' bar 'gyur ba'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang gis mdzes par bgyis pa'i gzhal
74a1(rgyud): med khang thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur zhing dga' ba dang yid du mchis par 'gyuraro// lha'i chu klung dang / 'bab chu dang / steng ka dang / rdzing lha'i tsan dan gyi dri chab kyis yongasu gang ba de la
74a2(rgyud): rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i gzhal med khang dang / lha'i pad+ma dang / ud pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos legs par rgyan pa'i char gser gyi bye ma legs par bdal ba'i gzhal med
74a3(rgyud): khang dag 'byung bar 'gyuraro// lha'i bu mo dang / mi 'am ci'i tshogs dang / dri za'i tshogs kyis dga' bar bgyis pa/ lha dang / lha ma yin dang / dri za dang / klu dang / rig 'dzin dang / mi 'am ci'i cho gas
74a4(rgyud): kyis yongasu bskor cing lha'i 'byor pa'i gzhal med khang leg sa par bstabs pa'i gnas na thams cad du rtse bar bgyid/ dga' bar bgyid/ dga' mgur spyod par 'gyuraro// byang chub kyi/ 
74a5(rgyud): snying po la thug pa nas byang chub la mchis kyi bar dang / chos kyi 'khor los bskor ba nas yongasu mya ngan 'das pa'i bar/ du tshe'i tshad gcig tsam du skyong bar bgyid do// de bzhin du
74a6(rgyud): grub pa bla na med pa chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur te/ da ltar zas kyi gong bu sgrub pa'i cho ga shin tu rnyed par
74a7(rgyud): dka' lags so// phyogs bcu mtha' dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang lhan cig 'grogs nas mchi bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
74a8(rgyud): cad las mngon sum du chos nyan par thos par 'gyuraro// de'i 'od zer 'bar ba'i snying pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa 'phags
74b1(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzig dbang phyug gi snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi phyag bgyis pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang sngags dang phyag rgya rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag
74b2(rgyud): rdzogs par sgrub pa'i cho ga thams cad dang / cho ga zhib mo'i rgya chen po mtha' dag gi dkyil 'khor 'di kho na nyid du gnas par 'gyur lags so// klu'i rgyal po bye ba phrag brgya stong rnams de'i
74b3(rgyud): dbang du gyur nas rtags par rgyun tu mchis par 'gyur ro// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po
74b4(rgyud): thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// 'og mi na gyi gnas kyi lha rnams kyi rig sngags 'chang de'i phyi ba bzhin rtag tu 'brang zhing rtag par rgyun tu yongs su bskor bar
74b5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// lha'i ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa'i bza' ba/ dang btung ba dang / gzhal med khang rnam pa sna tshogs dag lhun gyis grub par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du
74b6(rgyud): gos dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gzhal med khang dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de la sogs pa sbyin sreg gi cho ga don yod pa sgrub pa dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i grub pa
74b7(rgyud): 'thob par 'gyuraro// 'on te skal pa chung ba sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sa bon ma mchis pa zhig mchis la des snod de blangs pa tsam gyi mod la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug 'thob par 'gyur te/ 
74b8(rgyud): lha dang mi'i dpal nyam su myong bar 'gyuraro// reg pa tsam gyi mod la tshe lha'i lo brgya khri bzhi stong thub par 'gyuraro// de la phyis kyang nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ sdig pa dang ni sgrib pa thams
75a1(rgyud): cad kyis nyon mongs par mi 'gyuraro// phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba dang / bdug pa dang / rab tu gdug pa thams cad nub par 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal dang / dud 'gro'i
75a2(rgyud): gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dgas kyi yul thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyuraro// sems can thams cad kyi mchod gnas gcig pur 'gyuraro// bud med dang / 
75a3(rgyud): skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / sems can thams cad lta 'tshal bar 'gyuraro// thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyuraro// tshig btsan zhing don yod pa 'thob par 'gyur// 'gum pa'i dus
75a4(rgyud): su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzigs bzhed par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon su ma du mthong bar 'gyur ro// dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag nas
75a5(rgyud): dus bgyid par 'gyuraro// dus bgyis nas skal ba mnyam pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ pad+ma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// 
75a6(rgyud): lan 'ga' yang phyir ngan song du mchi bar mi 'gyur te/ phyis ma 'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa tham sa cad blta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad blta ba
75a7(rgyud): phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rtag tu mchi bar 'gyuraro// dpral bar thig le bgyis na thams cad du mi gda' bar 'gyuraro// me lha rtag par rgyun tu dran par bgyis pa tsam gyis rang
75a8(rgyud): gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas mchog thams cad stsol bar bgyid do// dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyuraro// de nas don yod bsgongs pa sgrub par 'tshal na rig sngags
75b1(rgyud): 'chang nges 'bras dang sran ma ma shar bsres te bsgral la bsgongs nas ma dang / bu ram dang / sha khar dang / sbrang rtsi lhan cig brdzis nas/ bil ba'i tshad tsam du bgyis te/ de'i 'og tu
75b2(rgyud): shing ka ra bi ra'i me sbar nas sgongs pa re re la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis nas me'i nang du sbyin sreg bgyi ste/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o// de na
75b3(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang yungs kar dang / me tog ci snyed pa dang bsres te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyid nas me'i dbus su stsal par bgyi'o// 'bras yos dang yungs kar dang khro bo'i rgyal
75b4(rgyud): po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas gtor bar bgyi'o// de nas dme'i dbus nas me lha lus phyed tsam phyung nas rin po chesna bdun las bgyis pa'i snod zas bsgongs pas bkang nas
75b5(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang la rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis zas bsgo ngas pasgrub pa'i cho ga grub zin gyis lha'i zas bskongs chen po long shig ces stobs par bgyid ngo // de nas rig sngas/ 
75b6(rgyud): 'chang gis zas bsgongs pa'i snod de blangs par bgyi'o// blangs pa tsam kho nas bcud kyis len du gyur nas na mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyuraro// skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyu ro// lpags pa yongasu
75b7(rgyud): dag par 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba drug khri brgya stong gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyuro// me lha gnas dang gzhal med
75b8(rgyud): khang dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du mchis nas las thams cad bgyid par 'gyuraro// gang dang gang gis zas bsgongs pa la reg pa de yang thos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtsho chen por 'gyur ro// 
76a1(rgyud): don yod zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang bcas pa tshe/ 
76a2(rgyud): gzhib mo mtha' dag rdzogs par kha ton du gnas pa 'di nyin ci bzhin shu lo kha stong klog gam 'chang bar bgyid na tshe rjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ pad+ma las brdzus
76a3(rgyud): te skyes nas skye ba dran par 'gyuraro// lan 'ga' yang phyis dran pa brjed par mi 'gyuraro// tshig btsun par 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyi snying du sdug par 'gyuraro// mchod pa chen po'i
76a4(rgyud): 'os su 'gyuraro// dpral ba la thig le bgyis na mi gda' bar gyur nas 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po tham sa cad dbang du gyur nas gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'byed par
76a5(rgyud): 'gyuraro// bud med gang zhig bu'i ched du zas bsgongs pa de 'alan bu gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa rnyed nas
76a6(rgyud): yun ring du 'tsho zhing yid gzhungs mkhas pa dang / bstan bcos thams cad la bag tsha ba ma mchis par 'gyuraro// de nas skye bo 'bum zas stsal bar 'tshal na 'o ma'i thug pa sgrub par bgyi ste/ 
76a7(rgyud): gnas gtsang ma bcos bsnyungs par shing kar bi ra'i lcug mas bkrus cing don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i gsang sngags bzlas brjod bgyis te/ de nas khro bo'i rgyal po che ba dang yung
76a8(rgyud): kar la bzlas brjod bgyis nas gtor bar bgyi'o// de nas zas bsgongs pa gcig snod kyi nang nas phyung nas 'o thug nang du bsu lo// de nas bgos te thog mar dkon mchog gsum la
76b1(rgyud): bsod snyoms dbul bar bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dbul btsa bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu 'phags pa 'jam dpal la dbul bar bgyi// 
76b2(rgyud): de'i 'og tu dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / mdangs rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams dang / bkren pa dang / sdug phongs
76b3(rgyud): pa dang / lam gyis dub pa dang / slongs mo pa rnams la rab tu stsal bar bgyi'o// ji tsam du skye bo 'bum ci 'tshal bar kha zas 'tshal du stsal kyang snod de gang pa 'am bri bar mi mngon zhing de
76b4(rgyud): bas par mi 'gyuraro// gang dag zas de 'tshal ba de dag ste/ na gyi sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / bar du gcod pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyuraro// nad thams cad dang bral bar
76b5(rgyud): 'gyuraro// dgra thams cad dang / phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyis tshugs parami 'gyuraro// 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i
76b6(rgyud): 'jigs pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyuraro// lus mnyon cing 'jam par 'gyur ro// nga ro lha ltar mnyen zhing snyan la dga' bar bgyid pa'i dbyangs su 'gyu ro// rtag tu dub pa'i sdug bsngas
76b7(rgyud): thams cad yongs su spangs par 'gyuraro// rtag tu ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du bde ba yang dag par stobs par 'gyuraro// tshe rjes nas bde 'gro thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyuraro// 'o ma'i thug pas
76b8(rgyud): lhung bzed bkang nas de gnas mthon po gla gab med par dkyil 'khor bgyis te/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lhung bzed de dbul bar
77a1(rgyud): bgyi'o// phul ba tsam gyi mod la chu bo gang gi bye ma 'bum phrag brgya stong gi bye ma snyed kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi ning gi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs
77a2(rgyud): pa re re'i spyan sngar lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa'i lha'i zas bsgongs pa dang / lha'i 'o thug gis lhung bzed bkang ba dang / lha'i tsan dan gyi dkyil 'khor lha'i me tog sil ma bkram pa 'byung
77a3(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang nyan thos kyi dge/ 
77a4(rgyud): 'dun dang bcas pa la lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa'i mcho dag gis bstabs par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i da'akhor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i
77a5(rgyud): tshogs dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kyis rig sngags 'chang yon bdag de'i yon sbyong par mdzad do// gang gi phyir yon sbyangs nas skal pa
77a6(rgyud): dang 'thun pa'i tshe 'di nyid dang / gzhan du dbang phyug chen po 'thob par 'gyuraro// grub pa chen po'i gser gyis 'byor par 'gyur ro// mdzod dang bang mdzod mang pos rgyas par 'gyur ro// 
77a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad blta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyis de la srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / 
77a8(rgyud): sba ba bgyid par 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang des legs par khrus bgyis te/ 
77b1(rgyud): gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos nas 'o thug mar dang bsres pa 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o// sgron shing dang a rga'i shing gis me sbar bar bgyi'o// sbyin sreg lan stong / 
77b2(rgyud): rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa bdag nyid dam nor dbang du gyur nas/ mchis par 'gyuraro// nub gsum du bgyis/ 
77b3(rgyud): na klu'i rgyal po thams cad gnas dang 'khor du bcas pa dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyuraro// nub lngar bgyis na 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang dri za dang / lha ma yin
77b4(rgyud): dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen dpo dang / mi ma lags pa thams cad dang / mi thams cad 'khor dang bcas par dbang du gyur na mchis par 'gyur
77b5(rgyud): nub bdun du bgyis na rigs 'dzin thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyuraro// nub thams cad du/ bgyis na brgya byin la sogs te sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi
77b6(rgyud): lnga rnams dang / lha'i bu mo'i tshogs thams cad dang / gtsang ma'i lha'i bu mo rnams babs nas dbang du gyur te/ ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du bsnyen bkur bgyid cing mchis par 'gyur ro// 
77b7(rgyud): ba nya nas brtsams te mar gyi de'i tshes nyi shu gsum ma ma gnam stong gi bar du dus gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bgyis la/ arga'i shing gi yam sreg shing gis me sbar nas
77b8(rgyud): gnam stong gis rdzogs pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du mchis nas rig sngags 'chang leg so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar bgyid de/ rig sngags
78a1(rgyud): 'chang legs so legs so// nga mnyes par byas kyis rig sngags 'chang spros shig dang / mchog sbyin te gang gnyer ba de thams cad sbyin no// gter sna ba 'am/ no/ 
78a2(rgyud): bsgyur ba smra ba 'am/ zhing smra ba 'am/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba'am/ mi snang bar bya ba 'am/ gsang sngags smra ba'am/ cho ga zhib mo sgrub pa de dag thams cad sbyin no// rgyal po nyid dam/ blon po
78a3(rgyud): nyid dam/ yul bdag nyid dam/ phyug pa nyid dam/ grong rdal 'thob pa 'am/ gos 'thob pa'am/ ba lang dang / rta dang / ma he dang / rnga mo dang / lug 'thob pa 'am/ nor 'thob pa 'am/ 'bru
78a4(rgyud): 'thob pa de dag thams cad sbyin no// na mkha' la 'gro bal ma/ mi snang bar bya ba'am/ rdzu 'phrul 'thob pa'am/ ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa'am/ gzungs 'thob pa'am/ phyag
78a5(rgyud): rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo sgrub pa'am/ ro lang / sa bslangs pa'o/ rig 'dzin grub pa nyid dam/ ral gri 'i rig 'dzin nyid dam/ nam mkha' rig 'dzin nyid dam/ 
78a6(rgyud): phug tu 'jug pa'am/ dur khrod du 'jug pa 'am/ nags su 'jug pa'am/ ri la rgyu ba de dag thams cad sbyin no// de nas rig sngags 'chang gi ji ltar yid la bsams shing smra ba de dag
78a7(rgyud): thams cad stsol bar bgyid do// rig sngags 'chang la bstan pa tsam gyi mod la dri med don yod lta ba zhes bgyis pa lus yongs su dag pa/ 'thob par 'gyuraro// tshe rjes nas 'jig rten gyi/ 
78a8(rgyud): khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ pad+ma'i ze ba'i dbus nas brdzus te skye ba'i skye ba dran par 'gyuraro// don yod zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis
78b1(rgyud): pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang bcas pa/ cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag dang bcas pa 'di rdzogs te byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du kha ton
78b2(rgyud): du gnas par bgyi'o// de nas la du'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga sgrub par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang des kha zas las la tu stong rtsa brgyad bgyis la/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i
78b3(rgyud): zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas legs par khrus bgyis te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// de nas la tu mar dang bsres te sbyin sreg bgyi'o// 
78b4(rgyud): shin tu dri zhim po'i shing gi yam sreg shing gi me sbar bar ba gyi'o// stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang me'i dbus nas khye'u zhig byung nas snod lha'i la tu sa bkang nas dbul bar bgyid
78b5(rgyud): de nas rig sngags 'chang gi yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas te khye'u de'i lag tu gtor ro// khye'u des rig sngag sa 'chang la smras pa/ rig sngags 'chang ci zhig don du
78b6(rgyud): gnyer rig sngags 'chang gis 'dod pa thams cad byin cig ces brjod par bgyi'o// des smras pa/ rig sngags 'chang snod kyil tu khyer cig dang / 'dis khyod kyi dgos pa dpag tu
78b7(rgyud): med pa grub par 'gyur ro// 'di ni khyod kyi bcud kyi mchog yin no// rig sngags 'chang long shig 'di ni khyod kyi grub pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis snod gang ba de
78b8(rgyud): blangs te khye'u la yang khyed kyis kho bo'i grogs kyis shig ces brjod par bgyi'o// khye'u yis smras pa/ dgos pa thams cad 'grub pa'i grogs bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang gang gi tshe dgos pa
79a1(rgyud): byung ba de'i tshe gu gul dang tsan dan lhan cig bsres la mar dang yungs kar sbyangs don yod lcags kyus lan bdun bzlas te sbyin sreg bgyi'o// arga'i shing gi me sbyar ro// 
79a2(rgyud): sbyin sreg bgyis pa tsam gyi mong la bdag bkug pas mong la mchis nas dgos pa thams cad sgrub par bgyi'o// las thams cad bgyi'o// ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du bsnyen bkur bgyis
79a3(rgyud): shing bkur stir spyad par bgyi'o// bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad bzlog par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gi la tu de la
79a4(rgyud): reg par bgyis na nam mkha' la 'phur nas rig sngags 'a chang gi rigs thams cad zil gyis gnon par 'gyu/  ro// rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur
79a5(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba sa ya phrag gnyis dang / bye ba phrag bdun gyis yongasu bskor bar 'gyuraro// tshe'i tshang lha'i bskal pa drug khrir
79a6(rgyud): 'gyuraro// skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyuraro// la tu lhung bzed kyi nang du stsal te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du bzhag nas don yod rgyal po'i khro bos dbang bskur/ 
79a7(rgyud): te/ de nas dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / dpas rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad la stsal bar bgyi ste/ longs spyod du stsal kyang
79a8(rgyud): bas par mi 'gyur gyi slar zhing 'phel bar 'gyur te/ ji srid du lhung bzed nal tu mchis pa de srid du 'gyur ro// ji srid du skye bo 'bum 'bum mang zhing phal che bar stsal kyang gtugs
79b1(rgyud): par mi 'gyur ro// la tu la don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis na de'i 'og tu gang du reg pa de yang gser bzang por 'gyur ro// la tu la lan bdun bzlas brjod paH/ 
79b2(rgyud): ste/ klu'i gnas su 'phangs na de'i tshe rgya mtsho chen po mthar gtugs pa'i klu'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur te/ bsgo na char mi 'bab pa bsgo
79b3(rgyud): ba bzhin char 'bebs par bgyid do// ci bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyu ro// ha cang char ches na bsgo ba bzhin ha cang char chen po 'gums par bgyid do// rlung dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / 
79b4(rgyud): ser ba thams cad sgo ba tsam gyis gcod par bgyid do// phug gi sgor la tu la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis nas phug gi sgor bsnun na phug gi sgo thams cad 'bye bar
79b5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// 'khrul 'khor dang / gtan pa dang sgo glegs thams cad dum bur bcag par 'gyur ro// gnas na ga nas pa thams cad phyir byung nas rig sngags 'chang gi
79b6(rgyud): mdun du mchis te bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyuraro// nags tshang tshing gi dbus su 'phangs na nags tshang tshing gi gnas kyi sgo thams cad phye nas sman gyis rdzas thams cad rang gi gzugs
79b7(rgyud): kyi mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro// la tu la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te/ dur khrod chen po'i dbus su 'phangs na 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang bcas pa'i gnas kyi sgo
79b8(rgyud): thams cad 'bye bar 'gyuraro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad sgren mor gyur nas thams cad dbang du mchis par 'gyur zhing ji srid 'tshe'i bar du bsgo ba bzhin mchis par
80a1(rgyud): 'gyur ro// rma mthung ba'i mi ro dri chab kyis khrus bgyis la la tu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ lag pa gnyis sul tu stsal la/ gos dkar pos ro
80a2(rgyud): g.yogs nas khro bo'i rgyal po yungs kar dang chab la lan bdun bzlas nas dbang bskur na ci dris pa de dag thams cad smra bar 'gyur te/ bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / lo nongs pa dang / nad
80a3(rgyud): dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / pha rol gyi dpung dang / phas kyi dgra bo dang / mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa dang / mi ngas dang yams kyi nad de dag thams cad smra bar 'gyuraro// lha'i 'jig rten du skye
