80a4(rgyud): ba'am/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye ba smra bar 'gyur zhing / dmyaladabar skye ba smra bar 'gyuraro// tshe rings pa'am/ che thung ba smra bar 'gyur ro// dus ma lags pa'i 'chi ba smra bar
80a5(rgyud): 'gyuraro// gter gyi gtam smra bar 'gyur te/ nor bsgyur ba 'i gtam mam/ zhing gi gtam mam/ mig 'phrul gyi gtam smra bar 'gyuraro// cho ga zhing mo 'grub pa dang / 
80a6(rgyud): gsang sngags 'grub pa dang / phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'grub par smra bar 'gyuraro// mig sman 'grub pa dang / ril bu 'grub pa smra bar 'gyuraro// nam mkha' la mchi ba dang / mi ganga' bar
80a7(rgyud): bgyi ba dang / ro langs bslang ba dang / mig mngag pa dang / dgra chad pas bcad cing dbang du bgyi ba de dag thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro// sgyu thabs smra bar 'gyuraro// nyams pa smra bar 'gyur
80a8(rgyud): 'phel ba smra bar 'gyur ba nas bskal pa las 'das pa'i 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i bar du smra bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gi chab kyis khar sul
80b1(rgyud): lal tu blangs na ro 'gyel bar 'gyuraro// la tu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas rgyal po'i bskor bsnun na rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa bdag nyid ngam/ nor dbang
80b2(rgyud): du gyur nas mchis par 'gyuraro// grong khyer gyi sgor bsnun na grong khyer na gnas pa'i skyes pa dang / bud med dang khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur zhing nor
80b3(rgyud): chen po 'du bar 'grub pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// mchong nge'i gnas chen por 'gyur ro// la t+pal lan bdun pazlas brjod bgyis te/ dpal lha mo chen mo'i lag par stsalan dpal lha mo chen mo
80b4(rgyud): dbang du gyur nas nor chen po stsol cing ji srid 'tsho' bar du ma ches par 'gyur ro// la tA la lan brgya rtsa brgyad pazlas brjod bgyis nas khug ma'i nang du stsal te mtshan
80b5(rgyud): khung du bsrel bar bgyi ste/ ji tsam du bsrel ba de srid du/ mi ganga' bar gyur nas gang du stsal ba der 'jug par 'gyu ro// gang na shing gcig gam 'bab chu gcig par
80b6(rgyud): la tu la khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi ste dbang bskur nas shing gi drung du brdeg na 'dod dgur bsgyur ba dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// ji ltar bsams pa'i
80b7(rgyud): 'dod pa thams cad nye bar mchis nas yongs su spyod pa dang / ji srid 'tshe'i bar du mchis par 'gyuraro// la tu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ ma mo'i gnas su nag po
80b8(rgyud): chen po'i spyi gtsug tu bzhag la khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas te chab dang yungs kar gyis dbang bskur bar bgyis na/ de nas sbyor ba mo thams cad dang / mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dbang
81a1(rgyud): du gyur nas mngag gzhug pa las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// la t+pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te nag po chen po'i lte ba'i phyog su bzhag na ma mo'i tshogs thams
81a2(rgyud): cad rang gi gzugs kyi mdun du mchis nas mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// las thams cad bgyid par 'gyuraro// la tu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas 'phags pa
81a3(rgyud): 'jam dpal gyi lhung bzed kyi nang du stsal te/ khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur bgyis na ji srid du lhung bzed na la tu mchis pa de srid du phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan
81a4(rgyud): sngar lha'i zhal zas ro sna tshogs kyi ro'i mchog dang ldan pa de dag 'thung bar 'gyur zhing / nyan thos dang byangachub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen
81a5(rgyud): bo dang bcas pa tshim par bgyis par 'gyuraro// de bzhi na gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang byang chub sa mas dpa'i tshogs dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa
81a6(rgyud): de dag gi rig sngags 'chang ngo'i yon sbyong ba mdzad par 'gyur ro// la tu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i dbang bskur la lcags kyu'i rgyal pos chab
81a7(rgyud): la bzlas brjod bgyis na me thab kyi mtshams bcing bar bgyi'o// de nas arga'i yam sreg shing gis me sbar lal tu de me thab kyi dbus su bzhag ste/ mar dang / yungs kar dang / 
81a8(rgyud): zho dang / sbrang rtsi bsres pas lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o// lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / me lha me rang bzhin gzugs kyis byung nas rig sngags 'chang la smras pa/ 
81b1(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang legs legs so// bdag tshim par byas so// bdag dga' bar 'gyur to// rig sngags 'chang bdag gis mchog tu dga' ba thob kyis rig sngags 'chang
81b2(rgyud): ltar yid la bsams shing 'dod pa smros shig dang mchog sbyin no// rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin mchog brjod par bgyi'o// me lha des kyang thad
81b3(rgyud): stsol cing dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyuraro// las thams cad grub par stsol bar 'gyur ro// ma'i phung po'i dbus su zhugs na 'od zer stong 'phro ba rnams gangs bzhin du bsil
81b4(rgyud): bar 'gyur te chab nas byung ba bzhin no// lag pas me rnams tshugs par bgyid do// 'bar ba bzhin du klad pa'i spyi bor bzhag na skra nyag ma gcig kyang 'tshig par mi
81b5(rgyud): bgyingad ngo // me'i dbang du mchi bar mi 'gyur ro// 'bar bzhin du g.yar gyi nang du bsrel na chung zad dro ba tsam du yang mi 'gyuraro// lus la bab na ji ltar tsan dan bzhin du
81b6(rgyud): bsil zhing bde bar 'gyuraro// gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs bgyid par 'gyur ro// gos kyi mtha' mar thum po bgyis na tshig par mi 'gyur ro// chab kyi nang du stsal na 'gum par mi
81b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// sbyin sreg thams cad kyi cho ga so/ so'i gzugs su mchis par 'gyur ro// thams cad du dgos pa 'di yan grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro// dgos pa gang dang gang du bskos pa de dang der
81b8(rgyud): dgos pa thams cad grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du gsang sngags dang dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga sgrub pa thams cad lung 'bogs par 'gyuraro// du ba dang / rlung dang / me
82a1(rgyud): 'bar ba'i shugs kyis dpag tshad stong du mchis shing slar yang ldog par 'gyuraro// dgos pa thams cad nye bar ston par 'gyuraro// dgos pa thams cad bgyid par
82a2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// thams cad du grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro// de nas don yod me 'bar ba// bla med 'bar bzang sgrub 'tshal na// yid bzhin nor bu lta bu dang // gzi brjid nyi ma dang mnyam pas
82a3(rgyud): phyogs bcu'i kho ra khor yug gi/ kun nas su ni gsal bar bgyid// sgrub pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang // 'tshed pa bla na med pa 'grub// bcud kyi mchog ste dam pa lags// nor sgyur
82a4(rgyud): smra ba bla na med// gzhan yang 'tshed pa sna tshogs pa// sgrub pa bla na med pa lags// ji ltar nyin mtshan gda' de bas na// nyin par gyi ni gdugs dang mtshungs// lan cig/ 
82a5(rgyud): dgos pa sgrub pa na// legs par las bgyis nor bu dang / rdzas bsres legs par bgyis pa la// gtsang ma/ sa bzlas pa'i las rnams dang // gtsang mas spyad pas
82a6(rgyud): sgrub pa dang // don yod chu dang me dang ni// me yi shing rnams brjod par bgyi// me 'bar 'od dang mtshungs pa ste// de dag thams cad cig spungs pa'i// yam sreg cho ga bla na med// tsan
82a7(rgyud): ngan dang ni seng ldeng dang // pa tang ka ra bi ra dang // arga sha mi skyug ma dang // shir sha karna ka ri ka/ 'o ma'i shing dang byang chub shing // blag sha dang ni sna ma dang // gan d+ha bar shi pad+ma yi/ 
82a8(rgyud): rtsa ba dang ni lo mar bcas// pad+ma dkar po ku mu dang // ud pa la me tog lo ma rtswa// bi dza pu ri bi la ba shing // sin du bA ri tsam pa ka/ tre ka bi tsu marde tsa// sa ha ba la tsi dra ka/ shing de kun
82b1(rgyud): ka bsdus pa yi// yam sreg shing gis las bgyis te// yungs kar mar dang zho dang ni// sbrang rtsi 'bras yos sbyin sreg bgyi// bzang po'i zangs las srang gsum dang // mtshal las gnyi
82b2(rgyud): gyur gang bskus kyang // srang gcig tsan dan dkar po nyid// srang bcu ldong ros srang gcig ste// de dag bsres pa'i rdzas rnams dang // de bzhin yung ni nyis 'gyur dag/ zhig dag ni bkang
82b3(rgyud): nas su// ma thab dbus su gzhug par bgyi// sbyin sreg stong ni rtsa brgyad du// shin tu mnyam gzhag legs gsal ba// gtsang ma gtsang mar spyod pa yi// gos gtsang legs par
82b4(rgyud): khrus bgyis pa// dri zhim dri yis bsgos par bgyi// ro sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma dang // me tog 'bras bu nyid kyang dgod// bzlas brjod kyi ni sbyin sreg nyid// stong rtsa
82b5(rgyud): brgyad ni tshang ba dang // de nas lha bshos gtor ma dang // me tog bdug pa mchod yon snod// dbul te 'o mas mdag ma dgum// 'o mas zhig zhi bar bgyi// de nas rig
82b6(rgyud): sngags 'chang gis bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bgyis nas yungs kar gyis bsnun par bgyi'o// khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// de nas zhig 'bar bar
82b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhig de la mchod par bgyi'o// de nas zangs kyi sgrom bu'am/ dngul gyi sgrom bur zhi gnas nor bu blangs te/ sgrom bu der bzhag par bgyi ste/ yid// 
82b8(rgyud): bzhin gyi nor bu ji lta ba bzhin du 'di yang don yod pa 'bar ba mthu chen po'i mthu dang ldan par 'gyuraro// mtshan mo ni zla ba'i 'od bzhin du gda' bar 'gyuraro// nyin mo ni nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du
83a1(rgyud): gda' bar 'gyuraro// nam 'tshod pa'i dus kyi tshe nor bu de bzhag na 'tshe ba dang sreg pa dang / 'tshed pa thams cad grub par 'gyuraro// nam hom bgyid pa de'i tshe thab kyi dbus su
83a2(rgyud): bzhag ste/ sregs blugs kyi sbyin sreg bgyis na me chen po 'bar bar 'gyur ro// thams cad kyi thams cad du dgos pa rnams sgron mas gsal bar bgyis pa bzhin du 'gyuraro// g.yul
83a3(rgyud): ngo chen por g.yul 'gyed pa'i dbus su skyes pa dpa' bo legs par khrus bgyis pa/ gos gtsang mas bgos pa/ ya lang dang / go char bsdams pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po de'i
83a4(rgyud): spyi bo'i gtsug tu bzhag nas gcig pu g.yul gyi dbu/ sa su zhugs na de nas skyes pa de me 'bar ba gcig pur 'gyur ro// de nas g.yul 'gyed pa'i pha rol gyi dpung rnams
83a5(rgyud): pham par gyur nas phyogs bcur 'khrugs nas 'byer ba ra 'gyuraro// phyi nas lan 'ga' yang pha rol gyi dpung dang / dgra'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro// pha rol gyi
83a6(rgyud): dgra dang mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro// lag pas nor bu bzung nas phug gi gnas su zhugs na gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'byer bar 'gyuraro// gnas na gnas pa thams cad
83a7(rgyud): mdun du mchis par 'gyuraro// klu'i gnas thams cad du mchis nas lag pas nor bu bzung ste/ gnas kyi nang du zhugs na chab thams cad kyi phyir mi tshugs par 'gyuraro// de nas klu thang
83a8(rgyud): mdun du mchis nas bden par dam bca' bar 'gyuraro// dbang du gyur nas ji srid 'tshe ba'i bar du las bgyid par 'gyuraro// bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyuraro// lo tog dang / rtswa dang / 
83b1(rgyud): shing gel pa dang / nags tshal thams cad bde bar 'phel bar 'gyuraro// snyan cing mdangs dang ldan pa dang mnyen par 'gyuraro// gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / dran pa dang ldan pa dang / mi
83b2(rgyud): bde ba chung bar yang 'gyuraro// sems can gang dag gis yang le tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu la longs spyod par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad dang / gzhan ches mang po
83b3(rgyud): dag gis dgos pa mang po bgyid par 'gyur ba ni nor bu chen po don yod 'bar ba'i nor bu me 'bar ba'i chen po lags so// de nas don yod snang ba rnam par lta bas 'phags pa spyan
83b4(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug bkug ste/ rang gi gzugadas su blta bar 'tshal na de nas rig sngags 'chang ga/ tsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// lus logs
83b5(rgyud): par bkrus te spos chab kyis byug par bgyi'o// shing / arga'i yam sreg shing gis me sbar bar bgyi'o// yu/ ngas kar dang / a ga ru dang / tsan dan dang / zho dang sbrang rtsi
83b6(rgyud): dang / mar sbyar bas stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o// de nas don yod lcags kyu gu gul las lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi sregs blugs kyi sbyin sreg bgyis na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
83b7(rgyud): dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas/ mchog thams cad bsams pa bzhin yongasu rdzogs par bgyid do// ji ltar yid la bgyid cing bsams pa'i mchog stsol
83b8(rgyud): bar bgyid do// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar yid la bgyis shing bsams pa'i mchog smras pa dang / de'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis thams cad
84a1(rgyud): stsol bar bgyid do// de nas mig sman sgrub par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang legs par bkrus te gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// nub gcig bsnyung ba
84a2(rgyud): bgyis te/ des zangs kyi za ma tog bgyis la de nas mig sman so bir dang yung banyis 'gyur du bsres pas dgang bar bgyi'o// de nas stong rtsa brgyang bzlas brjod bgyis nas thab kyi dbus
84a3(rgyud): su bzhag par bgyi'o// de'i steng du u shi ra dang / yung kar dang / tsan dan dang / zho dang sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang bsres pas lan stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o// shing arga'i me sbar bar
84a4(rgyud): bgyi'o// lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / de nas mig da sman blangs la rtun gyi steng du legs par zhib tu btag/ das la/ ldong ros dang / ga pur dang / glang rtsi bsres nas
84a5(rgyud): slar yang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa ba rgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la don yod lcags kyu'i ri ga sngags rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis pa
84a6(rgyud): ni thams cad du mgul pa legs par sbyar te/ de nas don yod rgyal pos dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgyas lan bdun phyag rgya bcing ngo // de nas mig sman gyis
84a7(rgyud): byugs na nam mkha' la 'phur nas rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur ro// skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyuraro// bskal pa khrir 'tshe bar 'gyur ro// dpral bar
84a8(rgyud): thig le bgyis nas mi gda' bar 'gyuraro// mig la bskus te tshig gzhan mi smra bar rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas mchis par
84b1(rgyud): 'gyu ro// mchod pa phal po ches cher mchod par 'gyuraro// nor 'du 'grub pa chen po 'thob par 'gyuro// sgrub pa'i dus sam bzlas brjod kyi dus su mig la bskus na bgegs dang / log 'dren
84b2(rgyud): dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad kyis mi mthong bar 'gyuraro// phyis kyang gegs byed par mi nus te/ bar chad bgyid par mi 'gyuraro// bde ba sgrub pa'i mchog dang / bzlas brjod kyi
84b3(rgyud): ga grub par 'gyuraro// mig la byugs te skye bo mang po'i nang du zhugs na de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur te nor dang 'bru dang / gos dang lhab lhub rgyan phal po che 'grub par 'gyuraro// bud
84b4(rgyud): med kyang mig mi 'dzums par blta bzhin du bdag nyid dam/ nor dbang du 'gyur ro// mig la byugs te dgon dpa chen por zhugs na chom po dang / g.yon can dang / rkun
84b5(rgyud): po dang / gcan zan gdugs pa dang / sbrul dang / dbye/ gdug dang / sbrul gyi dug gi 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ bde legs su slar yang
84b6(rgyud): mchi bar 'gyur ro// 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyod pa thams cad la mig sman bskus na smra ba rnams kyi bla na med par 'gyur te/ thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro// g.yul
84b7(rgyud): ngor g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du mchis na mig la byugs na thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur zhing / 'jigs pa thams cad las bsgral bar 'gyuraro// gdugs pas zin pa thams
84b8(rgyud): cad la mig la bskus na gdug pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro// rims zhag gcig pa dang / zhag gnyis pa dang / zhag gsum pa dang / rims zhag bzhi pa thams cad la mig la/ 
85a1(rgyud): bskus na rims nad thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// dug mi bzang ba 'tshal ba la mig la bskus na dug ma mchis par 'gyu ro// gdon thams cad kyis zin pa la
85a2(rgyud): mig la bskus na gdon brgyad khri bzhi stong las thar par 'gyuraro// mig bro 'tshal ba la bskus pa tsam gyi mod la byang bar 'gyuraro// klad pa cher bro 'tshal ba la yang mig la bskus/ 
85a3(rgyud): pa tsam gyis byang bar 'gyur ro// tshangs pa'i srin po'i gdon dang / brjed byed kyis zin pa la mig la bskus pa tsam gyis thar par 'gyur ro// rgyal po khros pas bsad par 'os
85a4(rgyud): pa gang su yang rung ba khrid pa mig la bskus pa tsam gyis 'a'ajigs pa thams cad spang ba'i thar par 'gyuraro// na dag po chen po'i mig la bskus na rang gi gzugs kyis
85a5(rgyud): dus su mdun na mchis nas mchog thams cad stsol cing dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyuraro// ma mo'/ tshogs thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par
85a6(rgyud): 'gyuraro// dpal lha mo'i mig la bskus te mig mi 'dzums par don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan gsum bzlas na dpal lha mo chen mo mchis nas dgos pa thams cad dang / 'bru rab
85a7(rgyud): tu mang po stsol bar 'gyuraro// nyal ba'i tshe mig la bskus te nyal na rmi lam bzang po mang zhing phal che ba mthong bar 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi
85a8(rgyud): gzugs mthong ba stsol bar 'gyuraro// mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyuraro// dran pa dang blo gros rgya chen por 'gyuraro// mig la bskus te tshogs kyi dbus su zhugs na mchod pa/ 
85b1(rgyud): chen po 'thob par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs brnyan gyi mig la bskus na rtag tu mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu blta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// 
85b2(rgyud): gi'u wang dang / lhan cig sbyar te mig la bskus nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na dbang phyug chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// longs spyod chen po phun sum tshogs par yang 'gyur ro// 
85b3(rgyud): don chen po 'grub par yang 'gyur ro// rgyal po btsun mo dang / blon po'i tshogs dang / 'khor thams cad dga' bar gyur nas thams cad dbang du gyur te mchis par 'gyur ro// 
85b4(rgyud): dpal lha mo chen mo'i gzugs brnyan gyi mig la bskus na 'byung po thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur zhing las bgyi/ dab ci mchis zhes thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis
85b5(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// nag po chen po'i gzugs brnyan gyi dpral ba dang mig la bskus na gnod sbyin thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// mi ro'i mig la bskus na ldang bar 'gyur/ 
85b6(rgyud): gsang sngags dang / dug sbyar ma dang / byad kyis zin pa thams cad kyi mig la bskus na dug sbyar ma dang / byad dang / gsang sngags thams cad bshig par 'gyur zhing lan 'ga'
85b7(rgyud): yang slar zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur ro// bkres pa'i mig la bskus te grong du zhugs na bza' ba dang / btung ba'i sngon mo lhun gyis 'grub cing 'thob par 'gyuraro// bsod snyoms
85b8(rgyud): pa'i mig la bskus te bsod snyoms la mchis na kha zas sna tshogs mang po dang / yon phal po che 'thob par 'gyuraro// sme ba dang / ling rtog dang / rab rib dang / chu bur dang / mtshan mo
86a1(rgyud): 'thob pa dang / g.ya' ba dang / tshag po dang / mig gi rdzi ma rngub dang / mig slesme bo de dag thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// mig nad thams cad las sos par 'gyuraro// lha'i
86a2(rgyud): mig dag pa mdab bzang dang / mtshungs pa mdab bzang kyi mthong ba thob nas thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang / dbang du gyur nas nor rnyed pa dang / don grub pa dang yang thob nas dbang phyug
86a3(rgyud): bla na med par 'gyuraro// de nas nor dang / 'brud nga / gos dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan dang / rgyan 'phyang thams cad dgug pa dang / 'phel bar bgyid pa dang / don yod me lha dgug
86a4(rgyud): pa'i sbyin sreg rgya chen po brjod par bgyi'o// grub pa kun dgyi bla na med// don kun grub pas mod la ni// mkhangs rnams mchog tu dga' bar bgyid// dbang phyug skal
86a5(rgyud): pa phun sum tshogs// mod nyid kho nar 'thob 'gyur bar // the tshom du yang mi bgyi zhing // yid gnyis nyid kya nga ma lags so// gtsang mas gtsang ma'i gos dag dang // 
86a6(rgyud): legs par bkrus pas las sgrub bo// sbyin sreg bla na med 'phel ba// 'di ni rgya chen bsam mi khyab// ka ran rtsa ba sdong bur bcas// mdab ma me tog 'bras bur bcas// arga'i
86a7(rgyud): shing dang brag shing gi/ yam sreg dag gis me spar la// sa bon bdun po 'bras dang bcas// 'bras yos til dang yungs kar dang // zho dang sbrang rtsi mar dang ni// yungs mar
86a8(rgyud): ngag dang bsres pa yi// sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad tshang bgyi// khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis dbang bskur ba dang // de nas don yod lcags kyu'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po
86b1(rgyud): lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas gu gul dang / skye che'i 'bras bu dang mar du sbyar bas sbyin sreg bgyi'o// dgos pa thams cad rdzogs pa dang / de'i tshe bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / 
86b2(rgyud): gnas mal dang / stan dang / nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba 'phel bar yang 'gyu ro// gos sna tshogs dang / lngab lhub dang / rgyan
86b3(rgyud): dang / rgyan 'phyang dang / me tog dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams lhun gyis grub par 'byung bar 'gyuraro// dbang phyug gi 'byor pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur zhing ji srid 'tshe'i
86b4(rgyud): bar du mchis par 'gyuraro// de nas zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshe das brgyad la nyin zhag gcig mchis nas mig la ba skus te/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan dgu bcu bzlas
86b5(rgyud): brjod bgyis la khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur nas don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te/ de nas mig la mig sman gyis bskus na nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis
86b6(rgyud): mchis par 'gyur ro// mig sman grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi gtso bo rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyuraro// skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyuraro// bskal pa khrir 'tsho
86b7(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// mig sman 'dis mig la byugs na nyin par ji lta ba bzhin du mtshan mo mthong bar 'gyur zhing mi gda' bar yang 'gyuraro// 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gnas
86b8(rgyud): thams cad du zhugs na thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur ro// 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib me'i rgyal po// // bam po bdun pa// mig sman 'dis
87a1(rgyud): mig la blugs nas ma mo'i gnas su zhugs na/ lha gtso bo de dag mig mi 'dzums par lta bar bgyid pa la khro bo'i rgyal po lan gcig bzlas par bgyi'o// de nas ma
87a2(rgyud): mo dang lha'i gtso bo thams cad mdun du mchis nas mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// ji srid 'tshe'i bar du las thams cad sgrub par bgyid pas mchis par 'gyuraro// ma mo'i tshegs
87a3(rgyud): thams cad kyis yongs su bkur cing snying du sdug par 'gyur// rtag par rgyun tu srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir gnas shing rje su 'brang bar 'gyuraro// de nas gi'u wang sgrub pa'i
87a4(rgyud): sbyin sreg gi cho ga brjod par bgyi ste/ don yod rgyal po grub pa yis// rig sngags 'chang ba bde myong zhing / lha dang lha min mchod pa dang // sgrub pa'i don kun 'grub pa dang / 
87a5(rgyud): dbang du 'gyur ba dam pa dang // mkha' la mchi ba'i dam pa dang // mi snang shin tu rnyed dka' dang // modado la phug tu 'jug pa dang // nags kyi nang du 'jug pa dang // ri sul dag
87a6(rgyud): tu 'jug pa dang // thang dag la ni rgyu ba dang // klu gnas mtshor ni 'jug pa dang // de bzhin chu klung che bsgral dang // rdzu 'phrul grub dang skyed pa dang // de bzhin 'jigs dang sgrib kun dang // nad kun
87a7(rgyud): zhi bar bgyid pa nyid// sdig pa thams cad nyams par bgyid// g.yul ngor g.yul las rgyal bgyid de// rtag tu dgra kun brlag par bgyid// gdon rigs kun dag char gcod cing // rim
87a8(rgyud): rnams thams cad bzlog par bgyid// sngon gyi sgrib pa 'jig bgyid cing // sdig pa thams cad nyams par bgyid// dbang phyug stsol cing skal ba stsol// nor dang 'bru rnams 'phel bar
87b1(rgyud): bgyid/ 'thab pa 'thab mo rtsod pa dang // 'gyed pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid // btsang ba dngan shing sgrog dang // khong sgril lcags sgrog phye mar grog/ rgyal po gdug pa khros pa yis// bsad par
87b2(rgyud): 'os pa sel bar bgyid// da ltar 'di la bsten pa nas// mi bdag bu sdug bzhin smra zhing // mi bde kun las grol bar 'gyur// 'di ni kun tu sdug pa dang // gnas kun mchis par mchod par
87b3(rgyud): 'os// lus can snying du rtag tu sdug/ rgyal po btsun mo 'khor bcas pa'i// rtag tu gnang chen dag tu 'gyur// dge sbyong bram ze nyid dang ni// rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dmangs rigs dang / 
87b4(rgyud): bud med kun dang de bzhin du// skyes pa khye'u bu mo yi// / rtag tu gnang chen dag tu 'gyur// gi'u wang bran med pa po// 'di la gang dag rtag rten na// 'phags pa 'jig
87b5(rgyud): rten dbang phyug ste// mchog sbyin rtag tu mchod par rgyu // tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// nyin dang mtshan du srung ba dang // rtag tu mchog stsol phyir mchis so// 
87b6(rgyud): gzhan yang lha ni mang po dang // klu'i rgyal po mthu chen dang // 'byung po gnod sbyin srin po dang // grul bum mi min lto 'phye che// dri za lha min nyid dag dang // na mkha' lding dbang mthu chen
87b7(rgyud): te/ de dag thams cad srung ba yi// tshad du nyin dang mtshan dag tu// rang dbang nyid kyis gnas par 'gyur// gi wang grub pa dam pa po// de ltar stobs dang ldan pa lags// de nas rig sngag
87b8(rgyud): 'chang ba yis// gtsang gyur legs par khrus bgyis nas// gtsang ma yi ni gos bgo ste// gi wang legs par bsgrubs nas su// dmar po chen po nyid dag dang // gur gum dag dang
88a1(rgyud): mnyam sbyar la// zangs kyi snod du bkang nas su// don yod zhags pa'i gzugs mdun du// stong rtsa brgyad ni tshangs bzlas nas// rgya ngar gyis ni kha dgum mo// de nas seng rje
88a2(rgyud): gi shing dang // arga'i shing gi yam sreg shing gi me spar la/ 'bras yos dang yungs kar dang / gu gul dang / 'bras dang / til dang bsres la/ zho dang sbrang rtsi mar du bsres te lan stong rtsa
88a3(rgyud): brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o// lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / de nas me zhi zhing me mdag phra mo yang zhi ba dang thal ba blangs te/ snod kyi nang du stsal nas de nas slar yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
88a4(rgyud): la/ khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur te/ phyag rgya'i phyag rgya das kyang dbang bskur ro// de nas dpral ba'i dbus su the dag le bgyis nas nam mkha' la 'phur nas rig sngags
88a5(rgyud): 'chang chen po'i rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dpon por gyur zhing skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyuraro// lo dgu khri dgu stong du/ 
88a6(rgyud): 'tsho bar 'gyur zhing gnas kyi sgo thams cad rtag tu 'byed par 'gyuraro// dpral ba la theg le bgyis na mi gda' bar gyur nas gnas thams cad du zhugs na gnas thams cad kyi bdag por
88a7(rgyud): 'gyur zhing 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro// 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po mthu dang ldan pa thams cad kyis yongs su bskor/ 
88a8(rgyud): nas mchis par 'gyuraro// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyuraro// mig la bskus na ji ltar nyin par bzhin du mtshan mo snang zhing thams cad du gter mthong bar 'gyur ro// 
88b1(rgyud): sa'i phug dang / thang gi sgo phye ba mthong bar 'gyuro// thang gi gnas su zhugs nas thang gi dgos pa thams cad bgyi ste/ slar yang mchi bar 'gyuraro// chu klung chen po'i nang du zhugs na
88b2(rgyud): khyim dang gzhal med khang ji lta ba bzhin du mthong bar 'gyuraro// rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyur ro// chab la gnas pa gang lags pa de dag thad
88b3(rgyud): du dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyuraro// klu'i mtsho dang gnas su ji ltar rang gi khyim bzhin du 'jug cing 'byung bar 'gyuraro// lus mtha' dag byugs te g.yul ngor g.yul 'gyed
88b4(rgyud): pa'i nang du zhugs na ya lang dang go cha bgos pa bzhin du mthong nas thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// khar bsrel te rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na btsun mo 'khor
88b5(rgyud): dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// gang la tshig smras pa de dag thams cad bgyid par/ 'gyuraro// gang la blangs pa de dag thams cad ster bar
88b6(rgyud): 'gyuraro// gang la bsgo ba de thams cad bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyuraro// khar 'chos nas gang dang gang du mchis pa de dang der skyes pa dang bud med dang cas bu mo thams cad bdag
88b7(rgyud): nyid ngam/ nor dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// lag pa g.yas pa byugs nas su reg pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / bran po dang / bran mo dang / las bgyis
88b8(rgyud): pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / mngag gzhug pa rnams dbang du gyur nas bsgo ba bzhin mchis par 'gyur ro// mdzub mo g.yas pa la bskus na ser ba dang / sprin dang / 'brug gi dus su
89a1(rgyud): sprin la mngon sum du bstan te bsdigs na/ grang ba dang / rlung dang / ser ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyuraro// dpag tshad gcig kho ra khor yug tu zil gyis mnan par
89a2(rgyud): 'gyuraro// char ha cang ches na lag pa g.yas pa sprin la mngon sum du bstan pas ha cang char che ba gcod par 'gyuraro// char mi 'bab pa'i dus su lag pa g.yas pa'i lag mthil la/ 
89a3(rgyud): byugs nas klu gnas pa'i mtsho'i chu la thal mo lan gsum brdabs na de'i mo la klu'i rgyal pos char gyi rgyun chen po gtong bar 'gyuraro// gal te mod la char pa mi 'bebs na de'i tshe lan lnga
89a4(rgyud): brdeg pa dang / klu de dag thams cad kyis char gyi rgyun ga tong bar 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe char pa mi 'bebs pa de'i tshe klu thams cad las klad pa'i nad 'byung bar 'gyu ro// gal
89a5(rgyud): te lan bdun bsnun na klu'i rgyal po thams cad la tshul ma yin pa'i sdug bsngal 'byung bar 'gyuraro// klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi rig sngags phung bar bgyis par 'gyur ro// 
89a6(rgyud): gdon gyis zin pa thams cad kyi mig la bskus na/ bskus pa tsam gyi mdo la gdon brgyad khri bzhi stong rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// rims kyis thebs pa rnams kyi dpral ba la thig le bgyis na
89a7(rgyud): rims zhag gcig pa'am/ nyin gnyis pa 'am/ nyin gsum pa 'am/ nyin bzhi pa'i rims thams cad zhi bar 'gyuraro// nad kyis zin pa rnams la khrus bgyis na mod la nad thams cad
89a8(rgyud): las thar par 'gyu ro// sha bkra dang / mdze dang / rkang shu dang / g.yan pa dang / shu ba dang / 'brum bu rnams las thar par 'gyu ro// g.ya' ba dang / ldog pa dang / mtshan par rdol pa dang / 
89b1(rgyud): ba mched pa dang / 'brum bu phra mo mched pa la byugs pa tsam gyis thar par 'gyuraro// gdug pas zin pa thams cad la byugs pa tsam gyis mi gdugs par 'gyuraro// dug gis myos par bgyis pa
89b2(rgyud): thams cad la 'tshal ba tsam gyis thar par 'gyuraro// ljon pa dang / skran dang / dmu chu dang / mtshan pa na ba dang / rtsib logs na ba dang / snying na ba dang / chu so na ba dang / gzhang nad dang / tshad pa dang
89b3(rgyud): gcin srib dang / gsung pa dang / ma zhu ba dang / rtug skams la bsros nas 'tshal ba tsam gyi mod la zhi bar 'gyur zhing phyis lan 'ga' yang gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyuraro// mtshogs mar
89b4(rgyud): gi wang gi ril bu bgyis te/ phug gi sgo dang / nye bar ma dachis nas lag pa g.yas pa yang byugs te/ mgo la dathal mo brdabs na phug gi sgo thams cad 'bye bar 'gyur ro// 
89b5(rgyud): bag tsha ba ma mchis par 'jug ste/ slar cung zad kyang ba gegs bgyid par mi 'gyuraro// gnas de na gnas pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad dbang du gyur nas mdun na mchis
89b6(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// dgos pa sgrub pa chen po thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// rkang pa gnyis la byugs te/ me 'bar ba'i nang du zhugs na me lha rang gi gzugs kyi mdun du mchis nas lag pa nas
89b7(rgyud): bzung ste/ rig sngags 'chang la rig sngags 'chang bdag gi gzhal med khang gi gnas su zhugs shig/ rig sngags 'chang gis bsgo ba thams cad sgrub par bgyi'o zhes smra ba na/ de'i tshe
89b8(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gis bgyi ba ci mchis pa de bsgo bar bgyi ste/ thams cad bgyid par 'gyur// dpung pa gnyis la byugs na glang po che bdun gyi stobs dang ldan par 'gyuraro// berla gnyis la
90a1(rgyud): thugs na tshugs pa ma mchis pa'i gyang du 'gyuraro// byin pa gnyis la byugs na 'bab chu chen po'i pha rol tu rgal bar 'gyur ro// mgrin pa la byugs nas nags khung du zhugs na
90a2(rgyud): nags khung gi gnas kyi sgo thams cad bye nas sman gyi rdzas thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur te ci 'tshal ba de blang bar bgyi'o// gi wang gi ril bu bgyis te khar bsre
90a3(rgyud): nas ri sul dang / sman gshong du zhugs nas skad drag po lan gsum gdon par bgyi ste/ ri sul dang sman gshong gi gnas gsang ba'i sgo gang dag lags pa 'byer bar 'gyur zhing / de na
90a4(rgyud): gnas pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad rang rang gi ga/ zugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur zhing las tham/ sa cad bgyid par 'gyuraro// de nas rtsa dang shing gel ba dang / 
90a5(rgyud): nags tshang tshing gi sman gyi rdzas gang lags pa dag rang gi gzugs kyi mdun na mchis par 'gyur zhing / gang dag gi bcud kyi mchog de dag la 'dzag la/ bcud srung ba de dag kyang
90a6(rgyud): rang gi gzugs kyi mdun na mchis nas thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// ji ltar 'tshal ba bag tsha ba ma mchis par dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur// snying khar thig la bgyis nas snying
90a7(rgyud): la cung zad ci bsams pa dang / yid la bsams shing brnag pa'i dgos pa de dag thams cad mod la grub par 'gyur ro// lto la thig le bgyis na kha zas dang btung ba'i ston mo 'dod dgu thang
90a8(rgyud): thob par 'gyur te/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad lhun gyis 'grub par 'gyuraro// rtsib log gnyis la byugs na ji ltar bsams shing don du gnyer ba'i gos rnams 'thob par 'gyur
90b1(rgyud): skal tshigs la blugs na ji ltar yid la bsams pa'i mal dang / stan 'thob par 'gyuraro// rna ba la byugs sam/ gnang dang gnang thams cad kyi gnas su thugs na ji ltar bsams pa'i rgyan
90b2(rgyud): dang / lhab lhub thob par 'gyuraro// mjug do la byugs na rta'i bzhon pa thob par 'gyuraro// nyin gcig bzhin nang par tshig gzhan mi smra bar gi wang gi ril bu re re la don yod rgyal po'i snying po bzlas
90b3(rgyud): nas 'tshal te/ nyi ma dang po la tshigs su bcad pa stong bklags na 'dzin par 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin nyis 'gyur du bgyis nas 'dzin par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun gyis thogs pa mang por 'gyur
90b4(rgyud): zhag bcu bzhir bgyis na mi'am ci mo lta bu'i sgra dbyangs/ su 'gyuraro// zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bgyis na thos pa ba sags pa'i rgya mtsho chen por 'gyu ro// ka la bing ka'i dbyings
90b5(rgyud): ltar mnyen zhing snyan la rna ba'i sgra dbyangs su 'gyuraro// bu'i ched du mar dang lhan cig stsa lan bya rog lta bu dang mo sham rnams kyis kyang bu rnyed par 'gyu ro// brtson rar stsal ba dang / 
90b6(rgyud): shing sgrog dang / lcags sgrogs dang / gtan pa dang / khong sgril la byugs na byugs pa tsam gyis mod la dum bu dum bur 'chag par 'gyur ro// 'thor bar 'gyuraro// tshes brgyad dam/ bcu bzhi'am/ ches
90b7(rgyud): bco lnga la don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan bdun bzlas la khro bo'i rgyal pos rang la dbang bskur nas gi'u wang gi ril bu dang spos chab bsres pas khrus bgyi'o// khrus bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la sdig
90b8(rgyud): pa thams cad dang / sngon gyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyuraro// nub gsum du khrus bgyis na gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / sgrub pa dang / grub pa'i mchog thams cad thob par 'gyuraro// 
91a1(rgyud): pas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba dang / gdug pa dang / sdig pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// lan 'ga' yang thams cad kyis thams cad du 'jigs pa mi 'byung
91a2(rgyud): zhing yongs su thar par 'gyuraro// phyis lan 'ga' yang sdig pa'i dri mas gos par mi 'gyur ro// gi'u wang gi ril bu til mar dang bsres te kha gdong la byugs nas rgyal po'i mdun du mchis na
91a3(rgyud): bu bzhin du pang du 'khyud nas dga' ba chen po 'thob pa dang / rgyal po khro bo'i 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyuraro// lus thog thag tu byugs nas bsad par 'os pa'i lus la yang mtshon
91a4(rgyud): gyis phog par mi 'gyur te/ dum bu dum bur chags par 'gyur // mda' 'phangs na lus la 'bab par mi 'gyur zhing ga zhu 'chags par 'gyuraro// gi'u wang gi ril bu mgul du
91a5(rgyud): btags nas 'brog dgon pa dang / ri dang nags tshang tshing gi/ skrod dka' bar zhugs na chom po dang / g.yon can dang / rkun po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / mi dang / mi ma
91a6(rgyud): lags pa dang / gcan zan gdugs pa dang / sbrul gdug pa dang / dug gi 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ mi gda' bar 'gyuraro// dpung pa g.yas pa la btags na thams cad
91a7(rgyud): du pha rol las rgyal bar 'gyuraro// thams cad du mchod gnas chen por yang 'gyur ro// thams cad du mthu dang brtson 'grus chen po rdzib med pas pha rol zil gyis gnon par 'gyuraro// dpung pa
91a8(rgyud): g.yon pa la btags na skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad kyi gnang chen du 'gyur te/ thams cad lta 'tshal bar 'gyuraro// mchod pa'i 'os chen por 'gyuraro// dgos pa
91b1(rgyud): mang po 'grub par 'gyu ro// byin pa g.yas pa la btags na dub pa ma mchis par dpag tshad stong du mchis par 'gyur ro// gi ru wang gi ril bu khar bsrel lag pa g.yas pas yungs kar gyi
91b2(rgyud): don yod lcags kyu bzlas nas drangs te tshig gzhan mi smra bar gnas 'thon por 'dzegs te/ phyogs gang du bsams pa'i skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo mchis pa'i phyog/ 
91b3(rgyud): der yungs kar gyis gtor na mod la bkug par 'gyur te/ mchis par 'gyur ro// gal te dpag tshad brgya tsam na gnas pa zhig na yang gdon mi 'tshal bar de zhag gsum gyis mchig
91b4(rgyud): 'gyur te yid gnyis mi bgyi'o// lag pa g.yas pa'am / lag pa g.yon pa la gi'u wang gi ril bu btags na gang du reg par nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / nor
91b5(rgyud): dang / mu tig dang / shang ka shi la dang / byi ru dang / sa laM sbrum dang / dngul dang / gos dang / lhab lbub rA dag thams cad bkug nas mchi bar 'gyur te/ ci 'tshal
91b6(rgyud): ba de mchi bar 'gyuraro// bya tshang du zhugs nas chang mang gi sgor thal ma brdabs na 'chad pa dang / 'tshed pa'i kha zas de dag thams cad bkug nas mchis par 'gyur te/ gang du 'tshal ba
91b7(rgyud): der mchi bar 'gyur// spros 'tshong gi tsheng khang du mchis na tshong khang gi yo byad thams cad mchi bar 'gyur ro// chang 'tshong gi sgor thal mo brdabs na chang gi bum pa thams cad mchi bar
91b8(rgyud): 'gyuro// khang pa'i sgor thal mo brdabs na 'bru thams cad bkug par 'gyuraro// bcud 'byin pa'i khyim du zhugs nas 'khrul 'khor la reg par bgyid na bu ram gyi khu ba dang / sha kha ra'i
92a1(rgyud): grags bu thams cad mchi bar 'gyuraro// gang du 'tshal ba der mngags par 'gyuraro// grong khyer gyi sgor mun tshad tshub na thal mo brdabs na grong khyer na gnas pa thams
92a2(rgyud): cad gnyid bsgrogs par 'gyuraro// dgra bo'i sgor btab na bskrad par 'gyuraro// mtshon cha mkhan gyi khyim du 'phangs na mtshon cha dang / go cha rnams rengs pa dang / rmugs par bgyis
92a3(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// rgyal po'i sgor btab na phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba dang / sems can gdugs pa thams cad bcings pa dang / rengs pa dang / rmugs par bgyis par 'gyuraro// dung
92a4(rgyud): la byugs nas 'thon por bus na sgra gang du grag pa de dag tu 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa/  dang / byang dang / dug sbyar ma dang / dug dang / nad las
92a5(rgyud): yongs su thar par 'gyuraro// grong khyer gyi sgor bus na ya mas kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / mings thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyuraro// phyugs lhas su bus na'o mthang
92a6(rgyud): phrogs par 'gyuraro// gang du 'tshal ba der mchi bar 'gyuraro// ra lug gi lhas su bus nar lug gi 'o ma phrogs par 'gyur te/ gar 'tshal ba der 'chi bar 'gyu ro// skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i
92a7(rgyud): dbus su bus na thams cad sgren mor gyur nas gos thams cad bkug par 'gyuraro// rdza rnga la blugs te khyams mthon po'i steng du brdungs na grang ba dang / rlung dang / ser ba thams cad
92a8(rgyud): bcings pa dang bshig par 'gyur te/ tshugs par mi 'gyuro// dpag tshad brgya khor khor yug tu ser ba bkag par 'gyuraro// grong khyer ram yul 'khor mtha' dag tu bus na nad dang / 
92b1(rgyud): yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyuraro// 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyuraro// mings dang / mug ge'i 'jigs
92b2(rgyud): pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyuraro// gzhan yang dgos pa rnam pa sna tshogs brgya stong dag bgyid par 'gyur te/ thams cad la sbyar bar bgyi'o// de nas sems can thams la dang thun mong/ 
92b3(rgyud): bzhi ba dang / rgyas pa nad thams cad zhi bar bgyid cing sdig pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid pa/ yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ mug ge'i dgon pa thad
92b4(rgyud): rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang /  srin po dang / gdon dang / brjed byed thams cad brlag pa ngar bgyid pa brjod par bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang gtsang
92b5(rgyud): mar gyur pas legs par khrus bgyis te/ spos dri zhim pos lus byugs la gos gtsang ma bgos la spo/ sa dri zhim pos bsgos nas byams pa'i sems la mnyam
92b6(rgyud): par gzhag cing / sems can thams cad la lhag par brtse ba dang / snying rje chen pos snying gdungs pas sbyin sreg gi las 'di bgyi ste/ arga'i shing dang / sha ma'i shing dang / shing 'o ma can
92b7(rgyud): nam ji ltar yang byang chub kyi shing ste/ de dag gi yam sreg shing gis me spar la/ 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma'i ldum bu dang / mdab ma dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang
92b8(rgyud): mar du bsres par sbyin sreg bgyi'o// don yod zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ de nas don yod zhags pa khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur te/ don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgyas
93a1(rgyud): phyag rgya lan brgya rgya brgyad bcing ngo // de nas sbyin sreg gi dgos pa rnams mthar phyin pa'i mdo khon dngag chad gcig khor yug tu yams kyi na dang / gnod padang / 
93a2(rgyud): 'tshe ba dang / nad dang / mu ge'i dgon pa mi bzad pa dang / rang gi dpung dang / gzhan gyi dpung gi 'jigs pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang / chom
93a3(rgyud): po dang / g.yon can dang / rkun mo dang / gcan zan gdug pa can dang / sbrul dang / dug mi bzad pa dang / gdugs pa dang bcas pa'i srog chags kyi 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar
93a4(rgyud): 'gyuraro// mi tshugs par 'gyuraro// dpag tshad brgyar khor da yug tu rims mi 'byung ste/ gnod pas ma lags / nad kyis ma lags te/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 
93a5(rgyud): 'byung po dang / gdon rnams kyis mi tshugs te/ rab tu zhi bar 'gyuraro// 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / 'khrug pa dang / 
93a6(rgyud): skrod pa dang / mdangs gcod pa dang / 'ching ba dang / bsdigs pa rnams kyis mi tshugs te rab tu zhi bar 'gyuraro// sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyuraro// shin tu lo legs
93a7(rgyud): shing mdangs dga' la skye bo dang / mi mang pos rab tu gang zhing me tog dang / 'bras bu phun sum tshogs par 'gyuraro// nor dang / 'bru dang / lo tog rab tu mang po 'grub par
93a8(rgyud): 'gyur ro// shin tu ro dang ldan pa dang / shin tu smin pa dang / yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rtswa dang / shing gal ba dang / sman dang / nags tshang tshang dang / myu gu dang / rtsa
93b1(rgyud): bdang / 'bras bu bzang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// phyir zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yul den yang du mi mchi ba'i reg pa myong bar mi 'gyur ro// yul de na dge sbyong dang / bram ze
93b2(rgyud): dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams rtag tu nang ma mchis par 'gyuraro// bde bar tshor ba
93b3(rgyud): dang / yid la dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyuraro// byams pa dang / snying rje'i sems kyis gnas par 'gyur ro// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam/ 
93b4(rgyud): mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po de dag thams cad kyang legs par srung ba'i phyir rtag tu srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir dpag tshad
93b5(rgyud): brgya kho ra khor yug tu srung ba dang / yongs su bskyar ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su bgyid par 'gyur ro// rgyal po bzhi yang dpung dang bcas te/ 
93b6(rgyud): yongs su skyong ba dang / srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa bgyid par 'gyuraro// gdug pa thams cad bzlog pa dang / srung ba dang / yongs su skyong bar 'gyuraro// dbang
93b7(rgyud): phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po'i lha'i bu rnams rtag par rgyun tu srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa bgyid par 'gyuraro// lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu 'khor
93b8(rgyud): dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i tshogs kyi 'khor thams cad kyis yul de legs par bsrungs par 'gyur ro// gzi byin stsol bar 'gyur ro// 
94a1(rgyud): dpag tshad gcig kho ra khor yug tu sems can thams cad yongs su srung ba dang / yongasu skyong bar 'gyu ro// dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rjes
94a2(rgyud): rigs dang / dmang rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad la srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed pa bgyis par 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i las 'di'i mthus
94a3(rgyud): sems can thams cad sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yul de la dgongs par 'gyuraro// phyogs bcu'i
94a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' thams cad dang / byang nga chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad yang dag par dadagongs par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad la
94a5(rgyud): dbug 'byin par ston par 'tshal bar 'gyuraro// sems cadan thams cad yongs su bsrung ba'i don du nyi ma dang / zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs dang bcas pa legs par
94a6(rgyud): 'byor par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag par rgyun tu skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du dbugs 'byin
94a7(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// yongasu srung ba dang / yid kyi brnag pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bgyid par 'gyur te/ yang nas yang du blta bar 'gyuraro// de nas des sbyin sreg gi thal ba dang / 
94a8(rgyud): dri chu skyom bgyis te phyogs bzhi kun tu dbang bskur na mtshams chen po bcad pa bgyis par 'gyur ro// nad kyis zin pa thams cad kyi nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyuraro// rims
94b1(rgyud): thams cad la thig le bgyis na rims thams cad las thar par 'gyuraro// dri chab dang thal bas khrus bgyis na thams cad kyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur
94b2(rgyud): brtson ra na mchis pa'am/ phyag sbal na mchis pa'i gos la bskus pa na ral par 'gyuraro// gdug pas zin pa dang / dug gi myos pa thams cad la bskus na gdug par mi 'gyur ro// 
94b3(rgyud): me dgug pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga rdzogs s+ho// / de nas pad+ma rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir pad+ma'i rigs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i
94b4(rgyud): zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor cho ga zhib me'i rgyal po chen po brjod par bgyi ste/ 'di ni ma bsdu bus par las brgya stong bgyid par 'gyur ro// tshes
94b5(rgyud): grangs rgyu skar bzang po dang // shin tu bkra shis mchog da/ ge la// legs par khrus bgyis gos gtsang bgo// / byams pa'i sems la mnyam par bzhag/ sems
94b6(rgyud): can kun la brtse ba dang // snying rje dam pas rgyan pa dang // don yod zhags pa rig sngags che// grub pa bla med cho ga'i rgyal// bklags pas las rnams thams cad dag/ 'grub par
94b7(rgyud): bgyid de som nyid med// 'jig rten bla ma'i snying po dag/ de bzhin gang dag rtag brjod na// lus can rtag tu mchog sbyin gyis// phyag na pad+ma rtag tu 'gyur// ji ltar gang ga'i bye snyed kyi/ 
94b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong la// bsod nams phung po khri phrag skyed// dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs pa dang // sangs rgyas bya ba bgyid par 'gyur// bsnyung ba bgyis nas bzlas brjod gcig/ 
95a1(rgyud): mkhas pa'i mis ni brjod bgyis pa// dge slong pha dang dge slom// dge bsnyen po mos de bzhin du// bde ba can du myur du mchi// sdug bsngal mi bzang myong 'gyur ba'i/ 
95a2(rgyud): nyon mongs pa las thar par 'gyur// rtag tu sangs rgyas byang sems dag/ mthong bar 'gyur te som nyi med// de nas don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du bzlas brjod
95a3(rgyud): kyi cho ga brjod par bgyi ste// bzlas brjod kyi ni las bgyis na// rig sngags 'chang ba de nye 'grub// don yod zhags pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi// mdun du ba lha'i dkyil 'khor bgyi/ 
95a4(rgyud): gru bzhi kho ra khor yug tu// tshon rtsi dkar po zhib mo yis// gru bzhi lhag par thig gdab po// ngos bzhi rnam das su sgo bzhi dag/ dbus nas ngos bzhir bshis su
95a5(rgyud): dbab la tsan dan dkar pos bri ba ni// dkyil 'khor mchog la pad+ma dag/  mdab brgya gur gum gyis gtor cing // pad+ma'i ze ba'i dkyil dag tu// ma zhom pa
95a6(rgyud): yi bum pa ni// spos chab kyis ni bkang ba yi// yungs kar ldan pa bzhag par bgyi// a ga ru yi bdug pa dbul// bum pa gang ba dgod par bgyi// me tog sna tshogs rgyan
95a7(rgyud): par bgyi// mchod yon snod kyang bzhi bzhag go/ rig sngags 'chang ba gtsang gyur par// gtsang ma'i gos ni bgo bar bgyi// legs bkrus rnam par dag pa dang // gso sbyong / 
95a8(rgyud): dag ni blangs pa dang // dkar gsum zas ni 'tshal nas su// dus gsum du ni khrus bgyi'o// dus gsum bzlas brjod bgyi ba ni// don yod zhags pa'i snying po dag/ dus gsu
95b1(rgyud): du yang brgya rtsa brgyad// 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi/ mngon sum skyil mo krung bcas te// bzlas brjod phyag rgya bcings nas su// bgrang phreng dag ni blang bar bgyi// mdzub mo dag ni
95b2(rgyud): mthe bo dag/ brkyang nas zhi zhing dul ba yi// yid kyis byams sems mnyam par gzhag/ ting 'dzin brtan pas lus snyoms par// legs par bzhag ste zhi bar lta// tshig gzhan mi
95b3(rgyud): smra bzlas brjod bgyi// bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyi mod las chen po g.yo bar 'gyuraro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te phyag bgyis na sa chen po yang g.yo bar 'gyur ro// 
95b4(rgyud): brtan pa'i sems kyis skrag par mi bgyi'o// sems ca na thams cad la mchog tu brtse bas 'phags pa smra na ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod zhags pa zhabs pa
95b5(rgyud): mthong ba tsam du bris la/ ji tsam na khro bo'i rgyal po la/ na bdun bzlas so// lan bdun bzlas pa tsam rgya/ mdo las chen po g.yo zhing sgra 'byung bar 'gyuraro// 'phags
95b6(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dpral ba nas 'od zer byung nas kun tu snang bar 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang de yang cher snying dga' ba dang / bzhin 'dzum pa dang / shin tu rab
95b7(rgyud): tu dga' bas spu zing zhes bgyid par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gdong du lta bar bgyi ste/ gdong du bltas pa tsam gyi mod la bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras
95b8(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gi ngo g.yas pa nas legs so zhes bgyi ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyuraro// mig bsgyur bar bgyid cing kun tu leg so zhes bgyi ba'i sgra byung rig sngags 'chang gis
96a1(rgyud): sgribs pa thams cad rnam par dag pa thob nas lus yongs su dag pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba sa ya phrag brgya stong la dge ba'i
96a2(rgyud): rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis lta ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro// lus 'jam pa dang / shin tu gzhon sha chags pa dang mnyen par 'gyuraro// skra cung zad
96a3(rgyud): 'khyil ba dang mnyen pa dang / snyan pa'i tshig smra bar 'gyur ro// mig yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ lus yongs su dag pa dang / yid yongs su dag pa dang / gnyer ma dang / 
96a4(rgyud): skra skya bo spangs par 'gyuraro// sems can thams cadade la lta ba dag pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyuraro// ji tsam du 'dug ce na/ 'phags pa spyan ras
96a5(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs ston cing dbugs 'a byin par bgyid de/ lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor bzha gnas mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyuraro// nam mkha'
96a6(rgyud): la mchi ba'am/ mi gda' bar bgyi ba'am/ lha'i mig 'thob pa'am/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing lta ba'am/ ting nge 'dzin rab tu 'thob pa 'am/ gzungs rab tu 'thob pa'am/ don yod
96a7(rgyud): pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo 'grub pa'am/ gtsug lag smra ba'am/ gsang sngags smra ba 'am/ thos pa 'dzin pa nyid dam/ gter smra ba 'am/ nor sgyur ba smra ba 'am/ mig
96a8(rgyud): 'phrul smra ba 'am/ 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/ phug tu 'jug pa'am/ klu'i gnas su 'jug pa'am/ zhing smra ba 'am/ gnod sbyin dgug pa 'am/ srin po dgug pa'am/ ro langs
96b1(rgyud): bslang ba 'am/ nags khrod du 'jug pa 'am/ ri la rgyu ba'am/ grong khyer du 'jug pa 'am/ sman lta ba'i phyir 'jug pa 'am/ ral gri'i rig sngags 'chang nyid dam/ grub pa'i rig sngags
96b2(rgyud): 'chang nyid dam/ 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid dam/ rgyal po 'thob pa 'am/ yul 'thob pa'am/ yul gyi bdag po nyid dam/ dpung chen po rab tu gzhom pa'am/ bskrad pa 'am/ rgya
96b3(rgyud): mtshor 'jug pa de dag thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// dgos pa grub pa thams cad stsol bar 'gyur// ji ltar gang du 'tshal bar yongs su skyong bar 'gyuraro// mtshams ma mchis pa
96b4(rgyud): lnga rnams 'byang bar 'gyuraro// rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis ngan sems can thams cad la lta ba sgrib pa dang bral ba dag pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyuraro// mig
96b5(rgyud): sman sgrub par 'tshal bas des zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgya da la ldong ros kyi mig sman zangs kyi snod kyi nang du su/ la te/ tsan dan gyi dkyil 'khor bgyis la 'phags pa
96b6(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du bzhag nas/ legs par khrus bgyis te/ gos gtsang ma bsgos nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du skyil mo
96b7(rgyud): dkrung bcas te/ mchis nas bzlas brjod bgyi'o// don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya'i mtshams bcing bas mtshams bcing bar bgyi'o// khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas par bgyi'o// 
96b8(rgyud): zas dkar gsum 'tshal bar bgyi'o// rigs kyi bu pho 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang yang rung bas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyi bsnyen gnas la goms par bgyis nas bzlas
97a1(rgyud): brjod bgyi'o// bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyi mo la zangs kyi snod 'bar ba dang / rlangs pa dang / dbu ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de blangs nas mig la byugs na na mkha'
97a2(rgyud): la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchis nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyuraro// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnam mthong ba dang / rig sngags
97a3(rgyud): 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba chen por 'gyur ro// phug gi gnas phye ba thams cad mthong bar 'gyuraro// gter byung ba thams cad mthong bar 'gyuraro// lha'i gnas thams cad kyi sgo
97a4(rgyud): phye ba mthong bar 'gyuraro// gang du 'tshal ba der mchi bar 'gyuraro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / gdon dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / phas
97a5(rgyud): kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba thams cad mi gda' bar 'gyuraro// tshes brgyad dam/ bcu bzhi 'am/ bco lnga/ la tshig gzhan mi smra bar 'phags pa spyan ras
97a6(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du skyil mo krung bcas te mtshos nas lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
97a7(rgyud): dbang phyug lha'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor bzhag pa dang / dri med 'phags kyi lta ba'i cho 'phrul zhes bgyi ba'i ting
97a8(rgyud): nge 'dzin 'thob cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs pa'i byin gyis brlabs bkod pa yang dag par lta ba snang ba zhes bya ba'i rdzu 'phrul thob nas tshe'i tshad lha'i
97b1(rgyud): bskal bstong du 'gyuraro// bdag nyid lha'i rang bzhin thob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa
97b2(rgyud): rgyas 'od dpag med kyis dam pa'i chos kyi gtam gleng bar mdzad pa thos par 'gyur ro// bde ba can na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad bsu
97b3(rgyud): ba'i slad du lha'i gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyuraro// skra cung zang 'khyil par yang 'gyuro// pad+ma snang ba'i gzhal med khang zhes bgyi ba'i khang pa rtseg ma'i gzhal med khang
97b4(rgyud): mthong bar 'gyuraro// de nas rang gi lus rdo rje sra ba bdag nyid kyi snying po'i rang bzhin thob par 'tshal na rig sngag das 'chang des spos chab des bum pa bkang nas lan
97b5(rgyud): drug khri nyis steng bzlas brjod bgyis te/ byang chub sa mas dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du nyin zhag gcig mchis par 'gyur bas
97b6(rgyud): khrus bgyi'o// khrus bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la lus rdo rje las byung ba'i rang bzhin du 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de la gzigs par 'gyur ro// tshe lha'i lo khrir 'gyuraro// 
97b7(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / gdon thams cad dbang du 'gyuraro// lha dang / klu thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyuraro// 'jig rten pa'i dgos pa sgrub pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// dran pa
97b8(rgyud): tsam mam/ sems bskyed pa tsam gyi mod la gdon thams cad dang / brjed byed thams cad babs nas thams cad smra bar 'gyur te/ bden pa 'am/ mi bden pa'am/ yang dag pa
98a1(rgyud): 'am/ yang dag pa ma lags pa'am/ bskal pa dang ldan pa 'am/ bskal pa dang mi ldan pa 'am/ byung ba 'am/ ma byung ba 'am/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo// 
98a2(rgyud): legs pa de dag thams cad smra bar 'gyuraro// de la sogs te las bgyi ba thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// bran bzhin du las thams cad rtag tu bgyid par 'gyuraro// yang na 'jig rten thar
98a3(rgyud): so sor bsgral bar 'tshal ba'am/ thams cad dbang du gyur nas bzhag par 'tshal lam/ thams cad sems can dmyal ba'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten
98a4(rgyud): las thar par bgyi bar 'tshal lam/ don yod ye shes pa/ dkod pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'tshal la dam/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor sgrub par 'tshal
98a5(rgyud): lam/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo sgrub pa ra 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des gzugs brnya na so so ba bzhin du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
98a6(rgyud): phyug don yod pa'i gzugs su bgyis te/ ral pa'i thar tshugs dang / ri dgas e na ya'i lpags pas rgyan pa/ phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'tshang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 
98a7(rgyud): skyil mo krung ngam 'greng ba/ drung na nor bzang dbus mo g.yas pa phab pa/ g.yon na khro bo'i rgyal po gdong gyen du lta ba khro bo'i gzugs lag pa drug pa/ 'od dpag med kyi dbu rgyan thogs
98a8(rgyud): pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis klubs pa/ thams cad ring bsrel dang bcas par bgyi ste/ ri'i steng gi pad+ma'i stan la mchis par bgyi'o// gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ dus gsum
98b1(rgyud): du khrus bgyis nas nyin zhag gcig mchis te/ rig sngags 'chang gis pa'i rnam lngas nye reg bgyi'o// chab dang yungs dkar gyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// snying rje chen
98b2(rgyud): pos gdungs pa'i snying gis blta bar bgyi'o// gal te 'di lta bu'i cho gas mi bgyid na bklags pa tsam gyi mong la yang 'grub par 'gyur na/ bzlas brjod kyi las kyi cho gas lta smos kyang ci
98b3(rgyud): 'tshal/ yang rig sngags 'chang gang zhig/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ba phrag brgya bcu rtsa brgyad kyi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
98b4(rgyud): la mchod par 'tshal lam/ lta bar 'tshal lam/ dge ba/ 'i rtsa ba rgya chen po bskyed par 'tshal lam/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba la rab tu bzhag par
98b5(rgyud): 'tshal ba 'am/ thams cad kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag par bgyi ba ra 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang des/ dge slong pha' ma/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen pa'am/ dge bsnyen
98b6(rgyud): ma 'am/ rgyal po'am/ btsun mo 'am/ gzhan su yang rung bas thams cad cho ga 'di bzhin bgyis te/ des ci 'byor pa'i gser las don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyi'o// 
98b7(rgyud): de nas kha shar phyogs su bstan te bzhag la gur gum gyi dkyil 'khor bgyis te/ gru bzhi cha 'byes par li kris thig gdab par bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor dbus su pad+ma'i phreng ba bgyi'o// 
98b8(rgyud): pad+ma'i phreng ba'i dbusu ril ba spyi blugs dang bgrang phreng bzhag par bgyi'o// me tog sna tshogs kyis mdzes par bgyi'o// spos chab kyis bkang ba'i bum pa me tog ci 'byor pas legs
99a1(rgyud): par rgyan pa bzhi bzhag par bgyi'o// mchod yon gyi snod lnga bzhag par bgyi'o// pog phor lnga las a ga ru'i bdug pas bdug par bgyi'o// dris bsgos pa'i mar me
99a2(rgyud): bcu drug spar bar bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bgyi'o// me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba yang dbul bar bgyi'o// 'jig rten dbang
99a3(rgyud): phyug gi mdun du skyil mo krung bcas te/ mchis nas don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te/ bdag nyid la dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// khro bo'i rgyal po lan gcig bzlas par bgyi'o// 
99a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dmigs pa yid la ba gyis nas phyogs bcur yid kyis mchod cing phyag ba dgyi'o// bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings te/ bzlas
99a5(rgyud): brjod bgyi'o// bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis pa dang / sa chen po g.yos par 'gyuraro// bdag nyid dga' bar gyur nas 'bar bar mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa
99a6(rgyud): de dag thams cad kyang zhal mngon sum du ston pa nye bar ston par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ral pa'i gseb 'bar bar gyur nas leg so zhes bgyi ba'i sgra 'byung
99a7(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// lan brgya rtsa brgyad lan gnyis bzlas brjod bgyis na grub pa chen po'i rtags ston par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag brkyang nas rig sngags
99a8(rgyud): 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzigs pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyuraro// don yod zhags pa grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang bar
99b1(rgyud): 'gyuraro// nyi ma'i rtse na de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang mthong bar gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ston par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par
99b2(rgyud): 'gyuraro// brgya rtsa brgyad pa lan gsum bzlas na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs skya rengs 'char ka'i dus su mdun du mchis nas pad+ma dri ma med pa zhes bgyi ba'i
99b3(rgyud): zhags pa stsol bar 'gyuraro// grub pa thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// rgyal ba 'od dpag med kyang legaso zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyuraro// gang su yang rung bas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
99b4(rgyud): dbang phyug gi gzugs mthong na de ni de bzhin gshegs pa drug khri la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyuraro// de la lha/ thams cad dang / tshangs pa la sogs te dbang phyug dang / 
99b5(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po'i lha'i bu rnams rtag tu lta 'tshal 'gyuraro// nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyuraro// mchog tham sa cad yongasu rdzogs nas rtag tu rjesu 'brang zhing srung ba
99b6(rgyud): dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa dang / bgyid par 'gyuraro// sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyuraro// 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// / 
99b7(rgyud): bam po brgyad pa// des ci 'byor pa'i gser la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa byas la de nas zhal shar phyogs su bstan te bzhag la gur gum gyi
99b8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa legs par 'byes pa byas te/  li khris thib btab la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su pad+ma bri/ pad+ma'i dbus su ril ba bring ka ra dang / bgrang phreng bri/ me tog
100a1(rgyud): sna tshogs bkram la/ bum pa spos chus bkang ba/ me tog ci 'byor pas legs par brgyan pa bzhi gzhag/ mchod yon gyi snod lnga bzhag par bya zhing / phog
100a2(rgyud): por lnga nas a ka ru'i bdug pas gdug par bya'o// spos sna bcu drug dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bltam te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bya zhing / me
100a3(rgyud): tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dag kyang dbul bar bya'o// 'jig rten dbang phyug la mngon du phyogs te/ skyil mo krungs bcas la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings
100a4(rgyud): la bdag nyid la dbang bskur ro// khro bo'i rgyal po lan gci ngag bzlas la phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa tham sa cad yid la byas te/ yid kyis phyag byas la lus
100a5(rgyud): kyis kyang phyag byas te/ bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings la bzlas brjod bya'o// brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas sa chen po g.yo bar 'gyur zhing bdag nyid snying dga' la
100a6(rgyud): 'bar bar snang ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad zhal nye bar ston par mdzad do// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dbu ral pa'i gseb 'bar zhing leg so zhes
100a7(rgyud): bya ba'i sgra 'byung ngo // brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa gnyis pas ni dngos grub chen po'i mtshan ma ston to// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag brkyang ste/ rig sngags 'chang gi
100a8(rgyud): mgo'i spyi bor 'jog par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang la don yod pa'i zhags pa grub pa
100b1(rgyud): 'gyuraro/ tho rangs de bzhin gshegs pa de dag zhal ston par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ston par 'gyu ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan
100b2(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad gsum pas ni skya rengs shar ba'i dus kyi tshe 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na bzhugs te/ pad+ma'i
100b3(rgyud): dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i zhags pa sbyin par mdzad cing / dngos grub thams cad sbyin par mdzad do// rgyal ba 'od dpag med legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par mdzad do// gang la
100b4(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi skur bstan dpa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par 'gyur ro// lha
100b5(rgyud): thams cad dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i bu rnams rtag tu lus ston 'dod par 'gyuraro// nad thams cad dang
100b6(rgyud): bral bar 'gyur ba dang / mchog thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang zhing srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar byed par 'gyuraro// sdig pa thams cad
100b7(rgyud): dang bral bar 'gyur ro// de nas dngul las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gzugs snga ma bzhin du byas pa la tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor du
100b8(rgyud): tsan dan dkar po'i dri chab kyis bkang ba bzhag par bya zhing mchod yon gyi snod lnga bzhag par bgyi'o// me tog sna tshogs dkram zhing tsan dan dkar po'i bdug spos kyis bdugs te/ 'phags
101a1(rgyud): baspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bgyi'o// dri sna bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bltam par bya zhing / bdug spos kyi snod pan
101a2(rgyud): bcu bzhag par bgyi'o// khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag brgya
101a3(rgyud): lan bdun bcing ngo // bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya byas te/ skyil mo krung du 'dug la lag pa g.yon pa'i 'dzum mo brkyang ba pad+ma'i tshul du byas la bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad
101a4(rgyud): bya'o// lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / shar phyogadas nas legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra grag par 'gyur zhing bdag nyid dga' bar snang ngo // rgyal po blon po dang
101a5(rgyud): btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur te/ mang brjod pas dpag tshad stong nas 'ong bar 'gyur ro// thams cad bgyi ba ci mchis zhes bran bzhin du 'gyur ro// gang
101a6(rgyud): bsgo bde byed par 'gyuraro// de nyid bla mar 'gyur zhing cher mchod par 'gyur ro// brgya rtsa brgyad lan gnyis bzlas pas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / 
101a7(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / rlung lha la sogs pa dbang du 'gyur zhing bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro// gang bsgo ba byed par 'gyuro// rgyal po bzhi/ 
101a8(rgyud): 'khor gnod sbyin gyi tshogs dang bcas pa rnams dbang du 'gyur ro// brgya rtsa brgyad lan gsum bzlas pas nyi ma dang zla ba na mkha' las 'bab cing mdun na 'dug par 'gyuraro// 
101b1(rgyud): mtshan mo'i lha dang / nam mkha'i lha 'ongs nas mdun na 'dug par 'gyur zhing dbang du 'gyuraro// thams cad ci bgyi zhes pa'i bya ba byed cing 'dug par 'gyuraro// brgya rtsa brgyad
101b2(rgyud): lan bzhi bzlas pas klu thams cad dbang du byas par 'gyur te/ rgya mtsho'i klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo la sogs pa'i bar thams cad dbang du byas par 'gyur ro// zang
101b3(rgyud): las byas pa'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa la tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor byas te/ me tog dmar po bkram la bdug spos kyi snod bzhi nas
101b4(rgyud): bdug par bya zhing mtsham pa lnga bcu rtsa gnyis bltam par bya'o// mchod yon gyi snod bzhi bzhag la 'phagadas pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bya'o// khro
101b5(rgyud): po'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig rjes su dran par bya'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcing bar brgya 'o// ras la bris pa'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar skyil mo krung du
101b6(rgyud): 'dug ste/ sems can thams cad la dmigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la bya'o// phyogs bzhir byams pa'i lta bas blta bar bya'o// sems can dmyal ba dang / 
101b7(rgyud): gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha ma yin dang / yi dgas kyi yul thams cad yid la bya'o// sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad yid la bya zhing snying rje'i sems kyis blta bar bya'o// / 
101b8(rgyud): bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya pad+ma'i tshul du bcings te bzlas brjod bya'o// brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / phyogs bzhi g.yo zhing sgra grags par 'gyur la dmyal ba ba'i sems can
102a1(rgyud): de dag thams cad yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// dmyal ba'i sgo thams cad bcad par 'gyur zhing bcom pa dang thal bar brlag par 'gyur// dmyal
102a2(rgyud): ba'i sems can de dag bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyuraro// bdag nyid kyang byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyuraro// 
102a3(rgyud): lus kyang mtshan bzang pos rgyan par 'gyur zhing / sems can gang dag gis mthong ba de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyuraro// brgya rtsa brgyad lan gnyis bzlas brjod
102a4(rgyud): byas pas ni sa'i 'og gi sems can mun gnag pa snang ba dang bral ba de dag don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i mthus mun gnag dang bral bar 'gyur zhing 'od zer 'byung
102a5(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// yongs su grol ba'i sems can de dga'/ phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gan su brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing dga' ba dang 'chi ba spangs
102a6(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du kun nas mthu 'phags pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur zhing tshe bskal pa thub par 'gyur ro// shi nas
102a7(rgyud): bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyuraro// byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du de nyid kyi zhabs kyi drung na gnas par 'gyur zhing mya ngan thams cad dang bral bar 'gyuraro// / 
102a8(rgyud): tsan dan dkar po dang / gla rtsi dang / ga pur dang / spos kyi rigs sna tshogs gzhan dag phye ma zhib mor byas te/ yang legs par btags la/ kun du ru dang / sra rtsi pog dang / 
102b1(rgyud): gan d+ha ra sa dang / chu dang lhan cig sbyar te/ sha khar btab la legs par btags pa las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa sor bzhi pa'i chang du byas
102b2(rgyud): te rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa ral pa'i thor tshugs dang / e ne ya'i lpags pas bzhag pa/ phyag bdag gi cha lugs 'dzin pa/ phyag bzhi gcig na pad+ma thogs/ gnyis
102b3(rgyud): pa zhags pa thogs gsum pa gsal shing thogs/ bzhi pa dbug 'byin pa/ gdan pad+ma 'od kyi dkyil 'khor mdom gang gis brgyan par bya ste/ g.yas su 'phags ma sgrol
102b4(rgyud): ma g.yon du dri med 'gro bya'o// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi 'og tu ni khro bo'i rgyal po'o// gong du ni 'od dang / dag med do// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gre
102b5(rgyud): gtsang ma bgos te/ dus gsum du khrus bya zhing gos sum phrugs bsgos la ches brgyad nas tshes bco lnga 'i bar du dus gsum du bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o// 
102b6(rgyud): spos sna tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor byug par bya zhing mtshon sna lngas bri bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su don yod pa'i zhags pa dang / rig sngags kyi lha dbus mo gtsug te gyen du
102b7(rgyud): lta ba bri bar bya'o// grwa bzhir dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha bri bar bya'o// sgo bzhi'i cha 'byes par bya'o// dkyil 'khor khor
102b8(rgyud): yug tu pad+ma bri bar bya'o// grwa bzhir spos kyis bkang ba bzhag go// sgo bzhir dri dang / gtor ma dang / bum pa gang ba bzhag go// dkar gsum gyi gtor ma dang / mchod
103a1(rgyud): yon gyi sdong bzhag go// me tog sna tshogs dkram par byas zhing a ga ru dang / tsan dan gyi bdug pa dbul bar bya'o// spos sna brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang
103a2(rgyud): ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bltam par bya/ 'phan gdugs bzang po sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
103a3(rgyud): dbang phyug dkyil 'khor du zhal shar phyogs su bstan la mchod pa bya'o// ras kyi tshon skud sna lnga pa/ srid du khru bcu drug pa/ thor to gcig tu gser gyi yang mig/ thor to
103a4(rgyud): gcig tu mu tig gi chu na kor btags te/ sbrul 'khyi dal ba bzhin du skyil la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su da bzhag ste/ gtsang mas gos gtsang mas g.yog par
103a5(rgyud): bya'o// rig sngags 'chang dkyil 'khor la mtshan du phyogs te/ skyil mo krung du 'dug la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan sum cu rtsa gnyis bcing ba
103a6(rgyud): byas la bdag srung ngo // khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par byas la dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / phyogs bcing ba yang bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang
103a7(rgyud): gis bzhin 'dzum gyis rgyas par byas la bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings te/ mi smra bar yungs kar 'bru re re nas bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad brjod nas ras kyi srad bu'i steng du
103a8(rgyud): gtor bar bya ste/ stong rtsa brgyad chang pa dang ras kyi srad bu de 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / 'od zer sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyuraro// leg so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rig
103b1(rgyud): sngags 'chang legs so legs so// khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa grub kyis long la dgos pa thams cad byos shig/ khyod kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po gnyis don yod pa'i
103b2(rgyud): zhags pa pad+ma grub pas 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgos pa thams cad sgrub par 'gyu ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de yang 'bar bar 'gyuraro// 
103b3(rgyud): 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sku las spos kyi sprin chen po 'byung bar 'gyur te/ spos des dpag tshad drug tsam du khyab par byed do// gang la dri mnam pa tsam gyis nad thams cad dang bral bar
103b4(rgyud): 'gyuraro// sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ sdug bsngal gyi sgrib pa thams cad dang / byang dang / drug dang / dbyig dug dang / phye ma'i sbyor ba rnams 'jug par
103b5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// lus thams cad dri ma med par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyang rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i zhags
103b6(rgyud): pa de blangs la zangs kyi ga ba che bzang po'i nang du bcug ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du bzhag par bya'o// nam dgos pa byung ba'i tshe gtsang mas khrus
103b7(rgyud): legs par bya ste blangs par bya zhing dgos par bya'o// nyin re zhing dus gsum du mchod par bya'o// rig sngags 'chang de yang na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur zhing lus yongs su
103b8(rgyud): dag par sngon gyi rig sngags 'chang rnams dang lhan cig rtse zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// tshe lo stong thub par 'gyur te/ shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams
104a1(rgyud): su skal ba mnyam pa rnams kyi nang du pad+ma'i snying po la brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur/ 
104a2(rgyud): byang chub kyi snying po la mthar thug gi bar du tshe bskal pa brgya phrag stong thub par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de yang gang gis mthong ba tsam gyis mtshams med
104a3(rgyud): pa lnga la sogs pa zad par 'gyuraro// sna ma'i me tog la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la re re nas dbul bar bya ste/ brgya rtsa
104a4(rgyud): brgyad tshang ba dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / btsun mo/ de'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyuraro// rang nyi dad nor dang bcas/ dbyig dang bcas/ 'bru dang
104a5(rgyud): bcas/ bran po dang bcas/ bran mo dang bcas te las bya da par 'gyur ro// sna ma'i me tog snying pa de ba sdus la/ gla rtsi dang / pri yang ku dang / rgya spos dang
104a6(rgyud): ru rta dang / gur gum dang / spang spos dang / sA ma ka dang / smrig ka dang / na la da dang / bol dang / yungs kar rnams zhib tu btags pa'i phye mchar pa'i chu dang
104a7(rgyud): sbyar ba'i bu ni dug med par byed pa'i mchog pad+ma zhes bya ste/ thog mar grags pa dang dpal du byed/ nad thams cad sel ba dang / rims nad thams cad nye bar sel
104a8(rgyud): bar byed do// brtsog shu dang / 'bras dang / me dpal dang / rkang shu dang / phol mig dang / ldog pa dang / de thams cad la ni bskus na bde bar zhi bar 'gyur ro zhes gsu
104b1(rgyud): nang de dag thams cad la khrus byas na sdig pa sel to zhes thub pas gsung ngo // tshe sbyin par byed/ rgyal po dag yul sbyin par byed do// thig le byas te g.yul ngor song na thams ca
104b2(rgyud): las rtag tu rgyal ba dang / bud med rnams dga' ba dang / dbang du 'gyur bar byed pa'i mchog yin no// byad 'joms shing dug dang / dbyig dang / bye ma'i dug dang / 
104b3(rgyud): gsang sngags kyi sbyor ba byas pa dag kyang de bzhin no// zas za ba dang khrus byed pa na thig le'i byug pa rtag tu byas na de thams cad las 'gro ba rnams bde bar thar par 'gyuraro// 
104b4(rgyud): zhes 'jig rten dbang phyug gsung ngo // klad pa'i nad mi bza dad pa la ni drug par bya'o// mig na bal ni mig sman gyi thur mas so// son ba la ni khar mur ro// 
104b5(rgyud): ljon pa la ni chu dron dang ngo // rtsib logs na ba la ni mar dang / zug go// yan lag dang nyin lag na ba la na bsku bar bya'o// dbang du bya ba la ni lag mthil la
104b6(rgyud): bsku bas so// nad tshabs po che la ni sku mnye dang khrus bya'o// gnod sbyin gyi gdon bsal ba la ni sna nas btang ba'i las bya'o// bdug pas ni gdon thams cad las
104b7(rgyud): rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// rgyas thebs pa rnams la ni mchogs mar thig le bya'o// snying na ba la ni chu dron dang lan tsha bsres pa'o// khyim zhi bar bya ba ni 'bras yos
104b8(rgyud): dang gsum sbyar bas zhi ba chen por 'gyuraro// thams cad du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas so// 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa rnams la ni ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byas la me tog
105a1(rgyud): bkram ste/ dri chus bkang ba bzhi bzhag cing 'o mas bkang ba bzhi dang / mchod yon gyi snod bzhi dang / pog por bzhag ste/ a ga ru dang / du ru kas
105a2(rgyud): bdug go/ gu gul la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te bdug par bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dri chab kyis mchod par bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal po yungs kar la
105a3(rgyud): lan rgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan dgu bcu rtsa gcig bzlas na 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa rnams la smra ba'i mchog tu
105a4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// g.yul 'gyed pa las rgyal bar 'gyuraro// rang gi dpung dang / gzhan gyi dpung yan lag bzhi/ pa thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// gal te brgya
105a5(rgyud): byin rang dang lha ma yin lhan cig pas kyang ma yin la/ mi rnams kyis lta ci smos/ brgya byin dgug sa par 'dod na pad+ma la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ brgya
105a6(rgyud): byin gyi ming nas brjod la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la re re nas dbul bar bya zhing dri chab kyang dbul lo// gu gul dang / mar dang / yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa
105a7(rgyud): brgyad bzlas te/ shing arka'i me spar la tshes bcu bzhi la sbyin bsreg bya'o// bzlas brjod kyi cho ga rdzogs pa dang / brgya byin lha'i dbang po dpung dang bzhon par bcas pa 'ongs
105a8(rgyud): nas mdun du 'dug ste/ bsgo ba bzhin byed cing thams cad du 'gyuraro// brgya byin gyi go 'phangs ma gtogs pa gang bslangs pa de sbyin par byed de/ de ni sems mi bzad do// tshangs pa
105b1(rgyud): rdog pas mnan te/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / tshangs pa rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du 'dug ste/ mchog thams cad sbyin par byed do// yid la
105b2(rgyud): 'dod pa sgrub par byed do// gu gul la lan dgu bcu bzlas te khyab 'jug la 'dug cing / chu dang yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te spyi bor gtor na khyab 'jug rang gi gzugs
105b3(rgyud): kyis mdun na 'dug cing las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// gzugs sna tshogs kyi bar du ston to// hi ran n+ya ka shi bu la yang sbyin par byed cing khyab 'jug chen po'i stobs kyi shugs
105b4(rgyud): dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dbang phyug chen po'i zhal ma dathong bar 'dod na rna ba g.yas par lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas/ 
105b5(rgyud): spyi bor gtor ro// gu gul gyi bdug pas bdug cing arga'i chu la lan bdun bzlas te dbul bar bya'o// de nas dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs 'gul bar 'gyur zhing
105b6(rgyud): logs so zhes bya bar sgra 'byung ngo // de nas dbang phyug chen po rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug par 'gyur zhing rang gi tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// 
105b7(rgyud): 'dod pa'i mchog thams cad sbyin par byed do// mchog gang 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par byed do// nag po chen po dgug par 'dod pas gu gul la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
105b8(rgyud): te/ khrag dang chang dbul bar bya zhing yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas nag po chen po'i steng du gtor na khugs par 'gyur te/ bran bzhin du las thams cad byed pa
106a1(rgyud): 'gyur zhing gar mngags pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro// 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad kyi sgo bye bar 'gyur
106a2(rgyud): zhing gang 'dod pa byed do// thams cad byams par 'gyur zhing las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// mi smra bar mtshan mo'i dus mtshams gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa re re bzlas na ma
106a3(rgyud): mo'i lha 'khor dang bcas pa dang / mtshan mo rgyu ba dang / nyin par rgyu ba'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phya
106a4(rgyud): chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/ da las thams cad byed par 'gyuraro// thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis rtag tu mdun na nye bar gnas so// 
106a5(rgyud): mtshan mo longs spyad par gzhal med khang thams cad sbyin parabyed do// gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ khrus legs par byas nas bden par smra zhing byams
106a6(rgyud): pa'i sems nye bar gzhag nas sems can thams cad la rtag tu brtse ba dang / snying rje chen pos lhag par dmigs te bzlas brjod rtag tu bya'o// bzlas brjod kyi cho ga rim par phye
106a7(rgyud): ba'o// de nas rtag tu las thams cad byed pa/ dge ba zhi pa/ rgyas pa/ drag shul spyod pa/ srung ba/ nad thams cad sel ba/ byad 'jig pa/ dbang du byed pa/ sbyin sreg gi cho ga
106a8(rgyud): bshad par bya'o// khyim srung bar 'dod pas arga'i yam sreg shing dang / pad+ma dang / yungs mar bsres pa las sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i
106b1(rgyud): sring po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na khyim chen po bsrungs par 'gyur ro// 'bab pa dang / cod pa dang / khrag khrug
106b2(rgyud): thams cad dang / byer rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba thams cad dang / rims thams cad dang / yams kyi nad dang / nad 'go ba thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang / mu ga na
106b3(rgyud): dgon pa dang / mi ngas dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu me'i mings thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyang srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sgra
