106b4(rgyud): babyed par 'gyuraro// dbang phyug dang dbang phyug chen po yang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang rtag tu rgyun mi
106b5(rgyud): 'chad par sku ston bzhed par 'gyur ro// sbyin sreg gi ma ra dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul gi sgyu na sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na yul dang / yul
106b6(rgyud): 'khor dang / grong khyer dang / yul gru dang / ri khrod dang / ljongs rnams zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar zla banya
106b7(rgyud): la me tog dkar po dang / gan d+ha bri yang ku dang / rgya spos rnams yungs mar dang bsres te sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na rgyal po bran po dang btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / 
106b8(rgyud): yul gru dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / ba lang dang / mahe rnams dbang du 'gyur ro// shing a pa marga'i ye sreg shong
108a1(rgyud): zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang mar bsres pa dang / me tog dkar po rnams la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na yul gru stong thob par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras
108a2(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang mar bsres pa dang / pad+ma'i sdong po'i yam sreg shing rnams las brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na mtshan mo zad pa dang di na ra
108a3(rgyud): brgyad brgya 'thob par 'gyuraro// me tog ku mu da dang / pad+ma sdong bu dang / rtsa ba dang / mdab mar bcas pa dang / yungs kar bsres te shing seng ldeng gi me spar la sbyin sreg brgya
108a4(rgyud): rtsa brgyad byas na log 'dren thams cad las yongs su dgrol bar 'gyuraro// zla ba yar gyi ngos tshes brgyad la bsrung ba byas te/ gtsang mas khrus legs par byas la/ 
108a5(rgyud): gos dkar po bgos te tsan dan dang / pri yang ku shing dang / 'bras yos dang / mar dang / yungs kar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na nam phyed
108a6(rgyud): dus su gnod sbyin mo 'ongs nas zong lnga stong sbyin par 'gyur ro// zla ba mar gyi ngo'i tshe sa bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig bsnyungs pa byas te/ rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung gi 'gra
108a7(rgyud): du song la shing bil ba'i me sbar te/ bal ba'i me tog dang / mar dang sbrang rtsi bsres pa stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na de'i 'og tu gnod sbyin mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa 'ong bar
108a8(rgyud): 'gyuraro// nam phyed na rin po che'i za ma tog thogs nas 'ong bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang des blang bar bya'o// gdong du mig blta bar mi bya'o// yang brgya rtsa brgya
108b1(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas pa dang / rkang pa'i drung du snod bor nas btung de rig sngags 'chang 'gum mo zhes zer ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis khro bo'i rgyal po la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byar
108b2(rgyud): de nas gang gi tshe dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe nam phyed na lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na gnod sbyin mo 'ongs par 'gyur te/ dgos pa thams cad byed cing bran bzhin du las thams
108b3(rgyud): cad byed par 'gyur ro// zla ba mar gyi ngo'i tshe sa bcu bzhi la gang na gter yod pa der song ste/ stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la gtor ma'i cho ga yang bzhag par bya/ 
108b4(rgyud): zhing 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa la mchod pa bya das la sna ma'i me tog dang pad+ma'i mdab mang dang / yungs kar dang / mar bsres pa rnams las sbyin
108b5(rgyud): sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas te/ chu dang / yungs kar/ la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas nas sa/ la brdabs na de'i 'og tu gter thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur
108b6(rgyud): te blangs la dkon mchog gsum gyi sku skal dbul bar bya zhing lhag ma rang gis blang bar bya'o// ba ru ra'i shing gi mo s+phar la til dang / 'bras so ba dang / mar bsres pa
108b7(rgyud): las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa dang / nor dang 'bru dang bcas pa dang / 
108b8(rgyud): dbyig dang gser dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gnas par 'gyuro// yungs kar dkar po dang / tsam pa ka'i me tog dang / pad+ma'i yam
109a1(rgyud): sreg shing dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na yul thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing bud med dang / skyes pa dang / 
109a2(rgyud): khye'u dang / bu mo dbang du 'gyur ro// 'bras phub lan tshwa dang ldan pa las lan dgu bcu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten dbang du 'gyu ro// a ga ti'i shing gri
109a3(rgyud): me sbar la sbrang rtsi dang / mar bsres pa dang / arga'i me tog las sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas na nyin re zhing di na ra
109a4(rgyud): brgya 'thob par 'gyuraro// pa la sha'i yam sreg shing dang / 'bras yos las sbyin sreg stong rtsab rgyang byas na gser brgya phrag stong 'thob par 'gyur te/ 
109a5(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa bya zhing bgo bsha' byas na yang 'byung bar 'gyuraro// tshes bco lnga zla ba nyal bsnyung ba byas te/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung
109a6(rgyud): ngam chu klung chen po'i nang rked pa nub tsam du zhugs te/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ yul kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas khros pas chu klung de la brdab par/ 
109a7(rgyud): bya'o// de nas chu'i nang nas bu mo zhig byung nas rin po che mang po dag sbyin par byed de blangs la/ phyed kyis dkon mchog gsum mchod par bya zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
109a8(rgyud): dbang phyug la yang mchod par bya'o// tshes bco lnga zla ba nyal bsnang ba byas te/ nam phyed na bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas
109b1(rgyud): nas a pa marga'i yam sreg shing dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang / sra rtsi pog bsres pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la rang gi ming gis sbyin sreg stong byas na sdig pa
109b2(rgyud): thams cad las grol bar 'gyur zhing nad thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / mi mdza' ba thams cad 'jigs par
109b3(rgyud): 'gyuraro// shing arga dang / til dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul dang mar bsres pa las sbyin sreg byas na zhi ba chen por 'gyuraro// 'bras yos dang / 'o ma dang mar
109b4(rgyud): dang / yungs kar dang / tsan dan dkar po bsres pa/ las sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na rgyas pa dang / mchog tu dge bar 'gyur ro// tshes bcu bzhi la/ ka/ 
109b5(rgyud): ra bi ra'i me tog dang / lan tshwa sna bdun bsres pa dang shing tsher ma can gyi yam sreg shing yungs mar la bsres pas drag shul spyod pa bya'o// mar mi 'bab
109b6(rgyud): pa'i tshe pad+ma dang / tsan dan dang / yungs kar dang / mar bsres pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na khro bo'i gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas
109b7(rgyud): na ji srid 'dod pa de srid du char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro// thal ba de blangs la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te na mkha' la gtor na ha cang char che ba zhi bar 'gyur ro// 
109b8(rgyud): phyogs bzhir gtor na mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyuraro// sprin la mngon du phyogs te gtor na rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro// gzhan gyi sde
110a1(rgyud): mnan pa ni til dang / 'bras so ba'i sbyin sreg gis so// pha rol gyi dpung bzlog pa ni sa bon bdun gyi sbyin sreg gis so// phug sgrub pa ni shing arga
110a2(rgyud): sbyin sreg gis so// arga'i lo ma dang mar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg byas na phug gi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyu ro// nags su 'gro ba'i tshe ku mud dang / rgya spos dang / yungs/ 
110a3(rgyud): kar dang / mar bsres pas nags kyi phug gi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur zhing sman gyi dngos po thams cad rang bzhin du gnas par 'gyuraro// shing pa la sha'i me spar te na le
110a4(rgyud): sham brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na brgya byin dang / tshang sa pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang 8/ nyi ma 'ongs nas mdun na 'gyuraro// sna ma'i me tog
110a5(rgyud): dang / kar ni kA ra'i me tog dang / ud pa la rnam sa mar dang bsres pa las sbyin sreg brgya stong byas na/ zla ba dang / nyi ma 'ongs nas mchog sbyin zhing lus la
110a6(rgyud): 'od zer btang nas na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyuraro// a shwad thas yam sreg shing byas la shu ti dang / nyi'u shing dang / arga dang / tsan dan dang / yungs kar dang / nas dang
110a7(rgyud): mar bsres pa las nyi ma bdun gyi dus mtshams gsum du sbyin sreg nyi shu rtsa gcig byas na rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro// gdon dang / gnod sbyin dang / 
110a8(rgyud): srin po thams cad chad pas bcad na 'bras so ba dang / yungs kar dang / lan tshwa'i sbyin sreg bgyis te thams cad la don yod pa'i zhags pa bcing bar bya zhing khro bo'i phyag rgya
110b1(rgyud): dang gsang sngags lhan cig rjes su dran par bya'o// sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o// de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga'i rgyal po chen po ras kyi gzugs mthong ba tsam gyi mang/ 
110b2(rgyud): la mnar med pa'i mthar thug pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga byang bar 'gyur bar bshad par bya ste/ ras khru khru bani lham pa/ kha tshar ma chad pa/ sgra med pa/ thag ran pa
110b3(rgyud): ba/ shin tu dkar ba/ shin tu sbyangs pa la ri mo mkhan mi smra ba'i dka' thub can/ bsnyen gnas la gnas pa gnang mas gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ zas dkar gsum tha
110b4(rgyud): ba/ dus gsum du khrus byas pa/ lhag ma ma yin/ pa'i tshon rtsi'i snod sar pa bzhag ste/ pi ra sar pas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhengs pa'i
110b5(rgyud): bzhugs pa'am/ skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa bri bar bya ste/ ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis rgyan pa/ e ne ya'i lpags pa bsnams pa/ phyugs bdag gi cha lugs
110b6(rgyud): 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag bcu drug pa/ zhal zhi ba/ spyan phye ba/ dbu rgyan la rgyal ba 'od dpag med bzhugs pa/ zhal g.yas pa'i thor tshugs la zla
110b7(rgyud): tshes kyis rgyan pa/ phyag gnyis rdo rje'i thal mo sbyar ba las gyen du pad+ma'i tshul du bya'o// phyag gnyis thur du kun tu zhal gyi phyag rgya bya'o// phyag gnyis bzlas brjod kyi/ 
110b8(rgyud): phyag rgya byas la/ mdzub mo g.yas pa brkyang ste/ pad+ma'i tshul du byas la bar na bgrang phreng 'dzin par bya'o// phyag gnyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bya'o// 
111a1(rgyud): phyag gcig na rtse gsum gnyis pa na pad+ma gsum pa na don yod pa'i zhags pa'i glegs bam/ bzhi pa don yod pa'i zhags pa/ zhags pa
111a2(rgyud): tha mal pa 'dra ba/ lnga pa dbugs 'byin pa/ drug pa na ril ba spyi blugs/ bdun pa na rin po che sna tshogs kyis bkang ba'i snod/ brgyad pa na me tog sna tshogs kyi snod thog/ 
111a3(rgyud): par bya zhing / 'od mdom gang gis rgyan pa/ sku me tog sna tshogs kyi bkra bas mdzes par bya'o// ri po Ta la'i khang pa brtsegs pa shin tu mdzes pa/ gru bzhi lham pa/ 1
111a4(rgyud): ba bzhi zugs pa/ khri 'phang stegs bu mdzes pa dang / ldan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis mdzes par// rgyan pa/ pad+ma'i phreng bas mdzes par byas pa/ rdo
111a5(rgyud): rje'i phreng bas rgyan pa/ me tog sna tshogs dang / chu shi nga gi yal gas mdzes par byas pa/ g.yas la gas kyi steng na nyi ma/ g.yon logs na zla ba/ 
111a6(rgyud): gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dag lag na me tog sna tshogs mang po thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par bya'o// ri pad+ma 'dra ba zhig snying pos mdzes par
111a7(rgyud): byas shing / sdong po dang ldan pa/ mtshes mdzes par byas pa/ mtsho nyas gang zhing chu srin ma ka ra dang / bzhad dang / shang shang te'u dang / ngur pas rgyan pa/ nor bu rin po/ 
111a8(rgyud): che sna tshogs kyis legs par rgyan pa'i ri de'i steng du pad+ma'i gdan dang seng ge'i khri bya'o// g.yas phyogs kyi phyi rol khang pa'i gnas su dbang phyug bya'o// g.yon du dbang phyug chen
111b1(rgyud): po rgyan thams cad kyi brgyan par bya'o// nang gi gnas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go// g.yas su 'phags ma sgrol ma lus btud de 'dzem bag dang bcas pa bya'o// 
111b2(rgyud): g.yon du dri med 'gro lag pa dbugs 'byin pa dang / nor bzang pus mo btsugs pa bya'o// pad+ma'i snying po'i dbus su gnas su khro bo'i rgyal po khros pa'i gzugs can
111b3(rgyud): lag pa bzhi pa lag na mtshon cha thogs pa te/ zhags pa dang / dbyug to dang / rtse gsum dang / pad+ma'o// pad+ma'i stan la skyil mo krung phyed bcas la/ lus cung zad btud
111b4(rgyud): pa mgo'i steng g.yas g.yon du drang song bstod rabs bya dad pa bya'o// de nas 'og gi g.yas g.yon durje'i zom chen po lag na rdo rje'i tshogs mang po 'dug pa
111b5(rgyud): dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / rlung lha dang / dbang po dang / lha'i tshogs dag bya'o// g.yas phyogs kyi mtsho dang / ri'i bar du brgya byin dang tshangs
111b6(rgyud): pa bya'o// g.yon phyogs su rgyal po chen po bzhi go cha bgos pa bya'o// de'i 'og tu pho nya mo pad+ma'i rigs mdzes ma lag pa 'brel bar bya'o// lha mo chen mo dpal
111b7(rgyud): dang / dbyangs ldan ma dang / 'jigs byed ma dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo dang / sa'i lha mo dang / lo tog gi lha mo bya'o// dbang phyug gi drung du khro gnyer
111b8(rgyud): can bya'o// dbang phyug chen po'i drung du gos dkar mo'o// ri dang pho nya mo'i bar du srin mo ral pa gcig ma'o// ri'i khor yug gru bzhi rin po che sna bdun gyis spras pa bya zhing
112a1(rgyud): ljon shing dang / lcug ma sna tshogs gis rgyan dang mche'u mdzes pa me tog sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ seng ge dang / stag gis gang ba dang / klu'i phrug gu dang / 
112a2(rgyud): grul bum dag bya'o// g.yon du gsang ba chen po lnga bya'o// 'og tu klu'i rgyal po lnga bya'o// thams cad brag gi stan dang / lag na rin po che'i me tog gi bor ba thogs te/ 
112a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la lta bar bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du rig sngags 'chang dbus mo gtsugs te/ lag na me tog dang / pog por
112a4(rgyud): thogs pa bcom ldan 'das la blta bar bya'o// sted dgi bang rim du thub pa chen po rgyal ba 'od dpag med/ da shAkya'i rgyal po dang / 'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal po bya'o// 
112a5(rgyud): ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba tsam gyi mdo la tshe rab brgya stong du mnar med pa bsags pa dang / mtsha/ mas med pa lnga'i las byed pa de dag thams cad 'jig
112a6(rgyud): par 'gyur/ rnam par 'jig par 'gyur zhing sems can de dag thams cad kyang yongasu grol bar 'gyur na sems can dag pa rnams lta ci smos/ dad pas mos pa rnams
112a7(rgyud): dang / dkon mchog gsum mchod pa don du gnyer ba de dag ni tshe 'di nyid la 'bras bu che ba dang / phan yon mang po dag tu shes par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i
112a8(rgyud): klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur zhing de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur// ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba/ 
112b1(rgyud): ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dngos su mthong ba yin no// ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba tsam gyis 'phags pa spyan ras
112b2(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug dgongs par 'gyur zhing sku yang ston par 'gyuraro// nyam thag pa tsam gyi mdo la sku ston par 'gyur zhing mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro// don yod
112b3(rgyud): pa'i zhags pa'i gzungs kyi snying po 'grub par 'gyuraro// nad kyis thebs pa dang / nad tshabs chen pos gzir ba dang / nad sna tshogs dang / sdug bsngal brgya stong
112b4(rgyud): gis dkrug pa de dag thams cad mthong ba tsam gyi mdal nad thams cad dang sdug bsngal thams cadadadang / gnod pa thams cad las yongasu grol bar
112b5(rgyud): 'gyur zhing sgrib pa dang / nad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa dag kyang / mthong ba tsam gyi mod la yongasu grol bar 'gyur ro// 
112b6(rgyud): ras kyi sku gzugs 'di 'khor mang pos mchod pa dang bkur sti chen po dang / sol snyan dkrol ba mang po dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyis legs par
112b7(rgyud): rgyan par byas te/ grong khyer chen po'am/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ ljongs sam/ khyim mam/ grong du zhugs na ras kyi sku gzugs gzhugs
112b8(rgyud): pa tsam gyi mod la 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab mo dang / khrag khrug dang / mu ga'i dgon pa dang / mings dang / rang gi dpung dang / gzhan gyi dpung gis
113a1(rgyud): 'jigs pa zhi bar 'gyuraro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / srul po dang / lus srul po dang / skem byed dang / brjed
113a2(rgyud): byed dang / grib gnon zhi bar 'gyur zhing / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / dga' ba dang / mi mang po bde ba mang bar 'gyuraro// dga' ba dang / yid bde ba mang bar 'gyuraro// 
113a3(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// 'di mthong ba tsam gyis shi 'phos nas thams cad bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro// bskal pa
113a4(rgyud): stong phrag bdun du tshe rab su tshe rab dran par 'gyuraro// pad+ma'i 'od dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
113a5(rgyud): chen pos ma thob pa thob par 'gyuraro// pad+ma rab tu ga nas pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags 'chang gis 'khoralos bsgyur ba nyid 'thob par 'gyuraro// ri mo'i sku gzug
113a6(rgyud): sgrub pa'i cho ga dang / cho ga zhib mo'o// de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo chen po'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ chu klung gi 'gram mam/ pad+ma'i mche'u
113a7(rgyud): 'am/ ud pa la'i mtshe'u 'am/ me tog gi skyes mos tshal lam/ 'bras bu'i kun dga' ra ba 'am/ khang bzangs gzhi dag cing sa gzhi yongs su sbyangs pa rtsa dang / 
113a8(rgyud): shing bal dang / skra dang / phub ma dang / sol ba dang / phyag dar gyi phung po dang / gyo mo dang / shing dang / bong ba dang / gseg ma dang / thod pa'i rus gang ba dang / shi ba'i
113b1(rgyud): ro rnams spangs pa'i sa gzhi'i phyogs na mtshe'u dang / 'bab chu dang / 'bab chu byang phyogs nas 'bab pa dang / nye ba na chu yod cing shin tu mdzes pa/ lho phyogs dang / byang phyogs
113b2(rgyud): dang / nub phyogs dang / shar phyogs gang na ljon shing gis mdzes par byas pa/ gang nyams dga' ba/ kha dog dang / gzi byin du ldan pa'i gnas de lta bu rnyed nas chu dang / 
113b3(rgyud): yungs kar la bzlas te kun tu gtor ro// sa gzhi de lta bu sbyang ba ni mchog yin no// khro bo'i rgyal pos yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te phyogs bzhir gtor na
113b4(rgyud): kun nas dpag tshad brgya tshun chad phyogs bcing ba dang // dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / mtshams bcing pa bya/  das par 'gyuraro// sdang ba thams cad dang / bgegs
113b5(rgyud): dang / log 'dren thams cad kyi skad cig kyang mi gan sa par phyogs bzhir byer te dong ngo // srog chag sa sdang ba dang / sdang ba'i sems dang / sdang ba'i
113b6(rgyud): gcan zan khro bo gang yin pa de dag thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing lha thams cad srung bar 'gyur// gnas kyi phyogs der mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bya ste/ gru bzhi
113b7(rgyud): lham pa ngos re re zhing khru sum cu rtsa gnyis gzhal bar bya ste/ cha 'byes pa gru bzhi cha mnyam zhing mdzes la sgo bzhi dang / rta babs bzhir ldan pa/ 'bras kyi phye ma'i tshen
113b8(rgyud): sna bzhir sbyar la de nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste/ tshon sna lnga'i thog skud kyis thig btab nas tsan dan dkar po'i phur bu btab ste/ zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad dam/ ches
114a1(rgyud): bco lnga la tshes grangs dang / rgyu skar bzang po gdams te/ dkyil 'khor gyi mchog bri bar bya'o// dang po ni dkar pos dri'o// gnyis pa ni
114a2(rgyud): dmar pos so// gsum pa ni ser pos so// bzhi pa ni nam mkha'i kha dog gis so// lnga pa ni mig sman gyi kha dog gis te/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying po 'jigs pa
114a3(rgyud): med par cha rnam par mdzes shing gsal bar pir sar pa dang / tshen dang / snod sar pas bri bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi snying por pad+ma mdab ma stong pa kho ra khor yug stegs bu/ 
114a4(rgyud): dang bcas pa bri zhing / pad+ma'i phreng ba tshon gyis mdzes pa bris la de'i dbus su sangs rgyas bcom lda na 'das thub pa chen po shAkya'i rgyal po dang / 'od dpag
114a5(rgyud): med dang / 'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal po gzhag go/ g.yas su mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug don yod pa 'i zhags pa'i cha byad 'chang ba gsang sngags kyi rjes su
114a6(rgyud): 'brang ba bya'o// g.yon du phyag na rdo rje rnga yab dang rdo rje thogs pa bzhini khro gnyer can/ 'od 'bar bas bskor ba'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drung du lha
114a7(rgyud): mo sgrol ma dang / dri med 'od 'phro/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu dkar sham chen po dang / gos dkar mo dang / dkar mo chen mo lag na dbyug pa dang / 
114a8(rgyud): ril ba spyi blugs thogs pa'o// de'i 'og tu srin mo ral pa gcig pa mche ba gtsigs pa/ thod pa'i phreng ba thogs pa sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa/ lag pa bzhi pa
114b1(rgyud): lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis na rdo rje dang / dgra sta dang / g.yas pa'i gung mo lha dang log 'dren la bsdigs par bya'o// g.yon du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bram
114b2(rgyud): ze'i cha lugs 'chang ba ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis bzhugs pa/ 'od dpag med kyi thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa bya'o// g.yas g.yon du dbang phyug dang dbang phyug chen po bya'o// 
114b3(rgyud): de'i 'og tu dpal lha mo dang / lha mo dbyangs can ma dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo dang / sa'i lha mo dang / lo tog gi lha mo dang / 'bras bu dang me tog gi lha mo bya'o// de'i 'og
114b4(rgyud): tu khor yug tu gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / rlung lha la sogs pa bya'o// ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis rgyan dpa'i drang srong bzhags par bya'o// glar rgyal po bzhi
114b5(rgyud): go cha bgos pa bzhag par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i dbus dang bar bar du lcags kyur dang / dgra sta dang / rdo rje dang / dbyug pa dang / zhags pa dang / 
114b6(rgyud): lcags sgrog bya'o// phyi rol tu tshangs pa dang / drag po dang / lha mo u ma dang / tshangs pa'i drung du lha dbyangs ldan ma khros pa'i gzugs can no// de dag gnyis kyi bar du
114b7(rgyud): dbyug pa dang / ril ba spyi blugs bri bar bya'o// grwa gcig tu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi rnam grangs bzhag go// grwa gcig tu shi bA ba
114b8(rgyud): ha bzhag go// de nas shar phyogs kyi sgor khro bo rta mgrin 'jigs su rung ba'i mig can bzhag go// lho phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje chen po ki li ki la zhes bya ba/ rdo rje rnam par 'dren pa/ 
115a1(rgyud): lag na rdo rje dang / dgra sta dang / zhags pa thogs par bya'o// nub phyogs kyi sgor pho nya mo pad+ma rigs mdzes ma lag pa pad+ma'i rtse mo nas 'dzin par bya'o// 
115a2(rgyud): byang phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje chen po zom zhes bya ba'i tshogs lag na rdo rje dang / zhags pa thogs par bya'o// de nas 'jug pa'i sgo nas gser gyi bum pa spos chus bkang ste/ dar las/ 
115a3(rgyud): bcings la rnam pa thams cad dang / me tog gi phreng bas brgyan nas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag ste/ steng du sna ma'i me tog gi gdu bu bzhag
115a4(rgyud): par bya'o// tsan dan dang / gur gum dang / gla rtsi dang / ga pur gyi chu dang / bog por bzhi bzhag cing / a dag ru'i bdug pas bdug go// tshon sna lnga'i ras kyi srad
115a5(rgyud): bu mchod phyir gyi srad bu tshad du byas la/ gser gyi yang mig rtse gsum can gdags par bya zhing / thorato gcig tu me tog pad+ma'i gdub 'khor dang mu tig dang / 
115a6(rgyud): rin po ches spras pa zlum por bskyil ba bum pa'i steng du bzhag la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byas te/ yungs dkar la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad
115a7(rgyud): bzlas te de la gdab par bya'o// tsan dan dang / ga pur dang / gla rtsi'i phye mas bgos la bgo bar bya'o// sgo bzhi'i gnas su dri chab kyis bkang ba'i bum pa dang / zas dkar
115a8(rgyud): gsum gyi gtor ma bzhag par bya zhing / gser dngul gyi mchod yon gyi snod sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / spos chus bkang ba brgyad dang / spos chu dkar pos bkang ba brgyad
115b1(rgyud): bzhag par bya'o// ro dang / dri sna tshogs kyis bkang ba brgyad dang / zho dang 'o ma dang / spos chus bkang ba brgyad dang / gtor ma la sogs pa dbul ba sna brgyad dang / dbul ba sna
115b2(rgyud): drug cu rtsa bzhi pa rnams sha dang / khrag dang / srun dong dang ke ke'u dang / kha zas ngan pa dang / gtung ba ngan pa spangs te gtsang mas gtsang ma sbyar bar bya'o// me tog sna tshogs
115b3(rgyud): kyi gcal dkram par bya zhing gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lda ldi dang / ba dan gyis brgyan par bya/ pog por sum cu rtsa gnyis bzhag par bya zhing bdug spos sna tshogs mang pos
115b4(rgyud): gdug par bya/ spos sna brgyad dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bltam par bya/ dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu pad+ma'i phreng ba bri bar bya'o// rig sngags 'chang
115b5(rgyud): gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya zhing dus gsum/ du khrus byas la/ gos gsum bgo bar bya/ grogs gtsang ma bsgrub par bya'o// 'jug pa'i cho ga
115b6(rgyud): byas pa nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying pos dbang bskur ba'i bar tsam gyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs gzung zhing 'jig rten mgon pos byin gyis brlabs pa dang / 
115b7(rgyud): pad+ma'i rigs pad+ma 'chang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i dngos grub la mngon du phyogs par 'gyur ro// gang bsams pa thams cad de kho na/ 
115b8(rgyud): bzhin byed par 'gyur ro// dam tshig thams cad la don yod par 'jug go// chos nyid thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos la dam tshig grub
116a1(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// las kyi sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba dang / bde ba thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro zhing lha dang / mi'i dpal thams cad myong bar
116a2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// lha dang / lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i tshogs kyi bsgo skal la dbang bar 'gyuraro// rnal 'byor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags la brten/ 
116a3(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// bdeg pa dang / spyo ba dang / phur bus gdab pa dang / sreg pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / g.yeng ba dang / bsad pa dang / dbang du bya bas mi tshugs so// 
116a4(rgyud): gang dag de lta bu byed pa de nyid kyi lus sam mgol brgya phra/ dag stong gyur du 'bab par 'gyur zhing gzhan gyis phyir ba/ zlas cing grol bar mi nus te/ rig sngags 'chang / 
116a5(rgyud): des dgrol bar bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang des ri mo'i gzugs de dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs pa ra bzhag nas don yod pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas
116a6(rgyud): la/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan brgya rtsa brgyad bcing bar bya zhing khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bya'o// de'i 'og tu dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams las 'od
116a7(rgyud): zer kha dog sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyuraro// bum pa de yang 'bar la ras kyi sku gzugs de yang kha dog sna bdun du 'bar zhing shas cher 'gul bar 'gyur te/ khro bo'i rig sngags/ 
116a8(rgyud): 'chang snying dga' bar 'gyur zhing ras kyi sku gzugs las zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang leg so leg so// khyod kyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
116b1(rgyud): don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po grub cing khyod kyis zhags pa 'di yang grub khyod kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhags pa'i mchog 'di yang grub kyis las thams cad byos shig/ de dkyil
116b2(rgyud): 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa mchog grub nas bum pa spos chus bkang ba de blangs la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ rgyu skar rgyal la khrus byas pa'am/ zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes grangs shis pa
116b3(rgyud): la khrus byas pa tsam gyi mod la/ lus thams cad dri ma med cing yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur zhing / dngos po lnga'i bdag nyid yongs su dag par 'gyur te rna ba lnga yongs su
116b4(rgyud): dag pa dang / mig lnga yongs su dag pa dang / sna lnga yongs su dag pa dang / lce lnga yongs su dag pa dang // rnam par shes pa lnga yongs su dag pa dang / dbang po lnga
116b5(rgyud): yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mchog sbyin par 'gyurazhing rtag tu sku ston bzhed par yang 'gyu ro// de bzhin
116b6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad zhal ston par 'gyuraro// rtag tu byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dgongs par 'gyuraro// lha thams cad kyang de la srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba byed par
116b7(rgyud): 'gyuraro// brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa dag kyang 'ong bar 'gyuraro// rgyal po bzhi dpung gi 'khor dang bcas te sa'i phyogs der 'ong bar 'gyur zhing / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung
116b8(rgyud): pa dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba byed par 'gyuraro// sred med kyi bu dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / nor bu bzang po dang / gsang ba pa brgya stong phrag du ma srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba byed
117a1(rgyud): byed par 'gyur zhing zhi ba dang / bde leg su 'gyuraro// shes pa don yod pa dang / shes rab don yod pa dang / thos pa dang / tshul khrims dang / brtson 'grus thob par
117a2(rgyud): 'gyur zhing sbyin pa don yod pa'i sbyin par 'gyuraro// bsod nams kyi phung po don yod pa dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / 'di lta ste pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// rdzu 'phrul
117a3(rgyud): dpag tu med pa la mkhas par yang 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang gi cho ga zhib mo yang 'grub par 'gyuraro// stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa don yod par 'gyuraro// 
117a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma sa ya snyed sa ya brgya phrag stong drug cu rtsa bzhin
117a5(rgyud): dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu rdzogs pa yang dag par gzung bar/ 'gyuraro// sems can thams cad kyis kyang mchod/ pa dang / bkur sti bya bar 'gyur zhing thams cad dbang du
117a6(rgyud): 'gyuraro// mchod rten gyi snying po dang 'dra bar phyag bya ba'i 'os su 'gyuraro// dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo'o// 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib me'i rgyal po/ 
117a7(rgyud): bam po dgu pa// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas dbus mo/ 
117a8(rgyud): g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar te btud nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
117b1(rgyud): zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la pad+ma'i rigs la rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga/ rig
117b2(rgyud): sngags chen po'i rim par phye ba cho ga zhib mo don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar de bdag gis yongasu bsgrag pa
117b3(rgyud): bgyi'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhin 'dzum pas bcom ldan 'das la lta bzhin du don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di smras so// 
117b4(rgyud): nam stAM yad d+ha nu ga ta pra tiSh+Thi te b+h+yaHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twe b+h+yaHna ma pra t+ye ka bud+d+har+ya shrA ba ka saM g+he b+h+yaHa tI tA nu ga/ tA prat+yud pa na ne b+h+yaHna maHsamyak+ka tA nA ma/ na maH
117b5(rgyud): sa myaka pra ti pan nA nA/ na maHshA ra dA tI pu tA ya ma hA ma ta ye/ na maHAr+ya mai tre ya pra mu khe b+ho/ ma hA bo d+ha satra Ar+ya ga Na ba re b+h+yaHna maHAr+ya a mi tA b+hA ya/ 
117b6(rgyud): thA ga tA ya ar+d+ha te sa myag+na bud d+ha ya/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHAr+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ be d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA ma trA ya/ ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/ ma hA ri ShaM Ar+ya ga Na be re b+h+yaH
117b7(rgyud): na ma s+thi tA Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa ra mu kho d+hIr+t+ta a mo g+ha rA dza na nA ma hr-i da yan ta thA ga tA sa mu khaM b+hA Shi ta ma hA tAM pa Nan+ma d+h+yeH/ a hi mi dA nI mA bar+t+ta yi Sh+Ta mi sid+d+ha tu me man+t+ra pa dA/ sarba
117b8(rgyud): kAR+Sha Ni/ sar+b+ba b+ha ye b+h+yo ma ma sar+b+ba satwA nAny+tsa rak+Sha b+ha ba tu/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ bi ri bai re/ pi ri bai ri/ tsi ra tsa re/ pa ra ma hA/ 
118a1(rgyud): / ru NIk+Sha/ sau sa ra/ bar ba rba/ #tshar/ ma hA bad+ma haste/ ka la ka la/ ka ma~M ki li/ ku lu ga lu/ mahA shud sAsatwa/ e h+ye hi/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ 
118a2(rgyud): d+hA ba d+hA ba/ ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni/ ku Nu ku Nu/ pa ra ma shud d+ha satwa/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ ma hA sA ma prAp+tA/ tsa la tsa la/ sany+tsa la sany+tsa la/ bi tsa la bi tsa la/ 
118a3(rgyud): e Ta Ta e Ta Ta/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ e h+ye hi/ ma hA ka ru Ni ka/ ma hA pa shu pa ti be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+he ra/ sa ra sa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ha hA ha hA/ 
118a4(rgyud): ha hI hi hI/ hu hwA hu hU/ oM kA ra ma hA brah+ma be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ra d+ha ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ da sa ra sa ra/ pa ra pa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ba rang /

118a6(rgyud): su ruta tsu ru tsu ru/ pu ru pu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ sa nad ku mA ra/ ru dra/ bA sa ba/ biSh+Nu/ d+ha na da de ba ri Shi nA ya ka/ ma hu bi bi d+ha be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra
118a7(rgyud): tha ra tha ra/ g+ha ra g+ha ra/ ya ra ya ra/ la ra la ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ma ra ma ra/ pa ra pa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ba ra dA ya ka sa man ta a ba lo ki ta/ lo ke shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ mu hu mu hu/ mu ru mu ru
118a8(rgyud): mu ya mu ya/ muny+tsa muny+tsa as \u0f7fba lo ki te shwa ra/ rak+Sha rak+Sha ma sar+b+ba sa twA sh+tsa/ sar+b+ba b+ha ye b+h+yaHsar+b+bo ba sarge b+h+yaHsar+b+ba gra he b+h+yaHsar+b+ba dz+wa re b+h+yaHe wa ba d+ha/ ban+d+ha na/ tA Da na/ 
118b1(rgyud): tardzan/ rA dza/ tsaur/ taska ra/ ag+ne/ ud ka/ biSha shas+t+ra/ pa ri mo tsaka/ ka Na kaN/ kaNi ka Ni/ ku Nu ku Nu/ tsar tsa ra/ in dr-i ya ba la bo d+h+ya ga tsa trar Ar+tha sad t+ya/ sau pra kA sha ka/ ta
118b2(rgyud): ma tam/ dmangam/ sam sa ma/ sam sa ma/ mahAta man d+hak+Shar/ bid+ha man ba d+ha man/ lan+dA ra mi tA pa pU ra ka/ mi li mi lo/ rbarbarbaT+Ta/ ma mdzaH/  dza Ti/ Te rbanuH/ 
118b3(rgyud): e Ne ya tsar+b+ba kri ta pa ri ka ra/ e h+ye he/ A shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra ma hA b+hu ta ga Na b+hany+dza ka/ ku ru ku ru/ pa ra pa ra/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ma Ta maT/ bi shud+d+ha/ bi Sha ya ni bA si na/ ma hA ka/ 
118b4(rgyud): ru Ni ka shwe te ya dz+nyo pa bI ta/ rad na mu ku Ta mA lA d+ha ra/ sar+b+ba dz+nyA shir si kr-i ta ma gu Ta/ ma had b+hU ta/ ka ma la dkri ta kar ta la/ d+h+ya na sa mA d+hi bi mo k+Sha a pra kam+b+ha/ bahu
118b5(rgyud): satwa san+ta ti pa ri pA tsa ka/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ sar+b+ba kar+m+ma A ba ra Na bo sho d+ha ka/ sar+b+ba byA d+hi pra mo tsa ka/ sar+b+ba A shA pa ri pU ra ka/ sar+b+ba satwa sa mA shrI sa ka/ 
118b6(rgyud): na mo stu te swA hA// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di bshad pa tsam gyis 'khor
118b7(rgyud): mang bai ri dang nags tshal du bcas pa 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// 'jig rten du snang ba chen po byung bar gyur to// lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pun da ri
118b8(rgyud): ka dang / man da ra ba'i me tog gi char chen pos pus mo nub pa tsam bab par gyur to// sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa'i sgra dag kyang byung bar gyur to// mtho ris kyi lha dag gis kyang
119a1(rgyud): nam mkha' las bcom ldan 'das la rgyan dang / ljab lhub dag gi char phab bo// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na gnas pa'i/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za
119a2(rgyud): dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / gtsang ma de dag thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sems can dag pa chen po legs so/ 
119a3(rgyud): legs so// yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba 'di bshad cing / dngos grub mchog gi cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po 'di bshad pas
119a4(rgyud): rin po che'i char chen po 'bab po zhes zer ro// de nas / de'i phyir dus gsum du bzlas brjod bya zhing gtsang ma// sa gos gtsang ma bgos te/ dus gsum du khrus bya
119a5(rgyud): zhing zas dkar gsum za bas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar dpal lha mo bzhag ste/ mchod pa byas la yungs kar 'bru re re la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
119a6(rgyud): nas dpal lha mo la bsnun pa byas na tshes bcu bzhi nas bco lnga'i bar du dpal lha mo 'ong bar 'gyur ro// mtshams med pa lnga 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
119a7(rgyud): phyug sku ston par 'gyur// sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyuraro// mtshams bcad pa dang / zhi bar bya ba la a ga ru dang / tsan dan gyi bdug spos bsregs la thal ba dang / yungs
119a8(rgyud): kar dang / seng ldeng gi phur bu gdab par bya'o// rims thams cad la bu mo gtsang mas bkal ba'i srad bu la mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bor la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te btag
119b1(rgyud): na rims thams cad las thar par 'gyuraro// nad thams cad la mar dang til mar las bzlas te zangs kyi snod du sangs rgyas la phul ba'i sna ma'i me tog snying po dang / pad+ma ze ba dang bca
119b2(rgyud): pa btab ste bcos pa 'di ni grub pa yin te/ zas dang / skom dang / bsku ba dang / sna nas btang ba'i las bya ste/ nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas nad thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// 
119b3(rgyud): byang bcad na mar dang sbrang rtsil lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te lus la bsku zhing tshigs mas dril la/ lus kyi dri ma phyin par bya ste/ gong bu las gzugs brnyan byas la lan
119b4(rgyud): bdun bzlas te mtshon gyis btab nas dug sbyar ma dang / byad dang / gsang sngags thams cad bcad par 'gyur zhing nad thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// byang chen mo
119b5(rgyud): 'jig par 'gyuraro// srung ba'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te de bzhin du mdud pa dor ba byas na srung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa dang / skrag pa
119b6(rgyud): dang / dngang pa thams cad dang / 'byung po'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs so// ljon pa la tshwa chu 'jam tsam la lan bdun bzlas te byin na lto ba'i nad 'jig par 'gyur ro// 
119b7(rgyud): dug gsod na chu la lan bdun bzlas te byin na dug thams cad 'jig par 'gyur zhing mi gdug par 'gyur ro// mig na ba la srad bu dkar po rna ba la btags na mi nad thams cad 'jig
119b8(rgyud): par 'gyu ro// sdang ba'i dug mi bzad pa la 'jim pa la bzlas te byug pa byas na dug med par 'gyuraro// so na ba la ka ra bi ra'i so shing ngam/ sna ma'i so shing ngam/ shing ba gu'i
120a1(rgyud): so shing la bzlas te zos na nang zhi bar 'gyuraro// mtshams bcad pa thams cad ni tshon sna lnga'i srad bu byas la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ seng ldeng gi
120a2(rgyud): phur bu bzhi la btags te phyogs bzhir btsugs na mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyuraro// gdon thams cad la tshon skud sna lnga'i srang bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na gdon thams
120a3(rgyud): cad la thar par 'gyuraro// srog chags kI Ta dang / lhog pa dang mgul pa 'gags pa la sbrang rtsi pi pi ling ldan par byas te byug go// mgul 'gags pa la bldag pa byas na mgun
120a4(rgyud): 'gags pa thams cad la thar par 'gyuraro// mig na/ dang la spos chu dang / shing ba la sha'i chu dang / pa la sha dme tog gi sa bkru bar bya ba 'am/ shing mngar gyi chu la
120a5(rgyud): lan bdun bzlas te bkrus na mig nad thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// rna ba na ba la til mar dang shu ti za sa kyi snod du/ bcos pas rna ba bkang na rna nad las thar
120a6(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / khrag 'khrug dang / mi snyan pa thams cad la chu la lan bdun bzlas te gdong bkru ba byas na thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// dpu nga dang / 
120a7(rgyud): stobs dang / yul dang / yul 'khor dang / phyir rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba thams cad dang / g.yul ngo thams cad du ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byas la bum pa gang ba bzhi bzhag
120a8(rgyud): ste/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la a ka ru'i bdug pa dbul bar bya zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i mdo 'di mtsho/ 
120b1(rgyud): de bklags pa byas na zhi ba chen por 'gyur te/ thams cad byams pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i yid du 'gyur zhing thams cad du rgyal ba thob par 'gyuraro// zhi ba chen por 'gyuraro// chu des
120b2(rgyud): bdag nyid la kun tu gtor te tsan dan la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te snying khar thig le byas te/ rtag tu dran par byas na mtshams med pa thams cad zad par 'gyuraro// khyim thams
120b3(rgyud): cad srung na tshon sna lnga'i srad bu byas la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi la btags te/ phyogs bzhir btsugs na mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro// gdon/ 
120b4(rgyud): thams cad la tshon sna lnga'i srad bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na gdon thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// srog chags ki ta dang / lu'u ta dang / me dpal rnams
120b5(rgyud): la pad+ma dang / na ku lI dang / shing arga'i me tog mar dang bsres pa las sbyin sreg byas na/ khyim srung chen po byas par 'gyuraro// 'byung po'i gdon thams
120b6(rgyud): cad las bsrung bar byas par 'gyu ro// yang las thams cad la nor bu bsgrub pa'i rdzas 'di dag bsogs la cha mnyam par byas te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la snying po brgya
120b7(rgyud): rtsa brgyad bzlas pas las thams cad bya'o// dza ya dang / bi dza ya dang / mA gu la dang / gan d+ha nA dang / ba ru Ni dang / in dra ba ru nI dang / gan d+ha pri yaM gu dang / 
120b8(rgyud): ta ga ra dang / tsakra dang / ma hA tsakra dang / so ma rA dzi dang / su ma nad rnams phye ma zhib mor byas te/ char pa'i chus sbrus la tsan dan dang gur gum sbyar ba'i chus brlan te brgya rtsa brgyad
121a1(rgyud): bzlas la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyi spyan sngar nor bur byas te/ yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas a ga ru'i bdug pas
121a2(rgyud): gdugs la de nyid bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung du bzhag ste/ ras kyis g.yogs la grib mar bskams te blangs la yang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas par
121a3(rgyud): bya zhing / khro bo'i rgyal po lan gsum bzlas brjod byas te/ mgo bor bzung na rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pas mchod par 'gyur zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// 
121a4(rgyud): rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten thams cad dbang du 'gyuraro// bla/ ma gcig pur 'gyuraro// lha thams cad kyang gzi byin 'jug par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
121a5(rgyud): dbang phyug kyang rtag tu gzigs par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug dbang phyug chen po yang rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur zhing dus thams cad du mchog
121a6(rgyud): sbyin par 'gyuraro// phyir rgol ba dang mi mdza' ba thams cad kyang rtag tu 'thun par byed cing dbang du 'gyuraro// byad mi bzad pa dang / dug sbyar ma dang / phye ma'i dug dang / gsang sngags
121a7(rgyud): dang / g.yengs byed kyis mi tshugs shing thams cad 'jigs par 'gyuraro// rtag tu dpal dang / gzi byin dang / bsod nams dang / bkra shis dang / dge ba'i tshogs dang ldan
121a8(rgyud): par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de la gzigs par 'gyuraro// rtag tu ston pa bzhed par 'gyur// thams cad du dus thams cad na rgyal ba thob par 'gyuraro// skal pa/ 
121b1(rgyud): bzang po thogs pa med pa yang 'phel bar 'gyu ro// dpung pa la btags na glang po che chen po'i stobs dang ldan par 'gyuraro// 'gyed pa dang / dmag thams cad las rgyal ba chen por 'gyur/ 
121b2(rgyud): stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnod pa chen por 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gi cho ga zhib mo chen po grub par 'gyuraro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha
121b3(rgyud): za'i gdon dang / brjed byed kyis mi tshugs par 'gyuraro// nam yang de la rmi lam ngan pa dang / bltas ngan pa 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro// byis pa rnams la mgul du btags na
121b4(rgyud): gdon thams cad dang / rims nad thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / btsas pa 'phrog pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs so// nag po chen po ma mo'i tshig
121b5(rgyud): kyi 'khor dang bcas pa rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par byi bzhi na 'brang zhing / srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / swa ba byed par 'gyur/ yun ring du 'tshe bar 'gyur tshe ring
121b6(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// bud med rnams la ska rags sar pa btags te khrus byas nas gos gtsang ma sar pa bgos te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas
121b7(rgyud): na skal pa bzang po mchog dang ldan par byed cing bkra mi shis pa rab tu zhi bar byed/ khyim thab dang rtag tu rjesu 'thun par 'gyur/ khye'u dang bu mo yong bar 'gyur/ shes
121b8(rgyud): rab mchog tu 'gyur/ thams cad dga' bas lta bar 'gyur/ de la bud med kyi skyon yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ phyi ma la de lta bu'i bud med kyi lus mi thob par shes par bya ste/ 
122a1(rgyud): shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyuraro// nor bu 'di btags na thams cad du srung ba byas par 'gyur zhing dug dang mtshon dang mes mi tshug
122a2(rgyud): so// dug byas pa yang skye bar mi 'gyuraro// nor bu 'di btags pas dug med par 'gyur zhing myur du zhi bar 'gyuraro// tshor ba skye bar mi 'gyur zhing bde bar zhi bar 'gyuraro// rlung dang
122a3(rgyud): sprin dang ser ba mnan chu la lan bdun bzlas te nam mkha' la gtor na rlung dang sprin dang ser ba thams cad mnan par 'gyuraro// bzlog par bya na bal po se'u'i lcug mas bzlog par bya'o// 
122a4(rgyud): dran pa bskyed na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar mi smra bar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas te/ nor bu chu dron las btang ba byas na
122a5(rgyud): bklags pa tsam gyis tshigasu bcad pa stong 'dzin par 'gyur/ zhing thos pa mang po rgya mtsho bsags par 'gyuraro// rgyal srid dang / yul 'khor dang btsun mo 'khor dang
122a6(rgyud): bcas pa dbang du bya ba 'dod na lus bsku ba byas na gang du zhugs pa der thams cad dbang du 'gyuraro// dbus mo gnyis la byugs na chu klung chen po dbus mo nub tsam gyis pha rol du rgol bar
122a7(rgyud): 'gyuraro// rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/ dmag gam g.yul ngo'am/ tshogs pa'i nang ngam/ ri khrod dang tshang tshing dang / ri sul dang / dgon par phyin pa na sgreng ba
122a8(rgyud): byas na bde ba dang / bde leg su rgal bar 'gyur zhing chom po dang / g.yon can dang / rkun po dang / gcan zan gtum po'i 'jigs pas mi tshugs par 'gyur zhing bltar med
122b1(rgyud): par 'gyur// btson thams cad du song ban byug pa byas na shing sgrog dang khong skal dang / lcags sgrog gos bcings pa thams cad chag grugs su 'gyuraro// bdag nyid la bskus
122b2(rgyud): namatshon cha ma snang bar 'gyuraro// mag gnyis la bskus na gnyid legs pa'i tshe rmi lam mtshan po rmo bar 'gyur zhing ji ltar bsams shing smon pa snang bar 'gyur// 'phags pa
122b3(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku ston par mdzad cing thams cad bka' stsol bar 'gyuraro// de la mig nad thams cad kyis mi tshugs so// kha'i nang du bzhags na gang bslangs
122b4(rgyud): pa sbyin par byed cing dbang du 'gyur// gdon gyis zin dpal dpral bar thug pa byas na blugs pa tsam gyis dbab par 'gyur te/ thams cad smra bar 'gyuraro// 
122b5(rgyud): lag mthil du bskus na glang po che la reg na/ dbang du 'gyu ra zhing gar btang ba der 'gro bar 'gyuraro// dpral ba'i dbus su thig le byas na 'jig rten thams cad
122b6(rgyud): kyis cher mchod par 'gyuraro// med pa la byugs na mgron sngon bzhin du bram ze thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing bgyi ba ci mchis zhes bran bzhin du 'gyuraro// 'o ma dang sbyar te/ 
122b7(rgyud): mig la bskus na mtshan mo yang nyin mo'i bzhin du snang bar 'gyuraro// gnod sbyin dang srin po'i gnas thams cad kyi sgo phye bar 'gyur zhing gter thams cad 'thung bar 'gyur/ 
122b8(rgyud): thams cad bran bzhin byed par 'gyuraro// klu'i gnas kyi mtshor bor na klu chen pos char gyi rgyun gtong bar 'gyuraro// char ha cang che ba'i che chu dang bsres te na mkha' la gtor na zhi ba
123a1(rgyud): 'gyur ro// sprin la bltas te ser ba'i rgyun la gtor na ser ba 'bab par mi 'gyuraro// lag pa la btags na gang la reg pa de zad mi shes par 'gyuraro// rkang pa'i
123a2(rgyud): rje ngar la btags te me'i nang du zhugs na mes mi tshugs shing tsan dan bzhin du bsil bar 'gyuraro// ral gril byugs te g.yul ngor song na lus thams cad gcig tu 'bar bar gyur
123a3(rgyud): nas/ pha rol gyi dpung thams cad 'byer bar 'gyur zhing thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyuraro// nad chen pos thebs pa'i nad pa tshabs po che la phye ma byin na nad tshabs chen po las thar
123a4(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// chang pa dang po ban ba la chu dron las btang na mod la yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// rtsib logs na ba la dar ba las btang na zhi bar 'gyuraro// 
123a5(rgyud): nad thams cad la ni zhun mar dang til mar las sbyar te skumanye dang bza' ba dang / btung ba'i nad dang / snar bru gas pa dang / byug pa byas na nad thams cad 'jig
123a6(rgyud): par 'gyur zhing nam yang 'byung bar mi 'gyu ro// phug gi sgor khor yug tu blugs la snying po lan bdun bzlas te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya byas la khro bo'i rgyal po gsang sngag
123a7(rgyud): lan cig bzlas brjod byas nas zhugs na phug gi sgo chag ste rang gi khyim du 'gyur zhing sdang ba thams cad bzlog par 'gyuraro// bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad mi snang bar 'gyuraro// 
123a8(rgyud): khar bcug ste ma smra bar snang ba mdo brjod par byas na lan brgya phrag stong bzlas par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyuraro// shing
123b1(rgyud): srog shing la thugs na g.yul ngo thams cad du rgyal ba thob par 'gyuraro// bong la gtor na rin chen pos nyo bar 'gyuraro// bu mo'i gdong bkrus na mgo yang bar 'gyuraro// snying la/ 
123b2(rgyud): thig le byas na thams cad du bltar med par 'gyuraro// thams cad du 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa/ las thams cad byed bdag srung ba/ gzhan srung ba'i nor bu gang dang gang la sbyar
123b3(rgyud): zhing bzlas pas thams cad du bltar med par 'gyuraro// bgegs dang log 'dren rnams la til dang chu la lan bdun bzlas te byin na bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad zhi bar 'gyur/ 
123b4(rgyud): byur ngan pa med par byan ras la dkyil 'khor zlum po bris ral 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan snga dar mi smra bar bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la mchod
123b5(rgyud): pa rgya chen po byas te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo/ sa te/ a ga ru'i bdug pas bdug par bya zhing spos dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bltam pa byas na
123b6(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis mod la byur ngan pa thams cad med par 'gyuraro// dbul ba nyams pa'i don dang / ma grub pa dang / sdig pa dang rmi lam ngan pa dang ltas ngan pa dang
123b7(rgyud): sgrib pa bsal na gser ram dbul gyi bum pa spos chus bkang ba la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ blugs na de dag thams cad 'jig par 'gyur zhing 'jig rten pa'i dpal chen po
123b8(rgyud): nyams su myong bar 'gyuraro// gdon thams cad tshar bcad na til dang 'bras so ba'i sbyin sreg gis so// nad dang gdon pa thams cad bsal na chu la bzlas so// dus ma yin/ 
124a1(rgyud): bar 'chi ba zhi bar bya na dus gsum du lan gsum gsum du rtag tu bzlas pas dus ma yin par 'chi bzhi par 'gyuraro// bcing ba dang lcags sgrogs dang khong/ 
124a2(rgyud): sgril gzhom na nyin re zhing brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas so// rgyal po dbang du byan lam po cher brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyu ro// chom po dang rkun po ra
124a3(rgyud): par bya na rA dzA ko shA ka'i sa bon gyi sbyin sreg gis so// me rengs par bya na seng ldeng gi shing la bzlas te mer bcug nas bzlas na me rengs par byed par 'gyuraro// chu rengs par bya na ka la
124a4(rgyud): ki'i sa bon chu'i nang du btab na chu rengs par byas par 'gyurd ro// dug gzhi la na rma bya'i sgro yis so// mtshon re dngas par bya na shing gnam lcags kyis tshig pa'i thal ba
124a5(rgyud): la bzlas te gtor na mtshon cha thams cad rengs para'agyur ro// ting nge 'dzin sgrub na ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ba cings te bzlas na ting nge 'dzin stong thob par 'gyuraro// pha
124a6(rgyud): rol tu phyin pa drug rdzogs par 'dod pa'i rig sngags 'chang dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma des ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor grub bzhi pa cha shin
124a7(rgyud): tu mdzes pa byas te/ tsan dan gyis mchod par bya zhing gur gum dang / gla rtsi dang ga pur gyis mchod nas me tog sna tshogs bkram ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon
124a8(rgyud): du phyogs par bzhag nas bum pa spos chus bkang ba bzhi bzhag la mchod yon gyi snod bzhi dang / pog por bzhi spos chu'i bum pa'i dbus su bzhag par bya zhing / a ga ru'i bdug pa
124b1(rgyud): dbul bar bya'o// bum pa'i steng du bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzhag par bya/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya zhing / spos kyi mar me bzhi bltam par bya// mchod
124b2(rgyud): pa rgya chen po bya rgyan gyis brgyan par bya zhing dkyil 'khor byas la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su skyil mo krung du 'dug te bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bya/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa
124b3(rgyud): brgyad bzlas brjod byas na pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sku ston par 'gyuraro// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thad
124b4(rgyud): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// sems can brgya stong dmang po gdul na ri'i rtse mor stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pas/ so// sdang ba thams cad gzhom par 'dod pas rdo rje
124b5(rgyud): 'am/ mdung rtse gsum la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgyas tsham ngam bya zhing khro bo'i rgyal po'i bsdigs pa'i phyag rgya bcings te/ 
124b6(rgyud): khros pas lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas gsor te/ nam mkha' la 'phangs na bdud la sogs pa sdang pa thad bcom par 'gyur ro// las thams cad grub pa dang / gsang sngags
124b7(rgyud): thams cad 'grub pa dang / bsam pa thams cad 'grub cing yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te/ stong nyi shu bzla sa na grub pa chen
124b8(rgyud): por 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar 'dod pas stong sum cu rtsa gnyis bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin
125a1(rgyud): du spos chu'i bum pas dbang bskur bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan sku gdung dang bcas pa la mig gtad de khri bzlas na de bzhin gshegs/ 
125a2(rgyud): pa nyid 'thob par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs mnan te khri bzlas na spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang 'dra bar 'gyuraro// phyag na rdo rje spyan drang bar 'dod
125a3(rgyud): pas/ phyag na rdo rje'i zhags mnan te bzlas brjod lan stong byas nas gu gul gyi bdug pa dbul ba byas na 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje rang gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug par 'gyuraro// thad
125a4(rgyud): du khro bo'i rgyal po dran par bya zhing thams cad du don yod pa da'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcing ba byas na/ ma sgrubs ma bklags par 'gyur cing cho ga zhib mo mtha' yas
125a5(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur ro// snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / bta nga snyoms dang / ngo tsa shes pa dang / brtse ba dang / bya/ mas pa dang / shes rab dang ldan pas 'di 'grub par
125a6(rgyud): bstan to// go cha bgos pa grub pa mchog thams cad grub pa thob cing bsod nams kyi phung pos 'bar bar 'gyuraro// thog mar khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas pas rtag tu mtshams bcad pa
125a7(rgyud): dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / yul bcing bya ste/ srung ba mchog tu dkon pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rgyal ba'i bdag nyid skyes pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar 'gyur zhing go// 
125a8(rgyud): cha bgos par 'gyuraro// gal te dbang bskur bar 'dod na yang rgyal ba thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pas bden pa ston par 'gyuraro// don yod pa'i rgyal
125b1(rgyud): pa'i cho ga zhing mo mchog las khro bo'i rgyal po bshad par bya ste/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la/ shes rab dang byang chub kyi thabs dang ldan pas 'di 'grub par de bzhin gshegs pa
125b2(rgyud): thams cad kyis lung bstan te/ na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa ra badz+ra d+ha re b+h+yaHoM tsa ra tsa ra/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma hA ka ru Ni ka/ tsi ri tsa ri/ bai ri bi ri/ ma hA pad+ma hasta/ 
125b3(rgyud): ka la ka la/ ku ru ku ru/ ma hA sA ma prA p+ta/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsa tsa ra ti/ tsa ra shwa ra/ e h+ye hi/ sid+h+ya sid+d+ha/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ d+hI bad+d+ha ba/ ki Ni ki Ni/ pa ra ma shud d+ha swatra/ ka ra ka ra/ 
125b4(rgyud): ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ ma hA pa shu pe ti be Sha d+ha ra/ hahA/ hi hi/ hu hu/ oM kA ra ma hA brah+ma be Shad+ha ra/ tsaratsa/ ba ba ra/ rash+mi sha ta sa ha sra pra te maN+Di ta sha rI ra/ dzA
125b5(rgyud): la dz+wa la/ ta pa ta pa/ b+ha ga bAn/ so mA di t+ya/ yam/ pa ru Na/ ku be ra/ brah+me na dra/ bi Shi ga Na de bag tA b+hU rtsi ta tsa raN/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru/ san taka?/ 
125b6(rgyud): mA ra/ ru dra/ briSh+Nu bA sa ba/ d+ha na da/ de ba ri Shi nA ya ka/ bo hu bi bid+ha be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa man+ta ba lo ka/ bi lo ki tau/ lo ki te shwa ra/ mu ya mu ya/ mun tsa mun tsa/ bi d+ha ba d+ha
125b7(rgyud): na/ tA Da na/ tardza na/ rA dza taskar ag+ni u da ka/ bi Sha/ shas+t+ra pa ri mo tsa ka/ ka Na ka Na/ bal bo d+h+yed+h+ya ga tsa tu rAr+ya sad t+ya sam pra kA sha ka/ ta ma ta ma/ sa ma sa ma/ ma
125b8(rgyud): tsi t+yan d+h+ya/ kA ra pra sha ma na mi li mi li/ e Ne ya tsarma kra ta pa ri ka ra/ e h+ye hi/ ma Ta maT/ bi shud+d+ha bi Sha ya ni bA sin/ ma hA ka ru Ni kA/ shwe ta ya dz+nyo pa bI ta/ rat+na ma kurba
126a1(rgyud): mA lA d+ha ra/ sar+b+ba dzA shi ra si kri ta/ kar bu Ta/ d+ha na/ sa mA d+hi/ bi mo kA a pra kam+b+ha/ Sha Ta bA ra mi tA pU ka/ bahu satwA san ta ti ba ri pA tsaka sar+b+ba mA rA / 
126a2(rgyud): pra duSh+Ta pra maR+Sha ka/ sar+b+ba sid d+h+ya shA pa ri pu ra ka/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ a b+hi Sha kai ra/ b+ha bAn ta/ a mo g+ha rA dza hUM phaT/ na mo stu te swA hA// gsang sngags kyi cho ga snga ma de lta/ 
126a3(rgyud): bus las thams cad pa don yod pa'i zhags pa khro bo zhes bya ba grub pa mchog las thams cad pa'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba
126a4(rgyud): lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA ku ru Ni kA ya/ a mo g+ha ba ra dA/ bA sha hastA ya/ ma hA shud+d+haHsatwe ya/ A gan+d+ha/ b+ha ga bAn/ pad+ma hasta/ 
126a5(rgyud): ba ra da ka rA gu le/ pad+ma b+hu dza ma hA ba shu pa ti bai Sha d+ha rApri sA da/ shIg+ni a gats+tsha/ ma hA be ga/ bi dwe nata ra shrI/ ha sa he sa/ a mo g+ha shud d+he/ ha sa ha sa/ 
126a6(rgyud): tsa la tsa la/ a gats+tsha A gats+tsha b+ha ga bAn/ a ba lo ko ti shA ra ma ma gan d+ha puSh+pe/ sa ma mardza ni yam pra tIts+tsha/ tri rat+na sad t+ye na/ a mo g+ha sid d+he swA hA// 'phags pa
126a7(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor na gnas pa thams cad dgug pa/ a ga ru'i bdug pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas so// na mo rat+na ta yA ya/ na mo
126a8(rgyud): Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/ sar+b+ba gan d+ha ba ti sid ta/ a mo g+ha b+hu dza/ ba ra dA ya/ sar+b+ba gan d+ha mA lci ba b+hu Shi ti pra ye/ 
126b1(rgyud): tsan+nar+d+ha shi ra saM br-i ye/ gan d+ha gan d+ha nul pan sA ma ma pri tang cha/ bar ba ra ba ra dA ya swAhA/ lan bdun bzlas te dbul bar bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo Ar+ya.a pa la
126b2(rgyud): te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ hi la~M hi la~M/ mi mi laM/ ma hA prab+hA/ su bi ma le/ brah+ma be Sha d+ha re/ sum ti bar re/ tu
126b3(rgyud): ru tu ru/ bi tsitra puSh+pa mA l+ye ba b+hu She ti/ ha ra ha ra/ mar ma ra/ tu ru tu ru/ a mo g+ha hr-id ya pra mod na ku ru pra tI tsA ma ma puSh+pa ba re swA hA// me tog la lan bdun
126b4(rgyud): bzlas te dbul bar bya'o// na ma rat+na trA yA ya/ nam Ar+ya a ba le ki te shwa rA yaM/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ da ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka ya/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba
126b5(rgyud): ra / smar sma ra/ b+ha ga bAn/ sa ma ye/ sar+b+ba/ thA ga tA shAM sid+d+he/ b+ha ga bAn/ a ba lo kA ye/ sar+b+ba satwA a ba lo ka na/ a mo g+ha ba ti pA sha ha stA/ 
126b6(rgyud): sing d+he sing d+he/ sid+d+ha ba ra da sid d+hun tu te/ bud+d+ha d+harma/ saMg+ha sata t+yen tu ru tu ru/ sad t+ya sa ma ya pA la ya swA hA// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dran
126b7(rgyud): par bya ba'i rig sngags so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya bo d+hi satwA ya ma hA sa twA ya/ me hA ka ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ d+hu re d+hu re/ badz+ra d+ha ra/ 
126b8(rgyud): pad+ma dzaM be/ rig tA bar de/ beg beg/ b+hu Tu b+hu Tu/ sar+b+ba bi dza pra ye/ bud d+ha d+harma/ sag+ha sa dat+ye ne/ mi li mo li swAhA// gtor ma'i sngags te lan bdun bzlas
127a1(rgyud): te sbyin no// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hA satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka ya/ a pra ti ha ta/ ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na kA ya/ 
127a2(rgyud): b+ha ga bAn/ A ha ra A ha ra/ pad+ma sa na pad+ma b+hu dze/ shre taM ge/ shwe ta su dze shwe ta ma l+ya bi b+hu Shi te/ d+hu ma d+hu ma/ dz+wa la bud+d+ha d+harma/ saM g+ha sad t+ye na swA hA// mar me'i sngags te
127a3(rgyud): lan bdun bzlas so// na me rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM bi re bai ri/ pad+ma pA Ni/ a gam+ba
127a4(rgyud): ga mA/ a mo g+ha tad tA sid+d+hi/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ga ga na darashrI sany+tso di ta/ sar+b+ba bid+yA d+ha ra bi sho d+ha ne/ a mo dag+na sid+d+he swA hA// spos chu'i dri zhim po'i bum pa la
127a5(rgyud): lan bdun bzlas te khrus bya'o// khrus kyi rig sngag sa so// na mo rat+na tra yA ye/ na mo Ar+ya a ba ma ki te shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA
127a6(rgyud): kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+yathA/ d+hu me d+hu me/ d+hu d+hu me/ pad+me pad+me nir b+hA se/ shud+d+ha shud+d+ha/ kan tsa na/ pra b+ha sa bi ma le/ shud+d+ha rA shrI/ shud tsi shud tsi/ shu tsi go tsa ra sid+d+he/ pad+me ga
127a7(rgyud): ba ti/ pra ba ra Ni swA hA// gos kyi rig sngags te lan bdun bzlas pas so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki taM shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi swa twA ya/ ma hA sa twA yaM/ ma hA kA/ 
127a8(rgyud): ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ shA me sha ma ya/ shan ti me/ ma ma sa spyan ku ru/ shAn te sa maM sar+b+ba pA pa shan ta shud+d+ha ka l+yan par dza/ shAn ti bi dza ye/ dza ya sid+d+hi/ b+ha ga bAn/ 
127b1(rgyud): Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ sa ra sa ra swA hA// mal cha la bsngags te nyal na rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa thams cad mi mthong ngo // na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo Ar+ya a
127b2(rgyud): ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ nA ga prA kar Sha Ne/ dib bya dza la/ dza lA ba he/ dza la saM k+Sho b+ha yin nA ga dza las sho d+ha ni pad+ma
127b3(rgyud): sa re/ pad+ma bi shud+d+he/ pA Ni dza le saM sho d+hA ya/ A dman d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa le le swA hA// chu'i sngags te khrus dang dbang bskur ba'i chu blangs la lan bdun bzlas te spyad do// 
127b4(rgyud): na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ da bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA sa twa ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya da/ sar+b+ba satI ha taM ka rA ya/ a mo g+ha ba ra pra dA ya/ 
127b5(rgyud): sarba sad tA man na pA na pra dA ya/ de ba nA gA da yA bo dz+ya bid+d+ha d+ha ra sa nu pre dA ya/ sa ka la b+hu ba ne/ b+hu ba na wesho d+ha ni/ san+na trA yi pra ra bi shud d+he swA hA// dbul
127b6(rgyud): ba'i sngags so// na mo rat+na tra yA ye/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sar+b+ba de bA su ra na ma skri taM/ sa ma sa man+ta pre pU ra ne/ 
127b7(rgyud): sa ma gan d+hA ba b+ha si te/ ga ga na bi shud+d+he/ muk+ti pra b+he/ dza ye/ bi dza ya/ dza ya ni ra mA l+yo pa na ya ti/ puSh+pe mA l+ya gan d+ha bi sho d+ha na/ bi sho d+ha ya/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta bi shud+d+he/ 
127b8(rgyud): pad+ma bi sho d+ha ni swA hA// me tog nyid dor ba'i rig sngags so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ 
128a1(rgyud): tad+yathA/ d+ha ra Ni na d+ha re/ d+ha ra Ni ban d+he/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ shukr-i bi sho d+ha ni/ shu kra mA la lIng gi ti/ shu kra za sho d+ha ni/ shud+d+ha bi ma le swA hA// rtsa ku
128a2(rgyud): sha 'am/ ras kyi srang bu 'am/ bu mo gtsang mas bkal ba'i srad bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bor ba byas na khu chu 'gags par 'gyuraro// na mo
128a3(rgyud): rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ dz+wa la le dz+wa le/ bau ma le dz+wa le/ pa d+ha si ba ra dza/ sUr+ya ba ti/ 
128a4(rgyud): dza ya pad+ma la d+ha re swA hA/ me'i sbyin sreg gi thal ba de la lan bdun bzlas te kun tu gtor na bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyis nam yang mi tshugs so// 
128a5(rgyud): na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ dza le dza le/ dza la ba ti/ dza la pra b+ha bi na/ nA
128a6(rgyud): ga sra ba Ni/ dib bya bI ri Ni/ mi li mi li swA hA// nye reg gi rig sngags so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru/ 
128a7(rgyud): Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ri Ni ha ri Ni/ ping ga laM ping ga li/ hi ri hi ri/ b+ha ga ban ni tsa la pra tsa la/ pri ti tiSh+Tha mAn rak+Sha rak+Sha ma ma bud+d+ha/ d+harma saM g+ha sad t+ye na swA hA// stegs bu'o// 
128a8(rgyud): rtsa ku sha bting ba la lan bdun bsngags pas so// stan gyi rig sngag so// na mo rat+na tra ya/ na maHsar+b+ba maN+Da la ni bas ni de ba tA nAM/ na mo bi d+yA de ba tA nA~M/ sar+b+ba ka la pa sid+d+ha/ 
128b1(rgyud): nA nam Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bod+d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ e h+ye hi b+ha ga ba te/ pad+ma sun d+ha ri/ ma hA bidI de bat+taM/ tsa la tsa la/ pad+ma sun // 
128b2(rgyud): be ga pa te/ su ru su ru swA hA/ nyin re zhing me tog dang / bdug pa dang / gtor ma dang / spos chus pho nya mo pad+ma'i rigs mdzes pa dang / gnod sbyin mo ral pa gcig ma mchod
128b3(rgyud): nas bzlas brjod lan bdun byas na nam yang bgegs thams cad kyis mi mtshugs so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHkro d+ha rA dza ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo
128b4(rgyud): d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ nam \u0f7fsar+b+ba bid+ya ku la baM sha s+ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a mo g+had hr-i da ya pra b+hA bi ni/ sar+b+ba big+h+nAn pra sha ma ni/ A ha/ 
128b5(rgyud): rA se ha ra/ pad+ma pi thaib biSh+TaM/ ma Ni ka Na ka pi b+hUSh+Tate/ ka ma la b+hu dze/ ta ra ta ra/ tA rA ya pa ra ma/ a mo g+ha hr-i da ya/ dza ya tri ne tre/ ba rad b+hU dze/ sma
128b6(rgyud): rasma ra/ b+ha ga bAn/ sar+b+ba te thA ga ta sa ma ya/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ brah+ma bai Sha d+ha ra/ bi b+hu Shi ta ta nu/ ma hA b+ha ya ha re/ A lo ka ya/ bi lo ka ya/ sar+b+ba satwA ba lo ka/ 
128b7(rgyud): ni/ ba ra ba ra de swA hA// las thams cad pa'i rig sngags te khyad par du ni rig sngags 'dis dkyil 'khor gyi gnas na 'khod pa'i las mi rnams bsrung bar bya'o// na mo rat+na/ 
128b8(rgyud): tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA ka ru Ni kA yA/ tad+ya thA/ pa ra pa ra/ ma ra ma ra/ sa ra sa ra/ ban d+ha ban d+ha sa man+te na/ a
129a1(rgyud): mo g+ha ba sha ha ste/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ bud d+ha d+harma sag+ha sad t+ye na swA hA// thal ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te don yod zhugs pa'i phyag rgyas yul bcing ngo / 
129a2(rgyud): na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba le ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ngi shA ban d+ha ni/ a mo g+he/ a pra ti ha te/ mu ru mu ru/ 
129a3(rgyud): su ru su ru/ tu ru tu ru/ sar+b+ba bag+h+nAn bi nA sha Ni/ pad+ma sa ra bai b+hu Shi te/ bud d+ha d+harma saM g+ha sa t+ye ni ban d+ha a dzi ta ba de swA hA// spyan drangs te phyogs bcing bar bya'o// 
129a4(rgyud): na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a baM lo ki te shwa rA da ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Nid kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ sau r-i si ri/ 
129a5(rgyud): pi ri bi ri/ ba ra ba ra/ pra ba ra bi mA na d+ha ra/ da ra da ra/ gats+tsha gats+tsha/ b+ha ga bAn/ Ar+ya ba lo ki shwa ra sh+tsa/ b+ha ga bAn/ tu ru tu ru/ a mo g+ha pad+me swA hA/ 
129a6(rgyud): me tog ji snyed pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te snyim pa nas phul na slar gshegasu gsol bar 'gyuraro// rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo rim par phye ba'i cho ga'o// de nas don
129a7(rgyud): yod pa'i zhags pa'i rgyal po khro bo chen po'i snying po'i mchog sgrub na sgrub sra ba'i ras kyi sku gzugs kyi cho ga bshad par bya'o// cho ga zhib grub grub pa che// khro bo'i rgyal grub grub pa
129a8(rgyud): mchog/ don yod pa ni grub pa'i mchog/ rig sngags 'di ni bshad par bya'o// don yod rgyal po khro chen gyi// snying po dam pa sgrub pa ni// cho ga zhinga'i grub grub pa che// khrebar
129b1(rgyud): rgyal po grub pa mchog/ grub pa'i mchog ste don yod pa// rig sngags 'di ni bshad par bya// gang brjod pa tsam gyis cho ga zhib mo'i mchog 'grub pa// sangs rgyas bye ba brgya
129b2(rgyud): phrag stong gis gzigs par 'gyur ba rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed brgya stong mthong bar 'gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa
129b3(rgyud): 'gyur ba bsod nams kyi phung po bla na med pa/ sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba stobs dang brtson 'grus bskyed pa/ cho ga zhib mo thams cad don yod pa de kho na nyid sgrub
129b4(rgyud): pa 'grub pa/ dran pa tsam gyis mod la ni// sa gzhi yang ni g.yo 'gyur la// sum cu'i lha rnams g.yo'o/ gyur zhing // lhar bcas rgya mtsho lhun por bcas// klu
129b5(rgyud): rnams 'dir ni yed yod cing // gnod sbyin srin po'/ bros 'gyur ba// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed che// rig sngags rgyal po bla med kyis// phyag na rdo rje gnod sbyin
129b6(rgyud): bcas// dpung dang bcas shing bzhon bcas pa'i// lus skyes 'bar ba'i phreng can kun// 'dar zhing kun tu 'dar yod yid// rgyal po chen po bzhi po yi// gnas mchog
129b7(rgyud): dag ni g.yo 'gyur zhing // de dag thams cad 'dus gyur nas// 'jig rten dbang la skyabs 'dod zhing // bcom ldan mgon po bskyab tu gsol// thugs rje'i bdag nyid
129b8(rgyud): bskyab tu gsol// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das
130a1(rgyud): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la grub pa don cad snying po rig sngags rgyal po'i snying po 'di gang gis bklags pa tsam gyis don yod pa'i
130a2(rgyud): zhags pa'i snying po myur du rab tu 'grub cing / dran pa tsam gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lha'i lus kyis lus ston par 'gyur ba/ dngos grub dang mchog thams cad
130a3(rgyud): sbyin par 'gyur ba mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di'i nang du bsgrags par bgyi'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ 
130a4(rgyud): na ma a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba le ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ e pad+me pad+me/ pad+me d+ha ra/ bi b+hu/ 
130a5(rgyud): Shi ta b+hu dze/ tsa ra tsa ra/ brah+ma baM Sha d+ha ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ bi tsing tra mo la d+ha ra/ ma Ni ka na ka badz+ra bai DUr+ya laM kri/ ta sha rI ra/ ta ra ta ra/ ta rA ya/ b+ha ga ba ti bA ra Na/ d+hu ru
130a6(rgyud): d+hu ru/ a mo g+ha pA sha haste/ ba ra ba ra/ ba ra d+ha ya ka/ sa man+ta a ba lo ki te/ ma hA bo d+hi satwA ba ra da pad+ma sa na pad+ma go'u ra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka/ a b+hi Sha
130a7(rgyud): ka te/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA/ ba la ba la/ ma hA be ga d+ha ra/ bi kri tA na ya na/ daMSh+Ta ka rA la ma hA te dze/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bi pu la dza na ba ra da/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ ma hA pa shud pa ti be Sha
130a8(rgyud): d+ha ra/ sar sa ra/ bre bar bu t+ya saM b+ha ra/ su ga ta d+h+ya na sa mA d+ha/ sa man+ta aM ba lo ki ta/ I shwa ra ma he shwa ra/ duSh+Ta da ma ka/ ro dra pra la da ma ka/ kro d+ha rA dza ma hA be ga d+ha ra/ 
130b1(rgyud): sa ma sa ma/ ma hA s+thA ma pra p+ta/ tsan dra sUr+ya a ti re ka pra b+ha ma la la/ sar+b+ba ma la bi sho d+ha ka/ sar+b+ba ri Shi ga Na san+ta ti/ ma hA ma he shwa ra rU pa d+ha ra/ a mi tA b+hi dza nA le kr-i ta dza Ta/ 
130b2(rgyud): dak+Shi Na tsan drA laM kr-i ta shi ra/ ma tha ma tha/ sar+b+ba yak+Sha rak+Sha sa b+hu ta ga na b+ha na dza ka/ ta ra ta ra/ ta ra ga Na sa mA laM kr-i ti/ na k+Shad tra mA la sar+b+ba bag+h+na na bi nA shan ka ra/ pa ra mai tri tsit+ta ma hA/ 
130b3(rgyud): kA rU Ni kApa ra ba ra/ ba ri pUr+Na maN+Da la/ sau mya mu kha/ Sha Ta pA ra mi tA pa ri pU ra ka/ mi li mi li/ e Na ya tsarma ni ba sa na/ byag+d+ha tsermod ta ri ya/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sar+b+ba thA
130b4(rgyud): ga ta a ba lo ki ta/ tri ne tri tra shU la d+ha ra/ badz+ra dz+wa la d+hA ra/ a mo g+ha pA sha ha ste/ ya ma ba ru Na ku be ra rU pa d+ha ra/ nA gi na dra rU pa d+ha ra/ bi ma la bi shud+d+ha de ha/ 
130b5(rgyud): sar+b+ba pA pa sha ma ka sar+b+ba ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ka/ sar+b+ba ka bi Sha na ka/ sde lo kya ba shaM ka ra/ sar+b+ba satwa pri na d+ha ka/ bo d+hi satwa ba ra da/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a d+hiShI te/ 
130b6(rgyud): oM pad+ma bi b+hu Shi ta shud+d+he/ d+hi ra d+ha ri/ a ba lo ki ya mAn/ sam sa ma/ sar+b+ba karma me sA d+hA ya/ a mo g+ha pA sha hr-i da ya sid+d+he/ gre h+yan bi si ni ba rang hUM phaT/ na mo stu
130b7(rgyud): te swA hA// / grub pa don yod pa rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di bshad ma thag tu 'byung po'i tshogs dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / bgegs dang / log
130b8(rgyud): 'dren de dag thams cad khas bub tu 'gyel te gcig tu 'bar bar gyur cing / gnas kyang 'bar bar gyur pa dang / de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje dga' bas
131a1(rgyud): bskalangs te/ skrag par gyur pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug pa dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / rgyal po chen
131a2(rgyud): bzhi dang / skrag par gyur pa'i lha dang / lha ma yin dang drang srong dpa' gong ba thams cad dang / rgya mtsho na gnas pa'i klu'i rgyal po thams cad dang / chu bran thams cad dang / lha dang klu gang
131a3(rgyud): dag chu na gnas pa thams cad dang rgya mtsho chen po'i lha dang / lha gang dag lang ka'i grong khyer na gnas pa thams cad dang / rig sngags 'chang 'khor los bsgyur ba thams cad dang / 
131a4(rgyud): gang dag gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / nam mkha'i lha thams cad dang 'khrugs par gyur nas na mkha' las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod
131a5(rgyud): pa'i las dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa smra na ras gzigs dbang phyug de la yang mchod pa'i/ phyir lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / 
131a6(rgyud): ud pa la dang / pun da ri ka dang / man da ri ka dang / man da ra ba chen po'i char dang / lha'i rgyan dang lhab lhub kyi char pus mo nub tsam ri bo po Ta lar phab ste/ lha'i sil snyan dang / 
131a7(rgyud): glung byangs len cing ha ha zhes ca co dang ga zha'i sgra bton nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis sems can thams cad kyi don du rig sngags chen
131a8(rgyud): pa 'od bshad do zhes ched du brjod pa chen po ched du brjod do// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
131b1(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gang na ba der song ste/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas mchod pa'i phyir mu tig gi do shal brgya stong ri ba phul te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rig sngags chen po cho ga
131b2(rgyud): zhib mo thams cad kyi mchog bshang ngo // don yod pa'i rgyal po rig sngags chen po'i snying po 'jig rten mgon po thub pa chen pos bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das cho ga zhib mo
131b3(rgyud): mtha' dag don yod pa'i rgyal po 'grub pa'i mchog las thams cad grub par bshad du gsol/ de nas de'i don du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa'i
131b4(rgyud): zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo grub pa don yod pa'i ri/ ga sngags kyi rgyal po ras kyi sku gzugs sgrub pa'i/ mchog cho ga dang yo byad du bcas pa bshad pa/ ras gru bzhi
131b5(rgyud): ba kun nas cha legs par phye ba/ kha tshar ma bcad pa skra med pa/ ri mo mkhan gtsang ma khrus byas pas gos gtsang ma bgos la gso sbyong dang ldan par byas pas chen
131b6(rgyud): lhag ma ma yin pa snod sar par bzhag la bri bar bya ste/ dbus su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis bzhugs shing rgyal ba 'od dpag med kyis rgyan
131b7(rgyud): pa/ thor tshugs kyi g.yas su zla tshes kyis rgyan pa/ ri dgas e na ya'i lpags pa gyon pa/ phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dbu gsuM
131b8(rgyud): spyan gsum phyag bzhi pa/ ri'i steng na pad+ma'i bdan la bzhugs pa/ zhal dbus ma zhi ba'i zhal bzhin 'dzum pa/ zhal g.yas pa 'jig su rung ba/ khro gnyer can thor tshugs
132a1(rgyud): 'od dpag med kyis rgyan pa/ dbu zla tshes kyis rgyan pa/ zhal g.yon pa 'jig su rung ba bzhin bsgyur cing mche ba gtsigs pa/ rgyal ba 'od dpag med dbul zhugs pa/ 
132a2(rgyud): phyag gcig na pad+ma thogs pa/ gnyis pa rtse gsum thogs pa/ gsum pa don yod zhags pa sku'i phyed na 'dzin pa la bcom ldan 'das zhal khro gnyer can don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcing
132a3(rgyud): pa'i phyag la spyan gtod par bya zhing / bzhi pa dbugs 'byin pa'i phyag tu bya zhing 'od 'dom gang ba khor yug 'bar ba dang ldan par bya'o// g.yas phyogs na lha mo sgrol ma 'gying bag dang
132a4(rgyud): bcas shing lus btud par mchog sbyin pa'i phyag la mig gtod pa bya'o// g.yon du pad+ma'i rigs mdzes ma 'dze ma bag dang bcas pa gsang sngags kyi tshul dang / rjesu 'thun
132a5(rgyud): zhing don yod pa'i zhags pa la mig gtod pa bya'o// lha mo sgrol ma'i bar du gnod sbyin mo ral pa gcig ma bya'o// pad+ma'i rigs mdzes ma'i bar du khro gnyer can bya'o// phyog
132a6(rgyud): gnyis par lha mo dkar mo lag na pad+ma thogs pa bya'o// pad+ma'i rigs mdzes ma'i 'og tu pho so gsang sngags kyi rjes su 'brang ba bya'o// ral pa gcig ma'i 'og tu lha mo chen mo 'jigs
132a7(rgyud): byed ma bya'o// gong du gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug chen po me tog sna tshogs thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o// 
132a8(rgyud): 'og tu rgyal po chen po bzhi bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje 'jig su rung ba gad rgyangs can khro bo don yod pa'i rgyal po dang smra ba bya'o// 
132b1(rgyud): ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba tsam gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug za poT lan gzhal med khang dang bcas pa mngon sum du mthong bar rig par bya'o// 'phags pa don
132b2(rgyud): yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib me'i rgyal po// bam po bcu pa// mthong ba tsam gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad las thar par 'gyur/ 'jigs pa chen
132b3(rgyud): po brgyad las yongasu grol bar 'gyur/ mtshams med pa lnga byed pa yongasu thar par 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad spong
132b4(rgyud): pas mthong ba tsam gyi modo la rnam par dag par 'gyur/ dmanar med pa la gzhol ba'i mthar thug pa yang yodadasu grol bar 'gyur// tshangs pa chen po'i bsod nams
132b5(rgyud): brgya stong gi dge ba'i rtsa bskyed par 'gyur// 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog thob par 'gyur/ 'chi ba'i dus na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
132b6(rgyud): phyug mngon sum du ston par 'gyur zhing dbugs 'byin par 'gyur/ shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu skye bar 'gyur/ sgrib pa thams cad dang bral nas/ tshe rabs brgya stong
132b7(rgyud): phrag lnga rje su dran par 'gyuraro// byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du skye ba 'di tha ma yin te/ 'di mthong ba tsam gyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur na lhag par mang du byed/ 
132b8(rgyud): pa lta ci smos te/ de ni phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ bla na med pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro// gal te rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge
133a1(rgyud): slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ rgyal po'am/ blon po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa'am/ btsun mo dam pa gang la la zhig gis ras kyi sku
133a2(rgyud): gzugs bsgrub par bya ba de'i spyan sngar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dran par byed cing / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de la yang mchod na des na khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ 
133a3(rgyud): don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong phrag brgya 'gyur du bzlas brjod kyi cho ga chen po byas pa yin no// gang zhig khro bo don yod pa'i zhags pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mi smra bar lan
133a4(rgyud): gsum bzlas brjod byas te/ chus dbang bskur na des na khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bdag byang chub
133a5(rgyud): kyi snying po la thug gi bar du dbang bskur bar 'gyur snyam du de ltar shes par bya'o// gang gis don yod par grub pa'i tshe gzhib mo chen po'i gzungs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/ 
133a6(rgyud): dbang phyug ras kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar mngon sum du thal mo sbyar te 'dug nas lan gsum bzlas te/ bskor ba lan bdun byas la chu'i mchod yon dang / lha bshos dang / bdug spos
133a7(rgyud): dang / me tog phul nas phyag 'tshalo zhes smras na/ des khyod kyis 'di ltar shes par bya ste/ gzungs thams cad so sor lan stong phrag brgya bzlas par 'gyur zhing don yod pa'i zhags pA
133a8(rgyud): snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi rnam grangs chen po 'di lan stong phrag brgya bzlas par 'gyuraro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya byas la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/ 
133b1(rgyud): dbang phyug gi zhal la mig gtad de/ lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis sbyar la snying khar bzhag cing tshul 'dis phyag rgya re re nas lan stong phrag brgya byas par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das rigs
133b2(rgyud): kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa gang la la zhig 'phags pa spyan
133b3(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di brgya stong phrag khri bzlas brjod bya bar 'dod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa brgya stong phrag khris dbang bskur bar 'dod pa dang / 
133b4(rgyud): rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag gi cho ga zhib mo 'a de rdzogs par lan brgya stong khri bzlas par 'dod pa dang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya 'di lan brgya stong phrag
133b5(rgyud): khri bya bar 'dod pa des ras kyi sku gzugs la brtson par byaste/ ras kyi sku gzugs mngon du bzhag nas gan sa gtsang zhing dben pa/ gnas sa 'chag sa 'am/ dgon
133b6(rgyud): pa'i gnas sam phug gam/ ri'i rtse mo 'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ khang par gtsang sbra dang byi dor byas te ba ser mo'i lcib legs par mnyes la/ ba las byung ba lnga dang bsres te
