133b7(rgyud): bskus la spos sna tshogs kyi byug pas byugs nas/ ras kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bya ste gur gum gyis khru do'i tshad tsam bris la gla rtsi dang / ga pur gyis
133b8(rgyud): mchod par bya'o// dri chab kyi bum pa dri rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bkang ste/ ras kyi mgul chings kyis bcings la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag pa dang / me tog dang bdug
134a1(rgyud): spos dri zhim po dang / gtor ma dang / me tog gi phreng ba nyi shu rtsa gcig bzhag par bya/ dri chab kyis bkang ba brgyad phyogs bzhir bzhag par bya'o// 'o mas
134a2(rgyud): bkang ba'i snod brgyad bzhag par bya/ stegs bu'i drung du 'o mas bkang ba'i snod bzhag par bya/ 'o thug dang / sbyar thug dang / khaN+Da kha d+ya dang / 'bras chan dang / lag pan dang / bu
134a3(rgyud): ram dang / sha kha ra dang / zhun mar gyis bkang ba'i snod bzhag par bya/ a ga ru nag po dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / ga bur dang / kun tu ru dang / shi ri bA sa ka dang / cung
134a4(rgyud): beng rnams snod du bzhag nas/ a ga ru'i yam sreg de shing gis sbyin bsreg bya/ me tog sna tshogs kyi sa rgyan par mar gyi mar me sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis bltam
134a5(rgyud): par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos shing khrus legs par byas pas tshe sa bcu bzhi nas bco lnga'i bar du 'phags pa
134a6(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs kyis dbang phyug gi ras kyi sku gzugs la mchod par bya'o// de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas te dri chab kyis dbang
134a7(rgyud): bskur bar bya/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bya// de nas mi smra bar skyil mo krung du 'dug ste bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings la/ don yod pa'i zhags/ 
134a8(rgyud): pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa bya/ de'i 'og tu don yod par grub pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par byas na/ de nas ras kyi sku gzugs las 'od zer/ 
134b1(rgyud): bdun drung nas kun tu snang bar byas te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dpral ba'i spyan du zhugs par 'gyuraro// zhugs pa tsam gyis modo la
134b2(rgyud): sa chen po g.yo bar 'gyur zhing rig sngags 'chang yang snying dga' zhing ba spu ldang bar 'gyur/ mdog mdangs yongs su dag par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
134b3(rgyud): gi mchog sbyin pa'i phyag gi sor mo las lha'i chu 'dzag par 'gyur/ zhabs gnyis las 'o ma 'dzag par 'gyur/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag 'bar bar 'gyur/ phyag na pad+ma'i/ 
134b4(rgyud): pad+ma lo ma g.yo bar 'gyuraro// rtse gsum g.yo bar 'gyur zhing leg so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rig ras kyi bu leg so logs so// khyod kyis don yod pa'i
134b5(rgyud): zhags pa'i snying po grub kyis las thams cad byos shig/ khyod kyi don yod grub kyi cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen bo dam pa grub po zhes nas/ de nas 'phags pa spyan
134b6(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs ston par mdzad do// 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog sbyin par mdzad do// 'di ni grub pa'i mchog bla na med pa ste/ ma bsgrubs par las
134b7(rgyud): byed pa'o// de nas dbang du bya bar 'dod pa na me tog pad+ma la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phul te/ gang gi ming nas brjod pa de dbang du/ 
134b8(rgyud): 'gyuraro// sna ma'i me tog la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phul lo// yang lan bdun bzlas nas me tog snying po blangs te gang la byin pa
135a1(rgyud): dbang du 'gyuraro// gdon gyis zin pa la byin na gdon thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyuraro// nad kyis thebs pa la byin na nad thams cad las yongasu grol
135a2(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// rgyal po'i sgor gtor na rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro// mi ro bsregs pa'i sa'i steng du gtor na sems can de sems can dmyal ba las
135a3(rgyud): yongasu grol bar 'gyur/ mnar med pa na gnas pa'i sems can la gtor na skad cig de la yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ nyal ba'i sngas su bzhag na rmi lam chen po mthong bar 'gyur/ 
135a4(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku ston par mdzad cing yid du 'ong ba thams cad gsung bar 'gyur ro// skyes pa 'am bud med gang gi steng du gtor ba de dbang du
135a5(rgyud): 'gyur zhing grib ma bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur// rgyal po'i steng du gtor na de bzhin du 'gyur ro// lha'i gzugs brnyan gyi steng du gzhag na 'gug par 'gyur zhing las thad
135a6(rgyud): byed par 'gyuraro// mig sman la sgrub par 'dod pas ras kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar mig sman ldong ros la stong rtsa brgyad bzlas na grub pa'i rtags gsum ston par 'gyur te/ 'bar
135a7(rgyud): ba dang dbu ba 'byung ba dang / dud pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ des mig la bskus na mi snang bar 'gyuraro// gter thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad
135a8(rgyud): mthong bar 'gyur// dpral bar thig le byas na phug thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur/ sgo thams cad dang 'khrul 'khor thams cad 'bye bar 'gyuraro// yan lag dang nying lag la
135b1(rgyud): bskus na nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ spyi bor thig le byas na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mchog sbyin par 'gyuraro// mig la byugs na khyab 'jug dang dbang phyug
135b2(rgyud): chen po la sogs pa lha rnams rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur zhing dgos pa thams cad 'grub par byed do// mtshan mo mig la bskus na nyin mo bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur zhing
135b3(rgyud): gter thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur te/ kha phug tu bzhag nas dor bar bya'o// rang gi lus la byug na ji srid 'tsho'i bar du go cha bgos pa'i lus su 'gyur/ gnod sbyin dang / srin
135b4(rgyud): po la sogs pas mi mthong bar 'gyur zhing las thams/ cad byed par 'gyur te/ tshe bskal pa stong thub pa ra 'gyuraro// yang na bza' ba dang snying khar bsku ba byas na
135b5(rgyud): nag pochen po'i gzugs su 'gyur zhing lha thams cad kyi gzug sa ston par 'gyur ba nas tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs dang / gzugs sna tshogs
135b6(rgyud): mang po ston par 'gyur/ zla ba dang / nyi ma ston par 'gyur/ ldong ros dang / gi'u wang dang / so'u bi rA ka dang / gur gum dang / kra ku d+ha la don yod par grub pa khri bzlas/ don yod pa
135b7(rgyud): zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas/ khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas te/ thams cad du mi smra bar bya zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar btag
135b8(rgyud): la/ ras kyi sku gzugs la mngon du phyogs te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la tshes bco lnga nya la nyin zhag so gcig spang ba byas nas phye ma zhib tu btags te/ yang don yan
136a1(rgyud): pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dang / khro bo'i rgyal po dang / don yod pa grub pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ 'phags pa sman
136a2(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag tu bzhag ste/ mchod pa chen po byas nas ras kyi sku gzugs la mchod pa byas la nyin zhag gcig myong ba byas te/ ras kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan
136a3(rgyud): sngar skyil mo krung du 'dug la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bya/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa byas te/ bzlas brjod kyi phyag
136a4(rgyud): rgya byas la/ khro bo'i gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas te// de'i 'og tu mig la bskus nas don yod par grub pa'i gzungs bzlas par byas na bskus pa tsam gyis
136a5(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ri bo po Ta la dang bcas/ gzhal med khang dang bcas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i ri bo po Ta la na gan+da
136a6(rgyud): pa mthong bar 'gyuraro// bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong bar 'gyur zhing de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med chos 'chad pa mthong bar 'gyur/ chos bshad pa de yang thos
136a7(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhal med khang dang bcas
136a8(rgyud): pa mthong bar 'gyur zhing chos 'chad pa'i gsung gi sgra de yang thos par 'gyuraro// 'di ltar rigs ngan gyi rigasu skyes pa dang / mnar med pa la gzhol ba dang / mtshams med pa lnga byed
136b1(rgyud): pa gang yin pa thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thugs rjes dgongs par 'gyur zhing rma
136b2(rgyud): lam du ston par mdzad do// sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur/ mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i dngos grub sbyin
136b3(rgyud): par 'gyur/ lha'i lo stong du 'tshe bar 'gyur zhing lha'i bde ba nyam su myong bar 'gyur/ nad kyis thebs pa thams cad la mig sman 'dis bskus na nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur zhing
136b4(rgyud): rims thams cad sel bar 'gyur// dug thams cad la ba skus pa tsam gyis dug med par 'gyuraro// 'jigs pa thams cad la mig la bskus na mi mthong bar 'gyur/ 
136b5(rgyud): phyir rgol ba dang / dgra bo dang / g.yon can dang gachom po dang / rkun po thams cad kyis mi mthong bar 'gyur/ mtshe/ na gdab pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ 'thab pa
136b6(rgyud): dang rtsod pa dang / khrag khrug la mig la bskus na thams cad las rgyal zhing lan thebs par 'gyuraro// g.yul ngo thams cad du mig la bskus na g.yul 'gyed pa las rgyal bar 'gyur zhing
136b7(rgyud): dpung gi mchog rgyal bar 'gyuraro// rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro ba'i tshe mig la bskus na rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyuraro// mi smra bar grong khyer du song na skyes pa dang bud med/ 
136b8(rgyud): dang / khye'u dang / du mgrong khyer na gnas so cog thams cad dbang du 'gyur// mig g.yas pa la bskus na rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten gang mig gis mthong ba de thams cad dbang du 'gyur// 
137a1(rgyud): mig g.yon pa la skus na rigs ngan thams cad dbang du 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag g.yas pa nas brdung ste/ don yod pa grub pa/ 
137a2(rgyud): rig sngags kyi rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas na de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dang / khro bo'i rgyal
137a3(rgyud): po dang / gzungs thams cad so so'i lan stong phrag brgya brgya bzlas par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag drug bcu'i
137a4(rgyud): drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur/ thams cad kyis gzung ba byas par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa stong mnyes par byas par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa
137a5(rgyud): stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi mngon du mthong ba thob par 'gyu/ ra 'jig rten pa'i don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// / sngon gyi sgrib pas mnar med pa'i gnasu 'gro ba yong
137a6(rgyud): su dag par 'gyur/ nams kyang ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ tshe rabs tshe rabs su skye ba dran par 'gyur/ lha thams cad kyang mchog sbyin par 'gyur zhing rtag tu srung ba dang / 
137a7(rgyud): bskyab pa dang / sba ba byed par 'gyuraro// phyag g.yon pa mnan te lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na bzlas pa tsam gyi mdo la lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po la sogs
137a8(rgyud): pa bkug par 'gyur zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyur te gnas so// gang gi tshe dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe don yod par grub pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po lan bdun bzlas pa byas na lha dang / 
137b1(rgyud): klu la sogs pa thams cad kyang las thams cad byed cing rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyuraro// lte ba'i gnas su mnan te klu la sogs pa thams cad char gyi rgyun 'bebs
137b2(rgyud): par 'gyur te/ 'dzam bu'i gling mtha' dag tshim par byed par 'gyuraro snyam du lan brgya rtsa brgya bzlas na gang dang gang du song ba der skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ rgyal po 'am/ rgyal mo
137b3(rgyud): 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma la gang bsams pa dang / gang bcol ba dang / gang smras pa'i las de thams cad bsgrub par 'gyuraro// dbu
137b4(rgyud): nas bzung te bzlas na tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du dab dang du byas par 'gyur te/ thams cad la dbang ba sgyur cing bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyuraro// thog mar bzlas
137b5(rgyud): brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas nas bzlas pa bya'o// zhab/ sa gnyis mnan te stong phrag bcu bzlas pa byas na/ sa 'og yan chad dbang du byas par 'gyur zhing las thad
137b6(rgyud): byed par 'gyur te/ mngag gzhug pa thams cad byed par 'gyuraro// pad+ma la stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas pad+ma'i mche'ur bor na pad+ma zad mi shes pa 'byung zhing pad+ma dus thams
137b7(rgyud): cad par 'gyuraro// ud pa la la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas ud pa la'i mtshe'ur bor na/ ud pa la sngon po zad mi shes pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing nams kyang nyams par mi
137b8(rgyud): 'gyur te/ dus thams cad du me tog 'thung bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin du sna ma'i me tog dang / gan d+ha bA rI ka dang / yU thi ka dang / na ba mA'i me tog rnams kyang dus thams cad
138a1(rgyud): du me tog 'byung bar 'gyur zhing zad mi shes par 'gyuraro// 'bras bu dang me tog la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ bskyed mos tshal lam/ nags tshal gyi
138a2(rgyud): nang du gtor na me tog dang / 'bras bu zad mi shes shing dus thams cad par 'gyuraro// dpal chen mo dgug par 'dod pas spra tshil las lha mo dpal chen mo skyil mo krung phyed du
138a3(rgyud): 'dug pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ lus btud pa/ lag pa na pad+ma thogs pa/ brang rgyas pa byas la 'bras bu dang / me tog dgram par bya zhing ga bur dang / gla rtsi
138a4(rgyud): dang / tsan dan dkar pos mchod pa byas la ras kyi sku gzugangs kyi spyan sngar bzhag par bya zhing sngar tsan dan dkar po las byas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzhin byas la/ 
138a5(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ras kyi sku gzu/ gas la a ga ru'i bdug pa dbul bar bya/ dpal/ lha mo chen mo la tsan dan dkar po'i bdug pa dbul bar
138a6(rgyud): bya zhing gnyis ka la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur bya/ gtor ma dkar po dang / dri chab dbul bar bgyi/ mchod yon stong dbul bar bya ste/ rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma dus gsu
138a7(rgyud): du khrus byas shing gos gtsang ma bgos pas mngon du phyogs te skyil mo krung du 'dug nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan bdun byas la ci rnyed pa'i dri dang / phreng ba dang / me
138a8(rgyud): tog la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ dpal lha mo chen po'i mgo la gdags par bya/ me tog gzhan gyis mchod pa bya zhing tsan dan dkar
138b1(rgyud): bo la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i bdug spos dbul bar bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya zhing / yungs kar
138b2(rgyud): re re bzlas la dpal lha mo chen mo le bsnun par bya ste/ stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / dpal lha mo chen mo 'bar bar 'gyur zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dpral ba n+da
138b3(rgyud): 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad gang yin pa thams cad gser du snang bar 'gyuraro// dpal lha mo chen mo bkug par 'gyur zhing ji srid 'tshe'i bar du 'da'
138b4(rgyud): bar mi 'gyuraro// lha'i dpal rjesu spyod par 'dod na nyin re zhi dang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / dpal lha mo chen mo la dus gsum du mchod pa bya zhing
138b5(rgyud): mchod yon gyi snod kyang bzhag par bya/ dkon mchog ga/ sum mchod par bya/ sbyin par bya/ longs spyad par bya/ bsod nams kyang bya zhing dpal lha mo chen mo// 
138b6(rgyud): la dus gsum du mchod par bya'o// yang na dpal lha mo chen mo rang gi gzugs kyis gnas par 'dod pas don yod pa'i rgyal po khro bo'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya zhing tsan dan
138b7(rgyud): gyi ril bu stong rtsa brgyad kyis bdug par bya/ yungs kar stong rtsa brgyad kyis bsnun par bya ste yungs kar stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / dpal lha mo chen mo rgyan thams cad kyis
138b8(rgyud): brgyan pa/ lha'i nor bu dang / gser dang / mu tig gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i lus snang la zhal pad+ma kha phye ba lta bu/ spyan ud pa la sngon po ltar gsal ba/ pad+ma bsnams pa/ glang/ 
139a1(rgyud): pad+ma/ nor bu dang / rin po che dang / gser mang po'i pad+ma'i char 'bebs pa/ rin po che 'bar ba'i bum pa stong phrag brgya thogs pa/ lha'i bu mo dang gnod sbyin gyi
139a2(rgyud): bu mo brgya stong mang po thams cad lha'i rgyan gyis brgyan pas lus gsal zhing 'bar la mdzes pa mang pos yongasu bskor ba mdun na 'khod par 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gis 'jig
139a3(rgyud): par mi bya zhing sems dga' bar byas la/ gsang sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas par bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ 
139a4(rgyud): ma hA kA ru NI kA ya/ ma hA a mo g+ha ba ra dA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pad+mi NaM/ pad+ma ne tra pad+mA ge/ pad+ma d+ha re/ pad+ma ba ti/ pad+ma pri ye/ pad+ma gau rI/ pad+ma pra b+h+re/ pad+ma san prA toSh+TA
139a5(rgyud): te/ a ba lo kaM ta pri ye ba re de/ ba rA dA yi ni/ pr-i saMta// pra sA d+ha ya/ ku ru ku ru/ Ar+ya a ba le ki ta ba ra daM/ hu ru hu ru/ ba ra gi ni tsa la tsa la/ pad+ma bi b+hU
139a6(rgyud): ta pad+ma pri ye pad+ma gau rIbi tsi tra tra bi mA na d+ha re/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sam+ba ra sma ra sa ma ya/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra sa me/ sat+ya a d+hiSh+Ti ta de bi/ a mo g+ha pA sha ba ra de hUM
139a7(rgyud): na mo stu te swA hA// lan bdun bzlas pa tsam gyis lha mo dpal chen mo phyag brkyang ste/ rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur zhing / 'di skad ces kyang gsung par
139a8(rgyud): 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu tshur shog/ thugs las skyes pa/ gsung las skyes pa khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po khro bo dang bcas pa grub kyis/ don yod pa'i zhags
139b1(rgyud): pa pad+ma dri ma med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i gzungs la zhugs shig/ nga'i gnas la rang gi khyim bzhin du las su bya ba thams cad byos shig/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yang
139b2(rgyud): rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / gzung sngags 'di lan gsum bzlas brjod bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA
139b3(rgyud): satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM b+ha ga ba te/ mA tri dza ne tri/ ba ra ba ra/ a ba lo ki ta ba ra de/ k+Shi ri na pra ba tu/ a ma ba/ a ma ba/ bi pu la kIrti ka re/ 
139b4(rgyud): pra bar b+hu dze/ a mo g+ha pA sha ha ste swA hA/ de'i da'og tu lha mo dpal chen mo'i nu ma gnyis las 'o ma de'i rgyun 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'o ma'i rgyun de khas bzad de/ 
139b5(rgyud): 'thungs pa tsam gyi mdo la lha'i me tog pad+ma dang / mu da ltar 'jam pa'i lha'i lus su 'gyur/ smanra zad 'khyil cing 'khyil la mig ud pa la/ sngon po lnga
139b6(rgyud): bu dang / tshig gsal zhing mi 'am ci'i sgra dbyangs dang ldan par 'gyur/ don yod pa'i rgya mtsho'i nor bu chen po pad+ma la rnam par lta ba'i dpal dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i cho ga
139b7(rgyud): zhib ma'i rgyal po mngon sum du 'gyur/ tshig zhi'i ma mang po 'grub par 'gyur/ tshel stong phrag bcu thu par 'gyur/ rgyal ba 'ad dpag med byang chub sems dang tshogs
139b8(rgyud): thabs cig tu gzhal med khang mchog na chos 'gro ba mthong bar 'gyur/ rdzu 'phrul gyis na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ nor bu chen po pad+ma la lta ba zhes bya ba don yod pa'i zhags
140a1(rgyud): pa chen po'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i gtso bo gcig pur 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras
140a2(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gi sras su 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras gcig pur 'gyur/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
140a3(rgyud): ldang dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi bu'i gtso bo gcig pur 'gyur/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i bu gcig pur 'gyur/ thams cad du stobs dang pha rol gnon pa dang / 
140a4(rgyud): brtson 'grus thogs pa med pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba rig sngags kyi rgyal po gsang
140a5(rgyud): ba'i gzungs kyi rgyal po cho ga zhib mo zab pa dag mdze na sum du 'gyur/ lha thams cad kyi gnas dang / klu thams cad kyi gnas dang / mi 'am ci thams cad kyi gnas
140a6(rgyud): dang phug dang / khung gi gnas thams cad sgo 'byed par 'gyur/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gnas thams cad sgo 'byed par cha/ thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing bgyi ba ci mchis zhes bya/ 
140a7(rgyud): ba byed cing 'dug par 'gyur/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi ston pa bla ma gcig pu 'jig rten mgon po dang 'dra bar mchod pa'i gnasu 'gyur/ 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das
140a8(rgyud): pa'i gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad grub pa chen por 'gyur/ dpal lha mo chen mo 'khor dang bcas pa la sbyin sreg byas na rig sngags 'chang de la bu bzhin du byams
140b1(rgyud): pas rang nyid bsnyen bkur yongasu spyod do// 'dod pa thams cad dang yid du 'ong ba thams cad kyi dgos pa byed par 'gyuraro// nor bu dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / 
140b2(rgyud): mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / shang kha shi la dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / lha'i nor bu rin po che'i bar thams cad sbyin par byed do// yul ka shi ka'i gos bzang po mang po sbyin pa
140b3(rgyud): byed cing lha'i bza' ba dang / btung ba'i bar dang / bdud rtsi'i bar du sbyin par byed do// gnas thams cad du song ba na yang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bu la byams pa'i tshul gyis rtag
140b4(rgyud): tu phyi bzhin 'brang zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gi rang gi khyim yang rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo tsa da na ji lta ba de bzhin du rig sngags 'chang gi gzhal med khang
140b5(rgyud): mchog tu 'gyuraro// rnam thos kyi bu'i gnas na 'bru/ ra pa ji ltar ba bzhin rgyas par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa da / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen pos dus kun tu 'ong bar
140b6(rgyud): 'gyuraro// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdo rje 'chang yang rig sngags 'chang gi tshogs thams cad dang / gnod sbyin chen po gsang ba pa'i 'khor rnams dang / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung ba
140b7(rgyud): dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba byed par 'gyuraro// de bzhin du dpal lha mo chen mo 'khor dang bcas pa dang / rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin bye bas yongasu bskor bas nyin mtshan du srung ba dang / bskyab
140b8(rgyud): pa dang / sba ba byed par 'gyu ro// de nas don yod pa'i rgya mtsho nor bu chen po pad+ma la lha'i dpal dri ma med pa zhes bya ba don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po klags pas 'grub par
141a1(rgyud): 'gyur zhing de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma byed khrag khrig brgya stong drug bcu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra mo snyed las dge ba'i rtsa
141a2(rgyud): bskyed par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gis
141a3(rgyud): lha'i nor bu rin po che chen po dang / nor bu rin po che chen po sna bdun dang / lha'i gser dang / gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog mang po dang / lha'i gos dang / lha'i rgyan dang / lha'i dri dang / me tog dang / me
141a4(rgyud): tog phreng dang / byug pa rnams re re zhing 'phang du ri'i rgyal po re rab btsam gyi phung po byas nas de dag de bzhin gshegs pa gang dga'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa
141a5(rgyud): bzhi'i rdul phra mo snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ya nga dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa re re la tshul de lta bus so sor de bzhin gshegs/ 
141a6(rgyud): pa thams cad la nyin re zhing lo gcig gi bar du dbul bar byed/ mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed cing de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i spyan sngar dri zhim po dang ldan pa'i til mar rgya mtsho tsam gyis bkang
141a7(rgyud): ba'i mar me bltam par byed pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po yongs su bzung bar 'gyuraro// gal te don yod pa'i rgya mtsho'i nor bu chen po pad+ma la rnam par lta ba'i
141a8(rgyud): dpal dri ma med pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di klog pa dang / bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byed pa 'di ni bsod nams kyi phung po de dang ldan par 'gyur zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan par
141b1(rgyud): 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongasu gzungs par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku ston par
141b2(rgyud): 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung ston par 'gyur/ dpal lha mo chen mo de yang mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur/ dus kun tu de'i khyim du dpal gnas par 'gyur te/ gang na
141b3(rgyud): dpal lha mo chen mo gnas pa de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra mo dang mnyam pas phyogs de nyid du gnas par 'gyur te/ 
141b4(rgyud): dpal lha mo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum yin/ dpa'i phyiraro// lha dang / klu dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab la jug dang / dbang phyug chen po'i gsang sngags dang / cho ga
141b5(rgyud): zhing mo dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / drag shul la spyod pa dang / las sna tshog sa gzhan dag pas dpal lha mo chen mo las mchog tu
141b6(rgyud): bstan to// dpal lha mo chen mo ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yum yin no// dpal lha mo chen mo ni don yod pa'i mchog sbyin pa'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa sbyin pa'o// don
141b7(rgyud): yod pa'i grags pa rgya chen po sbyin pa'o// don yod pa'i na mkha' gzhal med khang 'chang ba'o// don yod pa'i yon tan bsgrags pa'i mchog sbyin pa'o// dpal lha mo chen mo ni don yod pa zla ba
141b8(rgyud): dang nyi ma'i 'od byed pa gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi nang na dpal lha mo chen mo mchog tu bstan to// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma khrus legs par byas la/ dri chus bsangs shing ba las
142a1(rgyud): zung ba lngas thugs pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos pas kha zas gtsang ma bza' bar bya zhing chang dang / sha dang / beg cod dang / sgrog rgya dang / ke'u rnams dang / 'dres pa dang / 
142a2(rgyud): 'phags pa rnams yongasu spangs par bya/ kha zas ngan pa dang / btang ba ngan pa dang / gos ngan pa dang / dri ma can yongasu spangs par bya/ sems can ngan pa dang / sten pa dang / ngan g.yo can dang / 
142a3(rgyud): gsod sbyin can dang / skye bo ngan pa can dang / khrel med pa dang / snying rje med pa dang / byams pa dang / bral ba dang / thub chod can gyi skye bo ngan pa yongasu spangs par bya'o// gnas ngan pa dang / gan+da/ 
142a4(rgyud): rten ngan pa dang / bsgom nyes dang / bza' nyes dang / grib dam ngan pa yongasu spangs par bya/ gcig gis gcig / 'bags pa'i kha zas ngan pa yongasu spangs par bya zhing dri dang
142a5(rgyud): bdug spos kyis bsangs te/ mi smra bar bzlas brjod byam sa pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba'i sems dang / yi da bde bar bya/ bkra shis tshang bar bya zhing / snying dga' ba dang / 
142a6(rgyud): mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' ba'i semasu byas nas bzlas brjod bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la a ga ru'i bdug pa dbul bar bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la du ru
142a7(rgyud): ka'i bdug pa dbul bar bya/ dpal lha mo chen mo la tsan dan gyi bdug spos dbul bar bya zhing dus ji lta ba'i me tog dbul bar bya ste/ gsang sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te thams cad
142a8(rgyud): la dbul bar bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHAr+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM puSh+pa bi lo ki te/ gan d+ha sa re/ a mo g+ha dza la sam pa/ 
142b1(rgyud): ra Ni pad+ma sa ma b+hu re/ tar ta ra/ mu daM te b+hu swA hA// lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ me tog dang / bdug spos dang / dri dang mchod yon dbu'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs/ 
142b2(rgyud): drung du stong rtsa brgyad bzlas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan gsum bzlas la a ga ru'i bdug spos dbul bar bya zhing ji snyed pa'i me tog dbul bar bya/ 
142b3(rgyud): spos dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bltam par bya zhing de nyid kyi zhabs drung du skyil mo krung du 'dug la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bltas la/ snying po'i gzungs lan brgya
142b4(rgyud): brgyad bzlas la bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya byas te/ don yod dpa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan bdun bcing ba byas na da dacings pa tsam gyi mod la sku gzugs g.yo bar 'gyur zhing sku
142b5(rgyud): thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur/ rang gi lus spu zing zhes bye da par 'gyur/ tho rangs 'phags pa spyan ras ga zigs dbang phyug sku ston par 'gyur te yid la bsams pa
142b6(rgyud): thams cad bka' stsol bar 'gyur// mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur/ 'dod pa'i mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur/ dbugs kyang 'byin par 'gyur/ yid du 'ong ba thams cad yongasu
142b7(rgyud): rdzogs par byed/ tshe 'di nyid la nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur/ sgrib pa dang sdig pa thad zad cing mthar thug par 'gyur/ 
142b8(rgyud): nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongasu grol bar 'gyur/ phas kyi rgol ba dang / dgra bo thams cad 'jig par 'gyur zhing mi tshugs par 'gyur/ g.yul ngor 'jug pa'i tshe rig
143a1(rgyud): sngags kyi rgyal po 'di yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas dmag gi nang du gtor ba byas na thams cad rengs par byas pa dang / rmugs par
143a2(rgyud): byas par 'gyuraro// 'di'i snying po dang gsang sngags ni 'di yin no// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHAr+ya a ba le kau te shwa rA ya/ be d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ 
143a3(rgyud): tad+ya thA/ oM a mo gA bA sha hr-i da ya/ pad+me ni ba ra de/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra sa ri ta pad+ma b+hu dze swA hA// snying po'i rig sngags so// oM a ba lo ko ta waM/ kha raM gi nai tu ru hUM swA hwe// nye ba'i
143a4(rgyud): snying po'i gzungs so// don yod pa'i rgya mtsho'i nor dbu pad+ma rnam par lta ba'i dpal dri ma med pa/ don yo dad pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i mchog zhib mo'i gzungs 'di/ 
143a5(rgyud): rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na mtshams med pa lnga zad par 'gyur/ lha mo dpal chen mo rtag tu rgyun mi 'a/ chad par mchog sbyin par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras
143a6(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug dus kun tu sku ston par bzhed par 'gyur/ de'i lus la dug thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/ 'jigs pa chen po mi bzad pa brgyad las yong
143a7(rgyud): su grol bar 'gyur/ rims thams cad dang / nad thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyuraro// gdon thams cad la tshon sna lnga'i srad bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te mdud
143a8(rgyud): pa nyi shu rtsa gcig por la gu gul gyis bdugs te mgul du btags na gdon thams cad las yongasu grol bar 'gyuraro// gal te nag po chen po dang / ma mo 'ongs te rgyas btab pa
143b1(rgyud): gang yin pa yang gdon thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyuraro// skud pa nag pos rims nyin gcig pa las yongs su grol bar 'gyuraro// gzhan dag la ni thams cad du srad bu dkar
143b2(rgyud): pos gsal bar bya'o// 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / khrag khrug thams cad la gi'u wang la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ thig le byas na thams cad du thogs pa med par 'gyur// 
143b3(rgyud): snying khar thig le byas na gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za la sogs pa thams cad kyis mi mthong bar 'gyuraro// lag mthil la thig le byas na skyes pa dang bud med
143b4(rgyud): dang / khye'u dang / bu mo gang la reg pa dbang du 'gyuraro// / smin mtshams su thig le byas na rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyuraro// mgul bar byugs
143b5(rgyud): na rje rigs thams cad dbang du 'gyuraro// dpung pa gnyi sa la byugs na rgyal rigs thams cad dbang du 'gyuraro// dpral ba'i skra mtshams su thig le byas na bram ze zad
143b6(rgyud): dbang du 'gyur ro// lte ba'i gnas su thig le byas na dmangs ris thams cad dbang du 'gyuraro// rkang pa'i rje ngar la byugs na dpag tshad brgyar ngal ba med par 'gro zhing slar yang 'ong
143b7(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// rkang mthil la bskus na chu klung chen po'i pha rol phyin par 'gyur zhing rgya mtsho'i bar du rgal bar 'gyuraro// dpung pa gnyis la byugs na gyad kyis mi thub par 'gyuraro// 
143b8(rgyud): pus mo gnyis la byugs na me'i phung po chen po 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar bar zhugs na tsan dan dang spu shel tshe ji bzhin du bsil bar 'gyuraro// bser skya'i 'o ma dang sbyar te mig la bskus
144a1(rgyud): na mtshan mo yang nyin mo bzhin du snang bar 'gyuraro// gter thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur zhing gal te de bskal pa stong du bzhag pa zhig na yang 'byung bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin du lho la/ 
144a2(rgyud): bskus na ji srid du lho chus ma bkrus pa de srid du kha zas dang btung ba mi 'dod par 'gyuraro// pho mtshan la bskus na khu ba 'gags pa byas par 'gyuraro// ba las byung ba lnga dang bsres te 'thung na lus
144a3(rgyud): dag cing dri ma med la gtsang zhing spyod pa gtsang ba dang ldan par 'gyuraro// bsgom nyes dang / bza' nyes dang / grib ma ngan pa dang blta nyes su mi 'gyur/ 'jigs pa thams cad las yongasu
144a4(rgyud): grol bar 'gyur/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad las yo dngasu grol bar 'gyur/ rmi lam ngan pa dang / bltas dngan pa dang / bkra mi shis pa'i dngos po thams cad 'dzag
144a5(rgyud): par 'gyur/ dug dang / dbyig dug dang / byad thams cad 'a/ jig par 'gyur/ gsang sngags dang sbyor ba dang / ga tor ma rnams 'jig par 'gyur/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa
144a6(rgyud): dang / khrag khrugs rnams kyi lan 'debs par 'gyur zhing thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur/ phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba dang / pha rol gyi dpung gi 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar
144a7(rgyud): mi 'gyuraro// zhun mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig sbyar te tho rangs kyi dus su mi smra bar byas nas zos na bklags pas tshigasu bcad pa stong 'dzin par 'gyuraro// sbyor ba zhag bdun du byas na
144a8(rgyud): bstan bcos thams cad la mngon sum du 'gyur ro// zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu sbyor ba byas na gsang sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang phyag rgya rim par phye
144b1(rgyud): pa thams cad la mngon sum du 'gyuraro// zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig zla ba gcig tu sbyor ba byas na thos pa mang po rgya mtsho bsags par 'gyuraro// sbyor ba lo gcig gi bar du byas na tshe lo stong thu
144b2(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// 'jig rten thams cad na bla ma gcig pur 'gyur zhing dga' ba dang tshig btsun par yang 'gyu ro// til mar dang lhan cig bskol te mgo la bskus na skra cung zad 'khyil cing
144b3(rgyud): lcang lo can du 'gyur ro// bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor la bskus na ston ka'i zla ba nya dang mtshungs par 'gyur zhing me tog pad+ma dang / ku mu da ltar 'jam par 'gyur/ lus thams cad la byug
144b4(rgyud): na mar dang 'dra bar 'jam por 'gyur zhing rkang lag shin/ tu gzhon sha can du 'gyur/ rna ba la blugs na rna ji tsam 'dod pa skye bar 'gyur/ sna nas btang na klad pa'i nad
144b5(rgyud): de cog 'jig par 'gyur zhing snabs dang mchil ma 'byung ba ra mi 'gyur/ lha'i spos kyi dri mnam par 'gyur zhing nam kyang yid du mi 'ong ba'i dri mnam par mi 'gyur/ gnyer
144b6(rgyud): ma dang / skra dkar spangs par 'gyur/ so rgal ba yang gsar du skye bar 'gyur/ lce pad+ma'i lo ma ltar 'jam par 'gyur/ mid pa'i nad dang ske 'gags pa thams cad las yongs su
144b7(rgyud): grol bar 'gyur/ 'jam tsam du byas te sna ba bkang na sim par byed cing lha'i rna ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ sgra yad du 'ong ba dang / bkra shis pa'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// de lta bas na
144b8(rgyud): gi'u wang gi cho ga chen po bsgrub par bya'o// de nas legs par grub pa mchog tu dge ba/ dge bar 'gro ba mig rkang zhes bya ba bshad par bya ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying
145a1(rgyud): po 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas nas/ don yod pa'i rgya mtsho'i nor bu pad+ma la rnam par lta ba'i dpal dri ma med pa don yod/ 
145a2(rgyud): pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos shing khrus legs par byas pas kha zas dkar po zos la/ mig rkang gi ril bu khar
145a3(rgyud): cug na ji snyed bshad pa dang / bklags pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ lce pad+ma dang ku mu da'i lo ma ltar 'jam par 'gyur/ mi 'am ci'i sgra dbyangs dang ldan par 'gyur/ de las lha'i sgra
145a4(rgyud): yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ gang la smras pa de dag bran po dang / bran mo bzhin du gnas par 'gyur/ gang la dri man dam pa de yang dbang du 'gyur/ tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su
145a5(rgyud): gyur pa yang dbang du byed do// 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / gnod sbyin mo dang / yi dgasadang / sha za la sogs pa thams cad dang / brjid byed dang / 
145a6(rgyud): sdang ba dang / rab tu sdang ba dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad dri des 'byer bar 'gyur zhing phyogs bzhir dpag tshad brgyar byer nas thag ring po na 'khod par 'gyuraro// phyir rgol ba dang / sdang ba
145a7(rgyud): dang / rab tu bsdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa thams cad dri des 'byer bar 'gyur zhing byams pa'i sems kyis dbang du 'gyur ro// dpung pa g.yas pa la btags na lag pas glang po che gnon
145a8(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa chen por 'gyuraro// gyad kyis mi thub par 'gyuraro// rdo rje 'chang dang 'dra ba'i mthu stobs ston par 'gyuraro// mgul du btags
145b1(rgyud): te g.yul ngor song na gcig pus dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi las rgyal bar 'gyur zhing slar yang 'ong bar 'gyuraro// spyi bor gzhag ste rgyal po'i pho brang du song na rgyal po'i btsun mo'i khor
145b2(rgyud): dang bcas pa dang / blon po dang / blon po chen po dang / bram ze mdun na 'don dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur zhing spyi bo la dbang bskur bar 'gyur/ thams cad du thogs pa med pa dang ldan par
145b3(rgyud): 'gyur/ lag pa la btags na gang la reg pa de thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / gser la reg pa tsam gyis zad mi shes par 'gyur
145b4(rgyud): sa bon gdab pa dang / brda ba byas na zad mi shes par 'di dal bar 'gyur/ rin po che'i lag pa dang 'dra bar la/ dar/ 'bru'i phung po 'phel bar 'gyur/ nyi ma re re zos na dran pa
145b5(rgyud): dang blo chen po 'phel bar 'gyur/ sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur 8/ rims thams cad sel bar 'gyur/ 'bras dang / mdze
145b6(rgyud): dang / lhog pa dang / lu'u ta dang / shu ba dang / g.yan pa dang / g.ya' ba dang / phol mig la byugs pa tsam gyis 'jig par 'gyur zhing nams kyang tshugs par mi 'gyur ro// sbyor ba zla
145b7(rgyud): ba gcig tsam du byas na cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gyi mchog 'grub par 'gyuraro// dus kun tu lus la thogs na mtshon
145b8(rgyud): gzas pas lus la mi tshugs so// chom rkun dang / g.yon can thams cad kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyuraro// thams cad thogs pa med par 'gyur/ til mar dang lhan cig bskol
146a1(rgyud): te krang ban pa dang / rna ban pa dang / son pa dang / migan ba dang / klang pa phyed na bal 'jam tsa mthugs pa tsam gyis sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing phyin/ 
146a2(rgyud): chang nang gang yang 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro// gdon stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad la zhun mar dang yungs kar bsres te bdugs na/ dus nas phyogs bcur 'byer zhing nams kyang gnas kyis 'gro/ 
146a3(rgyud): der 'ong bar mi 'gyur// rang gi yad la 'dod pa'i dgos pa gzhan thams cad kyang byed par 'gyur ro// de nas lha thams cad 'gug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad spyan 'dren pa/ de
146a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bskul ba/ rig sngags da'achang thams cad kyi grub pa'i mtha'/ gnod sbyin dang /  srin po rnams dang / 'byung po gdon rnams dang / brjed
146a5(rgyud): byed dang / gnod sbyin mo rnams dang / yi dgas dang / naza dang / skem byed thams cad 'byer bar byed pa/ sdang / ba'i bdud rnams gsod pa/ nad thams cad zlog pa/ 
146a6(rgyud): gdug pa'i dug rnams bzlog pa/ mche ba'i dug dang / gnas pa'i dug dang / 'gro ba'i dug thams cad la thogs pa med par grub pa/ rims thams cad 'joms pa/ khyad par du rim
146a7(rgyud): nyin bzhi pa 'joms pa/ bzhin dang bar byed pa'i gtso bo// gos bdug pa'i mchog/ gsang sngags dang / byad thams cad dbang du byed pa'i mchog/ gang la rgyal po khros nas gshed mas
146a8(rgyud): mtshon gzas pa yang bdug pa 'dis bdugs na de thams cad zhi bar 'gyuraro// dug dang / dug sbyar ma dang / srog chags lu'u ta dang / sbrul gyis zin pa dang / srog chags gon se dang / 
146b1(rgyud): gzhan yang srog chags sna tshogs dug dang bcas pa mchog tu mi bzad pa rnams dang / gal te klu 'jog pos zin na yang bdugs pa tsam gyis dug thams cad med par 'gyuraro// nad kun
146b2(rgyud): 'phrog pa grub pa ste// sdig pa thams cad 'jig byed pa// bsod nams phung po che dang mnyam// grub pa lha rnams kun gyis mchod// brgya byin sum cu'i lha dang ni// lha min lhan cig/ 
146b3(rgyud): g.yul 'gyed che// gdug pa 'di yis bdug pa dang // lha min de bzhin pham par 'gyur// drag po yis ni sum rtseg bsregs// khyab 'jug gis ni ba li bcings// mi'u thung gis
146b4(rgyud): sa gzhi mnan// lha min dbang pos nyi zla dang // gza'/ dmas 'jam byas 'khrugs par gyur// bdug pa'i rgyal pos khyad par gyis// mi'u thung ni kun las rgyal/ 
146b5(rgyud): sgyu ma byed pa stong phrag brgya// rtag tu rnam par rgyal bar/ byed// gdug pa'i rgyal pos skya bsangs rnams// / rnam par pham par the tshom med// bdud ni bye ba stong phrag
146b6(rgyud): brgya la 'dren pas byams pa'i stobs kyis btul// bdud ni bye ba stong phrag brgya// bdud pa'i rgyal po'i mthu stobs kyis// sdang ba'i bdud ni yang dag zang // rgya mtsho rnam par dkrug
146b7(rgyud): byas pas// rgya mtshor gnas kun gcer bur gyur// snod gcig gis ni sum cha bskams// yid bzhin nor bu chud zos pas// don kun grub pa bdag nyid ches// bdug spos 'di yi
146b8(rgyud): gdugs byas nas// slar yang rang gi khyim 'ongs te// rtag tu rgyal mtshan rtser btags nas// bdug pa 'di yis bdug byas shing // nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du ni// rin chen
147a1(rgyud): bdun gyi char pa phab// de ltar bdug pa stobs ldan yin// las kyi don kun sgrub par byed// g.yul chen po ltung ba'i klu'i mtshor// dga' bo dang / nye dga' bos rgya
147a2(rgyud): mtsho chen po la// lhun po chen po'i ri rab kyis srubs pas/ dug 'dzags pa mgrin sngon gyis dug 'thungs pas bdug pa'i rgyal pos bskor bas dug med par byas so// bdug pa'i
147a3(rgyud): rgyal po 'di'i mthus bdud rtsir yongs su byas so// de ltar bdug pa'i rgyal pos dug thams cad 'joms par the tsom med do// gling bzhi pa yi drang srong gis// des ni maN+Dal pham par
147a4(rgyud): byas// gtan phyed la ni longs spyod pa'i// skra can dbang pos ltung bar byas// bdug pa'i rgyal po bsams pa yis// / brdzun du smra ba de rnams nyams// de phyir bden par smra ba'i
147a5(rgyud): phyir// bdug pa 'di ni bden pa ldan// bden pa'i rgyal pos/ rab tu bsgrags// bden pa'i chos dang bden par smra// mtha' dag bsdus las byams pa'i sems// 'jig
147a6(rgyud): rten kun la rtag tu byams// snying rje dang ni dga' ba nyid// bdug pa gzhan gyis bdugs pa 'di// mtshon cha thams cad 'joms par byed// bden pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i bdug pa 'di de
147a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon po 'jig rten pa'i rtag tu bla mar gyur pa'o// sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du rig sngags 'chang rnams
147a8(rgyud): kyi khyad par du dmyal ba bcu drug gi 'jigs pa mi bzad pa dang / 'jigs pa chen pos sdug bsngal gyi tshor nga myong bar 'gyur ba dang / yi dgas kyi sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa chen po cher mi zad pa/ 
147b1(rgyud): rtag tu bkres pa dang bsgom pas nyen pa/ kyi hud zhes sgra sgrogs par byed pa'i skrag pa de la/ skyabs med do// sems can thams cad rje su brtse bas brtan par kun tu blta bar bya'o// 'jig rten thang
147b2(rgyud): kyi skyabasu gsungs pa ni bdug pa'i rgyal po bla na med pa'o// gdug pa 'dis bdugs te/ gang gi don du mang nas smos pa yang / ma rungs pa'am/ yang na byams pa yang rung te// yid la bsams pa
147b3(rgyud): rnams sgrub par byed do// 'dis bdugs te brjod pa tsam gyis mod la/ 'di rnams thams cad rtag tu 'grub par byed te/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsung dge ba'o// gza' zla ba 'am/ 
147b4(rgyud): gza' nyi ma rgyu skar nyam nga ba la gnas pa/ sgra can gyis zos pa rnams dang mi gang yin pa skye ba'i gnod pa dang / rgyal dpo 'am yang na/ bud med dam/ blon po chen po dang / blon po dang
147b5(rgyud): bkrangs pa dang / 'dun na 'don dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram zi dang / dmangs rigs dang / rje rigs dang / skye bog zhan dang 'grogs pas gnod pa dang / 'thab pa nyid dang / 
147b6(rgyud): sdug bsngal mi zad pas nye bar 'tshe ba la bdug spos rgyal pos bdug pa de'i skad cig la de dag thams cad mi 'byung ngo // gza' ba dang btung ba shin tu zhim po thob te/ gos med pa'i skye bo/ 
147b7(rgyud): ges dang / rgyan dang / lha rdzas kyi dri dang phreng ba dang phyug pa dang / gos dang / bzhon pa dang / khri dang / nye bar bsten pa dang / lhab lhub thams cad skad cig gis 'byung te/ gal te yang dag
147b8(rgyud): par sbyar ba yin no// bsams pa dang / re ba dang / yid kyi shing rta thams cad mngon par smras pas 'grub par byed do// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gsung ste/ rtag tu 'di dag thams cad
148a1(rgyud): 'grub bo// yi dgas rnams kyis zas rnyed cing / lha rdzas kyi gos dang rgyan mchog rab tu 'gyur ro// bdag gi sdig pa thams cad rtag tu grol bas dmyal ba las grol te/ dmyal bas
148a2(rgyud): mi bzad pa thams cad las grol lo// sdug bsngal thams cad las grol te/ skye bo bde ba la rtse bar byed do// bde zhing bde 'gror 'gro la bde ba thams cad du thob par byed do// bdug spos 'dis bdug/ 
148a3(rgyud): pas mchog gis dri snom par byed de/ rdul dang mun pa can thams cad bdug pa bsnams pas sangs par byed de/ dper na nyi ma shar bas 'jig rten gyi mun pa rnam par sangs par byed pa bzhin no// 
148a4(rgyud): bdug pa'i rgyal po 'dis sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par nyam nges par byed cing dmyal ba thams cad dang sdigs pa dang 'ji rags pa thams cad las grol te/ sa bcu po thob cing / bde 'gro
148a5(rgyud): lam bzang po bstan pa de'i phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis bdu/ ga pa'i rgyal po 'di sbyar bar bya'o// de nas byang chub se/ mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/ 
148a6(rgyud): dbang phyug gis bdug chen po'i rgyal po chen po cho ga zhib mo dang rje su 'thun pa 'di gsungs so// 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar/ mchod rten la sa'i phyogs gang du bdug pa 'dis bdug par bya ste/ de
148a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas rtag tu byin gyis brlabs pa dang / thams cad du rgyal ba dang / de bzhin du lung bstan pa'i sa'i phyogs der gang ga'i bye ma bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag snyed kyi sangs rgyas rnam
148a8(rgyud): bzhugs pa der rig sngags 'chang gis gang du bdug spos kyi bdugs pas rdo rje 'chang bye ba brgya stong phrag rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang bcas/ bzhon pa dang bcas pa dang / rtag tu
148b1(rgyud): gangs ldan dang / de bzhin nor bu bzang po dang / lnga rtsen dang / gang ba bzang po dang / ke lI kI la dang / gnod sbyin chen po yang dag shes dang / mi la zhon pa dang / sangs rgyas stobs dang / stobs po che dang / 
148b2(rgyud): sgra sgo skyongs dang / na ba kU ber dang / rab 'joms dang / dz+ya Ta ba ka dang / stobs kyi lha dang / rdzu 'phrul chen po te 'di rnams sde dang bcas/ dpung dang bcas/ bzhon pa dang bcas pas nyin
148b3(rgyud): mtshan rtag tu gnas nas de bzhin nyid du srung bar byed do// bdag gis dpal sa gsum gyi lha mo brtag tu mchod do// rtag tu sa gzhi gang du gdug pa rab tu bdug par bya ste/ rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / de
148b4(rgyud): bzhin nyid du gsang ba pa dang bcas pa dang / chos 'dzin pa la mkhas pa rnams rtag tu srung bar byed cing / de bzhin de nyid du tshangs pa dang / drag po lha'i bu rnams dang bcas pa dang // 
148b5(rgyud): de bzhin nyid du khyab 'jug dang / lha'i ris sum cu rtsa gnyis po thams cad du dus rtag tu yang srung bar byed do// zla/ ba dang / nyi ma dang / de bzhin nyid du sgra gcan dang / rgyu skar
148b6(rgyud): dang / skar ma'i tshogs dang / mtshan mo'i lha rnams kyis dus rtag tu srung bar byed do// 'jigs ma dang / dpal mo dang / dung can ma'i lha rnams dang / dbyangs can ma dang / sa 'dzin gyi lha rnam
148b7(rgyud): dang / chu lha dang / ljon pa dang / nags kyi rtse mo'i lha dang / ri'i lha dang / chu klung dang / ljang ka'i lha dang / gshin rje dang / chu'i lha dang / lus ngan gyi lha dang / gzhon nu'i lha dang / lha'i drang / 
148b8(rgyud): srong bdag nyid che ba dang / lteng ka'i lha dang / chu klung dang / lteng ka dang / lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / de bzhin du lha rnams kyis rtag tu srung bar byed
149a1(rgyud): rtag tu rjesu 'brang zhing / nyin mtshan rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rjes su 'brang ste/ sa'i phyogs gang du bdug spos 'dis bdugs pa'i sa phyogasu rtag tu lha'i gnasu byin gyis
149a2(rgyud): brlab so// 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / mgon po dang / bla ma dang / rnam par 'dren pa dang / 'jig rten gyi skyabs dang / mchog sbyin par de bzhin nyid du rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gnas so// 
149a3(rgyud): gnas der bdug spos gang yin pa de dag gis mchog tu bdug par bya'o// dri mnams pa tsam gyis/ myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob bo zhes so// sems can kun la phan don phyir// sdug
149a4(rgyud): bsngal thams cad ldog byed pa'i// rdzas kyi ming rnams/ bshad bya yi// lha dang mi rnams mnyan par gyis// a/ ka ru dang rgya spos nyid// de bzhin tsan dan ser mor bcas// 
149a5(rgyud): prik+ka nyid dang gi ha dang // kun tu ru bcas ma he'i mig/ ro dang sra rtsi pog nyid dang // de bzhin gur gum na lan da// a ru ra bcas dpal bskor ba// sA ma kaM dang spang spos bcas/ 
149a6(rgyud): bri ya gu bcas tu ru swa// ka ya swa dang ba ya s+tha// na me ru dang gla sgang bcas// ru ta a ga ru nag nyid// ga bur dang ni gla rtsi nyid// la ka gser shing 'bras bu dang // arga'i 'o ma gser 'o ma// sna
149a7(rgyud): 'o ma nyid dang ni// thod pa skal ba ldan nyid dang // so ma rA dza khyab 'jug mnon// shing dga' rgyal dang rnam rgyal nyid// nA ku lI dri nA ku lI// tshangs pa'i dang ku mu dang // pad+ma'i chub sbrang rtsi dang // 
149a8(rgyud): bur ma dkar po'i khu ba dang // 'di rnams lhan cig sbyar ba yi// bdug pa'i mchog 'di bsgrubs par bya// mkhas pas legs par khrus byas te// gtsang mas gtsang ma'i gos bsgos na
149b1(rgyud): zla ba nya 'am bcu bzhi la// bcu gsum pa'ang tshes brgyad la// rtag tu sbyar bya nyin mtshan gzung // sngags la mkhas pas bdug spos 'di// so so so sor kun sbyar nas// phyag rgya dkyil 'khor gas/ 
149b2(rgyud): sngags dang // me tog bdug spos dri rgya chen// mchod pa'i cho ga 'di yis dang // gtor ma'i las la mkhas pa dang // mchod yon snod ni gang ba dang // mgo la'ang dri dang til mar gyi// mar me
149b3(rgyud): legs gru gnasu ni// legs sbas gtsang mar gnas de sgrub// legs sbas gtsang mar gnas pa yis// slob ma mchog gi grogs kyis ni// don yod zhags pa'i spyan snga ru// 'dug nas
149b4(rgyud): yongasu dag pa'i lus// sdom dang byams pa'i sems gzhag/ nas// sems can kun la snying rje'i bdag/ sangs rgyas rje su dran sgom zhing // gsang sngags bzlas pa mchog gis
149b5(rgyud): shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dmigs te/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi zhal nas byung ba/ don yod pa/ 'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad/ khro bo'i rgyal po stong
149b6(rgyud): rtsa brgyad/ don yod 'grub pa brgya rtsa brgyad/ tshig dang yi ge shin tu gsal bar bzlas nas/ don yod pa'i rgya mtsho'i nor bu pad+ma la rnam par lta ba'i dpal dri ma med pa don yod pa'i zhags
149b7(rgyud): pa'i snying po stong phrag bcu bzlas te/ de nas gsang sngags 'di stong phrag rgya bzlas so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te/ a mo g+ha hr-i da ya ya na/ tsa ra tsa ra tsa ra/ ma hA ku ru Ni kA ya/ sA
149b8(rgyud): d+ha ya hUM a b+hi Shiny+tsa ya/ a mo g+ha pA sha ha ste swA hA// de nas gsang sngags brjod par bya ste mnyam par gzhag la las thams cad la mkhas pas bdug spos kyi mchog la bzlas pa tsam gyi
150a1(rgyud): mod la bdug spos kyi rgyal po la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyuraro// don yod pa'i zhags pa snang ba rgya che ba/ nor bu chen po'i
150a2(rgyud): sprin dri ma med pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rnam par gzigs pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mchog sbyin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba zhes bya ba'i bdug pa'i
150a3(rgyud): rgyal po yin te/ thog mar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas te bdug pa dbul bar bya'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te/ ma hA a mo g+ha dza ya dza ya swA hA/ 
150a4(rgyud): de'i 'og tu bdag rang la bdugs na de bzhin gshegs pathadams cad kyi byin gyis rlob par 'gyur// byang chub se/ dmas dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
150a5(rgyud): mchog sbyin pa bdugs pa tsam gyi modado la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku ston par 'gyuraro// dge sbyong dang bram ze'i gzugs kyis de dang lhan cig smra bar byed de/ 
150a6(rgyud): gang la smras pa dang / gang la gtam byas pa de thams cad tshe 'di la 'grub par 'gyuraro// de'i 'og tu mtshan mo rang gi gzugs ston par 'gyur zhing mchog sbyin par mdzad do// don yod
150a7(rgyud): pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur/ 'jigs pa chen po brgyad yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ sngon gyi sgrib pa dang sdig pa dmyal ba'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur bzang cing mthar thug par 'gyu ro// gang / 
150a8(rgyud): ngadag gis lus la bdugs pa tsam dang mthong ba tsam gyis mod la thams cad dbang du 'gyuro// yul 'khor dang / grong khyer grong rdal dong / ljongs dang / rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang
150b1(rgyud): bcas pa dang / blon po dang / blon po chen po dang / bkrabs pa dang / bram ze 'dun na 'don dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur zhing thams cad bgyi ba ci mchis zhes bya ba byed par 'gyuraro// rigs bzhi'i
150b2(rgyud): 'jig rten dbang du 'gyuraro// tshes bcu bzhi dang / bcwa lnga dang / tshes brgyad la khrus legs par byas te/ gos gtsang ma bgos la/ ba las byung ba lngas byugs pas/ khyim gyi
150b3(rgyud): phugasu dkyil 'khor byas la/ me tog dang mchod yon gyi snod bzhag par bya/ gtor ma dkar po nye bar bzhag par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dmigs la/ byang chub
150b4(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad la dmigs te phyogs bzhir bya/ dag byas bdug pa'i rgyal po 'dis bdug pa byas na/ bdug pa tsam gyi mod la phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i
150b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi de bzhin ga shegs pas yongs su gang ba la 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing re rer de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i klung gi
150b6(rgyud): bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag brgya la bdug pa'i sprin 'khrigs pa/ lha'i spos kyis bsgos pa/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bdug spos chen po tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po dang / go shi ra sha
150b7(rgyud): dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / bdug pos mang po na mkha'i ngos khebs pas mchod par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum na gnas pa'i lha
150b8(rgyud): brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'og min gyi gnas na gnas pa'i lha'i bar thams cad bdug pa'i dris rab tu dga' bar 'gyuraro// rgyu skar
151a1(rgyud): dang / skar ma'i tshogs dang / nyi ma dang zla ba thams cad dga' bar 'gyur te/ 'di la the tshom mi bya zhing yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// skad chen pos don yod pa'i zhags
151a2(rgyud): pa'i snying po bzlas pa byas na/ des na sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa legaso zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur zhing / rig sngags 'chang de la yang de bzhin
151a3(rgyud): gshegs pas byin gyi rlob par 'gyur/ dus kun tu dgongs par 'gyur/ yang dang yang du gzigs pa'i phyir byon par 'gyuraro// bde ba can na bzhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag
151a4(rgyud): med dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras ga/ zigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad thugs rab tu dgyes par
151a5(rgyud): 'gyur/ rig sngags 'chang la don yod pa chen po'i dngos grub stsol bar mdzad gzigs bzhed par 'gyuraro// klu tham sa cad la bdugs pa tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur zhing ha cang char
151a6(rgyud): ches na gcod par byed cing / char mi 'bab na char 'bebs par byed do// rlung dang / ser ba dang / sprin thams cad gcod par byed/ bdugs pa tsam gyis gdon thams cad 'jig par 'gyur
151a7(rgyud): bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad phyogs bcur dpag tshad stong du 'bros par 'gyur/ ma mo'i gan su bdugs na rlung dang / ser ba dang / sprin thams cad gcod par byed/ ma mo'i tshogs dang / 
151a8(rgyud): nag po chen po la sogs pa 'gugs par 'gyur zhing dbang du gyur nas 'dug par 'gyur/ bya ba thams cad byed par 'gyuraro// g.yul 'gyed pa'i tshe bdugs na dpung gi tshogs yan lag bani/ 
151b1(rgyud): pa'i dpung las rgyal bar 'gyur/ thams cad du bdugs pa tsam gyis rgyal bar 'gyur/ thams cad du sbyar bar byas na kun tu grub pa chen por 'gyuraro// bdug pa'i cho ga'o// 'phags pa don yang / 
151b2(rgyud): pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// bam po bcu gcig pa// de nas rig sngags 'chang rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir thig le bya ba dang / gdong bkru ba dang / 
151b3(rgyud): bsrub byas na ya lang dang go cha bgos pa dang / 'dra bar 'gyur bar bshad par bgyi yis bcom ldan 'das gsan du gsol// don yod pa'i nor bu rgya chen po rdo rje'i zhags pa zhes bya ba
151b4(rgyud): nor bu gang sbyor bar byas pa tsam gyis thams cad 'grub pa / bla na med pa/ mkhas pas mdzod spu rnams suHdag le byas na tshogs kyi nang dang / skye bo mang po'i nang dang / 
151b5(rgyud): dge 'dun gyi nang dang / de bzhin du rigs byed kyi tshogs pa zhi'i nang du skar ma'i tshogs kyi nang na zla ba ches pa dra zhin du mdzes shing 'jigs pa med do// lha rnams zad
151b6(rgyud): ya mtshan skye// drag po yin cod pan 'chang // 'jig rten mgon po'i g.yas kyi dbul// dbu rgyan rtse bran zla tshes bzhin// gdong bkru ba ni mchog yin no// zla ba nya ba'i 'od dang mtshungs// 
151b7(rgyud): smin ma rna ba dpral ba dang // pad+ma dkar sham shin tu 'jam// mig gnyis ud pa la sngon po 'dra// sems can thams cad dga' bas lta// dga' zhing rtag tu tshig btsan 'gyur// de yi mig
151b8(rgyud): gis gang mthong ba// thams cad dbang du gyur par 'gyur// skyes pa la bsku byas na// rtag tu rig smra blo tshan zhing // rtag tu ya lA go bgos pa'i// 'jigs pa med pa'i lus su 'gyur// 
152a1(rgyud): 'byung po rnams ni mi bzod cing // gnod sbyin 'byung po gsang ba pas// rtag tu thub par mi 'gyuraro// stobs chen pha rol gnon pa dang // rtag tu sred med stobs
152a2(rgyud): ldan zhing / glang chen stobs kyi stobs ldan 'gyur// lha rnams 'dar ni yed yod cing // klu rnams mtshon skrag par byed// gal te rig sngags smra ba yi// reg na ri rab lhun po yang // g.yo
152a3(rgyud): bar 'gyur ba the tsom med// rtag tu sred med stobs ldan zhing // stobs dang gzugs dang rtsal ldan 'gyur// nor bu rgyal po bla na med// 'di ni thos pa tsam gyis su// sdig pa kun las nges
152a4(rgyud): grol zhing // dug rnams thams cad 'joms par byed// da dpal dang skal bzang rtag thob 'gyur// gang gi lag tu tho dgas 'gyur ba// sgrib pa kun la nges grol zhing // de bzhin
152a5(rgyud): 'jig rten dga' bar 'gyur// de na de bzhin gshegs ku/ na gyi// thugs skyes gsung skyes sras su 'gyur// 'pha gas pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ bla ma rtag tu rjes
152a6(rgyud): 'brang zhing // rig sngags smra ba dbugs dbyung phyir// de bzhin du ni srung ba dang // rtag tu mchog ni sbyin par 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon po thub chen gyis// bsod nams phung po chen po thob// gang
152a7(rgyud): zhig nor bu 'di 'chang ba de de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi snyed las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams
152a8(rgyud): cad mthong zhing dbugs 'byin pa dang / phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyuraro// dpal dang skal pa bzang po thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur/ rtag tu lus dang ngag dang yid yongs su dag par 'gyur/ sen
152b1(rgyud): thams cad kyis mchod pa gcig par 'gyur/ dgra thams cad kyis mi sod par 'gyur/ phyag na rdo rjes de la rtag tu srung ba dang / skyabs pa dang / sba ba'i phyir gnas par 'gyur/ phyag na pad+ma
152b2(rgyud): yang rtag tu mchog sbyin par 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan pa de/ 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu chen po gzung bas
152b3(rgyud): sdang ba bdud la sogs pa thams cad dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad las rgyal te/ pha rol tu pham par mdzad nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro// 'dis rnga bo che la bskus
152b4(rgyud): te/ brdungs na chos kyi rnga bo che brdungs par 'gyur ro// gang dag sgra thos pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad/  kyi mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// 
152b5(rgyud): tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i ri dgas dang byag nga yin pa de dag thams cad kyang yongasu grol bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang / dam pa'i chos spo/ 
152b6(rgyud): ba dang / mnar med pa la gzhol zhing / gnas pa dag las yongasu grol bar 'gyur/ dmyal ba chen po bcu drug las yongasu grol bar 'gyur/ 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las yongasu grol
152b7(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ de la dug gi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ me'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ mtshon gyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung
152b8(rgyud): bar mi 'gyur/ rims thams cad kyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ 'dis dung la bskus te bus na chos kyi dung chen po bus par 'gyur/ tha na dung gi sgra thos pa'i bar de dag thams cad
153a1(rgyud): kyang slar log par mi 'gyur/ skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dag kyang skye ba dang / rga ba dang / nad dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa'i
153a2(rgyud): sdug bsngal las yongasu grol bar 'gyur/ 'di ni skye ba phyi ma yin te/ shi nas thams cad ris 'thun par bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu pad+ma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ lus skyes
153a3(rgyud): bu chen po'i mtshan dang / dpe byad kyis rgyan pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis klubs pa/ pad+ma las skyil mo dkrung bcas te skye bar 'gyuraro// byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du 'od dpag med las ma
153a4(rgyud): sum du chos kyi gtam thos par 'gyur ro// bzla ba yar gyi ngo dal cod pan dkar po bcings te nor bu chen po 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na sgreng ba tsam gyis mdo la chos kyi rgyal
153a5(rgyud): mtshan bsgrengs par 'gyuraro// 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags pa mthong ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa/ byang chub kyi snying por chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / bdud
153a6(rgyud): 'dul ba'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar rig par bya'o// 'di sgreng ba tsam gyis 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / khrag khrug thams cad zhi bar 'gyur/ gnod pa thams cad dang / mi ngas dang / mu go'i
153a7(rgyud): dgon pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ chom po dang / g.yon can dang / rkun ma dang / phyir rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba 'jig par 'gyur/ rang gi dpung dang / gzhan gyi dpung dang sdang ba'i sems can
153a8(rgyud): rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ dug mi bzad pa dang / gcan zan gtum po dang / bya dang / sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang dang / bye ba dang / sdig sbrul dang / 'bras dang / lo'u ta dang / dug dang / shu ba dang / 
153b1(rgyud): ldog pa dang / mtshan par rdol pa dang / ske bgegs pa thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur/ snang ba'i klu dang / ser ba dang / grang ba dang / rlung gas ma tshugs shing nang thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ 
153b2(rgyud): bde ba dang / dga' ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo mang po dang / mi mang pos yongasu gang dang / 'byor par 'gyur/ chos 'dod cing chos kyi kun dga' la dga' ba dang mgu bar 'gyur// 
153b3(rgyud): tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog dang / zas dang / skom ro zhim pa dang / shin tu 'jam pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ thams cad du lha'i reg pa dang bcas pa'i bza' ba dang btung ba 'bru
153b4(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// sdang ba'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung dpo dang / sha za dang / 'phra men ma dang / yi dgas dang / brjed byed dang / srul po dang / lus srul po dang / skem byed/ 
153b5(rgyud): dang / grib ma dang / bza' nyes dang / 'gom nyes dang / dri lta nyes dang / grib ma ngan pa zhi bar 'gyur zhing mi rgyu gas par 'gyur/ sems can de dag thams cad phan tshun
153b6(rgyud): byams pa'i sems su 'gyur/ mchog tu yid bde ba'i gnas pas gnas par 'gyuraro// yon tan dang phan yon chen po de dag ni nor bu'i rgyal po chen po'i byin gyis brlabs yin no// de
153b7(rgyud): nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na bzhin 'dzum zhing mig mi 'dzums pas bcom ldan 'das la
153b8(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das grub pa'i rdzas kyi mchog nor bu gdags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs shing lung bstan pa/ bdag gi snying po yid bzhin
154a1(rgyud): gyi nor bu chen po sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa rjes su bsgrags par bgyi'o// gser dang / na la da dang / gi wang dang / ba bla dang / ldong ros
154a2(rgyud): dang / pad+ma dang / ud pa la dang / gur gum dang / na ga pus pa dang / tra tsa dang / ta ra ga dang / tsan dan rnam gnyis dang / sprig ka dang / kA la ka dang / ru rta dang / shu ti dang / pri yang ku dang / ha re Nu ke dang
154a3(rgyud): sug smel dang / lo d+ha dang / dzA ta pa tri ka su ma na dang / sA ma ka dang / sra rtsi pog dang / shing arga'i 'o ma rnams bsogs te/ cha mnyam par byas la gser gnyis 'gyur du byas te/ rgyu skar bzang / 
154a4(rgyud): po dang / tshes grangs shis shing dge ba la khrus legs par debyas te/ gos gtsang ma bsgos nas nyin zhag gcig dbyams pa'i sems la mnyam par gzhag ste/ phye ma zhib mor/ 
154a5(rgyud): byas te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rgyal po'i snying po'i gzung sa stong rtsa brgyad bzlas/ khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgya da bzlas te gtor la dri chab bzang pos spangs te sbyar la/ gas
154a6(rgyud): dang bsres la ga bur dang / gla rtsi'i bdug pas bdugs te/ nor bu zho gnyis pa'i tshad du byas nas phug la ras skud kyis btags te gser gyis g.yogs la/ yang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i
154a7(rgyud): snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas/ khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar mi smra bar sgrub par byas la de nyid kyi zhabs drung du grib ma la
154a8(rgyud): bskam par bya ste/ phyed dam bzhi cha gser gyis g.yogs par bya zhing phyed g.yog par mi bya'o// gang la gsar gyis g.yog pa 'din gang la don yod pa'i zhags pa yod bzhin gyi nor bu
154b1(rgyud): chen po dang 'dra ste/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa las chen po bsgrub par byed do// gser gyis ma g.yogs pas ni 'jig rten pa'i dgos
154b2(rgyud): pa thams cad sgrub par byed do// nad thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang / lu ta dang / 'bras dang / 'go bo'i nang dang / shu ba dang / lhog pa dang / mtshan mar rdol ba dang / phol mig/ 
154b3(rgyud): dang / sha bkra dang / mog nad dang / klang nad dang / gzhogs phyed na ba dang / mgul pa 'gags pa dang / kha nad dang / sna nad dang / rna ba'i nad dang / sond dang / rkan na pa dang / len pa dang / 
154b4(rgyud): mchun pa dang / snying na ba dang / rtsib logs na ba dang / lto ba dan pa dang / mchin pan pa dang / rgyaban pa dang / gcin snyi ba dang / zug ze dang / 'khru ba dang / pho ba'i nad dang / gan
154b5(rgyud): 'brum thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing / rims thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te/ rims nyin bzhi pa dang / rlung las gyur pa dang / 'khris pa las gyur pa dang / bad
154b6(rgyud): kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyuraro// lus kyi nang gi nad thams cad la chu dron dang lhan cig sbyin no// phyi rol nad thams cad dang / gnod pa thams
154b7(rgyud): cad la byugs pa tsam gyis yongasu grol bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du dgos pa thams cad la sbyar ba tsam gyis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/ the tsom mi bya'o// gser gyis g.yog
154b8(rgyud): pa dpung pa la btags na thams cad du thogs pa med par 'gyur te/ stobs dang / brtson 'grub dang / pha rol gnon pa phyag na rdo rje dang / pad+ma 'chang dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// dgos
155a1(rgyud): pa thams cad 'grub pa bla na med pa rnam pa gsum po 'di la sbyar bar bya ste/ thig le dang / gdong pa bkru ba dang / lus bsku ba'o// yid la ji ltar bsams pa'i
155a2(rgyud): dgos pa sgrub pa'i de kho na nyid 'grub pa ste/ the tsom mi bya'o// rgyal po btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa dang / skye bo dang / blon por bcas pa rtag tu bgyi ba ci mchis zhes bran bzhin du
155a3(rgyud): dbang du 'gyur// nor bu spyi gtsug tu bzhag nas rig sngags bzlas na bgegs med par thams cad 'grub par 'gyuraro// lag pa g.yas pa la btags te rig sngags bzlas na/ bzlas
155a4(rgyud): brjod kyi cho ga stong phrag brgya 'gyur du byas par 'gyur te/ la/ na cig bzlas pas stong phrag brgyar rab tu 'phel bar/ 'gyur ro// mgul par btags te bcings na khrus ma byas
155a5(rgyud): pa khrus byas par 'gyur/ mi gtsang ba gtsang bar 'gyur/ cha nges par mi spyod pa tshangs par spyod par 'gyur/ thub par ma byas pa thub par byas par 'gyur/ smyung bar ma byas pa
155a6(rgyud): smyung ba byas par 'gyur/ tshig mi gtsun pa tshig btsun par 'gyur/ ma grub pa grub par 'gyur/ dam tshig mi shes pa dam tshig shes par 'gyur/ byams pa'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur/ 
155a7(rgyud): sbyin pa gang chung zad ci sbyin pa chung ngu yang stong phrag brgya 'gyur du sbyin pa chen po 'phel bar 'gyur/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug rdzogs par 'gyur/ nor bu 'di lag mthil g.yas pa la btags
155a8(rgyud): na gang la reg pa de zad mi shes par 'gyuraro// su la yang brjod par mi bya ste/ de'i 'og tu de dag thams cad 'phel bar 'gyuraro// rked pa la btags te/ chu'i nang du zhugs na chu klung chen po'i
155b1(rgyud): gting slebs par 'gyur ro// de nas nor bu sgrub par 'dang pas dngul shin tu yongasu dag pa las pad+ma mdab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa 'a phyeg/ dbus kyi snying po dang / zeb sam tog 'drabs/ 
155b2(rgyud): bcu drug pa'i tshang du byas la/ de'i dbus su gser gyi nor bu bzhag par bya'o// ba lang gi lci ba b.lang gi gcin dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la tshon sna tshogs kyis bri bar byas/ 
155b3(rgyud): khor khor yug tu pad+ma bris la/ pad+ma dbus kyi ze bar dngul las byas pa'i pad+ma bzhag ste/ bum pa gang ba bzhi dang gtor ma'i bum pa bzhi bzhag par bya zhing / me tog dgram par bya/ tshon rnam pa sna
155b4(rgyud): tshogs kyis bri bar bya/ a ga ru dang / tsan dan dang / du ru ka bdug pas bdug cing gtor ma dkar po bzhag par bya/ 'phan bdugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bya/ mar
155b5(rgyud): gyi mar me sum cu rtsa gnyis bltam par bya/ 'bras bu dang me/ tog phreng sna tshogs bzhag par bya/ 'phags pa spyan ra/ sa gzigs dbang phyug mngon du phyogs par bzhag ste/ 
155b6(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la nyin mtshon gcig spang ba byas la tshes bco lnga nas nyi shu dgu dang gnam stong gi bar dus mtshams gsum du mchod par bya zhing / pad+ma zam
155b7(rgyud): tog de dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la yang mchod pa byas la dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogasu mngon du phyogs te 'dug la bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bya/ khro bo'i rgyal po stong
155b8(rgyud): rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ yungs kar dang chus dbang bskur bar bya// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya stong rtsa brgyad bya/ de bzhin du khro bo'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya bya'o// mi smra bar dogs pa zang
156a1(rgyud): byas na de'i 'og tu ches bco lnga zla banya'i nang par gyi dus mtsham su nor bu'i rgyal po pad+ma dang bcas te gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
156a2(rgyud): dbang phyug gi zhal nas sgra 'byung bar 'gyur/ rig sngags 'chang dga' bar 'gyur/ na mkha'i dkyil nas legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen po
156a3(rgyud): mthong bar 'gyur/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis pad+ma 'bar ba de lag pa g.yas pas blang bar bya ste/ blangs pa tsam gyi mdo la na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur zhing / rig sngags 'chang ba
156a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur/ 'khor lo rgyal po gser gyi mdog can lta na sdug pa chen po mdun ngan gnas par 'gyur/ sdang ba dang / phyir rgol ba dang / 
156a5(rgyud): mdza' ba thams cad bzlog par byed/ 'khor bye ba stong phra/ ga bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi rgyu/ la por 'gyur/ tshe bskal pa stong thub par 'gyur/ don
156a6(rgyud): yod pa'i rnam par blta ba'i nor bu chen po rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur/ don yod pa'i dri ma med pa 'bar ba'i rtse mo rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i don yod pa'i
156a7(rgyud): zhags pa 'thob par 'gyur/ phyogs bcu kun gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis
156a8(rgyud): dbugs 'byin par 'gyur/ nor bu chen po yongasu dag pa rdo rje la rnam par lta ba'i 'od kyi lus rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin/ 
156b1(rgyud): dang na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams bgyi ba ci mchis shes dbang du 'gro bar 'gyur/ mgo bo'i spyi bor btags na nor bu chen po'i rdzu 'phrul gyis nub phyogasu song nas/ 
156b2(rgyud): bde ba can gyi rab tu dbye ba gzhal med khang dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas/ legs par brgyan pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa mthong bar 'gyuraro// de
156b3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa de dag las chos snang ba'i sgo'i chos bshad pa chen po thob par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs dang / rgyan dang / gzhal med khang ston par/ 
156b4(rgyud): 'gyur mgul du btags na phug gi gnas thams cad du 'judag par 'gyur/ thams cad du rgyal ba'i rje dpon dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur/ phug stong phrag drug
156b5(rgyud): cu rtsa bzhi'i sgo 'bye bar 'gyur/ dpung pa g.yas pa la bta gas na mi snang bar 'gyur zhing lus mi snang ba gang+ga'i klu dbye ba stong phrag brgya snyed kyi lus mi snang ba rnams kyi mchog
156b6(rgyud): rje dpon dang rgyal por 'gyuraro// dpung pa g.yon pa la btags na gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po la sogs pa thams cad mi snang bar byas par 'gyur/ thams cad kyi gnas kyi gzhal med
156b7(rgyud): khang sgo bye zhing 'dug par 'gyuraro// sked pa la btags na gter thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur/ dbus mo g.yas pa dang rwa g.yas pa la btags na nags kyi phug gi gzhal med khang gi gnas thang
156b8(rgyud): kyi sgo phye zhing / sman gyi dngos po thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na gnas par 'gyur zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// rkang pa'i rje ngaral btags na rlung gi phung po dang po'i stobs kyi shug
157a1(rgyud): chen ma galdan pa gzug chung ma song bas dpag nang stong phrag bcu gro dngas sa ra bar 'gyur/ namatshan ga cag gis sang gsum rgyas chen
157a2(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams rlung chen po'i shugs kyis stobs dang brtson 'grus kyis song ste/ slar yang 'ong bar 'gyur zhing gang gis kyang gnod par mi 'gyur/ thams cad du dgos pa sgrub pa thang
157a3(rgyud): grub par 'gyuro// rkang mthal la btags na sa'i 'og gi dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur zhing / sa'i 'og phug gi sgo thams cad bye bar 'gyur te/ rang ji ltar 'dod pa der 'jug cing 'byung
157a4(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// khar bcug na nyi ma re re tshigs su bcad paste dang lobs par 'gyuraro// mid pa tsam gyis thos pa rgya mtsho dbasags par 'gyuraro// lce'i rtse mor bzhag nas lde pad+ma
157a5(rgyud): dang ku mu da ltar 'jam par 'gyur zhing thos pa mang po 'dzun par 'gyuraro// lag pa la byugs na gang la reg pa de bla/ na bzhin du 'gyu ro// skyes pa dang / bud med dang khye'u dang
157a6(rgyud): bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze thams cad bgyi ba ci mchis zhes thams cad dbang du 'gyu ro// nor bu sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
157a7(rgyud): chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la don yod grub kyi bum pa rab mchog ces bgyi ba'i sgrub
157a8(rgyud): pa'i cho ga chen po mchis te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gzungs kyi mthu bstan pa/ ji lta ba der de ltar bcom ldan 'das bum pa chen po mthu sgrub pa'i cho ga
157b1(rgyud): 'di rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa sgrub pa 'grub par 'gyur ba lag so// rig sngags 'chang rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir de kho na nyid yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur lags so// de
157b2(rgyud): nas gser ram dngul lam zangs sam kham pa'i bum pa tshad dang ldan zhing kun nas shin tu zlum pa mgo 'am/ mgrin par phyin pa'i tshad shin tu 'jam zhing / thag thug dang shang shong med
157b3(rgyud): pa/ dbyibs legs shing byi dor legs par byas pa/ kun nas yongs su gang ba la mtshal gyi mtshon gyis pad+ma mdag ma brgya rtsa brgyad pa bri bar bya ste/ mgrin par pad+ma'i snying po dang ze ba
157b4(rgyud): bri/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bri bar bya ste/ shar phyogs su zhal bri/ lhor mi 'jigs pa skye ngan pa'i phyag/ nub du dbyig 'byin gyi phyag/ byang du yid bzhin
157b5(rgyud): nor bu rgyun thams cad kyis rgyan pa skyil mo dkrung du bzhug/ sa par bya'o// pad+ma'i mdab ma la dbang phyug dang / dang / phyug chen po dang / bram ze dang lha dang / drang srong gi tshogs
157b6(rgyud): dang / gi shin rje dang / chu lha dang / rlung lha dang / khyab bdag dang / brgya byin dang / rdo rje 'chang dang / lha'i tshogs gzhan dag bri bar bya zhing / me dang rlung dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / lha mo sgrol
157b7(rgyud): ma dang / khro gnyer can dang / pho nya mo dkar mo dang / tshogs kyi bdag po dang / gzhon nu dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / drag po dang / khyab 'jug bri bar bya'o// pad+ma'i mdab ma'i khor yug
157b8(rgyud): tu pad+ma'i phreng 'bri'o// de nas bum pa tshon sna tshogs kyis bri bar bya zhing gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par bya/ rim pa'i cha bkra zhing mdzes par bya'o// de nas thang shing las pad+ma'i gdan zlum/ 
158a1(rgyud): po bum pa shong ba tsam gyi tshad du byas la de'i steng du bum pa bzhag la khum pa de yungs kar dkar pos bkang ste/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya/ ras dkar pos bcing
158a2(rgyud): bar bya steng du yungs dkar dang / gla rtsi dang / ga bur dang / gi wang dang / ldong ros bzhag par bya/ bum pa'i kha ras dmar pos g.yog par bya/ rin po che sna bdun bzhag par bya/ de nas rig sngags
158a3(rgyud): 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la dkyil 'khor khru bzhi gru bzhi dang / 'phang du khru gang ba bya ste/ ba lang gi lci ba dang sa bsres par legs par blugs te gru bzhi cha mnyam par bya'o// de nas dkyil
158a4(rgyud): 'khor gyi steng du dri thams cad kyis byugs la dkyil 'khor gyi snying dpo dbus su tsan dan dkar pos dkyil 'khor khru gang grub bzhi pa byas la/ gur gum dang me tog pad+mas mchod par byas te/ pad+ma/ 
158a5(rgyud): mdab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa bris la pad+ma'i ze ba'i steng du bum pa gzhag ste/ 'phan gdugs sna tshogs kyis rgyan par bya// dkyil 'khor gyi snying po khor yug tu spos dang me tog sna tshogs
158a6(rgyud): dang byug pos sna tshogs dang / mchod yon gyi snod sna tshogs dang / bum pa gang ba mdzes pa dang / bdug spos kyi phye ma rnams mang po bzhag par bya/ me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dang / me tog phreng ci 'byor
158a7(rgyud): ba kun tu bzhag par bya/ mar gyi mar me bzang po bcu drug bltam par bya/ phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor kun nas pad+ma'i phreng ba bri bar bya/ sgo bzhi shin tu mdzes par bri/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi mtshan
158a8(rgyud): ma gsal bar bya/ mda' dang ba dan khor yug tu bzhag par bya/ tshon skud sna lngas bskor bar bya/ ro rnam pa sna tshogs dang dkar gsum ci 'byor pa bzhag par bya/ 'bras bu sna tshogs dang / 
158b1(rgyud): bza' ba rnam pa sna tshogs bzhag par bya/ me tog sna tshogs bzhag par bya/ me tog sna tshogs dgram par bya/ me tog phreng bzang po kun tu bzhag par bya/ bdug spos kyi snod dang bum pa gang ba kun du/ 
158b2(rgyud): bzhag par bya/ pog por bzhi bzhag par bya/ dri chab kyi phor bu bzhi bzhag par bya/ snod bzhi dang kham por brgyad bzhag par bya/ ro sna tshogs kyi gtor ma dkar po rnam pa mang po bzhag par bya/ 
158b3(rgyud): mar gyi mar me gang ba drug cu rtsa gnyis dbul bar bya/ 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dgram par bya/ chang dang / sha dang / beg tsong dang / ke'u dang / 'bags pa dang / kha zas ngan pa dang / btung ba
158b4(rgyud): ngan pa spang bar bya/ 'go mnyes spang bar bya ste/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bsags la zla ba nya la sgrub par bya'o// sru dpa'i tshogs bdag srung ba dang / thor tshugs bcings pa dang / phyog/ 
158b5(rgyud): bcing ba dang / yul bcing ba dang / de bzhin grogs srung ba/ dang / gzhan bsrung ba yang bya'o// gu gul gyi bdug/ pa dang / mar dang yungs kar gyi bdug pas bdug pa bya'o// tsan
158b6(rgyud): ngan dang / a ga ru dang / du ru ka dang / kun tu ru'i bdug pa 'di ni yang dag par bstan to// bum sgrub pa 'di ni mchog ste/ zhag lnga snyung ba byas nas gsang sngags bsgrub par bya ste/ dus mtshams
158b7(rgyud): gsum du bum pa dang sangs rgyas la mchod pa bya'o// mi smra bar dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs te/ skyil mo dkrung du 'dug nas lag pa g.yas pa bum pa'i stes bzhag la khro bo'i rgyal po stong rtsa
158b8(rgyud): brgyad bzlas la/ chu dang yungs kar gyis dbang bskur la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong phrag bcu bzlas so// yid la byed pa rtse gcig pas sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying
159a1(rgyud): / de ltar len cing sangs rgyas yong la byab ba sgoms la bzlas brjod bya'o// de'i 'og tu ches bco ldan 'thun pa ma nang par dbyig gi bum pa cher g.yo bar 'gyur zhing / 
159a2(rgyud): leg so zhes bya ba'i sgra chen po yang grag par 'gyur te/ bum pa chen po de yang 'bar zhing 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur/ reg sngags 'chang dga' bar 'gyur/ dri ma med cing yongasu dag
159a3(rgyud): la dri ma dang bral bar 'gyur/ mdog yongasu dag cing me tog pad+ma dang / ku mu da ltar dkar zhing 'jam par 'gyur/ bum pa de'i sku gzugs rnams rang rang gi lus las 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur
159a4(rgyud): de nas rig sngags 'chang gis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa rgya chen po bya/ rig sngags 'chang bum pa bsgrub pa 'di ni grub po// de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'cha
159a5(rgyud): gi dri'i chu dang yungs kar la khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa ga/ cig bzlas nas dbang bskur ba dang 6/ dbang bskur/ ma thag tu bum pa de las sgra 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags
159a6(rgyud): 'chang chen po legaso legaso// khyod kyis bum pa bzang po grub to// bum pa bzang po ji lta ba bzhin don yod pa'i snying po'i bum po bzang po yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po yang de bzhin gyis ji ltar
159a7(rgyud): 'dod pa long spyod cig yid la ji ltar bsams shing bcol ba thams cad grub par gyur cig/ de nas mchod pa chen pos gzhal med khang chen po mchod de/ bum pa bzang po de bzung bar bya/
