184a6(rgyud): so char ches na khang thog tu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po skad drag pos brjod de/ dbyug pa bskor na char ches pa 'chad par 'gyuraro// ser ba 'bab pa'i tshe sprin logasu bltas te khros pas khro bo'i
184a7(rgyud): rgyal po skad chen pos dran par bya zhing khros pas dbyug pa bskor na sad dang / rlung dang / ser ba mi 'bab par 'gyuraro// dpag tshad tshun chad du mtshams chen po kun tu bcad par 'gyuraro// gdon
184a8(rgyud): kun gyis zin pa la khro bo'i rgyal po la lan bdun dran par bya zhing dbyug pa bstan na gdon thams cad du zhing 'bros par 'gyuraro// brjed byed la sogs pa'i bar la bstan pa tsam gyis 'bros par
184b1(rgyud): 'gyuraro// rims thams cad la don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying pos bya bas na byabs pa tsam gyi mdo la rims thams cad las thar par 'gyuraro// zhag bzhi pa'i rims ni ngu zhing 'bros par 'gyur ro// g.yul
184b2(rgyud): 'gyed cing 'thab pa'i tshe don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po khros pas bzlas brjod bya/ dbyug pa bskor ba byas na mtshon dang / dgra sta dang / lag cha thams cad mi snang bar 'gyur zhing pha rol gyi dpung
184b3(rgyud): rnams kyi hud kyi hud zer zhing 'bros par 'gyuraro// 'brog dgon pa'i nang du 'dron po rnams song ba na don yod pa'i rgyal po dran par bya zhing dbyug pa bskor ba byas na rkun po dang / chom po dang / mi rgod
184b4(rgyud): dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / dom dang / dred dang / dug mi bzad pa dang / gcan gzan khro bo dang / glang po che dang / da ma he dang / dug dang bcas pa'i srog chags de dag thad mi snang
184b5(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// rang gi khyim du bde bar 'gro bar 'gyuraro// ming sa thams cad dang / ba lang gi nad dang / phyugs ngas che/ na po dang / rta nad chen po dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / 
184b6(rgyud): khye'u dang bu mo'i nad chen po byung ba'i tshe don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po dang / khro bo'i rgyal po'i skad chen pos dran par bya zhing dbyug pa grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir bskor ba byas na bskor ba tsam gyi mdo la mi
184b7(rgyud): ngas dang / gnod pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / 'khrug pa thams cad pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / tshang 'bru ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa thams cad las grol
184b8(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// bud med dang / skyes pa dgug par 'dod na gnas mthon por 'dug ste/ skad chen pos don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dran par bya'o// dbyug pa bskor bar bya'o// gang
185a1(rgyud): gi ched du bya ba de ming brjod par byas na dpag tshad brgya nas kyang de 'ong zhing bdag dang nor la dbang bya bar yod cing gnas par 'gyuraro// ji srid mtsho'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ro// 'on
185a2(rgyud): te nor bu bzang po'i sras dgug par 'dod na zla ba yar gyi ngo ches bcu bzhi la smyung ba byas te/ dbyug pa la don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya ste/ nor bzang kyi sras kyi/ 
185a3(rgyud): lto ba'i steng du bzhag par bya/ khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas pa byas na bzhi thun gyi tho rangs tsam na nor bu bzang po'i sras rang nyid rig sngags 'chang ba'i mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur zhing gser gyi dong rtse stong / 
185a4(rgyud): phrag bcu sbyin par mdzad do// de las dkon mchog gsum gyi sku skal dbul bar bya/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la mchod pa bya/ nor bu bzang po'i sras la mchod
185a5(rgyud): yon gyi chas dbul bar bya/ nyi ma re re zhing nor bzang kyi sras la mchod yon gyi chab phul na nam 'tshe'i bar du nyi ma re re zhi/ nga gser gyi dong rtse stong sbyin par mdzad do// de nas rig sngags
185a6(rgyud): 'chang bas phyed dam bzhi cha gcig dgod par bya tesbyin pa sbyin par bya/ bsod nams bsags par byas la/ nor bu bzang po'i sras dang lhan cig tu rje su yi rang par bya'o// 'brog dgon pa'i nang du// 
185a7(rgyud): 'brog dgon pa gang na chu dkon par dbyug pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod bya zhing gang na ne'u gsing sngon po yod pa'i gnas der sa la lan bdun brdab cing bskor te/ 
185a8(rgyud): skad drag pos don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po dran par bya/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la nyam thag thag skad du byas na/ de nas gnas gang du brdabs pa'i gnas der lha rdzas kyi chu
185b1(rgyud): cang grang ba yang ma yin/ ha cang dro ba yang yin/ ro dang chas pa yod pa'i rdzing bu 'byung bar 'gyuraro// de nas rig sngags 'chang bas dbyug pa la khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod bya ste/ rdzing cu
185b2(rgyud): nang du chu la brdab par bya'o// de nas rdzing bu'i nang nas mi ser skya bo zhig byung ste/ rig sngags 'chang ba la thal mo khong stong du sbyar nas mdun na 'dug ste rig sngags 'chang ba ci 'dod ces smra bar 'gyur
185b3(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang bas bdag ni kha zas kyi ched du lags kyis stsal du gsol zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang bas mi de la shes pa'i tshig brjod par bya'o// de nas mi de rdzing bu'i nang du
185b4(rgyud): zhugs pa dang / skad cig thang cig yud tsam la kha zas dang btung raba'i ro zhim po rnam pa sna tshogs yod par byed cing rig snga gas 'chang ba la sbyin par byed do// skye bo stong phrag brgya'i
185b5(rgyud): ston mo byar yod cing yo byad phun sum tshogs pa shin tu mang po/ 'gyur ro// gal te rig sngags 'chang bas rdzing bu med/ par mi byed na rdzing bu de dus rtag tu gnas par 'gyu ro// mi
185b6(rgyud): snang bar mi 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad dang 'dren po thams cad yo byad thams cad kyis brel pa med par 'byung bar 'gyu ro// 'on te don yod pa sna tshogs bya bar 'dod na rig sngags 'chang ba des
185b7(rgyud): lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pa'i dri chus khrus byas la spyi gtsug bcing bar bya'o// mi smra bar dbyug pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te bskor bar bya'o// de nas 'khor dang skye
185b8(rgyud): bo mang po 'khor zhing rmongs par 'gyuraro// de nas dbyug pa bskor ba byas na yid la ji ltar sems pa'i ngo bo de bzhin du thams cad ston par byed do// 'bras bu dang me tog go char 'beb so// sgyu ma rnam/ 
186a1(rgyud): pa sna tshogs ston par byed do// de nas ro langs bslang bar 'dod na rig sngags 'chang ba des legs par khrus byas shing gos gsar pa bgos te/ gtsang mar byas la dur
186a2(rgyud): khrod du song ste/ dbyug pa la don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod byed cing / dur khrod kyi nang du bskor ba byas na dpag tshad tshun chad
186a3(rgyud): du kun tu mtshams bcad par 'gyuraro// bgegs thams cad dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po ma rungs pa thams cad bcings par 'gyuraro// de nas rig sngags 'chang bas mi ro blangs te bkru bar
186a4(rgyud): bya'o// ba'i rnam lngas sbyang bar bya'o// ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khodar gru bzhi lham par bya'o// seng ldeng gi phur pa chad sor ba cu gnyis pa bzhi gru bzhir gzugs par bya'o// tshon sna lnga'i
186a5(rgyud): skud pas dkyil 'khor kun tu bskor bar bya'o// mi ro ras da kar pos dkri bar byas la dkyil 'khor dbusu bzhag pa ra bya'o// me tog gis gtor bar bya'o// gtor ma dkar po
186a6(rgyud): bzhag par bya'o// mchod yon gyi chu bzhag par bya'o// gu gul gyi bdug pa sbyin par bya'o// rig sngags 'chang ba shar phyogasu kha bltas te 'dug la dbyug pa g.yas par bzhag ste/ rig
186a7(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po gdon par bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal po lan drug cu dran par bya'o// g.yas pas byab par bya'o// lag pa g.yas pa'i dbyug pas brdab pa byas na mi re de 'gul bar 'gyur/ g.yo bar
186a8(rgyud): 'gyur te/ langs te phyogs bcur lta bar 'gyur/ rig sngags 'chang bas dbyug pa de spyi bor bzhag par byas na/ mi ro tshig smra bar 'gyuro// rig sngags 'chang bas gsang sngags dran par bya'o// yid kyis/ 
186b1(rgyud): bsam par byas na mi ro de thams cad smra bar 'gyur te/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ong ba dang / da ltar byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa na 'byung ba smra bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang bas dbyug pa snying khar
186b2(rgyud): bzhag par byas na khrag tu skyug par 'gyur/ khrag des thig le byas na khyim thams cad la sgo srung med cing sgo thams cad gdangs par 'gyuraro// bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad
186b3(rgyud): dbang du gyur cing 'dug go// dbyug pa snying khar btsir na skrag par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang bas blangs te mtha' dag bza' bar bya'o// zos pa tsam gyi na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyuraro// 'byung po chen
186b4(rgyud): po'i bdag po dang / dbang phyug chen po 'dra bar 'gyu ro// lha'i lo stong du 'tsho bar 'gyu ro// oM zhes bya bas dbyug pas brtsi dal bsdigs pa byas na de nas lce 'byin par 'gyu ro// rig
186b5(rgyud): sngags 'chang bas bcad la rig sngags 'chang blangs par bya'o// blangs pa tsam gyis na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang ba ral gri'i 'khor lo sgyur bar 'gyur ro// lo
186b6(rgyud): stong phrag bcur 'tshe bar 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang ba bco brgyad kyi 'khor gyis bskor bar 'gyuraro// de nas rig sngags 'chang bas mi ro'i spyi bor dbyug pas brdabs na sgra 'byung bar 'gyur zhing
186b7(rgyud): shi ba'i ro gcig tu mkhregs pa'i gser yin pas blang ba byas na srang gcig gis zangs srang stong gser du 'gyuraro// de dag ni 'jig rten pa sgrub pa'i cho ga yin no// de nas byang chub sems
186b8(rgyud): dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de dag ni sems can thams cad la snying rtse ba'i phyir bdag gi
187a1(rgyud): 'jig rten pa sgrub pa'i cho ga lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas bka' stsal pa/ sems can chen po sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir 'jig rten
187a2(rgyud): las 'das pa'i cho ga dam pa gsang ba'i snying po dang / dkyil 'khor dang blo brtan po 'jigs pa med pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dam pa sgrub par byed pa de kho na nyid
187a3(rgyud): grub par 'gyur ba dang / bklags pa dang / dran pa tsam dang / sgrub par byed pa tsam gyis de dag thams cad grub pa chen po thob par 'gyur ba dang / bsam pa chen po yongasu rdzogs pa grub par
187a4(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / mchog grub pa chen po so sor thob par 'gyur ba/ dang / rig sngags 'chang ba'i 'dod par gtogs pa bsam pra thams cad yongasu rdzogs par grub par 'gyur ba smos shig/ 
187a5(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags/ pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyi// drung nas dbugs 'byin pa dang / bsgo ba thos nas shin tu yid
187a6(rgyud): dga' ba chen por 'gyur te/ de stan las langs nas bla gros phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan
187a7(rgyud): 'das kyi zhags gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gos
187a8(rgyud): dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang / sdud pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur chen po byas te mchod nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang por byang chub sems dpa' sems
187b1(rgyud): dpa' chen po gang dag dkyil 'khor gyi lhar gtogs pa dang / gang dag rig 'dzin grub pa dang / gang dag lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / 
187b2(rgyud): lto 'phye chen po dang / gang dag don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig la rje su zhugs pa dang / gang dag ri bo po Ta la na gnas pa de dag thams cad kyi me tog dang / bdug
187b3(rgyud): pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gos dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang / chas dang / spud pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa byas te yid dga' bar gyur to// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
187b4(rgyud): gis bcom ldan 'das la stong phrag brgya bskor ba byas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de la yang mchod pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar te btud nas bcom
187b5(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mig mi 'dzums par 'dug ste/ bco ma ldan 'das la tshig 'jam po 'jam pos 'di skad ce sa gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la mchis pa ni/ 
187b6(rgyud): smad du byung ba rnam par lta ba don yod pa'i cho 'phrul/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rmad du byung ba de
187b7(rgyud): kho na nyid rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i rnam par lta ba'i zhags pa'i snying po dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
187b8(rgyud): bklags pa dang / sgrub par byed pa grub pa mchog tu gyur pa'i snying po dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mchog sgrub pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs shing lung bstan pa/ 
188a1(rgyud): lags te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis rig sngags 'chang thams cad mchog tu grub par bya ba'i phyir dang / sen
188a2(rgyud): thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir dmyal ba dang / yi dgas kyi gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten sel ba sngon gyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa mi bzad pa 'joms pa ngan song thams cad sel ba/ 'jig rten
188a3(rgyud): dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sdig pa dang / sgrib pa nges par sreg par byed pa/ yongasu bsgrags par bgyi'o// mtshams med pa lnga dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' spong ba
188a4(rgyud): dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / mtshams med pa la ga/ zhol ba dang / 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la 'khu ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
188a5(rgyud): tshogs thams cad spong bar byed pa de dag gis mnyan pa dang mthong ba tsam dang / sdom pa tsam dang / lan gci ga 'bad pa dang / 'chad pa tsam gyis thams cad byang bar 'gyur// 
188a6(rgyud): nga mthong ba tsam gyis thams cad zad par 'gyur/ byang bar 'gyuraro// rims thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / dri ma dang / ser sna dang / phrag dog thams cad bral bar 'gyur ro// 
188a7(rgyud): nyon mongs pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad las yongasu grol bar 'gyuraro// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sdug bsngal skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba dang / nad dang mya ngan dang / sme
188a8(rgyud): sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba thams cad dang bral bar 'gyuraro// 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / phung bar byed pa dang / rdeg pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / 
188b1(rgyud): gsod pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / shags 'gyed pa dang / btson du 'dzin pa dang / lcag su 'jug pa dang / rkun ma dang / zol ba dang / mi rgod dang / seng ge dang / glang po che dang / ma he dang / 
188b2(rgyud): nadangan pa dang / dmu chu dang / sha bkra dang / mdze dang / 'brum bu dang / g.yon can dang / shu ba dang / shu bran dang / g.yan pa dang / klad pa na ba dang / gzhogs phyed na ba dang / dom dang / dred dang / 
188b3(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / brjed byed dang / sbrul ma rungs pa dang / khwa gdug pa dang / sbrul nag po dang / srog chags gon dang / drug dang bcas pa'i srog
188b4(rgyud): chags 'dzegs pa sna tshogs dang bcas pa dang / me dang / chu dang / dug dang / mtshon dang / g.yangs dang / khyim rdib pra dang / grang ba dang / rlung dang / nyin mtshan dang / byi ba kha gdug
188b5(rgyud): pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad ni bklags pa dang / kha thon/ byas pa dang / mthong ba tsam gyis thams cad rnam/ par zhig par 'gyur/ phung bar 'gyur/ mod la phye mar bklag
188b6(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// yongasu thar par 'gyur ba 'di la dogs par mi bya/ yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya// the tsom mi bya/ sems gnyisu 'gyur ba bskyed par mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag rtag tu
188b7(rgyud): mngon du dran par bgyi ba dang / rtag tu yid la byed pa'i blo 'byung bar bgyi'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dang / khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying po yang bzlas par bgyi'o// rmad du byung ba rnam pa/ 
188b8(rgyud): blta ba/ don yod pa rnam par 'phrul pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul rnam par
189a1(rgyud): snang mdzad kyi byin gyis brlabs/ dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor/ don yod par rnamasakhas pa'i snying po ni rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par dus thams cad du yid la kha
189a2(rgyud): ton du brjod par bya'o// rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rje su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// de dag dran pa sgom pa tsam dang / dran pa tsam gyis 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yon tan phun
189a3(rgyud): sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi ldog pa zhes bya'o// phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs pa dang / lung ston
189a4(rgyud): pa dang / byin gyis rlobs par 'gyur na/ lta ba dang / klog pa dang dang / kha ton byed pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug mthong ste phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod pa dang
189a5(rgyud): dran pa dang / dus gsum du shin tu gsal bar yid la byed par / mchod cing phyag byed pa de lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ sems can de ni nga dang 'dra ba yin par rig par bya'o// 'jig
189a6(rgyud): rten dbang phyug gi byin gyis brlabs pa'i lus yin par rig par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi byin gyis brlabs pa dang / dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba
189a7(rgyud): yin par rig par bya'o// gang zhig lan mang du shin tu lhag par byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ sems can de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yin par rig par bya'o// bdag kyang dus thang du/ 
189a8(rgyud): rtag tu rjesu dran par bgyi'o// dus thams cad du mthong ba sbyin par bgyi'o// bsam pa dang re ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bgyi'o// de'i tshe bdag gis sems can thams cad myur ba myur ba
189b1(rgyud): byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gzhag par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni go cha chen po brtan par khas blangs pa la 'chel ba lags pas sems can thams
189b2(rgyud): cad bsgral ba'i phyir re ba'i mchog thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bgyi'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags
189b3(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems can dag pa'i mchog legs so legs so// 'di ni mchog tu dkon pa de/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i cho ga de'i ming
189b4(rgyud): 'dzin pa tsam gyis sems can yongs su grol bar 'gyur na/ lta ba dang / klog pa dang / sgrub pa dang / smyung ba'i cho ga byed pa dang / sdom pa la gnas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ sems
189b5(rgyud): can de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir/ mi ldog par 'gyur ro// sems can dag pa dus la ba/ ba pa gang yin par shes na smros shig/ de nas byang chub
189b6(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du lta zhing bzhin 'dzum ste/ don yod pa rnam par lta ba'i zhags pa'i snying po smras so// 
189b7(rgyud): dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 
189b8(rgyud): 'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi mchog la phyag 'tshalo// 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha gshin rje dang / chu
190a1(rgyud): lha dang / lus ngan po dang / drang srong gi tshogs kyi mchog la phyag 'tshalo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags
190a2(rgyud): bstan ngas gzigs kyang bang drug thugs che chen po la phyag 'tshal// 'di la ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ a ba lo ga ti d+ha sha hri yo/ dra la dz+wa la/ d+harma thA t+yAg d+hA/ car cang / mdzaH
190a3(rgyud): pad+mA b+h+r-i / d+hu ra d+ha ra/ mahA pA shad+ha re/ bar bar ba ro// rash+mi sha ta saha pra ti mad+hita sha rIr/ tAr ta ra/ bi phul te dzad+hare/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ ShaT pA ra mai tA pa ri pU ra Ne/ kA la ka la/ maH
190a4(rgyud): brad+d+hA ba~M Shad+ha re/ ma la ma la/ sarba pA pa A ba raN/ mA la kiHSha/ nA sha ne/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ za d+hi satwa/ bi shud+d+ha/ b+h+yaHd+huru/ ma hA satwa/ bta sa le/ yam ba ru Ni/ ku ber nam
190a5(rgyud): swA// 6rbaHrba/ ban+d+ha/ bany+tsa ma hA shwar/ bumar/ nan / gar/ A bar/ ma he shar/ de ba zadra/ ben ti na/ ti na ma swA ta/ thib rgya mchi mo la d+ha ru/ a ma hA
190a6(rgyud): ku Ta d+ha re/ di bya ma Ni ka na ka/ badz+ra be DUr+ya/ ma ra ka ta/ pad+ma rA ga in dra nI la di bya muk+ti ka/ a la krita/ sha rI ra/ shwe ta/ ya dz+nyo pa bI ta d+ha ra/ dza Ta ma kuT/ maN+Di ta nA ma/ tsan+da/ rA dzita/ 
190a7(rgyud): pad+ma d+ha ra/ pad+ma A sa na/ pad+ma b+hU dza/ trai lo tsan/ tri shU la d+ha ra/ pA sha d+hA ri/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ a b+hi Shi ka ta/ sa ra sa ra/ sarba pA pa/ pra sha ma na kAr/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka tA ru tu ru/ sarba
190a8(rgyud): rad ya ka rbo d+ha kro d+hi/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ a ba lo ki te/ bi d+hi maN+Da/ a ba lo ki ti/ la ke shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ ma hA tsin tA ma Ni b+ha ra/ the shwa rU ba/ mahA so mya ba da na ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ bud+d+ha d+ya d+h+ya/ 
190b1(rgyud): bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ b+ha ga ban/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ a ba lo ki ta gar+b+he/ ma hA pu N+ya/ te dza/ d+ha ra/ pra ba ra/ sid d+hi ka ra/ sarba byA d+hi ha ra/ sarba satwa da ya pa ra/ sarba duHkha/ dra mo tsa ka/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ na mo
190b2(rgyud): stu te swA hA// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi 'don rmang du thung ba rnam par lta ba'i zhags pa'i snying po'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'o// rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jig rten las 'das pa/ 
190b3(rgyud): gzungs kyi snying po'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'o// gzugs sna tshogs chen po sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa phyag stong mnga' ba/ dbu stong mnga' ba/ spyan
190b4(rgyud): stong gis rnam par gzigs pa/ phyag brgya stong gis byin gyis da brlabs pa/ gang ga'i klung bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag pa cu'i bye ma'i rdul shin tu phra ba dang mnyam pa'i dam tshig gi
190b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du rje su zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid gsang ba la 'jug pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing du 'jug pa/ byang chub kyi snying por bgrod
190b6(rgyud): pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/ chos kyi sgron me 'bar ba/ bdud la sogs pa ma rungs pa thams cad kyi bdud 'joms pa/ chos kyi dung 'bud pa/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng ba/ dmyal ba thams cad
190b7(rgyud): sel ba/ cho ga zhib mo thams cad grub par mdzad pa/ cho ga grub pa thams cad kyi mchog sa bcu chen po la so sor 'jog pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas la rjesu 'jug pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thad
190b8(rgyud): kyis dbang bskur ba dang / byin gyis brlabs kyis byin rlabs pa/ don yod pa'i mchog phun sum tshogs pa thob par mdzad pa/ don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rnam par sprul pa/ don yod par
191a1(rgyud): sems rgya mtsho snyed yang dag par 'dzin pa/ don yod par sems can sa bon la so sor 'jog pa/ don yod par byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug pa/ don
191a2(rgyud): yod par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul ba yongs su sgrogs pa/ don yod par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur gyi sprin rab tu byed pa/ don
191a3(rgyud): yod par sems can thams cad mi 'jigs pa'i khyim du 'dzud pa/ don yod par sbyin pa chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/ don yod par lha rdzas kyis me tog dang / bdug pa
191a4(rgyud): dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos go/ das dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / chos gos sna tshogs dang / rin po che
191a5(rgyud): bdun gyi char 'bebs so// don yod pas tshe yongs su rjes ti sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu brgyan pa sna tshogs su de ba/ zhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par lta ba/ don
191a6(rgyud): yod par bsod nams kyi phung po chen po rab tu rdzogs pa/ don yod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed pa/ don yod par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par mthong ba dang / grub pa
191a7(rgyud): dang / cho 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa ston pa/ don yod par dbang phyug sgrub pa don yod par rig sngags dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / rims par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo
191a8(rgyud): yang dag par ston pa/ don yod par grub pa mthong ba/ don yod par cho ga mthong ba/ don yod par tshe rab tu 'phel ba/ don yod par snyan par grags pa rab tu ston pa/ don yod par 'khor
191b1(rgyud): ba las rab tu sgrol ba/ don yod par skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba las yongs su sgrol ba/ don yod par mchog rab tu sbyin pa/ don yod par bzlas brjod dang / cho ga rab tu rdzogs pa/ don
191b2(rgyud): yod par dran pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu rdzogs pa/ don yod par rig 'dzin 'khor lo sgyur ba thob par yang dag par ston pa/ don yod par lha'i gnas dang / gzhal med khang sum cu rtsa gnyis
191b3(rgyud): kyi lha'i gnas su 'jug pa/ don yod par dga' ldan gyi gnas su 'jug pa/ don yod par 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du 'jug pa/ don yod par sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas su brgya byin
191b4(rgyud): lha'i rgyal por 'jug pa/ don yod par ri rab chen po lag dpa gcig gis skul ba/ don yod par rdzu 'phrul gyi/ stobs ston pa/ don yod par mi snang ba ston pa/ don yod
191b5(rgyud): par stobs 'phel ba/ don yod par gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor lo sgyur ba so sor 'thob pa ston pa/ don yod par yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi char
191b6(rgyud): 'bebs pa/ don yod par 'bru'i char 'bebs pa/ don yod par gos kyi char 'bebs pa/ don yod par rgyan dang / chos gos dang / mu tig gi chun 'chang dang / gdub 'khor dang / 
191b7(rgyud): gser gyi cong tsong dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs pa yang dag par ston pa/ don yod par ro rnam pa sna tshogs ro'i mchog ro brgya yi kha zas kyi char 'bebs pa/ don/ 
191b8(rgyud): yod par sems can sna tshogs grol ba ston pa/ don yod par bstan bcos dang / tshig le'ur bcas pa dang / tshul dang / 'dul ba dang / mdo sde dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su
192a1(rgyud): bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gling gzhi dang / de lta bu byung ba dang / skyes pa rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / rmad du zung ba'i chos kyi man ngag sna tshog
192a2(rgyud): dang / chos mngon pa dang tshogs kyi gtam yang dag par ston pa dang / don yod par theg pa chen po rnam pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho la 'jug pa dang rab tu ston pa don yod par gnod sbyin dang / srin / 
192a3(rgyud): po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / yi dgas dang / grul bum dang / brjed byed dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren sna tshogs nyes pa dang / gsod pa dang / shin tu sel ba yang dag par ston pa
192a4(rgyud): yin no// bcom ldan 'das de ltar na yon tan chen po can gyi dgazungs ngan song thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba/ thams cad du mi 'jigs pa'i gnas rab tu ston pa// 
192a5(rgyud): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam legs pa'i lam rab tu sto/ na pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam rab tu ston pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas dang / sangs rgyas nyid sbyin
192a6(rgyud): par mdzad pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das don yod par rnam par lta ba'i zhags pa'i snying po'i gzungs chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po yon tan khyad par
192a7(rgyud): yongs su bsgrags pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba la rab tu gnas pa lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub
192a8(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dkon pa'i gzungs 'di'i snying po 'jig rten las 'dra
192b1(rgyud): pa rnam par 'phrul pa bshad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa/ gsang ba'i snying po yongs su
192b2(rgyud): bsgrags pa legs so legs so// de dag ni sems can thams cad la lam mchog shin tu mchog tu gyur pa/ gya nom pa/ bla ma/ bla na med pa/ mchog tu dkon pa'i gzungs kyi snying
192b3(rgyud): po gsang ba yongs su bsgrags pa ste/ gang gi 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i chu bo chen po dang / srid pa'i rgya mtsho las sems can pha rol tu sgrol ba yin no// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rig
192b4(rgyud): kyi bu pho 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ba 'am/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen pa'am/ dge bsnyen ma'am// dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs dang / rje'u
192b5(rgyud): rigs dang / dmangs rigs gang la la zhig gam/ sems can gzhan gang yang rungs pas don yod par rnam pa/ ra lta ba'i snying po 'di dang / rmad du byung ba rnam par lta
192b6(rgyud): ba don yod pa'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rmad du byung ba'i de kho na nyid rnam par 'phrul pa/ 
192b7(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa/ dam tshig chen po dkyil 'khor gyi ming 'dzin pa tsam gyis kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po sogs par 'gyuraro// bsod nams kyi phung po chen po
192b8(rgyud): dang ldan par yongs su 'dzin par yang 'gyuraro// gang ga'i klung 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma'i rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
193a1(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon mthong ba dang / mngon du chos thos pa dang / mngon du dbyangs thos pa dang / mngon du lung bstan pa thos par 'gyur ba'i sems
193a2(rgyud): can chen po de dag gis ni bsod nams kyi phung po shin tu che ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// sems can de gzungs gang yin pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga
193a3(rgyud): dang / ming sna tshogs da ltar thos pa dang / yang na glog pa dang / yang na lta ba tsam mthong ba ni de dang mnyam pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu pho 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i
193a4(rgyud): dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba yang de dang mnyam pa yi/ nan/ dka' ba byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de ba zhin gshegs pa mnyam pa nyid du thos pa dang mthong bar
193a5(rgyud): 'gyuraro// gang dag gzungs 'di'i dkyil 'khor 'bad de stongab sa dang / brtson 'grus pha rol gnon par byed pa dang rmo la ba dang 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / bzlas brjod kyi cho ga byed pa
193a6(rgyud): dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho gas sgrub par byed pa dang / 'bad par byed pa de ni dka' ba chen po la zhugs pa yin no// de dang mnyam pa yin no// dka' ba gang zhe na/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
193a7(rgyud): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du dka' ba la zhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas te chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar yin no// rigs
193a8(rgyud): kyi bu pho 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong pha 'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen pa 'am/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs
193b1(rgyud): gang yin pa'am/ sems can gzhan gang yang rung bas gzungs 'di'i dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga stobs chen po dang / pha rol gnon pa'i brtson 'grus kyis sgrub par byed pa 'di ni 'jig rten las
193b2(rgyud): 'das pa'i cho ga tshol ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / bzlas brjod dang / cho ga dang / dkyil 'khor lta ba dang / 'jug pa dang / dam tshig dang / phyag rgya
193b3(rgyud): bcings te/ sgrub pa dang / 'di lta ste/ thos pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sems pa dang / dus gsum du lan gsum don yod
193b4(rgyud): pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dran pa dang / khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur ba dang / gzungs 'di yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig/ tu bzlas brjod dang / cho ga dran pa dang / byams pa dang / snying
193b5(rgyud): rje dang / byams pas snying brlan pa dang / sems can tham sa cad la snying brtse ba lhur byed pa de ni dka' bar spyod pa chen po la zhugs pa yin no// bskal pa grangs med pa
193b6(rgyud): gsum du dka' ba spyod pa la zhugs pa dang / 'dra ba 'am/ lhag pa yin no// de'i tshe 'di nyid la 'bras bu chen po thob par 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas
193b7(rgyud): nyid du so sor gnas pa yin no// 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// // bam po bcu gsum pa// bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags
193b8(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// rtag tu 'jig rten dbang phyug rje su 'brang bar 'gyu ro// rtag tu phyag g.yas pa byang chub sems dpa' de'i spyi bo la 'jog par 'gyuraro// rtag tu mchog sbyin pa mdzad par 'gyuraro// rtag tu
194a1(rgyud): zhal mthong bar 'gyu ro// de ltar na yon tan chen po brjod pa'i gzungs dang / dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya dang / cho ga 'di ni mchog tu dkon pa yin no// gzungs dang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
194a2(rgyud): 'di thos pa tsam dang / rna ba'i bu gar 'di'i sgra lan bdun nges par lhung na/ de 'chi 'pho ba tsam dang bsams pa tsam gyis bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu skye bar 'gyur te/ 'od dpag med kyi spyan sngar
194a3(rgyud): zhabs kyi drung du pad+ma la brdzus te skye bar 'gyuraro// rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i mdo sde dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor dang / 
194a4(rgyud): phyag rgya rnams kha ton tu kun tu gnas shing / tshe rabs dran par yang 'gyuraro// dbang po drug yongasu dag pa dang / mngon pa dar shes pa lnga yang so sor thob bo// tsam la rab tu skye bar 'gyuraro// 
194a5(rgyud): lha'i gzugs dang / kha dog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs yongasu/ dag pa de'i phyir/ stobs dang brtson 'grus kyis sems can thams cad sna tshogs 'dzin pa dang / mnyan par bgyi/ 
194a6(rgyud): klag par bgyi/ kha ton du bgyi/ se'i sna'i dri ma dang bral ba dang / phrag dog dang bral bar bgyi/ sems can thams cad byams pa dang / snying rje la sogs pa mchog dang yang dag par ldan pas bgyi'o// 
194a7(rgyud): gzungs dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'di mnyan par bgyi/ blta bar bgyi/ 'jug par bgyi'o// phyi ma'i dus dang / phyi ma'i tshe ma yin par phul du byung ba'i don la brtson par bgyi'o zhes pa'o// 'jig
194a8(rgyud): rten las 'das pa'i sgrub thabs kyi chog 'don/ bla na med pa zhes bgyi'o// mang du smos tsa 'tshal te/ de la 'gran sems kyis kyang mnyan par bgyi'o// zhes so// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
194b1(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzungs 'di gsungs pa'i de ma thag tu/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyis po Ta la'i ri bo 'di/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang
194b2(rgyud): bzhin du gyur to// me tog gi shing ljon pa dang / 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa gang yin pa rnams kyang / rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi khang pa brtsegs par rab tu gyur to// gang ga'i klung gi bye ma
194b3(rgyud): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag rnams 'bum phrag bye ba dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i rdul phra rab dang mnyam par rab tu gyur to// lha rdzas kyi me tog dang 'bras bu rnam par bkra ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams pham
194b4(rgyud): par byas pa'i rgyan rnam par bkra bas rnam par bkra zhing / dril dbu g.yer ka'i dra ba dang / gser gyi dril bu 'khrol ba'i bla de res dpyangs pa rnams dang / lha rdzas kyi seng ge'i khri yongasu
194b5(rgyud): bshams pa rnams kyang re re zhing khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbu sa na/ seng ge'i khri bshams pa brgya stong phrag dgu/ bcu rtsa dgur rab tu byung bar gyur te/ seng ge'i khri thad la// 
194b6(rgyud): phyogs bcu nas de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par byon te bzhug so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang / phyag gser gyi kha dog can brkyang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
194b7(rgyud): chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyi bo'i gtsug tu phyag 'jog par mdzad cing / leg so zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod par mdzad do// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug legs so
194b8(rgyud): leg so mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam chen por rab tu ston pas/ sems can thams cad pha rol tu 'gro bar byed pa dang / gang gis thos pa tsam gyis 'jig
195a1(rgyud): rten las 'das pa/ so sor khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyi lam tshol ba la rjesu 'gro'o// 'on kyang bzlas pa dang / 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / dkyil 'khor mthong
195a2(rgyud): ba dang / 'jug pa ches mang ba'i dbang du byas pa'i sems can rnams dam tshig la rje su 'jug par 'gyur ba de/ skye ba 'di nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa'i lusu rigs par bya'o// de nas po Ta la'i
195a3(rgyud): / gnas kyi ri bo dang / rtsa dang shing gel pa dang / sman dang / nags de rnams thams cad la mi gang tsam du mtho ba nyid dang / shing rta'i 'khor lo'i tshad tsam pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can
195a4(rgyud): gyi pad+ma rnams rab tu byung ste/ 'dab ma kha dog sna tshogs da pa dang / sdong bu bai DUr+ya dang / 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi da kha dog ltar dmar ba'i mu tig gi ze'u 'bru dang / lha rdzas kyi mu
195a5(rgyud): tig gi ge sar gyi khor yug tu bskor ba gang yin pa la byang / chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bzhug/ sa te/ byang chub sems dpa' nga rnams thams cad kyang / 
195a6(rgyud): chos la gus pas/ thams cad dbus mo btsugs te/ gzungs 'di'i dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya mthong ba'i don du/ mu tig gi do shal brgya stong rib byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
195a7(rgyud): chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mngon par bkab par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs pa ni yang ches cher
195a8(rgyud): g.yos par gyur to// lha'i me tog gi char chen po mang po rab tu phab te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa'i don dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mchod pa'i don dang / gzungs
195b1(rgyud): 'di'i dkyil 'khor dam pa la mchod pa'i don du char rab tu phab bo// de nas yang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes bzhin 'dzum zhing rdo rje bskor bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bder
195b2(rgyud): dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gzungs kyi
195b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'di ni shin tu rnyed par dka' ba ste/ 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed pa blta bar bgyi/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar
195b4(rgyud): blta bar bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang mnyam pa nyid du dbalta bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das mthu chen po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling na mchog tu dkon par blta bar bgyi ste/ 'di ni phyi
195b5(rgyud): ma'i dus/ phyi ma'i tshe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad/ pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyuraro// ga/ nga gis thos pa tsam gyis 'di lta bu'i yon tan dang phan yon
195b6(rgyud): so sor thob bo// kun tu snang bar byed par 'gyur ba 'di nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ros gzigs dbang phyug ma gtogs par sems can thams cad kyi
195b7(rgyud): nang na gzhan su yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje ji skad smras pa de de bzhin no// lag na rdo rje 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i sems can thams cad ma dang phar gyur pa 'di
195b8(rgyud): gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di sems can thams cad kyi re ba skong pa dang / skyob pa dang / skyabs
196a1(rgyud): dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dpung gnyen byed pa nas/ ji srid bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo sems can thams cad sangs rgyas nyid kyi
196a2(rgyud): bdag nyid kyi bar la rab tu 'god par byed do// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi stobs dang brtson 'grus dang pha rol gnon pas/ 
196a3(rgyud): sngon sems can rnams la phan pa'i don du zhugs pa yin no// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje/ nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi snying po dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po thogs/ 
196a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/ byang chub se/ dmas dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
196a5(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal/ nas/ nor bu rin po che chen po de yang mngon par dgab pa ra phul lo// lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs pas bcal du
196a6(rgyud): bkram pa/ mchod pa'i don du rab tu bkod nas/ rang gi stan la 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa don yod pa
196a7(rgyud): dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa rab tu gsal ba'i 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa gang gis spyi bo'i gtsug tu gdugs
196a8(rgyud): kyi rnam pa'i khang pa gartsegs pa kun tu gnas par gyur to// khang pa gartsegs pa de las kyang / 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs pa byung ngo // 'od zer sna tshogs pa'i snang ba des kyang / na mkha'i mthal du rdzu 'phrug
196b1(rgyud): gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul chen po sna tshogs pa bstan to// 'od zer gyi snang ba re res kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gang ga'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa
196b2(rgyud): dgu rab tu bstan to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de rnams thams cad kyis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya/ 
196b3(rgyud): ba byin te/ sems can chen po mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya 'di bshad pa 'di leg so lag so// 'jig rten las 'das pa shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa'o
196b4(rgyud): byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar byed pa'i lam/ chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed pa'i lam/ chos kyi rnam 'phrul 'bar ba dar byed pa/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng bar byed pa/ chos kyi dung
196b5(rgyud): 'bud par byed pa/ bdud bzhi'i dkyil 'khor las rnam parargyal bar byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs pa/ cus gnon par byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ban
196b6(rgyud): brgyad rab tu rdzogs par byed pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis gnon par byed pa de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' pha rol gnon par byed pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcu rab tu rdzogs par bya'o// 'di ni 'phags
196b7(rgyud): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad sgom par byed pa'o// 'di ni lam rab tu nyams pa rnams kyi lam du 'chags par byed pa/ bsam pa rab tu nyams pa rnams kyi bsam pa yongasu dag pa/ ngan song du 'gro/ 
196b8(rgyud): bar rgyu ba rnams kyi bde 'gre'i lam du 'gro bar byed pa/ 'di ni byang chub chen po'i sna blon dang / 'bras bu rab tu ston par byed pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ 
197a1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems can dag pa 'jig rten las 'das pa khyad par du 'phags
197a2(rgyud): pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi nye bar spyod pa'i cho ga shod cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
197a3(rgyud): chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas bskul ba thob nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i cho ga dang / dkyil 'khor gyi nye
197a4(rgyud): bar spyod pa'i cho ga dang / sgrub thabs gsungaso// gnas bzangadas gzhi dge ba dang // sa gzhi gtsang zhing ne'u sing la// ljon shing me tog 'bras bus khyab// me tog 'khri shing 'gram dang ni// 
197a5(rgyud): sa gzhi mnyen la dag pa dang // gang du chu bo 'bab pa dang // gzi brjid ldan zhing yid dga' ba// sa gzhi sems ni dga' ba/ ra 'os// yid kyi shing rta rgyas byed cing // go skabs legs par
197a6(rgyud): gnas pa dang // shin tu dag cing thun tshags bral// rus pa gseg ma gyo mo dang // phub ma sol ba yongasu spangs// gtsang zhing gtsang la logs dag pa'i// sa gzhi yongasu zlum pa der// mkhas pas rgyar
197a7(rgyud): ni gzings tshad du// gzhal nas shin tu rnam 'byes shig/ gtsang zhing mnyen la 'jam par phye// gnas der dkyil 'khor legs par bsgrubs// sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med// 'jig rten las 'das
197a8(rgyud): khyad 'phags par// de bzhin gshegs kun byin gyis brlabs// sa yi cha las spangasu ni// mi gang tshad du brko bar bya// dmar po 'am yang na gur gum kha dog dang // sa rdul dkar po snum pa ni// mar sar 'dra
197b1(rgyud): ba 'jam pa yin// sa yi khyab par dbye ba de// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis bsngags// byang chub snying pos der mtshungs// ring bsrel bzhugs pa'i mchod rten dang // de ni mtshungs par gyur pa yin// brkos
197b2(rgyud): pa'i nang du mkhas pa yis// slar yang sa de dgang bar bya// ji srid dong bu mnyam par gang // de ni dkyil 'khor yang dag pa'o// nyung dang lhag pa bsngags pa min// 'dir ni 'grub pa med par bstan// khru ni sum
197b3(rgyud): cu rtsa gnyis tshad// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig dag gdab// yang na khru ni bcu drug dang // yang na khru ni bco lngar bya// mnyam zhing grwa bzhir legs par dbye// ba yi lci ba dag dang ni// sa dang bsres te bsku bya/ 
197b4(rgyud): bang shin tu zhen par bajig pa dang // 'jam zhing mnyen par bya ba yi na// de la dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa// sna tshogs chen gyis kun tu dbye// sgo bzhi rnam par 'byes pa dang // rta babs bzhi
197b5(rgyud): dang ldan par bya// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi snying po ni// rnam par phye ste gru bzhi tshad// khru gsum yang na khru bzhi ni// thig sku da tshon gyis rnam par dbye// nang gi thig gi tshad dag tu// mahA
197b6(rgyud): rtse gsum pa dag dang ni// nor bu rin chen sna tshogs bya// bar gyi thig gi tshad dag tu// pad+ma dang ni rdo rje dang // kun tu bri bar bya ba yin// phyi yi thig gi tshad dag tu// rdo rje rnam pa'i stegs bu dang // nir chen
197b7(rgyud): sna tshogs gzhal med khang // stegs bu dag kyang bri bar bya// pad+ma'i dbus su gzhal med khang // gzhal yas khang pa gnas par bya// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi pad+ma la// rnam par snang mdzad thub pa bya// 
197b8(rgyud): g.yon du 'od ni dpag med pa// g.yas phyogasu ni de bzhin gshegs// shAkya'i rgyal po dag dang ni// don yod rgyal po 'jig rten gyi// dbang phyug mgon la mngon sum du// btud de thal mo sbyor ba ni// 
198a1(rgyud): phyag pan par na bya ba yin// phyag gnyis kyis nas tshogs pa'i// me tog rnams na 'chang ba dang // rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan par bya// 'od dpag med pa'i mdun dun// khrob/ 
198a2(rgyud): rgyal po phyag bzhi pa// btud de thal mo sbyor ba dang // lha rdzas me tog sna tshogs pa// lag pa gnyis na thogs pa dang // sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan par bya// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor legs par rgyan// / 
198a3(rgyud): tshogs dar gyis mdzes par bya// don yad zhags pa'i phyag rgya che// pad+ma'i gdan dang rnam rgyan pa// 'bar ba'i nang na yod par bya// grwa bzhi dag ni byas na ni// gnyis kyi bar gyi cha bzhi ste// dbus kyi ga
198a4(rgyud): su 'jigs med pa// shar gyi gnas gnas pa ni// lha me sgrol dam rnam par rgyan// g.yas kyi gan su gnas pa ni// gos/ dkar mo ni rnam par rgyan// nub kyi gnas na gnas pa ni// 
198a5(rgyud): mo dkar mo rnam par rgyan// byang gi gnas na gnas pa ni// lha mo pad+ma mdzes dgas rgyan// dkyil 'khor phyi rim grwan mas su// rgyal chen bzhi ni bzhag par bya// bar gyi gnas su
198a6(rgyud): bzhag pa ni// ral pa gcig pa gtum po shar// nub tu pho nya bzhin sgyur ma// g.yas phyogasu ni bzhin sbyar ma// rdo rje lcags sgrogs bya ba yin// byang du srin mo khro gnyer gdong // kun kyang me dbus
198a7(rgyud): 'jigs pa med// dkyil 'khor dbus su dgod pa bzhin// phyi rol thig le pad+mo'i phreng // rdo rje rtse gsum bzhag pa ni// kun tu 'bar ba phreng bar bcas// phyi rol dkyil 'khor kun tu ni// bri bya rtags
198a8(rgyud): dang phyag rgya dang // lha ni dbang phyug dbang phyug che// tshangs pa khyab 'jug gshin rje dang // chu lha dbang po lus ngan po// dbang sgyur dga' ldan gnas dag gi/ lha nas 'og min gnas kyi bar// lha rnam
198b1(rgyud): bri bar bya ba yin// sum cu rtsa gsum lha rnams dang // rtags ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang // kun kyang pad+mo'i gdan la gnas// de bzhin chos kyi 'khor lo dang // rdo rje rtse lnga rdo rje dang // nags pa dang na/ 
198b2(rgyud): dgra sta dang // legs mthong 'khor lo de bzhin no// mdung rtse gsum dang bzlas// ngos la dbyug pa tho ba dang // rdo rje dkyil 'khor pad+ma'i phreng // 'khor lo dung dang dga' nga dang // ral gri dang ni tam
198b3(rgyud): rab bum pa gang bdag dang ni// ma snang ba yi 'bag sha dang // pad+ma dang ni ud pa la// rgyal mtshan gdugs dang nor bu dang // dathug pa dang ni rdo rje dang // glu ba zhir rdo rjes mtshan pa yin// no
198b4(rgyud): bu rdo rje dag dang ni// dgra sta rdo rje dag dang ni// phyag rgya bzhi dang dga' ba 'khyil// byam bum dang kun de dang // ril ba b+h+ring ga/ ri dang ni// ri dgas e na'i lpags pa la// mchod phyir thogs
198b5(rgyud): pa'i snam bu dang // steng du rgyu skar bcas pa yi// zla ba nyi mde bzhin no// kun kyang 'bar ba'i nang du 'dug/ so so chend bye bar bya// mkhas pas shar gyi sgor bri ba// 'gying bag
198b6(rgyud): mthong na 'jigs su rung // lag na rdo rje 'jigs pa med// rdo rje 'chang ba 'bar ba'i nang // ke li ke la gtum po che// lho phyogs kyi ni sgo ru bzhag/ nub tu rdo rje ping ga la// mthong na 'jigs su rung ba
198b7(rgyud): yis byang du nges par gnod mdzes bya// phyi rol dkyil 'khor kun tu ni// pad+ma'i phreng dang u dpal phreng // grwa dag dang ni grwa rnams su// klu yi rgyal po bzhi rnams bri// sgo srung ba dag bri ba ni// nor bu
198b8(rgyud): bzang dang gang ba bzang // stobs kyi lha dang lngas rtsen yin// sgo yi gnas kyi bar dag tu// chu bo bzhi ni bri bya ba// gang ga dang ni si ta dang // pag shu dang ni sin du yin// phreng ba'i nang rol thog dag tu/ 
199a1(rgyud): dpal gyi lha mo ba san ti// dpe med ma dang sa yi lha// lo tog sman gyi lha mo dang // sgra dbyangs ma dang 'jigs ldan ma// de bzhin me yi lha dag dang // 'phrog ma dang ni dung can ma/ 
199a2(rgyud): gtum mo dang ni me tog so// de dag bri bar bya ba yin// khrus byas 'dri mkhan gtsang ma yos// gtsang ma'i snod du tshon rnams ni// lhag ma min pas kun tu bri// zas ni dkar gsum grub par bya// khyad
199a3(rgyud): par 'dod pas zas ngan pa// spang bar bya ba nya sha dang // tsong dang sgog kya ke'u rnams dang // 'dres pa spang bar bya ba ni// log 'dren glags tshol spang phyir ro// khrus byas gos ni sar bgos// gtsang
199a4(rgyud): mas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor rnam pa sna chog das kyis// kun tu brgyan par bya ba ni// ba dan rnam pa sna tshog sa dang // rnam pa sna tshogs mda' dang ni// lha rdzas dar ni
199a5(rgyud): spang ba dang // ba dan yang ni sbyang bar bya// mtshon skud sna lngalnga/ srad bu yis// kun tu yongasu bskor bar bya// zangs la sa byas pa'i pad+ma'i tshad// sor bzhi mdab ma bye ba dag/ 
199a6(rgyud): mdzes pa grwa bzhir gzugs par bya// snying po'i dkyil 'khor grwa rnamasu// pad+ma brgyad ni gzhal ba dag/ gser las byas pa bzhi bzhag cing // de bzhin dngul las byas pa bzhi// kun tu byu
199a7(rgyud): ru'i phreng ba dang // mu tig phreng ba de bzhin no// kun tu gser gyi srad bu dang // rin chen sna tshogs bzhag par bya// snying po'i dkyil 'khor thig bar du// gser gyi snod ni bzhi dag dang // dngul gyi
199a8(rgyud): snod ni bzhi bzhag go// dngul gyi bum pa gang ba bzhi la dngul dang gser dang zangs las byas pa'i me tog gis spras pa'i mgo lcogs kyis spras pa bzhag par bya'o// gser gyi bum pa bzhi bzhag
199b1(rgyud): bal mu tog dang / bru ru dang / pad+ma rA ga dang / mar gang dang / yon dra nI la dang / dngul dang / gser dang / me tog gis sbas pa'i mgo lcogs bzhag par bya'o// graN+DaM dang / gapur dang / gur grum
199b2(rgyud): dang lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye mas gser gyi stong bkang ba dang / dngul gyi snod kyi nang du gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / rangs kyi me tog mu tig gis rgyan cing // rin po che sna chog
199b3(rgyud): pas spras pa bzhag par bya// cod pan gyi rgyal mtshan bzhi bzhag par bya// rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bzhi bzhag par bya// tshon sna tshogs can dang / dar dmar po spang bar bya// dngul gyi ngog por bani
199b4(rgyud): bzhag ste// tsan dan dang / gla rtsi dang / ga pur dang / gur gum dgyi bdug pa bdug par bya// sa las byas pa'i bum pag daser gyis g.yogs pa'i nang du dri chab rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ 
199b5(rgyud): bkang ste/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par bgyis la bkang ba la dar gyis bcings la rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i steng du zangs las byas pa'i me tog gzhag nas snying
199b6(rgyud): po'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du pad+ma'i steng du bzhag par bya'o// de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor thog thag tu dri dang / phye ma dang byug pa dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang / 
199b7(rgyud): mchod yon gyi chab kyis dngul gyi snod dang / zangs kyi snod bkang ba drug cu rtsa bzhi bzhag par bya'o// lcags kyi snod bum pa gang ba drug cu rtsa bzhi bzhag par bya'o// me tog dang / mgo ljogs dang / pog
199b8(rgyud): por bkang ba drug cu rtsa bzhi bzhag par bya'o// bzhag par bya ste bdug pa sna tshogs kyis bdug par bya'o// sgo bzhir dri chab kyi bum pa dar gyis brgyan cing spud pa bzhag par bya'o// sna ma'i me tog gis gdu
200a1(rgyud): ngu'i steng du mda' la bdan btags pa drug cung bzhi btsugs te/ tshon sna tshogs kyis bkra bar byas pa'i mnga' dang / nor du'i phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor brgyan / 
200a2(rgyud): bya'o// de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor thog thag tus dang bsres pa'i ba'i lcibs dkyil 'khor byas la dri chub kyis bskus te tshon snga lnga'i srad bus thig btab la sgo ba'i rnam par phyeste/ seng rdze
200a3(rgyud): gaM phur bu tshang sor bcu gnyis pa drug cu rtsa bzhi gdab bo// tshon sna lnga'i srad bus dkyil 'khor kun tu bskor bar bya'o// bum bu dang / bum pa dang / byam bum drug cu rtsa bzhi'i gtor ma sna tshogs
200a4(rgyud): kyis bkang ba bzhag go// kham por zlum po drug cu rtsa bzhi gtor ma sna tshogs kyis bkang ba bzhag go// gtor ma tshul sna tsho gras pa drug cu rtsa bzhi so sor bzhag/ snod tshon sna lnga pa drug cu
200a5(rgyud): bzhi kha zas rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bkang ba dang / bca' ba rnam pa sna tshogs thugs pa dang / gtor ma dkar po rnam pa sna tshogs bzhag go// yo byad thams cad kyis yongasu gang ba ro// 
200a6(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gtor ma bzhag go// 'bras bu sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs dgram mo// phreng ba brgya nyi shu rtsa gcig dkyil 'khor du sbyang bar bya ste/ byang phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor la drug cu rtsa
200a7(rgyud): bzhi/ snying po'i dkyil 'khor la sum cu rtsa gnyis gdag so// me mar gyi sdong bu bzhi bud par bya'o// gtor ma brgya drug cu rtsa bzhi dang dkyil 'khor thog thag tu mar me bud par bya'o// chang dang sha dang / reg
200a8(rgyud): cong dang / sgog skya dang / ke'u dang / tshed sngon dang / la phug spangs pa'i gtor ma gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs bzhag par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi gra bzhir don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mdo sde bklag par
200b1(rgyud): bya ste sgo re rer bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklag par bya'o// chos klog pa legs par khrus byas te/ lha rdzas kyi gos kyis dkris te gtsang ma la dri rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bsgos
200b2(rgyud): po gos gtsang ma gsar ba bgos te/ chos kyi stan shin tu rgyan pa lha rdzas kyi stan la 'dug nas tshig 'jam po chog gnyen pos bklag par bya'o// nub kyi phyogs chal dkyil 'khor mthon po la bde/ 
200b3(rgyud): bcan gyi bkod pa bris pa 'od dpag med dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob pa'i gzugs bris pa'i ras kyi sku gzugs dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par
200b4(rgyud): bzhag par bya'o// shar gyi phyogs cha la dkyil 'khor gru bzhi mtho/ ngan po byas la/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor la shA/ thub pa dang / 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ba dang / don yod pa'i zhags
200b5(rgyud): pa'i khro bo'i gzugs bris pa ras kyi sku gzugs dkyil 'khor/ la mngon du phyogs par bzhag go// lho'i phyogs chal ri 'dra ba'i gnas mthon po byas la de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig
200b6(rgyud): rten dbang phyug rgyal po dang / 'jam dpal dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa ras la bris pa'i dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par bzhag go// byang gi phyogs cha la khro bar
200b7(rgyud): rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang / byams pa dang / sa'i snying po bris pa'i ras kyi sku gzugs dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par bzhag go// stegs bu'i rnam par mthon
200b8(rgyud): por byas pa thams cad legs par brgyan par bya'o// dar gyi phreng bas brgyan par bya'o// rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dang / bum pa gang ba bzhag pa dang / dris dkyil 'khor bya ba dang / ro'i mchog rna
201a1(rgyud): pa sna tshogs bza' ba'i ngo bo rnam pa du ma'i kha zas kyi rong dbul ba dang / 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i bsod snyoms bzhag pa dang / tsan dan dang / a ga ru dang / du rus ka/ 
201a2(rgyud): dang / ga pur dang / gla rtsi dang / gur gum dang / bsres pa'i bdug pa ras kyi sku gzugs la dbul bar bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang bas dus gsum du khrus bya zhing / gos lan gsum brjes te/ dus
201a3(rgyud): gsum du bzlas brjod dang cho ga bya'o// tshes brgyad nas brtsams te ches bco lnga tshang gi bar du don yod pa'i zhags pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal po'an nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas
201a4(rgyud): brjed bya'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu nyi shu drugacig dang / don yod pa rnam par blta ba'i zhags pa'i snying dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa rnam par 'phrul pa lan nyi shu
201a5(rgyud): gcig dang / rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sem/ sa dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa stong rtsa brgyad bzla brjod bya ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi zhags
201a6(rgyud): pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o// zla ba nyar thug gi bar du zas dkar gsum bza' bar bya'o// ches bco lnga'i nyon mtshan thog thag tu don yod pa'i nags pa'i snying po dpag tu med par bzlas parjod/ 
201a7(rgyud): bya'o// mtshan thog zag bzlas brjod byas kyang ngal ba med pa dang / lus snyoms pa dang bral bas bzlas brjod bya'o// byams pa dang / snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sems su bya'o// bzlas brjod kyi chog rtse
201a8(rgyud): nas dkyil 'khor gyi byab mtshams bcad pa dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / bdag srung ba dang / gzhan srung ba dang dkyil 'khor bsdams pa byas nas/ de nas 'khor rnams dkyil 'khor du dmatshag la gzug
201b1(rgyud): par bya'o// dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi las zin nas mchod pa rtsam mo// mchod pa'i cho ga zin pa dang / de nas bzlas brjod brtsam par bya ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor
201b2(rgyud): gyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod byas la khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad kyis dbang bskur ro// bzlas brjod lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / dbang bskur ma thag tu ras kyi
201b3(rgyud): sku gzugs dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad kun tu 'bar zhing 'od zer sna tshogs 'byin cing leg so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang ba'i snying dga' zhing lus 'bar bar 'gyur ro// 
201b4(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug shin tu 'bar zhing 'o dadu 'phro ba nyi ma sto 5a lhag pa'i 'od zer can don yod pa'i zhags pa 'tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba dkyil 'khor gyi dbus
201b5(rgyud): kyi nang nas mngon du gshegs te phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor kun la rnam par gzigs shing rig sngags 'chang ba leg so zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung ste/ phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ rig sngag
201b6(rgyud): 'chang ba'i spyi bo la bzhig ste dkyil 'khor gyi mchog shin tu brgyan cing spras pa 'di ni shin tu bzang ba yin te/ leg so leg so// 'di rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa rnam pa
201b7(rgyud): 'phrul pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gsang
201b8(rgyud): ba lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / namakha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po rnams kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor bdud thams cad pham par byed
202a1(rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor bgegs dang / rnam par log 'dren thams cad 'joms pa/ bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rje'u'i rigs dang / 
202a2(rgyud): dmangs rigs dang / tha na byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i byim ra rung ste/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i gcong rong las sgrol ba yin no// 'di ni sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad dang / 
202a3(rgyud): dmyal ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / nad dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba las yongasu thar par byed cing 'jigs pa med pa'i khyim du 'jug par byed pa yin no// 'di ni rnam par thar par byed pa dkyil 'kho/ 
202a4(rgyud): chen po snying po dang / gsang sngagasu bcad pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa 'di rig sngags 'chang ba de dang des ming brjod pa dang / gang
202a5(rgyud): dran pa tsam la sogs pa dang / lta ba dang / nyan pa dang / ming 'dzin pa yang 'khor ba'i pha rol tu brgal bar 'gyuraro// phyir mi lnga/ ga pa nyid du sa bcu bgrod nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
202a6(rgyud): pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// de gang zhe na/ gang zhig dkyil 'khor chen po 'di 'dra ba mngon du mthong ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i gzungs 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gsang
202a7(rgyud): sngags kyi tshig bzlas brjod byed pa dang / klog pa dang / dran pa dang / 'chad pa dang / lan 'ga' sbyang bas mthong ba dang / thang cig dang / skad cig dang / yud tsam gyis mthong ba ni nga dang mnyam pa dang / 
202a8(rgyud): mi mnyam pa yin no// zhes smra'o// bdag ni sems can de la de bzhin gshegs pa yin par yang 'dzin te/ 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa yin pas spyi bos dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// 
202b1(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang bas zung shig dang mchog ji ltar 'dod pa dang / ji ltar yid la re ba dang / bsam pa de thams cad rje su gzung zhing sbyin par mdzad do// de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang bas yid la ji ltar
202b2(rgyud): bsams pa'i mchog smras na/ de thams cad sbyin par mdzad cing don yod pa'i ye shes bkod pa rnam par grol ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyu ro// gzhan yang gang ga'i klung gi bye
202b3(rgyud): dang mnyam pa khrag khrig stong phrag bcu'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyis na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor de'i dam tshig tu zhugs pa ni dam tshig shes pa'i rjesu zhugs pa
202b4(rgyud): yin te/ de dag thams cad sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa yin/ 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i phyir mi ldog pa thob par 'gyur ba
202b5(rgyud): yin/ lung bstan pa dang byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ba yin// de ni mngal na gnas par skye ba'i tha ma ste/ phyis mngal na gnas pa'i dri mas gos par mi 'gyuraro// shi nas bde ba can
202b6(rgyud): gyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu skye bar 'gyuraro// de pad+mo'i nang nas rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par brdzus te skyes par 'gyuraro// tshe rabs kun tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyuraro// don yod pa'i rgyal po'i phun sum tshegs/ 
202b7(rgyud): pa cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub kyi snying po chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/ dam tshig chen po 'di kha ton byed na phyogs bcu'i
202b8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyis zhing na byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa mthong bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar legaso zhes bya ba thob par 'gyur te/ 
203a1(rgyud): rigs kyi bu skye ba blangs pa legs par skye ba yin pas legaso leg so// phyir mi ldog par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gnas pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa de
203a2(rgyud): dag thams cad dang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'od gzer 'bum phrag bye bas mdzes par gyur cing bsod nams kyis rgyan pa'i phyag gser gyi mdog can brkyang nas spyi bor phyag
203a3(rgyud): 'jog cing dbugs 'byin par yang mdzad do// byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du chos 'bel ba'i gtam mngon sum du sgrogs par mdzad do// tha na dkyil 'khor chen po rol mo'i sgra rnga bo che dang / rnga phran dang
203a4(rgyud): dung dang / rdza rnga dang / rol me'i sgra gang dag grag pa la sems can gang dag gis sgra de thos nas sna ba'i bu ga tsam du song ba de tha ma/ sa cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par
203a5(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// tha na byol so/ nga gi skye gan su gtogs pa bya'i rna bar sgra thos pa de dag tha ma/ sa cad kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyu ro// de ltar na rnam 'phrul
203a6(rgyud): pa'i cho 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga mthu chen po rnam par 'phrul pa yin no// rigs kyi bu pho 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nas/ 
203a7(rgyud): dge bsnyen ma'am/ sems can gzhan gang yang rung ba dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u'i rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ 'ga' zhig gi rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho
203a8(rgyud): ga 'di 'khor mang po'i nang du klog pa dang / sems can gang gis sgra de thos nas sgra dbyangs de dang ming thos pa rna ba'i bu gar song bar gyur pa de dag thams cad sgrib pa dang / sdig pa mi bzad pa las
203b1(rgyud): bral bar 'gyur ro// sngon gyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// phyir mi ldog par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis srasu rig par bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras
203b2(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gi sras kyi thu bo yin no// rtag par 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug grogs mdzad cing rje su 'brang bar 'gyuraro// rtag tu dbugs 'byin par mdzad par 'gyur// 
203b3(rgyud): mthar byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar du rtag tu rjesu srung bar mdzad do// sems can gang zhig dkyil 'khor de'i sa phyogasu song ste/ sa gzhi snang ba tsam mthong ba de dag thams cad kyang phyir
203b4(rgyud): mi ldog par 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa thams cad bsregs shi dang sgrib pa thams cad las yongasu grol bar 'gyur ro// de'ings rdul rlung gis bdas te lus la phog pa gang yin pa de
203b5(rgyud): dang / tha na sems can ngan pa yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i gnas la rab tu gnas/ par 'gyuraro// sdig pa thams cad las yongasu grol ba
203b6(rgyud): dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mthong ba dang ldan par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis
203b7(rgyud): dbugs phyung bar 'gyuraro// lha thams cad kyis bsrungs par 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongasu gzungs par 'gyuraro// dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyuraro// de ltar na sgra
203b8(rgyud): thos pa tsam dang / ming 'dzin pa tsam gyis 'bras bu chen po thob par 'gyuraro// de nas rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thad
204a1(rgyud): sreg cing sdug bsngal drag po las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba dang / nyon mongs pa drag po'i rgya mtsho dang / 'khor ba las sgrol ba 'grub pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas bla na med par
204a2(rgyud): dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i lam ston pa/ sangs rgyas dang / 
204a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' ston pa/ lha'i stegs sbyin sreg byas pa tsam gyi mod la the tsom med par/ me lha dang / dbang po dang / khyad 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / dbang phyug dang gshin rje dang / 
204a4(rgyud): chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / gzhon nu rnams sbyin sreg byas pa 'di tsam gyis modado la thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur ro// the tsom med par lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma
204a5(rgyud): yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen/ po dang / srin po dang / sha za dang / grul bum thams ca da 'ong bar 'gyur zhing / de'i mo la rig sngags 'chang ba'i
204a6(rgyud): rkang pa gnyis la rtag tu 'dud par byed do// de bzhin du nyin mtshan du kun tu srung bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po chen po bcu yang
204a7(rgyud): phyogs bcur srung bar byed de/ mi srun pa ma rungs pa sel cing dmyal ba dang / 'jigs pa mi bzad pa dang / dug drag po dang / sems can ma rungs pa rnams sel bar byed do// de ma thag tu
204a8(rgyud): bsod nams chen po'i lhun po dang / bsod nams chen po'i phung po bla na med pa skye bar 'gyuraro// tsan dan srang nyi shu dang / a ga ru srang lnga dang / du ru ska srang bdun dang / ga pur dang / gla rtsa
204b1(rgyud): srang gcig gi bzhi cha re re dang / gur gum srang gcig dang / lde pog kun tu ra srang lnga dang / gu gul srang bdun dang / 'di rnams gcig tu bsres te/ phye mar byas la khar dkar po dang / 
204b2(rgyud): sbrang rtsis ril bu zho re'i tshad tsam du byas pa stong rtsa brgyad dang / yungs kar dang / 'bras yos bsres te ril bu dang / bsres nas mar gyi nang du spyugs te sbyin bsreg bya'o// shing su ra
204b3(rgyud): b+hi dang / shing arga dang / shing sha ma'i yam shing gis me sbar te sbyin sreg gi cho ga bya'o// gang dang gang gi tshe stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na de dang de'i tshe sdig pa dang / sgrib pa drag po
204b4(rgyud): thams cad sreg par 'gyuraro// de dang de'i tshe de nad thams cad las yongasu grol bar 'gyuraro// de dang de'i tshe ga cong thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyuraro// de dang
204b5(rgyud): de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge slong dang / bram zla dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs
204b6(rgyud): la sogs pa thams cad kyi sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyuraro// sdig pa thams cad dang / byur thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang
204b7(rgyud): 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / shags 'gyed pa thams cad dang / rang gi 'khor dang / gzhan gyi 'khor gyi 'jigs pa thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba'i dgras
204b8(rgyud): 'jigs pa thams cad dang / sems can ma rungs pa thams cad dang / rkun po dang / zol pa dang / mi rgod pa dang / gcan zan gtum po'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ 
205a1(rgyud): sems can de dag thams cad 'jigs pa med par 'gyuraro// bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u tshig
205a2(rgyud): dang / dmangs rigs gang dag gis de'i dri tshor ba de dag thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// tshe rjes nas
205a3(rgyud): thams cad bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro bar 'gyur zhing / pad+mo'i nang nas brdzus te skye bar 'gyuraro// byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa rkang gnyis dang / rkang bzhi pa rnams kyis
205a4(rgyud): / de'i dri tsher ba tsam gyis thams cad nges par phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya/ sa nyid las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing mngon par rdzogs
205a5(rgyud): par 'tshang rgya'o// rig sngags 'chang ba de ji lta ji ltar spyi/ na sreg byed pa de lta de ltar de'i lus dri ma med cing yongasu dag par 'gyuraro// stong rtsa brgyad chang na rig sngags 'chang ba'i
205a6(rgyud): lus 'bar bar 'gyuraro// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas mang po'i sku mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag gis rig sngags 'chang ba la leg so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin te/ rig
205a7(rgyud): sngags 'chang ba legaso leg so// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchog/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga yin no// 
205a8(rgyud): 'di ni bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i sbyin sreg chen po'i cho ga yin no// 'di ni gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / brjed byed dang / bgegs dang log 'dren tshar gcod pa'i
205b1(rgyud): sbyin sreg chen po'i cho ga yin no// 'di ni byang chub kyi snying por song ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba'i sbyin sreg chen po'i cho ga yin no// 'di ni byang chub kyi lam bla na med pa yin no// de nas de bzhin
205b2(rgyud): gshegs pa'i sku de dag thams cad kyis phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog lta bu brkyang ste/ rig sngags 'chang ba'i mgo'i spyi bo la phyag 'jog par mdzad do// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
205b3(rgyud): dbang phyug gi rang gi ngo bo nyid kyi rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ don yod pa'i zhags pa dang / tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/ dbu lcang lo cod pan gyis rgyan pa/ pad+ma dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang
205b4(rgyud): zhags pa thogs pa/ rig sngags 'chang ba'i mdun na ba zhugs te bka' stsal pa/ rig sngags 'chang ba khyod kyi das don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil
205b5(rgyud): 'khor 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga chen po grub pa legaso leg so// zung shig dang / mchog rdzi lta ba dang / ji ltar 'dod pa de thams cad sbyin no// de nas rig
205b6(rgyud): sngags 'chang bas ji ltar 'dod pa'i mchog smras na de thams cad thob par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gis phyag brkyang ste/ rig sngags 'chang ba'i mgo'i spyi bo
205b7(rgyud): la phyag bzhag pa dang / phyag bzhag ma thag tu rig sngags 'chang ba na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyuraro// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyu ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thad
205b8(rgyud): mngon sum du mthong ba thob par 'gyuraro// phyir mi ldog pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas thob par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba/ 
206a1(rgyud): thob par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing la bsnyen bkur byas nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med byang chub
206a2(rgyud): sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa chos 'chad pa/ byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du mngon sum du thob par 'gyur ro// de nas ho khung bshad par bya ste/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin sreg
206a3(rgyud): gi gnas bla na med pa ni pad+ma kha bye ba 'dra bar byas pa/ zlum po khru gsum pa sa dang ba'i lci ba bsres pa dang ldan par byas/ pad+ma'i snying po la ho khung zabs su brko ba dang / thad ka kun du khru gang ba
206a4(rgyud): brko bar bya'o// nang du pad+ma bcu drug pa 'bur du byas pa bzhag la// tshen sna tshogs kyis pad pa de brgyan par bya'o// pad+mo'i phyi 'khor du dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas la dri sna chog kyis
206a5(rgyud): gtor ba dang brgyan par bya'o// dkyil 'khor kun tu bum pa ga/ nga ba bzhi dang / dngul gyi snod gang ba bzhi dang / mtsho/ da yon gyi chus bkang ba gser gyi snod bzhi dang / ro sna tshogs
206a6(rgyud): kyi gtor ma bzhag pa ni gtor ma dkar gsum rnam pa sna tshogs dang 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs bzhag pa dang / dri dang me tog sna tshogs kyis gtor te/ phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs sbyangs la/ dkyil
206a7(rgyud): 'khor kun tu tshon sna lnga'i ba dan gyis mnga' la brgyan te gzugs pa dang / sgo bzhi cha dbye ba dang / bum pa bzhag pa ni legs par rgyan cing dri chus yongasu bkang ba bya'o// sgo bzhir chos smra ba shin tu
206a8(rgyud): brgyan pa'i stan la 'dug ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklag par bya'o// grwa bzhir chos smra ba chos kyi stan legs par brgyan pa la 'dug nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mdo sde bklakrag
206b1(rgyud): par bya'o// gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / zangs kyi me tog dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang bas khrus byas gos gtsang ma bgos
206b2(rgyud): dri zhim pos bsgos te/ gtsang mar byas la ril bu la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad kyis dbang bskuro// don yod pa
206b3(rgyud): rnam par lta ba'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas don yod pa rnam par lta ba'i 'bar ba rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi zhags pa'i snying pos stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya/ 
206b4(rgyud): ba ni mi smra bar byas pa'i sems dang / snying thag pa nas brtse ba/ dang / snying rje bar bya ba ni las bla na med pa yin no// dko na mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa'
206b5(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshalo// 'di lta ste/ oM pa d+ma ma pA ni/ tsa ra tsa ra pad+ma b+hu dze/ dz+wa la dz+wa la hU ta sha ne/ b+hu ru b+hu
206b6(rgyud): ru khi mo k+Sha b+hu dze/ da ha da ha/ sar+b+ba ma lan/ a mo g+ha ba ni pa ra de/ hUM hU ni ra da ha/ pA be/ sha ma sha ma ni/ lo kot+ta ra Ni/ sa man+ta rash+mi ba ra de/ tu ru tu ru/ pra ba re/ a mo g+ha sing d+hi/ oM b+hud+d+ha ba/ na mostu/ 
206b7(rgyud): swA hA/ de ni rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor 'bar ba zhags pa chen po'i snying po dang / gzungs kyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga 'jig rten las 'das pa bla na med pa yin no// de nas rig sngags 'chang bas
206b8(rgyud): thal ba des rmad du byung ba chen po'i bya ba thams cad bya'o// thal ba des gang lus la byugs pa de ni sgrub pa dang sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyuraro// dpral bar thig le byas na de ma thag tu zhag
207a1(rgyud): bzhi pa'i rims las thar par 'gyuraro// zhag gnyis pa dang / zhag gsum pa dang / mtshan mo dang / nyin par pa dang / nam phyed pa dang / nyin phyed pa dang / lo gcig pa dang / zla ba gcig pa dang / zhag
207a2(rgyud): bdun pa dang / rtags pa'i rims dang / lan 'ga' yang gnas shing phyir 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro// dpag tshad brgya 'das te 'bros par 'gyuraro// mtshogs mar thig le byas na gdon stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi las thar
207a3(rgyud): par 'gyu ro// thams cad kyang phyogs bcur dpag tshad stong du 'bros par 'gyuro// thal ba'i rdul bya rog gi mchu la gos pa phyogs kyi gnas gang du lhung ba der gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / yi
207a4(rgyud): dgas dang / grul bum dang / brjed byed dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren phyir gnas par mi 'gyu ro// thams cad 'broso// phyogs kyi gnas der lhung na slar 'ong bar mi 'gyuraro// snying khar thig le byas na/ 
207a5(rgyud): nad thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// lte ba'i gnasu thig le bya/ sa na lto ba'i nang gi nad thams cad mod la sos par 'gyuraro// gdug pas zin pa la bskus na dug med par 'gyur ro// dug gis
207a6(rgyud): myos pa la byin na dug med par 'gyuraro// thal bas khrus byas na byad dang / g.yengs byed dang / sngags dang / dug thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyu ro// sha bkra dang / mdze dang / 'bras dang / shu phran mched pa/ 
207a7(rgyud): dang / 'brum bu dang / lhog pa dang / me dpal dang / 'brum phran rnams byung na chu dron po dang sbyar te bskus la mar la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas bskus na mod la nad thams cad las yongasu thar par
207a8(rgyud): 'gyuraro// sprin log su gtor na sad dang / rlung dang / sar ba thams cad mi 'bab po// rlung ldang ba'i log su gtor na rlung bsdams par 'gyur ro// phyogs bzhir gtor na mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyuro// 
207b1(rgyud): yul 'khor kun tu gtor na me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog dang / me tog gi ljon shing dang / shing gi yal ga dang / ldumar dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / ri dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / nags tshal ba/ 
207b2(rgyud): legs par bsrungs par 'gyur ro// yul 'khor la dpag tshad brgya tshun cad kun tu mtshams chen po bcad pa byas par 'gyur ro// grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir gtor na dar 'jug pa dang / phyir 'byung ba'i sems can
207b3(rgyud): bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / byol song gi skye gnasu gtogs pa rkang gnyis pa dang / rkang bzhi pa
207b4(rgyud): dang / ri dgas dang / bya de dag thams cad sgrib pa dang / sdig pa drang bral bar 'gyuraro// 'gongs pa tsam gyis nad dang / sdug bsngal thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// nad thams cad dang bral bar
207b5(rgyud): 'gyu ro// tshe yongasu rjes nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi kha/ ma su 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas nyid du gnas kyi bar du phyir/ mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i gnas thob par 'gyur ro// dur khrod
207b6(rgyud): dam ro bsregs pa'i steng du thal bas gtor na/ dmyal bar skyes pa'i sems can de dag thams cad mod la dmyal ba nas thar to// mngon par dga' ba 'am/ bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// grong
207b7(rgyud): khyer ram/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ lha'i gnas sam/ grong ngam/ khyim mam/ dgon pa'i gnas sam/ yul 'khor kun tu gtor na mtshams chen po bcad cing zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i
207b8(rgyud): po brang gi sgor gtor na rgyal po dang btsun mo'i 'khor dgra thams cad las legs par bsrung bar 'gyuraro// skye bo mang po'i nang du gtor ba tsam gyi mdo la skye bo mang po de dag thams cad sgrib pa dang / 
208a1(rgyud): sdig pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang bya ba stong phrag brgya byed pas rang 'dod pa la rang gi blos thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o// de nas rnam par
208a2(rgyud): grol ba'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sku gzugs ras la bris pa bshad par bya'o// dar ram ras gtsang ma legs par btags pa tshad khru do'am/ khru gsu
208a3(rgyud): 'am/ khru bzhi pa de'i dbus don yod pa'i zhags pa/ 'jig rten dbang phyug tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/ dbu lcang lo cod pan gyis rgyan pa/ cod pan rgyal ba 'od dpag med dang g.yasu zla ba ches pa can gyis
208a4(rgyud): rgyan pa/ phyag bzhi pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ skyil mo da dkrung bcas te bzhugs pa bri ba ni ri bo po Ta la lcug ma me to/ dag can sna tshogs kyis gang ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi lhag mas
208a5(rgyud): gang ba bya'o// de'i steng du rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ seng ge 'i khri'i khri bya'o// seng ge'i khri'i steng du pad+ma'i gdan bya'o// de'i steng du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhugs/ 
208a6(rgyud): par bya ste/ pad+ma dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / zhags pa thogs shing gzugs de phyag gdugs 'byin pa bya'o// dbu'i gong man chad gzhal med khang chen po lha rdzas rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa
208a7(rgyud): dbus mtho ba dang bcas pa bya'o// dbus mtho ba'i steng du de bzhin gshegs pa bdun tshad dang 'thun par pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i
208a8(rgyud): gong gi dbu su de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'od dpag med dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'od dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gsum rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ skyil mo krung
208b1(rgyud): bcas te/ gzhal med khang gi nang na bzhugs par bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'od 'dom gang ba la 'khor bar de bzhin gshegs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan par bya/ de
