208b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i nye 'khor kun tu 'od gzer 'bar ba sna tshogs dang / mdung rtse gsum pa'i phreng ba bya'o// de nyid kyi nye 'khor du lha sum cu rtsa gnyis bya'o// gong gi dbus rdo rje 'chang ba khro gnyer can
208b3(rgyud): rdo rje gsor bar bya'o// de nas tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i dbang phyug chen po dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi snying po'i dbang po dang / 'og min gnas kyi lha'i
208b4(rgyud): bu dang / dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu dang / 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma'i lha'i bu dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / gzhon nu dang / me lha
208b5(rgyud): dang / nag po chen po dang / dga' ba'i dbang phyug dang / dga' bo/ dang / nye dga' bo dang / stobs lha dang / gang pa gzang po dang / nor bu bzang po dang / gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha
208b6(rgyud): dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams me tog sna tshogs dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs lag pa nas 'phrul pa dang / mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs par bya/ 
208b7(rgyud): 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// // bam po bcu bzhi pa// lha rnams kyi phyi rol thog thag tu pad+ma'i phreng ba rdo rje dang / mdung rtse gsum pas spras pa'i
208b8(rgyud): pad+ma'i phreng bas kun tu 'khor bar bya/ g.yas phyogasu 'phags ma sgrol ma skyil mo krung phyed du bcas te bzhugs pa/ ut+pal dang / nor bu rin po che phyag na thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan
209a1(rgyud): pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal du blta bar bya'o// de'i rgyab tu khro gnyer ma me tog sna tshogs 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bya'o// g.yon du dkar mo zhes
209a2(rgyud): bya ba ni skyil mo krung phyed du bcas te bzhugs pa/ ku mu da dang / nor bu rin po che lag na thogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la blta bar bya'o// dkar mo de'i rgyab tu pad+ma
209a3(rgyud): mdzes dga' ma/ me tog sna tshogs thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bya'o// lha mo sgrol ma dang / dkar mo'i 'og tu pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i lha mo thams cad kyang dbu yid tsam 'dud pa/ na bza'
209a4(rgyud): dkar po gsol pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bzhengs pa bya da'o// g.yas phyogasu srin mo ral pa gcig ma gtum mo skyil mo krung phyed du bcas te bzhugs pa/ phyag bzhi la zhags pa dang / 
209a5(rgyud): dgra sta dang / ral gri dang / rdo rje lag na thogs pa 'phags pastsu na ras gzigs dbang phyug la blta bar bya'o// g.yon du/ pho nya mo zhal mche ba gtsigs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan
209a6(rgyud): pa phyag bzhi la zhags pa dang / dgra sta dang / rdo rje dang / mdung rtse gsum pa phyag na thogs pa/ skyil mo krung phyed du bcas te bzhugs pa/ 'bar ba'i nang na 'jig rten dbang phyug la lta bar bya'o// ri bo bo Ta
209a7(rgyud): la'i ngos kyi gseb tu klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / klu'i bu mo klu'i gnas dang bcas pa bya ste/ me tog sna tshogs thogs shing / gong du bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug la 'tho bar bya'o// 
209a8(rgyud): ri'i smad du lha mo dpe med ma dang / lha mo ba san ti dang / sa'i lha mo dang / dpal lha mo dang / lha mo 'jigs byed ma dang / sgra dbyangs ma dang / lcags sgrogs ma dang / dung can ma ste rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan
209b1(rgyud): pa me tog sna tshogs dang / nor bu rin po che thogs pa bya'o// gzhal med khang gi gong du mchod rten chen po brgyad phreng bar sbrengs la mchod rten gyi rgyan ji ltar rgyan pa de ltar brgyan par bya'o// mchod rten gyi
209b2(rgyud): 'og g.yas rol tu bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa la 'jig rten dbang phyug mngon du mchod pa mdzad pa bya'o// 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ba phyag na rnga yab thogs pa bya'o// de'i
209b3(rgyud): 'og tu drang srong dang / lha'i bu me tog sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya'o// g.yon phyogasu bcom ldan 'das chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba bya ste/ kun dga' bo dang / rdo rje 'chang ba lag
209b4(rgyud): na rnga yab kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon du g.yob par bya'o// g.yas phyogasu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa
209b5(rgyud): byed pa bya'o// g.yon phyogasu khro bo'i rgyal po bcom ldan 'ad sa la mchod pa byed pa bya'o// de'i 'og tu drang srong dang / lha'i tshogs bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o// 
209b6(rgyud): ras kyi sku gzugs kyi g.yon dang g.yas kyi phyi rol thog thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs brgya rtsa brgyad pad+mo'i gdan la tshad ji lta ba bzhin du skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs pa rgyan tha~Md kyis
209b7(rgyud): brgyan par bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi seng ge'i gdan gyi zhabs drung du rig sngags 'chang ba pus mo btsugs te/ me tog dang / pog por dang / bgrang phreng lag na thogs te/ 
209b8(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mngon du blta bar bya'o// ri mo mkhan khrus byas shing gos gtsang ma bgos te/ gtsang bar byas la ro sna tshogs pa'i zas dkar gsum bza' bar
210a1(rgyud): bya'o// snod gsar pa gtsang ma'i nang nas tshon lhag ma ma yin pas bri bar bya'o// 'di yang kha zas mi gtsang ba sna tshogs dang / gos ngan pa mi gtsang ba yongasu spang bar bya'o// tshig
210a2(rgyud): ngan pa dang / sems ngan pa yongasu spang bar bya'o// chang dang / sha dang / beg cong dang / sgog skya dang / ke'u dang 'dres pa yongasu spangs par bya'o// nyi ma re re zhing ba'i rnam lnga la reg par bya'o// dri ma
210a3(rgyud): dang bral zhing ser sna dang / phrag dog dang bral bar bya'o// byams pa dang / snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la dang ba lhag par bya ste ras kyi sku gzugs bri bar bya'o// ga pur
210a4(rgyud): dang / gla rtsis bsgos pa'i tshen sna tshogs kyis bri bar bya'o// dben zhing 'du 'dzi yongasu spang bar bya'o// rmugs pa dang / gnyid yongasu spang bar bya'o// de ltar ri mo bri ba ni las legs par
210a5(rgyud): byas pa yin no// zla ba yar gyi ngo la bri bar bya'o// rgyu skar shin tu/ bkra shis pa dang / tshes grangs dang nyi ma shin tu bkra shi sa pa la brtsam par bya'o// rgyu skar rgyal ni bkra shis pa yin
210a6(rgyud): te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsngags pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa/ lha thams cad kyis rjesu bzung ba yin no// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dang / dge
210a7(rgyud): slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / dge sbyong dang bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo gang la la
210a8(rgyud): zhig don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par gzigs pa/ byang chub chen po'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba/ rnam
210b1(rgyud): bar grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba/ ras kyi sku gzugs chen po mthong ba'i sku gzugs mthong ba tsam gyi mo la sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur// mtshams med pa lnga
210b2(rgyud): byed pa dang / mnar med pa la gzhol ba dang / dam pa'i chos yong su spong ba dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs
210b3(rgyud): rgyas thams cad spong bar byed pa rnams kyang mthong ba tsam la sogs pas sdig pa thams cad phye mar klog go// rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// sdom pa chen po yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ro// gang ga'i
210b4(rgyud): klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu snyed kyi de ba zhin gshegs pa byang chub snying po la mngon du gshegs pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mthong ba dang / 'dra bar rig
210b5(rgyud): par bya'o// ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba ni gzhal med khang // dang bcas pa'i ri bo po Ta lan 'phags pa spyan ras pa/ zigs dbang phyug 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas te ma
210b6(rgyud): du bzhugs pa mngon du mthong ba dang 'dra ste/ 'di la the tsom mi bya'o// yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// sems kyi skad cig gcig rab tu dang ba byas na/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongasu gzung bar
210b7(rgyud): 'gyu ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dgongs te mchog sbyin par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
210b8(rgyud): yongasu gzung bar 'gyuraro// lus dang sems yid las byung ba yongasu dag par 'gyu ro// dbang po thams cad yongasu dag par 'gyuraro// dri ma dang bral zhing ser sna dang / phrag dog dang bral bar 'gyur/ 
211a1(rgyud): 'jig rten pa thams cad dga' ba dang / bla mar lta bar 'gyu ro// tshe ring por 'gyuraro// nang thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu skal ba
211a2(rgyud): mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// pad+ma'i nang nas brdzus te skye bar 'gyuraro// mthong ba tsam gyis mod la phyir mi ldog par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med
211a3(rgyud): pa'i sku gzugs 'di gang gis mchod pa de ni phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod par 'gyuraro// 'di ni mngal na gnas pa'i tha ma yin te/ phyis ma rig pa'i mun pa'i nang du lhung
211a4(rgyud): par mi 'gyuraro// de ltar na mi mnyam pa dang 'dra ba yin te/ ras kyi sku gzugs kyi cho ga 'jig rten las 'das pa sgyu dab pa'i cho ga 'di ni dam pa yin no// de nas gsang sngags kyi
211a5(rgyud): cho ga 'jig rten las 'das pa sgrub pa brjod par bya'o// gang gi/ sa dran pa tsam gyi modado la de bzhin gshegs pa tha/ mas cad mngon sum du mthong nas 'dug pa dang / phyogs
211a6(rgyud): bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sgo phye ste 'dug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mngon du mthong ba sbyin par mdzad pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad mngon du srung ba dang / 
211a7(rgyud): skyob pa dang / sbed par mdzad pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / snying po dang / cho ga zhib mo thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i le du 'gro ba yongasu dag
211a8(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// dus gsum du gshegs shing so so na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i tshogs mchog thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'phags
211b1(rgyud): pabardo rje 'chang ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad dang / rig pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tsha lo// oM a mo g+ha a ba lo ki ti ma hA maN+Da la pad+ma sar+b+ba bo d+hi satwa na ma skr-i te/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sa man+ta a ba lo ki te/ 
211b2(rgyud): a mo g+ha ma hA brah+ma/ be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ ma hA bo d+ha ni/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ pad+ma bi bo d+ha ni/ sar+b+ba pA paM an d+ha ka ra/ pra sha ma ni/ sar+b+ba dur ga ti/ b+hA ra ka/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ 
211b3(rgyud): hu bi bi d+ha/ ge Sha d+ha ra/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta gar+b+he/ hu ru hu ru/ a mo ga gar+b+he/ tu ru tu ru/ a mo g+ha pA sha haste/ mu ru mu ru/ bi mo k+Sha b+hu dze/ k+Shi Ni k+Shi Ni/ sar+b+ba A ba ra Na bi shud+d+he/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sar+b+ba ta
211b4(rgyud): thA ga ta/ pa ri pU ra Ni/ ta ra ta ra/ tA ra ya mAn/ a ba lo kA ya pa/ dad+ba b+hU dze/ ma Ni ka na ka/ bi b+hu Shi ta/ bA hu/ da ma da ma/ da dur dan tA nAn/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra da/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ sar+b+ba de/ 
211b5(rgyud): bag Na na mas+thi ta/ ri Shi ga na/ sti ba ta/ sha ta sa ha sa tsan+d+ra sUr+ya a ti re ka/ raSh+Ti/ a ba b+hA si ta/ ma hA pa shu pa ti/ be Sha d+ha ra/ pa ra ma/ shud+d+ha satwa/ a ba lo ki te/ lo ke shwa ra/ 
211b6(rgyud): pa ra ma/ kA ru Ni ka/ maN+Da la shwa ra/ su pa bud+d+ha/ ma hA pad+me/ b+hu dze shwa ra/ ma hA bid+yA d+ha re shwa re/ d+hi raM d+hi ri/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ ma hA bi mo kA/ maN+Da la d+ha ra sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ gu h+ya/ mu dra sa ma ya
211b7(rgyud): d+ha ra/ ma hA ba la bid+ya d+ha ra/ ma hA ma Ni/ mo li d+ha ra/ a mi tA b+ha/ ma kuT d+ha ra/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ sa man+ta/ a ba lo ki ta/ lo ke shwa ra/ ma te shwa ra/ pa sha d+ha re shwa ra/ pa ra pa ra/ pa ra ma/ ma hA mai tI/ a
211b8(rgyud): ba lo ka te/ sar+b+ba satwa sa ta rA ga/ sid+d+hi sad+d+hi shA/ ba ri pU ra ke/ ma hA ba ra/ pra modan na mo stu te swA hA// 'di ni thams cad rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis
212a1(rgyud): phyag byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gas ngag 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i mchog/ gsang ba'i sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad
212a2(rgyud): yongasu sbyong ba/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam rnam par sbyong ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigasu 'jug pa yin no// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// dus gsum du
212a3(rgyud): gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo// oM bI ra bI ra/ ma hA maN+Da la/ bi shwa rU pa Sha Ta pA ra mi tA/ pa ri pU ra ko/ sar+b+ba bo d+hi satwa/ na ma skr-i ta/ 
212a4(rgyud): ra ma bi pu la/ bi mo k+Sha d+ha ra/ ma hA pA sha/ bi lo ki ta/ a mo/ g+ha pA sha dz+wa la ti/ ma hA dzA la a ba lo ki ta/ ma hA ma Ni/ biSh+Ta d+ha ra/ sa man+ta/ a ba b+hU si ta/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ma hA gam b+hi ra/ 
212a5(rgyud): bi mo kA pA sha d+ha ra/ ba la bo d+h+ya ga/ A kaR+Sha kra/ oM brah+ma rA pa/ ma hA a mo g+ha pA sha hUM hUM/ phaT phaT/ sar+b+ba satwe/ bi lo/ ki ta/ ba ra prad/ na mo stu ti swA hA// 'di ni rnam par grol ba'i/ 
212a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'o// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags/ 
212a7(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshalo// oM bi bud+d+ha/ bi bud+d+ha/ ma hA ka ru Ni ka/ ta ra ta ra/ ta rA ya/ ma hA ar+Na ba bA ra~M/ ma hA b+hu dza bi lo kA ya hUM phaT swA hA// nye ba'i snying pa
212a8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshalo// oM a mo g+ha
212b1(rgyud): sha mahAd na pA ra mi tA/ pa ri pU / s+yAng dad / bi bad+hA/ btsi tre/ sar+b+ba satwa/ u ba b+hog/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ ma hA dAn/ pUdzA me g+he/ pra ba ta ya/ ta ra ta ra/ ta ra ya/ ma hA pad+ma pA Ni hUM phaT/ 'dzin smin pa'i
212b2(rgyud): rol tu phyin pa'i zhags pa chen po'i snying po ste/ gang gis yungs 'bru tsam yang sbyin pa byin te/ dran pa tsam gyis lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na mchod sbyin sbyin pa rnam par 'phrul pa chen po shin tu
212b3(rgyud): rgyas pa chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par 'gyur de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/ 
212b4(rgyud): kyi dbang phyug thugs rje chen po phyag 'tshalo// oM a mo g+ha shI la/ saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ ma hA shud d+ha satwa/ pad+ma bi b+hu Shi ta/ pU dza d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa man+ta/ a ba lo ki te hUM phaT swA hA/ 
212b5(rgyud): gzungs 'di bsnyung ba byas te/ gso sbyong gi yan lag brgya/ da bzung nas mi smra bar lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dran par bya 'o// de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod
212b6(rgyud): bya'o// bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyi mod la tshul khrims yongasu dag pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi dri zhim po'i sgra
212b7(rgyud): mang po lus las 'byung zhing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du grags par 'gyur ro// gang zhig nyi ma re re zhing gzungs 'di dran na de ni rtag tu tshul khrims yongasu dag par 'gyur ro// dge slong gang zhig tshul
212b8(rgyud): khrims nyams pas bsrung ba byas te/ 'di bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyi mang la tshul khrims yongasu dag par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims mang po dang ldan par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd la phyag
213a1(rgyud): 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshalo// oM ma hA bIr+ya/ a mo g+ha bi lo ki te/ ba ra b.radzA/ 
213a2(rgyud): D+ha bIr+ya/ ma hA ba la/ ba la ba la/ ma hA bo d+h+r-i ga ba la bod+ha ni/ hUM phaT swA hA// gzungs 'di dus rtag tu yongasu dag pa'i yid kyis dran par byas na dran pa tsam gyi mdo la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
213a3(rgyud): rdzogs par 'gyu ro// byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du nam yang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyu ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems
213a4(rgyud): dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshalo// oM a mo g+ha kAn ti/ sar+b+ba bo d+hik+Sha/ mri Na/ kA Na k+Sha Na/ ma hA mai tri/ kA ru Na/ sar+b+ba satwa ba ta sa la/ ma hA kA/ 
213a5(rgyud): ru Ni ka/ sar+b+ba satwa k+Sha mi Na hUM phaT swA hA// gzungs 'di sems can du gyur pa thams cad la bzod pa chen po dang / snying rje/ chen po dang / brtse ba'i sems kyis dmyal ba na gnas pa dang / 
213a6(rgyud): byol song gi skye gan su gtogs pa ri dgas dang / bya gang dag 'das pa gang yin pa dang / gnas gang yin pa dang / skye ba gang yin pa de rnams la snying rje ba'i phyir gang zhig gzungs kyi mchog dran par byed na/ 
213a7(rgyud): dmyal ba'i sems can las thar par 'gyur zhing skye bo mang po gnas pa gang yin pa rnams grol bar 'gyuraro// nam sangs rgyas kyi zhing la gnas kyi bar du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur/ 
213a8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshalo// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ ma hA a
213b1(rgyud): mo g+ha ka ru Na/ d+h+yA na sa mA d+hi/ sar+b+ba bi mo k+Sha/ a pra ki pya ka/ tsu ru tsu ru hUM phaT swAhA// gzungs 'di 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dmigs nas yi rtse gcig tu byas te dran par byas na dran pa tsam gyi
213b2(rgyud): modo la de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin stong phrag brgya so sor thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod
213b3(rgyud): byas pa tsam gyis ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dbang sgyur bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
213b4(rgyud): dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshalo// oM a mo g+ha/ ma ra hA pradz+nyA/ a ba b+hA sa/ s+pha ra Na pra sa ra pra sa ra/ sa man+ta budadad+hi/ a ba lo ki ta/ b+ha ga bAn pradz+nyA/ a ba lo ki ta/ tsak+Shu She ma hA
213b5(rgyud): pradz+nyA/ ba ra da/ pA Ni/ ma hA d+ha ra Ni/ b+hu dze hUM phaT swA hA/ gzungs 'di dran pa tsam gyi mong la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyu ro// thabs dang shes rab sna tshogs
213b6(rgyud): kyis dge ba chen po'i blo 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu rgyun mi bcad par pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i blo dang ldan par 'gyuraro// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ong ba dang / da ltar
213b7(rgyud): byung ba'i sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i shes rab dang blor 'gyur ro// lan 'ga' yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang bral bar mi 'gyuraro// sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang // 
213b8(rgyud): babasam gtan dang / shes rab kyi blo nyams par mi 'gyur// byang chub la thug gi bar dang / rab tu rmongs par mi 'gyu ro// don yod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi gzungs chen po yin no// dkon mchog
214a1(rgyud): gsum la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ oM a mo g+ha bi mo/ 
214a2(rgyud): maN+Da la ma hAd b+hu ta bi ma le/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ ma hA da b+hu ta/ a mi tA b+hA/ ma ku Ta/ d+ha ra hUM phaT swA hA// dkyil 'khor der yungs kar dang / dri chab dang ldan pa'i bum pa la sngags bzlas brjod byas/ 
214a3(rgyud): nas chus kun tu chag chag gtab na chag chag gtab pa tsam gyis mod la dkyil 'khor kun tu dpag tshad cig gi nang du sa sbyangs te yongasu dag par 'gyur ro// ji ltar shel gong dang / rin po che sna tshogs
214a4(rgyud): pa dag pa dri ma med pa mdzes pa de 'dra ba'i sa gzhir 'gyuraro// shin tu dag pa dang / shin tu dri ma med pa dang / shin tu nyam/ das dga' ba dang / shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i sa gzhir 'gyuraro// 
214a5(rgyud): shin tu sa gzhir dpa' bar 'gyuraro// sa phyogs de'i bud medadang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs
214a6(rgyud): gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu gnas par 'gyu ro// de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu skye bar 'gyuro// tshe rabs
214a7(rgyud): dran par 'gyu ro// nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bo'i bar du bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po sogs par 'gyu ro// gang dag
214a8(rgyud): byol song gi skye gan su gtogs pa'i rigs dang / bye dag phyogs der 'gro zhing rab tu 'jug pa de dag thams cad yongasu grol bar 'gyuraro// bde 'gro'i lam la rab tu gnas par 'gyuraro// gang gis
214b1(rgyud): de'i sa la lag par 'ongs te reg pa de dag thams cad nad dang bral ba dang / nyon mongs pa dang bral ba dang / rims dang bral ba dang / sgrib pa med pa dang / sdig pa dang bral bar 'gyuraro// de dag phyis lus
214b2(rgyud): la tsher ba'i nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rtag tu bde bas tshim pa'i lus su 'gyu ro// sa yongasu sbyong ba'i rig sngag so// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
214b3(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ oM a mo g+ha dru ma/ la ta brik+Sha/ shaM kha pa tra/ puSh+pa pa la/ ba Ti pa A ro ha/ na hi DA ga/ pu shwa ri Na/ ud sa hri da/ sun+da
214b4(rgyud): ra pra sa pa Ni / khaM bi d+ha/ bi tsa tra/ pa ri shwa d+ha ya/ pad+ma b+hu dze/ sa ma sa ma/ 8/ sa man+te na/ pa ri maN+Da la/ pa ri sho d+ha ya/ ma la ma la/ bi ma la/ dbi ma la nirma la su pa ri shud d+ha/ pad+ma ud pa lip+ta/ dza la ma lAn/ 
214b5(rgyud): bi shud d+he/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ pa ra ma ma hA shud+d+hA ya/ satwa hUM / Ta/ nA maHtri b+hu ba ne hUM phaT/ swA hA// 'dis tsan dan dang / pad+ma nga chu dang yungs kar la yongasu bzlas te/ ljon pa'i sdong po dang
214b6(rgyud): me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing dang / sna tshogs pa'i lcug ma dang / rtsi dang / shing gel pa dang / sman dang / chu klung dang / lteng ka dang / rdzing bu dang / 'bab chu mdzes pa'i steng du gtor bar bya ste/ de rnam
214b7(rgyud): thams cad la/ bdud rtsi blug par 'gyu ro// de rnams thams cad la lha rdzas kyi me tog dang 'bras bur 'gyu ro// tha na lha'i rtsa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang nags kyi bdag por 'gyu ro// gang la reg pa
214b8(rgyud): gyis/ re bde thams cad ser sna 'dri ma dang bral zhing / phrag dog spangs par 'gyuraro// ma khros pa dang / bang rkan dang / mchil ma dang bral zhing / lus kyi phyi dang / nang gi dri ma zhim pa thams cad yongasu dag
215a1(rgyud): par 'gyuro// gang yang lus kyi nang gi nang dang / gnod pa sna tshogs pa de thams cad yongasu grol bar 'gyur zhing / rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par nyams pa dang / legs par yongasu
215a2(rgyud): dag pa dang / dri ma med par 'gyur ro// zhes so// de la chus khrus byas pa gang yin pa de rnams kyang / lha'i chu dang / byang chub yan lag gi chus khrus byas par 'gyur ro// sdig pa dang / sgrib pa'i dri ma thams cad
215a3(rgyud): bkrus par 'gyu ro// yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus bkrus par 'gyuraro// des so shing zos pa gang yin pa de rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rjesu dran pa chen po 'phel bar 'gyuraro// mya ngan zad dang / 
215a4(rgyud): bral bar 'gyur zhing / zhags pa thams cad yongasu spangs pa da dang / rtag tu kha nas ud pa la'i dri bro bar 'gyuraro// ngag 'ja ma zhing snyan par yang 'gyur zhing / ngag mnyan par yang 'gyur
215a5(rgyud): dga' ba'i gtam byed par 'gyur zhing / skye bo thams cad yid dga' bar yang 'gyuraro// mi 'am ci'i dbyangs su yang 'gyu ro// bstan bcos dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang sngags dang / 
215a6(rgyud): theg pa chen po thams cad thos pa tsam gyis kun tu 'dzin par byed cing / kha ton du yang gnas par byed do// me tog de la mnams pa dang / phreng ba mgul par 'ching bar byed pa gang yin pa de rnams
215a7(rgyud): kyang byang chub yan lag gi me tog gi phreng ba bcings par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang gis mngon par dbang bskur bar yang 'gyur ro// sna tshog su dag par yang 'gyur te/ lha'i dri dang / 
215a8(rgyud): rig pa dang / yang dag par ldan par 'gyuraro// lce pad+ma'i mdab ma dang mtshungs par yongasu dag par 'gyuraro// lha'i so dang mtshungs pa'i kha dog tu 'gyur/ bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu
215b1(rgyud): mo gang la gtam smras pa de/ rtag tu dbang du 'gyuraro// shi 'phos shing skye ba rjes nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu skye bar 'gyur te/ pad+ma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyuraro// tshe rab dran par yang
215b2(rgyud): 'gyur ro zhes pa'o// 'bras bu dang / me tog dang / chu dang / nags kyi bdag po dang / rtsa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman yongasu sbyong ba'i sngagaso// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub
215b3(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ oM a mo g+ha a ma le tri ma le/ bi ma le/ niR+YA le/ di bya pa ri shud+d+ha
215b4(rgyud): sar+b+ba ma lo ba kaR+Shi te/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa pa ra de pra pa ra pa ri shud+d+he/ ma da hA ma Ni rat+na kA ya pa ri shud d+he ma Ni ma Ni sho d+ha ni ma hA a mo dag+na tsin+tA ma Ni shud+d+hi/ hri da ya shud+d+he kA ya nir+Ya la ma hA ma Ni pa
215b5(rgyud): shud+d+he/ hu ru hu ru pra ba ra pa NI ma hA b+hu dza pa ra de/ tu ru tu ru/ ma hA satwa bta sa laM/ pa ri sho d+ha ya mAM sarba su bi shud+d+ha ma le swA hA/ rig sngags 'dis/ rig sngags 'chang gi bdag nyid kyi lus/ 
215b6(rgyud): yongasu sbyang bar bya ste/ tsan dan gyi tshul dang / gur gum dang / gla rtsi'i chu dang / ga pur gyi chu dang / yungs kar dang / ba byung lnga bsres pas/ rdza gsar pa'i bum pa bkang de/ rig sngags 'di stong rtsa brgyad
215b7(rgyud): dubazlas par bya'o// ras dkar pos bkru bar bya zhing lan bdun du btab par bya'o// khrus byas pa tsam gyi mod la khro bo'i rgyal pos/ bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya'o// khrus byas pa tsam dang / dbang bsku
215b8(rgyud): btsam gyis bdag rang gi phyi nang yongasu dag cing dri ma med par 'gyu ro// sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / dug dang bral bar 'gyuraro// nyon mongs pa dang nang dang bral bar 'gyur// rga ba la sogs pa dang bral bar
216a1(rgyud): 'gyuro// bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / bdud la sogs pa thams cad las yongasu thar par 'gyuraro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang 'byung po dang / sha zal sogs pa thams cad
216a2(rgyud): yongasu spangs par 'gyur zhing bar chad bya ba'i phyir rig sngags 'chang ba'i drung du slar 'ong nus par mi 'gyu ro// rig sngags 'chang bde bar sgrub pa dang / bde bar nyal ba dang / bde bar sad pa dang / 
216a3(rgyud): nam 'tshe'i bar du bde bar gnas pa dang / dri ma thams cad spangs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
216a4(rgyud): dbang phyug mngon sum du mthong ste shi ba'i dus byed par 'gyuraro// / bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu skal ba mnyam paraskye bar 'gyuro// pad+mo'i nang nas 'ardzus te skyes nas de bzhin ga
216a5(rgyud): pa 'od dpag med mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro// rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dang / lus mtshan dang / dpe byad kyis/ brgyan pa dang / tshe rabs dran par 'gyu ro// mthar byang chub la thug
216a6(rgyud): gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyuraro// rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo 'di mtha' dag rdzogs par kha ton byed par 'gyuro// 
216a7(rgyud): gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa'i mdo sde gzhung sna tshogs rnam pa du ma kha ton byed par 'gyu ro// bskal pa stong phrag brgya tshun chad du skye ba dran par 'gyuraro// oM a mo g+ha pad+ma/ bi ma le
216a8(rgyud): pra sa ra/ sa man+ta/ mu khe swA hA/ dkyil 'khor char phye ste thig gdab pa'i sngag so// oM a mo g+ha bi bi d+hi/ rU pa bi tsi tra/ gan d+ha/ ra san d+ha ra/ pra ba ra/ b+hu dze swA hA// tshen rtsi'i sngags dang / sku gzugs bzhag pa
216b1(rgyud): dang mtshon cha'i rtags bri ba'i sngag so// oM a mo g+ha san+ta pa ri maN+Da la/ pA sha ban d+he hUM/ yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas dkyil 'khor bsdam par bya'o// oM a mo g+ha sa man+ta/ da
216b2(rgyud): sha rig ma hA sI man/ ban d+ha ya/ d+hu ra d+hu ru/ hUM phaT swA hA// yungs kar dang tshul lan bdun bzla brjod byas pas mtshams bcad pa'o// oM a mo g+ha rak+Sha Na/ pA sha haste/ b+hu ru b+hu ru swA hA// yung
216b3(rgyud): kar dang dri chab la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas bdag srung ba'o// oM a mo g+ha tsU Da min/ hu ru hu ru/ nA ga pA sha ban d+he hUM swA hA/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pas spyi gtsug bcing
216b4(rgyud): ba'i sngag so// oM a mo g+ha dza la bi ma le/ su ru su ru swA hA/ dritshul lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pas khrus dbya ba'i sngag so// oM a mo g+ha mr-i ta/ bin+du tsa ra tsa ra swA hA/ nye reg
216b5(rgyud): bya ba'i sngag so// oM a mo g+ha di bya bste tsu ru tsu ru swA hA/ gos kyisngag so// oM a mo g+ha b+hu dza ka/ ka ba tsa/ ba ra de/ tsi ri tsi swA hA/ go cha'i sngags yin te yungs kar dang / gur gum gyi chub
216b6(rgyud): bya'o// oM a mo g+ha brah+ma b+hu dze pAr+yan te na pra sa ra swA hA/ mchod phyir thogs kyi sngagaso// oM a mo g+ha tsU Da ma Ni pad+me/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa ya/ ma ma sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka ma Ni ma ni swA hA/ dbang bskur ba'i sngags
216b7(rgyud): so// oM a mo g+ha pad+ma ba sun d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha ra Ni/ maN+De hUM/ stan gyi gsang sngagaso// oM a mo g+ha sa man+ta par+yang ke/ b+hu bi swA hA/ skyil mo bkrung bca' ba'i sngagaso// oM a mo g+ha su ra d+hi/ pad+me pa ra/ 
216b8(rgyud): pa ra hUM/ me tog gi sngag so// oM a mo g+ha bi bid+ha/ gan d+ha/ pra sa re/ pUr+Na b+hu dze sA hA/ dri'i sngag so// oM a mo gi bi bi d+ha le pa na pra ba re pa ra pa ri sAhA// thugs pa'i sngag so// oM a mo g+ha ga ga na s+pharaH
217a1(rgyud): ma ye b+hu b+ha ru d+hu/ bdug pa'i sngag so// oM a mo g+ha shuk+ka sa ra sa ras/ a gra d+ha ra b+hid+hA ra trA/ gtor ma'i sngags te thams cad du bya'o// oM a mo g+ha pra bar/ nu ba la ka na/ ka / 
217a2(rgyud): ri hUM/ zas dang gtor ma'i sngags// oM bi bi d+ha/ a mo g+ha pha la/ pa ra pa ra hUM/ 'bras bu'i sngag so// oM a mo g+ha ad b+hU ta gan d+ha ba re hUM/ mchod yon gyi sngag so// oM a mo g+ha bi bi d+ha/ ma Ni/ b+hu
217a3(rgyud): Na kha re/ dz+wa la dz+wa la hUM/ rgyan dang / thod dang / dar spyang dang / mda' dang / tshon sna lnga dang / thig skud kyi sngag so// oM a mo g+ha/ bi bi d+ha/ b+ha dza ne/ dza ya dza ya swA hA/ snod kyi sngags te thams cad du sbyar/ 
217a4(rgyud): oM a mo g+ha/ pra ba ra b+ha ba na/ b+hu be tha ra tha ra swA hA/ gzhug pa'i sngagaso// oM a mo g+ha na ma ska ra Na/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ oM dwe dza la hUM/ phyag 'tshal ba dang thal mo sbyor ba'i sngag so// oM
217a5(rgyud): a mo g+ha tsakra du ru du ru pra du ru swA hA// bskor ba'i sngagaso// oM a mo g+ha sa man+ta b+ha ba ne b+ha ba b+ha ba swA hA/ spyan drang ba'i snga/ ga so// oM a mo g+ha tsin+ta ma Ni pra kaR+Sha ya du ru du ru swA hA/ 
217a6(rgyud): gsol ba gdab pa'i sngag so// oM a mo g+ha nirman+ta Na/ bi mo k+Sha maN+Da le mi li mi li swA hA/ snyan gsan dbab pa'i sngag so// oM a mo gA ma hA ra shrI dzA la sa ha sre dz+wa la dz+wa la sa man+te swA hA// mar me'i/ 
217a7(rgyud): sngagaso// oM a mo g+ha pA sha haste pra sa ra gats+tsha sA b+hA ba nan bi sardzi ta si sa ra sa ra hUM phaT swA hA/ slar gshegasu gsol ba'i sngag so// oM a mo g+ha pA shA ban d+ha sa man+ta ma hA sa ma ya/ dr-in+ye hUM phaT/ 
217a8(rgyud): swAhA/ dam tshig gi sngagaso// oM a mo g+ha sa man+te/ phre ba ra/ sa ra sa ra/ pra sa ra ma hA b+hu te shwa ra/ d+hi ri d+ha ra/ hUM hUM phaT swA hA// gsang sngags 'dis la du dang / mod kar dang / zan dang / rtsa ba dang / 
217b1(rgyud): sdong bu dang / gtor ma dkar po dang / tshogs chen po'i bdag po'i gtor ma sbyin pa dang / me tog dang / gdug pa sbyin pa byas na phyis bgegs byed mi nus par 'gyuraro// 'jig rten 'das pa'i kyi
217b2(rgyud): 'khor gyi// phyag rgya de nas brjod bya ste// gang gis gzung ba tsam gyis ni// sdig pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// las dang nyon mongs sgrib pa dang // dug rnams thams cad rnam par bcom/ 
217b3(rgyud): rnam grol dkyil 'khor rigs kyi ni// dam tshig phyag rgya yang dag yin// lag gnyis pad+ma 'dar byas la// sor mo rnams ni mnyam gzhag ste// gung mo lcags kyu 'dra bar bya// lag
217b4(rgyud): gnyis mnyam par gzhag pa yi// phyag rgya rnam grol dam tshig 'di// don yod zhags par byin gyis brlabs// 'jig rten 'das pa khyad par gyis// lam gyi 'bras bu
217b5(rgyud): thob par byed// oM pad+ma b+hu dze/ pad+ma bi ma le swA hA// dam tshig rtse mo'i rtse shes pas// rdo rje pad+ma rtag tu bya// gung mo nu nga zad bskums nas ni// lag gnyis pad+mo 'dra bar bya// 
217b6(rgyud): gang gis phyag rgya 'di mthong ba// 'jig rten rnams kyi dbang phyug dag/ mtshungs pa med par 'gyur ba yin// rnam grol phyag rgyas dogs med par// sangs rgyas mtshungs med 'gyur ba
217b7(rgyud): yin// byang chub sems dpa' kun gyis ni// phyag byas pa yi phyag rgya 'di// rnam grol dkyil 'khor rmad du byung // oM pad+me su pad+me/ bi mo k+Sha maN+Da la/ pad+ma la/ pad+ma b+hu dze swA hA// rdo rje bcing ba
217b8(rgyud): mnyam gzhag ste// rdo rje pad+mo gung mo na// bskums na de bzhin gshegs kun gyi// rnam grol gsung ba'i phyag rgya 'di// yang dag grol bar rab tu bstan// phyag rgya 'di ni bstan pas ni// 
218a1(rgyud): ngan par byas pa thams cad 'jig/ oM a mo g+na badz+ra pad+ma b+hU dze ma li mi li swA hA// lag gnyis thal mo khong stong las// mdor na nor bu 'dra bar bcing / nor bu'i phyag rgya rdo rje 'dra/ 
218a2(rgyud): yid bzhin nor bur brjod pa yin// las ni don yod thams cad byed// don yod mchod pa'i char 'bebs shing // don yod pha rol phyin drug rdzogs// don yod sangs rgyas rnams dang ni// byang chub
218a3(rgyud): sems dpa' mthong ba yin// don yod rnam grol dkyil 'khor gsang // mtshams med lnga po sbyong par mdzad// oM a mo g+ha/ ma Ni ma Ne/ ma hA ma Ni pad+ma Ni swA hA/ rdo rje pad+ma'i thal mo sbyar// pad+ma
218a4(rgyud): kha bye 'dra bar rgyas// gung mo lcags kyu 'dra ba yi// phyag rgya la did ni mchog tu bzang // phyag rgya 'di ni mthong tsam gyis// 'bras bu chen po rmad du byung // 'jig rten 'das pa khyad/ 
218a5(rgyud): par 'phags// dus gsum sangs rgyas mthong ba yin// oM a mo g+ha badz+re ma hA pad+me/ dz+wa le su dz+wa le/ ma hA dz+wa le/ swA hA// snying kar rdo rje pad+ma nyid// rdo rje bcing pa phun sum
218a6(rgyud): tshogs// mdzub mo lcags kyu 'dra ba ni// bcing bar bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di// gzi brjid chen po dag dang ni// stobs chen pha rol gnon pa dang // thams cad grub par byed pa'i gnas// thams cad gru
218a7(rgyud): par rab tu sbyin// 'jig rten 'das pa grub pa che// sangs rgyas nyid phyir bla na med// sdig pa thams cad 'phrog pa grub// gsang sngags grub pa bla na med// oM a mo g+ha sid d+hi/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ sid d+he/ a
218a8(rgyud): ba lo kA ya sid d+he/ ma hA bi pu le sid d+hi/ ku ru ku ru swA hA/ rdo rje thal mo mnyam gzhag ste// gung mo bshibs te sgreng ba dang // srin lag mthe bong so sor 'gyed// gung mo yid tsam dgug bya ba// pad+ma'i
218b1(rgyud): dbang phyug sems dpa' che// 'jig rten dbang phyug bla ma ste// rtag tu rnam grol dkyil 'khor ni// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis// phyag rgya byas pa 'di yin no// phyag rgya 'di dang don yod pa
218b2(rgyud): snying po'i phyag rgya dang / phyag rgya de dag mthong ba ni// 'jig rten dbang phyug mthong ba dang 'dra ba yin no// phyag rgya mchog 'di mthong ba ni rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang 'dra ba yin te/ phyir mi
218b3(rgyud): ldog pa thob par 'gyuraro// phyag rgya 'di bcings pa tsam gyi mthong bas mod la dam tshig thams cad shes par 'gyuraro// mthong ba dang bzung ba tsam gyi mod la 'bras bu chen po 'thob cing mod la
218b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bla na med pa yin no// dkon mchog ga/ sum la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / 'a chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs
218b5(rgyud): / rje chen po la phyag 'tsha lo// oM a ba lo ki ta/ ma hA shud d+has tra sa ra sa ra/ sa man+ta a ba b+hA sa/ kun+da la/ a mi tA b+hA/ ma ku Ta/ d+ha ra/ dzA Ta ma ku TA/ na ba badz+ren+da/ man+ti ta/ tsa ra tsa ra/ 
218b6(rgyud): saM b+ha ra/ b+hu ba Ne shwa ra pad+ma b+hu dze swA hA// phyag rgya chen po bdun po de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i byang chub snying po'i lam gyi 'bras bu ston pa/ rtag tu 'jig rten dbang phyug bla ma'i 'jig rten
218b7(rgyud): mgon po'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor bskor ba yin no// phyag rgya bdun ni phyag rgya chen po bye ba phrag bdun gyis yongasu bskor ba yin te/ phyag rgya chen po bdun po de gang du bcings shing phyag rgya mchog
218b8(rgyud): bzung ba ni phyag rgya chen po bye ba phrag brgya bcings par 'gyuro// bzung bar 'gyu ro// de dag thams cad mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyuro// bstod par 'gyuraro// ming 'dzin pa byas par
219a1(rgyud): 'gyuro// phyag rgya bdun po de dag ni gsang sngags sgrub pa thams cad dang / kun tu las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// thams cad byed pa'i phyag rgya 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lamathun med
219a2(rgyud): pa yin no// gang zhig phyag rgya de dag bcings pa mthong zhing khrus legs par byas te/ gtsang mas sgrub par byed pa 'di ni ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ sngon gyi sgrib pas dmyal ba mthong bar mi 'gyur
219a3(rgyud): phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis mod la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bdun gyi drung du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags par 'gyu ro// bsod nams kyi phung po chen po kun tu
219a4(rgyud): bzung bar 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sa bcu la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// phyir mi ldog/  pa'i gnas rab tu thob par 'gyuraro// mtshams med pa lnga byed
219a5(rgyud): pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa la bskur ba 'debs pa dang / mnar med pa la gzhol ba rnams kyi rtse ste phyag rgya bzung ba tsam dang / bstan pa tsam gyi mdo la sdig
219a6(rgyud): pa de dag thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis yongasu bzung bar 'gyur ro// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / 
219a7(rgyud): za la sogs pa rnams las legs par bsrungs par 'gyuraro// dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gshin rje dang / chu lnga dang / lus ngan dang / gzhon nu rnams rtag
219a8(rgyud): tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir rgyun tu rje su 'brang ba byed par 'gyuraro// sems can thams cad dga' ba mthong bar 'gyuraro// mchod rten du 'gyur ba yon par 'dod pa dang / 
219b1(rgyud): lus ring bsrel gyi snying po yin par 'gyu ro// rdo rje ltar 'khregs pa'i lus su 'gyuraro// dug gis mi tshugs mes ma yin/ mtshon gyis ma yin/ chus ma yin/ dbyigs drug gi 'jigs pas/ 
219b2(rgyud): ma yin/ seng ges ma yin/ gcan zan gtum pos ma yin/ dug mi zad pas ma yin/ rkun po dang / mi rgod kyis ma yin/ khyim rdibs pas ma yin/ gnod sbyin dang / srin pa'i gdon yang
219b3(rgyud): 'ong bar mi 'gyur/ nad thams cad 'jug par mi 'gyur/ lus la dug sbyar ma dang / byang dang / spong stong gi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyu ro// rtag tu sdig pa can gyi rmi lam mthong bar mi 'gyu ro// 
219b4(rgyud): rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa lta ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' lta ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu 'phag/ das pa spyan ras gzegs dbang phyug mthong ste/ rtag tu mchog
219b5(rgyud): sbyin pa mdzad par 'gyuro// lha thams cad kyang rtag tu rgyun ma/ 'chad par 'dis mthong bar dgyes par 'gyu ro// rtag tu yon tan dang bsod nams 'bar// dpal gyi lus la shin
219b6(rgyud): tu 'bar ba'i lu su 'gyur ro// thams cad du 'di mchod par 'os pa chen por 'gyur te/ rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyis mchod par 'os pa chen por
219b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// lha'i gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bar du yang dgyes par 'gyur te/ mchod par byed do// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin lha'i bdag po dang tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen
219b8(rgyud): po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / gzhon nu dang / drang srong gi tshogs rnams kyis mchod par 'os pa chen por 'gyu ro// sems can thams cad kyang rtag tu de mthong bar 'dod
220a1(rgyud): // par 'gyu ro// rtag tu dgyes par ston pa bzhed par 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang bas khrus byas gos gtsang ma bgos te gtsang mar byas la dri sna tshogs kyis lus bsku ba dang / bdun
220a2(rgyud): pa sna tshogs kyis bdug pa byas la/ tsan dan dkar po dang / gur gum gyis lag pa gnyis bskus te/ ga pur dang / gla rtsis bskos pa'i sa phyogs gtsang mar ras kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan snga 'am/ 
220a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan snga'am/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar skyil mo dkrung bcas te 'dug nas phyag rgya 'di bcing bar bya'o// mchod rten
220a4(rgyud): ring bsrel can gyi drung du phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o// sangs/ rgyas la mchod pa'i tshogs yon chab la sogs pa 'a/ dbul bar bya'o// byams pa dang / snying rje'i semasu bya'o// sen
220a5(rgyud): thams cad la lhag par brtse ba dang / snying rje'i sems pa sgom par bya'o// sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
220a6(rgyud): dbang phyug yid la dran par bya'o// sangs rgyas yid la byed pa dran pa bsgom par bya ste/ phyag rgya chen po bdun po de dag ni bcing ba byas na phyag rgya bye ba phrag bdun bcings par 'gyur ro// de nas mthu brjod
220a7(rgyud): par bya'o// mthu ni 'jig rten las 'das pa yang dag par mthong ba dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rang bzhin gyi sku mngon du mthong ba yin no// rgyal po btsun mo'i nang du'am/ skye bo
220a8(rgyud): mang po'i mang du tshogs pa dang / dge slong gi tshogs kyi dge 'dun gyi nang du'am/ 'khor du bcad pa'i nang du'am/ rig byed pa zhi tshogs pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / bud med
220b1(rgyud): dang skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang bcas pa de dag gi nang de dag gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho 'phrul 'jig rten las 'das pa mod la mngon du ma
220b2(rgyud): ba dang / 'dres pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'chi ba dang / skye ba dang / skyes nas yang dag par dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i 'bras bu dang / dge ba dang mi dge bas shi ba dang / skyes nas phyug
220b3(rgyud): po'am/ dbul po'am/ rgyal po thob pa 'am/ lha'i long spyod dang / lha'i gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / rtag tu dbang phyug chen por 'gyur ba dang / klu'i
220b4(rgyud): skye gnas dang / yi dgas dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po gsang ba pa rnams kyis dmyal ba mi bzad par skye ba dang / mtshams med pa la thug gi bar du mthong ba dang / bram ze'i rigs sam/ 
220b5(rgyud): rgyal rigs sam/ gzhan yang rigs dum sna tshogs par skye/ bar mthong ba dag 'jig rten mgon pa'i mthus mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa'i las bsgrub par bya/ 
220b6(rgyud): ba de dag thams cad bstan par bya ste/ rgyal ba dang / rnam par rgyal ba dang / char 'bab pa dang / shin tu char 'bab pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / dus ma yin par 'bab pa dang / dar ba dang / rgud pa dang / 
220b7(rgyud): 'byor pa dang / mi 'byor pa dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / nor dang / 'bru rnyed pa dang / 'phel ba dang / 'bri ba dang / lo nyes pa mthong ba dang / 'khor ba na da ltar gyi las gang cung zad legs par byed pa dang / 
220b8(rgyud): nyes pa byed pa dang / dge ba'am/ mi dge ba 'am/ 'bri ba 'am/ 'phel ba 'am/ skye ba legs par skye ba 'am/ ngan par skye ba dang / bu 'byung ba/ bu pho 'am/ bu mo 'am/ bu bzang po 'am/ bu ngan pa 'am/ bsod
221a1(rgyud): nams can nam/ bsod nams med pa mngal na gnas pa de dag bden pa nyid du mthong ste/ las kyi cho ga legs par byas pas the tsom mi bya'o// tshes grangs dang / rgyu skar dang / 
221a2(rgyud): nyin mtshan brjod par bya mi dgos kyi bzlas brjod dang / gtor ma dang / gtsang sbra dang / bkru ba shal dang / shin tu khrus bya ba dang / gos gtsang ma bcang ba dang / bden par smra ba dang / byams pI
221a3(rgyud): sems dang / bla ma la legs par mnyan pa de bzung ba kho nar bya'o// zas dang / skom gtsang ma dang / chang dang / sha dang / beg tsong dang sgog skya dang / ke'u dang / 'dres par byas pa'i 'dres pa'i
221a4(rgyud): zas yongasu spang ba dang / shin tu 'bags pa dang / de dag/ da ni khyab par 'dod pas yongasu spang bar byas nas sa 'di ni mod la thams cad mngon du mthong bar 'gyur ro// dka' thub
221a5(rgyud): spyod pa la brnyas sems mi bya/ mgus pa mi bya'i lkog tu ya dmi bya'o// rje su bstan pa de dag ni mchog yin no// bsgrub par bya ba mchog de dag ni/ 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon
221a6(rgyud): pos bka' stsal pa yin no// dngul las me long chu zheng du sor bcu drug pa byas la zangs las pad+mo'i gdan khru gang gi tshad sdong bu dang bcas par bya'o// me long gi gong du dngul lam// gser las
221a7(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa bya ste tshad sor bzhi pa/ gdan pad+mo phyag bzhi la mdung rtse gsum pa dang / zhags pa dang pad+ma dang / nor bu rin po che thogs par bya
221a8(rgyud): ba ni 'jog sbyong legs par byas pa/ 'jam po 'od phyin pa tsam du sbyang bar bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang bas me long gi gong gi 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sku la ring bsrel bzhag par bya'o// 
221b1(rgyud): gapur dang / gla rtsis sku la mchod par bya'o// me long gi nye 'khor thog zag tu dngul gyi me tog dang gser gyi me tog rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i phreng ba gdags par bya'o// dbang bskur ba'i nga
221b2(rgyud): gdags par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang bas me long de la nyi ma re re zhing dus gsum du don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya ste/ ji tsam brgyad stong tshang gi bar du bya'o// 
221b3(rgyud): khro bo'i rgyal po dbang bskur bar bya'o// de nas me long 'bar bar 'gyur ro// gcig kho nar kha dog sna tshogs par 'bar bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sku gzugs de las lha rdzas kyi chu 'dzag
221b4(rgyud): go// 'od zer sna tshogs 'byungo // de nas rig sngags 'chang ba'i lus 'bar zhing dga' bar 'gyur ro// don yod par dga' ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib
221b5(rgyud): mo grub pa 'thob par 'gyuraro// lus shin tu dri ma med cing yo/ dag par 'gyuro// de nas rig sngags 'chang bas 'jig ste/ na thams cad kyi mngon sum ngon yod pa'i zhags pa rnam
221b6(rgyud): par 'phrul pa 'grub pa bstan par bya dgos pas/ de nas rig sngags 'chang bas sa dang ba'i lci ba bsres pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyar khru bzhi 'phang du khru do pa byas pa shin tu mkhregs pa shin tu 'jam
221b7(rgyud): par bya'o// thig skud kyis rnam par phye ste/ tshon sna tshogs rnam par dbye zhing sgo bzhi rnam par phye nas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo rnam par phye ste/ pad+ma mdab ma brgyad tshon gyis gsal bar bri zhing pad+ma'i dkyil du ge/ 
221b8(rgyud): sar dang ze ba bya'o// stegs bu gru bzhi la rin po che sna tshogs kyis rgyan pa dang / stegs bu grwa bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi go cha bgos pa/ gtum pa/ 'jigs par byed pa'i gzugs bri bar bya'o// ste
222a1(rgyud): bu'i dbus kyi gnas par bar du lha dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / gzhon nu dang / lus ngan po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po
222a2(rgyud): dang / lha dbang phyug dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / ral pa gcig pa dang / sgrol ma dang / dkar mo dang / khro gnyer ma dang / rdo rje pho nya mo rnams tshon sna tshogs kyis zhing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ me tog sna
222a3(rgyud): tshogs thogs pa bya'o// stegs bu'i phyi rol tu mdung rtse gsum pa'i phreng ba dang / rdo rje phreng ba dang / pad+ma'i phreng ba kun tu bya'o// phreng ba'i bar dbus dang / grwa'i bar du lha mo brgyad dang 'jigs byed ma dang / dpe
222a4(rgyud): med ma dang / ba san ti dang / dpal sgra dbyangs dang / sa'i lha mo/ dang / dung can ma dang / bus pa dan ti rnams rgyan thams ca/ da kyis brgyan pa/ me tog sna tshogs dang rin po che'i snod thogs
222a5(rgyud): par bya'o// phyi rol thog thag tu phreng ba'i bar bar du dri sna tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor bsku zhing tsan dan dkar po dang / gur gu ma gyi mchod pa sna tshogs bya'o// ga pur dang / gla rtsis mchod cing
222a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor kun tu dar sna tshon sna lnga'i rgyal mtshan dang mda' dang / rta babs kyis brgyan par bya'o// dngul gyi snod bzhi cung pang gis bkang ste bzhag par bya'o// dngul gyi snod bzhi gtor ma dkar gsu
222a7(rgyud): gyis dgang par bya'o// dngul gyi snod bzhir mchod yon gyi chu bzhag par bya'o// snod brgyad ro sna tshogs kyi gtor mas dgang par bya'o// 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs bzhag par bya'o// kha zas bza' ba dang / 
222a8(rgyud): gtor ma sna tshogs bzhag par bya'o// dri sna tshogs dang / byugs pas dngul gyi snod bkang ste bzhag par bya'o// dngul gyi pog por brgyad/ tsan dan dang / a ga ru dang / tu ru ka dang / ga pur dang / gla rtsi dang / 
222b1(rgyud): gur gum dang / sra rtsi pog dang / spog gis gang bar bya zhing bdug spos sna tshogs pa sreg go// dngul dang / zangs dang / gser gyi me tog gi snying po'i dkyil 'khor du btsal du dgram mo// phyi'i dkyil
222b2(rgyud): 'khor du/ ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog btsal du dgram par bya ste/ phreng ba rnams khor yug tu bskor nas bzhag pa te/ de la yang / me long legs par rgyan par byas nas/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi
222b3(rgyud): pad+ma'i ge sar dang / ze'u 'brul shar du phyogs par bzhag par bya'o// rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma khrus byas gos gtsang ma bsgo bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi las dang / bya ba thams cad byas nas/ me/ 
222b4(rgyud): long la mngon du phyogs te/ skyil mo dkrung du 'dug par gyur/ denas 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod dbul bar bya ste/ bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad rdzogs pa
222b5(rgyud): dang / khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bsku ro// dbang bskur ba tsam rgya mod la 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon sum dang / 'khor chen po'i dbus/ me long gi dbus der/ 'phags pa spyan ras
222b6(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis mthong ste/ me long gi dbus de nas rig sngags 'chang de la leg so zhes bya ba sbyin par mdzad do// rig sngags 'chang chen po legaso leg so// bdag la
222b7(rgyud): don yod pa'i me long la 'bebs pa'i de kho na nyid dam par gyur pa 'di thams cad yang dag par mthong ste/ 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las kyi 'bras bu bla na med pa zhes bya ba yod/ 
222b8(rgyud): su dag pa nyid do// rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis 'bras bu chen po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam mtshungs pa med pa thob bo// khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i 'jig rten dang / 'jig
223a1(rgyud): rten las 'das pa'i sgrub pa'i cho ga dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya grub bo// rig sngags 'chang / 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i cho ga ga
223a2(rgyud): 'dod pa smros shig/ de thams cad sbyin par bya'o// zheso// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis/ mchog gang don du gnyer ba de blangs na thams cad 'phral nyid du sbyin par byed do// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
223a3(rgyud): gang yin pa der/ kun nas 'ongs pa'i bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rmangs rigs dang / rje rigs dang / rgyal po dang / blon po
223a4(rgyud): dang / bkrabs pa dang / 'dun na 'don dang / btsun mo'i 'kho dar du kun 'ongs pa dang / bsod nams dang ldan pa'am/ bsod nams dang mi ldan pa'am/ yongasu dag pa'am/ lta ba
223a5(rgyud): ngan pa 'am/ gzhan dmyal ba pa'i sems can gti mug gi mun pa la ldan pa/ mnar med pa la gzhol ba/ mtshams med pa lnga byed pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ dam pa
223a6(rgyud): chos spong ba/ gang yin pa de rnams thams cad la'ang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lus de la ston par byed/ thams cad du smra bar byed/ yang dag par dbugs 'byin par byed// 
223a7(rgyud): thams cad du rang gi las la dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa de thams cad ston par byed do// rig sngags kyis chom rkun dang / gdol pa dang / rig sngags spong zhing nyams par
223a8(rgyud): byed pa dang / rig sngags sun 'byin par byed pa dang / rig sngags la ma dad cing gus pas mi nyan pa de'i mi mthong ba ni ma gtogs te/ gzhan du na rang gi las kyi 'bras bu sdug bsngal rnam pa sna
223b1(rgyud): tshogs nges par 'byung bar mthong ngo // de nas sems can de rnams gang 'dod pa'i don yid la byed pa 'jug ste/ 'jig rten pa 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa de thams cad 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen
223b2(rgyud): po ru/ rang rang gi 'bras bu nges par 'byung ba bsod nams dang / bsod nams ma yin pa'i 'bras bu mthong bar byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong ngo // de bzhin ga
223b3(rgyud): pa'i sku chen po dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang bcas pa'i gzhal yas khang mthong ngo // po Ta la ka'i ri bo'i gzhal yas khang rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa dang / 'phags
223b4(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa gzhal yas khang na lha dang klus yongasu bskor ba mthong ngo // gzhan ji ltar da ltar gyi dge ba dang / ma dge ba 'am/ lo legs pa dang / 
223b5(rgyud): lo nyes pa 'am/ nad dang / 'chi ba dang / tshe thung ba dang / tshe ring / ba dang / rang gi dmag tshogs dang / pha rol gyi dmag tsha gas dang / g.yul dang 'khrug pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / rgyal
223b6(rgyud): ba 'am/ 'pham pa'am/ brlag pa 'am/ ma brlags pa 'am/ yams dang / char ches pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i char ram/ char med pa'am/ rlung ngam/ sad dam/ tshad pa yang rung ste de dag thad mthong ngo // 
223b7(rgyud): nor dang ldan pa'am/ nyams pa'am/ 'phel ba 'am/ lo thog gam/ me tog gam/ 'bras bu 'phel ba yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad mthong ngo // chom rkun dang / rkun po dang / dug dang / mtshon cha'i
223b8(rgyud): 'dzags pa 'am/ rgyal po'i 'jigs pa 'am/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / brjed byed kyi 'jigs pa de thams cad mthong ngo // nor chen po'am/ nor med pa de thang
224a1(rgyud): mthong ngo // 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba mthong ngo // bu thob pa dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / yul dang / ljongs thob pa dang / bud med thob pa de thams cad mthong ste/ 'di la dogs pa
224a2(rgyud): dang / yid gnyis dang / the tshom bskyed par mi bya zhing / mchog tu dad pa dang / gus pas shin tu 'bad de/ cho ga 'di bsgrub par bya'o// don yod zhags pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jig rten
224a3(rgyud): las 'das pa'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga rdzogaso// // de nas yang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub
224a4(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras ga/ dazigs dbang phyug gis/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po gsungs pa cho ga zhib mo'i nye bar spyod pa dang bcas pa dang
224a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang / ras ris shin tu zad pa/ shin tu gting dpag dka' zhing / shin tu rgya che la/ shin tu sgrub dka' ba dang / dkyil 'khor mang po dang
224a6(rgyud): phyag rgya mang po dang / gsang sngags mang po dang / ras ris mang po yongasu bsgrags pa rnams ni rab rib dang bral bar mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho chen po dug can pa zab pa lta bu/ lhun pa
224a7(rgyud): chen po dang mtshungs pa lta bu/ smig sgyu lta bu/ rdul phra rab lta bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang mtshungs pa lta bu/ bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ gzhal du
224a8(rgyud): med pa/ tshad med pa/ bskal pa'i grangs kyis bgrang bar bya ba med pa'i bskal pa'i tshad ma dang / bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshad ma dang / lha'i yul gyi tshad ma dang / klu'i yul gyi tshad
224b1(rgyud): ma dang / sems can gyi tshad ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshad ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan la snang ba'i tshad ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes
224b2(rgyud): kun tu snang ba'i tshad ma dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi tshad ma dang / bdud kyi yul gyi tshad ma rnams kyis thog mar dmigs pa ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das bar du yang dmigs
224b3(rgyud): pa ma lags bcom ldan 'das bar du yang dmigs pa ma lagaso// tha mar yang lags na/ bcom ldan 'das de ci ltar yongasu shes par bgyi/ sgrub thabs kyi cho gas bsgrub par bya ba ni du
224b4(rgyud): zhig lags/ gsang sngags ni du zhig phyag rgya ni du zhig/ da dkyil 'khor ni du zhig/ bri bar bya ba'i phyag rgya ni du zhig/ lag pa'i phyag rgya ni du zhig/ bdug pa'i sbyor ba ni du zhig/ 
224b5(rgyud): mig sman ni du zhig/ ril bu ni du zhig/ bdug pa ni du zhig/ sa ris ni du zhig/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags ni du zhig/ sti po ni du zhig/ nye ba'i snying po ni du zhig/ khro bo'i gsang sngags
224b6(rgyud): ni du zhig/ drag po na du zhig/ zhi ban du zhig/ yi ge gcig pa ni du zhig/ yi ge gnyis pa ni du zhig/ yi ge gsum pa ni du zhig/ yi ge bzhi pa ni du zhig/ yi ge lnga pa ni du zhog/ yi ge drug pa ni du
224b7(rgyud): zhig/ yi ge bdun pa ni du zhog/ yi ge brgyad pa ni du zhig/ yi ge dgu pa ni du zhig/ yi ge bcu pa ni du zhig lags/ smyung bar gnas pa ci ltar lags/ nyin mo dang mtshan mo ni ci ltar/ khrus
224b8(rgyud): kyi cho ga ni ci ltar/ gos bsgo ba ni ci ltar/ phyogs bcing ba ni ci ltar/ dkyil 'khor bcing pa ni ci ltar/ gtsug tor bcing ba ni ci ltar/ bdag srung ba ni ci ltar/ gzhan srung ba ni ci ltar/ 
225a1(rgyud): grogs srung ba ni ci ltar/ slob ma srung ba ni ci ltar/ rab tu 'jug pa ni ci ltar/ phyag bya ba ni ci ltar/ bskor ba bya ba ni ci ltar/ mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil bul ba ni ci ltar/ gtor
225a2(rgyud): ma 'bul ba ni ci ltar/ me tog 'bul ba ni ci ltar/ bdug pa ni ci ltar/ dri ni ci ltar/ mar me ni ci ltar/ nye reg ni ci ltar/ lha bshos ni ci ltar/ thams cad du spyan drang ba ni ci ltar/ snyan gsan dab pa
225a3(rgyud): ni ci ltar/ rmi lam bskul ba ni ci ltar/ sbyin sreg gi cho ga ni ci ltar lags// zhi ba can ni du zhig lags/ rgyas pa can ni du zhig/ mngon spyod can ni du zhig/ zhags pa ni du zhig/ rdo rje ni du zhig/ pad+ma ni du
225a4(rgyud): zhig/ gshegasu gsol ba ni du zhig/ nye bar 'pho bar byed pa'i bya ba ni du zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mtshan de nyid ci 'dra ba dang / rgyu mtshan ci 'dra ba dang / kun tu spyod par
225a5(rgyud): 'gyur ba ni mi shes so// bcom ldan 'das bdag las sgrub pa'i cho ga du zhig gi rjesu 'brang bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar phyi ma'i dus/ phyi ma'i tshe na/ sems can rnams kyi
225a6(rgyud): su 'brang bar 'gyur/ dngos grub du zhig rjesu stsal bar bgyi/ ci ltar sems can bla na med par 'gyur bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das 'di dag la bdag 'khrugs par gyur cing / bdag la spobs pa
225a7(rgyud): med do// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis shes par mi nus na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis cho ga'i mtshan nyid ji lta ba de dag bdag la gsung du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la the tshom mchis pas/ 
225a8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi the tshom bcad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas zhu ba yongasu zhus pa
225b1(rgyud): gyur pa gsan nas/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba 'di/ dri ba yongasu ngus pa ni leg so leg so// lag na rdo rje khyod
225b2(rgyud): yongasu 'dri bar byed pa'i spobs ba sdus pa ni/ lag na rdo rje sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir don gyi ched yongasu nus pa'i phyir dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi mchog 'grub pa'i don du/ 
225b3(rgyud): yongs zhus pa'i phyir dang / lag na rje rje 'di ni mchog tu rmad du blang bas te/ phyi bzhin du rjesu 'brang ngo // lag na rdo rje 'di ni sgyum lto bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang mtshungs pa'o// lag na rdo rje don yod zhags/ 
225b4(rgyud): pa'i sring po'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga/ rgya mchen po drug can pa dang / zab par mtshungs pas te/ 'dzin gting dpag dka' ba'o// lag na rdo rje rgya mtsho chen po thag
225b5(rgyud): pa'i grangs kyis bgrang bar nus kyi/ lag na rdo rje don yodags pa'i snying po'i tshad ni bzung bar ma nu so// lag na rdo rjeri'i rgyal po ri rab ni rdul phra rab tu gtor ba'i grangs kyi mtha
225b6(rgyud): thug par bya bar nus shing / slar yang ri'i rgyal po ri rab tu gnas par 'dod pas rang gi gnas su rab tu bzhag par nus kyi/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i tshad ni gzung bar mi
225b7(rgyud): nuso// de ltar rgya che ba/ de ltar gting dpag dka' ba/ de ltar zab pa ste/ lag na rdo rje 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyis mkhyen pa dang
225b8(rgyud): gting dpag par mi nuso// don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i tshad 'dzin par ni mi nu so// lag na rdo rje sgyu ma lta bu gang yin pa de dang / snying po dang / ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de dang / zhags
226a1(rgyud): pa dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa 'di/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi/ sems can rnams
226a2(rgyud): kyi gzugs dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs sna tshogs dang / tshul sna tshogasu mthong bar byed de/ sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i ched dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi mchog
226a3(rgyud): sgrub par byed pa'o// lag na rdo rje 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thams cad du mnyam par 'gro ba ste/ gang du chu dang 'o ma mnyam
226a4(rgyud): pas mnyam pa bzhin no// thams cad du mnyam pas byams da pa dang snying rje chen po rgyas par byed do// don yod pa'i zhag/ das pas 'gugs par byed la sgrol bar byed do// 'chi ba med
226a5(rgyud): pa'i thang rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du 'jog par byed do// dman pa dang / mchog dang / bar ma dang / rigs mthon po dang / dma' ba dang / dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / 
226a6(rgyud): gshin rje'i 'jig rten la sogs pa rnams// thams cad du mnyam par dran par byed cing ming smos pa tsam gyis 'dzin par byed cing / sems can thams cad bla na med par byed la/ dub pa dang / 
226a7(rgyud): ngal ba dang / yid la bcags par 'gyur ba med do// lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / 
226a8(rgyud): brjed byed dang / yi dgas dang / nags dang / gshin rje'i gnas ji srid du/ sa 'og gi nang du son pa rnams dang / srid pa'i rtse mo nas mnar med pa'i mthar thug pa dang / ji srid du/ 'og min
226b1(rgyud): gyi srid pa'i bar du/ gcig tu sems bskyed pas yongasu rgyug go// lha dang klu dang / bcas pa nas ji srid dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi bar thams cad dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang
226b2(rgyud): bu mo rnams bla na med par byed do// dper na nyi ma'i 'od zer ni mun pas mdongs pa thams cad sel bar byed de/ 'dzam bu gling thams cad du mnyam par snang bar byed do// de bzhin nyid du
226b3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thams cad du snying rje chen pos kun tu snang bar byed cing / thams cad la thams cad du mnyam par
226b4(rgyud): gnas te sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dang / 'jigs pa mi bzad dpa dang / nad dang mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal gyi 'ching ba/ rnams thams cad yongasu grol bar byed do// skye ba dang rga/ 
226b5(rgyud): ba dang / 'tsho ba'i sdug bsngal yongasu grol bar byed do// ma tho ris la gzhol ba la sogs pa'i lam thams cad du 'god par byed do// de ltar snying rje chen po dang / byams pa
226b6(rgyud): chen pos thams cad du mnyam par rjesu 'gro ste/ thams cad du mnyam par mchog tu byed cing / thams cad du mnyam par byang chub kyi lam la rab tu dgod par byed do// thams cad du
226b7(rgyud): mnyam par skyabs dang dpung gnyen du 'gyuraro// lag na rdo rje de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ni/ brtan pa dang / go cha dang / spro ba chen blo/ 
226b8(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi don gyi ched du zhugs pa'o// lag na rdo rje 'di ni/ thabs gcig tu 'jug pa chen po ste/ sems can thams cad 'jigs
227a1(rgyud): pa chen po'i lam las so sor ldog par byed pa'o// bde ba nas bde bar gshegs pa'i lam du 'god par byed pa'o// rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog pa med la bsam pa rnam
227a2(rgyud): pa gzhan du 'gyur ba med do// sems kyis yid la bcags par 'gyur ba med do// de nas yang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas byang chub sems
227a3(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yon tan bsngags pa chen po 'di thos nas dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yi rangs pa dang / rab tu rangs pa dang / dga' ba
227a4(rgyud): dang / yid bskyes nas/ ched du brjod pa ni tshod du brjod par gyur to// e ma mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug/ e ma 'jig rten dbang phyug bla ma/ khyod kyi ming gi yon tan bskyed
227a5(rgyud): bas ngan 'gro thams cad grol bar byed do// phyag na rdorjebyang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ 'di ni 'jig rten gyi bla ma mgon po// 'di ni 'jig rten gyi yab chen po/ 'di na
227a6(rgyud): 'jig rten sgrol bar byed pa'i mgon po// thub pa nyin mo'i nyi ma'o// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// de lta bur lag na rdo rje ji ltar smra bar bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka
227a7(rgyud): pa lag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug can song la/ mngon par phyag 'tshal nas yongasu zhus shig/ mchog tu gyur pa'i tshig gis cho ga ji lta
227a8(rgyud): ba bzhin du snying po dang / de kho na nyid kyi rang bzhin de rnams ston par byed do// don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i sgrub pa'i dngos grub ji lta ba bzhin du ston par 'gyur zhing lung 'bogs
227b1(rgyud): par byed do// de nas gnang spyan gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes thab molapa brtags shing khong du chud desang ge'i rdul gyis 'gro nang / rdo rje sho bang byed bzhin pas thab mdzes padz+ram med pa'i ma/ 
227b2(rgyud): tog gzung nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa stan ras gzigs dbang drug gal ba der dong ste ljags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa smra
227b3(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ zla ba mdzes pa dri ma med pa'i me tog phul te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs
227b4(rgyud): te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags dpa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces gso dal to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni shin tu rmongs pa dang lda
227b5(rgyud): pa/ dran pa yongasu nyams pa blo'i dpa' zhum pa ste/ don yodazhags pa'i snying po'i gsang sngags dang phyag rgya mang po dang / ras ris kyi sgrub pa'i cho ga shin tu rgyas pa 'di dang de dag
227b6(rgyud): mi sheso// sngon ma ni ru zhig/ bar ma ni du nig/ tha ma ni du zhig/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags ni du zhig/ snying po ni du zhig/ nye ba'i snying po na du zhig/ ji srid du yi ge bcu pa'i bar gyi gsang sngags ni du zhig/ dkyil
227b7(rgyud): 'khor dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / ras ris ni du zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la skabs dbye bar gsol zheso// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
227b8(rgyud): phyug gis/ phyag na rdo rje la brtse ba'i don du/ zla ba mdzes pa dri ma med pa'i me tog blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i don du na mkha'i dbyingasu gtor ro// gtor ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das
228a1(rgyud): kyi dbu'i steng gi mtshamasu 'khor lo'i rnam par gnas so// dpag tshad lnga brgyar khyab cings gzhi las gyen du 'phags pa nyid kyi ji srid 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du gnas
228a2(rgyud): te/ bai DUr+ya sngon po chen po'i sdong bu la/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi dril bu dpyangs pa'i ba dan bcings pas mdzes shing 'bar bar yongasu gyur to// 'khor lo'i rnam pa legs par yongasu 'khor
228a3(rgyud): ba ni nyi ma bye ba brgya stong phrag pas lhag pa'i kun tu snang ba/ legs par yongasu dag pa/ yongasu byang ba shin tu dri ma med pa'i gser gyi mchod stong rnam par mdzes par shin tu gnas pa/ nor bu/ 
228a4(rgyud): rin po che chen po sna tshogs pas spras pa dga' bar bya ba/ yid kyi shing rta rab tu tshim par byed pa dang / dga' bar bya ba mthong ba lha dang / lha ma yin gyi phyag bya bar 'os pa dang / 
228a5(rgyud): rjed par bya bar 'os pa dang / drang srong rnams kyi bstod par 'os pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis lu nga bstan par 'os pa ste/ thams cad du zla ba mdzes pa dri ma
228a6(rgyud): med pa'i me tog gi ge sar la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bzhugs pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs par 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi yongasu bskor nas bzhugs pa la/ gdugs
228a7(rgyud): kun nas yongasu 'khor ba'i/ lha rdzas kyi gzhal med khang dang / lha dang klu dang / chus byung dang / lha'i bu mo dang / klu'i bu mo dang / mi 'am ci'i bu mo dang / lnga dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri
228a8(rgyud): za dang / lha ma yin dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / rig sngags 'chang dang / rig pa 'dzin pa brgya stong phrag gis lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs pa'i gzhal mang khang dang / lha rdzas kyi
228b1(rgyud): rgyan dang gos dang / lhab lhub kyis brgyan cing / dar dpyangs dang / ba nad dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams thogs
228b2(rgyud): te bcom ldan 'das dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la mchod pa byed par gyur te/ lha rdzas sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa'i sprin gyi char 'bab par gyur cing / lha'i dri za'i klu dbyangs yang dag par len
228b3(rgyud): tsacing rnga dang / pheg rdob rnams kyi mchod pa'i don du rol mo byed par gyur to// po Ta la'i ri bor gzhal med khang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa ru/ ca co'i sgra chen po sgrogs par gyur to// po Ta
228b4(rgyud): la kar gnas pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang // lto 'phye chen po gang yin pa rnams kyang sems tshim pa thob
228b5(rgyud): cing / rmad du byung ba thob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ba'i lha gang yin pa rnams dang / pad+ma/ 'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha gang yin pa rnams dang / rdo
228b6(rgyud): rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor pa'i lha gang yin pa rnams dang / nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha gang yin pa rnams dang / glang po'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ba'i lha gang yin pa dang / dkyil
228b7(rgyud): 'khor chen po'i lha gang yin pa de rnams thams cad mchog tu ya mtshan pa dang ldan zhing / rmad du 'byung ba thob ste/ sems tshim pa skyes la ngo mtshar ba thob nas/ bcom ldan 'das la blta bar
228b8(rgyud): byed pa gzhin du kun tu gnas par gyur to// zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / rgyu skar dang / skar ma'i tshogs dang / lha dang / mtshan me'i lha dang / dbang po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang dbang phyug chen podang
229a1(rgyud): gzhon nu dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / tshogs kyi dbang phyug dang / nag po chen po dang / dbang phyug dang dbang phyug chen po dang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / 
229a2(rgyud): nor bu bzang po dang / gang pa bzang po dang / stobs kyi lha dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan gyi lha rnams dang / gzhon nu'i lha rnams gdugs kyi yub nas bzung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
229a3(rgyud): mchod pa byed par gyur to// lha'i gzhal med khang chen po lha'i rnam par sprul pa'i mchod pa'i sprin gyi mchod pa byed do// gdugs kyi rnam pa'i khor yug gi nang du dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'og min gyi lha
229a4(rgyud): dang / lha'i gnas thams cad du lha'i bus yongasu bskor ba gang yin pa de na mkha' la mchod pa'i sprin chen pos bcom ldan 'dras shAkya thub pa dang / spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug 'khor
229a5(rgyud): gyi dkyil 'khor la mchod pa byed do// sa'i lha dang / klu dang / ga/ nod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za gang yin pa rnams dang // sa gzhi'i lha dang / chu'i lha dang / nags kyi lha dang / lo thog
229a6(rgyud): gi lha dang / sman gyi lha gang yin pa de rnams thams cad sa'i mthil gyi gzhal yas khang de sbyong bar byed par gyur te/ dri sna tshogs pa'i chus chag chag 'debs shing / dri sna tshogs pa'i phye mas byug
229a7(rgyud): par byed/ me tog sna tshogs btsal du 'grems shing / bdug pa sna tshogs kyis bdugs nas sa'i dkyil 'khor yang dag par rgyan par gyur to// de ltar rnam par 'phrul pa'i go skabs rgya chen po ni/ 
229a8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i khru mchog de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig byin gyis rlob pa'o// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes/ de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po/ 
229b1(rgyud): yangs pa rgya chen po mthong nas shin tu ya mtshan pa thob cing rmad du byung ba thob ste/ 'di ltar sems par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
229b2(rgyud): dbang phyug gi bstan pa ni shin tu ya mtshan no// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la slar
229b3(rgyud): yang gsol ba btab po// bcom ldan 'das skabs dbye bar mdzod cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ gnod sbyin gyi sde
229b4(rgyud): dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// lag nardo rje dogs pa gsal ba dang / the tshom gcod pa la rje su ga zung ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
229b5(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las lang / sa te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan
229b6(rgyud): 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas/ mig mi 'dzum zhing / bzhin rab tu 'dzum pa lus 'od zer 'bar bas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la don yod zhags/ 
229b7(rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / pad+ma yangs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / pad+ma gtsug tor gyi nor bu'i dkyil 'khor dang / don yod zhags pa'i gsang ba sgyu ma lta bu'i snying po dang phyag rgya dang / kun tu spyan
229b8(rgyud): ras gzigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i rim par phye ba mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das de dag bdag gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yongasu bsgrags par bgyi'o// sgrub pa bla zhing / bklags
230a1(rgyud): pas 'grub pa dam tshig mchog tu gyur pa'i snying po nye bar bstan par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas phyag gser gyi kha dog can/ 'od ze
230a2(rgyud): sna tshogs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gi yang dag par rgyan par brkyang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyi bo'i gtsug tu phyag 'jog
230a3(rgyud): par mdzad cing / sems can dag pa chen po leg so leg so// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug/ da lta de'i dus la bab par shes na smos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags
230a4(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bskul bar rig nas/ phyogs bcur kun tu bltas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas nas/ de
230a5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la kun tu bltas te/ rtsa ba'i/ gsang sngags don yod zhags pa'i pad+ma gtsug to/ ra gyi nor bu don yod zhags pa'i snying po gsungaso// don yod
230a6(rgyud): pa'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor du/ pad+ma gtsug tor gyi gsang ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dris pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dang po ni/ dus gsum du gshegs shing rab tu bzhugs pa'i de bzhin
230a7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor don yod pa gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar
230a8(rgyud): byung ba'i rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rigs kyi snying po'i dam tshig rnams la
230b1(rgyud): phyag 'tsha lo// yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshalo// yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tsha lo// blo gros chen po 'phags pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa byams
230b2(rgyud): pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i tshogs kyi mchog rnams phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
230b3(rgyud): rgyas 'phags pa 'od dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshalo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tsha lo// pad+mo'i gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor 'chang ba la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems
230b4(rgyud): dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thug/ sa rje chen po can la phyag 'tshalo// drang srong chen po/ 'phags pa'i tshogs kyi mchog rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 
230b5(rgyud): de rnams la phyag 'tshalo// rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'phegs pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal nas gsungs pa/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying
230b6(rgyud): po de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar gsungs pa 'di/ bdag gis da ltar 'khor chen po la bshad par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ oM pad+moSh+NI Sha pa ra da hUM/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsa ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma hA
230b7(rgyud): ru Ni ka/ tsi ri tsi ri/ pi ri pi ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ pa ra ma kA ru Ni ka/ si ri si ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ pi ri pi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ ma hA pad+ma sta/ ka la ka la/ ki l-i ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ ma hA shud d+ha satra/ e h+ye
230b8(rgyud): he/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ d+hU bad+hU ba/ ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni/ ku Nu ku Nu/ pa ra ma shud d+ha satwa/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ ma hA s+yA ma prAp+ta/ tsa la tsa la/ sany+tsa la/ bi tsa la/ eT Ta e Ta Ta/ d+ha/ 
231a1(rgyud): ra b+har/ b+hi d+ha / b+hu ru d+ha rba/ ma hA bi ma la/ paR+ShaSh+TA 'bir dza swa d+ha ya hA hA/ e h+yehaM/ ma hAka ru Ni ka/ mahA pa shu pa ti/ gai rad+ha ra/ d+ha rAd+hA ra/ mahA pad+moSh+NA Sha d+ha ra/ sa ras
231a2(rgyud): sarba A pa ra Na ha ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ sarba bid+yA d+ha ra na mas+sa ta/ ha ra ha ra sarbe kil+li Sha ha ra/ hA hA hA hAM/ hA hI hI hI/ hA hU hU hU/ oM kA ra brah+ma bai Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha ri d+ha ri/ d+hu ru d+hA r+ya/ ma hA pad+ma dz+wa la
231a3(rgyud): d+ha ra/ ta ra ta ra/ sa ra sa ra/ pa ra pa ra/ pad+ma pA sha d+ha ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ba ra rash+mi she ta sa ha sra/ pra ti maN+Do ta sha rI rA ya/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ta pa ta pa/ b+ha ga bAn so ma A di t+ya ya ma/ ba ruH
231a4(rgyud): ku be ra/ brah+ma/ in+na/ r-i Shi ga Na/ de ba ga Na ad+h+yaR+shi ta/ tsanaN/ su ru su ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ pu ru pu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ san ta ku mA ra/ ru tra/ bA sa ba/ biSh+Nu/ d+ha nang / de ba ri Shi/ nA sa
231a5(rgyud): ka/ bahu/ bi bi d+ha/ bai Sha d+ha ra/ ma hA pad+ma daN+Da d+ha ra/ pA shad+harAd+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ thar tha ra/ g+ha rag+h+ra ra/ ya ra ya ra/ la ra la ra/ ha ra he ra/ ba ra pa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ 
231a6(rgyud): tsa ra tsa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ma hA ba ra dA ya ka/ sa man+ta man+ta la/ a ba lo ki ta/ lo ka shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ mu hu mu hu/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ya mu ya/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ b+ha ga ban Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra/ rAH
231a7(rgyud): rak+Sha/ ma ma sarba b+ha ye b+h+yaHsarba b+ha ye b+h+yaHsarba u pa tra bo b+h+yaHsarba gra he b+h+yaHsarba dz+wa re b+h+yaHsarba byad+hib+h+yaHbad+d+ha ban d+ha na tA Da na tapA na/ ra dza/ tsau ra/ taska ra/ ag+ni/ u da ka/ bi Sha/ shas+t+ra/ par+ra
231a8(rgyud): mo tsa ka/ ka Na ka Na/ kiM Ni ki Ni/ ku tu kuN+Da/ tsa ra tsa ra/ oMn+di ya ba la/ bo d+h+ya ga/ tsa tu rAr+ya sat+ya/ sa pra kAM sha ka/ ta ma ta ma/ da ma dam/ sa ma sa ma/ sa ma sa ma/ ma hA ta mon+ta ka ri ba d+ha man/ 
231b1(rgyud): ShaT pA ri ma tA pa ri pU ra ka/ mi li mi li/ Ta Ta Ta Ta/ 'dza Sha dza/ Ti Ti Ta Te/ dzi dzi Shi Shi/ Tu Tu Tu D+ha/ dzu ru 'u dzu/ e ne ya tsarma kr-i ta pa ri ka ra e h+ye he/ I shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ pad+me shwa ra/ mahA b+hU taH/ 
231b2(rgyud): Na/ saM b+hany+dza ke/ ma hA sid+d+hi swa ra/ ku ru ku ru/ pa ra pa ra/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ma Ta ma Ta/ bi shud+d+ha bi Sha ya/ ni bA saM na/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ shwe ta yadz+nyo pa bI ta rata na ma ku Ta mA lA d+ha ra/ sarba dz+nyA shi ra si kr-i ta ma kuT/ 
231b3(rgyud): ma had+hA taHka ma lA la kr-i ta/ ka ra ta la/ d+hu nA sa mA d+hi/ bi mo k+Sha pra kam+ba/ bahu satwa san+ta ti/ pa ri pA tsa ka/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ sarba karma A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ka/ sarba bya d+hi pra mo tsa ka/ sarba A shA pa rip+pa/ 
231b4(rgyud): rakaHsarba satwa/ sa ma shA sa ka/ oM pad moSh+NI Sha bA sha hr-id ya maN+Da lan mostu te swA hA/ 'phags pa spyan ras gdags dbang phyug gis/ don yod zhags pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor
231b5(rgyud): gyi gsang ba'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs mtha gtu/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa gzhi cher g.yos par gyur te/ ri dang / nags
231b6(rgyud): dang / dgon par bcas pa rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g.yos par gyur to// kun nas sa'i mthil 'di yang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi pad+ma'i gdan/ kun nas bting bar gyur to// bcom
231b7(rgyud): ldan 'das phyag na pad+mo'i lte ba'i gnas na/ pad+mo chen po gyen du 'phags pa/ mdab ma stong pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin/ bai DUr+ya sngon po chen po'i sdong bu dang / 'dzam bu chu bo'i gsar gyi
231b8(rgyud): snying po dang / mu tig dmar po'i ze'u 'bru dang / lha'i mu tig chen po'i ge gsar dang cig tu 'bab par gyur pa 'od zer sna tshogs pa 'byin par byed pas te/ 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / 
232a1(rgyud): dmar po dang / dkar po dang / gcod dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog tu snang bzhin pas 'bar zhing / rnam par gsal la lhang nge'o// phyogs bcu kun tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing
232a2(rgyud): rnamasu kun tu snang bar byed do// lha'i gnas dang / klu'i gnas dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gnas dang / dri za'i gnas dang / lha ma yin gyi gnas dang / nam mkha' lding gi gnas dang / mi 'am
