232a3(rgyud): ci'i gnas dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas rnams kun tu snang bar byed do// rab tu tshim par byed do// yang dag par bskul bar byed do// yang dag par dbugs 'byin par byed do// dmyal ba chen
232a4(rgyud): po bcu drug po rnams kun tu snang zhing / reg pas dmyal ba chen po dede rnams kyang / pad+ma can chen por skyes par gyur to// // sems can dmyal ba de rnams kun kun nas snang zhing reg
232a5(rgyud): pa tsam gyis de rnams thams cad yongasu grol te/ bsams pa tsam gyis mod la bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi kham su pad+ma las brdzus te skyes shing / lha'i lus la rgyan dang
232a6(rgyud): lhab lhub dang / gos dang / bud pas rnam par rgyan cing / skye ba nas skye ba ru skye ba dran par skyes so// de bzhin du dud 'gre'i skye gnas su song ba rnams kun nas snang bas/ ri dgas dang / bya de dag thad
232a7(rgyud): kyang dud 'gro'i skye gnas las yongasu grol te/ mtho ris su rna rgyan dri ma med cing g.yo ba 'dzin par skyes so// de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu kun tu sems can thams cad kun tu snang zhing reg pa de rnams
232a8(rgyud): thams cad sa chen po brgyad pa la rab tu gnas par gyur to// des kyang 'khor chen por kun tu 'ongs pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshigs chen po de rnams thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par
232b1(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu phyir mi ldog pa nyid la rab tu bkod par gyur to// rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor gang yin pa thams cad kyang don yod pa pad+ma'i gtsug tor chen po'i snying po gsang ba don yod
232b2(rgyud): zhags pa'i dngos grub so sor thob par gyur to// klu'i rgyal po'i 'khor gang yin pa de thams cad kyang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan so sor snang bar gyur to// lha'i 'khor gang yin pa de
232b3(rgyud): rnams thams cad kyang 'od 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob bo// gnod sbyin dang srin po gang yin pa de rnams thams cad rin po che'i gzhal med khang du gnas par gyur to// 'byung po'i 'khor gang
232b4(rgyud): yin pa de rnams thams cad gzi brjid dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob par gyur to// lha ma yin gyi 'khor ba dang yin pa de rnams thams cad rdo rje'i go cha dang / rdo rje rgyag
232b5(rgyud): mtshan gyi ya lang bgod par gyur to// nam mkha' lding gi 'khor gang yin pa thams cad kyang rdo rje mchu rtse mo chen po'i stobs kyi shugs rjesu thob par gyur to// mi 'am ci
232b6(rgyud): dang / lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor gang yin pa thams cad kyang lus dang / ngag dang / yid yongasu dag par gyur to// dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / 
232b7(rgyud): bu mo gang yin pa de rnams thams cad skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal las yongasu grol bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang sku las nyi ma'i tog ces bya ba'i 'od zer
232b8(rgyud): chen po rnam par spros te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thugs khar rje su zhug so// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thugs
233a1(rgyud): khar zhugs ma thag tu/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje don yod zhags pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi gsang ba'i rnam
233a2(rgyud): par 'phrul pa la ltos shig/ lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mthong lag so// sems dpa' dag pa bdag gos mthong lag so// sems dpa' chen po dag pa
233a3(rgyud): 'di'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa pad+ma'i dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po// pad+ma gtsug tor gyi gsang ba'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor shin tu zab pa/ shin tu rgya che
233a4(rgyud): pa rmad du byung ba chen po/ dngos grub mchog sgrub par byed dpa ni/ bcom ldan 'das mtha' dag rgyas par gsungs shig/ gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / rig sngags
233a5(rgyud): dang / dkyil 'khor rmad du byung ba/ nye bar spyod pa'i tshig dang bcas pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi sdig pa rnam par 'joms pa'i don dang // rig sngags 'chang
233a6(rgyud): rnams kyi mchog 'grub pa'i don du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar gsungs shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
233a7(rgyud): phyug gis/ gnad sbyin gyi sded dpan chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// lag na rdo rje don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i mchog tu gsang ba gtsug tor thams cad kyi dkyil la
233a8(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyi don gyi ched du/ sdig pa thams cad nyams par byed pa sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong bar byed pa/ dri ma dang / rtog ma thams cad sel bar byed gnang zad
233b1(rgyud): tu zhi bar byed pa / bkra mi shis pa thams cad bzlog par byed pa/ sdig pa dang / ma rungs pa'i sems can phyir rgol ba dang / dgra'i 'jigs pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ bgegs dang / log sa
233b2(rgyud): 'dren pa thams cad char gcod par byed pa/ bdud la sogs pa'i me rungs pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa/ dug dang mtshon cha dang / me dang / chu'i 'jigs pa dang / mche ba'i dug pa
233b3(rgyud): seng ge dang rgyal po dang / gnod sbyin rnams ldog par byed pa/ dug dang byang stems dang / g.yeng byed dang / phye ma'i sbyor ba thams cad rnam par nyams par byed pa/ don yod zhags pa'i
233b4(rgyud): snying po de kho na nyid gces pa rmad du byung ba de kho na nyid kyi sgo po'i sgrub pa bla na med pa bklags pas grub pa 'di rjes zung zhig/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na
233b5(rgyud): rdo rje bzhin 'dzum cing / gdong khro gnyer dang bral bas bskor bar byed bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sa mas dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la
233b6(rgyud): 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das don yod zhags pa'o snying po dam par gyur pa gsang ba pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor de rnams du zhig lags pa de dag bcom ldan 'das
233b7(rgyud): kyis gsungs shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gsol ba btab
233b8(rgyud): par rig nas/ phyag g.yas pas lte ba'i pad+ma'i phyag rgya'i rnam pa la reg go// reg ma thag tu/ phyag g.yas pa'i pad+ma la/ snying po rig sngags de yang pad+ma'i steng du 'dug ste/ rang gi ngo
234a1(rgyud): gzhal med khang tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba don yod pa'i gzugs spyan gsum pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ rgyan thams cad kyi rnam par brgyan pa/ nor bu gser gyi cod pan
234a2(rgyud): can/ 'od dpag med kyi cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ ral pa'i cod pan pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyis bud pa/ zla ba phyed pas rnam par mdzes pa/ zhags pa 'chang ba/ pad+ma'i gtsug tor 'chang ba
234a3(rgyud): dang nor bu'i dbyug pa 'chang ba dang / rdo rje'i dbyug pa 'chang ba/ dkyil bkrung gis bzhugs pa/ 'od zer 'bar bas yang dag par rgyan pa/ gos rnam par bkra ba sna tshogs dang / 
234a4(rgyud): spyan nyi ma dang zla bas lhag par 'bar bas rnam par mdze/ sa pa/ pad+ma rnams kyi steng na mdzes bzhin pa/ de bzhi/ na gshegs pa thams cad thugs mnyes par byed pa
234a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi phyag bya bar 'os pa/ lha thams cad kyis mchod par 'os pa/ klu thams cad kyis rjesu gzung bar 'os pa/ drang srong thams cad
234a6(rgyud): kyis dga' bar 'os pa/ lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyis rje su 'gro bar 'os pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bla mar 'os pa mthong
234a7(rgyud): ste/ de lta bu'i snang ba rgya chen po/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ de kho na nyid gces pa'i snying por gyur pa'i snying po nye bar
234a8(rgyud): bstan no// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de mthong ba tsam gyi mong la/ snying po gsang ba/ don yod pa'i pad+ma dri ma med pa'i gtsug ton
234b1(rgyud): 'od zer 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob par gyur to// ting nge 'dzin so sor thob pa gang gis sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi nang du chud par gyur to// de rnams thams cad rab tu mgu ba'i
234b2(rgyud): yid kyis zhabs dag gi rjes la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ don yod zhags pA
234b3(rgyud): snying po'i gsang sngags 'di smras so// oM a mo gA pA sha hri da ya pad maSh+NI Sha ku mA ra be Sha d+ha ra/ pad+me shwa ra/ A be sha ya/ sarba a mo g+ha ku la sa ma ya hr-i da ya/ sarba sid+d+hi a mo g+ha pa yan+tu
234b4(rgyud): pad ma/ pad+ma hUM hUM na mo stu te swA hA// 'di ni don yod zhigs dpa'i snying po bklags pas grub pa'i sgrub thabs so// oM a mo g+ha pad+moSh+NI Sha shwa ra/ pad+me shwa ra/ sa man+ta ya sarba/ 
234b5(rgyud): ta thA ga tA nAM/ a mo g+ha pad+moSh+NI Sha sa ma ya A kaR+Sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ sarba karma sid+d+hi pra yats+tsha me a ba lo ki te shwa ra hUM hUM/ ma hA pad+moSh+Ti Sha b+hu dze swA hA// rigs kyi rgyal po'i
234b6(rgyud): gsang sngag so// oM ma hA tsaN+De pad+me sha ra bi bi d+ha rU pa/ bi ka Ta/ pad+ma daMSh+Ta ka rA la b+hI Sha Na/ bak+taM sarba duSh+Ta hr-i da ya/ khA da ya/ big+h+na/ pad+ma d+haM ka/ tsau Ti/ dr-i Ti hUM swA hA// khro bo'i rgyal po'i rigs
234b7(rgyud): kyi snying po'o// nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba'i las rnams so// oM a mo g+he pad+moSh+Ta ShaM pad+ma pA sha kro d+ha ka/ mA ya karma pra bi sha ya ma hA pA shu pa ti/ ya ma/ ba ru Na/ ku be ra/ brah+ma he/ 
234b8(rgyud): Sha d+ha ra/ ma hA tsat+ta be ga a mo g+ha ku la sa ma ya/ pad+me hUM hUM/ khro bo'i rgyal po don yang zhags pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po'o// de nas don yod pa'i snying po'i las rnams su 'gyur te/ 
235a1(rgyud): dran pa tsam gyi mong la/ dus gsum gying bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pas gcig tu mtshungs par 'gyur// che dpag med dang mnyam pa'i lus su 'gyur/ 
235a2(rgyud): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang / mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mtshungs shing mnyam pa nyid du 'gyuraro// mtshungs shing mnyam pa nyid kying bzhin gsheg
235a3(rgyud): pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mthong ngo // pad+ma'i phyag gi ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyi phyag gis 'jig rten dbang phyug dang mnyam pa nyid du 'gyu ro// pad+ma'i gtsug tor
235a4(rgyud): bcings pa nyid kyis spro ba'i gtsug tu mngon par dbang bsku dar na/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams ca// dkyi mngon par dbang bskur// pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyis
235a5(rgyud): don yod par dbang bskur ba gang yin pade/ pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po rgyas par gyur pa 'thob ste/ ting nge 'dzin pargya stong phrag dang / bla na med pa'i dpal 'thob bo// rigs kyi
235a6(rgyud): rgyal po'i gsang sngags rgyas par gyur pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor du/ rigs kyi rgyal po legs par grub par 'gyur te/ thams cad du rigs kyi rgyal po'i dngos grub bzang po
235a7(rgyud): rnams 'ong bar 'gyu ro// rigs kyi rgyal po'i gsang sngags kyi rgyal po dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po mchog gi dngos grub thams cad rab tu sbyin par byed do// pad+mo'i phyag gis rjesu 'jug
235a8(rgyud): cing don yod pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub ji lta ba bzhin du 'grub te/ bklags pas grub pa 'di la the tshom med do// pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rigs kyi dngos grub dang / pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil
235b1(rgyud): 'khor ram/ don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ bklags nas bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub ste/ rigs kyi rgyal po dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po gang yin pa de thams cad du dbang phyug
235b2(rgyud): tu 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi cho ga zhib mo dang / phyag rgyas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rigs thun mong pa thams cad du rgyal po'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas
235b3(rgyud): kyi zhing stong phrag rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag rnams dang / gang ga'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i zhing du rgyal por 'gyuraro// rigs kyi rig pas lha'i dbang phyug dang / lha'i
235b4(rgyud): tshogs rnams kyi dbang phyug tu 'gyu ro// rtag tu yang gnod nga sbyin rnams dang / srin po rnams su gyur pa dang / dri za rnam sa dang gnod sbyin rnams dang / srin po rnams kyi de bzhin
235b5(rgyud): nyid du thams cad du rgyal po dang / dbang phyug tu rtag tu 'a/ gyur te the tshom med do// na mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams dang / thams
235b6(rgyud): cad du ji srid byang chub la yang dag par gnas kyi bar du rig kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro// de nas khro bo'i rgyal po dran pa tsam dang drag po de yid la sems pa tsam gyi mod la/ 'phral du ri rab
235b7(rgyud): ltung bar byed cing / khor yug gi ri rnam par 'thor bar byed do// rgya ma tshotshe chen po kun nas dkrug cing / rgya mtsho chen po nye bar skye bar byed do// kun tu gsal bar byed do// klu'i gnas thad
235b8(rgyud): duHklu'i gnas 'bar bar yang byed do// bgegs dang log par 'dren pa thams cad kyi skad cig tsam gyis steng du bdug par byed do// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung ba dang / gza'
236a1(rgyud): dang brjed byed dang / mi bzang pa de rnams thams cad khro bo'i rgyal po dran pa tsam gyis 'jigs par 'gyu ro// khro ba'i rgyal po'i gsang ba pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi
236a2(rgyud): dam tshig la gnas pa dang / dkyil 'khor du phyag rgya gnas pa dang / gsang sngags kyi lha gzhan gang yin pa rnams kyis khro bo'i rgyal po dran pa tsam gyis de rnams thams cad rig sngags
236a3(rgyud): 'chang la skyabasu 'gro bar byed do// de rnams thams cad rje su 'brang bar 'gyur zhing gnas par byed do// 'ga' zhig gang du 'gro ba 'am/ 'dug pa de la dbang po dang / skabs gsum pa'i lha/ 
236a4(rgyud): dang tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po da dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / gzhon nu dang / sde
236a5(rgyud): dpon dang / de bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi dus rtag tu/ ga sngags 'chang gi rje su 'brang bar byed do// the chom med do// khros pa'i las rnams sam/ de bzhin du drag pa
236a6(rgyud): las rnams thams cad kyang hUM yig tsam gyis de la dngos grub mthong ngo // phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang sems can ma rungs pa shin tu mi bzad pa rnams dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang
236a7(rgyud): 'jigs pa dang rnam par 'gras pa'i skye ba dang / sdig pa de rnams thams cad hUM yig gis mchog tu gzir ba tsam gyis thal bar 'jig par 'gyur ro// sdang ba dang / ngan sems pa'i sen
236a8(rgyud): dang byas pa mi bzo ba dang / byas pa la 'khon pa thams cad drag po'i hUM yig bzlas pa tsam gyis skad cig la bsregs te/ dper na me yis phye ma leb bzhin no// las gzhan stong
236b1(rgyud): phrag rnams dang / las brgya stong phrag nyid bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub te/ dran pa tsam gyi mo la las thams cad 'grub bo// de nas don yod pa pad+ma'i gtsug tor dran pa tsam gyis bya ba
236b2(rgyud): thams cad ni gnyisu 'gyur te/ ji ltar gang cung zad yid la byed pas las byed do// dkyil 'khor ram/ gnas rnam pa gzhan thams cad du ji ltar yid la byed pa'i bya ba thams cad
236b3(rgyud): du byed do zhes so// 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// / bam po bco lnga pa// de nas gsang sngags la 'jug pa rnams kyi dgod
236b4(rgyud): pa thams cad so sor 'grub par 'gyur ba ni oM zhes bya ba don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi da dkyil 'khor thams cad du gsang sngags yi ge gcig pa'o// 
236b5(rgyud): 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar 'bum dran par byas nas dang po la gnas par 'gyu ro// sngon gyi sdig pa ba sogs pa sems can dmyal ba mi bzad pa gang ci yang rung
236b6(rgyud): bde dag thams cad ji ltar rlung gis phyag dar gtor ba bzhin 'jig par 'gyur/ dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyu ro// don thams cad rjes su 'jug par 'gyur/ de bzhin
236b7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad dang / gang dkyil 'khor gyi lha gzhan dag kyang dgyes par 'gyur la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mchog sbyin pa mdzad do// gsang sngags
236b8(rgyud): oM zhes bya ba dran nas che 'phos pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur// gsang sngags kyi yi ge gcig pa'o// oM hUM yi ge gnyis pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas
237a1(rgyud): gnyis pa 'thob par 'gyuro// de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas kyi spyan sngar 'jug par 'gyur zhing mchog thams cad rje su sbyin par mdzad/ sdig pa thams cad kyang rnam/ 
237a2(rgyud): par dag par mdzad/ sngon gyi nad kyis sos par 'gyur/ nor gyi dbang phyug nor bu bzang po'i bu dbang du 'gyur zhing nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// mi gang gis kyang phyir zhing bar chad byed rus par
237a3(rgyud): mi 'gyur/ tshe 'phos nas ri gru 'dzin du skye bar 'gyur/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyuraro// oM pad+me gsang sngags kyi yi ge gsum pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na sa gsu
237a4(rgyud): pa la yang dag par 'jug par 'gyur/ pad+ma yang ba'i dkyi/ del 'khor gyi phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags gang yin pa thams cad la zhugs par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ra/ 
237a5(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gzhon nu'i cha byad can mdun na bzhug/ sa par 'gyur zhing 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog rjesu sbyin par mdzad/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i pad+ma gtsug
237a6(rgyud): tor dkyil 'khor ston par mdzad/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams ston par mdzad/ thams cad du dngos grub rjesu sbyin par mdzad do// oM pad+ma hri/ 
237a7(rgyud): gsang sngags yi ge bzhi pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na sa bzhi pa la 'jug par 'gyur/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sku mdog gser gyi kha dog can mdun na bzhugs
237a8(rgyud): shing dpung pa brkyang nas phyag spyi bor 'jog par mdzad la rig sngags 'chang ba leg so// zhes bya ba rjesu sbyin par mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang tshur shog khyod kyi sdig pa dang sgrib pa zad
237b1(rgyud): yong su dag ste/ rang gang ba thams cad shin tu dri ma med par yongasu dag go ma'i 'jig rten 'di nas che 'phos nas nga'i sangs rgyas kyi nang du'ang zhing tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ phyir na/ 
237b2(rgyud): nam yang mngal na gnas pas gos par mi 'gyur/ 'jig rten pa dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyuraro// oM pad+ma b+hu dze/ gsang sngags yi ge lnga pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas lnga

237b5(rgyud): khyod dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed pas rig sngags 'tshang/ khyod che brjes na de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khwa ga khrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba mtshungs

237b7(rgyud): par phye ba grub cing rig sngags 'chang khyod sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad spangs kyis bya ba thams cad gyis shig/ yid la bya ba'i sgrub pa thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin de dag

238a1(rgyud): snang ba mdzad par 'gyur stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
238a2(rgyud): rgyas rnams gzigs shing mngon sum du ston pa mdzad/ dbugs 'byin par mdzad do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma gzigs

238a6(rgyud): thams cad du gnas kyi sgo rnams ni phye bas 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las sgrub pa rnams ji ltar yid la byas pa bzhin las thams cad byos shig/ oM pad+ma dz+wa la hUM d+hA//

238b6(rgyud): gtsug tor gyi snying po cho ga zhib mo dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa rnam par sprul pa grub kyis rig sngags 'chang nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du song la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gyis shig/ 
238b7(rgyud): oM a mo g+ha ma Ni pad+me/ gzungs sngags kyi snying po yi ge brgyad pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na lus shin tu yongasu dag tsang dri ma med par 'gyur/ bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis nor
238b8(rgyud): bu rin po che chen po shel ltar phyi nang shin tu yongasu dag ste/ de ltar rig sngags 'chang gi lus yongasu dag par 'gyur/ sa brgyad pa la gnas par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'

239b6(rgyud): gtsang sbra spyod pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ byams pa'i sems dang snying rje skyes pa/ bden par smra ba/ bla ma la gus pa/ dkon mchog gsum la dad pa che ba/ bla ma dang slob dpon la rtag
239b7(rgyud): tu mchod pa byed pa 'di ni bzlas brjod kyi cho ga yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bla na med par bstan to// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon lag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
239b8(rgyud): chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la rab tu 'dzum la lag na rdo rje skor bzhin du mgo btud nas smras pa/ sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi bzhi don yod
240a1(rgyud): pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor dkyil 'khor gyi snying po gsang ba chen po 'di ni shin tu rnyed par dka' ste/ gzungs sngags kyi snying po re re po 'di dag ni bzlas brjod tsam gyis
240a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur na/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang ches ngal zhing dub par bzlas brjod sgrub pa dang / cho ga rgyas par sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ nyin zhags

240a7(rgyud): cig yud tsam mam/ dus tshigs gcig gam/ dus tshogs gnyis sam/ dus tshogs gsum yongasu rdzogs par gzhan mi smra bar/ don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po khro
240a8(rgyud): bo'i rigs kyi gsang sngags rim par phye ba gzungs sngags chen po'i snying po bcu po 'di lan gcig dran nam/ klog gam ming gzung ba yang dran nam/ lag na rdo rje dus tshigs gcig tu dran pa
240b1(rgyud): tsam gyis kyang de'i mtshams med pa byed pa mnar med par gzhol ba/ bskal par gnas pa yang de yis thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur la/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa bsags pa rnams zad

240b6(rgyud): rtsa gnyisu nor bu dbang ba'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur/ bskal pa khri brgyad cur 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas ri gru 'dzin du bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ bskal pa
240b7(rgyud): stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur/ bskal pa 'bum phrag brgyad cur dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nang du bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ bskal pa 'bum phrag
240b8(rgyud): sum cu rtsa gsum gyi nang du brgya byin nyid byed par 'gyur/ bskal pa 'bum phrag lnga bcu rtsa gnyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam su 'jug par 'gyur/ bskal pa stong phrag N+DI/ 
241a1(rgyud): shur 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid la spyod par 'gyur te nams kyang mi'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur zhing gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba thams cad brdzus te skye bar
241a2(rgyud): 'gyur/ thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/ lag na rdo rje de ltar rig sngags lan cig dran pa tsam gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje gal
241a3(rgyud): te gang zhig zhag gcig gam/ lan gcig bsnyung ba la gnas te bzlas brjod dang bcas pa byed na lag na rdo rje de ni tshe 'di nyid la mi bdag nyid kyi ngo bo nyid sgrib pa dang bral nas don yod pa
241a4(rgyud): chen po dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo// don yo dad pa bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo// pad+ma gsal ba rna dam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo// don yod pa dri
241a5(rgyud): ma med pa snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo// don yod pa rnam par gzigs pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ti nga nge 'dzin 'thob bo// pad+ma gtsug tor mthar phyin pa'i

241a7(rgyud): gshegs pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur/ che brjes nas 'dzag rten gyi khams bde ba can du pad+ma dag
241a8(rgyud): la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo dang / don yod pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi cho ga mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang / phyag rgya dang bcas pa cho ga zhib mo
241b1(rgyud): mtha' dag rdzogs par kha ton du lobs par 'gyur zhing / don yod pa'i rig sngags 'chang 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyu ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'kho
241b2(rgyud): gyi snying po gsang sngags sgrub pa'i cho ga ste/ sgrub pa'i cho ga gnyis pa'o// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa
241b3(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das don yod pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bya ba'i cho ga dang sgrub pa'i cho ga
241b4(rgyud): bcas pa bshad par gsol/ bcom ldan 'das rig sngag des 'chang kun gyi 'grub pa/ bsam pa yongasu rdzogs pa/ dngos grub bsgrub pa'i cho ga de kho na bshad du gsol/ 
241b5(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phag sa pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// 
241b6(rgyud): lag na rdo rje bya ba'i cho ga dang / sgrub pa'i cho ga bshad par bya yis nyon cig/ lag na rdo rje gsang sngags rtsa ba don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po gsang ba 'di'i rig sngags
241b7(rgyud): 'chang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma lan cig tsam dran pa yid la byed pa yongasu dag pa'i bdag nyid snying rje chen
241b8(rgyud): po dang / byams pa dang ldan pa'i bsam pas sems can la dmigs pa'i sems can gang yang rung ba ngan song gsum du skye bar mi 'gyur te/ sems can dmyal ba'am/ dud 'gro'i
242a1(rgyud): skye gnas sam/ yi dgas kyi yul rnams kyi gnas de dag med de/ de ltar sems can thams cad sgrub pa dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// lan gnyis brjod pa
242a2(rgyud): tsam gyis nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// lan gsum brjod pa tsam gyis nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te/ dug dang / 'brum bu dang / 'bras dang / ldog pa dang / rkang shu dang / 
242a3(rgyud): mdze dang / g.yan pa la sogs pa thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur ro// lan bzhi brjod pa tsam gyis dbyig dug dang / byad thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro// lan lnga brjod pa tsam gyis
242a4(rgyud): 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa tham/ das cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// lan drug brjod pa tsadam gyis 'jig pa dang / gdon dang / rims thams cad
242a5(rgyud): 'jig par 'gyur ro// lan bdun brjod pa tsam gyis dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'jigs pa thams cad dang / sa mas can thams cad kyi nang dang / yams kyi nad thams
242a6(rgyud): cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyuraro// lag na rdo rje de lta bas na sems can thams cad kyi don du nyin re zhing gzhan mi smra bar lan bdun dran par bya'o// sems can gang la la sems can dmyal ba/ 
242a7(rgyud): gzhol ba shi ba dang / dge slong gang la la bslab pa'i sdom pa dang / tshul khrims kyi sdom pa ral pa dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon la gus par ma byas pa shi ba de'i don du bye ma gtsang ma
242a8(rgyud): blangs la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na/ dur khrod dam/ ro bsregs pa 'am/ 'chad par der bye ma gtor bar bya'o// gang dang gang na sems can gang dag gi rus pa yod sar bye ma
242b1(rgyud): gtor ma thag tu de dang der bye ma bab pa'i sems can dmyal ba'am/ yi dgas sam/ sha zar skyes pa'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po'i skye gnas skyes na de de'i mdo la che brjes nas thad
242b2(rgyud): mtho ri su gzhol bar 'gyur zhing nams kyang sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar mi 'gyur ro// yang na gro ga la bris nas mchod rten gyi nang du bcug pa'i gnas der rkang pa gnyis pa 'am/ 
242b3(rgyud): rkang pa bzhi pa gang dag nye bar 'ongs pa de dag thams cad grob ma phog pa tsam gyis sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag cing thams cad mtho ris su gzhol bar 'gyur ro// tha na
242b4(rgyud): ri dgas dang / bya dang / tha na ldang sgo ska dang / ne'u le dang / sde dag pa dang / sbrul dang / khyi dang / rus sbal dang / lag 'gro dang / dkyil 'khor de la grib ma bab pa tsam gyis thad
242b5(rgyud): kyi las sgrib pa rnams rnam par dag par 'gyur zhing de dag thams cad mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du gzhol b.ra' gyu ro// dung la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas gnas
242b6(rgyud): mthon por bus na sems can gang dag dung de'i sgra thos pa skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / ri dgas dang / bya dang / dud 'gro'i skyes gnas su gtogs pa de dag thams
242b7(rgyud): cad mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du gzhol bar 'gyuraro// gang dag tshul khrims yongasu dag pa dang / sems can gang dag sbyin pa la dga' ba dang / gang dag bsnyen gnas la nye bar gnas pa
242b8(rgyud): dang / gang dag skyabs gsum gzungs pa dang / gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pas bsdams pa de dag kyang dung gi sgra thos nas sems can de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par
243a1(rgyud): 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur la/ tshe brjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ tshe rabs nas tshe rabs
243a2(rgyud): dran par 'gyur ro// tsan dan la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba'am/ mchod rten gyi dkyil 'khor sa 'am/ dge 'dun gyi nang ngam/ skye bo mang po'i nang ngam// 
243a3(rgyud): rgyal bI pho brang du bdugs na/ gang dag der dri ma nams pa'i sems can de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sku yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chos gos la gdugs nas gang gi lus la gyon
243a4(rgyud): pa de'i sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'jig pa dar 'gyur ro// lus la bab pa tsam gyis dri ma dang / ser sna dang / skyon thams cad spangs par 'gyu ro// gos bcang / 
243a5(rgyud): pa tsam gyis 'jig rten thams cad dbang du 'gyu ro// bad gnyid kyis gos de gdugs nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na rgyal po btsun mo dang / 'khor dang bcas pa
243a6(rgyud): dbang du 'gyur/ mchod gnas chen por 'gyur/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla mar yang 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs na dge slong thams cad kyi mchod gnas chen
243a7(rgyud): por 'os par 'gyuraro// skye bo mang po'i nang du zhugs na nor chen por 'phel bar 'gyur zhing mchod pa chen po'i 'os su 'gyuraro// ri'i rtse mo nyi ma 'char ba'i khar bdugs nas gsang sngags
243a8(rgyud): rtsa ba lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na mong la nyi ma 'bab par 'gyur zhing 'dod pa mchog kun rjesu sbyin par byed do// gu gul dang bsres nas lha chen po'i mdun du bdug par bya zhing gas
243b1(rgyud): sngags rtsa ba lan bdun bya ba byas nas modado nyid la lha chen po 'bab par 'gyur zhing rigs sngags 'chang gi mdun du 'dug nas bsams pa thams cad yongasu skor bar byed do// bol
243b2(rgyud): dang tsan dan dang / gu gul bsres nas sred med kyi bu'i mdun du 'dug par bya zhing gsang sngags rtsabs lan nyi shu rtsa gcig lus kyi yan lag la byab pa byas na sred med kyi bu rang gi
243b3(rgyud): gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing 'dod pa mchog kun rjes su byin par byed la/ dngos po sna tshogs kyang sbyin par byed do// yungs kar dang bsres nas tshangs pa la 'dug cing gsang sngags
243b4(rgyud): rtsa ba lan bcu bzhi bya ba pa byas na/ tshangs pa rang gzugs dkyis mdun na 'dug la mchog thams cad sbyin par bye dad do// pad+ma'i phye ma dang bsres nas nag po chen po dang / mi
243b5(rgyud): mo'i tshogs la 'dugs na nag po chen po dang / ma mo'i tshe gas 'khor dang bcas pa rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing mchog dang / bya ba sgrub pa thams cad sbyin
243b6(rgyud): par byed do// na ga puSh+pa dang / sbrul gyi shun pa dang / bsres pa'i bdug pa klu'i mtshor bdug cing gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bdun yungs kar la bzlas brjod nas klu'i mtshor gtor la/ 
243b7(rgyud): don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i mdo lan cig brjod cing dran par byas na klu dang / klu mo dang / klu'i bu pho dang / klu'i bu mo thams cad gnas kun nas byung nas rig sngags 'chang gi rkang
243b8(rgyud): pa gnyis la 'dud cing gang bsgo ba de dag thams cad byed la 'dod pa thams cad sbyin zhing dbang du 'gyuraro// lan gsum sbyar na klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho yang 'ong ngo // klu'i rgyal po dga'
244a1(rgyud): bo dang / nye dga' bo yang 'ong zhing thams cad bsgo ba bzhin byed la dbang du gyur nas 'dug go// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dgug par 'dod pas dur khrod kyi nang du mi ro bsregs
244a2(rgyud): pa'i sol bas bdug la/ gsang sngags rtsa ba gsang mthen pos lan bdun brjod cing dran na gnod sbyin dang srin po dag rgyug cing 'ong la/ rig sngags 'chang gi rkang pa gnyis la btud
244a3(rgyud): nas/ rje btsan bka' stsol gcig ces zer ba dang / de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gis de bsgo ba ji lta ba bzhin du byas na bsgo ba thams cad la byed mngag pa'i las byed par 'gyur zhing
244a4(rgyud): ji srid 'tshe'i bar du 'dug go// thod pa sbyar la lan bdun pa zlas brjod byas nas thod pa bkang ba'i bdug pas ba dadugs na 'byung po thams cad kun nas 'ong zhing thams
244a5(rgyud): cad dbang du 'gyur la/ las byed par 'gyu ro// gnod sbyin mo dbab par 'dod pas btsag gis gnod sbyin mo dra sa la/ ba lang gi lci ba'i dkyil 'khor byas par phyes pad+ma
244a6(rgyud): ri mo bri zhing phye'i gtor ma lta bur byas pa bzhag la bdug pa 'dis bdug cing / gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas gnod sbyin
244a7(rgyud): mo la brdeg pa byas na gnod sbyin mo rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du 'dug cing / lha'i 'jig rten gyi bar du 'gro la slar yang 'ong ste/ don gsang ba thams cad bsgo ba tsam gyis byed par
244a8(rgyud): 'gyur ro// yang nam 'am chung ma'am/ sring mo yin no zhes smra bar bya ste/ gal te mar byas na bu la sdug pa long spyod dang / gzhal med khang thams cad kyis nang du 'jug la rgyal po'i bu bzhin
244b1(rgyud): yongasu skyong bar byed do// gal te sring mor byas na rnam thos la 'gran par 'gyu ro// gal te chung mar byas na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi bdag po ltar dga' ba'i longs spyod dag la rtser 'jug par byed do// 
244b2(rgyud): lha mo dpal la bdug la/ gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bdun bzlas brjod bya zhing lha mo dpal gyi mgo la byugs na lha mo chen mo dpal rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing / nor gyi phung
244b3(rgyud): po chen po 'bul bar byed de/ nam 'tshe'i bar du khyim na 'dug cing nor chen po nyid 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rnam thos kyi bu la bdugs na gser srang stong sbyin par byed do// nor bu bzang po'i bu
244b4(rgyud): la bdugs na gser dong che stong sbyin par byed do// tshal ga daseb du bdugs na tshal na gnas pa'i lha rang gi gzug das kyis mdun na 'dug cing rjes dang / sman thams cad
244b5(rgyud): rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug go/ ri rnams la bdug sa na rtsa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang rdzas thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ro// grong khyer bzhi'i sgo rnamasu bdug
244b6(rgyud): na grong khyer kun tu yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'gro ba dang / nad thams cad dang / 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyu ro// 'brog tu
244b7(rgyud): bdugs na rkun mo dang / g.yon can dang kaganod byed dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / sbrul dang / dred dang / dom gyi 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing ri dgas gtum po'i 'jig
244b8(rgyud): pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyuraro// rims thams cad la bdugs na rims thams cad las thar par 'gyuraro// sdig pa thams cad 'gegs pa tsan dan gyi bdug pa sgrub pa'i cho ga ste
245a1(rgyud): gsum pa'o// // de nas thig le yang dag par bshad par bya ste/ rigs kyi rgyal po'i gsang sngags sgrub pa ni nyi ma'i gzi brjid dang mtshungs shing skar ma'i rnam pa
245a2(rgyud): ltar 'bar ba yin te/ gzi brjid kyi rgyal po de gnyis kyis 'bar bar 'gyur ba ni bsod nams kyi phung po rnam par 'phe lo// lha rnams kyi nang na lha dbang po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug
245a3(rgyud): dang / dbang phyug chen po dang bcas pas rtag tu mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur zhing rig sngags 'chang gis the tsom mi bya'o// dpral ba'i steng du thig le byed pa ni rtag tu mdzes pa yin te/ nyi ma
245a4(rgyud): ltar 'od zer gyi dra ba stong gis gsal shing shel ltar dag pa mdog dkar ba dri zhim pa dang / glang po che'i bya la da dang / dpral ba dang / ba lang gi gnas ltar skyon med cing mnyam
245a5(rgyud): par 'thun la shin tu dul ba/ ded dpon gcig pu'i nor bu ra gyur cing gsang sngags 'bum bzlas pas legs par sgrub pa/ gser dang / gos ltar kun tu 'bar ba ni thig
245a6(rgyud): le yin no// smin mtshams kyi bar dpral ba na shin tu phra ba rtag tu rtag par mdzes pa ni zla ba nya ba mkha' la 'gro ba lta bu yin la/ skye bo'i dbus na gsal ba ni rgyu skar gyi rgyal po zla ba
245a7(rgyud): dbus na gnas pa bzhin rang gi 'khor gyi dbus na lha rnams kyi rgyal po dbang po brgya byin lta bu yin la/ skye bo'i dbus na ni 'jig rten gyi rgyal po bdugs gcig pa ltar 'bar ba yin// 
245a8(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi nang na gdugs gcig pa bde bar gshegs pa ltar shin tu dul ba yin la shAkya'i rigs kyi brgyud ltar sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa de bzhin du nor bu mchog
245b1(rgyud): rnam par dag pa ni sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa yin no// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ji ltar 'jig rten dbang phyug cig pu ltar mchog dang / rab mchog sems can thang
245b2(rgyud): kyi don du sbyin par byed de de ltar thig le nor bu'i mthu ni 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin par byed do// lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur zhing / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi bdag po
245b3(rgyud): dbang po dbang du 'gyur bar rje su 'gro ba dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po 'dod par gyur pa thams cad kyang dbang du 'gyur ba ni nam mkha' la
245b4(rgyud): skar ma ltar dpral bar rtag tu dbang du gyur pa yin te/ saM dmas can thams cad kyi mgo bos rkang pa'i drung du rtag tu 'dud la me yis mi 'tshig/ chu yis me khyer zhing lus la
245b5(rgyud): dug dang / sbyar ba'i dug dang / phye ma'i dug dang / byad mi bza da pa dang / ngan sngags dang / sdang ba'i rnam pas mi chug sa par 'gyur te/ nor bu lta bu'i mthus de dag thams cad
245b6(rgyud): kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// rims dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / nad dang / rlung dang / klad nad chen po la thig le byas pa lta bur mod la de dag thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ sems can
245b7(rgyud): btson du bzung ba 'am/ chad pas bcas pa'am/ bcings par 'os pa la thig le lta bu byas pas de dag thams cad las thar par 'gyuraro// smin mtshams dpral bar thig le lta bu byas
245b8(rgyud): na de'i mang la gnod sbyin stong dang / srin po drag po'i gzugs can gdon brgya stong rnams lus la 'jug par mi 'gyur zhing glang po che dang / ri dgas kyi bdag po'i khru dang / chom rkun dang / shod
246a1(rgyud): kyi lam dang / ri'i lam dang / ri sul dang / ngam grog dang / glog dang / glang dang / sbrul dang / sdang 'jigs kyi 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyuraro// thig le lta bu'i mthus
246a2(rgyud): dgra'i snga stong snyed kyi nang na 'gyed pa las myur ba nyid du rgyal bar 'gyur/ g.yul dang / 'thab mo dang / tha snyad mod nyid la zhi bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe nor bu gtsug gi spyi bor btags pa gang
246a3(rgyud): yin pa dang / thig le yang byas nas 'khor lo la byugs la pha rol gyi dmag tshegs g.yul gyi nang du zhugs na bdag nyid gcig pus dpung tshogs yan lan bzhi pa las rgyal ba
246a4(rgyud): 'gyur/ 'dis thams cad du zhugs pa tsam gyis pham pa/ byas par 'gyur zhing phyogs bcur 'bros la thams/ cad 'jigs par 'gyuraro// thig le byas nas rgyal po'i
246a5(rgyud): po brang du zhugs na rgyal po dang / btsun mo dang / 'khor dang ba ces pa dbang du gyur nas nye bar 'khod ngo // ji srid la tshe'i bar du mchod gan su 'gyuraro// dpung pa g.yas par
246a6(rgyud): nor bu btags la yan lag dang / yan lag dag tu thig le byas na thams cad du rgyal ba 'thob cing reg pa tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur la/ don gang dang gang bsgrubs pa de dang de thams cad
246a7(rgyud): 'thob par 'gyuraro// ril bu dag ni khar bcug nas// lhan cig 'dug la smras na ni// thams cad dbang du 'ong bar 'gyur// rgyal po dang ni btsun mo 'am// dge sbyong dang ni bram ze dang // rgyal
246a8(rgyud): rigs dang ni dmang rigs nyid// skyes pa dang ni bud med nga / khye'u dang bu mo rnams kyang rung // de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur// kun tu mngag pa'i las rnams byed// ril bu zos pa tsam
246b1(rgyud): gyis ni// nang rnams thams cad rnam par 'jig/ gang gi nyin bzhi pa yi rims// gang dag khong skom nad kyis nyams// gang zhig rtag pa'i rims kyis btab// gang du 'thab mo 'byung ba dang
246b2(rgyud): de bzhin skye bo sdang sems can bdag la grib gnon gzhan grib gnon/ skem byed skem pa brjed byed dang / gang zhig gdon gzhan mi bzad pa/ sdig pa'i las ni kun tu spyod/ sngon gyi
246b3(rgyud): las ni mi bzad pa/ de kun skad cig tsam gyis 'jig/ ril bus khrus byas tsam gyis ni/ 'bras dang shu bar gyur rnams dang / lhog pa dang ni rkang shu dang / mtshan par rdol dang me dpal
246b4(rgyud): dang / khyi jo mdze dang rkang pa'i nad/ mi bzang de rnams kun dang rang ni// gang dag nor rgyas sdang bas zin// byugs pa tsam gyis mod la ni// thams cad dug med zhi bar 'gyur// 
246b5(rgyud): ril bu thams cad las byed pa// lha rdzas shi ba sos pa/ ra byed// ril bu dag ni 'chang byed cing // thig le dag ni byas pa yis// thams cad du ni mchod pa 'thob// 
246b6(rgyud): thams cad du ni nor dag 'du// dpal 'dod pa ni dpal 'thob cing // 'bru 'dod 'bru'i phung po 'phel// lha rnams dag ni dga' 'gyur zhing // klu rnams kyang ni dga' dang bcas// gnod
246b7(rgyud): sbyin srin po dri za dang // lha min mkha' lding mi 'am ci// lto 'phye chen po thams cad dang // 'byung po rnams kyang dga' dang bcas// rtag tu phyag bya'i gnas 'gyur zhing // thams cad dbang
246b8(rgyud): du gyur nas 'khod// 'khod kun bran byed ci bya zer// gang zhig ril bu de dag bsten// ril bu thig le rtag byed la// de bzhin gshegs kun dgongs pa mdzad// 'phags pa spyan ras
247a1(rgyud): gzigs kyi dbang de nyid rig la rtag tu ni/ mchog sbyin dus kun gzigs par mdzad// bsod nams phung po stong dag ni// nyi ma re re bsogs par byed// 'jig rten
247a2(rgyud): pa yi bde spyad cing // 'jig rten pha rol shin tu bde// tshe rje ba ni 'phos nas su// bde ba can du modo la 'gro/ gang dang gang du skye bar ni// tshe rabs rtag tu tshe rabs dran// lag na rdo rje gnod
247a3(rgyud): sbyin che// gnod sbyin bye bas yongs bskor cing // g.yel ba med par nyin mtshan du// dus kun tu ni srung ba dang // skyob dang spring dang srung bar byed// gang zhig bu ni med pa dang // bud med bu ni
247a4(rgyud): 'dod pa la// ril bu gcig cig sbyar nas su// mnyam pa ngar gzhag pas gsang sngags ni// mkhas pas zla ba yar gyi ngor// 'bum ni tshang par bzlas nas su// zla ba nyaste
247a5(rgyud): bco lnga la// skyes babud med khrus bya zhing // yan lag yan lag thig le bya// dkon mchog gsum ni leg sa mchod cing // bram ze dag kyang mchod ston byed// srung
247a6(rgyud): ba'i cho ga byas nas su// gtor ma dkar gsum mang po bsham// bdag nyid rgyan gyis brgyan nas su// gos gtsang rnams ni bgo bar bya// byams pa'i sems la yang dag gnas
247a7(rgyud): snying rje sems can sdug par byed// bsam pa dag cing nges pa dang // bla ma rtag tu gus par bya// me tog sna tshogs rab dgang zhing // spos dang byug pa sna tshogs dang // du rus can dan
247a8(rgyud): sal kaM/ lha yi 'dug pas bdug bya zhing // bur ma 'o ma bdun dang na// ril bu lags sbyar baba' bar bya// gsang ba'adi mthungs mdal ni// btung dang kha zas bza' bar bya// mgon
247b1(rgyud): bopo spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang // mchog sbyin mdzad par mchod par bya// byams mdzad de yi zhabs drung du// mtshan mo nyal dang nang par ni// mthong ba mchog 'di thob par 'gyur// 
247b2(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang // mchog sbyin rang gzugs ston mdzad cing // mchog nyid dam pa sbyin par mdzad// bud med de ni bu bskyed cing // gzugs bzang mchog tu
247b3(rgyud): bstan sdug/ stobs ldan gzugs ni phun sum tshogs// lha yi dpal gyi rjes su 'gro// chos ldan mkhas shing gsal ba dang // tshe ring dbang phyug tshad med 'gyur// dpa' bo dag las
247b4(rgyud): rgyal ba dang // sdang ba thams cad 'joms par 'gyur// yang na dran pa'i blo bskyed par 'dod pas thos pa la ga rten nas 'dug cing // rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma zhag
247b5(rgyud): bdun du nyin re zhing mar dang 'o ma bskol ba der ril bu bdu na bcug ste/ zan ma zos pa'i sngon rol du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas nas 'jam tsam pa 'thungs la/ 
247b6(rgyud): phyis kha zas bza' bar bya// zhag bdun gyis thos pa'i rgya mtsho chen po bsags par 'gyur te bstan bcos thams cad dang / chos lugs dang / 'dul ba dang / snyan dang / brda' spyod
247b7(rgyud): pa dang / mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs kyi bsnyad pa'i sde dang / tshog su bcad pa'i sde dang / gleng bzhi'i sde dang / ched du brjod pa'i sde dang / de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang / skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang / chos
247b8(rgyud): mngon pa dang / rtsis dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya thams cad dang / theg pa chen po thams cad kha ton tu lobs par 'gyur// zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu sbyar ba
248a1(rgyud): byas na stobs chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol gnon par 'gyur te/ glang po che khri stob su 'gyuraro// zla ba gcig tsam sbyar ba byas na lo lnga brgyar 'tsha zhing gnyer ma dang / skra
248a2(rgyud): dkar spangs la skra cang le 'khyil shing 'khyil bar 'gyur ba dang / lus kyi mdog dkar sham lta bur 'gyur/ lo gcig tu sbyar na lha'i sman bcud kyis len mchog la 'jug cig nam
248a3(rgyud): mkha'i stang du lha rnams dang lhan cig 'thun par 'gyur la/ brgya byin dang yang lhan cig 'gran par 'gyur/ lha rnams kyi lha me'i tshogs dang / lha'i gzhal med khang na rtse zhing dga' bar
248a4(rgyud): byed la rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang gi gnas na gnas par 'gyur/ nyi ma lta bur 'od gtong zhing rgyu la gnas pa bzang po rnams kyis 'gro bar byed// gzi brjid
248a5(rgyud): shin tu gsal ba mi bzod cing rnam par dag par 'gyur// zhes bya ba la the tshom mi bya'o// las thams cad sgrub pa'i thig le dang / ril bu sgrub pa'i cho ga bzhi pa'o// 
248a6(rgyud): de nas mi snang bar bya ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba sman gyi mchog don yod pa'i mthus grub pa bshad par bya ste/ rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyi grub pa'i mchog de kho na nyid yin no// sman
248a7(rgyud): dngul chu dang / brah+ma kI ra dang / su bar+Na kI ra dang / shal sngo sangs dang / ku k+Shi dang / su gan d+hi dang / ki kuSh+ma skyon med pa dang / ud pa la bzang po dang / pad+ma k+Sha dang / gu gul dang / pe lu pa
248a8(rgyud): tatra dang / gur gum dang / nA ga puSh+pa dang bcas pa dang / spang spos dang / shi ri Sha'i me tog dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / bcas pa bsres nas zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma la don yod
248b1(rgyud): pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi bsang ba'i rigs kyi rgyal po'i sngags kyis shin tu brtson par lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod bya zhing khro bo'i gsang sngags lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas pas
248b2(rgyud): lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dbang bskur la/ yi ge gcig pa la lan 'bum bzlas brjod bya/ de'i tshe gsang sngags bcu po so sor lan nyi shu rtsa re re bzlas brjod bya ste/ gsang sngags thams
248b3(rgyud): cad rdzogs par bzlas brjod byas nas sman don yod par rgya che ba gsal ba zhes bya ba sman gyi mchog/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du bzhag
248b4(rgyud): la grib ma la bskam par bya'o// yang don yod pa'i zhags dpa'i gtsug tor gyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas snod gtsang ma'i nang du bcug la nam dgos pa
248b5(rgyud): byung ba de'i tshe thams cad du sgrub pa'i dgos pa thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma ra gyur pas lus legs par khrus byas la spos chus
248b6(rgyud): thugs te/ gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya/ sman gyi mchog 'di yungs mar gyis sbrus la rang gi lus la byugs par bya ste/ lan gcig bskus pa tsam gyis mi snang bar 'gyur la/ gnas
248b7(rgyud): gsang bar bya ba'i sgo bcad pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ gnas thams cad du ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'jug par 'gyur/ don thams cad byed par 'gyur/ 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / 
248b8(rgyud): srin po dang / sha za la sogs pa'i gtso bo rgyal por 'gyur zhing de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/ ci bgyi zhes bya ba byed la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas nas lus bya ba'i dges patha
249a1(rgyud): kyi rje su 'jug par 'gyuro// klu'i gnas kyi sgo bcad pa thams cad na 'jug la kru khor dang bcas pa thams cad mdun dur khong nas bya ba thams cad la ci bgyi zhes bya ba
249a2(rgyud): byed par 'gyur zhing las su bya ba dang dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar 'khod cing nyin mtshan du gnas la de nas klu thams cad bsgo ba bzhin byed par
249a3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// sman la si ha dzi hra dang / ba'i 'o ma dang sbyar bas mgo kun byugs na ji lta ba yid la byas pa dang / rang gi blos 'dod pa'i ngo bo sna tshogs ston par byed/ gnasu gtogs pa zad
249a4(rgyud): ji ltar 'dug pa bzhin ston par byed/ gnas su gtogs da pa thams cad 'khor gyi nang na ji ltar rnam par sprul pa/ de'i gzugs sna tshogs ston par byed/ ji srid 'tshe'i bar
249a5(rgyud): du 'phel ba rnams ston par byed cing bya ba thams cad byed do// spos kyi til mar dang sbrus nas byin pa dang / rkang pa la bskus na na mkha' la 'phags par 'gyur zhing / 
249a6(rgyud): nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur la gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur/ chu'i steng du 'gro zhing nams kyang phyir sa la rkang pa 'jog par mi 'gyur/ lag pa g.yas pa la skus na gang dang
249a7(rgyud): gang la lag pa reg pa de 'ong bar 'gyur la sus kyang mthong bar mi 'gyur/ bud med gzhon nu'i 'o ma dang bsres nas mig la bskus nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na mthong bar mi
249a8(rgyud): 'gyur zhing / don 'dod pa gang yin pa byed do// don gyi rdzas gang yin pa blangs kyang sus kyang mi mthong ngo // bud med gang dang phrad na sus kyang mi mthong la ji srid 'tshe'i bar du 'dug kyang
249b1(rgyud): sus kyang mi shes so// khar thugs nas gang dang gang na bro gar byed pa dang / bzhad gang byed pa nyid kyi nang du zhugs na bya ba thams cad byed la lus ni sus kyang mi mthong ngo // bum pa la thug
249b2(rgyud): nas chus bkang na chu'i rgyun snang la bum pa de ni mi mngon/ gzhong pa chus bkang ba de'i dbus su byugs na chu de gang bar snang la bum pa de ni mi snang ngo // bdag nyid la byugs nas bum
249b3(rgyud): pa chus bkang ba lag na thogs na bum pa las chu 'byung ba ni snang la mi de'i lus ni mi snang ngo // mig la bskus nas skye bo mang po'i nang du zhugs na mi mthong bar 'gyur la/ de'i sgra ni
249b4(rgyud): thos shing rang gi lus ni mi mngon no// gnas su gtog das pa thams cad du zhugs na rang gi lus khrus ma byas kyi bar du mi mthong ngo // su yang rung ba'i mig la bskus
249b5(rgyud): la lus la yang bskus na de dag thams cad mi mthong ba ra 'gyur zhing / gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der mi sna/ nga bar 'gyur la khrus byas pa tsam gyis phyir snang bar
249b6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// lus kun la bskus nas/ mdzod chen po'i nang du zhugs na mi mthong bar 'gyur la gser dang / dngul dang / 'phra men dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / byi ru dang / dung dang / 
249b7(rgyud): man shel dang / rdo rje dang / bai DUr+ya dang / margad dang / mthon kha dang / gos dang / sdud pa dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub gang yang rung ba nyid 'dod na thams cad blangs nas song na sus
249b8(rgyud): kyang mi mthong la gar dga' bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ji srid du khrus ma byas pa de srid du rang mi mngon la/ khrus byas na thams cad du mthong ngo // rig sngags 'chang bud med kyi nang du
250a1(rgyud): 'jug par 'dod pa gtsang mar khrus bya'o// de nas spos chus khrus bya'o// de'i 'og tu btsang gi khrus bya'o// yang gur gum gyis khrus bya'o// de'i 'og tu ba'i rnam lngas
250a2(rgyud): khrus bya'o// de'i 'og tu ba'i til mar dang / lhan gcig bsres pa des lus bsku bar bya'o// de'i 'og tu bud med gzhon nu'i zho dang sbyar bas mig la bskus la de nas ril bu gsum
250a3(rgyud): dpung pa g.yas pa la gdag par bya'o// de nas gos gtsang ma bges nas gsang sngags brjod cing dran par byas la rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na mi mthong bar 'gyur te/ lus sus
250a4(rgyud): kyang mi mthong ngo // nyi ma gcig gam/ nyi ma gnyis sam/ nyi ma bdun nam/ nyi ma bcu bzhi 'am/ nyi ma nyi shu rtsagacig tu khrus byas la bud med de dag gi nang na rtse zhing
250a5(rgyud): dga' bar byed la/ yongasu spyod par byed kyang sus kyangami shes la 'jug cing phyir 'gro ba na sus kyang glag sa mi rnyed de/ ji srid du khrus ma byas pa'i bar du rang gis
250a6(rgyud): lus mi snang bar 'gyur ro// phug tu 'jug na lus kun spos kyi til mar gyis byugs la phug tu zhugs na phug gi sgo thams cad phye bar 'gyur gyis/ gnas de'i nang du zhugs la ji
250a7(rgyud): lta ji ltar las su bya ba de lta de ltar gyis shig chu'i nang du zhugs na ji ltar khyim gyi nang na 'dug pa bzhin chus mi rlan la/ chus gos par yang mi 'gyur ro// me'i nang du zhugs
250a8(rgyud): na mes lus la me reg cing tsan dan ltar bsil bar 'gyur// klu'i gnas mtshor zhugs nas 'khod pa rnams kyis de mi mthong gis ji ltar rang gis yid la las su bya bar 'dod
250b1(rgyud): pa'i las kyi rnam pa gzhan dag kyang gyis shig/ mi snang bar bya ba ril bu'i sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// 
250b2(rgyud): bam po bcu drug pa// de nas sbyin sreg gi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ las thams cad kyi don sgrub par byed pa/ dngos grub thams cad byed pa'i gnas/ sdig pa thams cad 'phrog pa/ de
250b3(rgyud): bzhin du sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa/ rig sngags thams cad kyi dngos grub bla na med pa/ gnod sbyin thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ sdig pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa/ 
250b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi legs par rgyal ba sbyin pa/ dgra thams cad bzlog par byed pa/ 'thab pa dang / rtso/ dad pa nyid dang / 'gyed pa dang / mtshon cha'i dra ba thams cad/ 
250b5(rgyud): las sgrol bar byed pa/ grub pa don yod pa mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad du gsang sngags dang dkyil 'khor gyi
250b6(rgyud): dngos grub/ phyag rgya 'pho ba dang / de kho na nyid kyi rim par phye ba'i sgrub pa las thams cad du mchog gi dngos grub kyang 'grub te 'di la the tsom med do// bde ba thams cad rtag tu rab tu
250b7(rgyud): sbyin pa dang / dbang phyug ma yin pa thams cad kyi sgrub pa dang 'gugs pa dang / lha dang / klu thams cad sman 'dren pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dang
250b8(rgyud): bdud dang / 'byung ba dang / sha za dang / gdon mi bzad pa dang / brjed byed mi bzad pa dang / tshangs pa'i srin po rnams thams cad thams cad du sgrol bar byed par grub pa dang / nyin
251a1(rgyud): mo dang mtshan mo'i dus rtag tu tshar gcod par the tsom med do// rims thams cad rtag tu rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ nad thams cad ldog par byed pa/ dug thams cad
251a2(rgyud): gsod par byed pa/ 'phral du sregs blugs byin pa tsam gyis thams cad du rtag tu gnang chen po dang / thams cad du thams cad du mthong na dga' ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla
251a3(rgyud): mar mchod par bya ba dang / thams cad du stobs dang brtson 'grus dang pha rol gnon pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu mthong ba yang sbyin par 'gyur te 'di la the tsom med do// byang
251a4(rgyud): chub sems dpa' rtag tu kun tu snang ba dang / dus thamasacad kyi tshe las thams cad la shin tu dga' ba dang // skye ba nas skye bar tshig btsun par 'gyu ro// thams cad
251a5(rgyud): du bla ma la srid zhu che ba dang / thams cad du mchod par 'os pa'i bla ma'o// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pas rtag/ tu yang srung ba dang / yongs su skyong bar byed pa dang / rgyal
251a6(rgyud): po chen po bzhi dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha nyid kyis kyang / dus rtag tu srung ba dang / skyab pa dang / sba bar byed par the tsom med do// dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i bu stong / 
251a7(rgyud): phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che ba rnams kyis srung ba dang / skyabs pa dang / sba bar byed cing / rtag tu legs par khor los bsgyur bar gnas par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa dang / 
251a8(rgyud): khyad 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / drag po dang / gzhon nu dang / nor bu bzang po dang / stobs kyi lha dang / gang pa bzang po dang / lnga rtsen dang / gar mkhan mchog te 'di rnams
251b1(rgyud): kyis rtag tu srung ba dang / sgrub par byed cing gnas te 'di la the tshom med do// me'i lha gzi brjid chen po dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / rgyu skar gyi lha rnams kyis srung ba dang / skyab pa dang / sba
251b2(rgyud): bar byed cing / mchog tu mchod pa byed pas gnas par 'gyuraro// sbyin sreg tsam 'di ni/ bya ba thams cad bla na med pa'i dngos grub rnams la'o// 'bras thug po che dang / yungs kar dang / 
251b3(rgyud): gu gul dang / mar dang sbrang rtsi bsres pas sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis thams cad mchog sbyin par 'gyur te/ bya ba thams cad
251b4(rgyud): sgrub par byed par 'gyur// tsan dan dang / pad+ma'i chu ba dang / 2bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / a ga ru dang / zho da dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar bsres pas/ sa mI'i shing gi zhi
251b5(rgyud): ba'i me sbar te stong phrag brgyad tu sbyin bsreg bya'o// de nas 'a/ phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi ga zugs kyis mdun du nye bar gnas te/ mchog thams
251b6(rgyud): cad sbyin par 'gyuraro// bya ba thams cad kyi dngos grub du yang 'gyuraro// yid kyi shing rta thams cad yongasu rdzogs par yang 'gyur ro// cho ga zhib me thams cad kyi dngos grub tu yang 'gyur/ 
251b7(rgyud): thams cad du don yod pa thogs pa med pa'i dngos grub du yang 'gyuraro// bsod nams thams cad 'gugs pa'i dngos grub du yang 'gyuraro// dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye
251b8(rgyud): ba dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / sgrub pa'i cho ga thams cad kyi mchog go dngos grub tu 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba la rje su zhugs par 'gyur/ 
252a1(rgyud): seng ljang dang / rnam pa'i shing gi yam shing gi 'bras sa lu dang / til dang / yungs kar dang / zho dang / mar dang / lan tshwa dang bsres pa'i sprin sreg stong phrag brgyad
252a2(rgyud): byas na/ bgegs dang / log par 'dren pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gdon thams cad dang / gdug pa dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dgra thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do// 'thab pa dang / 
252a3(rgyud): rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad las sgrol bar byed do// mtshon cha thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyuraro// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dgra thams cad las rgyal
252a4(rgyud): ba sbyin par 'gyur ro// tsan dan dang 'bras yos dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar bsres pa'i pad+ma'i sbyin sreg stong / phrag brgyad byas na/ yul 'khor dang / ri brag dang / grong dang
252a5(rgyud): grong khyer dang / ljongs rnams su/ kun nas dpag tshad stong phrag cig 'khor khor yug tu zhi ba chen por 'gyur// sems can thams cad dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / 
252a6(rgyud): khye'u dang / bu mo rnams la srung ba dang bskyab pa'i ched du yang dag par sgrub par 'gyuraro// nad thams cad thams cad du rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// gcan zan gtum po thams cad dang / sbrul
252a7(rgyud): gdug pa dang / ma rungs pa thams cad byams par 'gyuraro// rgyal po dang / yul 'khor dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyis yongs su bskor ba thams cad shis pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro// 
252a8(rgyud): ma ta ma ga dang / yungs kar dang / mar dang / klu shing gi me tog dang / 'bras yos rnams bsres pas arga'i shing gi yam shing gi me sbar la stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg byas na/ 
252b1(rgyud): char mi 'bab par byed pa la de nas klu chen po rnams kyis char gyi rgyun 'byin par byed de ji srid char pa 'bab par 'dod pa'i bar du'o// lo thog dang / shing dang / rtsa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman
252b2(rgyud): gyi rdzas dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams yongasu rdzogs par byed do// legs par yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// klu'i rgyal po chen po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyis dga' ba chen por
252b3(rgyud): 'gyur zhing / dus dus su ji lta ba bzhin du char gyi rgyun 'byin par byed do// ha cang char ches na de nyid kyi thal bas stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg byas na ha cang char ches rab tu zhi bar byed do// 'bras
252b4(rgyud): yos dang / go la dang / yungs kar dang / gtum po'i sa bon mAs bsres pa'i sbyin sreg byas na/ rlung dang ser ba tha/ mas cad bzlog par byed do// dpag tshad stong phrag khor yug
252b5(rgyud): du mtshams chen po bcing bar byas par 'gyur ro// rlung bcing / ba la yungs kar dang 'bras thug po che'i sbyin sregastong phrag brgyad byas na/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad
252b6(rgyud): bcing bar byas par 'gyur te/ ji srid du be ram b+ha'i rlung gi bar du bcings par 'gyur ro// grub cing ba la ni yungs kar dang / til gyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ lo bcu gnyis
252b7(rgyud): su klu bcings pa byas par 'gyuraro// nang thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba la ni/ yungs kar mar dang bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do// 
252b8(rgyud): pha rol gyi dmag tshogs ldog pa la ni/ kar bi ra'i shing gis me sbar te/ nim pa'i mdab ma dang / lan tshwa dang / phug ma'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ pha rol gyi dmog cha
253a1(rgyud): dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dgra thams cad rnam par nyams par byed de/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du phyis 'byung bar mi 'gyu ro// phyogs bcing ba la/ dpag tshad stong phrag
253a2(rgyud): khor yug gis so// til dang yungs kar dang 'bras yos dang / pad+ma'i mdab ma mar dang bsres pas sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ dpag tshad stong phrag khor yug tu mtsham
253a3(rgyud): chen po bcings pa byas par 'gyuraro// log 'dren thams cad bcing ba la ni/ yungs kar nag po dang / til nag dang / sran ma dang / til dang mar sres pas sbyin sreg stong phrag
253a4(rgyud): brgyad byas na bgegos dang / log 'dren dang / bdud la sogs pa ma rungs pa dang / gnod sbyin dang srin dpo rnams bcing ba byas par 'gyuraro// gnod sbyin 'byin pa la
253a5(rgyud): ni b+ha ga'i sa bon dang / lan tshwa dang / til mar bsres pas sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ gnod sbyin dang srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / brjed
253a6(rgyud): byed la sogs pa thams cad 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon sum du nges par 'byin par 'gyur ro// yams dang / nye bar 'tsho ba dang / nad 'gro ba thams cad dang / 'jigs pa thad
253a7(rgyud): rab tu zhi bar 'gyuraro// dge legs thams cad 'byung bar 'gyuraro// bram ze dbang du byed pa la/ 'bras yos dang / arga'i yams shing mar gyis btags pas sbyin sreg stong
253a8(rgyud): phrag brgyad byas na bram ze thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// rgyal rigs dbang du byed pa la/ bu ram dang / mar dang / 'bras yos dang / arga'i mdab mas sbyin sreg stong phrag
253b1(rgyud): brgyad byas na/ rgyal rigs thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyuraro// dmangs rigs dbang du byed pa la/ myos byed kyi 'bras bu dang / dong ka'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ dmangs
253b2(rgyud): rigs thams cad du byed pa'i mchog 'grub po// rje rigs dbang du byed pa la/ mar rnam pa gsum gyis bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ rje rigs thams cad dpa
253b3(rgyud): du byed do// sna ma'i me tog mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ bud med thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyuraro// gzhon nu ma dbang du byed pa la/ chu'i me tog
253b4(rgyud): mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas/ dan/ gzhon nu ma thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyuraro// 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa la/ 
253b5(rgyud): 'bru dang mar gyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ 'jig sa pa dang / 'thab mo dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do// nor dang
253b6(rgyud): 'bru 'phel bar byed pa la/ 'bru bdun mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na nor dang 'bru 'phel bar 'gyu ro// dbang phyug thob pa la/ yungs kar dang / mad+h+yaHdang / sbyin
253b7(rgyud): sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na dbang phyug chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro// yul thob pa la/ tsha ba gsum mar dang / man+taHdang / bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ yul chen po
253b8(rgyud): thob par 'gyur ro// grong gi don du kar bi ra'i me tog dang / yungs kar dang / 'bras yos mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ grong rnyed par 'gyur ro// gter gdon
254a1(rgyud): pa la ni/ pad+ma'i chub mar dang bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na gter chen pos sor rnyed // gnod sbyin spyan drang bar 'dod pas/ gu gul dang / gtam
254a2(rgyud): papo'i sa bon dang / sbrang rtsi mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ gnod sbyin rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du nye bar 'dug ste/ ci bsgob byed cing las thams cad
254a3(rgyud): byed par 'gyuro// 'dod pa'i gzugs can ma spyan drang bar 'dod pas 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / zho dang sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i dro da // pri yang gu'i sa ka ra bi ra
254a4(rgyud): shing yam shing gis me sbar nas sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na de'i 'og tu 'dod pa'i gzugs can ma 'ongs te/ ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du spyod par byed do// rnam pa gsu
254a5(rgyud): brjod par bya ste/ ma dang chung ma dang / sring mo'o// gal te ma yi/ na na bu la zhen pas/ nor dang 'bru dang longs spyod che na po rnam par 'phel zhing phun sum tshogs par byed de/ ji
254a6(rgyud): srid 'tshe'i bar du mi 'bral bar kun tu gnas par byed do// gal te chung ma yin na/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dga' ba du mas rtse zhing / long spyod la yongasu spyod par byed de rnam pa sna tshogs pI/ 
254a7(rgyud): gos dang / rgyun dang / lhab lhub dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byugs pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i ro bro ba'i long spyod la yongasu spyod cing / rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i ma
254a8(rgyud): stan dang / nor dang 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba dang bcas pa rnam par 'phel ba la yongasu spyod de/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du grib ma bzhin du rje su 'brang bar 'gyuraro// srog kyang yongs su
254b1(rgyud): gtong bar byed do// gal te sring mo yin na de'i tshe/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dbang phyug dang / lha'i gzhal med khang na longs spyod la yongasu spyod cing / ji srid 'tsha'i bar du bsnyen bkur
254b2(rgyud): dang / rim gro byed do// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs bzlog pa la/ phug ma dang / lan tshwa'i sbyin sreg gis dpag tshad brgya stong phrag gi nang du dgra mi 'byung ste/ sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad
254b3(rgyud): byas na g.yul dang 'khrug pa chen po las rgyal bar 'gyu ro// nyi ma 'bab par byed pa la/ ri'i rtse mor sbrang rtsi dang / na le sham dang / 'bras thub po che dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin
254b4(rgyud): sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na nyin re re zhing nyi ma 'bab par/ byed de/ mchog thams cad rjesu stsol bar byed da cing / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'dod pa tsam gyis bsnyen bkur
254b5(rgyud): dang / rim gro byed cing nye bar gnas so// zla ba dang / rgyu ska dang / skar ma'i tshogs 'bab par 'dod pas gon sa mthon por tsha ba gsum dang / rgya mchu dang / lan tshwa dang / 
254b6(rgyud): 'o ma dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg byas na zla ba dang / rgyu skar dang / skar ma'i tshogs 'bab par byed do// 'dod pa dang / yid kyi shing rta dang / bskal pa dang / dbang phyug
254b7(rgyud): thams cad cher 'phel ba rab tu sbyin no// ji srid 'tshe'i bar du nye bar gnas te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / sba ba byed par 'gyur ro// nyi ma re re zhing mthong bar 'dod na
254b8(rgyud): 'bab par byed do// lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang // lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / bud med dang / 
255a1(rgyud): skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje rigs dang / dmangs rigs thams cad 'gugs pa la til dang / yungs kar
255a2(rgyud): dang / 'bras thug po che dang / sman sna tshogs dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ 'gugs pa chen po'i dngos grub du 'gyur te/ 'jig
255a3(rgyud): rten thams cad dga' bar yang 'gyuraro// rgyal po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang g.yog tu bcas pa 'khor du 'gyur te/ rtag tu de nyid kyi rje su 'brang bar 'gyur la ngag gi rdza su 'jug
255a4(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// bdag nyid kyis sam nor gyis kyang rung ste tha/ dmas cad du bla ma gcig pur mchod pa chen po byed par 'gyuraro// sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i sgrub thab so// / 
255a5(rgyud): de nas mog 'phrul bshad par bya ste/ don yod pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rig sngags kyis sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don gyi ched du/ las thams cad byed pa
255a6(rgyud): dge ba la mkhas pa rnams kyi bde ba sbyin pa/ rtag tu dbul po rnams kyi bde ba thob par byed pa'o// de nas rtogs pa'i mod la 'bru mchog tu 'phel bar 'gyur zhing / 'jig rten thad
255a7(rgyud): kyi bla ma nyid du mchod par bya ba dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / dbang phyug sbyin zhing / long spyod chen po 'phel ba dang / rgyal po'i bde ba dang ldan pa dang phyogs phyogasu rab mchog sbyin
255a8(rgyud): par byed do// gai wa dang / bcu gang dang / ldong ros dang / mu zi dang / pad+ma ge sar dang / ud pa la sngon po dang / li kha ra dang / gur gum dang / rgya mtsho sbub dang / gnyis dang / gser
255b1(rgyud): gyi mdang ma stong phrag sbyar ste/ phye ma shin tu zhib mor byas la legs par bsgongs la ga pur dang / gla rtsi tsam gyi blangs la/ sngags kyi stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa/ mkhas pas rnam pa
255b2(rgyud): gsum du sbyar bar bya ste/ skye bos gang pa nyid la lnga mnyam pa'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gos/ mig sman gyi snying pos stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la mig la thug par bya ste mi snang bar
255b3(rgyud): 'gyuraro// skye bo mang po'i dbus su na mkha' la nye bar gnas par byed do// hUM yig gis mthong bar bya'o// na mkha' la 'gro bar byed do// gnas par byed do// nyal bar byeng ngo // rgyug par
255b4(rgyud): byed do// bskus na lus la me 'bar bar mthong ste// de ston pa dar byed do// ngu ba'i rgyal mtshan ston par byed do// rkang dpa'i mthil la kun tu thugs na/ chu bo dang / chu klung chen
255b5(rgyud): po'i steng nas 'gro ste rkang pa la chus gos par mi 'gyur ro// ma chen po 'bar ba'i nang du 'jug ste/ sreg par mi byed cing / ba spu'i khung bu gcig kyang 'byi bar mi 'gyuraro// 
255b6(rgyud): bye mas phyogs bzhir na mkha' kun tu gtor na/ me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs pa'i char gyi rgyun ltung bar byed do// rin po che sna tshogs kyi gzhal med khang mthong bar byed do// lus
255b7(rgyud): mtha' dag la byug par bya zhing / skye bo'i mig sman bsku zhing / phye mas gtor nas/ ljongs chen po'i nang du 'jug par bya ste/ de cung zad kyang mi mthong ngo // ji ltar yid la byed pa bzhin
255b8(rgyud): du rmongs pa chen po'i sgyu ma ston par byed de/ rgyal po dang / dmag sde chen po dang / drang srong gi gzugs dang / gser gyi bum pa can dang / mi'i seng ge dang / phag dang / dga' byed
256a1(rgyud): kyi mtshan nyid dang / rol snyed ma phrogs pa dang / zla 'od mgo bo yongasu gtong ba ston par byed do// 'joms pa dang / gsod pa dang / srog 'dor bston par byed do// 
256a2(rgyud): me tog gi char ram/ 'bras bu'i char ram/ rlung dang / sprin dang ser ba dang / 'bru'i char ston par byed do// rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rnam 'gyur rnams ston par byed de/ gzhal med khang
256a3(rgyud): chen po'i rnam pa rnams bsams pa tsam gyis ston par byed do// dge 'dun gyi nang du 'jug na/ rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa la sogs pa ya ma zung gzhal du med pa ston par
256a4(rgyud): byed do// bdag nyid kyi mgo bo la bskus nas mgrin pa tsam gyis dri za/ til mar bsgos pa'i phye mas gtor de bar bya zhing / mig sman gyis byug par bya/ phye mas lus
256a5(rgyud): mtha' dag la bdug par bya// rkang pa la byug par bya ste/ dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs na yang dag par shes bzhi na dang / zhi ba dang / dul ba dang / zung tsam du mthong ngo // de
256a6(rgyud): nas zhugs pa tsam gyis me'i khams su mthong bar byed do// mthong bar byed do// sems par mthong bar byed do// nam mkha' la gnas par byed do// 'chag par byed do// 'dug par
256a7(rgyud): byed cing mal stan la rtog par byed do// 'ong bar byed cing / 'gro bar byed do// me tog 'bab par byed do// nam mkha' la rnga'i sgra ston par byed do// rig byed bzhi pa'i nang du shing arga'i
256a8(rgyud): 'o mas bsgos nas byugs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gsum pa'i gzugs su mthong bar byed do// lha'i gar mkhan sna tshogs pa'i gzugs su mthong bar byed do// ji lta ji ltar
256b1(rgyud): yid la byed bzhin pa'i b+ha ra ta dang / dga' byed rnams mthong bar byed do// 'khor chen po'i dbus su rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gar mkhan rnams su ston par byed do// rgyal po'i pho brang du/

256b6(rgyud): sna tshogs pa mthong bar byed do// de ltar na mig sman dang phye ma mthu chen po bsku ba dang sbyor bas gzhal med khang dang / gar mkhan dang gzhal med khang mthong bar byed de/ ji srid

257a2(rgyud): 'gyuraro// sgyu ma'i rnam 'phrul sna tshogs pa 'grub te/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu ji lta ba de bzhin du rab tu sbyor ba'i dngos grub tu 'gyu ro// rab tu sbyar ba tsam gyi dngos grub chen po rgya che ba 'dzi/

257b1(rgyud): rlob pa'i gnas dang mnyam pa/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong ba'o// de nas po Ta la ka'i gzhal med khang dang mnyam pa'i gnas/ don yod pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
