259b6(rgyud): me tog dang / gdu bu byas nas bzhag par bya'o// dbus kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor du snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po nyid kyi gsang sngags stong phrag brgyad bzlas so// de nas gtor ma'i
259b7(rgyud): las la mnyam par gzhag nas/ sna tshogs pa'i gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs dang / dkar po dang / de bzhin du sna tshogs pa'i gzugs nyid dang / sna tshogs pa'i ro bzhag par
259b8(rgyud): bya'o// rnam pa sna tshogs su phye ba'i sna tshogs pa'i gzugs dang / sna tshogs pa'i rnam pa dang / sna tshogs pa'i kha dog dang ro nyid dang / sna tshogs pa'i yul du rgyu ba ste/ 'di ni
260a1(rgyud): gtor mar brjod de/ 'byor pa'i gtor mar bshad do// dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu rgyan gdags te/ sna tshogs pa'i 'bras bu rgya chen po dang / sna tshogs
260a2(rgyud): pa'i lo ma sngon po'i phreng ba dang / mar me'i phreng ba brgya rtsa brgyad dang / ji ltar rnyed pa'i mar dang til mar gyi kun nas bkang ba brgya rtsa brgyad do// bdag dngos grub 'dod pa rnams bye
260a3(rgyud): dang la phug dang / dkar dang / la du dang / sran ma mud ga'i la tu dang / 'bras bu rnams de bzhin du log 'dren la gtor mar byin pas las thams cad bde blag du 'grub bo// phye'o
260a4(rgyud): zan dang / zhe'i nying khu dang / lo ma sngon po nyid/ gnodasbyin dang / srin po kun nas phyogs bzhir gnas pa rna mas la gtor mar sbyin par bya'o// zhe'i zan dang 'o ma yang
260a5(rgyud): ste 'di ni 'byung po'i gtor mar bshad do// lo ma'i gong bu dang / phye dang / 'bras thug po che'i zan dang / de ba/ zhin du 'khur bzlum po ste/ 'di ni phyogs bzhir yi dgas
260a6(rgyud): dang sha za rnams la gtor mar sbyin par bya'o// 'bras thug po che dang / 'o ma'i zan ni zla ba dang / nyi ma'i tshogs kyis lhan cig pa'i lha dang rgyu skar rnams kyi gtor mar bya'o// rtag
260a7(rgyud): tu tsan dan gyi chu dang / de bzhin du me tog dang 'o ma'i zan ni mtshan mo'i lha la gtor mar sbyin par bya ste las kyi dngos grub bla na med pa'o// 'bru bdun mdzes pa chen po dang / shing snu
260a8(rgyud): mchog tu mdzes pa/ 'bras A ma khu bskol ba mdzes pa dang / zho dang 'o ma so sor mnyam pa dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang bcas pa rnam pa bdun po sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha/ 
260b1(rgyud): la gtor mar sbyin par bya'o sa kurba dang / rtse mo dang / 'bras thug po che brtsos pa'i khu ba dang ldan pa 'di/ rlung lha'i gtor mar brjod de rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad dgyes par byed do// 
260b2(rgyud): zho dang / 'o ma bskol ba dang / 'bras thug po che dang / hwags dang bcas shing / bu ram dang bcas par ldan pa/ 'khur ba zlum po dang / mar gis gang ba'i 'khur ba 'di ni klu'i rgyal po
260b3(rgyud): rnams kyis gtor mar brjod de/ las thams cad sgrub pa'o// 'khur ba zlum po dang / ba byung lnga dang / pu shel tshe dang / ma la ya'i tsan dan dang / 'bras thug po che dang / zhabs
260b4(rgyud): bsil dang / mchod yon rnams bdud kyi dkyil 'kha dar la gtor mar sbyin par bya'o// gur gum gyi chu dang / 'bras thug po che la dri bzang pos bsgos te/ chu klung gi
260b5(rgyud): rgyal po la gtor mar sbyin par bya'o// thams cad du/ las thams cad sgrub par byed do// rtsa dur ba'i chu/ dang / 'o ma dang / gtum pa'i sa bon brtsos pa dang / 'bras
260b6(rgyud): thug po che ni tshangs pa'i srin po nyid dang / gsang ba pa rnams la gtor mar dbul bar bya ste thams cad rigs pas so// 'di ni gtor mar brjod de/ bgegs rnams kyi dkyil
260b7(rgyud): 'khor sgrub par byed pa la bgegs rnams ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dga' bar 'gyur te the tsom med do// de'i phyir rig sngags 'chang mkhas pas thams cad legs par bsgrub par
260b8(rgyud): bya'o// zho dang / 'o ma dang / 'o thug dang / bu ram dang / mar dang / l-i kha ra dang ldan pa 'dis bdag skyes pa'i rgyu skar gyi lha la gtor mar sbyin par bya ste/ tshe'i dngos grub dang / de bzhin du
261a1(rgyud): rgyas pa dang / zhi ba dang / sdig pa thams cad ldog par byed do// 'ad ni gtor mar brjod de rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi bde ba thob pa'o// bya ba gang yin pa de rnams la/ 
261a2(rgyud): bdag gi gtor mthun gsum du byas na/ rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi rig sngags dang / gsang sngags bde blag tu 'grub te the tshom med do// de'i bgegs thams cad dang / 
261a3(rgyud): sdig pa dang / sdang ba rnams nam yang bar du gcod par mi nus te/ nam yang phyis sdig pa mi 'byung ngo // rtag tu gtor ma rgyas pa thob par byed cing / stobs dang brtson 'grus dang
261a4(rgyud): ldan pa dang / thams cad thogs pa med par 'gyuraro// de lta bu byed bzhin pa'i rig sngags smra ba'i mkhas dpa de bgegs rnams thams cad kyis de nam du yang
261a5(rgyud): mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha zas sdang bar byed pa med do// nod med cing / rgyal po'i dpal min med la skem byed dang
261a6(rgyud): skem pa med la/ brjed byed dang / klu dang / gza' dang / rims med cing / thams cad kyi tshe cung zad kyang med do// dug med cing sbyar ba'i dug nyid kyang med la/ byang stems
261a7(rgyud): thams cad kyang nam yang mi yong ste/ kun nas dpag tshad stong phrag tu ring du 'bros par byed do// kun nas stobs nyid rgyas pa dang / de bzhin du yang dga' ba dang / de bzhin du
261a8(rgyud): yang stobs dang brtson 'grus dang / gzi brjid 'phel bar 'gyu ro// thams cad du phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / cho ga zhib mo thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par byed do// 
261b1(rgyud): tshe rang du 'phel zhing / lha dang mi rnams kyi mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyuraro// skyes pa'i rgyu skar gyi lha gang yin pa yang dri yong su 'dzin par 'gyur zhing de rnams thams cad kyang srid
261b2(rgyud): bapar du stobs dang / brtson 'grus 'phel bar byed par the tsom med do// de la dgra mo 'byung zhing nam du yang phyir rgol ba dang / dgra bo med de phyag rgya 'dzin pa nyid med kyang dkyil
261b3(rgyud): 'khor gyi mchog tu zhugs pa tsam gyi mdo la 'am/ yang na 'jug pa'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam la/ de rnams kyi lus de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba
261b4(rgyud): khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i byin gyis brlabs pa'id lus su 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga daklung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad
261b5(rgyud): cu rtsa bzhi'i drung du bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu skye b.ragyur te/ ri rab chen po dang mnyam pa'i bsod nam sa kyi phung po chen po yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de
261b6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / mnyam pa'i drung du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur// 
261b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang sngags rnams kyi dngos grub chen po so sor rnyed do// byang chub sems dpa' thab
261b8(rgyud): kyi/ ris thun mong ba'i tshogs bsdus pa'i sar bsgrod de phyir mi ldog par 'gyuraro// sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi lha'i gnas na gnas pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / sum cu rtsags
262a1(rgyud): gyi lha'i tshogs dang lhan cig thams cad du srung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba ba'i ched du yang dag par sgrub par 'gyuraro// lag na rdo rje dang / rig pa 'dzin pa'i dbang po du ma
262a2(rgyud): rig pa 'dzin pa byed pa'i tshogs kyi yongasu bskor zhing rtag tu rjesu 'brang ba rnams srung ba dang bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i ched du yang dag par sgrub par 'gyuraro// stobs chen po dang brtson
262a3(rgyud): 'grus dang pha rol gnon pa dang / mdangs kyi rnam pa so sor rnyed par 'gyuraro// dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyi mod la bskal pa bye bar brgyud nas bsags pa'i sdig pa dang sgrib pa
262a4(rgyud): dang / mtshams med pa lnga'i 'gro ba rnams dang / mnar med/ dpal gzhol ba de thams cad yongasu zad cing yo/ dang su gtugs par 'gyur ro// thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed
262a5(rgyud): do// don yod pa'i bya ba'i dngos grub so sor rnyed do// sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa'i dri ma dang / ser sna'i dri ma thams cad dang bral bar 'gyuraro// 'jig rten
262a6(rgyud): thams cad dga'o ba dang / bla ma chen po mchod par 'os par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'dod par yang 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
262a7(rgyud): dbang phyug gi rtag tu mchog rtsol bar byed cing bla mar 'gyuraro// 'chi 'phos te skye brje ba na bsams pa nyid kyi mong la/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu pad+mo las brdzus te skye ba
262a8(rgyud): 'gyuraro// dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngomatshig gi bla mar shes par bya/ mchod par bya/ 'od dpag med dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang
262b1(rgyud): phyuphyaphyug dang / mthu chen thob kyi bkod pa dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o// des na rig sngags 'chang dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon nges kyang dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa byas nas/ kun nas mtsham
262b2(rgyud): bcing ba byas shing / srung ba'i cho ga byas la/ bdag bcing ba dang / gtsug tor bcing ba dang / mtshams bcing ba byas te/ de'i 'og tu kha shar du phyogs te/ dkyil 'khor la
262b3(rgyud): mngon du phyogs pas skyil mo krung gis 'jug la/ don yod pa pad+ma'i gtsug tor stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o// gu gul la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i bdug spos
262b4(rgyud): dbul bar bya'o// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dbus kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor du pad+ma'i ge sar gyi dbus su tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/ 
262b5(rgyud): pad+ma dang zhags pa thogs te/ bzhengs nas phyogs bcur rnam par gzigs par mdzad de/ rig sngags 'a chang la bka' stsal pa/ rig sngags 'chang legs so/ 
262b6(rgyud): leg so// khyod kyi rig pa 'dzin pa grub po// don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rig pa'i rgyal po 'di rjes su zung cig/ rig sngags 'chang ji ltar yid la byed pa bzhin
262b7(rgyud): du 'dod pa'i mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyu ro// 'di ni rig sngags 'chang de rnams kyi mngal du gnas pa'i skye ba'i tha ma yin te/ skye ba rjes nas thams cad du pad+ma las brdzus
262b8(rgyud): te skye bar 'gyuraro// skye ba nas skye ba thams cad du don yong zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag dang / cho ga na'i ma'i rgyal po mtha' dag kha ton du byed do// don yod zhags pa/ 
263a1(rgyud): gtsug tor dri ma med pa/ kha ton du kun tu gnas so// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du mchod
263a2(rgyud): yon dang / zhabs bsil dbul bar bya/ a ga ru'i bdug pa dbul bar bya/ me tog ji ltar 'byor pa dbul bar bya/ gshegasu gsol bar bya ste/ des 'phags pa spyan ras
263a3(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de lta bu byas nas rig sngags 'chang na mkha' la 'gro'o// don yod pa'i gtsug tor pad+ma dri ma med pa'i 'od zer gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba
263a4(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin so sor thob te/ rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba khragakhrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhis yongasu bskor bar 'gyur zhing / pad+ma'i ris kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar
263a5(rgyud): 'gyuraro// tshe lo bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur 'gyuraro// dkyil 'khor rgya rtsa ga dang / sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'o// / de nas
263a6(rgyud): de'i ras ris bshad par bya ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rog pas ras khru bzhi pa byas nas sam/ yang na dar la bal tshon sna tshogs pas rnam par phye ste/ 
263a7(rgyud): lha'i gzugs mchog tu mdzes pa/ phyag gnyis pa 'od zer gyi 'khor bar bya'o// ras ris sgrub pa ni/ dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes bco lnga la tshon lhag ma min pa snod gsar par
263a8(rgyud): bzhag pas ri mo mkhan gtsang ma legs par khrus byas pas 'drir gzhug par bya'o// dbus su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chad pa/ 
263b1(rgyud): pad+ma rgyas pas yongasu bskor ba bya ste/ khor yug tu 'ong mdom gang ba/ kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng ba can phyag bzhi pa/ zhal gsum pa ral pa'i cod pan gyis rgyan pa/ zla ba ches pa
263b2(rgyud): spras pa/ 'od dpag med kyi cod pan 'chang ba/ mdud rtse gsum 'chang ba/ pad+ma'i mdab ma rnam par bkra ba'i pad+ma'i zhags pa 'chang ba/ phyag g.yon par pad+ma 'chang ba/ 
263b3(rgyud): pad+ma'i steng du pad+ma gtsug tor bya'o// mdab ma phyed kha bye ba'i dbus kyi pad+ma'i mdab ma la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mgul yan chad tsam cod pan 'chang ba dbu
263b4(rgyud): 'bar ba'i snying por yod par bri bar bya'o// phyag gcig/ ni dbugs 'byin pa 'chang zhing / rin po che'i char 'bebs pa/ 'bar ba'i snying po can rgyan thams cad kyis
263b5(rgyud): rnam par brgyan pa/ sna tshogs pa'i gos 'tshong ba bya'o// pad+ma'i gdan la klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dag 'bo mgo bo dgu pa/ klu yis yongs su bskor ba dang bcwa
263b6(rgyud): pa/ thal mo 'chang zhing lus phyed par bya'o// nya dang / chu srin dang / me tog sna tshogs dang / nor bu shel dang / ngang pa dang / ngur pa dang / shang shang te'us yang dag par rgyan pa'i
263b7(rgyud): kha khyer dang bcas pas spras pa'o// gzhogs g.yas su sgrol ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ thal mo sbyar ba smad de 'dzin pa/ 'bar ba'i snying po'i lus can bya'o// g.yo
263b8(rgyud): dugos dkar mo gos dkar po 'chang brgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ 'bar ba'i snying po'i lus cano/ thal mo smad de 'chang ba'o// gzhogs g.yasu khro gnyer can skyil
264a1(rgyud): krung phyed pas gzhugs pa bya'o// de'i 'og tu dkar sham ma gos dkar po 'chang ba bya'o// g.yon du srin mo ral pa gcig ma bya ste/ phyag brgyad pa/ drag mo drag tu rgod
264a2(rgyud): pa'i pho nya mo bya'o// bzhin khro gnyer can thams cad skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa rgyan thams cad kyi rnam par brgyan pa thams cad pad+ma'i gdan la gzhugs pa bya'o// steng du tshang
264a3(rgyud): pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i dbang po rnams na mkha' nas bcom ldan 'das dang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed bzhin pa bya'o// 'og tu pad+ma la gshin
264a4(rgyud): rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / gzhon nu rnams khrus bya ste/ skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa bya'o// rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams bya ste/ drag po'i gzugs skyil krung
264a5(rgyud): byed pas bzhugs te/ de rnams thams cad kyang pad+ma 'dzi/ na pa'i gzugs su bya'o// rig sngags 'chang / ni/ bcom ldan 'das dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
264a6(rgyud): dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du/ pad+ma'i gdan la rig sngags 'chang pus mo gtsugs pa bya ste/ pog phor dang / lag na me tog gi phor pa dang / bgrang phreng 'dzin pa bcom ldan 'dra/ 
264a7(rgyud): kyi zhal la blta bar byed bzhin pa bya'o// de lta bu'i ras ris kyi bya ba pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dang / ras ris dkyil 'khor mtha' dag gi nang du gtogs par 'gyur
264a8(rgyud): mthong ba tsam gyi modado la sdug bsngal dang sdig pa dang / ngan 'gro thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do// thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'gro ba thams cad gcod par 'gyur
264b1(rgyud): nyes par byas pa thams cad 'joms par yang 'gyuraro// sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad dang / mtshams med pa lnga las rnam par thar bar byed do// mthong ba tsam gyi modo la/ don
264b2(rgyud): yod pa'i dngos grub so sor thob bo// sems can thams cad kyis kun tu bskor bar bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i 'os su 'gyuraro// dgongs pa thams cad legs par grub par
264b3(rgyud): byed par 'gyuraro// bde bar byed par 'gyu ro// nor dang / gzugs byed pa dang / bkra shis dang / long spyod dang / rigs dang / dbang phyug dang / stobs dang / spobs pa dang / bsod
264b4(rgyud): nams dang / skal pa bzang por byed pa dang / bdag nyid chen ngo po'i yon tan gyi bye brag 'phel ba dang / bsod nam des bsags pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'phel ba/ 
264b5(rgyud): dang / phun sum tshogs par byed do// mthong ba tsam gyi mad la/ las su bya bar 'os pa'i bya ba thams cad byed // de ltar ras ris mthong ba tsam gyi mod la yon tan
264b6(rgyud): gyi bye brag lhag par rtogs par 'gyuraro zhes so// ras ris sgrub pa'i cho ga dang / sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'o// // de nas phyag rgya bshad par bya ste/ phyag rgya rnams kyi don yod pa'i
264b7(rgyud): 'khor los bsgyur ba phyag rgya chen po bla na med pa/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rgyas btab pa/ sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa/ don yod pa'i phyag rgya thams cad dang sgrub
264b8(rgyud): thabs thams cad kyi dngos grub bla na med pa sdig pa thams cad zad par byed pa nyid dang / phyag rgya'i dam tshig gi dngos grub blan med pa/ phyag rgya gzung ba tsam gyis mnar med pa
265a1(rgyud): yang skems par byed pa/ dmyal ba pa rnams skems par byed pa ste/ gang gis bzung ba tsam la sogs pas dmyal ba pa'i sems can thams cad grol bar byed
265a2(rgyud): cing skems par byed do// dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rgyal ba de rnams thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu kun tu gzigs par 'gyur
265a3(rgyud): te the tshom med do// dus gsum pa'i rgyal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad dang / de bzhin du pad+ma'i phyag gi rtag tu mchog sbyin pa dang / rtag tu mthong bar 'dod pa/ 
265a4(rgyud): dang / lha rnams kyis rtag tu srung bar byed cing dga' bo dang / 'o/ ga min gyi lha dang lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha thams cad kyis/ srung bar byed cing kun
265a5(rgyud): nas yongasu skyong bar byed de/ thams cad la cho ga bzhin du/ bdag nyid kyi snying las skyes pa'i bu bzhin du dge ba dang / zhi ba dang stobs dang / brtson 'grus nyid dang / mdang
265a6(rgyud): kyang rab tu 'jug par byed cing de bzhin du yang tshe 'phel lo// phyag rgya 'di rnams bzung bas bkra mi shis pa thams cad nyams par byed do// bgegs thams cad nyams par byed cing // 
265a7(rgyud): bdud dang / log par 'dren pa dang / bdug pa'i gnod sbyin rnam par nyams par byed do// gdug pa'i srin po dang / yi dgas thams cad kyang / phyag rgya 'dzin bzhin pa'i skad cig
265a8(rgyud): de la mgo bo tshal pa bdun du 'gas shing mig 'byin par byed do// brgya byin dang / tshogs dang bcas pa'i gdug pa thams cad rab tu nyams par byeng ngo // de'i phyir yang dag par 'chi
265b1(rgyud): par byed pa la lag pa'i thal mo pad+ma 'dra ba/ pad+ma 'byung ba'i gtsug tor don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgyas bsdigs mdzub yongasu dkris la/ mthe bong gsor mo dang / gung mo sar
265b2(rgyud): mo rab tu brkyangs la lcags kyu'i rnam par bkug te/ ming med dang / mthe'u chung lag pa'i nang du bcug nas rtag tu snying kha'i gnas su bzhag par bya ste/ 'di ni don yod pa
265b3(rgyud): pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rtsa ba'i gsang sngags kyi sngags dang phyag rgyar marjod do// de bzung ba tsam dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags brjod pa nyid kyis dus gsum du gshegs
265b4(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rnam par 'gyur ba drugatu g.yos te/ char 'bab par byed do// me to// ga gi char dang / lha rdzas kyi gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab
265b5(rgyud): lhub rnams mchod pa'i don du kun nas char bab po// dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad kyi
265b6(rgyud): bsod nams kyi phung po chen po stong phrag bskyed do// phyag rgya de gzung ba tsam gyi skad cig de la phyag rgya gang ga'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa bye ba stong phrag bye ba'i grangs su bgrangs
265b7(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya bcings par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya de bzung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / de bzhin du thub pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgyas byin gyis rlob bo// 
265b8(rgyud): ri rab kyi tshad dang mnyam pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyi rin po che'i phung por byas te/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa/ so so so so la phul ba dang / rgyal
266a1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po thob pa'i grangs kyi tshogs nyid kyang phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis 'di'i 'bras bur 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs
266a2(rgyud): pas nyin mtshan rtag tu rnam par gzigs par the tsom med do// zhes so// phyag rgya 'di nyid las g.yas pa'i 'dzub mo brkyangs te/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags lan gcig brjod do// phyag
266a3(rgyud): phyag 'di ni don yod zhags pa'i gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i chu skyes kyi stobs spyan ras gzigs kyi snying po zhes bya ste/ thams cad du las thams cad legs par thob par byed do// phyag
266a4(rgyud): rgya 'di bcings pa tsam gyis kyang bsod nams kyi tshogasathams cad dang / spyan ras gzigs don yod dpa dri ma med pa'i dngos grub du yang 'gyuraro// de bzhin ga
266a5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi gzigs pa dag pa'i snying po'i phyag rgya yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyuraro// sdig pa dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab
266a6(rgyud): tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// phyag rgya 'di bzung ba tsam dang / dang po bcings pa tsam gyis ri rab chen po ltar 'gyur te/ bdud dang bgegs la sogs pa thams cad dang / 'byung po dang / gnod
266a7(rgyud): sbyin dang / srin po thams cad kyis/ mi 'gul zhing mi g.yo la zil gyis mi non par yang 'gyur// phyir rgol ba dang / dgra'i 'jigs pa thams cad nas yongasu grol lo// de bzhin
266a8(rgyud): gshegs pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i drung du dge ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po kun tu 'dzin par 'gyuraro// dge ba'i rtsa ba
266b1(rgyud): bskyed pa dang ldan par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mngon sum du mthong ba dang ldan par 'gyuraro// phyag rgya'i gsang ba'i lhag par 'dren pa 'di 'ching bzhin pa
266b2(rgyud): de de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya gang cung zad yod pa de mig gis gsal bar mthong ngo // thams cad du rab tu 'ching zhing 'dzin par 'gyuraro// gang yang 'phags pa spyan ras
266b3(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gi sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang / phyag stong gi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang / nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya gang yin pa
266b4(rgyud): dang / glang po'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya gang yi nu ba dang / don yod zhags pa'i yangs pa rgya chen dpe'i dkyil 'khor gang yin pa dang / rta mgrin gyi phyag
266b5(rgyud): rgya gang yin pa dang / mgrin sngon gyi phyag rgya gang yin pa/ dang / gzhan phyag rgya 'dam tshig gsang ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa gang yin pa de rnams thams cad kyang phyag
266b6(rgyud): rgya 'di gcig pu bcings pa tsam gyis de rnams thams cad bcings par 'gyur zhing yang dag par bzung bar 'gyur la/ kun tu bcangs pa dang mchod par yang 'gyuraro// 'di ni
266b7(rgyud): phyag rgya thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du gdugs cig pur gyur pa ste/ ji ltar 'phags pa spyan ras gzogs dbang phyug gi sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam
266b8(rgyud): par 'phrul pa bzhin du phyag rgya 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu'i phyag rgya'i rnam par 'phrul pa ste/ las thams cad la phyag rgya 'od sbyar na/ gang dang gang la rab tu sbyar ba de thogs pa med par 'gru
267a1(rgyud): bong phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo'i sor mo gnyis brkyangs la lcags kyu'i rnam pa tsam du bkug pa 'dzin gnas pa'i phyag rgya 'di spyan drangs pa dang / bod pa dang
267a2(rgyud): yang dag par bskul ba dang / mchod pa'i sprin nyid kyang yin te/ dam tshig dang / phyag byed pa dang / 'jug pa dang / bskor ba byed pa nyid dag gdan dang / phyogs bcings pa dang / 
267a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor btsangs pa dang / mtshams bcing ba zhes pa dang / gtsug tor bcing ba dang / bdag srung ba dang / gzhan srung ba dang / de bzhin nyid du grogs srung ba dang / khrus dang / 
267a4(rgyud): gos bgo ba dang / nye reg byed pa nyid dang / sbyin sreg dang / de de bzhin du sngags bzlas pa dang / gdug pa dang / me tog dang / dri dang phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gtor ma
267a5(rgyud): 'bul ba'i las dang / de bzhin du gshegs su gsol ba nyi da dang / de bzhin du 'gugs pa ste/ thams cad la phyag rgya 'di bya'o// sa bcu gnon pa'i phyag rgya dang gas/ 
267a6(rgyud): sngags bcu la yang phyag rgya 'di bya ste snying po dang nye ba'i snying po 'di nyid kyang thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal po nyid dang / mngon par dbang bskur ba dang / rigs kyi
267a7(rgyud): gsang sngags dang / gzhan la yang phyag rgya 'di dang / phyag rgya 'di'i snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po nyid kyang rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal po'i mngon par dbang bskur ba dang / 
267a8(rgyud): rigs kyi gsang sngags gzhan la yang gnas thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o zhes so// // phyag rgya'i cho ga dang / sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'o// phyag rgya gsum ni rnam sprul pa/ phyag
267b1(rgyud): rgya de dag yang dag bstan// bzang po gtso bo chen po ste// mchog dang rab mchog nyid yin no// phyag rgya gya nom bla na med// 'jig rten 'dren pas bstan pa yin// snying po de nyid gyur pa ste// 
267b2(rgyud): phyag rgya dkyil chen legs par bsgrubs// sangs rgyas byang chub phyag rgya 'di// dus gsum gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs// kun gyis 'di ni byin gyis brlabs// phyag rgya dus
267b3(rgyud): gsum gshegs pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pas phyag rgyar btab// de bzhin sangs rgyas chen po pa// thub pa snang mdzad kyis kyang btab// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
267b4(rgyud): dkyil gyi// gsang nyid kun tu bzhugs pa yin// de nas gsang sngags gsang ba nyid// dngos grub bla med pa shang par bya// oM a mo g+ha hr-i da ya/ pad+ma uSh+NI Sha
267b5(rgyud): kaR+Sha ya/ sA d+ha ya/ b+ha ra sa b+ha ra/ ma hA pad+me sA hA// bskul ba dang / spyan drang ba dang / gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so// oM pad+ma uSh+NI Sha a mo g+ha maN+Da le hUM/ 
267b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor srung ba dang / phyogs bcings pa dang / mtshams bcad pa dang / dri chab dang / chu dang / yungs kar bsres pa la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas bya'o// oM pad+ma she
267b7(rgyud): kha re hUM/ spyi gtsug bcing ba yin te/ lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas so// oM pad+ma uSh+NI Sha a mo g+ha dza le hUM/ khrus bya ba'i sngags te yungs kar dang / chu la lan bdun bzlas
267b8(rgyud): brjod byis pas so// oM baM ma le shung d+he hUM/ nye reg bya ba'i sngags so// oM sa tsA da ya pad+me hUM/ gas bgo ba'i sngagaso// oM me laM mi li shud d+he hUM/ lus yongasu sbyang ba'i sngags
268a1(rgyud): te kha'i rnam lnga'i tshul lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas so// oM pad+ma uSh+NI Shas mo g+ha a b+hiShiny+tsa At+ma shud d+he hUM/ dbang bskur ba'i sngags te dri chab la lan bdun
268a2(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas paso// oM pad+ma ka ba tse/ dr-i DA ban d+ha hUM dz+wa la swA hA/ go cha'i sngags te/ len nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pas so// oM badz+ra a d+hiSh+ThA na pad+me hUM/ byin gyis brlab
268a3(rgyud): pa'i sngags so// oM dz+wa la pad+me d+ha ra ha ra hUM/ sa'i sngags so// oM pad+ma a shra ya/ ru ha tsa la tsa la hUM/ gdan gyi sngags so// e di bya pad+me maM/ me tog gi sngags so// oM pad+ma a mo g+ha sa
268a4(rgyud): ba ra Ni swA hA// bdug spos kyi sngags so// oM pad+ma gan d+haHI shwa ri hUM/ byug spos kyi sngags so// oM pad+ma pra/ kar+Ni d+ha ra Ni sa me swA hA// 'bras yos dang me tog dgram pa'i/ 
268a5(rgyud): sngags so// oM pad+ma dza le su gan d+ha ba ti hUM/ mchodayon dbul ba'i sngags so// oM shu kla ba re ra/ sa ya shud d+he/ hUM/ lha ba shos kyi sngags so// oM su ru
268a6(rgyud): su ru ku b+ha ba tI swA hA// gtor ma'i sngags so// oM ma hA pad+ma a shri ni sA d+ha ya hUM/ gtor ma zar gzhug pa'i sngags so// oM pa la bi shud+d+he/ pra ba ra hUM/ 'bras bu'i sngags so// 
268a7(rgyud): oM pra ba ra puSh+pe dza ya swA hA// phreng ba'i sngags so// oM dz+wa la dzA ya sa ra sa gri Ni hUM/ gtor ma bcos pa'i sngags so// oM pad+ma dI pa ya/ dz+wa la hUM/ mar me'i sngags so// oM sa
268a8(rgyud): ma pad+ma b+hu ba Ne Shu sa ra hUM/ 'jug pa'i sngags so// oM pad+ma uSh+NI Sha a mo g+ha mu ni hUM/ phyag bya ba'i sngags so// oM tsakra maN+Da le/ sa man+ta pad+me hUM/ bskor ba'i sngags so// 
268b1(rgyud): oM sa man+ta pra ki ra Na pad+me sa b+ha ra hUM/ me tog dor ba'i sngags so// oM pad+ma sa ma ya uSh+NI Sha/ mahA a mo g+ha sa ma ya hUM/ dam tshig gi sngags so// oM sa man+ta sA d+hA ra Na pad+med+d+ha
268b2(rgyud): paT skyil mo krung gi sngags so// oM a pa ri mi ta dz+wa la pad+me hUM/ bgrang phreng gi sngags so// oM sha ta sa ha sra dz+wa la ti pad+me/ d+ha ra d+ha ra hUM/ bzlas brjod kyi sngags so// a sa maH
268b3(rgyud): d+ha ri sha pad+me hUM/ rmi lam gyi sngags so// oM sa man+ta/ rak+Sha ra Ni pad+me hUM/ srung ba'i sngags so// oM sa man+ta me ru D+ha s+thir hUM/ ra ba'i sngags so// oM sa man+ta/ dz+wa lA ma la gar+b+he/ 
268b4(rgyud): la dz+wa la/ ma hA pad+ma dz+wa le hUM/ me'i sngags so// oM d+haHd+hu ru/ pra sa ra/ d+had+hu sa re man+te sAhA/ sreg thugs kyi sngags so// oM sa man+ta a ba le ki ta gu h+ye/ bA yu dza
268b5(rgyud): pad+ma bi gi ni swA hA/ na mkha' 'gro ba'i sngags so// oM shu b+hasta d+hA ri Ni pad+ma b+hu dze hUM/ mtshon cha'i sngag sa so// oM sa man+ta A kaR+Sha Ni pra sar gu h+ye hUM/ drang ba'i sngag
268b6(rgyud): so na maHtri b+hu ba na/ I shwa rA ya/ lo ke shwa ra ya/ ma he shwa rA ya/ d+he ra d+ha ra/ sa man+ta/ a ba lo ka ta/ gu h+ye/ A gats+tsha b+ha ga bAn d+hi ri d+hi ri/ ma hA bi ri/ ma Ni ka na ka badz+ra/ 
268b7(rgyud): baiDUr+ya/ ma ra ka ta pad+ma ra ga in dra nI la/ ma hA muk+ti ka/ bi b+hu Shi ta sha ri ra/ mahA pad+me b+hu dza/ a mo g+ha pA sha d+ha ra/ sa man+ta a ba lo ki ta/ ba ra dA ba ra dA ya ka/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ sa
268b8(rgyud): man+ta/ a ba lo ki ta/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ bA ga bAn shI g+h+raM sa ma ya/ ma nu sma ra/ bi be d+ha be Sha d+ha ra/ ya ma ba ru Na/ ku be ra na ma skr-i ta/ I shwa ra/ ma hai shwa ra/ pad+me shwa ra/ lo ki shwa ra/ 
269a1(rgyud): e hi b+ha ga bAn/ shrIg+h+raM A gats+tsha/ sarba bi d+yA maN+Da la/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ da ri sha na swa ra pan/ bi bi d+ha te dza d+ha ra/ sa man+ta ra sh+mi/ dz+wa la gar b+ha sha rI ra/ ma hA kA ru/ 
269a2(rgyud): Ni ka sau ma mya mu kha/ pa ri pU ra Na/ tsan+d+ra maN+Da la mu kha/ na maHtsan+na dza Ta d+ha ra/ a mi tA b+hA/ ma ku Ta d+ha ra/ ma hA prah+ma be Sha d+ha ra/ tri lo tsa na a mo g+ha ba ra da/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ ma hA kA ru Ni
269a3(rgyud): ka/ pad+ma pA shA a ba lo ki ti/ shud d+he satwa/ ba ra da ya ka/ na mo stu te swA hA// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so// rigs sngags
269a4(rgyud): 'dis gu gul nag po la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug da la bdug par bya'o// gdugs pa tsam gyi mod nyid la
269a5(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyi sa ston par mdzad cing mchog thams cad sbyin par mdzad do// gal te mtshams med pa lnga byed pa
269a6(rgyud): mnar med par gzhol ba des kyang bdugs pa tsam gyis nges par ston par mdzad na/ dge slong tshangs par spyod pa/ bsam pa dag pa dad pa can mos pa la lta smos kyang ci
269a7(rgyud): dgos/ mdo nyid la rang gi gzugs rang gi ngo bo yongs su dag pa mngon sum du ston par mdzad cing / mchog thams cad sbyin par mdzad la don yod pa chen po'i dngos grub
269a8(rgyud): sbyin par mdzad do// drag po la bdugs na gzugs mngon sum du mdun na 'dug cing / 'dod pa dang dgos pa'i dngos grub thams cad sbyin par byed do// sred med kyi bu/ 
269b1(rgyud): la bdugs na gzugs brnyan 'gul zhing / tshig 'byin la yid la bsams pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed/ rtag tu rjesu 'brang bar 'gyur/ stobs dang shugs dang / 
269b2(rgyud): brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa'i dngos grub sbyin par byed do// ma mo'i gnas su nag po chen po la gdugs na nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa dbang du gyur
269b3(rgyud): nas 'dug la las dang bya ba thams cad grub par byed/ thams cad du dngos grub chen po sgrub par byed do// tshogs kyi dbang phyug la bdugs na/ bgegs dang log
269b4(rgyud): 'dren thams cad bcings par 'gyuraro// 'dod pa'i dbang phyag la bdugs na sdang ba dang / bdud dang / bar chad byed pa gzhan gang yin pa de dag thams cad bcing
269b5(rgyud): par 'gyur zhing mi snang bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i sgor bdu gas na rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa bkug nas dbang du 'gyur te/ nye bar gnas la
269b6(rgyud): 'dong ba dang bya ba thams cad byed do// nyi ma shar ba'i tshe nyi ma la mngon du phyogs nas bdugs na nyi ma 'bab cing 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad sbyin par byed do// zla ba nya la
269b7(rgyud): bdugs na zla ba 'bab cing dbang phyug 'byor pa chen po sbyin par byed do// rnam thos kyi bu la bdugs na nor 'phel ba chen po sbyin par byed do// lha mo chen mo dpal la bdugs na
269b8(rgyud): dpal 'thob par 'gyuraro// gdon thams cad la bdugs pa tsam gyis 'bab cing phyogs bcur 'bros so// zin pa'am mazin po la 'dugs na mod la 'ong ngo // dur khrod
270a1(rgyud): mi rol bdugs na ro langs ldang bar 'gyuraro// thod pa la bdugs na 'bab cing gar byed/ glu len rgyug par byed cing spong gtong byed do// rdo rje la bdugs na
270a2(rgyud): 'bar ro// mdung rtse gsum pa la bdugs na 'bab par byed do// 'khor lo la bdugs na na mkha' la 'gro'o// zag pa la bdugs na sbrul bzhin 'khril bar byed/ rdza ma dang
270a3(rgyud): bum pa la bdugs na 'bab par byed cing rang nyid 'gyur bar byed la phan tshun 'gro bar byed do// lhung bzed la bdugs na rang nyid 'gro bar byed do// ral gri la bdugs na 'bab par
270a4(rgyud): byed cing 'bar bar byed la rang nyid 'gro bar byed do// dung de la bdugs nas bus na sgra gang du grags pa de/ dag thams cad du 'thab pa dang / 'thab me dang / rtsod pa dang / 
270a5(rgyud): 'gyed pa dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'gro ba'i nang dang / 'khrug pa dang / nad thams cad dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / sdig pa dang / gdug
270a6(rgyud): pa thams cad dang / dgra thams cad las thar par 'gyur zhing sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyuraro// rims thams cad la bdugs na/ rims thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// 
270a7(rgyud): rims nyin bzhi pa la bdug cing gsang sngags kyang rjes su dran na rims nyin bzhi pa ku co 'don cing 'bros par 'gyur ro// klu'i mtsher bdugs na mong nyid la char gyis rgyun chen po
270a8(rgyud): 'bebs par byed do// char ches na gnas mthon por bdugs na char ches pa gcod par byed do// sprin la mngon du phyogs nas bdugs na grang lhags dang / rlung dang / ser ba
270b1(rgyud): thams cad gcod par byed la/ lo cig gi bar du mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyuro// ri mthon po'i rtser 'dugs na/ phyogs bzhi thams cad kyi pha rol gyi dmigs tshogs dang / 
270b2(rgyud): phyir rgol ba dang / phas kyi dgra thams cad dang / dpag tshad stong gis bar du rmugs pa dang / rengs pa dang / bcings par 'gyur la dpag tshad stong gi bar du mtshams chen po
270b3(rgyud): bcad par 'gyur// bdag nyid la bdugs na sems can thams cad la mchod pa'i gnas chen por 'gyur la sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyuraro// bu mo la bdugs na bag
270b4(rgyud): mar blangs par 'gyuraro// tshong zong la bdugs na rin che bar lon par 'gyuraro// bang ba la bdugs na 'bru 'phel ba mang bar 'gyuraro// btung ba'i gnas su bdug
270b5(rgyud): na btung ba 'phel ba mang por 'gyuraro// gos la bdug sa na gos thob par 'gyuraro// me tog dang 'bra sa bu la bdugs na gang la byin pa de dag bdag nyid dam nor gyi
270b6(rgyud): sgo nas dbang du 'gyur ro// phreng ba la bdugs na gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na gang gis mgo la bcings pa de la 'bab par byed cing / ya mtshan byung ba dang
270b7(rgyud): 'byung ba smra'o// 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang la bdugs na rig sngags chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhing / 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ston por mdzad la/ dgos pa thams cad
270b8(rgyud): sgrub par mdzad do// gnod sbyin me'i gzugs bris pa la bdugs la gsang sngags lan bdun dran par byas na/ gnod sbyin mo 'ongs nas 'dod pa thams cad sbyin zhing las byed/ 
271a1(rgyud): par 'gyur la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar 'dug go/ sbyor ba mo la bdugs na sbyor ba mo thams cad dang / mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dbang du gyur nas ji srid 'tshan
271a2(rgyud): bar du bar du nye bar 'dug go// 'dod dgur sbyar ba'i gzugs can la bdugs na 'dod dgur sbyar ba'i gzugs can ma 'ongs nas chung mar bya'o// zhes smran ji srid 'tsho'i bar du
271a3(rgyud): yod byad dang / longs spyod du bya ba thams cad sgrub par byed la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la rtsibs dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / rnam thos kyi bu la 'gran par 'gyuraro// dril bu
271a4(rgyud): la bdugs nas sgra dkrol na 'jigs pa thams cad la sa thar par 'gyur la/ srung ba chen po byas par 'gyur/ khyim gyi nang du dkrol na 'byung po dang / gnod
271a5(rgyud): sbyin dang / srin pa dang / yi dgas dang / brjed byed dang / grib gnon thams cad byung nas phyogs bcur bro/ sa par 'gyur ro// oM a mo g+ha bA sha/ pad+ma uSh+Ti
271a6(rgyud): Sha ta ra ta ra/ a pa ta raM tu/ bA ban gats+tsha tu/ swa b+hA bA nAn/ tu ru tu ru/ ma hA pad+ma b+hu dze swA hA// slar gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags te/ bdug spos gu gul dang / 
271a7(rgyud): chu dang yungs kar dang bsres pa la lan bdun bzlas brjid byas na thams cad du slar gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags byas par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags rim par phye ba'i tshe/ 
271a8(rgyud): ga dang sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// // de nas lha mo chen mo sgrol ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ga la ba der
271b1(rgyud): song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lha'i mchod pa'i sprin chen pos mchod de/ 
271b2(rgyud): lan gsum bskor ba byas nas mgo btud de thal mo sbyar nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so// 
271b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rig sngags chen po 'jig rten du tshor bstan lags so// gsang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / don yod pa
271b4(rgyud): zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rig sngags kyi rgyal po che na po'i stong po rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi don dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar
271b5(rgyud): bgyi ba'i slad du 'dzam bu'i gling du bzhags lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang don yod pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rig sngags kyi rgyal po de'i snying po dang / 
271b6(rgyud): cho ga zhib mo don yod par sgrol ba dri ma med pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi zhags pa zhes bgyi ba rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i snying po bshad par bgyi ste/ rig sngags 'chang gang gis
271b7(rgyud): dran pa tsam gyis bdag bkug cing g.yar drangs par 'gyur/ rig sngags 'chang gis rig sngags sgrub cing yongasu spyod pa la rim gro bgyi ba dang / rig sngags 'chang
271b8(rgyud): sgrub pa'i dngos grub mchog rtsal bar bgyi ba dang / bsams pa thams cad yid bzhin du yongs su bskang bar bgyi ba de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor mang po'adu
272a1(rgyud): pa'i mngon sum du rig sngags kyi rgyal po bshad par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas lha mo sgrol ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha
272a2(rgyud): mo chen mo sgrol ma rang gi rig sngags kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa nga'i byin gyis brlabs kyi phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs kyis shod cig/ de nas lha mo sgrol ma bcom ldan 'das
272a3(rgyud): kyi spyan sngar don yod par sgrol ba dri ma mang ba pad+ma gtsug tar gyi zhags pa nos bya ba rig sngags kyi song ba smras pa/ nam sde yad+d+hi k+Shan+da/ thAthAg tu R+Sha shAkyan dzA ya yad+hi ldan nem
272a4(rgyud): nAM/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba le ki te shwarAd ya/ bod+hi satwA yo/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni/ de s+ya/ na maHtA rA ye/ ma hA debi/ oM tA ra Ne tA raNatA
272a5(rgyud): pad+ma bi b+ha Shi tA re/ ma Ni ka na ka bi tsit+titamA la/ ma ku Ta nan/ daM ta pad+me/ d+hu ru d+ha ru/ pid+me pA shed+d+hadzi/ a mo g+ha pA sha haste/ tA ra ya b+ha ge ba ti/ ma hA saH
272a6(rgyud): ba ri nge/ tu ru ta ru/ ma hA tA ra Ni ba ra de/ sA dA ya sA dA ya/ sid d+hi/ a mo g+ha ba ra de sA hA// oM a mo g+ha pad+mi ne tA re swA hA// snying po'o// oM ma Ni tI re hUM/ nye ba'i snying po'o// 
272a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gsang sngags nor bu rin po che chen po'i snying po// don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rig sdigs kyi snying po'i zhags pa cho ga zhib me'i rig sngags
272a8(rgyud): 'chang ba rnams kyi bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / sems can thams cad la mchog stsal ba rab tu stsal bar bgyi ba'i slad du rjesu stsal ba lagaso// bcom ldan 'das
272b1(rgyud): rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di'i yo byad dang / cho ga bshad par bgyi ste/ du ru ka dang / gu gul dang / sprig ka gcig tu bgyis la/ gsang sngags kyi snying po 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
272b2(rgyud): brjod bgyis nas bcom ldan 'das bdag la bdugs na bdugs pa tsam gyi mod la bcom ldan 'das bdag dgug pa dang / g.yar drangs par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das
272b3(rgyud): rig sngags 'di sgrub pa'i tshe rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis shing bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du dngos grub rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad
272b4(rgyud): bzlog par bgyi/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za thams cad bzlog par bgyi/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams
272b5(rgyud): cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi/ bsam pa thams cad yid ban na du rdzogs par bgyi/ mchog stsal bar bgyi/ de legs dang / dge legs srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / 
272b6(rgyud): sba bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das mchis nyal ba na bdug spos kyi rgyal po 'dis bdag la bdugs shing / bdag gi snying po nor bu rin po che chen po'i snying po gsum po de dag lan nyi
272b7(rgyud): shu rtsa gcig brjod na bdugs pa tsam gyi mod dang / dran pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid kyi ngo bo rang gi gzugs yongasu dag pa bstan cing / mngon sum du mchis par
272b8(rgyud): bgyi mchog thams cad rje su stsal bar bgyi/ byung ba dang 'byung ba'i bka' mtshang bgyi'o// dran pa tsam gyi mod la don yod pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi zhags pa'i snying po 'di dran pa tsam gyis
273a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bdag rig sngags 'chang de'i mdun du mchis shing bsam pa thams cad yang bzhin du yong su rdzogs par bkye/ sdang ba dang sdig pa thams
273a2(rgyud): cad dang / bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad so sor bzlog par bgyi/ dngos grub chen po sgrub pa rjesu stsal bar bgyi/ bkra shis kyi sgra thams cad 'byung bar bgyi/ rig sngag/ 
273a3(rgyud): kyi dngos grub thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba'i dngos grub thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ bsod nams drang
273a4(rgyud): ba'i dngos grub thams cad rjes sul bar bgyi/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cangs sor zlog par bgyi/ sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par
273a5(rgyud): rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar baN+Di/ rtag tu dz+nyAn ma 'tsha par rig sngags 'chang gi bgegs dang logs na thams cangs sor bzlog par bgyi/ nad thams cad
273a6(rgyud): bsal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'chang 'gum pa'i tshe rnam par shes pa tha ma la bang ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rtag tu mngon sum du bstan rtsa
273a7(rgyud): mdun na nye bar mchis par bgyi/ sangs rgyas yid la bgyid pa shin tu dran pas dus las 'da' bar bgyis pa dang / ji ltar sbrul lpags pa rjes pa bzhin lus brjes nas
273a8(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi skal pa dang mnyam par pad+ma dag las brdzus te skye la rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dang / tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ de bzhin
273b1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su bzung zhing byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lus rdo rjer 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du chud par 'gyur/ sa bcu la gnas par ya
273b2(rgyud): 'gyur/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par yang 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan par yang 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bskyed par yang 'gyur// 
273b3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du ston par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad bsags par 'gyur/ sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / sdig pa thams cad
273b4(rgyud): yongasu dag par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa tham sa cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i dam tshig rtogs pa dang / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig byang chub kyi
273b5(rgyud): snying po'i mthar thug pa'i bar du 'tshal bar 'gyur ba la gas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga gas pa shAkya thub pas lha mo chen mo sgrol ma la legs
273b6(rgyud): zhes bya ba byin te/ lha mo chen mo legs so legs so// rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di khyod kyis bshad pa mchog tu legs so// cho ga zhib mo 'di yongs su rdzogs par bya ba
273b7(rgyud): dang / rig sngags 'chang de yang yongasu srung ba'i phyir dang / yongasu bskyang ba'i phyir dang / dngos grub rab tu sbyin pa'i phyir khyod kyis yongasu bskyang bar bya'o// de nas gnod sbyin
273b8(rgyud): gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po bozhi dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / tshogs kyi bdag po nag
274a1(rgyud): chen po dang / rig sngags dang dkyil 'khor gyi lha du ma dang / nor bu bzang po'i bu dang / lnga rtsen dang / gar mkhan mchog dang / stobs can dang / stobs po che dang / 
274a2(rgyud): ljang sdo dang / dung can dang / de bzhin du 'jigs byed dang / dbyangs ldan ma dang / dpe med ma dang / lha mo chen mo dpal dang / ral pa gcig ma dang / che tog chags te thams
274a3(rgyud): cad 'dus nas 'thun par stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo
274a4(rgyud): sbyar nas btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang phyi dma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe rig sngags 'chang de dang / rig
274a5(rgyud): sngags smra ba'i/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnya na nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ gzhan yang skyes pa'am
274a6(rgyud): bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo gang zhig don yod pa'i zhags pa gtsug tor 'di sgrub par bgyid dam/ klog par bgyid dam/ 'don tam/ tha na ming tsam yang 'dzin par bgyid
274a7(rgyud): na/ bcom ldan 'das de la bdag cag kun nas 'thun par rtag tu rjesu 'brang zhing srung bar bgyi/ yongasu bskyang bar bgyi/ gzi brjid gzhug par bgyi/ dngos grub chen po'i
274a8(rgyud): bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/ bsam pa thams cad kyi mchog yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/ nyes par bgyis pa thams cad so sor bzlog par bgyi/ sdig pa dang / 
274b1(rgyud): sgrib pa thams cad yongasu sbyang bar bgyi/ byang chub kyi snying po la mthar thug gi bar du rtag tu rjesu 'brang bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du grogs po dag legs
274b2(rgyud): legs so// khyed kyis bya ba de ltar yin te rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po 'dings gtams shing yongasu gtad do zhes bka' stsal to// don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor
274b3(rgyud): gyi rdo rje chen po'i snying po gsang ba rdzogs so// / rnam par thar pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po gsang ba bstan pa bklags pas grub pa cho ga zhib mo rgyas pa ma
274b4(rgyud): tu gsang ba mtha' dag rdzogs pa yongasu rdzogs so// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ba
274b5(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas mig mi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas na sa bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol teto// bcom
274b6(rgyud): ldan 'das 'di na bdag la pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor pad+ma'i rigs kyi snying por gyur pa gsang ba de kho na nyid bstan pa mchis te/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang
274b7(rgyud): ba'i don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po khro bo'i rgyal po rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i snying po bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ngo bo tha dad pa dang / phyag rgya tha dad pa dang / sngags tha dad pa dang
274b8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dang / gzugs bri ba yongs su bsgrags par bgyi/ sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i slad du/ rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyi de kho nar gyur pa ni 'di
275a1(rgyud): lags te/ rig sngags 'chang ba thams cad kyi gnas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor pad+ma yangs pa'i dam tshig don yod pa'i zhags pasgrub pa'i cho ga rjes su
275a2(rgyud): stsal bar bgyi na bcom ldan 'das de bdag la gnang bar mdzad cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
275a3(rgyud): pa'i rigs dang / pad+ma'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs dang / rdo rje'i rigs dang / spyi'i dam tshig 'grub par 'gyur/ spyi'i byin gyis brlabs dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i
275a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dang / gzugs bri ba dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba la rjesu 'jug par 'gyur/ cho ga zhib mo sgrub pa thams cad kyi dngos grub de kho na nyid du 'gyur/ de
275a5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing / dang / byang chub sems dpa' dkyil 'khor du'o/ jug pa'i dam tshig byin gyis brlabs kyi de kho na nyid du
275a6(rgyud): 'gyur lags so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags
275a7(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// snying rje chen po dang ldan pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dam tshig rnam par thar pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor rnam
275a8(rgyud): par 'phrul pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dam tshig dkyil 'khor chen po dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba cho ga zhib mo de'i dus la dbab par shes na shod cig/ 
275b1(rgyud): ngas byin gyis brlabs shing rjes su yi rang la phyag rgya chen pos btab nas byin gyis brlab so// sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum
275b2(rgyud): phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs so// sems can thams cad kyi don du de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub bla na med pa
275b3(rgyud): phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / dam tshig chen por byin gyis brlabs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
275b4(rgyud): bzhin 'dzum zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dkyi gsang ba rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul pa bkod pa don yod pa mthong ba'i ting nge 'dzin
275b5(rgyud): mngon sum du byas nas ting nge 'dzin des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad 'od zer gyis snang bar byas/ lha'i
275b6(rgyud): gnas thams cad snang bar byas/ klu'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas/ gnod sbyin dang srin po'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas/ 'byung po'i gnas thams cad snang bar
275b7(rgyud): byas/ lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas/ sa'i 'og tu gtogs pa 'og na gnas pa thams cad snang bar/ 
275b8(rgyud): byas par snang gi gnas na mkha' la rgyu ba'i lha rnams snang bar byas shing stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas g.yo ba chen por 'gyur ba dang / g.yo
276a1(rgyud): ba'i mthus des de dag thams cad bskul bar gyur to// bskul ba tsam gyi mong nyid la/ de dag thams cad lhags te/ ri gru 'dzin na 'khor mang po 'dus
276a2(rgyud): pabar 'thun par lhags nas 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor mang po 'dus par mkhyen nas don
276a3(rgyud): yod pa'i zhags pa'i cha byad du zhugs shing bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba thams cad du rigs spyi'i dam tshig gi
276a4(rgyud): tshul du zhugs la/ ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis rgyan / rgyal ba 'od dpag med thor tshugs su thogs pa/ tshangs pa'i gzugs can phyag bco brgyad la rang gi ngo
276a5(rgyud): bo zhags pa thogs pa/ thal mo sbyar ba/ sku phyed na phyag g.yon pa brten pa/ mdung rtse gsum pa bsnam sa pa/ ril ba spyi blugs dang / bgrang phreng bsnams pa
276a6(rgyud): pad+ma bsnams pa/ pad+ma'i phyag rgya bsnams pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / rgyal mtshan bsnams pa/ me tog gi phur ma dang / bi dza pu ra bsnams pa/ dbugs 'byin
276a7(rgyud): par mdzad pa/ rin po che'i char 'bebs par mdzad pa/ thal mo sbyar ba'i phyag rgya mdzad pa/ spyi bor phyag rgya mdzad pa/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya mdzad pa/ pad+ma yangs pa'i
276a8(rgyud): phyag rgya mdzad pa/ rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya mdzad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / nor bu'i phyag rgya mdzad pa/ gzugs zhi ba/ spyan gsum pa/ mchod phyir
276b1(rgyud): thogs pa/ ga na pad+ma/ sku 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba/ sgrol ma bdun rjes su 'brang ba/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcus bskor ba/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / gshin rje dang / 
276b2(rgyud): chu lnga dang / lus ngan pos bskor ba/ dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu dang / sred med kyi bu dang / dbang chen dang / rgya mtsho dang / dga' bo
276b3(rgyud): dang / nye dga' bo 'khor dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar 'khod nas mig mi 'dzums shing bzhin 'dzums pas/ me tog sna tshogs pa rnams bcom
276b4(rgyud): ldan 'das la 'thor te/ 'di lta ste/ me tog shwa la dang / ta ma la dang / tsam pa ka dang / a ti muk+ta ka dang / sho kA brta dang / kha bye 'khyil pa dang / gan d+ha biR+Shi kra/ 
276b5(rgyud): dang / mthon kha dang / mthon kha chen po dang / ka dam/ pa dang / mdog mdzes pa dang / sum n+ya ka dang / skya/ snar dang / char gsal ba dang / dri med gzi brjid dang // 
276b6(rgyud): dri dga' dang / rab sim dang / pa lA sha dang / za ba dang / ma raN+Da ka dang / gzi brjid bsil dang / dri med dang / gzi yangs ldan dang / shin tu bstan dang lha dga' dang / yi
276b7(rgyud): dga' dang / yu thi ka dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / ud pa la dang / ud pa la dmar po dang / ta ra Na gu h+ya dang / gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che rnam
276b8(rgyud): pa sna tshogs kyi me tog rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa ni dngon sum du rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba don yod pa'i rgyal po 'di smras so// dus gsu
277a1(rgyud): du gshegs shing bzhugs pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba rigs
277a2(rgyud): kyi dam tshig la phyag 'tsha lo// rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor rigs dang / phyag rgya thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa
277a3(rgyud): dang / da ltar byung ba'i rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// yang dag par rdzogs pa rnams la phyag 'tsha lo// yang dag par zhugs pa rnams
277a4(rgyud): la phyag 'tshalo// blo gros chen po dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i dbu la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sa/ dmas dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa 'phags pa
277a5(rgyud): tshogs kyi mchog rnams la phyag 'tshalo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag
277a6(rgyud): 'tshalo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la
277a7(rgyud): phyag 'tshalo// drang srong chen po de dag dang / 'phags pa'i tshogs kyi mchog de dag la phyag 'tshal nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal nas byung ba/ don yod
277a8(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon sum du gsungs pa 'di 'khor mang po'i nang du bdag gis bzlas kyis/ bdag gi dgos

277b2(rgyud): re pa ra ma ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ si ri si ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ bi ri pa r-i/ be ra bai ra~M/ mahA pad+ma hasta/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki l-i/ ku lu ku lu/ me hI shud+d+ha satwa/ e h+ye hi/ bung d+ha bud d+h+ya/

277b4(rgyud): Ta Te/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hai ra b+hA ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ e h+ye hi maHdkA ru Ni ka/ ma hA ba shu ba ti/ be Sha d+ha ra/ ra d+ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ tsar tsa ra/ ha ra ha ra/ hA hA hA hA/

277b7(rgyud): pu ru pu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ sa nang ku mA ra/ ru dra bA sa ba/ briSh+Nu d+ha nad/ bA yu de pa ri Shi nA ya ka/ bi nA ya ka/ bahu bi bi d+ha be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi rad+ha ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ tha raH
277b8(rgyud): ma sngar gyur/ ya yar/ la rolar/ Shar bar/ mar mor/ par ba / 6 68/ bar b.rakha rangs ka/  sa maHma pa mag ta/ zi ma ga ta/ lesheg pa/ mcho shA
278a1(rgyud): mu tra/ mu ra mu ru/ mu ya mu ya/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad
278a2(rgyud): dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / yams kyi nad thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang / nad thams cad las srung du gsol/ srung du gsol/ gnod pa dang / 'ching ba dang / rdeg pa
278a3(rgyud): dang / sdigs pa dang / rgyal po dang / chom rkun dang / gnod byed dang / me dang chu dang / dug dang / mtshon las yongasu thar bar mdzad pa/ ka Na ka Na/ ka Ni ki Ni/ ku tu ku N+ya/ tsa ra tsa ra/ 
278a4(rgyud): in+di ya/ ba la bod+h+yAng+ga/ mA ra ka/ tsa tu rA r+ya sa t+ya saM prak+Sha da shA ka ta ma ta ma/ da ma da ma/ sha ma sha ma/ sa mas ma/ ma hA ta mAn d+ha ka ra/ bi d+ha man/ Sha Ta pA ra mi tA/ pa
278a5(rgyud): pU ri ka/ mi li mi li/ Ta Ta Ta Ta/ dzadza dzaH/ tre r+thar+thaH/ Tu Tu Tu Tu/ dzidz+r-i dzi dzi/ ru wuSh+Ta dzu/ e Ne ya tsan+da/ kr-i ta/ pa ri ka ra/ e h+ye hi ma hA kA ru Ni ka mahe shwa ra/ mat+ma/ 
278a6(rgyud): b+hUta/ ga Na b+ha dza ka/ ku ru ku ru/ pa ra ba ra/ ka Ta ka Ta/ maT maT/ be shud+d+ha bi Sha ya ni bA sa na~M/ mahA kA ru Ni ka/ shro ta ya dz+nyo pa bI ta ya/ rat+na ma kuT/ mA lA d+ha ra/ sarba dzA shair
278a7(rgyud): kr-i ta/ dza TA ma ku Ta ma hA da b+hU ta/ ka ma la kri ta/ ka ra ta la/ d+hu na sa mA d+hi/ bi mo k+Sha/ a pra kam+b+ha/ ba hu setra/ san+ta ti/ pa ri pA tsa ka/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ sarba karma A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha
278a8(rgyud): sarba b+hud+hi pa ri mo tsa ka/ sarba A sha pa ri pU ra ka/ sarba satwa/ se mA shA san ka ra na mostu te swA hA/ oM prah+ma be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ sa man+ta/ dz+wa la a mo g+ha hUM/ 
278b1(rgyud): don yod pa'i snying po// a yi ge gcig po ni kun nas gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig dang / pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa/ rigs thams cad
278b2(rgyud): kyi spyi'i yin te/ bklags pas grub pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis snying po yi ge gcig po kun nas de/ 
278b3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi gsang ba spyi'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor smras pa tsam gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug
278b4(rgyud): tu g.yos shing lha'i me tog gi char rab tu bab la/ kun nas rin po che'i char rab tu bab po/ de bzhin dgashegs pa gang ga klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig sting
278b5(rgyud): kun nas gshegs nas na mkha'i dkyil la rdzu 'phrul/ gyis bzhugs so// don yod pa'i rim par phyed 'i sprin lha'i rin po che sna bdun phab la 'bab pas khebs pa
278b6(rgyud): dang / lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog rnams dang / lha'i rgyan dang / gos sna tshogs pa'i char bcom ldan 'das dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs don yod pa'i rgyal po'i
278b7(rgyud): tshul du zhugs pa la mchod pa dang / bkur sti bya ba'i phyir rab tu phab po// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par mdzad de/ sen/ 
278b8(rgyud): dag pa chen po khyod kyis sangs rgyas 'byung ba mchog bstan pa legaso legaso// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya dang / dkyil
279a1(rgyud): 'khor dang / rig sngags kyi gnas rim par phye ba rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / yi ge gcig pa'i rjesu zhugs pa ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
279a2(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams su nyi ma gcig shar ba yin no// gang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
279a3(rgyud): gyi khams rdul phra mo snyed kyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba rdzogs par sangs rgyas 'byung ba gcig gis thams cad kyi rje su zhugs pa yin zhing / snying po yi ge gcig gi rje su zhugs pa
279a4(rgyud): yin la phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor rim par phye bad dang / dam tshig gcig gis rje su zhugs pa yin no// / don yod pa rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil
279a5(rgyud): 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bzang po 'ang ni don yod pa'i gsang sngags kyi zhags pas drangs shing sku gcig gi dam tshig la bkod pa yin te/ de nas
279a6(rgyud): don yod pa'i zhags pa zhes bya bar byin gyis brlabs so// snying po yi ge gcig pa'i gzungs sngags ni rtag tu bklags pas grub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
279a7(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la
279a8(rgyud): legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa leg so legaso// de kho na nyid bsgrub pa grub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs spyi'i dam tshig thams cad grub pa don
279b1(rgyud): yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po sgrub pa bklags pas 'grub pa 'di ni mchog tu bzang ba yin gyis yon tan gyi phung po shod cig/ snying po yi ge gcig pa 'don don yod pa'i zhags
279b2(rgyud): bsgrub pa bde ba/ bklags pas grub pa/ phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / sku gzugs ri mo dang bcas pa sgrub pa'i cho ga bla na med pa yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
279b3(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma yangs pa'i
279b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dang / pad+ma'i rigs kyi rnam par thar pa 'i dkyil 'khor dang / de kho na nyid kyi dam tshig gas dang ba chen po dang / rigs spyi'i sgrub pa bklags pas
279b5(rgyud): 'grub pa 'di'i yod byang dang / cho ga bshad par brgya yis bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs dug sol/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis dran pa tsam gyis
279b6(rgyud): bdag mdun na nye bar mchis shing / bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/ rig sngags kyi dngos grub thams cad rje su stsal bar bgyi'o// bcom
279b7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug legs so legaso// de ltar khyod kyis sems can thams cad bsgral bar bya zhing / rig sngags 'chang rnams
279b8(rgyud): kyi dngos grub dam pa mchog de khyod kyis rab tu sbyin par gyis shig don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po gsang ba'i dam tshig dang / yi ge gcig po rigs spyi'i rje su zhugs pa de
280a1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs kyis yo byad dang / sgrub pa'i cho ga shod cig de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
280a2(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyis dbugs phyung ba dag thos nas snying shin tu dga' ste/ yo byad dang / cho ga smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon sum nyid du sdig pa
280a3(rgyud): sreg cing ma lus par zad par bgyid pa/ sems can dmyal ba rtsa ba nas 'byin pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga smras pa/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas nas su/ dbus su pad+ma'i 'khor lo
280a4(rgyud): byas tshon rtsi sna tshogs rnam par dbye// pad+ma ze ba'i dbus/  su ni// spyan ras gzigs dbang bzhugs par/ dbya// bum pa bkang dang 'phan rnams kyis// dkyil
280a5(rgyud): 'khor kun nas brgyan par bya// me tog sna tshogs leg sa pa ra dgram// spos dri bzang pos bsgos pa yi / mar ma'i 'phreng ba kun tu bud// mchod yon chu dag gzha
280a6(rgyud): par bya// gu gul dang ni sa lpa ki/ a ga ru dang du ru ska// bdug spos snod bzhi dag nas bdug/ rig sngags 'chang ba khrus byas nas// gos gtsang bgos te smyung ba la// nye bar
280a7(rgyud): gnas nas tshes brgyad dam// bcu bzhi 'am tshes ni bco lnga ste// zla ba yar gyi ngo la sgrub// shar du kha bltas 'dug nas su// don yod zhags pa dus gsum du// nyi shu rtsa
280a8(rgyud): gcig bzlas brjod bya// snying po'ang brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas// yi ge gcig po 'bum du ni// mtshan mo bar chad med par bzlas// skya reng shar nas 'jig rten dbang // ze ba'i
280b1(rgyud): dbus na 'bar 'gyur zhing // 'gul 'gyur 'gul ba de yis ni// dmyal ba chen po bcu drug gi/ sgo rnams dag ni bye bar 'gyur// dmyal ba'i gnas nas shugs chen gyis// g.yo
280b2(rgyud): la g.yos pa tsam des ni// dmyal ba'i tshor kun rnam par 'dzag/ dmyal ba de yang rnam par 'joms// sems can dmyal ba de dag ni// thar nas phyogs bcur brgyug pa yi// 
280b3(rgyud): dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal kun las grol// mtho ris lam du zhugs par 'gyur// dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal thams cad dud 'gro rnams las yongasu grol bar 'gyur/ bdag
280b4(rgyud): nyid kyi sgrib pa dang sdig pa dang / sdug bsngal mi bzang po/ thams cad mthar gtugs par yongasu zad pa/ ra 'gyur/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las yong
280b5(rgyud): su grol bar 'gyuraro// gal te sdig pa thams cad zad par gyur na/ de'i tshe 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs bang phyug gi sku mdog gser gyi mdog can ston par mdzad
280b6(rgyud): la mchog thams cad sbyin par mdzad do// don yod pa dri ma med pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur/ sgrib pa dang bral ba/ sems can gyi rgyan rnam
280b7(rgyud): par dag pa'i bdag nyid ngo bo thob par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i klung gis bye ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu po rnams mang nyid la mngon sum du ston par
280b8(rgyud): mdzad la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi phyag g.yas pa mgo'i spyi bor 'jog par mdzad/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po
281a1(rgyud): yongs su bzung bar 'gyur/ 'jig rten pa kun gyis gcig pu mchod pa chen po byas par 'gyur ga shin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / 
281a2(rgyud): tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rang gi gzugs kyis mngon sum du ston cing nye 'khor la kun nas srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa byed par 'gyur/ dngos grub
281a3(rgyud): dang / dgos pa thams cad grub par 'gyur/ gal te sdig pa thams cad zad par ma gyur na/ de'i tshe 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku mdog gser gyi kha dog can du
281a4(rgyud): mi mthong / des sgrib pa dang / sdig pa lhag ma lus par she das par bya ste/ de nyid du bzlas brjod kyi cho ga spyad da ba gnyis pa byas pa dang / sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams
281a5(rgyud): cad rtsa ba dang bcas pa thams cad phyung bar 'gyuraro// gal te bzlas brjod kyi cho ga smyung ba gsum pa byed na ba zlas brjod kyi cho ga gsum rdzogs pa dang / 'phags pa
281a6(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs kyi phyag g.yas pa brkyang nas rig sngags 'chang bteg ste mod la 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'od dpag med kyi spyan sngar 'jog par mdzad la/ mngon sum
281a7(rgyud): du bzhugaso// de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyis dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing phyag spyi bor 'jog par mdzad de/ tshe dpag tu med par 'gyuraro// gal te sems can gzhan
281a8(rgyud): rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ skyes pa 'am/ bud meng ngam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'am/ zan dud 'gro'o skye gnas su song ba gang zhig sdig padang
281b1(rgyud): sgrib pa zad par 'dod na rig sngags 'chang khrus byas la gos gtsang ma bgos/ sbyang ba byas pa des dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par bzhag la rig sngags 'chang cho ga byed
281b2(rgyud): pas gsang sngags rje su dran par byas nas rma bya'i sgros byab par bya'o// de tsam gyis yon tan gyi khyad par thob par 'gyur te/ sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur/ 
281b3(rgyud): nad thams cad dang / bdug pa thams cad dang / na ba thams cad dang / mtshams med pa thams cad zad par 'gyur te the tshom mang ngo // sgrib pa dang bral ba nyid thob par
281b4(rgyud): 'gyur zhing tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyur/ lha thams cad kyis bzung zhing kun nas srung bar 'gyur/ de ba bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung thob par 'gyur/ 'phags
281b5(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzigs bzhed par 'a/ gyur/ tshe ring ba dang / sgrib pa dang / nad dang bral bar 'gyur/ tshe 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams
281b6(rgyud): bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur/ tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur te/ snying rje dang / byams pa
281b7(rgyud): chen po yid la bya ba rtse gcig tu bya zhing sbyang ba dang / bzlas brjod bya'o// sdig pa dang / sgrib pa zad par bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga'o// 'phags pa don yod pa'i
281b8(rgyud): zhags pa'i cho ga zhing mo'i rgyal po// / bam po bcu bdun pa/ de nas rtag tu bzlas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi tshad
282a1(rgyud): ji lta ba bzhin du/ legs par phye ba/ gru bzhi pa/ rgyur gzings kyi tshad kyis shin tu rnam par phye ba bya ste/ dri'i tshon rtsi rnam par bkra ba kun nas pad+ma'i
282a2(rgyud): phreng ba dang / rdo rje'i ge sar la brten pa'i dbus su pad+ma bya'o// rdo rje'i thig skud kyis kun nas bskor ba'i dbus kyi pad+ma'i go sar la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug tshang
282a3(rgyud): pa'i cha byad 'dzin pa dgod par bya'o// nyi ma re re zhing me tog dang bdug pa dbul bar bya zhing nyi ma re re zhing a ga ru'i bdug pa dang / khrus byas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ don
282a4(rgyud): yod rgyal po'i bzlas brjod dang / phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ da'o// yi ge gcig pa'i snying po'i bzlas brjod thu na gsum du lan gsum mam/ lan bdun nam/ lan
282a5(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas so// zas ngan pa bcu yongasu spangs par bya zhing / sems can ngan pa yang spangs par bya'o// sgrub thabs kyi de kho na nyid las thams
282a6(rgyud): cang du 'jig rten pa'i bya ba thams cad 'grub bo// 'jigs pa chen po mi bzad pa brgyad po de rnams las grol lo// don yod pa'i rgyal po dran pas nad thams cad rnam par nyams
282a7(rgyud): par byed do// dug dang sbyar dug dang / byang stems dang / gdon thams cad dang / 'jigs pa dang / sdang ba dang / skrag pa dang / rims dang / nad thams cad dang / po la
282a8(rgyud): mig dang / ldog pa dang / mtshan par rdol ba dang / g.yan pa dang / rkang shu dang / mdze dang / mgo bon pa dang / mig na ba dang / rna ba na pa dang / snun pa dang / kha na pa dang / rkan na pa
282b1(rgyud): dang / mgul na ba dang / snying na ba dang / ljon pa dang / so dang / mchun pa dang / lag pan pa dang / rtsib logs na pa dang / chu son pa dang / pho ba'i nang dang / mazhu ba dang / rkang pa na ba dang
282b2(rgyud): rgya ba na ba dang / yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad na ba dang / tshad pa dang / gzhang nad dang / gcin nad dang / gsud pa dang / 'khog pa la lan cig brjod de byas pa tsam
282b3(rgyud): gyis thams cad sel bar byed de/ myur du rab tu zhi bar byed cing skad cig de nyid la yang yang dag par gnas par byed do// 'jig rten pa'i bya ba gzhan thams cad 'grub par
282b4(rgyud): 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya ste dang phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nyi ma re/ re zhing bskyed par 'gyur ro// bsod nams chen po dang
282b5(rgyud): ldan par 'gyuraro// tshig btsun par yang 'gyur ro// 'ji ga rten thams cad kyi bla mar yang 'gyur ro// mcho dpa'i 'os chen por 'gyuraro// don che zhing che ba dag 'ong
282b6(rgyud): 'gyuraro// dbang phyug dang / dpon po lhun gyis grub pa nyid du rnyed do// rgyal po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang / g.yog tu bcas pas gcig tu mchod par 'os par 'gyur// 
282b7(rgyud): nyi ma re re zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyuraro// rtag tu yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ba so sor thob po// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang
282b8(rgyud): dag par rgyan pa mthong ngo // tshes brgyad dang bco lnga la po Ta la ka'i ri bo'i gzhal med khang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas na/ 'phags pa spyan ras
283a1(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug bzhugs te/ 'khor chen po la chos ston par mdzad pa dang / 'od dpag med bde ba can gyi gnas na zhugs pa mthong ste ji srid byang chub
283a2(rgyud): snying po'i bar du mthong ngo // 'chi 'phos pa na bsams pa nyid kyi mo la bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur te/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan par pad+ma las
283a3(rgyud): brdzus te skye bar 'gyuraro// sgrib pa dang bral zhing rnam par 'phrul pa byin gyis rlob pa don yod pa'i 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob po// ting nge 'dzin gang zhig thob pas
283a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag snyed las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshe dgas pa thams cad la mngon par phyag byas nas/ se
283a5(rgyud): gol gtogs pa tsam nyid la slar yang 'ong ba de lta bu'i/ nga nge 'dzin so sor thob po// ting nge 'dzin gzhan khra ga khrig brgya stong phrag so sor thob cing / bzlas pa'i cho ga
283a6(rgyud): gcig pus las thams cad sgrub par 'gyur ro zhes so// bzlas pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga'o// de nas khrus kyi dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ khrus byed pa la mkhas
283a7(rgyud): pa gang gis dri ma thams cad sel bar byed cing mdzes pa/ sdig pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed pa dngos grub thams cad byed pa'i de kho na nyid bsod nams dang gzi brjid
283a8(rgyud): rab tu 'phel bar byed pa/ nad thams cad sel bar grub pa/ sdig pa dang / sdig to nyams par byed pa/ de bzhin du zad pa dang nyams pa bcom pa/ drug dang byang stems nyams pa/ 
283b1(rgyud): nangad yun ring po yongasu spangs pa/ de bzhin du gcod yun ring po dang rims yongasu spangs pa ste 'di dag khrus kyis 'grub ste/ rig sngags gang yin pa nges 'grub par don yod pa
283b2(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yongasu bsgrag so// bgegs kyis reg pa gang yin pa dang / grib gnon gyi gdon mi bzad pas reg pa gang yin pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag
283b3(rgyud): tshogs kyi 'jigs pa mi bzad pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa la yang / dgra rnams kyis pham pa dang / skye bo sdang ba dang / gang gi 'khrug pa'i g.yul du song ba dang / rgyu skar
283b4(rgyud): gyis bcom pa gang yin pa dang / blo'i skye ba zad pa dang / ma ning dang / nyams pa'i ma ning dang / dbang po nyam rnas pa'i bar gang yin pa rnams dang bu mi 'tshe ba gang yin
283b5(rgyud): pa rnams kyi bu 'thun par skye bar 'gyuraro// bsad cing / gzhom pa thob pa gang yin pa dang / 'ching ba dang / bsod par song ba gang yin pa dang / chom rkun nam/ 
283b6(rgyud): rkun mo'i nang ngam/ gnod sbyin nam srin po'i nang du song ba gang yin pa dang / gcan zan gtum po'i nang du song ba gang yin pa dang / mche ba gdug pa dang / dug gi khrod du song
283b7(rgyud): pas dug 'jigs pa mi bzad pa zos pa gang yin pa dang / khyim sdib pa dang / g.yang sa dang / byi ba kha gdug pa'i 'jigs pa rnams dang / mi mngon par sdig pa byed pa gang
283b8(rgyud): yin pa dang / mtshams med pa byed pa gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa la bskur ba 'debs pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba 'di rnams dkyil 'khor du khrus byas pas thams
284a1(rgyud): cad yang dag par zad par 'gro zhing / myur du thams cad rnam par nyams par byed de rtsa rnams me'i sreg pa bzhin du sngon bsags pa'i mi bzang ba'i las
284a2(rgyud): 'di dag thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do// 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla ma dang / rtag tu mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro// tshe yun ring por gnas te/ rtag tu bde ba dang / 
284a3(rgyud): dga' bar byed do// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nad med cing rims med pa nyid du gan so// bde blag tu bya ba byed cing / de'i skye ba bdun dran par 'gyur ro// lha rnams kyis rtag tu
284a4(rgyud): srung bar byed cing / mthar thug rtag tu dpal 'bar bar byed do// sangs rgyas rnams rtag tu mthong bang dang / rtag tu 'jig rten dbang phyug gi mchog sbyin par
284a5(rgyud): byed pa dang / rtag tu mthong bar 'dod pa yang thun mtsha mas rtag tu mngon sum du mthong bas gnas par byed do// rtag tu rig sngags dang / dkyil 'khor
284a6(rgyud): gyi lha dang / rig sngags kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur te/ rtag tu dkyil 'khor gyi mchog gang yin pa yang sgrub par byed do// rgyar bzings kyi tshad kyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bya ste/ 
284a7(rgyud): tshon sna tshogs pas rnam par phye ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi mchog bri bar bya'o// me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs pas bkra ba/ sgo bzhi kun nas rnam par phye ba dang / las rnams
284a8(rgyud): legs par zin nas dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por 'khor lo yang dag par bri'o// pad+ma'i lte ba dang snying po nyid kyang 'bar bar bya'o// zur dang zur rnams su/ zhags pa
284b1(rgyud): 'bar ba pad+ma la gnas pa bya'o// rig sngags 'dod pas khrus dang gtor ma dkar po yang 'dir dgod par bya'o// a ga ru'i bdug pa dbul zhing / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ji lta ba
284b2(rgyud): bzhin du/ dkyil 'khor legs par brgyan par bya'o// las gzhan sgrub pa ni ro sna tshogs pa'i gtor mas mchod par bya zhing sna tshogs pa'i bdug spos dbul lo// bum pa
284b3(rgyud): chus bkang nas rdzas kyi phye ma rnams der gzhug cing / rin chen sna bdun bcug ste/ de la rgya dar gyis bcings la/ don yod zhags pa brgya dang / snying po nyid kyang lan brgyar
284b4(rgyud): bzlas so// yi ge gcig pa brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas so// 8/ tsan dan dang / sa mI dang / si ri Sha dang / hab shang tsi de'u dang / gur gum dang / yungs kar dang pad+ma ge sar
284b5(rgyud): rnams legs par btags nas bum pa bkang bar bya ste/ 'di rnams kyi khrus bya'o// nye'u shings shu ti dang / bil ba ste 'di rnams kyi nyed pa dang / rtag tu sngon du
284b6(rgyud): byab par byas la/ de nas mkhas pas khrus bya'o// de nas srung ba'i cho ga ni don yod rgyal pos bya'o// de nas rtswa ngur ba bting nas/ de la skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste/ bum hA
284b7(rgyud): chus khrus bya zhing pad+ma'i phyag rgya yang byed du gzhug go/ de nas gtsang ma gos gtsang ma bsgos te/ gtsug tor btsong bar bya zhing / sngon du bzlas pa 'bul ba dang bskor ba byas
284b8(rgyud): nas/ sgo dang sgo nas phyag bya'o// shar gyi sgo ru zhugs la dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por/ skyil krung gis 'dug la/ don yod pa'i rgyal pos lan bdun du byab par
285a1(rgyud): bya'o// lag tu rdo rje dang / bgrang phreng gis mngon par dbang bskur zhing / chu dang yungs kar dang phyag rgyas dbang bskur bar bya'o// de nas dkon mchog gsum
285a2(rgyud): la mchod pa bya'o// 'di ni khrus kyi gtso bor 'jig rten dbang phyug gis gsungaso// sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don gyi ched dang / rig sngags 'chang rnams la khyad pa
285a3(rgyud): du/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang / lha thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / don yod pa'i phun sum tshogs pa gdon mi za bar byed do// gang dang gang du las
285a4(rgyud): la nges par sbyar ba thams cad du don yod pa'i dngos gru dab thob par 'gyur te/ thams cad du 'di la the tshom med do// sngags kyi dngos grub bla na med pa ma grub pa yang
285a5(rgyud): grub par 'gyur te/ don yod pa'i dngos grub thob cinga'aphral nyid du 'bras bu mthong ba yin no// lus yo/ ngasu dag cing shin tu dri ma med pa dang / legs par khrus
285a6(rgyud): byas par de brjod par bya'o// sdig pa thams cad nyams par byed pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad zad par byed pa/ nad thams cad las yongasu grol bar byed pa ste/ mdor na thams
285a7(rgyud): cad du dngos grub so sor rnyed cing / dpal chen por lhag par 'gro'o// rig sngags don du gnyer ba thob ste/ rig sngags don yod pa'i dngos grub kyi de kho na nyid las bu 'dod
285a8(rgyud): pas ni bu thob po// nor 'dod pas ni nor thob po// dbang phyug 'dod pas ni dbang phyug thob po// myur du dpal 'dod pas ni dpal thob po// mngon par 'dod pa thams cad phral
285b1(rgyud): du yongasu rdzogs par byed do// zhes so// khrus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// / de nas nor bu'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ yid
285b2(rgyud): bzhin gyi nor bu'i sgrub pa rmad du byung ba don yod pa'i nor bu'i dngos grub dang / bya ba thams cad sgrub par byed pa/ thams cad du ltung ba'i sdug bsngal las byung ba'i 'jigs pa
285b3(rgyud): thams cad las skyob par byed pa bsod nams thob pa mngon par thar par byed pa/ mtshon cha dang / khong bsgril gcog par byed par the tsom med do// sdig pa thams cad rnam
285b4(rgyud): par nyams par byed pa/ mtshams med pa zad par/ byed pa/ rtag tu gsod ba med pa'i gnas thams/ cad du son par byed pa/ rtag tu 'khrugs pa dang / 
285b5(rgyud): g.yul ngo las rgyal ba sbyin par 'gyur ro// chom rkun gyi nang nas grol bar 'gyur zhing / rkun mo las kyang sgrol bar byed do// gcan zan gtum po seng ge dang / 
285b6(rgyud): glang po che dang / do ma dang / gzig dang / dred dang / khyi dang / phag dang / lce spyang rnams las nor bu'i rgyal po gang du gnas pa'i mdo la thams cad du sgrol bar byed do// dug
285b7(rgyud): dang / sbrul thams cad dam/ mche ba sdug pa dang / sbrul go na sa dang / bta sa nA b+ha dang / du ga nyid dang / dug shring ga dang / dug mu sta ka nyid dang / de ra da'i dug dang / lus
285b8(rgyud): la byas pa dang / mi bzad pa'i dug dang / dug ha la ha la dang / sdig pa la sogs pa gang yin pa dang / mthong ba'i dug gang yin pa dang / dbugs kyi dug mi bzad pa gang yin
286a1(rgyud): pa dang / reg pa'i dug 'jigs pa dang / 'jog po yis kyang zin pa dang / gzhan yang srog chags mi bzad ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dug mi bzad pa rnams/ 
286a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam dang / nor bu reg pa tsam gyis de rnams thams cad 'phral du drug med par 'gyuraro// gal te gang gar 'bab pa'i dug 'thungs kyang 'phral du 'jogs/ 
286a3(rgyud): par byed do// na mkha' lding gis sbrul nyid dang klu bzhin no// me yis mi 'tshig go// slar yang chus 'khyer bar mi 'gyuraro// byi ba kha gdug pa'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung / de
286a4(rgyud): la rgyal po khro bar mi byed do// nam yang phyir rgold ba dang / dgra dang / 'thab mo dang / 'khrul 'khor/ byed pa dang / sdang ba gang yin pa de rnams med do// tshe
286a5(rgyud): ga 'di ni mchog go/ dug dang byang stems dang / phye ma'i sbyor ba la sogs pa thams cad skad cig de la nyams par byed do// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'bru
286a6(rgyud): po dang / yi dgas dang / skem byed dang / brjed byed dang / gsang ba pa dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren rnams dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam dang / nor bu bzung ba nyid kyis
286a7(rgyud): thams cad 'bros par byed de 'di la the tshom med do// 'di thams cad kyis thun mong du nor bu'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba la/ bsam pa gang yin pa'i bsam pa de thams cad yid
286a8(rgyud): la don du gnyer bar bya ba gang yin pa rnams kyang nor bu bzung ba nyid la thams cad myur du phun sum tshogs par byed do// tshe 'phel ba dang / sngags kyi dngos grub bla na med pa
286b1(rgyud): grub bo// bkra shis pa dang / dam pa dang / bsod nams dang / dag pa dang / sdig pa nyams pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa nyams pa dang / 'phral du rmi lam bzang por byed pa nyid dang
286b2(rgyud): rtag tu sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang / rtag tu lha rnams 'gugs pa nyid dang / rtag tu 'byor pa thams cad byed pa dang / rtag tu zla ba nya ba ltar 'od zer
286b3(rgyud): 'bar bas rnam par mdzes pa dang / tshig brdzun pa dang / rtag tu dga' ba dang / thams cad du mchod par bya ba'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gi rdzas kyi sbyor ba bya ste/ cha
286b4(rgyud): mnyam par legs par phye la gtso bo'i rje su 'brang bar bya'o// 'di lta ste/ rgyal ba dang / rnam par rgyal ra ba dang / nA ku li dang / dri'i nA ku li dang / a ru ra dang / 
286b5(rgyud): lag pa dang / dbang po log pa dang / dri'i spyi yang ku/ dang / rgya spos dang / 'khor lo dang / 'khor lo cha/ na po dang / khyab 'jug gnon pa dang / so ma rA dza dang //
