286b6(rgyud): sun na da dang / pad+ma ge sar dang / ma la ya'i tsan dan/ na la da dang / gur gum dang / ba bla la dang // ud pa la sngon po dang / klu shing gi me tog dang / tsam pa ka'i me tog dang / 
286b7(rgyud): pa TA dang / bag skyes dang / spang spos dang sA ma ka rnams mnyam par byas te phye ma zhib mor legs par btags la bu shel rtse dang / tsan dan gyi chus smras te/ zangs kyi/ 
286b8(rgyud): snod du bzhag la/ khrus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bkod te/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas snying po brgya rtsa brgyad nyid dang / yi ge gcig pa
287a1(rgyud): 'bum du bzlas pas rdzas kyi snod 'bar bar byed do// de nas nor bu mgo bo la bcings pa'am/ lag pa la bcings la bzung bar bya ste/ mchog tu skal
287a2(rgyud): pa bzang po thob cing / dbang phyug gi mchog dang dpon po thob po// rje rigs bu med pas kyang mi dang nor 'phel bar 'gyuraro// rgyal po dang / dgra rab tu 'joms shing / srung
287a3(rgyud): pa'i mchog tu rnyed par dka' bas te/ nor bu gang du gnas pa der/ glog gi gnod pa med do// der byi ba kha gdug pa'i 'jigs pa dang / g.yo ba mi 'byung ngo // nor bu'i rgyal
287a4(rgyud): po gang du gnas pa'i gnas 'di mchod rten du bskur ro// / sum cu rtsa gsum na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi rtag/  tu srung bar byed cing / rtag tu yang rgyal po chen po bzhi
287a5(rgyud): dang / lag na rdo rje stobs po ches rtag tu yang srung zhing / dus rtag tu rje su 'brang bar 'gyur te the tsom med do// / dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ rgyar gzings
287a6(rgyud): kyi tshad kyi logs bzhi pa zur bzhi pa shin tu bcags pa/ legs par sbyar ba mchog tu mdzes pa bya'o// khor yug tu me tog sna tshogs kyi mgo lcogs kyi bkra ba bris la shar
287a7(rgyud): gyi sgo rnam par phye ste dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi pad+ma rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyis yongasu bskor ba'i dbus kyi pad+ma'i ge sar la yang / 'jig rten dbang phyug dgod par bya'o// 
287a8(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du/ rdzas kyi snod bzhag par bya zhing / me tog gcal du bkram par bya la/ dkyil 'khor brgyan par bya ste/ dri dang yon/ 
287b1(rgyud): chab dbul bar bya zhing / tsan dan gyi bdug pa sreg go// nyin mtshan du gos gtsang ma bsgo zhing bcing bar bya/ shin tu dri ma med pa'i sems su 'gyur bar bya/ byams pa dang / snying
287b2(rgyud): rje mchog tu 'gyur bar bya zhing / de nas nor bu'i rdzas sgrub po zhes so// nor bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// de nas ldong ros kyi mig sman gyi cho ga'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ 
287b3(rgyud): rgyar gzings kyi cha'i mthar thug pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas te/ dri sna tshogs dang / rnam par bkra ba'i rig sngags 'chang ni/ grwa rnamasu mkhas pas bri bar bya'o// 
287b4(rgyud): dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por/ pad+ma mdab ma phyed kha bye ba'o// lag pa gnyis kyi dbusu pad+ma ge/ da sar rgyas pa 'chang ba'o// shar gyi sgo rnam par phye ba
287b5(rgyud): bya ste/ ldong ros dngul gyi snod du bzhag nas dkyil 'khor du pad+ma'i steng du dgod par bya'o// snod kyi khor yug tu dar dmar po'i gos bzang pos g.yog par bya
287b6(rgyud): yang na pad+ma'i mdab ma 'am/ yang na byang chub shing gi mdab ma 'am/ yang na shing 'dzam bu'i mdab mas g.yog par bya'o// a ga ru'i bdug pa dbul bar bya'o// 'phags
287b7(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod zhags pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i drung du dgod par bya'o// me tog dang dris mchod pa bya// rig sngags 'chang gis
287b8(rgyud): dkar gsum zos la 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad kyi bsnyen gnasu 'gyur bar bya'o// yang na nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pa bya/ zla ba yar ngo'am/ tshes bco lnga'i nya'am// tshes
288a1(rgyud): bcu bzhi 'am/ tshes brgyad la/ gtsang mar khrus byas te/ gos gtsang bsgo bar bya/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyang bzlas shing / snying po brgya rtsa brgyad
288a2(rgyud): kyang bzlas par bya/ yi ge gcig pa stong phrag bcur bzlas la/ dkyil 'khor nye bar spras shing me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang mar me dang / gtor ma dbul bar bya'o// de nas
288a3(rgyud): yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du 'phang par bya'o// 'phangs pa tsam gyi mod la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lus la
288a4(rgyud): 'od zer sna tshogs 'byin par byed do// ldong ros kyi snod de yang 'bar bar byed de/ 'bar ba tsam gyi ma la dmig la bskus na na mkha' la 'gro'o// don yod pa'i ye
288a5(rgyud): shes yangs pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i 'od zer gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob po// don yod pa'i 'khor lo kun nas rnam par gzigs pa zhes
288a6(rgyud): bya ba'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba gang ga'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus
288a7(rgyud): yongasu bskor bar 'gyuraro// thams cad du gnas kyi mnga' bdag rgyal por 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro zhing / tshe bskal pa dpag tu med par 'gyuraro// rgyal
288a8(rgyud): ba 'od dpag med kyi cod pan 'chang bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa dri ma med pa'i spyan zhes bya ba'i rdzu 'phrul so sor thob ste/ rdzu 'phrul gang gis se gol ba rtogs pa tsam gyis/ 
288b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing / gang ga'i klung bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur 'gro bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don yod pa'i dngos grub yangs
288b2(rgyud): pa'i mchod par 'gyur zhing skad cig gis slar yang 'ong bar byed do// rang gi lus la 'od zer brgya stong phrag du ma 'bar bar byed do// gang 'dod pa thams cad byed do// de nas du ba
288b3(rgyud): 'phrul bzhin pa ni bskus na mi snang bar 'gyur te/ mi snang ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal por 'gyuraro// lha dang klu dang / gan
288b4(rgyud): sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / lha ma yin dang // na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye che/ dan po'i gnas kyi sgo thams cad bye nas gnas te/ gang
288b5(rgyud): du 'dod pa der 'jug par byed do// gnas thams ca da na gnas pa rnams 'bangasu gyur nas gnas te/ ci bsgo ba byed do// sems can thams cad kyang rdza su
288b6(rgyud): 'brang bar 'gyuraro// rgyal po dang btsun mo'i 'khor g.yog dang bcas pas mchod pa dang / bla mar bya ba'i gnas gcig pur 'gyur// bka' bsgo ba yang / bdag nyid dang / nor
288b7(rgyud): gyis kyang byed cing gnaso// dbu ba 'byung bzhin pa bskus na/ cho ga zhib mo dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rigs kyi
288b8(rgyud): gsang ba'i dam tshig mngon du gyur nas gnas te/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa rnams sngon du gyur nas gnaso// lha dang
289a1(rgyud): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad yang dag par rje su 'brang zhing / srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i ched du rtag pa kho nar rje su 'gro'o// 
289a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mngon sum du mthong ba sbyin par 'gyuraro// don yod pa'i 'od zer dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob te/ sa'i
289a3(rgyud): steng nas sor bzhi tshang du 'phags pa'i na mkha' la gnaso// ldong ros la bzlas nas mig la bskus nas/ mig gis gang mthong ba de dbang du gyur nas gnas te/ rgyal po
289a4(rgyud): dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang / blon po dang / bkrabs pa dang / 'dun na 'don dang / dpung gi tshigs yan lag bzhi dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / 
289a5(rgyud): bu mo dang / dge slong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje rigs dang / dmangs rigs rnams dbang du gyur nas gnas so// tha na ri dgas dang / bya yang lta
289a6(rgyud): bar byed bzhin du dbang du gyur nas nye bar gnas so// 'dis byugs pa'i mig gi nad dang / gnod pa dang / sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do// 
289a7(rgyud): lus kyi gdung ba dang / sems kyi gdung ba thams cad dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / mtshan ma ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis par gyur pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do// skye
289a8(rgyud): brjes nas kyang spyan lnga yongasu dag pa so sor thob bo// tshe rabs dran par yang skye bar 'gyuraro// 'jigs pa dang / sgrib pa dang bral zhing / don yod pa legs par rab tu
289b1(rgyud): gnas pa kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i lus dag pa so sor thob po// kun nas don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig so sor thob
289b2(rgyud): po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun tu gzigs pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang bskur ba so sor thob bo// byang chub sems dpa' thams
289b3(rgyud): cad dang rtag tu yang 'grogs shing gnas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan par 'gyuraro// zhes so mig sman gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// / 
289b4(rgyud): de nas bdug pa rim par phye ba'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/ darig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi mchog tu rma dad du byung ba/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
289b5(rgyud): thams cad mchod pa'i don dang / de bzhin nyid du 'dzi garten gsum po thams cad 'gugs pa grub pa dang / lha thams cad spyan drang ba dang / dbang po dang / 
289b6(rgyud): tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams bsdigs par byed pa/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / sha za dang / gdon ma rungs pa de rnams thams cad
289b7(rgyud): bdug pa'i dris 'bros par the tshom med do// bgegs dang log par 'dren pa nyid dang / sdang ba dang / de bzhin du bdud kyang rung ste/ bdug pa'i dris rnam par zhig par
289b8(rgyud): 'gyur zhing / yan lag dang nyin lag rnam par 'thob par byed do// rang gi dmag dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / shin tu 'dras pa dang / phyir rgol ba dang / de bzhin
290a1(rgyud): du dgra bo nyid dang / skye bo sdang ba dang / gang du 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / g.yul nyid kyang bdug pa'i dris/ thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur
290a2(rgyud): bar the tshom med do// gal te skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze nyid dang / de bzhin du dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / dge slong
290a3(rgyud): dang / dge slong ma dang / rgyal po'am/ rgyal phran dang / de bzhin du rgyal mo dang / btsun mo'i 'khor kyang rung ste/ legs par khrus byas/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas bdug
290a4(rgyud): spos 'dis bdugs na gang gis btugs pa'i dri mnam sa pa dang / de lus la reg pa tsam gyis sdig pa tha ma/ mas cad las rnam par grol lo// sgrib pa thams
290a5(rgyud): cad rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid thob par 'gyur te/ 'di/ la the tshom med do// mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa/ rnams 'phral du thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur// 
290a6(rgyud): zhes so// bdug pa 'di tsam gyis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dris kun tu 'gengs te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i gnas nas ji srid tshangs pa'i 'jig/ 
290a7(rgyud): rten gyi bar dris kun tu 'gengaso// stobs dang shugs chen pos lha'i gnas thams cad 'gul bar byed cing bskyod par byed do// chu rgyun gyi klu rnams 'gul bar byed cing / ri rab
290a8(rgyud): las gzhan pa'i ri gang yin pa 'dar yed yeng byed do// gsang bar gnas pa rnams rnam par skrag par byed do// dmyal ba bcu drug gi 'jigs pa rnams rnam par zhig par
290b1(rgyud): byed do// de bzhin du sa'i mthil thams cad kyang dkar bsil du snang bar 'gyuraro// dmyal ba'i sems can rnams shin tu sbyangs pa dang / sdug bsngal mi bzang ba de rnams
290b2(rgyud): thams cad yongasu grol te/ bde ba can du yang 'gro'o// mtho ris thams cad du ji lta bzhin du gnas so// dmyal ba thams cad nyams te/ pad+ma can du rab tu 'gyur ro// nyi tshe
290b3(rgyud): ba'i dmyal ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa gzhan rnams dang / sa 'og gi nang du song ba gang yin pa dang / dgon pa dang / ri dang tshang tshing dang / dgon gdung dang / g.yang sar gnas
290b4(rgyud): pa'i dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong ba gang yin pa de rnam sa thams cad gdug pa'i dris yongs su grol lo// / mi gtsang ba za ba'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 
290b5(rgyud): 'byung po dang / sha za gang yin pa rnams dang / bsha pa dang / lci ba za ba gang yin pa rnams dang / mchu lam dang / snabs za ba gang yin pa rnams dang / 
290b6(rgyud): 'dres pa zab gang yin pa de rnams thams cad bdug pa'i dri mnams pa tsam gyis yongs su grol nas phral nyid du lha'i 'jig rten du skye'o// rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i
290b7(rgyud): khro ba'i mchog dang / dri zhim po'i kha zas rnyed par 'gyuraro// dud 'gro'i skye gnasu song ba'i srog chags ri dgas dang / bya rnams thams cad dril mnams pa tsam gyis nang
290b8(rgyud): thams cad las yongasu grol lo// bdug pa mnams pa tsam 'das nad thams cad las yongasu grol lo// rims thams cad las yongasu grol lo// na ba thams cad
291a1(rgyud): las yongasu grol lo// 'bras dang / phol mig dang / ldog pa dang / me dpal dang / shu ba dang / mdze dang / g.yan pa dang / mig na ba dang / mgon pa dang / 
291a2(rgyud): gzhog phyed na ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / snun pa dang / son pa dang / kha na dang / smra ba dang / 'jigs pa dang / skrag pa dang / nad 'gro ba dang / 'khrug pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad bdug/ 
291a3(rgyud): pa'i dri bsnams pa tsam gyis rab tu zhi bar byed do// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de dang / don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po'i mthu yis sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba'i
291a4(rgyud): las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed ci dang / rnam par grol te mi 'jigs pa'i grong du 'gro bar 'gyuraro// de nas rdzas rnams kyis rang bzhin cha shas rnam
291a5(rgyud): par phye ba dang ldan pa bshad par bya ste/ tsan dan srang sa/ sum dang / a ga ru srang gsum dang / tu ru ska srang lnga dang / gur gum srang bcu dang / sbrika srang gnyis
291a6(rgyud): dang / na lan srang gnyis dang / ma he'i mig srang nyi shu dang / sra rtsi pog srang bcu dang / bol srang gsum dang / sal+la kI srang brgyad dang / rgya spros srang gnyis dang / spang
291a7(rgyud): spros srang gcig dang / shA ma ka srang gcig dang / gan+d+ha pa tra srang gcig dang / pad+ma ge sar srang gcig dang / shri rI ma'i me tog srang gcig dang / l-i khar dkar po srang bcu dang / drin
291a8(rgyud): sprin yang ku srang gcig dang / pu shel chi srang lnga dang / stag sen srang gcig dang / sug spel srang gsum dang / bA la ka srang lnga dang / gur gum dang / gla rtsi tshor ba ste/ thams
291b1(rgyud): cad leg pa ga dbye bar byas nas/ phye mar byas la mthar thams cad gcig tu bsdoms te/ sbrang rtsis smra bar bya'o// tshes bco lnga la/ rgyu skar dang / tshes grangs kyi lha dge ba la/ rig sngags
291b2(rgyud): 'chang gtsang mar gyur gyur pas gos gtsang ma bsgos te/ legs par khrus byas par gyur pas brtul zhugs spyad pas bdug pa'i mchog sbyar bar bya'o// de nas bdul ba'i rgyal po sgrub
291b3(rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa tshad shin tu rnam par phye ba bya ste/ gzings kyi tshad kyi shin tu bcags pa/ 'jam zhing bsnyen pa la/ tshon rnam pa sna tshogs pas bsgo bzhi shin tu rnam par phye ba/ 
291b4(rgyud): 'dzes par bri bar bya'o// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snyi dpor/ pad+ma'i phreng ba bri'o// dbus kyi pad+ma phyed kha bye/ dpa'i phreng ba bri ste/ lag pa gnyis mthon nas sna tshogs
291b5(rgyud): pa'i sprin 'khrigs pa 'dzin par byed pa'o// de'i stengadu bdug pa'i snod bkod nas/ me'i kha dog can rgyan// sa kyis g.yogs la/ dkyil 'khor gyi gru bzhi rnams
291b6(rgyud): rlung gi rgyal po bri'o// sgo bzhir zhags pa bris nas khor yug tu lag pa'i phyag rgya'o// pad+ma'i phreng ba las nges par 'thon pa'o// bdug spos 'khyil pa 'ching bar byed pa dkyil
291b7(rgyud): 'khor gyi steng du smras par bya'o// ji ltar 'byor pa'i gtor ma dang me tog dbul bar bya/ mchod yon gyi snod dang / gang ba'i bum pa dang / ba dan dang / rgyan dang / skud pa dang
291b8(rgyud): bos mtshams bcings pa dang / dkyil 'khor la dngul dang / gser bzhag cing / khor yug tu mar mo'i phreng ba dang / dri sna tshogs rgya chen po'o// 'phags pa spyan ras
292a1(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug bkod nas kha shar du phyogs nas/ pad+ma'i phreng ba la nye bar dgod par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis bdug pa'i rgyal po la yongasu bzlas/ 
292a2(rgyud): par bya ste/ nyi ma bdun la thun gsum du don yod pa'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// don yod pa'i snying po yi ge cig pa'i bzlas brjod 'bum
292a3(rgyud): rdzogs pa ste/ stong phrag brgya rdzogs pa na bzlas brjod kyi cho ga'o// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bya zhing / slar yang don yod pa'i rgyal po'i
292a4(rgyud): bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / khro ba'i rgyal po'i ba zlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig bya'o// de nas thog marasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bdug pa dbul bar bya/ 
292a5(rgyud): de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bdu ga pa dbul lo// 'di ni bajug pa sgrub pa'i cho ga grub par 'gyuraro// 'dug pa'i rgyal po 'das bya ba
292a6(rgyud): sgrub par 'gyuraro// gal te rig sngags 'chang gis yungs kar gyi 'bras bu gcig gi tshad tsam gyi bdug pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod par 'dong pa dang / stong
292a7(rgyud): gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dri gcig gis rgyas par 'dod pa dang / bdug pa'i sprin 'khrigs pas kun nas g.yogs par 'dod pa dang / dri sna tshogs pa'i
292a8(rgyud): char 'bebs par byed par 'dod pa des/ bdug pa'i rgyal pos bdug pa de/ rig sngags 'chang gis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chang bar mngon par brtson par bya'o// de nas rig sngag
292b1(rgyud): 'chang gis nyi ma re re zhing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar dkyil 'khor byas la me tog gcal du bkram par bya'o// 
292b2(rgyud): mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil yang bzhag par bya/ bdug pa'i rgyal po 'dis bdug par bya zhing / don yod pa'i rgyal po dus su gcig tu brjod par bya ste/ phyogs bcur
292b3(rgyud): bdug pa'i sbog por dbul bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la byed par 'gyur ba dang / sems can 'byung po thams cad la byams pa bsgom par bya/ sa
292b4(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa thams cad dri ma med pa'i sa dmas kyis yid la bsgom par bya/ dkyil 'khor dal me tog dang bdug pa dang / mchod yon dang / 1
292b5(rgyud): bsil phul te yi ge gcig pa yid la brjod cing / ga r+b+ha yang lan gcig bcings la phyag bya'o// zhes so// phul ba tsam gyi mo la phyogs re re zhing gang+gA / 
292b6(rgyud): klung gi bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i sangs rgyas bye ba la dris khyab par byed cing / bdug pa chen po 'khrigs pas na mkha'i mthil du khyab par 'gyur ro// 
292b7(rgyud): dri sna tshogs kyi char 'bab par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das mchod pa'i las sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bye ba dgu bcu rtsa dgun
292b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pas de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams thams cad rig sngags 'chang la dus
293a1(rgyud): dus su don yod pa'i rgyal po dran par byed pa srung ba'i don dang / phyag rgya 'ching bar byed pa de srung ba'i don du/ leg so zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod par byed do// 
293a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byams pa rgyas par byed pa de bzhin du bya'o// don yod pa chen po'i dngos grub kyang sbyin par byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi// 
293a3(rgyud): drung du bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po nye bar sogs par byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa re re zhing bye ba brgya stong phrag gi drung du bsod nams kyi phung po dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba
293a4(rgyud): nye bar sogs par byed do// ji ltar rig sngags/ de'achang de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i cho ga byed/ byed pa de bzhin du/ rnam pa du ma de bzhin gshegs pa
293a5(rgyud): re re zhing gi spyan sngar rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang nyi ma bdun du rab tu brtson pas// de bzhin gshegs pa dang / bla ma mchod do// phyogs
293a6(rgyud): bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du mthong ba stsol bar byed do// de rnams thams cad kyi dbugs 'byin par byed la mchog rab tu rtsol bar 'gyur ro// 
293a7(rgyud): don yod pa'i dngos grub rjesu stsol bar 'gyur ro// phyir mi ldog pa la rab tu gnas par 'gyuraro// sa bcu yang dag par gnon te mngon par shes pa lngar 'gyuraro// 'jig
293a8(rgyud): rten pa'i bdug pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// de bzhin nyid du 'jig rten las 'das pa la 'chi 'pho ba na de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan snga'i zhabs drung du pad+ma la brdzus te skye ba
293b1(rgyud): 'gyuraro// tshe rabs dran par yang 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du 'gro bar byed pa de thams cad du yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig sngags
293b2(rgyud): 'chang la lung ston par 'gyuraro// phyis kyang skye ba gzhan du skye bar mi 'gyuraro// lus 'di nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsnyen bkur nas/ bde ba can gyi
293b3(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams su song ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do// tshe dpag tu med par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dngag
293b4(rgyud): tu med pa ji lta ba de bzhin du/ 'di'i rdzu 'phrul deng rnam par 'phrul pa'i khyad par so sor thob bo// 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bdug pa sgrub pa'i
293b5(rgyud): khyad par ro// de nas 'jig rten pa'i bdug pa sgra ba pa'i cho ga brgya stong phrag du ma 'grub par byed do// ji lta ji ltar bdug pa nyid yid la byed pa de lta de ltar zad
293b6(rgyud): yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro// klu'i gnas su bdugs na/ bdugs pa tsam gyi mad la/ klu'i rgyal pos char rgyun chen po 'byin par byed do// rgyal po'i sgor
293b7(rgyud): bdugs na/ rgyal po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor g.yog dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas gnas so// skye bo mang po'i dbus su bdugs na/ rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten
293b8(rgyud): dbang du gyur nas gnas so// bdag nyid la bdugs na/ thams cad du mchod pa'i 'os chen por 'gyuraro// nad thams cad la bdugs na/ nad thams cad yongs
294a1(rgyud): grol bar byed do// dug la bdugs na dug med par 'gyuraro// mtshams kyi nang du bdugs na me tog dang / 'bras bu thams cad ro zhim pa dang / legs
294a2(rgyud): par bsrungs par 'gyuraro// lo thog la bdugs na/ 'bru'i phung po chen por 'gyuraro// khyim 'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ grong ngam/ grong khyer la bdugs na/ dug
294a3(rgyud): dang / sbyar dug dang / dug dang bcas pa'i srog chags thams cad nam yang mi 'gyu ro// g.yul gyi dbus su bdugs na cher rgyal bar 'gyu ro// bdag nyid dam/ 
294a4(rgyud): gzhan rnams sam/ don 'thun pa rnams la bdug/ sa na/ lam du 'gro ba na chom rkun dang / g.yon ca/ na dang / rkun mo dang / gcan zan gtum po'i 'jigs
294a5(rgyud): pa thams cad mi snang bar 'gyur zhing / bde ba dang lag/ sa pas rang gi khyim du 'ong ngo // dpag tshad stong du 'gro yang ngal ba med cing / slar yang 'ong bar byed// 
294a6(rgyud): dung la bdugs nas 'thon por bus na ji srid dung gi sgra thos pa de srid du gnod pa thams cad dang / 'jigs pa thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / mtshon cha dang / 
294a7(rgyud): 'thab mo dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dgra bo dang / sdang ba dang / rab tu sdang ba'i sems can thams cad rnam par nyams par
294a8(rgyud): byed do// yams thams cad dang / nye bar 'tshe ba dang / nad 'gro ba thams cad dang / 'khrugs pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do// bde ba dang / lo legs
294b1(rgyud): pa dang / dga' bar 'os par 'gyuraro// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'dod par 'gyuro// nad med pa dang / gnod pa med pa dang / rims med pa dang / thang chad pa med par
294b2(rgyud): srid 'tsho'i bar du gnas so// khang pa'i steng mthon por phyogs bzhir bdugs na/ rlung dang / sad dang sprin gyi ser ba thams cad bcings par 'gyur te/ ji srid yid
294b3(rgyud): la byed pa nar mar yod pa de srid du mtshams bcings par byas par 'gyuraro// khyim gyi nang du bdugs na/ bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / bran po
294b4(rgyud): dang / bran mo thams cad dang / ji srid du rkang gnyis pa dang / rkang bzhi pa thams cad byams pa'i yid/ du 'gyur te/ dbang du gyur nas gnas so// ji srid// 
294b5(rgyud): 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur byed do// slar yang yid gzhan du mi 'gyuraro// 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe / bdug sa na/ dri mnams pa'i mthu ngas/ sangs rgyas
294b6(rgyud): rjesu dran pa skyes te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu mngon sum du mthong ba so sor thob te/ phyis kyang ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// 
294b7(rgyud): dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyuraro// 'chi 'pho ba na bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams sam/ mngon par dga' bar skyes te/ 'di la dogs pa
294b8(rgyud): dang / yad gnyis bskyed par mi bya zhing / the tshom bskyed pa mi bya'o// zhes som mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyim la bdugs na/ nag po chen po la sogs pa/ ma mo'i tshogs kyis
295a1(rgyud): yongs su bskor ba/ dbang du 'gyur te/ mdun du nye bar gnas par byed do// lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad dang / nag po chen po'i gzugs brnyan
295a2(rgyud): gyi spyi bo'i gtsug tu bdugs na/ bdugs pa tsam gyi mod la/ kha nas khrag skrag go/ rig sngags 'chang gis de blangs te/ theg le byas nas na mkha' la lding bar byed do// mig la
295a3(rgyud): byugs na ma snang bar 'gyur te/ bde blag tu 'byung po'i bdag po chen por 'gyuraro// lto bar yongasu byugs na/ gnod sbyin dang srin po'i dpon po'o// lus mtha' dag la byugs na/ 
295a4(rgyud): stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / stsal chen po/ nag/ dpo chen po dang mtshungs pa'i shugs su 'gyur te/ de de nyid kyi gzugasu 'gyuraro// 'khor gyi tshogs chen por
295a5(rgyud): yang 'gyuraro// tshangs pa la bdugs na/ bdugs pa tsam gyis mod la/ 'o ma 'dzag pa blang bar bya ste/ lus la byugs par bya'o// tshangs pa dang dra ba'i
295a6(rgyud): stobs dang shugasu 'gyur te na mkha' la 'gro bar byed do// khyab 'jug la bdugs na/ bdugs pa tsam gyi modo la lus la ba lA sha'i kha dog gi dri'i chu 'dzag te/ rig sngag
295a7(rgyud): 'chang gi lus la byugs par bya'o// sred med kyi bu'i gzugs dang / stobs dang / shugs 'chang bar 'gyur te/ lag na 'khor lo thogs pas na mkha' la 'gro'o// dbang
295a8(rgyud): phyugs chen po la bdugs na/ dbang phyugs chen po'i lus la rdul 'byung te/ rig sngags 'chang gi lus la byug par bya'o// dbang phyugs chen po'i gzugs su
295b1(rgyud): 'gyur te/ lag na mdung rtse gsum dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / sbrul gyis 'byung po'i bdag po chen por 'gyur te na mkha' la 'gro'o// thams cad la don yod/ 
295b2(rgyud): rgyal po'i bzlas brjod lan gsum rnam par sbyin par bya'o// snying po yi ge gcig pas spyi bor bzlas brjod lan bdun du bzlas brjod sbyin par bya'o// spra tshil las byung / 
295b3(rgyud): ba'i klu mgo bo dgu pa sor bzhi pa'i tshad du bya ste/ gser gyis g.yog par bya zhing dri'i dkyil 'khor bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag par bya'o// don yod pa'i rgyal po/ 
295b4(rgyud): lan brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas so// bdug pa 'dis bdu dgas pas klu ldang bar byed do// rig sngags 'changadagis 'jigs pa med par bya ste/ khro bo'i rgyal po yung
295b5(rgyud): kar la zlas te/ spyi bo'i gtsug tu bdegs na/ lding bar byed do// gang du 'dod pa der gnas nas/ klu chen po'i mtsho dang / gnas dang / gzhal med khang rab
295b6(rgyud): tu 'byung ngo // chu gang yin pa de rnams kyang / 'thung bar byed pa dang / khrus byed pa'i bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo 'am/ tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song bas
295b7(rgyud): 'thung ba dang khrus byed pa de rnams thams cad kyang nang rnams dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sdig pa dang / sgrib pa bral ba dang / 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar yang 'gyur ro// klu
295b8(rgyud): rnams kyang dus dus su char gyi rgyun chen po 'byin par byed cing / char 'bebs par byed do// dus dus su me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo thog rnams rdzogs par byed de/ 
296a1(rgyud): monam po'i myong bar 'gyuraro// phyir zhing log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyuraro// phug dang khung bu'i sbyor 'khrug 'khor gyi sgo glegs la bdugs na
296a2(rgyud): zhing bcog par 'gyuraro// 'khrug po'i dus su bdugs na 'pham par 'gyuraro// lag mthil la bdugs na/ gang dang g.yo po reg pa thams cad du dbang du byed do// 
296a3(rgyud): bdug pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// // de nas sman gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ don yod par thams cad du gzhan gyi mi thub pa nad thams
296a4(rgyud): cad sel bar grub pa/ thams cad du drug 'jom das par byed pa/ na ba thams cad sel bar grub pa/ sdang ba thams cad ldog par byed pa/ 'byung po thams
296a5(rgyud): cad la mi 'jigs pa/ mtshon dang / mo dang / chu dang / dug rab tu 'joms pa/ rtag tu srung ba dang skyab pa dang sba bar byed pa/ dgra rnams dang / 
296a6(rgyud): gzhan rgyal ba ldog par byed pa/ rgyal po dang / rgyal phran nam/ btsun mo'i 'khor du song ba dang gtso bo rtag tu dbang du byed cing thams cad thogs pa med par 'gyur// 
296a7(rgyud): pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / 'khrug pa dang / g.yul rnams rtag tu rab tu 'joms par byed pa/ gang gi tshe chom rkun gyi nang du song ba nyid dang / don 'thun gyi nang dang / 
296a8(rgyud): rkun mo dang / seng ge dang / stag gi nang du song ba de'i tshe/ thams cad du sman gyi rgyal bster ro// tshe ring por 'gyur te/ rtag tu pad+ma'i phyag gi mchog sbyin par 'gyuraro// 
296b1(rgyud): lha rnams kyis rtag tu srung bar byed do// gnod sbyin dang / sbyin po dang / klu dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding nyid dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po nyid dang / mi ma yin
296b2(rgyud): gdug pa gang yin pa de rnams thams cad nyin dang mtshan du srung ba'i don du yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur te the tshom med do// rgyal po chen po rnams thos sras dang / rgyal po
296b3(rgyud): chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dpung dang bzhon pa dang bcas pa dang / skabs gsum pa'i lha'i dbang po dang / tshangs pa
296b4(rgyud): dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha/ de rnams thams cad 'thun pas rtag tu srung bar bye/ dad do// sangs rgyas kyis rnam par gzigs shing / 
296b5(rgyud): rtag tu yang mthong ba stsol bar mdzad do// gang sman lag tu phyin par 'gyur ba 'ang / yang nas yang du ri ga sngags kyi dngos grub myur du thob po// byang stems
296b6(rgyud): 'pho ba med do// de la dug med cing sdig pa med la/ mi bzad pa'i sbyar ba dang / phye ma'i sbyor bas gnon par mi 'gyur ro// sngon gyi sgrib pa nyams par byed de/ de bzhin du
296b7(rgyud): yang / sdig pa thams cad dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / mtshan ma ngan pa gang yin pa dang / gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i sdang ba nyid de/ de rnams thams cad myur du rnam par
296b8(rgyud): nyams par byed do// sman gang du gnas pa'i dpag tshad khor yug tu srung ba dang / de bzhin nyid du mtshams bcings par byed do// bgegs dang / log par 'dren pa thams
297a1(rgyud): cad dang / de bzhin du/ bdud dam sdang ba de rnams thams cad rab tu 'bros par byed do// sman gang du gnas par gdon rab tu 'phros par byed de// mkha'
297a2(rgyud): 'gro ma gang yin pa dang / rnal 'byor ma gang yin pa dang / skem byed dang / gza' dang brjed byed dang / grib gnon gang yin pa dang / mi bzad pa de rnams thams cad rab tu zhi
297a3(rgyud): bar 'gro bar 'gyuraro// lha rnams der gnas par byed cing / 'khrul 'khor la sman a gang de mchog go zhes so// rgyal bas dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing / dngos grub thams
297a4(rgyud): cad kyi de kho na nyid stsol bar mdzad do// rtag tu 'jig rten dbang phyug gi mchog stsol zhing / rtag pa'i mtha/ dar mthong ba stsol bar 'gyuraro// don yod pa'i zhags pa
297a5(rgyud): myur du 'grub te/ sman 'chang ba la/ sman gang du gnas par gang gis kyang bklags mi rnyed do// don yod pa 'amachog sbyin pa zhes bya ba ying bzhin gyi nor bu sman gyi
297a6(rgyud): mchog rab tu 'bad pas legs par bsgrub par bya ba dngos grub kyi mchog las thams cad byed pa de nyid de'i tshe shi ba yang dag par 'tshe bar byed pa/ le rdzogs par bsten te/ 
297a7(rgyud): sngags dang phyag rgyas gso bar bya'o// lo stong thas tu sa tu de ba dang / dga' bar byed do// dbang phyug dang / nor thob pa dang / 'bru 'phel ba dang / bla na med pa dang / rgyal po
297a8(rgyud): dga' bar 'gyur te rtag tu gnas so// 'bangs dang / ci bgyi dang / mchod pa chen po rnyed do// thams cad du de dag rtag tu tshig btsun pa'o// thos pas dngos grub mchog gyur pa'i
297b1(rgyud): rdzas kyang 'dir ni bshad bya ste/ tsan dan rgya spos ru ta dang / sprig shing tsha bA la ka/ brag skyes spang spos sA ma kang / sug smel glas dgang na la da/ pad+ma u pal spri yang ku/ shing gun
297b2(rgyud): mdab ma tsha ba gsum/ shi ri sha yi me tog dang / de bzhin pa ri pe la ba/ 'di rnams cha ni mnyam par ldan/ thams cad legs gzhal legs par sbyar/ gsang sngags brgya
297b3(rgyud): rtsa brgyad bzlas pa la/ khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur te/ yi ge gcig pas stong phrag bcur bzlas so// 'dir sman rnams bgrang phreng gi tshad tsam du bsgongs nas grib ma
297b4(rgyud): yongasu bskam par bya'o// gla rtsi dang / ga pur gyi blang la le/ rigs par sbyor ba'i bya ba byas pa dang / dkyil 'kho ru du 'jug pa ni/ ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi bya/ 
297b5(rgyud): ba dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / dam tshig/ la rab tu 'jug pa la/ shar gyi sgo ru phyag bya/ sa nas/ dkyil 'khor mchog la bskor ba bya ste/ 
297b6(rgyud): sgo dang sgo ru phyag bya zhing / shar gyi sgo ru 'jug par bya'o// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por/ 'phags pa spyan ros gzigs dbang phyug la mngon du phyogs par pad+ma'i
297b7(rgyud): ge sar la 'dug nas/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad dang / khro bo'i rgyal po'i bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bya ste/ mngon par dbang bskur bar bya zhing / 
297b8(rgyud): phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags legs par sgrub bo// de nas mchod pas 'jig rten mgon po'i dngos grub mthong bar byed cing rtag tu g.yo bar byed la 'jig rten mgon po'i
298a1(rgyud): 'od zer gyi sbyin sreg rab tu grol lo// dkyil 'khor ba shad par bya ste/ gru bzhi po ko la'i tshad du cha legs par phye 'gru bzhi dang / sgo bzhi yod pa pa/ them
298a2(rgyud): skas kyi rim pa can du tshon sna tshogs kyi skud pas thig gdab cing dkyil 'khor gyi snying po mdzes par bya/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying po pad+ma mchog kha phye ba mdab ma brgya
298a3(rgyud): brgyad pa/ snying po dang / ze ba shin tu mdzes pa/ snying po las pad+ma byung ba/ kha phyed bye ba dang / lag pa gnyis byung bas pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dzin pa bris par dngul gyi snod
298a4(rgyud): kyi nang du sman bkang ste dar gyis kha g.yogs nas pad+ma'i mya ba ma'i steng du bzhags par bya/ 'phags pa spya na ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu tshangs pa'i cha byad du
298a5(rgyud): bzhugs/ dar gyi gcod pan bcings brgyan pa pad+ma/ 'i steng du bzhugs par bya'o// dkyil 'khor/ phyi rol kun tu phyag rgya'i rtags rnams gsal bar bri'o// 
298a6(rgyud): sgo sgor don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma'i steng du bzhag pa khe dog dang 'od zer 'bar ba bri'o// grA grar bum pa gang bar bra'o// dkyil 'khor kun tu 'phan dang / bum pa gang ba dang / 
298a7(rgyud): 'bras bu dang / me tog bsres pa mdzes pas brgyan par bya'o// gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs bzhag par bya'o// mchod yon gyi chu dbul bar bya/ tsan dan dang / a ga ru'i bdug
298a8(rgyud): spos dang / spos sna tshogs dbul bar bya/ dkyil 'khor kun tu mar me'i phreng ba dang / me tog phreng ba dgod cing kun tu 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dgram par bya'o// rig
298b1(rgyud): sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas legs par khrus bya zhing gos gtsang ma bgos pa 'jigs pa med pas zla ba yar gyi ngo nya la bsgrub par bya ste/ sems can thams cad la brtse
298b2(rgyud): bar gyur cing byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i bdag nyid can gyis bsgrub par bya'o// gang gis lag gis bzung ba tsam dang / reg pa tsam gyi mod la de dga' ba 'thob cing
298b3(rgyud): sdig pa thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur/ sngon gyi sgrib pa rnams 'jigs par 'gyur/ mtshams med pa byed pa rnams las grol bar 'gyur/ modado la nad thams cad
298b4(rgyud): 'byung zhing ngan 'gro thams cad 'jigs par byed pa/ bsod nams chen po'i stobs kyi dngos grub sman dgyi de kho na nyid mthong ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
298b5(rgyud): lung bstan cing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rna mas kyis bsngags pa/ 'dren pa 'jig rten dbang phyug
298b6(rgyud): gis sprul pa dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyis bsngags pa/ rig sngags 'chang gi dbang po thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ lha thams cad kyis srung ba/ klu'i dbang po thad
298b7(rgyud): rjesu 'brang ba/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i dbang po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / ku pe ra dang / nyi ma dang / 
298b8(rgyud): zla bas mchod pa de bzhin du rgyu skar gyi tshogs dang / gza' kun dang / mjug rings dang / de bzhin du gza'i khyim dang / thams cad du bkra shis kyis mchod pa/ cho ga zhib mo
299a1(rgyud): thams cad dang / de bzhin du kyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / bzlas brjod thams cad dang / gsang sngags thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa/ rags ste 'daban/ 
299a2(rgyud): gshegs pa gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi 'di bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sman gyi mchog dbang bskur ba/ dus gsum gying bzhin gshegs
299a3(rgyud): pa rnams kyis lung bstan pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu thams cad dang 'thun pa'i sprin sman gyi rdzas bkra shis pa bye ga khrag khrig gam/ lhag par gyur pa gzhan gang yang med do// 
299a4(rgyud): sman de lta bu ni rtag tu mchog gtso bo 'byin pa/ 'jig te/ de na dbang phyug dang 'dra ba yin no// de'i phyir tham das cad sman 'chang bar 'dod pas gnas gang yang rung
299a5(rgyud): pir sbyar bar bya ste/ gtsang ma legs par khrus byas pa des sbyar bar bya'o// ji lta ji ltar bkra shisakyi bsam pa yid la byed pa de lta de ltar bsam pa yid
299a6(rgyud): la byed pa yong su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ sbyar ba tsam gyi mod la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ 'dod pa thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ rig sngag
299a7(rgyud): 'chang gi tsang mar gyur pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos pa spos chus legs par khrus byas la nyin re sman re re don yod pa'i rgyal pos bzlas brjod byas te zos na/ zos pa tsam
299a8(rgyud): gyi modo la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dgongs
299b1(rgyud): shing snang ba rnam par dag par 'dzub par 'gyur/ nyin zhag gsum du sbyar nang gA rnam par dag pa 'thob bo// nyin zhug lngar sbyar na dran pa rnam par dag pa 'thob bo// rnan zhugs
299b2(rgyud): bdun du sbyar na rig sngags chen po'i cho gzhib mo rnam par dag pa 'thob bo// nyin zhag bcu bzhir sbyar na ngon yod pa'i zhags pa de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi dmachog chen po 'tha
299b3(rgyud): nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu sbyar na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig gi dngos grub thob bo// de bzhin
299b4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba de kho na nyid kyi dmachi ngag gi dngos grub thob bo// zla ba gcig gi bar du sbyar na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis
299b5(rgyud): dngos grub sgyu ma lta bus rgyan pa thob cing tshe lo stong thub pa ra 'gyur ro// zla ba gsum du sbyar na lus yongasu/ dag pa dang / mdog yongasu dag pa 'thob bo// lo
299b6(rgyud): gcig tshang bar sbyar na/ don yod pa'i dngos grub rig sngags 'chang 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te/ mig mthon ting mdog bung ba lta bu skra ral bu 'khyil bar 'gyur// che lo
299b7(rgyud): bdun pa lta bu'i gzugs dang / 'thun par 'gyur la/ tshe bskal pa 'bum thub par 'gyur ro// bdar nas bdag nyid la byugs na/ gang dri mnams pa tsam gyi bgegs dang / 
299b8(rgyud): log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / yi dgas dang / skem byed dang / brjed byed dang / grib gnon thams cad dang / gdon thams cad
300a1(rgyud): dang / bdug pa thams cad dang / dgra thams cad dpag tshad stong du 'bros so// gal te myur du mi 'bros na ni spyi bo dum bu 'bum du 'gas shing yan lag dang / 
300a2(rgyud): yan lag rnams zhig par 'gyur la/ bu dang chung mar bcas pa 'jig par 'gyur/ sngon gyi sdig pa dang sgrib pa rnams kyis mi mtshugs par 'gyur/ sems can dmyal ba myong
300a3(rgyud): bar 'gyur ba mtshams med pa lnga dag 'dzag par 'gyur/ rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / ma shis pa dang / bkra mi shis pa'i dngos po thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ spos
300a4(rgyud): mnams pa tsam gyis rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i blo/ na po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / rgyal rig das dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs ci bgyi zhes
300a5(rgyud): bya ba byed la dbang du gyur nas 'khod do// byugs pa tsam gyis 'bras dang / phol mig dang / lhog pa dang / me dpal dang / rkang shu dang / g.yan pa dang / mdze
300a6(rgyud): dang / khyi rdo dang / shu ba dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang / rma dang / khong gi rma yongasu sos par 'gyur/ dug thams cad dang / zos pa dang / dug myos dang / sbyar dug drag po dang / dug
300a7(rgyud): sbyar ma dang / sbyar dug phye ma dang / byang rnams la bskus pa tsam dang / chu dron po 'thungs pa tsam gyis dug med par 'gyuraro// dri tsam gyis klu'i rgyal po 'jog po'i dug kyang
300a8(rgyud): med par 'gyuraro// rims nyin bzhi pas thebs pa la dpral bar bskus nas ku co 'don cing 'bros so// rims thams cad dang / nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin
300b1(rgyud): gsum pa dang / rlung las gyur pa dang / 'khris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa dang / lba ba dang / pho ba'i nad dang / mchin pa na pa dang / lto
300b2(rgyud): ba na ba dang / skran dang / gcin sri ba dang / snying na ba dang / rtsib logs na ba dang / mgul pa na ba dang / kha na ba dang / 'khyil zhing na ba dang / tshad pa dang / mdoms na ba dang / 
300b3(rgyud): yan lag dang / nyin lag na ba chu dron po 'thungs pa tsam gyis yongs su sos par 'gyuraro// gzhogs phyed na ba dang / mgon pa dang / mig na ba dang / rna ba na bal bskus pa
300b4(rgyud): tsam gyis sos par 'gyuraro// thig le byas na cho/ dam rkun dang / gnod byed dang / me dang / chu dang / byi bzabs 'jigs pa dang / gcan zan khro bos 'jigs
300b5(rgyud): pa las thar par 'gyur zhing 'jigs pa thams ca da las yongs su thar par 'gyuraro// nyes par bya/ sa pa thams cad yong su thar par 'gyur ro// lag pa
300b6(rgyud): gdengs pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ mi ma yin pa gang gis kyang mdangs 'phrog par mi nus shing bor chad bya bar mi nus so// na mkha' 'gro ma thams cad
300b7(rgyud): mthong ba tsam gyis dbang du gyur nas 'khod do// rgyal po btsun mo dang // 'khor dang / bcas pa'i mchod gnas chen por 'gyur/ gzhan yang gang dang gang du sbyar
300b8(rgyud): ba rang gi blos bye ba phrag 'bum sbyar na las sgrub par byed de/ sman gyi mchog shin tu 'bad pas bsgrub par bya'o// sman gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// 
301a1(rgyud): nas de'i phyir gser gyi ri lu'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i snying po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don
301a2(rgyud): yod pa'i rnam par gzigs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rgyal po zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang / de bzhin
301a3(rgyud): gshegs pa rin chen snying pos byin gyis brlabs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug 'od kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i
301a4(rgyud): klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs shing bsngags pa/ byin gyis pa rlabs pa/ dbang bskur ba/ rjes su thugs rangs
301a5(rgyud): par mdzad pa/ lung bstan pa/ mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gtsug gi nor bu cod pan 'chang ba/ rgyal ba 'od dpag med kyi
301a6(rgyud): gtsug tor gyi mtshan nyid kyi theg le yid bzhin gyi nor bu rgyal mtshan gyi nor bu chen po'i rgyal po mchog tu grub pa/ rig sngags dang / dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya dang / cho ga
301a7(rgyud): zhib mo thams cad kyi gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dam tshig spyi/ sku'i snying po gang gis mthong ba tsam la sogs pa 'dir tshang bar bstan pa lta bu
301a8(rgyud): zhig gis nus mod kyi/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba dang / dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rdzogs par mngon sum du mthong ba dang
301b1(rgyud): 'dra bar 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag nyid mngon sum du mchod par gzung ba dang / lung ston pa 'thob par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mngon sum du dge ba'i/ 
301b2(rgyud): rtsa ba bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// nor bu gser gyi kha dog du bstan pa'i ril bu 'di gang gis mthong zhing 'chang ba ni dge ba'i rtsa ba bsod nams kyi phung po chen
301b3(rgyud): po bskyed skyed par 'gyur/ nor bu ril bu 'od mthong ba tsam gyis sgrib pa dang / sdig pa thams cad dang / gdug pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga dang / mnar med par gzhol
301b4(rgyud): ba dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa la sku ra pa 'debs pa dang / sngon gyi tshe rabs nas bsags pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'jig cing spang
301b5(rgyud): par 'gyur/ rims dang / nad thams cad las yongasu/ thar par 'gyur/ gang gi lag na sman 'di yod pa/ ra gyur pa'i sems can de ni lung bstan par 'gyur// 
301b6(rgyud): ril bu gang la yod pa ni/ phyir mi ldog par lung bstan cing // mgon po sa bcu dag la gnas// rtag tu mchod rten gyur pa ste// sku gdung snying po'i bdag nyid can// rtag tu
301b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas bdag nyid 'gyur// dus gsum dag la bzhugs pa yis// sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa gang sangs rgyas dpa' bo de kun gyi/ sras gcig tu ni brjod
301b8(rgyud): pa yin// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras// thugs las skyes dang zhal las skyes// chos kyi dbyings sprul chos las skyes// 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin
302a1(rgyud): mgon// rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur// phyag g.yas rtag tu spyi bor ni// 'jog mdzad 'di ni bcom med// ril bu mthong ba tsam gyis ni// sdug
302a2(rgyud): bsngal kun las rab tu grol// sdig pa thams cad lhag par 'tsheng // sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag/ da ni ngan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur// phyir zhing gnas mchog zhi ba 'thob// 
302a3(rgyud): 'jig rten 'dren pa 'od dpag med// mgon po rtag tu mngon sum mthong // bde ba can du 'jug par byed// gang na de yi mngon dga' ba// de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs
302a4(rgyud): pa rtag tu mi 'khrugs par 'gyur zhing // de bzhin mi g.yo mi 'gul te// sems dpa' ri rab che/ dang mnyam// gzung du med pas mtsho dang 'dra// de la
302a5(rgyud): bgegs dang log 'dren dag/ nams kyang 'jug pa/ ra mi 'gyur la// sems dpa' phyag bya'i ga nas su 'gyur// gang la nor rgyal 'di yod la// rgyam
302a6(rgyud): po bzhi po dag/ dpung dang bcas pa bkol dang bcas// rtag tu srung phyir gnas byed de// 'dir ni nyin mtshan de bzhin no// lha tshogs thams cad srung bar ni// the tshom
302a7(rgyud): med par byed par 'gyur// gzi brjid dpal yang rab tu 'phel// de la legs par 'jug par 'gyur// 'dzag med rtag tu rmi lam ni// dngos po chen po sna tshogs
302a8(rgyud): mthong // gru 'dzin ril gzhal med khang // tshal dang bcas shing rin chen bcas// gnas dang bcas pa mthong bar 'gyur// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // dri za lha min
302b1(rgyud): gsang ba ba// na mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci// de bzhin lto 'phye 'khor dang bcas// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams ni// kun nas bskor ba mthong bar 'gyur// rin
302b2(rgyud): chen lha yi seng ge'i gdan// khang pa brtsegs pa rin chen dang // nor bu chen pos rgyan pa dang // 'jig rten dbang phyug thub pa'i brtso// pad+ma snying po la zhugs nas// don
302b3(rgyud): yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang // dkyil 'khor bcas pa'i chos bstan to// gsung kun thob par gyur nas ni// thub pa rang gi ngo bo mthong // de ltar rmi lam bzang rmi ba
302b4(rgyud): nyin cig bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur// nor bu rgyal/ pe'i mthu ni de 'dra bas// de bas mi yis 'ab/ da pa chen pos bzung // dge sbyong bram ze nyid dang rgyal
302b5(rgyud): rigs dang // dmangs rig nyid dam yang na rgyal po 'am// brtson mo slas sam dpung gi gtso bo 'am// skyes pa 'am bud med khye'u dang bu mo dag/ nor
302b6(rgyud): bu'i rgyal po rtag tu 'chang byed pa// de ni stong pa nyid dang 'dra bar 'gyur// chom rkun gyis ni mi slus shing // gnod byed kyis ni 'jigs mi 'gyur// 'jigs pa mi bzang
302b7(rgyud): brgyad las thar// de la dug dang sbyar ba'i dug sbyar dug drag pos mi tshugs shing // de la byad kyis tshugs mi 'gyur// gang la nor bu'i rgyal po yod// de la nad kyis mi
302b8(rgyud): tshugs shing // na bsam yin sdig pas min// pad+ma chu yis mi chags ltar// rtag tu chags pa med par gnas// g.yul 'gyed pa yi nang na 'am// 'thab bam 'gyed
303a1(rgyud): ngam rtsod pa na// lan thebs rtag tu rgyal bar ni// thob par 'gyur te the tshom med// de nas rdzas ni bshang bya ste// sman ni bkra shis dang ldan pa// grub
303a2(rgyud): pa'i mtha' ste mchog tu gtsang // 'jig rten mgon dang mnyam par gsungs// a ga ru dang / tsan dan dang / pad+ma dang / ud pa la dang / shi ri sha'i me tog dang / a pa maH/ 
303a3(rgyud): dang / me ru dang / na lang dang / chu srin gyi sen mo dang / ka na ka'i 'bras bu dang / tsan dan gyi 'bras bu dang / pad+ma'i 'bras bu dang / rdo drag dang / med dang / bcod dang / sU ka ra
303a4(rgyud): dang / ma kaT+Ti dang / dza ya dang / badze sa dang / pa ri be la dab dang / ra sa dang / bI rA dang / d+h+ya ma ka ka dang / rgyaspos dang / bu sA dang / a brta ka dang / rurta dang / byA
303a5(rgyud): gran kha dang / pata tra dang tra tsa dang / kad ma bA rA dang / khri yang ku dang / gi bang dang / spr-i ka dang / smrig rkang nga/ nga / yungs kar dang / na ga puSh+pa dang / a la dang / ljong
303a6(rgyud): ros dang / gur gum dang / ga pur dang / gla rtsi dang / spang spos dang / na le sham dkar po dang / sum dang / nye'u shing dang / shuti dang / sbrang rtsi dang / tsam pa ka ste/ de bzhin rdzas
303a7(rgyud): ni de dag kun/ su bar+Na ni dkar po sbyar/ ril bu nam cig tsam du ni// skyes bu mkhas pas bya ba yin// su bar+Na sa ni bkab nas su// rdzas rnams bsres nas sbyar bar bya// cha rnam/ 
303a8(rgyud): 'phel bar bya ba ste// gla rtsi yis ni bskyed do// phye ma zhib mor gtags nas su// tsan dan dkar po'i chu sbyar nas// grib ma la ni skam par bya// tshes brgyad dag nas brtsam
303b1(rgyud): nas ni// tshes ni bco lnga nya yi bar// nyin cig bzhin du don yod pa'i// rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas// khro bre'i rgyal pos nyin cig bzhin// lan bdun par du dbang bskur ro// 
303b2(rgyud): phyag rgyas dbang bskur bar yang bya// de nas tshes ni bco lnga ste// nya la chu dang yungs kar dag/ dkyil 'khor du ni bzhag par bya// de nas nor bu'i rgyal po ni// bzhag pa'i dkyil
303b3(rgyud): 'khor bshad par bya// cha rnams ma nor legs par dbye// rgyar ni ko la'i chad du bya// shin tu 'jam la byi ba dar legs// tshon rtsi sna tshogs mdzes pa dang // dkyil 'khor
303b4(rgyud): mchog ni thig gdab bo// sgo bzhi gdod cing grwa bzhi gdo dang // kun nas shin tu cha phye zhing // dkyil 'khord snying po che phye ba// tshad dang shin tu ldan par bya// pad+ma
303b5(rgyud): chen po bzhi dag dang // de bzhin phyag dang spyan du bcu sa// don yod dngos grub bri bar bya// nor bu rgya la po 'tshang ba yis// phyag rgyar bcas pa bri bar bya// 
303b6(rgyud): chu yi rgya mtsho'i nang du ni// las kyi rdo rje legs par bri// dkyil 'khor snying po dam pa la// kun nas kha khyer rnam pa dang // me tog sna tshogs pa dag bri// dkyil 'khor
303b7(rgyud): phyi rol kun tu ni// nor bu pad+ma legs par bri// sgo bzhi yi ni gnas rnams su// pad+ma zhags pa mdung rtse gsum// rdo rje'i tshul mchog legs par bri// grwa bzhi yi ni gnas
303b8(rgyud): rnams su// lag na nor bu yod pa bri// pad+ma'i steng na rab tu gnas// dkyil 'khor bzang po phan phran dang // bum pa rkang dang me tog dang // bdug pa 'bras bu rnams kyis rgya
304a1(rgyud): gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs dag/ ci bdog blangs chen bzhag par bya// kun tu mar ma phreng ba dang // mchod yon chu dang a ga ru// tsan dan bdug spos
304a2(rgyud): dbul bar bya// nor bu rgyal po 'jigs med pa// snod bzang legs par bkang nas su// rgya dar la yis kha g.yogs te// dkyil 'khor de nyid rig pas bzhag/ dkyil
304a3(rgyud): 'khor snying por 'jig rten dbang // gzhag ste de nas las rdo rje// snod kyi steng du bzhag pa ni// nor bu dkyil 'khor bya ba yin// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i
304a4(rgyud): rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya/ khro bar rgyal pos lan bdun dbang bskur bar bya// de nas gsang sngags yi ge gcig po 'bum tshang bar
304a5(rgyud): bzlas brjod bya ste/ 'bum bzlas brjod byas na nor 'i rgyal po 'bar bar 'gyuraro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gi lags// g.yas dang ldan pas bzung nas
304a6(rgyud): ni/ tshang ba dam du ba dam par bya// bsdams pa tsam gyi mdado dag la// rdzu 'phrul gyis ni na mkha' la 'gro/ nor bu dri ma med pa don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bkod pa
304a7(rgyud): zhes bya ba/ rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba 'thob la/ 'khor rig sngags 'chang 'khor los bsgyur ba bye ba phrag 'bum yod par 'gyur/ khung gi sgo zang
304a8(rgyud): phye bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad phye bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dmachog dang // dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dag kha ton du long
304b1(rgyud): par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba dang / 'dud pa dag gis gsong por smra bar byed/ thams cad du/ 
304b2(rgyud): yang don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bye ba thob par 'gyur/ tshe bskal pa 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis su ring bar 'gyur/ don yod pa'i pad+ma/ 
304b3(rgyud): 'khor lo mdun nas 'gro bar 'gyuraro// gal te 'bar bar ma gyur na sngar bstan pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par rnams thob par 'gyur la/ mnyam par nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs par
304b4(rgyud): 'dra ba'i nor bu rgyal po'i ril bu ni 'jig rten dang / 'a dag rten las 'das pa'i las rnams sgrub pa yin no// / tshe rjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar
304b5(rgyud): 'gyur la// gang dang gang du skye ba'i tshe rabs thams cadadu tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ nor bu'i ril bu'i mthong ba tsam gyis dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs
304b6(rgyud): dmangon sum du mthong zhing blta bar 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon du mthong zhing rtag tu blta bar 'gyur/ rol du rang gi lus la yod pa de yang byung
304b7(rgyud): ldog par rig par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bsrel gyi snying po mchod rten dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba ste/ 'di la som nyid dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// mthong bar
304b8(rgyud): rig pa tsam gyi mang lo sngon gyis las kyi sgrib pagrangs dang bgrang ba'i tshul gyi bskal pa 'bum du bsags pa mnar med pa'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur ba/ mtshams med pa la khyer
305a1(rgyud): pa/ 'phags pa la bskur pa 'debs pa/ dam pa'i chos spong ba de dag thams cad dus gsum gyi bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
305a2(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mthu dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi nor bu'i rgyal po'i mthus thams cad zad par 'gyur/ sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba
305a3(rgyud): dag las yongasu thar par 'gyur ba de 'gro'i lam la gzhol bar 'gyur/ tshe rjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyuraro// de lta bas na legs par sgrub mthar thug par bya/ 
305a4(rgyud): zhing bsgrub par bya/ mthu stobs kyis sbyar bar bya/ shin tu gsal zhing rab tu gsal ba'i bsam pas 'badadapas sbyar bar bya/ rang gi sha dang khrag kyang yongasu btang
305a5(rgyud): nas btsal bar bya zhing / cho ga zhing mo'i rgyal po yongasu btsal bar bya ba yin na phyi rol gyi dngos po nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyigs dang / gser dang / dngul dang / gos
305a6(rgyud): dang / rgyan rnams yongasu btang nas yongasu btsal bar bya ba lnga smos kyang ci dgos te/ srog btang bar bya'i de'i btang bar mi bya'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i rnam par thar
305a7(rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba bsgrub pa 'di brtsal bar bya zhing bsgrub par bya'o// 'di'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/ sen
305a8(rgyud): thams cad yang dag pa nyid kyi dad pas sangs rgyas nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing nams kyang ngan 'gro logs par 'gro bar mi
305b1(rgyud): 'gyuraro// nor bu'i ril bu sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// de nas de'i phyir don yod pa yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po don yod pa chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i dngos grub
305b2(rgyud): kyi sman nor bu dang / gsang sngags rnams bshad par bya ste/ sman nor bu dang / gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya'i mthu des phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i chan rig sngags
305b3(rgyud): 'chang rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig spyi'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam pa sna tshogs sgyu ma lta bu'i ngo bo nyid bstan pa yang dag par ston par mdzad// 
305b4(rgyud): bklags pas grub pa/ rigs kyi dam tshig thams cadad du nye bar ston par mdzad do// rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi ngal ba 'bras bu med pa gzhan du 'gyur ba med do// 
305b5(rgyud): ngal ba dang / dub pa dang / 'bad pa'i bzlas brjod rgya cho ga 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir rang gi sems kyi rgyud dang pa dang / gus pa dang / gsang
305b6(rgyud): chen dang / gsang bar bya ba gzhan la bstan par mi bya ste/ dngos grub med par mi 'gyur ro// de lta bas na gsang sngags sgrub pa ni shin tu gsang bar bya zhing legs par bsnyung ba byas
305b7(rgyud): la 'bad par bya/ kha zas ngan pa spang bar bya/ gos ngan pa dang / sems ngan pa yang yongasu spang bar bya/ mi srun pa dang / mi bden pa dang / phra ma dang / sems can sun par
305b8(rgyud): byed pa dang / gsang sngags rkub dang / cho gzhing mo rku bar bya ba dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor rku bar byed pa de dag go rtogs pa ni gang na yang ma de/ dus gsum gyi mgon pos/ 
306a1(rgyud): smad cing byang chub sems dpa' yang smad la/ mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang spang pa yin no// sems can sdong dum bsregs pa ni/ 
306a2(rgyud): gsang ba sun 'byin ma rungs pa// 'jig rten 'di nang pha rol tu// rtag tu smad par bya ba yin// lha rnams kyis ni yongasu btang // ma rungs pas ni bdud kyis zos// ma rungs pas
306a3(rgyud): ni bgegs kyis zos// bslab bzhi tshul khrims nyams pa dang / mgon po'i bsnan pa sun 'byin pa// de la dngos grub ji ltar 'byung // de la skyob pa gang yang med// mgon med kun tu
306a4(rgyud): smad pa yin// de bas de la dngos grub ni// chung ngu'ang med la nyes pa yis// gsang sngags dang ni sman mo grub// nyes pa de dag rang gis byas// gzhan yang ma
306a5(rgyud): rungs byed pa yin// de bas sems can mkhas la sbyin// slob pa 'dod cing yon tan dga'// snying rje'i bdag nyid byams pa gnas// sems can kun la rtse ba'i mchog/ 
306a6(rgyud): de yi lag tu sbyin bya ste// de yi dngos grub bla na med// gsang ba 'di ni shin tu gsang ba yin te// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi snying po gsang ba de yang rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi de kho na
306a7(rgyud): nyid kyi gsang ba dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya sgrub sla ste/ bklags pas 'grub pa de bzhin du sman nor bu 'di la rtag tu 'jug cing dngos grub kyi de kho na nyid rab tu ston par byed pa
306a8(rgyud): yin no// rig sngags 'chang ni bdag nyid kyis// mtshig tu gas ba bsgrub byab// rig sngags 'chang ni gtsang ma yis// khrus byas gos gtsang gyon byed la// 'di ni nyon nag
306b1(rgyud): bsnyung ba dang // dad dang gus pas mchod pa bya// don yod 'khor lo sgrub byed pas// dngos grub dkyil 'khor dam pa sgrub// sman spri ka dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / a gu ru dang / pad ma
306b2(rgyud): ge sar dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma'i ldum bu dang / pad+ma'i mdab ma dang / de bzhin du gi'u wang dang / ldong ros dang / tsom pa ka dang / su ma na ste/ de bzhin cha ni mnyam sbyar te/ phye ma dag
306b3(rgyud): tu byas nas ni// de nas don yod rgyal po yis// tshes brgyad nas ni bco lnga'i bar// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas brjod bya// khro bo'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas dbang
306b4(rgyud): bskur ro// de'i 'og tu cha lngar bya ste/ mig bsku ba dang / da ril bu dang / phye ma dang / til mar chos pa dang kha gdong 8bkru zhing khrus bya'o// mig sman ni so'u byi re dang / lhan
306b5(rgyud): cig sbrus la don yod pa'i rgyal pos brgya stong bzlas pa rjod bya'o// ril bu ni sbrang rtsi dkar po dang lhan cig smra 'o// phye ma ni 'jig rten dbang phyug la phul ba'i me
306b6(rgyud): tog dang lhan cig sbrul lo// til mar bcos pa ni brah+ma ti la ste/ shing pa la sha'i mar dang lhan cig sgra'o// bkru ba ni tsan dan dkar po'i chu dang lhan cig sgyu zha ngi su man dang / gur gun
306b7(rgyud): dang / spros chus lhan cig sbrus la so sor brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ khro bo'i rgyal pos nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas nas dbang bskur bar bya'o// de nas rig sngags
306b8(rgyud): 'chang nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba byas pas gcig tu sbrus te/ dngul gyi snod kyi nang du bcug la/ so sor brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas shar phyogs kyi sgo nas dkyil
307a1(rgyud): 'khor du bzhag par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor mchog la phyag dang bskor ba byas la de nas so sor dar gyis kha bcad de/ dkyil 'khor gyi snying por bzhag la don yod
307a2(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas dbang bskur bar bya/ dbang bskur bar nas kyang rig sngags 'chang gis dbang bskur bar bya/ de nas
307a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor snying por ni// 'jig rten dbang phyug mchod bya ste// bdug spos lnga dag dbul bya bo// a ga ru dang tsan dan dang // spri ka gu gul du ru ka/ mchod yon snod ni lnga dbul
307a4(rgyud): zhing / gtor ma lnga ni dbang bya ste// ro ldan sna tshogs dag gi das dgang // ro ldan 'bras bu sna tshogs pa'i// gto dar ma cha lnga dbul bar bya// kun tu phreng ba nyi shu dang // 
307a5(rgyud): mar me nyi shu lnga dag dang // spos kyi phye ma lnga dag dang // spo sa kyi cha lngar phye bas phyug/ 'phan phran nyi shu rtsa lnga gdags// tshon rtsi lnga yis mdzes par bya// gser
307a6(rgyud): dang dngul gyis g.yogs pa yi// bum pa gang ba nyi shu lnga// rin po che ni lnga gzhug go/ sgo bzhi grwa bzhir bum pa brgyad// brgya dang nyi shu rtsa lnga nyid// dkyil 'khor me tog
307a7(rgyud): 'bras yos dang // yungs kar nyid kyis mngon par dgram// slob dpon bla ma mchod pa ni// gos dang snod dang yon gyis so// thub pa 'jig rten dbang phyug ltar// ston pa'i
307a8(rgyud): 'du shes bskyed nas su// dkyil 'khor slob dpon mchod byas nas// de nas dkyil 'khor gshegs par gsol// de nas las rnams bya ba ni// ji ltar yid la sna tshogs bya
307b1(rgyud): don yod chen po'i gzhal med khang // rig sngags 'chang gis rtag tu gsang // de nyid dngos grub sgrub sla ba// de bzhin nor bu sman sngags so// don 'di shin tu bkra shis so// mkhas
307b2(rgyud): pa mi yis bya ba yin// phra ma'i chog kyang mi sten te// brdzun ni nams kyang smra mi bya// 'di ni grub pa'i de nyid de// de la 'grub pa the tshom med// 'dir ni dkyil 'khor bshad par bya/ 
307b3(rgyud): kun nas gru bzhi lham pa ste// grwa bzhi cha ni legs par byed// ko la'i tshad de legs pa dang // sna tshogs tshon gyi thug skud kyis// dkyil 'khor dam pa thig gdab po// dkyil
307b4(rgyud): 'khor dbus kyi snying por ni// 'khor lo bzang po brib bya// dbus kyi lte bar pad+mo yau// 'khor logasade la babri bar bya// pad+ma'i snying po gser dang ni// dngul
307b5(rgyud): lam tsan dan las byas pa// 'bar ba 'jig rten dbang phyu ga bzhugs// 'khor lo kun tu rtsibs dang ni// mu khyud dag gis cha dbye'o// dkyil 'khor snying po'i grwa
307b6(rgyud): rnams der// lha yi dbang po tshangs pa dang // khyab 'jug dbang phyug chen po bri// kun tu kha khyer rnam pa dang // pad+ma phreng ba rnams bya'o// dkyil 'khor phyi rol kun tu ni// rtag
307b7(rgyud): dang phyag rgya rnams bri ste// rdo rje dgra sta mdung rtse gsum// ral gri zhags pa tho ba dang // gshin rje be con pad+ma gdugs// dbyug to mnga' bo che rnams so// grwa rnams kun tu
307b8(rgyud): phreng ba dang // me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dkram// sgo sgo der ni dkyil 'khor gyi// lha stegashin rje chu lha dang // lus ngan dang ni gzhon nu bri// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi rnams su ni/ 
308a1(rgyud): rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag/ go cha legs par bgos pa dang // khro bar lta ba 'jigs byed bri// 'di ni dkyil 'khor mchog yin te// dkyil 'khor rgyan
308a2(rgyud): dgos pa rnams// legs pa yongs su rdzogs par ni// rig sngags ji bzhin bstan pa yin// de nas legs par khrus byas la// gos gtsang bgos pa 'jigs med pas// sman
308a3(rgyud): mchog bzung ste las bya'o// rmongs pa'i dra ba sna tshogs dang // sgyu ma lta bu'i rnam sprul pa// gang gis ngan 'gro bar 'gyur ba// sems can kun la bstan par bya// rtag tu dga' dang
308a4(rgyud): dang pa dang // gus pa de nyid thob par 'gyur// rig sdug/ das 'chang gis sgrub pa'i mchog/ dngos grub de nyid thob par 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang gis sngar khrus byas
308a5(rgyud): la rdzas kyi dri chab gtsang mngon yod pa'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya// tsan dan gyi tshul ba rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas skra yan chad tsam byug
308a6(rgyud): 'tshang zin par bsdus nas kha gdong bkru bar bya'o// mig sman la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas bskus ni mig bzang bar 'gyuraro// brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas brjod bya/ 
308a7(rgyud): nas bdag nyid dang phyogs bcur gto ro// de bzhin du til mer la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas sgo yan chad bsru ba dang / tshong zin par bsdu ba dang / lus rkang mthol
308a8(rgyud): yan chad bsku'o// yi ge gcig po yid la bya ba la sems byams pa nyid la gnas nas rgyal po dang / btsun mo'i sgo'am/ skye bo'i nang ngam/ 'dus pa chen po 'am/ dge 'dun
308b1(rgyud): gyi nang ngam/ tshogs dang phrad pa 'am/ de bzhin du gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ de dag thams cad kyis 'jig rten mgon po'i gzugs dang / kha dog du mthong zhing sa'i steng nas rkang
308b2(rgyud): pa khru gang tsam gyis spags te 'dug la/ ji lta ji ltar 'dul ba rnams kyi dad pa de lta de ltar gzugs rnams ston par byed de/ rgyal po'am/ 'khor los bsgyur ba 'am/ mi'i
308b3(rgyud): seng ge'am/ 'phag gam/ sred med kyi bur ston pa 'am/ tshangs pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi dbang po'am/ dbang phyug chen po mig gsum pa'am/ gzhon nu 'am/ chu
308b4(rgyud): lha'am/ gshin rje'am/ rnam thos kyi bu'am/ de ba bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi 'am/ nag po chen po 'am/ dga' byed dbang phyug gam/ ser skya'am// gas
308b5(rgyud): ba pa 'am/ lag na rdo rje stobs che 'am/ nor bu bzang pe'i bu 'am/ gang ba bzang po'am/ stobs kyi'ang/ gar mkhan mchog gam/ rlung lha 'am/ drang srong nyid/ 
308b6(rgyud): de ji ltar gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs yid la byas pa thams cad ston par byed do// me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs pa nyid 'byung bar byed do// de bzhin du dge 'dun gyi nang du
308b7(rgyud): zhugs na de sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / gzugs sna tshogs su snang zhing gzhal med khang gi rnam pa dag kyang ston par byed do// ji ltar 'dod par 'gyur ba yid la byas pa de/ 
308b8(rgyud): lhar gzugs rnams ston par byed do// 'khor tshogs pa'am/ dgon pa 'am/ 'chags dag kyang sman nor bu dang / gsang sngags kyi mthus gzugs sna tshog su ston pa
309a1(rgyud): byed do// 'gron po 'brog gi nang du phyin pa nyams thag pa/ 'jigs pa mi bzad pa/ chu med pa/ mgon par mgon med pa/ sdug bsngal drag po de lta bu'i nang
309a2(rgyud): du chud pa'i skye bo sdug par gyur pa/ skyabs med pa/ mgon med par gyur pa/ skyob pa med pa/ dpung gnyen med par gyur pa ni de la rig sngags 'chang gis phye ma 'dis phyogs
309a3(rgyud): bzhir mtshams bcad par bya/ phye mas dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du ri mo bris la rol bu la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag go// yungs ka ra la til mar gyi rgyal pos bskus la don
309a4(rgyud): yod pa'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ khro bo'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te/ dbang bskur nas khro bo'i rgyal po hUM zhes bya bas phyag rgya
309a5(rgyud): bcings la sa la bsnun cing phyogs bzhir gtor ba ra bya ba phyag rgya dang ldan par byas pa tsam gyis chu bzang po rnam pa sna tshogs 'bab cing rdzing 'byung bar
309a6(rgyud): 'gyur/ tshal dang / nye ba'i tshal dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gzhal med khang 'byung bar 'gyur/ phye ma'i dkyil 'khor las grong khyer dang / khang
309a7(rgyud): bzang 'gyur bar 'gyur/ khyim gyi gnas lnga stong 'byung bar 'gyur zhing bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / nyams dga' ba dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ 
309a8(rgyud): nyo tshong dang / ba'ang dang / ma he dang / rta dang / glang po'i gnas dag 'thung bar 'gyur/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / tshong pa dang / khyim dang / khang pa bzang po dag 'byung bar
309b1(rgyud): 'gyur te/ ji srid du bsam pa de srid du 'dug go// chu dang yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas phyogs bzhir gtor na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// yungs kar de g.yul 'gyed pa'i
309b2(rgyud): nang du gtor na dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ des pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dgra 'jigs shing 'joms par byed pa las rgyal bar 'gyuraro// 
309b3(rgyud): grong khyer gyi phyogs bzhi kun tu gtor na gtor ba tsam gyi mdo la 'obs bcad tsang rab kha khyer gyis bskor la grong khyer kun tu skyes bu go cha bgos pa dag snang bas grong khyer mnan
309b4(rgyud): pa'am/ gtse bar sus kyang mi nus so// mtshan mo'idri'i til mar de nyid yungs kar la bskus te/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas chang ba gang me'i nang du
309b5(rgyud): gtor/ chang ba gang phyogs bzhi kun tu gtor na kun na/ sa mar me'i phreng ba 'byung bar 'gyur la/ ji srid / gos pa de sring du 'bar ro// gtsug lag khang ngam/ 
309b6(rgyud): dgon pa 'am/ ri 'am/ phug gam/ 'chag sa'i gnas sam/ khyim du gtor na mar me'i 'phreng 'byung bar 'gyur la/ chu dang yungs kar gyis mi snang bar 'gyur/ grong khyer gyi
309b7(rgyud): sbyor yungs kar gtor na gtor ba tsam gyi modo la dag thams cad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi grong khyer mi snang bar 'gyuraro// gang na phyir rgol ba dang / pha rol gyi dmag
309b8(rgyud): tshogs gnas pa 'grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ tshul gyi nang ngam/ dgon pa'i gan su gtor na 'brog dgon pa 'thung bar 'gyur la/ thams cad phan tshun ngo ma shes nas 'jig
310a1(rgyud): shing skrag pa chen pos rab tu 'gros par byed do// dgra'i tshogs kyi nang du gtor na mtshon cha thams cad dang / 'gyed pa'i go cha thams cad mi snang zhing gcer bur 'gyu
310a2(rgyud): zhal che 'gyed pa'i nang du gtor na 'gyed zla gtso bo de gcer bur 'gyur ro// dgra'i steng du gtor na me 'bar ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag la sogs pa yid la ji ltar byas pa'i las
310a3(rgyud): 'bum steng byed do// de nas las rgya chen po byed pa'i rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma legs par khrus byas pa spos kyis lus bskus pa nges/ yungs kar dang / til mar gyi rgyal
310a4(rgyud): pos bskus pa la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la gto// dar bar bya/ khro bo'i rgyal pos lan bdun dbang bskur
310a5(rgyud): nas phyag rgya bcas pa'i lag pas ril bu spyi bor bzha ga la phye mas gdab par bya/ til mar gyi rgyal phra sa rkang pa la byug par bya/ don yod pa'i rgyal po lan
310a6(rgyud): tsag dran par bya ste/ yongs su sbyang ba'i las lhan cig bya ba legs par byas pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzugs g.yo ste gar dga' bar 'gro la/ 
310a7(rgyud): gzugs brnyan gang du 'gro ba de nyid du rang 'gro/ lha'i steng du gtor na lha lha'i gnas nas 'pho zhing gar dga' ba der 'gro'o// phye mas lha'i steng du gtor la khro bo'i rgyal po hUM zhes
310a8(rgyud): byab mi snang bar 'gyur// ti la mar gyi rgyal po la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la bdag nyid kyis pus mo dang / byin pa la bskus nan mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyuraro// rkang
310b1(rgyud): mthil la bskus na sa'i steng na rkang pa sor bzhi tsam mi reg go// rdo'i steng du rkang pa bzhag pa dang / rkang rjes byung ba'i steng du rdza ma dang / bum pa dang / bum pa bzhag pa'i rku la
310b2(rgyud): bskus na sor bzhi tsam gyis chad du na mkha' la 'dug go/ yungs kar la bzlas brjod byas nas mes sbyin sreg byas pa'i thal ba de blangs nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod
310b3(rgyud): byas la/ til mar gyis smras pa la khro bo'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad dbang bskur nas mig la bskus na mig gsum ston cing dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su ston par byed do// 
310b4(rgyud): bas lus la byugs na tshangs pa'i gzugasu ston to// da shing pa la sha dang / brna sha bsres pas lus bru gas na sred med kyi bu'i stobs dang / shugs dang / 
310b5(rgyud): gzugs su ston to// til mar chen pos khar bskus la thal bas dpral bar thig le byas na gzhon nu'i gzu gas su ston to// yungs kar gyi 'bru kha dog sna tshogs
310b6(rgyud): can la til mar chen po byugs pas bskus la don yod pa'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ phyag rgyas brgya rtsa brgyad dbang bskur cing khro bo'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa
310b7(rgyud): brgyad dbang bskur la/ de nas dngul gyi snod kyi nang du bzhag de nas las thams cad byed de na mkha' la gtor na nor bu dang rin po che'i char 'bab par ston to// de bzhin gash+ye
310b8(rgyud): pa mchod pa'i tshen mkha' la gter na me tog gi char sna tshogs 'bab par 'gyur/ 'dus pa'i nang du na mkha' la gtor na 'bras bu dang nor gyi rgyun sna tshogs pa ston to// tshal
311a1(rgyud): gyi nang du gtor na me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs pa ston to// ri phug tu gtor na rdzas dang sman sna tshogs ston to// mchod rten snying ba'am/ gtsug
311a2(rgyud): lag khang ngam/ lha'i gnas su gtor na yo byad thams cad kyis yongasu gang zhing rdzogs pa gang pa bzang po yangs pa gnas kyi mchog ston to// grong khyer stong par gtor na
311a3(rgyud): 'tsho ba'i yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs shing yongs su rdzogs pa dang / yul rgyal po dang / sbas pa dang / bkrabs pa dang / 'dun na 'don pa dang / blon po dang / skyes
311a4(rgyud): pa dang / bud mad dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dag ston to// / yang dag khro bo'i rgyal po hUM zhes bya bas gtor na dadapung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa ston to// dur khrod kyi
311a5(rgyud): nang du gtor na shi ba'i rus pa gang dang gang la bab dA dadang de gang du sems can dmyal ba'am/ dung gro'i skyes gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'dzag rten nam/ 
311a6(rgyud): lha ma yin nam/ na mkha' lding ngam/ dri za'am/ mi 'am ci 'am/ lto 'phye chen po'am/ bya 'am/ nya'am/ rus sbrul gyi rigs su skyes pa'am/ lha'i 'jig rten nam/ 
311a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes pa de'i rus pa 'am/ thod pa la tshig 'byung bar 'gyur la/ gang du skyes pa de'i gtam yang smra'o// gang dang gang ga skye gnas su skyes pa de thams cad smra
311a8(rgyud): la thabs ji ltar bya ba de smra'o// yungs kar nges kyang rus gong 'brel par 'am/ shi ba'i ro 'am/ rus pa 'thor ba la baban bab pa tsam gyis mad la sems can dmyal ba las
311b1(rgyud): yongasu thar nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyuraro// zong bkram pa'i nang du gtor na thams cad mi mngon par 'gyuraro// nam mkha' la gtor na skar ma rnams mi mthong / 
311b2(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// skye bo mang po'i nang du gtor na thams cad gcer bur 'gyur ro// 'dus pa'i nang du gtor na thams cad bro rdung bar byed do// dge 'dun gyi nang du gtor na dge slong
311b3(rgyud): thams cad bsam gtan 'thob par 'gyuraro// tshogs kyi gtso bo la gtor la rnal 'byor spyod par 'gyuraro// mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs kyi nang du gtor na thams cad bong bu dang / 
311b4(rgyud): wa dang / khyi'i gzugs can du 'gyuraro// sbyor ma'i sgor gtor na sbyor ba thams cad 'bar la ma he'i gzu dgas can du snang ngo // shi ba'i steng du gtor na bro rdung bar
311b5(rgyud): byed do// thod pa'i steng du gtor na bro rdung bar byed cing rgyug la phan tshun rgyug par byed do// lam gyis bzhir mdor gtor na gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 
311b6(rgyud): 'byung po thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na nye bar 'khod la ji srid mche'i dbang du gyur nas 'khod ngo do// nyin gcig bzhin bdag nyid la gtor na mchod pa chen po'i
311b7(rgyud): gnas su 'gyur te/ gzhan yang rang bzhin gi blo rnams kyis las 'bum snyed byed do// don yod pa chen po rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor sgyu ma lta bu'i cho ga'o// 
311b8(rgyud): 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// // bam po bco brgyad pa// de nas de'i phyir 'dugs pa chen po dang / lag na rdo rje
312a1(rgyud): gzugs bstan pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/ gang gis lha rnams myur du 'ong ba dang / phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs myur du ston to// rdo rje'i sku dang stobs po che/ 
312a2(rgyud): rta mgrin dang ni mgul sngon dang // de bzhin rta ni rgod ma'i kha// bdud rtsi'i khyil ldan gzugs po che// log 'dren rnams ni rab 'joms dang // khro rgyal de bzhin 'jigs
312a3(rgyud): byed spyan// ke le'i ki li'i rgyal po che// khro bo tshal pa stobs po che// de bzhin rdo rje sa 'og gzugs// rdo rje rtse mo de nyid dang // klu chen rab 'joms spyan yangs dang // sog ma
312a4(rgyud): med ni 'dul ba dang // de bzhin thigs khro khros chen dang // de bzhin mche ba gtsigs mdzad dang // rgyal po chen po rdo rje'i sgrog/ sku yi dbang po stobs kyis
312a5(rgyud): gnon// mgon po gos sngon gyon pa dang // dbyug sngon da gra las rgyal ba dang // 'jig rten dbang phyug pad+ma/ 'i lte// phyag na pad+ma pad+ma byug/ de bzhin 'jigs
312a6(rgyud): pa brgyad sel dang // de bzhin mchod rten 'jig rten bla// sna tshogs gzugs ste bzang po dang // sred med bu dang tshangs pa dang // drag po daN+Di dbang phyug dang // nag po chen po
312a7(rgyud): gzhon nu dang // gshin rje dang ni chu lha nyid// nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang // rgyu skar sgra gcan mjug rings dang // de bzhin bza' dang lha ma yin// na mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci// gno// 
312a8(rgyud): sbyin srin po lto 'phye che// 'byung po dpal ldan rnam thos bu// de bzhin yul skyong mig mi bzang // 'phags skyes de nyid mthong ba dang // mi'u thung dang ni drang srong gzugs// nor
312b1(rgyud): bu bzang sras gang ba bzang // sna tshogs gzugs can ston pa dang // rgyal po dang ni ded dpon dang // tshong dpon de bzhin khyim bdag dang // bram ze dang ni rgyal rigs dang // dge sbyong
312b2(rgyud): stag dang seng ge dang // khyu mchog de bzhin nags kyi lha// shing lha de bzhin lo tog lha// gang ga sI tA ya mun// zla ba skal ldan ru sbal nya// lag 'gro dang ni thod pa can// skal yod
312b3(rgyud): de bzhin 'bras bu dang // me tog rgya rlabs chen po dang // sna tshogs gzugs dang rnam sna tshogs// de ltar dgugs pa bstan pa dang // de ltar slar gshegs gsol ba nyid// sbyin
312b4(rgyud): sreg dra ba 'di nyid kyis// rgyu 'phrul smad byung gsang sngags grub// rdzas grub nor bu til mar grub// don yod na ga pa sgrub pa'i phyir// de nyid dngos grub rab ston pa// 
312b5(rgyud): mchod rten dgon pa gtsug lag khang // lha yi gnas dang / de bzhin grong // grong khyer nyid dang 'bab chu'i dang ngo // / mtsho'u dang lteng ga chu bo dang // rdzing dang de bzhin
312b6(rgyud): char 'bab dang // 'brug sgrogs dang ni glog 'gyu dang // gzhan yang me ni 'bar ba dang // dud pa'i phung po bde 'gyed dang // skyes bu go cha gyon pa dang // de bzhin mtshon cha sna tshogs
312b7(rgyud): mthong // khyu mthong grub pa mthong ba dang // de nyid rmad du byung ba ste// rdzas nyung sbyar ba nyung gyur kyang // de nyid dngos grub bla na med// sems can rnams la phan 'tshal nas// bco
312b8(rgyud): ldan de nyid bdag gis bshad// rig sngags 'chang rnams bklags pas 'grub// dbul po rnams ni nor 'thob cing // sdang ba rnams ni byams par bgyid// mu stegs gzhan
313a1(rgyud): rnams dad par bgyid// mkhas pa rnams ni dga' bar bgyid// gdul dka' rnams ni thar bar 'tshal// dge slong rnams ni bsam gtan thob// ting 'dzin bla na med
313a2(rgyud): pa 'thob// chos 'dod rnams ni sangs rgyas mthong // sdig pa byed rnams sdig pa 'jig/ mi rigs byas rnams thar pa thob// mtshams med lnga rnams rnam dag don// dbugs ma phyin
313a3(rgyud): rnams dbugs 'byin mchog/ ma dul ba rnams de bzhin 'dul// ma rgal ba rnams sgrol ba'i gru// thar pa'i lam du 'gro bar gnas// ma grol ngan 'gro kun las grol// sdig pa kun lnga/ 
313a4(rgyud): rnam par grol// lung ma bstan pa lung ston byed// skyon da dang dri ma sdig pa rnams// thams cad mod la spong ba dgyi nga // de la sogs pa'i las rnams ni// bklags
313a5(rgyud): pas grub pa bgyid pa lags// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das// don gyi dngos grub bla na med// gang du nga gang du sbyor ba bgyid// dgos pa thams cad 'grub par
313a6(rgyud): 'gyur// yid la bsams pa 'grub par 'gyur// 'dir ni yid kyis rnam bsams pa// ji ltar yid la 'dod pa dang // ji ltar ngo bo kun bsams pa// de ltar rnam 'phrul ston par
313a7(rgyud): bgyi// tshes grangs rgyu skar sbyar mi 'tshal// bsrung ba bgyi ba mi 'tshal te// cho ga ji bzhin dus ji bzhin// cho ga rig sngags rgyal po bzlas// rig sngags 'chang ba gtsang gyur cing / 
313a8(rgyud): legs par khrus bgyis gos gtsang dag/ bgos pa bden par smra ba dang // bla ma la ni gus byed pa// rtag tu byams pa'i sems la gnas// sems can kun la brtse ba'i mchog/ 
313b1(rgyud): sdom la gnas shing tshangs par spyod// chos ma yin pa spong byed pa// gal te de nyid grub 'dod na// sh+tha dang spun dong dang // 'dres dang za 'phro spags pa spangs// sems can ngan pa sun
313b2(rgyud): 'byon pa// rig sngags chu dang chog tu// chos rmugasang sngags rkub dang // de bzhin rkun mtsham rkun dang // ser sna rtag tu spang bar gyis// de dag la ni dngos grub med// ma rungs pa
313b3(rgyud): yid dam tshig nyams// yang bcugs pa ni med par byed// sdig pa'i chos ni kun tu spyod// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis smad// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis spyangad // rtag tu chos
313b4(rgyud): kyi sdong dum 'gyur// shi nas sems can dmyal b.raH/ zho la// rtag tu smod pa'i gnas su 'gyur// dbul de bo lus ni bskams pa dang // mdze dang khyo rjes 'debs par
313b5(rgyud): sdug bsngal rkun mchos sun 'byin// chos ku ba yi lus can ni// 'jig rten 'dir ni bder mi 'gyur// 8jig rten pha rol ga la bde// sems can dmyal bar
313b6(rgyud): gzhol ba yin// de lta bas na chen po 'dod pas ni rtag tu dam pa'i chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya zhing rtag tu dkon mchog gsum dang / pa dang ma dang bla ma dang // ston pa ni skyobs pa
313b7(rgyud): dang / skyabs dang / dpung gnyen mdzad pa/ ston pa/ mchog sbyin pa/ dngos grub dang / mi 'dzegs pa sbyin pa rga shi las thar bar byed pa/ dbang phyug sbyin pa/ nor sbyin pa/ longs
313b8(rgyud): spyod sbyin pa/ dang ba mchog bskyed pa de nyid 'jig rten gyi bla ma/ mgon po'i 'jig rten dbang phyug chen po// dbang phyug mgon po// mchog sbyin par mdzad pa/ gzugs sna tshog/
