314a1(rgyud): ston par mdzad/ dngos grub sna tshogs sbyin par bgyid pa/ mgon po sdug bsngal sna tshogs las yongasu thar bar bgyid pa/ nang sna tshogs sbyong bar grub pa/ 
314a2(rgyud): rin po che sna tshogs rab tu sbyin par bgyid pa// 'jig rten gyi sdig pa sna tshogs sel bar bgyod pa// bla ma la gus pa sna tshogs bgyid pa lags te// de lta bas na rtag tu 'bad pas
314a3(rgyud): dgos pa thams cad rab tu sbyin par bgyid pa/ rtag tu 'bad pas shin tu gus par bgyid pa lag so// de nas rdzas kyi sman sgrub pa dang / bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bshad par bgyi ste/ se
314a4(rgyud): ge'i lce dang / snying dang / mag dang / de bzhin du nya phyis kyi/ phye ma dang / ldong ros dang / brah+ma'i 'o ma dang / gu gu da la dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma'i ze ba dang / ud pal sngon po
314a5(rgyud): dang / nA ga pus pa dang / li shi dang / rgya spos dang / de bzhin du gi'u wang dang / gla rtsi dang / ga pur dang / gur gum da nga / tsan dan dkar po dang / smrig ka dang / te dza ba ti ste de
314a6(rgyud): ltar tshe mnyam par byas pa de dag thams cad phye ma zhib mo byas la dngul gyi snod bkang ste dar gyis g.yog/ don yod pa'i rgyal po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du dus gsu
314a7(rgyud): du khri bzlas brjod bya'o// dus gsum du khro bo'i rgyal pos lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pas dbang bskur zhing phyag rgyas kyang nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dbang bsku ro// khri tshang nA
314a8(rgyud): cha lnga byas te phye ma dang / til mar dang / nor bu dang / mig bsku pab dang / til mar chos pa dang cha lnga'o// phye ma'i pad+ma mu ruka'i phye ma dang sbyar la bzlas brjod bya'o// khro ba'i rgyal
314b1(rgyud): pos ni lnga stong ngo // til mar ni ma hA ru ti ras 'grub stes brgya stong bzlas brjod bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal pos bzhi stong ngo // nor bu ni sbrul gyi khrag gis sbrus te khri chig stong bzlas brjod bya'o// 
314b2(rgyud): khro bo'i rgyal pos lnga stong lnga rgya'o// mig sman ni rma bya'i mig chu dang / 'ug pa'i mig dang / klad pa dang sbyar la khri chig stong bzlas brjod bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal po stong rtsa brgyad do// 
314b3(rgyud): brah+ma te la srang nyi shu gan d+ha ra ba te srang brgyad/ yungs mar la srang bcu drug/ 'o ma la srang brgya/ ba ser mo grub pa'i 'o ma dang / ba'i lci ba dang / ba gtsan srang bdun/ du ru ka'i mar
314b4(rgyud): khung srang gnyis te rdzas 'di rnams chu dang bsres nas pad+ma de'i sdong bus dkrug cing zangs snod du bco'o// mnyam pa der gzhag pas gsang sngags bzlas// cho ga dag gis
314b5(rgyud): bsrung bar bya// cho ga bzhin du gtor ma sbyar// me tog ba dug spos dag gos bdug/ tol mar mchog ni ban+d+ha ba par bya// chung ngur me bud grub pa mchog/ spos kyi
314b6(rgyud): shing gis bud pa bzang // 'di ltar grub par shes pa dang / khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur ba// nyi shu gcig tu dbang bskur ro// til mar de ni snod gtsang ma// zangs snod yang
314b7(rgyud): na dngul snod bzang // smig ma'i snod du bzhag par bya// de nas rig sngags brgyad stong dang // khro bo'i rgyal po brgyad stong nyid// so so dag tu bzlas brjod bya// dkyil 'khor
314b8(rgyud): yongs su rdzogs pa der bzhag par bya ba ni ji ltar dkyil 'khor gyi cho gar bya ba de ltar byas nas bzhag cing slob dpon gyi las kyang bya ste/ ji ltar dkyil 'khor sgrub pa dang / 'jug
315a1(rgyud): pa dang / dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / dbang bskur ba dang / mchod pa dang / dkyil 'khor bskor ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / spyi'u gtsug bcing ba dang / phyag rgya bcing
315a2(rgyud): ba dang / srung ba'i cho ga dang / nye reg bya ba dang / gos bgo ba dang ga mchod phyir thogs pa ste dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon kun gyis de dag thams cad bstan par bya'o// de nas dkyil
315a3(rgyud): 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying por bzhag la rig sngags 'chang sbyang ba'i cho ga byas pas 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ khro bo'i rgyal pos kyang
315a4(rgyud): stong rtsa brgyad du dbang bskur/ phyag rgyas kyang stong rtsa brgya du dbang bskur la/ phyag rgya bcing nas rnam pa gsu dam 'dra bar dbang bskur ro// de nas las thams cad
315a5(rgyud): byas te yungs kar dkar po grub pa la rig sngags 'chang gis brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas la pad+ma'i mtsho ga gtso bo bcang ba/ gtsang mar byas pa/ legs par
315a6(rgyud): bskus pa/ sbyangs pa/ phye ma zhib tu btags pa/ thal ba lta bu la brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas nas snod dgang / gu gul dang / tsan dan dang / a ga ru dang / sprig ka la brgya rtsa
315a7(rgyud): brgyang bzlas brjod byas nas snod kyi nang du bkang la/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa'i steng du so sor bzhag go/ de nas khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur cing phyag rgyas kyang dbang bskur
315a8(rgyud): ba byas na/ gang gi tshe don du bya ba byung ba'i tshe bya ba thams cad byed do// gser ram/ yang na dngul lam/ zangs las pad+ma'i tshad du byas pa 'dab ma nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / snying po
315b1(rgyud): dang ze ba can dang / de bzhin du sor bcu gnyis pa'i tshang la sdong bu sor bcu drug pa'i tshad rdo rje'i rnam pa can du bya/ skud pa dmar po'i zhag pa pad+ma'i tshon dmar pos bzhen pa/ gzhon
315b2(rgyud): nus bkal ba grub pa dang / de dag la brgya stong bzlas brjod bya/ khre bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur cing phyag rgyas kyang dbang bskur ba byas la mkhas pas/ gsang ba'i gnasu bzhag
315b3(rgyud): go/ gang gi tshe don du bya ba byung ba de'i tshe las thams cad grub pa ston to// shin tu gtsang zhing gtsang bar bya ste/ su la yang mi sbyin no// sangs rgyas rnams la sku brnyas par
315b4(rgyud): gyur pa/ dam tshig nyams pa la bgegs 'jug par 'gyuradar zhing / 'phral du mtshams med pa lnga byed pa rmongs dpa'i dra ba de la dngos grub nams kyang shes par mi 'gyur// 
315b5(rgyud): gzhan ni bla ma la gus shing / sangs rgyas chos la ston byed pa/ 'phags pa'i tshogs la dang ba dang / bya/ mas sems snying rje bdag nyid can// de yi lag tu rab tu
315b6(rgyud): sbyin// bdag gi srog bzhin gtad par bya// de dag dngos grub mchog sbyin te// bklags dang mthong ba tsam gyis na// ji ltar yid la byas pa bzhin// rjesu 'thun pa'i las byed do// 
315b7(rgyud): 'jig rten 'dir ni rtag tu bde// 'jig rten pha rol bde ba yin// 'gro ba lam ni bde bar 'gro/ gang na 'od dpag med pa bzhugs// bde ba can du rtag tu 'gro/ brdzus te skyes te pad+ma
315b8(rgyud): las/ rgyan rtags kun gyis rnam par brgyan// tshe rabs dag ni dran 'gyur te// sngon gyi tshe rabs dran par 'gyur// de nas rig sngags 'chang rmongs pa chen po'i dam tshig ston par
316a1(rgyud): 'dod pa gtsang mas legs par khrus bya/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas nyin zhag cig bsrung ba byas pas lag na rdo rje dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
316a2(rgyud): phyug zhal mngon du bzhag ste/ me tog dang bdug spos dbul zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku gzugs dang / phyag na rdo rje'i sku gzugs la mchod pa yang bya/ 
316a3(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la a ga ru'i bdug spos kyis bdug/ lag na rdo rje la gu gul gyi bdug spos kyis bdugs/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la
316a4(rgyud): lha bshos dkar po dbul/ lag na rdo rje la ro sna tshogs/ dang ldan pa'i lha bshos phul la/ nyin par don yod/ pa'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bya ste/ kha gdong khro gnyer med
316a5(rgyud): pa dang / dri ma dang ser sna med pas na ma langs kyi bar du bzlas brjod byas pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzi gas dbang phyug 'bar bar 'gyur la/ lag na rdo rje yang
316a6(rgyud): dbus mo 'dzugs par 'gyur te/ de gnyis kyi mig nas 'jigs pa/ rig sngags 'chang gis blangs nas thig le byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// mig la bskus na nam mkha' la 'gro'o// 
316a7(rgyud): khar bcug na rig sngags dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor mngon du 'gyuraro// lag na rdo rje'i stobs dang / shugs dang / brtson 'grus kyis pha rol
316a8(rgyud): gnon par 'gyur/ lag na rdo rje'i rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na nye bar 'dug cing 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog rjesu sbyin par byed la/ rang gi gzugs kyis spyod par byed/ lag na/ 
316b1(rgyud): rdo rje'i stobs dang / shugs dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol gnon pa rjesu sbyin par byed/ de ltar lag na rdo rjes 'gugs par 'gyuraro// nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su til mar chen po ran par bdag
316b2(rgyud): nyid la bsku/ mig sman gyis mig byug/ phye mas gtor zhing bdag nyid la thig le bya/ nor bu mgo la bzhag nas gu gul gyis bdug/ bdag nyid gos ngur sgrog bgos nas sangs rgyas yid/ 
316b3(rgyud): la bya ba sgom zhing / zhi ba dang dul ba'i yid kyis sde can gyi nang ngam dge 'dun gyi nang du 'jug par bya'o// de nas dge slong de dag gis sde can gyis nang du zhugs sam/ dge 'dun gyi nang du
316b4(rgyud): zhugs pa'i rig sngags 'chang de bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang / mdog dang / rtags dang / spyod lam du mthong ste/ mtshan nyi shu rtsa brgyad yod pa 'od mdo gang ba/ stan pad+ma/ 
316b5(rgyud): brgya byin dang mtshangs pa'i mdun gyi bdar ba'i lha tshogs/ sna tshogs kyis gzugs mthong bar ston to// dge slong de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / mdog
316b6(rgyud): du mthong nas thams cad zhabs gnyis la 'dud pa byed do// rig sngags 'chang nges brnyas par mi bya zhing / bdag la bstod par yang mi bya/ brnyas pa tsam gyis khyod kyi bsod nams yod/ 
316b7(rgyud): su nyams par mi 'gyur bar bya'o// 'phags pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun rdzu 'phrul chen pos bstobs bcu dang ldan par dbugs dbyung bar bya ste/ rgyu des na brnyas par mi bya'o// de nas
316b8(rgyud): grong khyer dang / rgyal po'i pho brang du 'jug par bya/ de nas 'dus pa'i nang du 'jug par bya/ de nas grong dang / tshang tshong dang / yul dang ri brag kyi nang du 'jug par bya/ de nas btsun mo
317a1(rgyud): nang du 'jug par bya ste/ yul gyi skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mod dag thams cad kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi sku dang / mdog dang / rtags dang / dbyang
317a2(rgyud): su mthong zhing mchod pa chen po dang / rim gro sna tshogs byed par 'gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas yin no zhes smra te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho ga 'thob po// yungs
317a3(rgyud): kar dang / til mar gyis rang gi 'khor gyi spyi bor gtor cing byugs na/ thams cad lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / 
317a4(rgyud): lto 'phye chen po'i gzugasu ston to// rkang pa til mar gyi ngas bskus na sa'i steng nas sor brgyad tsam gyis snga dgas te na mkha' la 'gro ste/ ji srid du ma bkrus pa de srid
317a5(rgyud): du sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du sto to// mgon po spyan ras ga/ zigs mthong bar 'dod pa'i rig sngags 'chang / de nang par sngar langs nas gtsang ma khrus byas te/ gos
317a6(rgyud): gtsang ma bgos nas khang stang du 'dug la yungs kar la til mar gyis byugs nas phyogs bzhir gtor na/ rgyal po dang / blon po dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / btsun mo/ 
317a7(rgyud): dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad sgyu ma chen pos rmongs par 'gyur// de nas rig sngags 'chang des nor bu bzhis dbu rgyan dang phreng ba byas la mgo
317a8(rgyud): la gdag so// til mar gyis yan lag tsam la bsku bar bya/ dpral bar thig le bya// mig sman gyis mig sku/ phye mas bdag nyid la gdab/ ras bzang po yug gcig bgo
317b1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i cha byang du bgyi ba/ nor bu dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / gser srung gyis bcings na de dag thams cad rgyan dang / spud pa dang / nor bu dang / dngul dang / 
317b2(rgyud): rdo rje dang / bai DUr+ya sna tshogs la sogs pas lus rgyan par snang ngo // lag na pad+ma thogs na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugasu snang ngo // yid la ji ltar
317b3(rgyud): bsams pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i tshul dang / 'jigs pa brgyad dang / tshangs pa'i tshul dang / yid bzhin nor bu dang / rgod ma'i kha dang / mgul sngon dang / rta mgrin du
317b4(rgyud): ston to// ji ltar gzugs yid la byas pa de ltar ston te/ ji srid du thig le yod cing dbu rgyan thog pa de sa dang du tshul sna tshogs ston par byed do// til mar dang / yung
317b5(rgyud): kar dang bsres nas/ kau kuSh+Na dang lhan cig sbrus nas la ga pa g.yas na rdo rje/ dpral bar dbang phyug chen ngo'i thig le byas nas pad+ma'i phye ma gtor la/ nor bu skye
317b6(rgyud): gtsug tu bcing / mig sman gyis mag bsku/ gu gul gyis bdugs la shes rab can khro bo'i lta ba'i tshul byas na mngon sum du rdo rje 'chang gi gzugs su snang te/ de la the tshom mi
317b7(rgyud): bya'o// ji srid du bdag khrus ma byas pa de sring du rdo rje'i gzugs can du snang la las sna tshogs byed cing mi dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyis rdo rje 'chang nyid du sems te/ de la the
317b8(rgyud): tshem mi bya'o// seng ge'i khrag gis til mar dang nor bu sbrus nas lus la bskus na ma'i seng ge chen po'i gzugs su ston to// phag gi khrag gis sbrus nas lus la bskus na
318a1(rgyud): ngag gi gzugs chen por ston to// til mar dang / phye ma lhan cig sbrus nas yungs pa dang / shing pa la sha'i mdog tu byas la lus la bskus na sred med kyi
318a2(rgyud): bu'i gzugasu ston to// rig sngags 'chang gis pad+ma dang / til mar lhan cig sbrus la bskus na dbang phyug chen po'i gzugasu ston to// shing arga'i 'o ma dang / til mar dang / 
318a3(rgyud): mnyam par sbyar la lus la skus na tshangs pa'i gzugs su ston to// glang po che'i khrag dang til mar sbyar nas lus la bskus na tshogs kyi dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su ston
318a4(rgyud): to// ra'i khrag dang sbrus nas lus la byugs na ra'i gzu dgas su ston to// til mar dang / thing shing dang / ba d+ma'i phye ma dang / glang po che'i khrag dang lhan cig sbyar
318a5(rgyud): nas lus la bskus na nag po chen po gzugs mngon su mdu rang gi gzugs su ston la/ gang dang gang dag la thig le byas nam mo'i tshogs kyi gzugs su ston to// 
318a6(rgyud): sbrul gyi khrag dang / lpags pa dang / til mar gyi rgyal po dang lhan cig sgras la rgal tshig su bsku zhing / dpung pa g.yon par yang bskus na klu'i rgyal po chen po'i gzugasu ston te/ 
318a7(rgyud): ji lta ji ltar khrag dang sbyar zhing ji lta ji ltar yid la bsams pa de lta de ltar gzugs ston to// de nas gzhal med khang lta bar 'dod na yungs kar la til mar gyis bskus nas
318a8(rgyud): dge 'dun gyi nang du steng 'og tu gtor/ phye mas nor bu rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo kun tu bskus na dge 'dun rgan rims su bkod pa'i dbus su gzhal med khang chen po rgyan gyis brgyan pa
318b1(rgyud): ston dge slong rnams kyi steng du gtor na dge slong thams cad gzugs sna tshogs yid la/ ji ltar byas pa bzhin rgyal po'i gzugs su snang ba dang / gzhan dag blon po dang / gzhan dag
318b2(rgyud): bkrabs pa dang / gzhan dge 'dun na 'don pa dang / gzhan dag yongasu spyod pa'i gzugs su ston la/ yungs kar la bskus pas gtor na slar yang dge slong rnams su snang ngo // 
318b3(rgyud): shing arga'i 'o ma yungs kar la bskus nas dge 'dun gyi dbus su dge slong rnams kyis mal stan gyi steng du gtor na/ ji ltar dge slong thams cad 'khod pa ltar snang ngo // ral
318b4(rgyud): pa'i thor tshugs kyis rgyan pa la gtor na rgan po'i khar/ ba thogs pa sgur po ltag dgye skra dkar can nyams chung bar snang ngo // mal stan gyi steng du yungs kar gton
318b5(rgyud): bgal te mtshan thog thag bzhag na gzugs gzhan du mi 'gyuraro// lug gi steng na snod yod pa la gtor/ na de thur ma'i gze ba dang / sbrul nag po snang ngo // snod
318b6(rgyud): kyi steng du gtor na kham por du snang bar 'gyur ro// gtung ba'i snod sbrang rtsis byugs pa'i steng du gtor na phyag dar gyi phung por snang ngo // grong khyer gyi sgo dang grong khyer kun tu
318b7(rgyud): gtor na grong khyer kun nas mi snang bar 'gyur// grong khyer kun la yungs kar dang pad+ma'i phye ma gter na skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo mi snang ba thams cad snang
318b8(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// seng ge'i khrag dang sbyar nas dud 'gro'i skyes gnas kyi gnas kyi steng du gtor na lam gyi gzhi mdo thams cad du seng ge'i gzugs su ston to// ste drag cing gtum la
319a1(rgyud): yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa'i steng du gtor na thams cad wa'i gzugs su snang la phyogs bcur rgyug go// g.yul 'gyed sar gton na thams
319a2(rgyud): cad gnyid log par byas par 'gyur la mtshon cha thams cad dang / go cha thams cad mi snang bar 'gyu ro// me'i nang du gtor na mi snang ba rnams snang bar 'gyur ro// til mar dang sbyar/ 
319a3(rgyud): nas me'i nang du gtor na rtag tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro// chu'i nang du gtor na chu mi mngon par 'gyur ro// bum pa chus bkang ba la gtor na srog chags chu'i nang na gnas pa thams cad chu'i
319a4(rgyud): nang nas 'byung zhing thang la gnas so// tshal gyi nang du yudadas kar gyis gtor na me tog dang 'bras bu mi sna/ dang bar gyur pa thams cad snang zhing shing skam po dang / tshal/ 
319a5(rgyud): gyi mthar me tog dang 'bras bu thams cad ston to// nam mkha' la gtor na phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi na nga ngam/ 'dus pa'i nang ngam/ skye bo mang po'i nang du me tog
319a6(rgyud): gi char rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'bab ste/ lha'i dri legs par smin pa yid dga' ba sim par byed pa 'bab po// las dang ldan pa'am/ bze'i gnas kyi las te/ las kyi snod thams
319a7(rgyud): cad la til mar gyi rgyal pos byugs la phye mas bsku/ pad+ma chen po'i phye mas dkyil 'khor gyi gnas bsku/ yungs kar gyi phyogs bzhir gtor la/ de nas las kyi bzo bzang po ji
319a8(rgyud): lta ba bzhin ston par 'dod na las kyi snod de dang de dag nyid g.yol/ las kyi bzo'i tshul bzang pos mthar phyin pa rnam pa du ma dag ston par byed la nye tsheng byed pa 'byung ste/ gal te
319b1(rgyud): phyir bzlog pa ma byas na rin ji lta ji lta ba de lta de ltar nyo tshong byed do// chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog pa byas na mi snang bar 'gyur la dpag tshad brgya stong tsam gyi bar du khrid na de dang de nyid
319b2(rgyud): dumi snang bar 'gyur// rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo la phyems thug cing yungs kar chags par byas la/ pad+ma chen po'i phye mas gtor na 'jim pa bzhag la snod kying ba dza ltar 'dod pa
319b3(rgyud): bzhin bya ste/ snod ngo bo dngul las byas pa'am/ gser las byas pa'am/ zangs las byas pa'am/ lcags las byas pa'am/ lcags lnga las byas pa rin po che bzang po
319b4(rgyud): sna tshogs kyis smras pa ji lta ba de lta bu'i snod bkra ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byung bar 'gyur la/ nyo tshong byed dpa yang 'byung ste/ rin chen pos tshong byed do// yungs
319b5(rgyud): kar gyi phye ma dang / pad+ma'i phye ma lhan cig sbyar nas tshong 'du sa kyi dbus su gtor na kun tu zong bkram pa'i snod mi snang bar byas pa thams cad snang bar byed do// 
319b6(rgyud): zag pa'i steng du sbyor na sbrul chen po ston to// khyim dang / ra ba'i ngos dang / sgo dang / shing sbyar ba dang / ka ba'i steng du gtor na khang pa dang ra ba dang / 'khor gyi khyams rnams
319b7(rgyud): sbrul du ston to// ji srid du chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog pa ma byas pa de srid du sprul pa rnams 'dug go/ bzlog pa byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// gtsug lag khang ngam/ lha'i gnas
319b8(rgyud): sam/ khang bzang kyi ngos la gtor na sbrul chen por snang ngo // lha'i steng du gtor la mig sman gyis bsku/ ril bus thig le byas na lha'i gzugs brnyan de ku co 'don cing 'gro ste/ 
320a1(rgyud): gar 'dod pa der 'gro'o// bzlog pa byas na phyir 'dug go// sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi zhabs la byugs la phye mas gtor na sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs g.yo bar mdzad/ 
320a2(rgyud): bzhud par mdzad do// 'jug par mdzad do// 'chag par mdzad do// tsan dan la bzlas brjod byas nas bdugs na phyir bzhugaso// bum pa sbrang rtsis bskus pa rnams la gtor na g.yo
320a3(rgyud): bar byed do// ji tsam du phyir bzlog pa ma byas pa de tsam du g.yo'o// chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog na phyir 'dug go/ de nas rdo rje bskyod par 'dod na spos kyi dkyil 'khor byas la ma
320a4(rgyud): tog bgram ste/ gu gul gyis bdug pas bdug/ de ya dang yungs kar dang phye ma dang bcas pa gtor la don yo da pa'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na/ rdo rje dkyil
320a5(rgyud): 'khor las langs nas na mkha' la 'gro bar byed do// 'phar bar byed/ 'dug par byed/ 'bar bar byed/ cing / phan tshun 'gro bar byed/ mtho bar 'gro bar byed// 
320a6(rgyud): dma' bar 'gro bar byed/ rnam par 'gro bar byed/ 'bar ba chen pos 'bar byed de/ ji srid du bzlog pa ma byas pa de srid du na mkha' la 'gro'o// chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog pa byas/ 
320a7(rgyud): na de nyid du snang ngo // de nas 'khor lo bskyod par 'dod na dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la spos sna tshogs kyis bris nas me tog sna tshogs dkram par yang bya/ gu gul gyi bdug
320a8(rgyud): pas kyang bdugs nas 'khor lo lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la til mar gyi rgyal pos bsku/ phye mas sku/ lte ba'i dbus su thig le byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su
320b1(rgyud): bzhag par bya/ de la yang yungs kar dang / pad+ma chen po'i phye mas gdab par bya/ 'khor lo kun nas gu gul gyi bdug pas bdug cing se gol gyi sgra yang byas na 'khor lo de dkyil 'khor las/ 
320b2(rgyud): las langs nas na mkha' la 'phar zhing sdang ba thams cad la 'bab par byed de/ gal te g.yul 'gyed par 'bab na/ de'i tshe dgra thams cad kyi mgo gcod par byed/ sdang ba thams
320b3(rgyud): cad dang phyir rgol ba thams cad la bab na 'jig par byed/ bgegs thams cad la 'bab pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / brjed byed dang / 
320b4(rgyud): gdon rnams la 'bab pa dang / klu sdang ba thams cad da la bab na 'jig par byed de/ ji srid du bzlog pa ma byas pa de srid du 'phar ro// chu dang yungs kar gyis
320b5(rgyud): bzlog pa byas na slar dkyil 'khor la 'dug go/ mdung rtse gsum pa bskyod par 'dod na dkyil 'khor bya sa la thod pa bzhag par bya// me tog dgram pa yang bya// 
320b6(rgyud): gu gul gyi bdug pas kyang bdugs la/ mdung rtse gsum pa la/ til mar gyi rgyal pos bsku/ phye mas gdab cing thig le bya/ rtse'i rgyun gsum la pad+ma chen po'i phye mas gtor
320b7(rgyud): nas thod pa'i steng du bzhag par bya/ yungs kar gyis gtor zhing hUM zhes se gol byas na mdung rtsi gsum pa 'bar bar byed ldang bar byed/ na mkha' la 'gro bar byed/ kun tu
320b8(rgyud): 'bar bar byed/ 'gro bar byed/ phyogs bcur 'bar bar byed/ ji srid du bzlog pa ma byas pa de srid du 'phar bar byed do// chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog pa byas na slar dkyil
321a1(rgyud): 'khor la 'dug go// dung la til mar gyis byugs la phye mas gtor la thig le bya/ yungs kar gyis kyang phyi nang gtor la bus na ji srid du sgra thos pa de srid kyi skyes
321a2(rgyud): pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad bro rdung bar byed/ rgyug par byed/ mchong bar byed cing phyogs bcur rab tu rgyug par byed do// g.yul ngor bus na 'gyed pa'i mi thams
321a3(rgyud): cad dang / mtshon cha thams cad dang / go cha thams cad btang nas bro rdung bar byed/ gcer bur 'byung bar byed/ phyogs bcur rgyug par byed do// gal te dung lan bdun bus na phyir
321a4(rgyud): rgol ba dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshegs des nyon mongs pa skyed par 'gyur/ ji srid du bzlog pa ma byas dpa de sring mchong zhing phyogs bcur rgyug go/ spos chus bzlog
321a5(rgyud): cing khrus byas na phyir bde bar gnas par 'gyur la// rtag tu rgyal ba dang / dpal gyi mchog sbyin par 'a gyuraro// de nas sgyu ma de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i gsang sngags
321a6(rgyud): dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i dngos grub kyi dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ sgyu 'phrul gyi dra ba rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor gang du dkyil 'khor yongasu rdzogs shing / kun nas
321a7(rgyud): rgyan par yungs kar dang til mar gyi rgyal po dang / phye mar bsres pas byug pa dang / thig les kyang dbang bskur cing pad+ma chen po'i phye mas byugs la lag pa pad+ma'i phyag rgya dang / 
321a8(rgyud): hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod na brjod pa tsam dang / yungs kar gyis gtor ma'i mod la gtor ma'i snod dang / snod rdza ma dang / bum pa dang / bum pa bkang ba thams cad dang / mtshon/ 
321b1(rgyud): cha thams cad dang / dkyil 'khor gyi steng nas na mkha' la sor bzhi tsam gyis spags te/ 'dug la ji srid du dkyil 'khor gyi las su bya ba thams cad rdzogs rdzogs kyi bar du
321b2(rgyud): nam mkha' la 'dug go// rig sngags 'chang ba sa'i steng gi sor bzhi tsam gyi tshad kyi steng gi nam mkha' la 'dug go/ las su bya ba thams cad zin nas dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad dri chab
321b3(rgyud): kyi cho gas dbang bskur na gtor ma dang / snod rdza ma dang / bum pa dang / bum pa thams cad rang nyid 'phar bar byed la slar yang rang gi gnas su 'dug go/ go cha de lta bu ni
321b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor thams cad la bya ste/ thams cad du yo na tan ston par snang la/ byas pa tsam gyis las thams cad sgrub par 'gyur te/ the tsom mi bya'o zhes
321b5(rgyud): bshad // de'i phyir pad+ma'i dngos grub bshad par bya ste/ gser ram dngul lam zangs las shin tu legs shing mdzes pa snying po dang / ze ba dang bcas shing
321b6(rgyud): sdong bu tshad dang ldan par byas la/ mdab ma phyed kha phye ba 'khor bar mdab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi yod pa khru gang tsam gyi tshad sdong bu dang / snying po dang / ze ba'i tshad sor bzhi tsam du byas
321b7(rgyud): pa la til mar gyi rgyal pos bsku/ pad+ma'i phye ma dang / mig sman dang / mig bsku ba dang / thig ler byas pa dang bcas pas kun legs par bskus la/ pad+ma'i sdong bu'i bar du
321b8(rgyud): nor bu rin po che bzhag nas/ lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ khro bo'i rgyal pos lan bdun gyi bar du dbang bskur nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma legs par khrus byas pa/ 
322a1(rgyud): gos gtsang ma bgos pas til mar gyis bdag nyid la bsku bar bya/ mig bsku ba dang / thig le dang / bdug pas bdag nyid kyis lus la bdug par bya'o// lag pa
322a2(rgyud): g.yas pa la nor bu gdags/ lag pa g.yon par pad+ma bzung la bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ 'khor gyi nang du bcom ldan 'das la pad+ma'i mchod pa 'bum bya ste/ pad+ma
322a3(rgyud): 'bum 'byung bar 'gyuraro// mchod pa'i cho ga byas nas chu dang / yungs kar gyis btab na yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// pad+ma sprul pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad chu'i nang du bor na pad+ma
322a4(rgyud): 'gal me bskor ba ltar 'khor bar 'gyur la/ pad+ma da 'bum rnams char du 'bab par 'gyuraro// pad+ma'i chu'i nang du bzhag par bya ba ni mtsho bran nam/ lteng ka'am/ chu bo'am
322a5(rgyud): chu bo chen po 'am/ 'obs sam/ rdzing ngam/ mtsho'i nang gang rung ba'i gnas su bzhag na gnas de dang da thams cad du pad+ma'i mtsho chen po 'byung ste/ ji srid du pad+ma ma
322a6(rgyud): phyung ba de srid du/ dus rtag tu pad+ma'i mtshor 'dug ste/ ston ka 'am/ dgun nam/ dpyid dam/ sos ka tsha ba'i dus su rtag tu pad+ma'i mtsher 'dug go// tshal gyi 'gram du zhugs nas yungs/ 
322a7(rgyud): kar la til mar gyis bskus pa phye ma dang sbyar nas me tog gang yang rung ba zhig lag gis bzung ste bskor la yungs kar gyis gtor na/ tshal gyi mtha'i shing thams cad la me tog
322a8(rgyud): rgyas par snang ngo // dge 'dun gyi nang ngam/ tshogs pa'i nang ngam/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ram/ skye bo'i nang du me tog ji snyed pa lag gis bskor la/ yungs kar gyis gtor na me
322b1(rgyud): tog mang po 'byung bar 'gyuraro// chu dang yungs kar gyis thams cad du bzlog par byed pa yin no// 'bras bu ji snyed pa lag gis bzung nas yungs kar gyis gtor na 'bras bu'i char 'bab par
322b2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// gos lag pas bzungs nas yungs kar gyi gtor te sgor ston na gos dang bla re sna tshogs ston par byed rgyan lag pas bzung nas yungs kar gyis gtor na/ lha'i rgyan bzang
322b3(rgyud): po sna tshogs pa lag tu 'byung bar 'gyur zhing skye bo 'dus pa thams cad kyi rgyan du byed la thams cad la rgyan btags par 'gyuraro// yungs kar dang / chus bzlog par bya'o// yungs
322b4(rgyud): kar la til mar gyis bskus phye mas bsgre/ gau'u wa/ dang dang / gur gum dang / shing kun dang / sU hA'i 'o ma das kyang bsgos la de dag gcig tu byas nas grib ma la bskam// 
322b5(rgyud): de nas 'bras bu gcig khar gtsug la phyogs bzhir gtor na kha nas me 'bar bar snang zhing lus las 'a bar ba sna tshogs 'byung bar snang ste/ ji srid du yungs kar
322b6(rgyud): kha na yod pa'i bar tu lus las 'od zer 'bar ba kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ngo // til mar dang lhan cig btags pa'i snying por bya/ skang bur til mar gyi rgyal pos bkang ste
322b7(rgyud): mar me 'bum ston par byed do// me thab khung bu'i nang du bcug ni ji srid du ma phyung ba de srid du me 'bar bar ston to// mar me'i sdong bu'i nang du bcug la ma phyung na rtag tu 'bar ro// 
322b8(rgyud): mgal me 'bar ba'i nang du bcug na 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'bum snyed du snang ngo // gtor ma'i rdza ma dang / bum pa'i nang du gtor na gtor ma'i rdza ma dang / bum pa thams cad 'bar bar
323a1(rgyud): snang ngo // lag cha dang / mtshon cha thams cad la thugs na cig tu 'bar bar 'gyuraro// bdag nyid kyi lus la thugs la ril bu ga tsang ma spyi bor bzhag na/ lus
323a2(rgyud): thams cad gcig tu 'bar bar snang ba nas lus ril bsregs pa ltar snang ngo // 'o ma dang yungs kar gyis gtor na lus slar snang bar 'gyuraro// lag pa dang rkang pa la bskus la ril
323a3(rgyud): bu gtsang ma 'bar ba lag pa g.yas pas bzung ba 'am/ rkang pa'i mthe bos bzung na lag pa dang / rkang pa gcig pu 'bar ba dang / 'brel par snang ngo // 'dus pa'i nang ngam/ skye bo
323a4(rgyud): 'dus pa mang po'am/ rgyal po'i 'khor ram/ sde can gyi danang ngam/ rig byed bzhi'i nang thams cad du yan la/ dag nyams par snang ngo // dri chab dang yungs kar gyis
323a5(rgyud): gtor na lus slar rdzogs par 'gyuraro// mtshan mo'i / bu bsregs pa lam gyi bzhi mdor bzhag nas yung / sa kar gyis phyogs bzhir gtor na mar me 'bum phrag
323a6(rgyud): bye ba snang ngo // kun nas phyogs bzhir chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog par bya ba yin no// tshal chen po'i mtha' dang / nang du gtor la shing gcig la ril bu gtsang ma bzhag na shing dang / 
323a7(rgyud): rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / mdab ma dang / lo ma thams cad gcig tu 'bar bar snang ngo // ri'i rtse mor mar me bus nas ri kun tu gtor na ri kun nas gcig tu 'bar zhing mched par snang
323a8(rgyud): la sems can thams cad kun nas ngo mtshar du 'dzin par 'gyuraro// rkun ma dang / g.yon can dang / gnod byed dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / sdang ba dang / phyir rgol ba dang / sa
323b1(rgyud): kyi dgra thams cad dang / sdang sems can nas ri dgas gtum po dang / bya la sogs pa'i bar ril gnas pa rnams de'i mtshan mo nying phyogs bcu kun tu bros shing ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin to// 
323b2(rgyud): spos chab kyis bzlog par 'gyuraro// gzugs bsnyen gyi steng du gtor la/ gtsang ma'i ril bu 'bar bar bzhag na gzugs brnyan thams cad gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur te/ spos
323b3(rgyud): chu dang / yungs kar gyis bzlog par 'gyuraro// mar ma'i ril bu grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgor spar ste gnas gtsang mar bzhag/ dkyil 'khor gcig byas nas gtor ma'i cho ga bum
323b4(rgyud): pa bkang ba bzhag/ grong khor kun tu yungs kar gyis gto/ ra zhing don yod pa'i rgyal po yang dran par byas na gro dang khyer kun nas mar me'i phreng ba 'bar ba gcig tu snang/ 
323b5(rgyud): grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga byas la shar phyogs kyi sgo nas zhugs na gang grong khyer na gnas pa skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo de dag
323b6(rgyud): thams cad dga' ba chen po rgya che bas tshim par 'gyur ro// grong khyer de na gang sdang ba'i sems can phyir rgol ba dang / phas kyi dgra dang / chom rkun dang / g.yon can dang / gnod byed dang / 
323b7(rgyud): glags tshol bar gyur pa/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / brjed byed dang / mi ma yin pa gang yang rung ba grong khyer de na gnas pa de dag la long du gyur cing
323b8(rgyud): gdugasal du zhing ha ha zhes sgra 'byin cing grong khyer gyi sgor byung nas phyogs bcur rab tu 'bros so// grong khyer de yang kun nas gnod pa med cing 'khrug pa med par 'gyur// 'jigs
324a1(rgyud): pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'gro ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ mtshan mo 'das nas spos chu dang / yungs kar
324a2(rgyud): gyis grong khyer gyis sgor gtor zhing dbang bskur na bzlog par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// / bam po bcu dgu pa/ 
324a3(rgyud): ldong ros dang / thing shun gyi phye ma dang / yungs kar dang / ma hA trai la dang / arga'i 'o ma dang / pha gu'i 'o ma dang / gcig tu sbyar ro// nya'i mig 'khris pa dang bcas pa dang / 
324a4(rgyud): na ga pus pa dang / pad+ma'i chu rnams kyang lhan cig tu phye dmas zhib mor bya'o// phye ma snga ma legs par sbya ra la chus ril bur byas pa dang / phye mas gzhan yang
324a5(rgyud): bcang ngo // phye mas 'di dang pad+ma chen po'i phye ma bcang ba lhan cig tu bsres pa'i phye mas lus bskus// la phyogs bzhir yungs kar gtor te/ ril bu khar
324a6(rgyud): bcug la hUM zhes bya ba bsdams te brjod na de'i lus las chu 'dzag cing / de kho na bzhin du rna ba gnyis kyang lha rdzas kyi chu 'byung bar snang / lus las spos kyi rigs yid du
324a7(rgyud): 'ong ba rab tu sim par byed pa 'byung ba ni nang thams cad grub par snang ste/ rgyal ba'i phyag bzhin no// yungs kar gyi phye ma blangs te na mkha' la gtor la ril bu lag pas
324a8(rgyud): bskor na char chen po 'bab par 'gyuraro// ril bu na mkha' la 'phangs na mi 'bab bo// g.yul chen po 'gyed pa'i nang du phye ma de yungs kar sres te na mkha' la gtor la
324b1(rgyud): ral phre yang khar bcug ste// steng du ltas la hUM zhes bya ba'i sgras bos la gnam lpags chen po bab ste yod mi 'chang ba dang sdug bsngal bskyed par 'gyuraro// chu'i nang du zhugs te/ 
324b2(rgyud): phye ma de gtor la yungs kar dang / ril bu chu'i nang dru ga dab par bya/ phyogs bzhir yungs kar gtor te ti la mar gyis lus la bskus na klu chen po'i gzugs su snang ngo // ral
324b3(rgyud): bu dang yungs kar mi'i mdog lta bu chu dang bsres pa'i yungs kar na mkha' la gtor na 'brug sgra chen po 'byung shing glog chen po gsal bsnang bar 'gyur// chu'i nang nas 'brung
324b4(rgyud): na mi snang bar 'gyuraro// khron pa'i nang du btab na chu lung denas phyogs kun tu 'bab par 'gyuraro// rdza ma 'am bum pa'am/ rje'u 'am/ rol ba byung gar 'am/ 
324b5(rgyud): ril ba la phye mas byugs te/ de'i steng du yungs kar rgyu/ sa gtor nas chus bkang ste khrus byas na de chu/ 'bab par snang zhing de'i snod ni mi snang bar 'gyuraro// 
324b6(rgyud): gzhan yang dgos pa mang po byed de mchog tu grub pa yin no// de nas ri chen po'i 'bru mar gyi rgyal po byas ni 'bru mar gzhan dang / de bzhin du til las byas 'bru mar gyi
324b7(rgyud): rgyal po de bzhin du sbyar ro// lag pa dang rkang pa bzhag la 'dir nyam drod kyang shes par bya'o// bzhag pa thams cad nyams drod shes par bya ba ni mar sar bzhin du 'jam
324b8(rgyud): par 'gyur zhing skad cig de nyid la mtho ba dang / dma' ba ji ltar yid la 'dod pa bzhin du r-i yang 'gyur ro// snying po thur ma 'dra ba dang / zlum po'am/ yang na lcug ma lta bur/ 
325a1(rgyud): byas pas ka ba yang 'dud pa dang / ri yang dma' ba'am/ yang na mthon por 'gyur bar byed do// yungs kar dang pad+ma chen po'i phye ma lhan cig bsgres pa
325a2(rgyud): 'bru mar gyi rgyal pos bsgos pa phyogs bzhir kun tu gtor na ri thams cad mi snang zhing 'brog dgon pa snang bar 'gyur// yang ri bor snang bar 'gyuraro// yang na mos bgro
325a3(rgyud): par mi nus pa'i ri'i rtse mo na seng ge dang / stag gis gang lcug ma dang tsher ma can gyi shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis gang ba'am rtsub pa'am/ dum bu 'am/ khong stong du snang
325a4(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// ci ste rig sngags 'chang 'phags pa/ naspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyi pho brang ri bo po ta/ da la'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'dod na/ de nas
325a5(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gis zhag bdun gyi bar du nas kyi'o thu ga gis zlos te gtsang ma shin tu khrus byas pa go sa gtsang ma bgos pas ri'i gseb du zhugs la/ 
325a6(rgyud): sa phyogs gtsang ma'i gnas der shing dri zhim po'i me spar ba la yungs kar phye ma dang bsres pa 'bru mar gyi rgyal po dang sbyar la 'bras so ba dang bsres pa stong rtsa brgyad zhag bdun
325a7(rgyud): du dus gsum du sbyin bsreg bya'o// lha bshos dang gtor ma dkar po 'bul lo// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis tshes brgyad la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba byas la shin tu khrus
325a8(rgyud): byas pa gtsang mas spos sna tshogs kyis lus bskus gos bzang po gtsang ma bgos te/ 'bru mar gyi rgyal pos rang gi lus la bskus phye mas byugs mig sman gyis mig
325b1(rgyud): bskus/ thig le byas la nor bus mgo bcing zhing mgul ba dang 9dpung pa dang / rked par yang bcings la yungs kar dang / mtshal bsres pas ri'i phyogs bzhir gtor bar
325b2(rgyud): bya/ pad+ma chen po'i phye ma de yang phyogs bzhir gtor rang gi lag pa g.yon pas zhags pa dang / pad+ma bzung zhing g.yas pas rnam par lta ba bsnang ba dang / don yod pa chen pos
325b3(rgyud): ma med pa'i bya rgya bzung ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mdo lan gcig bzlas brjod byas na ji ltar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mdo sde bshad pa las bstan pa de ltar ri bo po Ta la'i
325b4(rgyud): gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'a chang de yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyudag gi gzugs su snang bar 'gyur// ji ltar ri bo po Ta
325b5(rgyud): la'i gzhal med khang bzhin du ri de la yang gzhal med khang snang ba ste/ ri de la rin po che'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs snang ngo // me tog sna tshogs kyi gzhal med khang
325b6(rgyud): snango // sA la dang / tA la dang / tA ma la dang / tsa ma pa ka dang / a sho ka dang / a d+hi muk+ti ka dang / ba ri sha ka dang / ka dam pa dang nI la dang / pa Ta la dang / pa lA sha dang / u dum ba ra dang / 
325b7(rgyud): dong ka'i me tog sna tshogs dang / sna ma'i me tog dang / ta ra Na dang / na ba ma li ka dang / kub bya ka sna tshogs snang bar 'gyuraro// bya'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis legs par rgyan pa dang / 
325b8(rgyud): ri dgas kyis tshogs sna tshogs kyis gang ba snang bar 'gyuraro// gang gi tshe phyir bsdu ba byed par 'dod pa de'i tshe gnas gzhan du 'gro bar bya'o// gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs la rang
326a1(rgyud): gi blo gros la ji ltar snang ba bzhin bya'o// dgos pa thams cad la rab tu sbyar ba ni bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyuraro// don yod pa'i zhags pa/ 
326a2(rgyud): chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi rig sngags 'chang gi cho ga gsang ba'o// // don yod pa'i sgyu ma rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i cho ga ni/ de nas de'i 'og tu phyag rgya phra
326a3(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ rtags mtshon phyag rgya'i de nyid ni// pad+ma rgyas dang sna tshogs mtshon// pad+ma kha ni phyed bye ba// phyag dag na ni rab tu 'dzin// phyag gnyis phyung zhing / 
326a4(rgyud): brkyang nas kyang // bskum pa'am 'dzin stangs de nyid kyi/ das// kun nas phreng ba 'bar ba'i rtags// mtshon cha phyag rgya bsnams pa ni// 'di lta ste/ ral gri dang / 
326a5(rgyud): mdung thung dang / mda' bo che dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / rgyal mtshan dang / rdo rje dang / rdo rje phreng zlum dang / las kyi rdo rje dang / zur
326a6(rgyud): gsum ma zhes bya ba dang / 'khor lo dang / dung dang / tho ba dang / zhags pa dang / dgra sta dang / dbyug tho dang / me tog gi thum po dang / bum pa gang ba dang / rin po che'i snod dang / 
326a7(rgyud): pad+ma'i phreng ba dang / rdo rje'i phreng 'azum dang / ud pa la'i phreng ba dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / pad+ma dang / ud pa la dang / zla ba dang / ri rab dang / me long dang / klu dang / mchod phyir
326a8(rgyud): thogs dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dang / gdugs dang / be con dang / gshin rje'i be tsan dang / chu srin gyi kha dang / sngags de'i phreng ba dang / mdung rtsa gsum pa'i phreng
326b1(rgyud): zlum dang / bsdigs pa dang / skyes pa dang / dbugs 'byin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / mchog sbyin pa dang / thal mo sbyar ba dang / glegs bam bsnams pa dang / 'khar sil dang // 
326b2(rgyud): lhung bzed dang / gdugs dang / dbu rgyan dang / nor bu skyes pa dang / gser skud dang / mu tig gi phreng ba dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / rna cha dang / me'i thab khung ngo // kun nas
326b3(rgyud): 'bar phreng phyag rgya de/ sna tshogs rmad du byung bas smras// mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa yi// pad+ma 'dzin la rab tu gnas// ras la bris pa'am dkyil 'khor ram/ rtsig pa 'am/ 
326b4(rgyud): gang yang rung ba la/ tshen rtsi rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// ga dang du bris pa mthong ba de// ngan 'gro sems can dmya/ dal bar ni// phyir yang 'gro bar mi 'gyuraro// 'jig rten
326b5(rgyud): dbang gis rtag mchog sbyin// sdig pa thams cad rna ma par spangs// gang zhig nyes byas mi bzad pa/ mtshams med lnga po byed pa nyid// mnar med pa yi
326b6(rgyud): gnas dang ni// dmyal ba gzhan du gzhol ba gang // phyag rgya de dag mthong tsam gyis// 'gro ba thams cad zad par 'gyur// skye dang 'chi las rnam par grol// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho rgal
326b7(rgyud): bar 'gyur// de dag skye ba phyir mar ni// phyir yang mngal gyis mi gos te// yang dang yang du pad+ma las// brdzus te skye ba dag tu 'gyur// rtag tu bde ba can du 'gro/ gang na 'dren pa/ 
326b8(rgyud): tshe dpag med// bzhugs pa'i spyan sngar rtag tu der// skye 'gyur the tsom mi za zhing // don rnams bde bar 'grub 'gyur zhing // rig sngags sna tshogs bde bar 'grub// de bar dkyil
327a1(rgyud): 'khor 'grub 'gyur zhing // rtag tu mi ldogs nas 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di dag mthong tsam gyis// sangs rgyas byang chub dang mnyam 'gyur// dus gsum gshegs pa'i
327a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas la// bla med dge rtsa bskyed par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu// bsod nams phung po chen po 'thob// de nas dkyil 'khor rab bshad pa// de nyid 'grub pa'i phyag rgya rnam
327a3(rgyud): 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu// 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin// sdig pa thams cad mod la sel// gang zhig mtshams med byed pa dag/ mi bzang mnar med gnas pa yi// sdig pa thams
327a4(rgyud): cad 'jig par 'gyur// dmyal ba'i sgo rnams bcad nas da ni// mtho ris sgo phye the tshom med// sgo phye gyur pa rnam das la ni// sangs rgyas zhing rnams snang bar 'gyur// de
327a5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa// mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor mthu nga ba tsam gyis sems can phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// 
327a6(rgyud): phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di mthong na shi 'phos pa'i mod la bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa tsam gyis gang na thub pa 'dren pa 'od dpag med bzhugs
327a7(rgyud): pa'i pho brang du myur du 'jug par 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa la// kun nas cha ni mdzes par bya// gru bzhi go la'i tshad tsam la// sgo bzhi them skas bzhi yis rgyan// shin
327a8(rgyud): tu legs par bskus dang ldan// 'jam zhing mnyen la mnyam pa yi// sa yi cha dang ldan pa la// dkyil 'khor shes rab can gyis dbye// dkyil 'khor de nyid thig btab la// phyag rgya brib
327b1(rgyud): rnam par dbye// phyogs bzhi'i cha ni mnyam pa yi// dbus na dkyil 'khor snying po yin// gru bzhi pa la kun nas kha khyer gyi rnam pa dang / mdung rtse gsum pa'i phreng ba rnam par dbye'o// grub ni/ 
327b2(rgyud): pa'i dbus su phyag rgya don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba bla na med pa dang / phyag rgya rgyan gyis rgyan pa tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis bri'o// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi
327b3(rgyud): phyag rgya bri ba yang shin tu 'byin par bya'o// dkyil 'khor kun nas gos dang / ba dan dang / rgyal mtshan gyis rgyan la kun tu yungs kar dkar po gtor ro// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi
327b4(rgyud): phyi rol gyi gnas su phyogs bzhi kun tu bya ba ni ba lang gi dalci ba sa dang bsres pas shin tu legs par byugadas pa dang ldan pa la tshon rtsi'i phyi mas kha khyer gyi rnam pa
327b5(rgyud): dang / kun nas pad+ma'i phreng ba chen po dang / mtshon cha bris la 'di'i sgo bzhi yang rnam par 'byes par bri'o// ji ltar phyag rgya dang 'thun pa'i ro sna tshogs kyis gtor
327b6(rgyud): ma bzhag par bya ste/ phyag rgya re re la yang mchod yon phul la/ dbyib mo dang / phru ba dang / bum pa dang / kham phor dang / rje'u gtor mas bkang la bzhag go// kun tu bum gang
327b7(rgyud): pa dang / bdug spos kyi ni snod dag dang / me tog 'bras bu sna tshogs dang // gtor ma dkar po dag gis bkang // me tog rnam par bkram byas la// kun tu phreng bas bzhag par bya/ 
327b8(rgyud): phreng ba bzang po bzhag nas kyang // de bzhin kun tu bdug spos dbul// a ga ru dang / tsan dan dang / du ru ka dang / sa la ki dang / sprik+ka dang / gu gul dang / sra rtsi pog dang / sgon shin
328a1(rgyud): dang / gra rtsi dang / ga pur gyi bdug pa 'di dag gis bdugs la/ gtor ma dang / me tog dang / lha ba shos dbul lo// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pas ngon
328a2(rgyud): yod pa'i rgyal po dran par byas te bskor ba phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor la phyag bya zhing phyag rgya thams cad la me tog bkram zhing me tog gtor ro// gang phyag rgya'i de kho na nyid gsang ba
328a3(rgyud): 'di dang / phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di sgrub pa gang dgos pa la sngar dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang bcas pa la mchog tu mdzes par byas la/ phyi las thams cad bya'o// rig sdug
328a4(rgyud): 'ching ba ga nang ma yis// gtsang ma yini gos bgo/ desal// ji ltar dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin// dal 'khor du ni gzhug par bya// ji ltar dkyil 'khor
328a5(rgyud): bgos pa// de bzhin du ni las bya'o// phyag rgya'i nga 'khor bu med pa// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni zhugs tsam gyis// thub pa snang mdzad kyis gsungs pa'i smra
328a6(rgyud): rigs ni thams cad du// phyag rgya dkrigs dang btam rnams kyis// dam tshig kun tu shes par 'gyur// spyi rigs kun gyi cho ga yis// dam tshig rjes zhugs de bzhin no// 
328a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor kun tu zhugs pa dang // rgyal bas lung ni bstan par 'gyur// kun gzigs de bzhin gshegs pa yis// phyag ni spyi bor 'jog par mdzad// chos kyi ro ni bdud
328a8(rgyud): rtsi yi/ gzi brjod ming la 'jug par 'gyur// rnam snang mdzad gsung dkyil 'khor du// don yod dngos grub stsol ba mdzad// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gang bzhugs pa/ 
328b1(rgyud): kun tu spyi yi rigs rnams kyi// don yod dngos grub mchog myur thob// sangs rgyas bye ba gang ga'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du
328b2(rgyud): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyuraro// bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ yon tan gyi phan yon 'di dag ni tshe 'di yin par khong du chud par bya'o// bde ba can gyi
328b3(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams su pad+ma las brdzus te skyes par 'gyuraro// tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran zhing 'od zer bye ba 'bar ba'i lus dang ldan zhing // tshe bskal pa brgya stong dpag tu med par
328b4(rgyud): 'gyuraro// yon tan thams cad dri ma med par snang ba don mi dad pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob ste/ gang ting nge 'dzin thob pas
328b5(rgyud): sgyu ma chen po lta bu'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyirma/ 'phrul ston par byed do// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi lha'i spyi'i rigs de bzhin gshegs pa'i
328b6(rgyud): rigs kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / 
328b7(rgyud): mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad dbang du gyur nas rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dkyil 'khor rnams
328b8(rgyud): 'byor pa gzigs nas srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba mdzad par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad phyi bzhin 'brang zhing mchod pa chen po byed par 'gyur ro// rgyal
329a1(rgyud): po btsun mo dang / 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis mchod pa'i 'os chen por 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad gcig tu bla mar byed par 'gyu ro// nad thams cad med
329a2(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyuraro// mtshan ma bri ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// de nas sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ 
329a3(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang ba rnam dag gi de nyid sgrub pa'i phyir/ spyi yi rigs rnams thams cad kyi/ cho ga zhib mo bla med yin// gang gis sbyin sreg byas tsam gyis// phyogs kun rnam
329a4(rgyud): par gzigs pa yin// de bzhin gshegs nas byon 'gyur zhing // byang chub sems dpa' dgongs par 'gyur// rigs rnams dngos grub rjes stsol cing // 
329a5(rgyud): rtag tu srung ba mdzad par 'gyur// mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs// the tsom med par myur du byon// mgon po 'khor bcas gnas nyid na// rang gi gzug
329a6(rgyud): su mthong bar 'gyur// 'dod pa thams cad rtag tu stsol// rtag tu mchog ni stsol ba nyid// nyin dang mtshan tu rtag par ni// rnam par gzigs 'gyur the tsom med// dkyil
329a7(rgyud): 'khor bshad par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi shin tu mdzes par bya ba ni rgya chen po ko la'i tshad tsam la/ legs par byugs pa shin tu 'jam pa/ shin tu gsal ba gru bzhi
329a8(rgyud): sgo bzhi dang / themaskas bzhi dang ldan pa/ rnam par 'byes pa mchog tu mdzes pa dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por yang bya'o// me'i gnas kyi dkyil 'khor ni// gru bzhi
329b1(rgyud): nyid kyi rnam pa la// kun nas them skas bzhi dag dang // steng du gru ni bzhi pa bya// rtag tu pad+ma'i snying po dang // snying po rgyas pa'i steng du yang // kun nas mdab ma mdzes par bya// gru
329b2(rgyud): bzhir pad+ma'i phreng ba bya// de bzhin du grwa gnyis kar rdo rje pad+ma dang bcas pa'o// gsum par mdung rtse gsum pad+ma dang bcas pa'o// bzhi par 'khor lo pad+ma dang bcas pa'o// lnga par bum
329b3(rgyud): pab gang pa bzhag go/ sna tshogs mtshon gyis rnam mdzes pa'i// kun nas mdab ma'i myu gu bya// rin chen snod ni bkang ba dang // me tog phreng dang ngang pa dang // phye mas pad+mar bcas pa
329b4(rgyud): dang // de bzhin me tog rigs dag nyid// de bzhin sna tsho/ dgas rgyan pa'o// nub kyi gnas dang grung dag tu// pad+ma'i mdab ma ut+pal bcas// bum pa dur bas bkang ba bri// 
329b5(rgyud): rtsa ba'i bum pa dbu ma la// 'dir ni kha khyer thig kyang ga/ dab// de nas dkyil 'khor mdzes bya ba// thig gi/ sa kun nas cha mnyam zhing // sgo bzhi mdzes par bya ba ni// / 
329b6(rgyud): tshon sna lnga yi skud pas gdab// me 'bar mdog can bri ba ni// kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng ba can// grwa dang grwa ni me lha bri// lus ni me mdog 'bar ba dang // lag na me 'bar 'dzin pa dang / 
329b7(rgyud): mtshan ma sna tshogs gzhan dag kyang // cho ga bzhin du bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor gyi ni cho ga gzhan// ba dan mda' dang sna lnga yi// skud pas bum pa gang dkris dang // de bzhin bdug
329b8(rgyud): spos snod dag gis// kun nas dkyil 'khor brgyan par bya// sna tshogs gzugs can rgya che yi// sna tshogs ro yi gtor ma bzhag/ rdze'u dang kham por rnam gsum gyi// dkar pos
330a1(rgyud): bkang ba bzhag par bya// rje'u dang dbyingab mo bum pa ni// gtor mas bkang ba kun tu bzhag/ 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs bzhag/ kun nas me tog dgram bya zhing // bre
330a2(rgyud): ba sna tshogs bzhag par bya// 'bras yos yungs kar gtor nas ni// kun tu mar me 'bar ba dang // sna tshogs dri dang de bzhin du// dri yi phye ma lha ba shos dang // dkyil 'khor kun la
330a3(rgyud): bzhag par bya// dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad la// blugs gzang du rabartag tu bzhag/ shing ni arga shi mi dang // yungs kar 'bras ni so ba dang // zhun mar dang ni mar dkar dang / 
330a4(rgyud): kun du ru ka tsan dan dkar sbyin sreg cho ga gar 'dir bzhag/ da ste// dus gsum rtag tu rigs 'dzin gyis// skyon sreg brgya rtsa brgyad du bya// rig pa 'dzin pa gtsang ma
330a5(rgyud): yi/ gtsang ma yi ni gos bgos la// dkar gsum byin zas bza' zhing // gzhan ni bza' dang spyad mi bya// kyil 'khor gyi ni nub sgo nas// dkyil 'khor shes pa
330a6(rgyud): 'jug bya zhing // d+ha ra b+ha'i stan la skyil krung ngu// shar phyogs kha bltas 'dug par bya// byams pa'i sems la mnyam gzhag ste/ don yod rgyal po dran bya bzhin/ snga dro'i dus su
330a7(rgyud): sbyin bsreg bya// gung la slob ma gzhug bya zhing // spyi yi rigs kyi sreg blugs ni// phye ma bred dus su bya'o// gang zhig dkyil 'khor du zhugs la// sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor de nyid dang // 
330a8(rgyud): grub pa kun tu cho ga yi// bdag nyid dbang bskur mo kun gyi// sbyin sreg byed pa'i mchog tu gsungs// kun tu gnas ni thams cad na// rgyas pa gnas mchog rwa gcig dang // gar ge/ 
330b1(rgyud): de bzhin phur bu dang // mdun na 'don pa me lha ni// sbyin sreg byed pa 'jig rten pa// mtshungs shes ston pas lung bstan to// 'jig rten 'das pa'i las sgrub pa// rig 'dzin dbang po chen po dang
330b2(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje tshangs pa dang // khyab 'jug dbang phyug chen po dang // mnyam pa pas kyang lhag pa nyid// de yi sbyin sreg byed pa la// de bzhin gshegs kun byin gyis rlob// gal te zhag
330b3(rgyud): bdun dus gsum du// de la sogs pa'i las rnams ni// me la sbyin sreg byed pa la// modo la mngon shes lnga thob ces// de skad 'jig rte dren pa gsum// las ni byas nas de nas ni// sbyin
330b4(rgyud): sreg las ni brtsam par bya// sreg blugs sbyin sreg byas/ tsam gyis// las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyuradar// lha rnams rtag tu 'ong 'gyur zhing // de bzhin gshegs
330b5(rgyud): kun dgyed par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' byon nas ni// mod la mthong ba'i sbyin par mdzod// sdig pa thams cad sreg par 'gyur// shin tu mi bzang sngon gyis las/ 
330b6(rgyud): blugs tsam gyis mod la sreg/ 'bar ba'i me yis phye leb bzhin// de la sogs pa'i sdig pa ni// sreg 'gyur 'dir ni the tsom med// sdang ba'i phyir ni rgol nyid dang // mi bzad phas kyi
330b7(rgyud): dgra rnams dang // pha rol dpung gis 'jigs pa nyid// de bzhin du yang rgyal po'i dpung // de kun sbyin sregs byas tsam gyi// mi gnang bar 'gyur the tsom med// de bzhin mi ngas
330b8(rgyud): gcong kun dang // nang kun rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// mu ga'i dgon pa'i 'jigs nyid kyang // sbyin sreg byas pa tsam gyis 'jig/ gnod sbyin srin po 'byung po dang // de bzhin gshegs
331a1(rgyud): dang log 'dren dang // sha za brjed byed yi dgas dang // de bzhin rnam pa sna tshogs gdon// 'di kun sbyin sreg byas tsam gyi// 'jig par 'gyur bar the tsom med/ 
331a2(rgyud): rtag tu 'jigs med lo legs shing // gling dang bde bar 'gyur ba yin// rtag tu sems can thams cad ni// kun tu rgyal bar 'gyur ba yin// rgyal po dpung dang bcas pa nyid// 
331a3(rgyud): btsun mor bcas pa nyid kyang ni// rtag par kun tu gsal bar ni// mi 'dzegs sbyin par the tsom med// rtag tu nad med 'gyur ba dang // dga' zhing yid ni bde ba dang // lus can
331a4(rgyud): dag ni thams cad la// rtag tu dga' bar byed cing gan sa// rtag tu me yi lha nyid ni// rgyun tu mthong bar 'di dad pa yis// me la sbyin sreg byas tsam gyis// me lha nyid
331a5(rgyud): ni bzhugs gyur te// rtag tu las ni thams cad mdzad// / rgyun tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur// lha ni rtag tu/ 'ong 'gyur zhing // thams cad du ni mthong ba ster// rgyud
331a6(rgyud): skar zla ba nyi ma dang // gshin rje dang mi chu lha dang // rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag/ dpung bcas bzhon par bcas pa yang // nyin dang mtshan du rtag par ni// rjes 'brang srung 'gyur
331a7(rgyud): tsam med// ci ste rig sngags 'chang don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po sgrub par 'dod na rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma des shin tu khrus byas la gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya/ nyin zhag gcig/ 
331a8(rgyud): srung ba bya zhing / shing arga'i yam shing sreg gi mi sbar la pad+ma dang / zhun mar dang / 'bras so ba'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya byas nas sreg thugs lan gcig byas pas/ mtshams
331b1(rgyud): med pa lnga byed pas yang 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tsom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi'i rigs kyi dngos grub 'don rig sngags 'chang de
331b2(rgyud): byang chub kyi shing gi me sbar la rigs spyir pad+ma dang / ut+pal sngon po dang / yungs kar dkar po dang / zhun mar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya byas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams
331b3(rgyud): cad kyi spyi'i rigs kyi dngos grub 'thob ste thams cad cho ga chen po zhib mo dang / sbyin sreg chen po'i cho gar 'gyuraro// de nas pha rol gyi dmag tshogs gzhom par 'dod na rig sngags
331b4(rgyud): 'chang gtsang ma des shin tu khrus byas la gos gtsang / ma bgos seng ldeng gi me sbyar la/ zho dang / zhun ma dar dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul gyi sreg blugs kyis
331b5(rgyud): sbyin sreg brgyad stong byas na dpag tshad stong tshun chad kyi pha rol gyi dmag tshogs bcing ba byas par 'gyuraro// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dgra gzhom par 'dod pa
331b6(rgyud): dang / dpung gzhigs par 'dod na de nas rig sngags 'chang gis shing kar pa ka'i me sbar la/ sbrul gyi lpags pa rjes pa dang / ke tse'i sa bon dang / lan tshwa 'bras sa lu dang / sres
331b7(rgyud): pa yungs kar mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg byas na dpag tshad stong tshun chad kyi pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dgra la gnam lcags chen po dang / rlung grang mo 'bab pas phongs pa dang / yid/ 
331b8(rgyud): mi bde ba skyes par 'gyur/ dgra thams cad rnam par 'jog par 'gyur ro// klus char 'bebs par 'dod na rig sngags 'chang des nyin zhag gcig bsrung ba byas la// shin tu khrus
332a1(rgyud): byas pa gtsang mas dri sna tshogs dang / me tog phreng ba dang / yungs kar dang / sha ta pus pa zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg mtshan gcig la dus gsum du byas na klu'i
332a2(rgyud): rgyal pos char gyis rgyun chen po 'bebs te/ 'dzam bu'i gling mtha' dag tu zhag bdun gyi bar du char 'bab par 'gyur ro// char de nyid ha cang ches na thal ba na mkha' la gter na ha cang
332a3(rgyud): ches pa 'chad par 'gyuraro// yang na me lha 'ong bar 'dod cing rang gi gzugs su mthong bar 'dod na rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma nges gos gtsang ma bgos la nyin zhag gcig gnas
332a4(rgyud): bar gyur pas shing sna ma'i me spar la 'bras so ba dang / zhu dan mar dang / bu ram sha kha ra dang bcas pa dang / tsha ba gsum dang / sna ma'i me tog sreg pa brgyad stong sbyin
332a5(rgyud): bsreg bya'o// brgyad stong tshad med pa dang / me lha me'i nang nas lus phyed phyung ste 'dug nas rig sngags 'chang la ci bgyi bka' stsol cig ces zer zhing ji ltar rig
332a6(rgyud): sngags 'chang gi cho ga'i don du 'gyur ba de bzhin du smra'o// thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba mchog thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba bdud rtsi 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i me'i kha/ kha'i
332a7(rgyud): mchog sbyin par byed do// gang bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i me'i kha thob pas gang du dbugs phyung ba dang / rngubs pa der me 'bar ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gang du phu zhes bya ba der me
332a8(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyuraro// mun gnag du dbugs phyung na me 'bar ba snang bar 'gyur ro// can dan dkar po'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
332b1(rgyud): nyid kyi gzugs ston par mdzad do// sa bon bdun gyi sbyin sreg gis nang thams cad zhi bar byed do// 'bras so ba'i sbyin sreg gis ni rgyal po dbang du byed do// phub ma dang lan tshwa
332b2(rgyud): sbyin sreg gis ni zhe 'gras par byed do// 'bras yos dang yungs kar gyis sbyin sreg gis ni sems can thams cad dbang du byed do// yungs kar dang / gu gul dang / zhun mar gyi sbyin
332b3(rgyud): srog gis ni gnod sbyin 'gugaso// ka ra bi ra'i me tog dang / gu gul zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg gis ni srin mo 'gugs so// de bzhin du 'dir las thams cad byed do// sbyin
332b4(rgyud): sreg gi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// ri mo'i dkyil 'khor dgyi sgrub pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/ kun tu thun mo dang sgrub pa'i mchog/ dge ba'i las kun byed pa ste/ 
332b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad mthong 'gyur zhing // bla med bsod nams chen po sogs// don yod rgyal po de nyid ni// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dag du// 'jig rten
332b6(rgyud): 'dren pa snang bar bya// mthu dang dngos grub sna tshogs pa'i// 'jig rten pa'i gzugs bya ba// grub pa sna tshogs byed pa'i gnas// so so'i gzugs su bya ba ni// ras sam yang na dar
332b7(rgyud): dag la// 'jigs pa med pas gzugs bya'o// don yod pa yi rgyal po ni// khru gang tsam gyi tshad dam yang na tshad shin tu rnam par 'byed pad+ma'i mdog lta bu phyag brgyad pa// dbu
332b8(rgyud): gsum pa/ de bzhin du/ spyan gsum pa/ zhi ba'i zhal du bri bar bya ste/ de bzhin du zhags pa 'dzin pa dang / pad+ma 'dzin pa dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / ril ba spyi blugs 'dzi
333a1(rgyud): pa dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / be con dang dbugs 'byin pa dang / bgrang phreng dang / me tog thum po 'dzin par bya'o// g.yon du ni dkar mo'o// g.yas su
333a2(rgyud): 'phags ma sgrol ma thal mo sbyar la dbu yid tsam 'dud pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ni ral pa'i ther tshugs can// dbu rgyan 'od
333a3(rgyud): dpag med kyis brgyan pa/ g.yas phyogs kyi dbu zla ba tshes pas rgyan pa/ ri dgas kyi lpags pa bsnams pa/ mchod phyir thogs pa/ brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 'od 'dom
333a4(rgyud): gang dang ldan pa'o// nang mir du pad+ma'i phreng ba'o// rim dpa gnyis par rdo rje phreng ba lcags kyu dang bcas par bya'o// rim pa gsum par nor bu rin po che'i phreng
333a5(rgyud): ba dang / rin po che sna tshogs mdzes pa'o// rim pa bzhi par mdung rtse gsum pa'i phreng ba'o// rim pa lnga par kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng ba'o// steng dang g.yas phyog
333a6(rgyud): kyi gnas su dbang po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po me tog sna tshogs thogs par bya'o// g.yon du gzhon nu dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan
333a7(rgyud): dang / dbang phyug dang / lha'i bu rnams bya ba ni me tog sna tshogs thogs par bya'o// lha mo sgrol ma'i rgyab du khro bo'i rgyal po don yod pa'i zhags pa bya ba ni khros pa/ gtum pa'i
333a8(rgyud): gzugs 'chang ba/ phyag bzhi pa/ 'bar ba'i nang du bzhugs pa/ sku rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ ral pa 'chang ba 'od dpag med kyi dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum pa/ g.yas pa
333b1(rgyud): zla bas brgyan cing ral gri 'dzin pa dang / zhags pa 'dzin pa dang / mdung rtse gsum pa 'dzin pa dang dgra sta 'dzin par bya'o// dkar mo'i rgyab tu rig sngags kyi rgyal po dbu gsum pa bya ba
333b2(rgyud): ni zhi ba'i zhal ras can rgyan thams cad kyis rgyan pa/ dbu rgyan rgyal ba 'od dpag med can thogs pa/ pad+ma 'dzin pa/ nor bu rin po che 'dzin par bya'o// 'og tu phonya mo dang / dbyangs
333b3(rgyud): can dang / dung can ma dang / dpal mo dang / gnas ma dang / dpe med ma dang / ral pa gcig ma dang / pho nya mo zhi ba dang / lo tog gi lha dang / sa'i lha dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi bya'o// 
333b4(rgyud): steng dang g.yas g.yon du sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs skyil mo krung bcas pa sor bzhi pa'i tshad tsam bya'o// nyi ma dang zla ba'i lha rgyu skar dang bcas pa bya'o// ri mo'i gzugs/ 
333b5(rgyud): kyi phyi rol gyi rim pa kun tu phyag rgya dang / phyag mtshan sna tsho gas rdzogs par 'bri'o// klu brgyad bya zhing kun nas 'bar ba dang bcas par bya'o// rig sngags dngos grub
333b6(rgyud): bla med pa'i// ri mo'i cho ga'i gnas 'di ni// sdig pa thams cad mod la sel// mtshams med lnga po sbyong bar byed// phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i ri mo'i gzugs
333b7(rgyud): grub pa grub pa 'di ni spyi'i rigs thams cad du 'jug pa ston pa yin no// phyi'i rigs thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi ri mo'i dkyil 'khor 'di ni dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas
333b8(rgyud): dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas kyang byin gyis brlabs pa'o// don yod pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi ri mo 'di ni thub pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlab pa ste/ don yod
334a1(rgyud): pa'i zhags pa'i de kho na nyid snying por gyur pa de kho na nyid gsang ba 'di mthong ba tsam gyis rnam par thar pa 'thob cing lung bstan par 'gyuraro// mthong ba tsam gyis cho ga zhib mo bla
334a2(rgyud): na med pa thams cad 'grub po// rnam par snang mdzad 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang ldan par snang ba byed pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu mngon sum du mthong
334a3(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// dkyil 'khor chen po 'khor bcas kyi rig sngags cho ga bla med pa// spyi rigs yang dag 'byung ba ni// thub pa rnam snang mdzad kyis bstan// de bzhin gshegs rigs
334a4(rgyud): grub pa dang // gang yang pad+ma'i rigs de bzhin// nor gyi/ gas de nyid 'byung ba dang // rdo rje'i rigs gang bla med/ dab// spyi rigs 'di nyid mthong ba ni// ri mo mthong ba'i khyad
334a5(rgyud): par yin// phyir yang ngan 'gror mi 'gro zhing // dmyal bang na 'gro'i sgo bcad de// mtho rigs kyi ni sgo yang phye// bla na med pa ston pa yi// phyag rgya'i ri mo'i dkyil 'khor 'di
334a6(rgyud): bsod nams bla na med pa yin// ci ste don yod pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs mthong bar 'dod na rig sngags 'chang des tsan dan dkar po las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
334a7(rgyud): dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa sor brgyad kyi tshad tsam la// gnad kyis gnas kyi cha'i so tshad shin tu rnam par mdzes pa/ dbu dang / mgur dang / rked pa dang / pus mo dang / yan
334a8(rgyud): lag dang / zhabs kyi tshigs dang / phyag sor dang / phyag sor gyi tshigs dang / sen mo thams cad kyi cha'i mnyam zhing mdzes pa dang / ral pa dang / sen mo tshad shin tu mdzes shing
334b1(rgyud): cod pan gyi rgyal ba'i g.yas phyogs na bla ga ma zhi ba'i gzugs can spyan gsum pa/ phyag bzhi shin tu mdzes pa dang / dbu skra shin tu mdzes pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i
334b2(rgyud): gzugs dang ldan pa/ zhags pa 'dzin pa g.yon pa 'od dpag can phyag na badz+ra bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pa mdung rtse gsum pa dang / dbugs 'byin tsang rtag tu mchog sbyin par
334b3(rgyud): mdzad pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs par bya'o// sgrol ma dang / dkar mo yang 'od 'dom gang dang bcas par dgod ngo // mgon po shin tu mdzes pa/ nor bu dang / mu tog gi
334b4(rgyud): rgyan gyis 'tshams su gser gyi rgyan gyis g.yogs pa/ 'i cod pan nam/ yang na spyi gtsug tu ring bsrel ba zhag par byas la/ tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor
334b5(rgyud): bya zhing gur gum dang / grats+tsha dang / ga pur gyis mchod la dkyil 'khor gyi snying po 'di'i dbus su pad+ma'o// sar dang / bcas pa'i mdab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa
334b6(rgyud): bris pu la de'i dbus su 'jigs pa med pas 'jig rten dbang phyug dar gyi cod pan gyis bcings pa bzhag la/ a ga ru dang / tsan dan gyi 'dug pa dbul nang me tog dgram pa
334b7(rgyud): byad me tog gi phreng bas mchod par bya'o// rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pa shin tu khrus byas pa gos gtsang ma bgos pas bsrung ba byas la mgon po 'jig rten
334b8(rgyud): dbang phrug mngon du phyogs par rgyal mokrung bcas te 'dug la mchod yon dang / lhab shes yul la byas pa'i sems la mnyam par gzhog ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su
335a1(rgyud): dran pa sgom mo// sems can thams cad la brtse bar gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin yang sgom zhing / gtam gzhan mi smra bar shin tu yongasu sbyar ba legs par spyod
335a2(rgyud): cing / gzhan 'jigs pa med pas bdag srung ba dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba bsrung ba dang bcas pa yang byas la bzlas brjod de nyid stong rtsa brgyad
335a3(rgyud): dang / phyag rgya yang stong rtsa brgyad brtsams na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'bar zhing g.yo ba dang / bdag kyang 'bar ba dang snying dga' bar 'gyuraro// 'phags pa
335a4(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mchog sbyin par mdzad dpa'i phyag brkyang la phyag spyi bor bzhag ste legaso// legaso// rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis mchod pa dam
335a5(rgyud): pa dang / gsang sngags kyi cho ga chen po byas so// sgrub pa dam pa byas so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi ri gas 'di dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams
335a6(rgyud): cad kyi cho ga zhib mo gsang ba dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dang / thams cad du spyi'i dngos grub rig sngags 'chang khyod la 'grub kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i
335a7(rgyud): snying po rje su zung shig dang / rig sngags 'chang ji ltar yid la byed pa da ltar 'dod pa dang / mchog thams cad ji ltar yid la bsam pa de thams cad rje su sbyin no// 'di ni
335a8(rgyud): khyod kyi skye ba'i 'khor ba tha ma yin te skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mngal du gnas pa las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang khyod shi 'phos nas bde ba
335b1(rgyud): can gyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu pad+ma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur// mngon sum du chos nyan par 'gyuraro// byang
335b2(rgyud): chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar tshe'i tshad bskal pa brgya stong dpag tu med grangs med bgrang du med par 'gyur ro// zhes tshig tu gsung ngo // de nas rig sngags 'chang gis khro
335b3(rgyud): bo'i rgyal po gang la khro bo'i rgyal po me tog gam/ cod pan la mngon par gtor na/ des na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi skur bzhugs te/ rig sngags
335b4(rgyud): 'chang na mkha' la 'gro zhing don yod pa'i ye shes bko/ dad pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo// / yangs pa chen pos rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor
335b5(rgyud): don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyuraro// sku gzugs sgrub pa de kho na nyid ces pa 'di ga la te rig sngags 'chang skal pa chung ba mnar med pa
335b6(rgyud): gzhol ba mtshams med pa lnga byed pa de lan cig nges par sgrub pa tsam gyis mdun du rang gi gzugs kyis nges par mchis par bgyi'o// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa
335b7(rgyud): thams cad dang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas la sdang bas khrag dbyung bar sems bskyed pa des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dus gsum du gshegs
335b8(rgyud): pa sangs rgyas kyis dgongs pa'i dam tshig chen po'i byin gyis brlabs de rig sngags 'chang sgrub na rmi lam du bdag gis gzugs mthong bstsal bar bgyi zhing yid la bsam pa
336a1(rgyud): thams cad/ yongasu rdzogs par bgyi'o// mchog thams cad rje su stsal bar bgyi zhing / sdig pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par bgyi'o// dri ma
336a2(rgyud): med par rnam par thar pa'i 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo// sad nas 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i 'os chen po gcig
336a3(rgyud): pur 'gyuraro// skye bo thams cad kyis mchod par bya ba chen por 'gyur ro// sgrib pa dang bral zhing rnam par dag pa/ sgo kun tu dri ma med par snang ba zhes bya ba'i lus yongasu dag pa 'thob
336a4(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// sems can gang gis de mthong bar gyur da pa de dag thams cad sgrib pa dang bral bar 'gyuraro// / nad thams cad dang bral zhing nyon mongs pa dang bral bar
336a5(rgyud): 'gyuraro// gdol pas kyang dad pa dang / gus pas sgrub pa rnam pa gsum dang / cho ga gzhan gyis kyang nga nges par yid la bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs
336a6(rgyud): par bgyi// rang gi gzugs kyis mthong ba stsal bar bgyi na/ mir gyur pa dad pa'i rje su 'brang ba sdom brtson can gyis lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ dran pa tsam gyis bdag rang gi
336a7(rgyud): gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par bgyi zhing yid la bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bgyi ste/ 'di la the tsom dang yid gnyis skyed par mi bya'o// de lta mod kyi bcom
336a8(rgyud): ldan 'das sems can tshe gcig pu pa de la rig sngags sgrub pa'i dngos grub rje su stsal bar bdag gis rngo mi thogs lag so// gang yang phyi mi'i dus na dge slong dag dang / rig sngags
336b1(rgyud): 'chang ba'i sems can ser sna can/ sems gya grub/ yid gnyisu mi byed pa/ ngo gnyis can/ ser sna can/ byas pa mi gzob/ pha rol gyi rdzas la rkam chags can/ gsang sngags rku ba
336b2(rgyud): yi ge rku ba/ gdug pa/ phrag dog che ba/ khengs pa/ gzhan gyi rdzas 'phrog pa/ mkhan po dang slob dpon phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor ston pa'i bla ma la mgus pa/ rig sngags kyi cho ga zhing
336b3(rgyud): mo 'di ston pa la ma gus pa nyid rkam chags can/ byas pa mi gzo ba nyid dag 'byung ste/ sems can de dag la brkyang bar bstan pa'am/ dngos grub bstan par rngo mi thog so// bdag
336b4(rgyud): la yang brnyas par bgyid pa'i sems can de lta bu mang ra du 'byung ba ste/ bdag la yang sun par bgyid pa/ bad ngag la yang ma gus par bgyid pa/ kun nas mnar sems
336b5(rgyud): dang sdang bas khrag 'byin par bgyid pa dag 'byung bar 'gyuraro// bdag la yang 'khu bar bgyid pa/ de bzhi na gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor
336b6(rgyud): dang / spyi'i rigs kyi dam tshig sun par bgyid pa'i sems can de ni smad par 'os pa zhes brjod par bgyi'o// rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo dang / dam tshig kun nas 'joms par
336b7(rgyud): bgyid pa'i gdol ba zhes rig par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba kun nas 'joms pa zhes rig par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po
336b8(rgyud): dang / gsang ba dang dkyil 'khor kun nas 'joms pa zhes rig par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dam tshig dang / gsang ba dang / rig sngags 'chang gi dkyil
337a1(rgyud): 'khor dang / phyag rgya kun nas 'joms pa zhes rig par bgyi'o// de dag gis bdag la smad pas sems can de dag sdig pas gdol pa zhes bgyi ste/ dge slong dag dang
337a2(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang de dag ni smad par 'os par rig par bgyi'o// tshig pa ka ba tshig pa lta bu/ rig sngags nyams pa/ log 'dren gyis zin pa dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyis smad pa
337a3(rgyud): zhes bgyi'o// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das chud gzan pa/ rig sngags nyams pa/ dmyal bar gzhol ba de dag ni bdag gis ma nongs te/ bdag gis yongasu spangs
337a4(rgyud): pa ma lagaso// de lta mod kyi dus gsum du gshegs pa da'i de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu spangs pa/ dus ga sum du gshegs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yongasu spang/ 
337a5(rgyud): pa rdo rje dam tshig dang dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya tham sa cad spangs pa/ thub pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang / dam tshig yongasu
337a6(rgyud): spangs pas bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang / sdang ba thams cad kyis zin cing nad kyis yongasu zin par 'gyur ba de dag ni bdag gis yongs su ma spangs so// de lta mod kyis
337a7(rgyud): rig sngags bsregs pa/ dkyil 'khor dang dam tshig bsregs pa/ phyag rgya byed pa dang bcas par bsregs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig dang rigs sun par byed pa/ sdig
337a8(rgyud): pa'i dge slong mang po de dag ni des na bskal pa mang po rdul phra mo bsags pa'i bskal par sdug bsngal nyam su myong ste/ 'jig rten 'di dang 'jig rten pha rol gyi bde ba can med do// 
337b1(rgyud): de lta bas na sems can rig sngags kyi ched du rig sngags rje su sems dpas byams pa'i sems su bya'o// gang gis drung du phyag rgya dang gsang sngags rim pa phye ba dang / rig sngags
337b2(rgyud): gsang ba snyed par 'gyur ba de la gus pa chen po dang / bla mar bgyi ba chen po bskyed par bgyi/ pa dang ma dang 'dra ba'i sems skyed par bgyi/ pha dang ma'i gus pa bgyi/ ston pa'i gus
337b3(rgyud): pa bgyi/ rang gi sha dang / khrag dang / rkang yang btang bar bgyi/ gos dang / rgyan dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / stan dang / bgo bas rim gro dang / mchod pa bgyi ste/ de la ni bdag gri
337b4(rgyud): mchod par bgyi/ rje dpon dang bla mar bgyi'o// rtag tu 'brang bar bgyi/ dran pa tsam gyis kyang bdag gi ga dgas mthong ba rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ rgyun tu rje su 'brang
337b5(rgyud): bar bgyi/ bdag rgyun tu rje su 'brang ba ni ji ltar chab kyi na ngadu til mar gyi thigs pa stsal ba ltar dngos grub kun tu mchi bar bgyi/ rgya mtsho'i dus rlabs bzhin du thams
337b6(rgyud): cad du mchi bar bgyi'o// bdag gis zhags pa dang / lcags kyus dmyal ba thams cad drang bar bgyi/ bde bar gshegs pa'i lam la so sor gzhag par bgyi/ stobs dang brtson
337b7(rgyud): 'grus dang / gzi brjid chen po 'jug par bgyi/ thams cad du sgrub pa dang dngos grub dang / mchog stsal bar bgyi'o// de nas tsan dan gyi gzugs 'di mthong bas 'phags pa spyan
337b8(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid kyi gzugs mthong ste/ de mtshungs par 'tshal bar bgyi ste/ bdag rang gi gzugs kyis rgyun kho nar gnas par bgyi'o// gang na cho ga 'di gnas pa de
338a1(rgyud): mchod rten dang bcas par mtshungs par rig par bgyi'o// sa phyogs de ni ston pa bla ma bzhugs pa'i gan su rig par bgyi'o// gang na dus gsum du gshegs pa'i
338a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi'i dam tshig gnas pa 'di sangs rgyas gnas so zhes rig par bgyi'o// de gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rmad du byung ba zhes rig par bgyi'o// lha thams cad kyi
338a3(rgyud): gnas dang dam tshig go zhes rig par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi gnas byang chub kyi snying po dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / 
338a4(rgyud): yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yang dag par ston pa de'i gan so zhes rig par bgyi'o// sa phyogs 'dir ri nu po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang gi gnas bkod
338a5(rgyud): pas rgyan par rig par bgyi ste/ de la the tsom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// de nas de'i 'og tu ga/ nas thams cad tu gtogs pa'i dngos grub chen po sgyu
338a6(rgyud): ma chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i gnas byed par 'dod pa dang / dgos pa thams cad byed par 'dod na rig sngags 'chang des dri sna tshogs la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
338a7(rgyud): dbang phyug gi gzugs sor bcu drug pa shin tu mdzes pa/ sku shin tu tshad dang ldan pa/ phyag drug pa/ de bzhin du zhal gsum pa bya ste/ dang po ni zhi ba'i zhal ras can tshangs pa'i
338a8(rgyud): cha byad 'chang ba/ spyan gsum pa/ ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis rgyan pa/ 'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan 'chang ba/ zla gam can no// zhal g.yas pa ni khro bo'i rgyal po'i gzugs
338b1(rgyud): can khro bo gzugs bsgyur ba/ spyan gsum pa la ral pa'i thor tshugs kyi steng gi ral pa la 'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan 'chang ba/ zla gam g.yas phyogs na gnas pa'o// g.yon
338b2(rgyud): pa ni zhal khro gnyer can/ khros pa'i lta stangs su lta ba/ spyan gsum pa/ ral ba'i tho tshugs 'chang ba/ 'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyun 'chang ba/ g.yas phyogs zla ga ma can/ rgyan
338b3(rgyud): thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis legs par rgyan pa/ zhags pa thogs pa pad+ma thogs pa/ mdung rtse gsum pa thogs pa/ dgra sta thogs pa/ dbugs 'byin pa/ 
338b4(rgyud): rin po che'i dbyug pa thogs pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhug/ sa pa'o// g.yas na lha mo sgrol mthal mo sbyar cing 'dud pa'o// g.yon na dkar mo thal mo sbyar te yid
338b5(rgyud): tsam du 'dud pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ meg sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan par bya'o// zhabs kyi drung du rig sngags 'chang gser gyi rgyan gyis
338b6(rgyud): brgyan pa/ lag na me tog thogs pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la kha bltas nas dbus mo btsug te 'dug par bya'o// lhag ma yin pa'i tshen rtsis tshad dang ma
338b7(rgyud): 'dres par sbyin dang / smin ma dang / mchu dang / sen mo'i gnas su sbyang bar bya'o// 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// // bam po nyi shu pa
338b8(rgyud): de nas rdzas bshad par bya ste/ 'jigs pa med pas spos kyi rigs tsan dan dang / ta gar dang / pu shel ci dang / li shi dang / nag puSh+pa dang / spri ka dang / rgya skyegs dang / kha ba Na
339a1(rgyud): kha dang / spang spos dang / na lang dang / gur gum dang / gla rtsi dang / gapur dang / sgron shing dang / gnad pri yang ku dang / kun tu ru dang / sha khar dang / pad+ma gesar
339a2(rgyud): dang / du ru ka dang / til mar dang / spra tshil dang / lhan cig sbyar ba'i phye ma zhib mo shin tu 'jam pa/ shin tu mnyen pa/ mchog 'di gtsang ba gtsang sbra spyod pas thub pa 'phags
339a3(rgyud): pabaspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dge zhing shin tu dul ba/ rab tu zhi ba'i rnam par shin tu mdzes par bya'o// gsang sngags brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas pas/ lan gcig
339a4(rgyud): bsgrub pa ni mchog yin te/ 'di yongasu rdzogs nas khro bo'i rgyal pos thams cad la mngon du gtor te/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis las brtsam mo// 
339a5(rgyud): de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas gos ga tsang ma bgos te/ shin tu khrus byas la dris byu gas pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi shin tu mdzes pa
339a6(rgyud): la gsal ba/ ko la'i tshad tsam gyi dkyil 'khor bzang po legs par byug pa shin tu gsal ba bya'o// dri sna tshogs kyis byugs pa shin tu 'jam pa la tsan dan kar po dang
339a7(rgyud): gur gum gyis dbus su las kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba bri bar bya'o// 'dir pad+ma yang byas te/ mdab ma brgya rtsa brgyad pa ge sar dang snying por bcas pa/ shin tu mdzes pa/ 
339a8(rgyud): shin tu bzang ba tsan dan dang gur gum gyis bri bar bya ste/ der tshon rtsi gzhan ni spyad par mi bya'o// bum pa spos chus bkang ba dang / de bzhin du dri chu dang / gtor ma thams cad/ 
339b1(rgyud): dri sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa dang / ci yod pa'i gtor ma bzhag ste/ de nas 'dir dkyil 'khor bya ba'i ni gnas sam dgon pa'am khyim mam gang du gnas par 'gyur ba der khrug
339b2(rgyud): tshad dam khru do 'am khru gsum 'am lhag par yang bya'o// de bzhin du bdug spos dang / tsan dan dang a ga ru dang / du ru ka dang / kun tu ru'o// ba dan kha dog sna tshogs pas
339b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor kun nas brgyan par bya'o// me tog phreng ba dgram bya zhing // dri dang byugs pa de nyid dang / kun tu mar me'i phreng ba'o// de nas dri las byas pa'i 'phags pa spyan
339b4(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su pa pad+ma'i ge sar gyi steng du gzhag pa la/ rig sngags 'chang mngon du phyogs par dkyil mo krung bcas
339b5(rgyud): te 'dug nas gzhan mi smra bar bzlas brjod brgyad stong / brtsam par bya'o// brgyad stong rdzogs pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku
339b6(rgyud): las 'od zer sna tshogs 'byung zhing sa cher g.yo bar 'gyur/ rang gi lag pa g.yas pa 'bar bar 'gyur ro// gzugs brnyan las rig sngags 'chung leg so leg so// 
339b7(rgyud): khyod kyis 'dod pa'i las thams cad grub pa'o// don yod pa chen po'i 'khor lo rnam par 'phrul pa'i dngos grub dang / thams cad tu dgos pa grub pa de kho na nyid grub bo// khyod
339b8(rgyud): kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di mchog tu grub pa'o// khyod kyis sgrub pa'i cho ga rgya cher mchog tu grub bo// zhes sgra 'byung ngo // de nas rig sngags 'chang gis dgro/ 
340a1(rgyud): pa yong su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ji ltar dgos par bya ste/ slob ma gzhug pa dang / dam tshig ni 'dir dgos pa zhes bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang ga
340a2(rgyud): gi tshe dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe dri las byas pa'i mgon po la sngar mchod pa bya ste/ de nas dges pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mdun du
340a3(rgyud): bzhag la/ bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas na dgos pa sna tshogs rmi lam du ston cing / ji ltar bsam pa thams cad ston par 'gyur de de'i mdun du tsan dan dkar po las dkyil 'khor
340a4(rgyud): byas la/ tsan dan dkar po'i sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya/ da'o// de nas thal ba la bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa ba rgyang bya ste/ rang gi lus mtha' dag khyab par bsku zhing / 
340a5(rgyud): thal ba de nyid dang / yungs kar gyi byug pa phyogs bzhir gtor na 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs ji ltar/ de ltar 'jig rten thams cad kyis mngon sum du mthong
340a6(rgyud): ste/ ji srid du phyir bsdu ba ma byas pa de srid du 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs su snang bar 'gyuraro// dri chu dang yungs kar gyis mngon du phyogs par gtor na phyib sdu ba byas par
340a7(rgyud): 'gyuraro// thal ba des rab tu bdugs te/ du khrod kyi nang du zhugs na 'byung po'i dpung dang / 'khor dang bcas pa mdun na nye bar gnas par 'gyuraro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang /
