340a8(rgyud): 'byung po dang sha za thams cad mdun na nye bar gnas shing dbang du gyur nas gnas te/ bdag dang nor gyis bgyi ba ci mchis zhes bya ba byed do// rang la blugs te tshegs kyi nang ngas
340b1(rgyud): dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs na ston pa mthong ba ji lta ba de ltar rig sngags 'chang snang zhing mthong ste/ mchod pa'i 'os chen por 'gyuraro// phyag bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur/ don dang mchod pa/ 
340b2(rgyud): chen po 'thob par 'gyuraro// thal bas lus bskus te klu'i mtsher zhugs na klu'i rgyal po stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad thams cad dbang du gyur nas gnas te bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur/ 
340b3(rgyud): zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas par 'gyur// rang la byugs te rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na/ rgyal po'i btsun mo dang 'khor du bcas pa rnams dbang du 'gyur te/ ci bgyi zhes
340b4(rgyud): bya ba byed cing mthun nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// 'jig rte/ dan gyi bla ma ji lta ba de bzhin du mchod pa chen po 'byung par 'gyur don chen po dang mchod pa chen po 'thob par
340b5(rgyud): 'gyur/ ji srid 'tshe'i bar du nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/ ston pa 'dren pa ji lta ba bzhin no// gang dang gang la thal bas reg pa tsam gyis de dang de'i nad thams cad
340b6(rgyud): bral bar 'gyur/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ngan 'gro'i sgo thams cad bcad par 'gyur/ mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// shi 'phos nas bde
340b7(rgyud): ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur// byas pa mi bzo ba/ gsang sngags kyi gdol pa/ ma gus pa/ bla ma mi byed pa/ rlom sems dang / nga rgyal dang ldan pa/ bdud kyi
340b8(rgyud): phyogs pa/ skyes bu gti mug can/ bsogs pa la zhen pa/ khengs pa nga rgyal can de dag gis gang du yang dngos grub yang dag par rje su mi mthong ngo // de dag yun ring bar thar pa mi/ 
341a1(rgyud): rnyed pas dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / gang yang rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis smad pa/ skye ba brgyad la
341a2(rgyud): dngos grub bsregs pa/ 'jig rten 'di dang / pha rol chung gson pa dag ni ma gtogs te/ de lta mod kyi 'dir bdag gis cung zad kyang ma nongs te/ sdug bsngal mang po dang chen
341a3(rgyud): po'i sems can dgrol bar rngo mi thogs lagaso// sangs rgyas thugs rje chen pos bka' stsal pa'i yid la bgyi ba bskal pa bgrangs par yid la bgyis pas dgrol bar rngo mi
341a4(rgyud): thogs lag so// de lta mod kyi sdug bsngal mang po brgyud par nyams myong bar 'gyuraro// dngos grub ni byam/ sa pas 'thob ste/ byams pa dang gsang sngags kyi go cha
341a5(rgyud): bgos pa/ byams pa'i ral gri thogs pa/ sems can thams cad la phan zhing mnyes gshin pa la de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i/ dngos grub 'di dag 'jig rten 'dren
341a6(rgyud): pas rje su gnang ngo // mgon po 'di mthong ba tsam gyis spos kyi gzugs kyi 'jig rten mgon po mthong ba dang / 'jig rten 'dren pa ra gi gzugs su mngon sum du mthong ba
341a7(rgyud): mtshungs pa nyid du khong du chud par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas bye ba gang ga'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam par mngon sum du mthong ba kho na dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po mthong ba mtshungs
341a8(rgyud): pa kho nar khong du chud par bgyi ste/ 'di ltar shes par bya'o// de nas phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po sgrub par 'dod pa'i dge slong
341b1(rgyud): ngam/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ rgyal po'am/ blon po chen po'am/ rig sngags 'chang ngam/ gzhan gang yang rung ba'i rig sngags 'chang gis phyir mi ldog pa'i
341b2(rgyud): gnas thob par 'dod pa dang / dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gnas mthong bar 'dod
341b3(rgyud): pa dang / rig sngags 'chang gi dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad mthong bar 'dod pa dang / 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin mthong bar 'dod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams
341b4(rgyud): cad kyi spyi'i dam tshig mthong bar 'dod pa na cho ga 'di ba sgrub par bya ste/ snying po dang bcas/ bya ba dang / bcas pa des myur ba dang / shin tu myur ba dang / mgyog
341b5(rgyud): par 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon sum du cho 'phrul ma da du byung ba gsang bstan par mthong ste/ 'di la som nyi dang nem nur bskyed par mi bya'o// the tsom dang
341b6(rgyud): yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gser gyi mdog can sor bzhi'i tshad tsam/ tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang
341b7(rgyud): ga ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa bya ste/ shin tu tshad dang ldan pa/ cha byad mdzes pa/ cha shin tu rnam par mdzes pa/ phyag gnyis pa/ spyan gsum pa/ 'od dpag med
341b8(rgyud): pa'i dbu rgyan can/ g.yas na zla ba tshes pa/ phyag g.yon pad+ma dang / ril ba spyi blugs bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas mi 'jig pa sbyin pa/ sku'i nang ga pur dang / gla rtsi dang / 
342a1(rgyud): ring srel gyis bkang ba/ g.yas na lha mo sgrol ma dngul las byas pa thal mo sbyar te yid tsam 'dud pa/ gser gyi brgyan gyi brgyan pa dang / g.yon na dngul las
342a2(rgyud): dkar mo thal mo sbyar te/ yid tsam 'dud pa pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs par bya'o// steng gi g.yas phyogs na 'od dpag med dkyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs pa dang / g.yon na
342a3(rgyud): shAkya'i rgyal po dkyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs pa dgod par bya'o// 'od 'dom gang dang bcas pas legs par brgyan par bya zhing gnad dang / gnad shin tu rnam par 'byes/ 
342a4(rgyud): ga skra dang / dpral ba dang / smin ma dang / shangs dang / snyan dang / zhal dang / mgul pa dang / dpung / pa dang / nu ma dang / rked pa dang / baR+Ya dang / dbus mo dang / 
342a5(rgyud): byin pa dang / zhabs dang / phyag gi sor mo mnyam zhing thams cad du mdzes pa/ sku chu zheng gab cing mthon dman ran pa/ mchod phyir thogs pa dkar po
342a6(rgyud): 'chang bar bya'o// las shin tu yongasu rdzogs shing shin tu mthar phyin pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs zin par rig nas rig sngags 'chang
342a7(rgyud): gis rgyu skar bzang po'i zla ba nya ba'am/ tshes brgyad dam/ bco lnga 'am/ bcu gsum ngam/ bcu bzhi 'am/ rgyu skar bkra shis pa rgyal gyi nyi ma dang 'thun pa rnyed nas dkyil
342a8(rgyud): 'khor bsgrub par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor shin tu mdzes par bya ba ni gru bzhi la cha legs par byed pa/ ko la'i tshad tsam la them skas bzhis brgyan pa/ khru gsum par rnam
342b1(rgyud): par dbye bar bya ste/ chung ba dang lhag par mi bya'o// legs par byugs pa shin tu 'jam pa/ snyib mnyen pa/ dbyibs legs pa la tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis rnam par dbye zhing dkyil
342b2(rgyud): 'khor dam pa thig gdab pa shin tu rnam par mdzes pa/ sgo bzhi pa la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying por pad+ma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dkyil
342b3(rgyud): 'khor bri'o// phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su cha rnam pa brgyad du phye la/ lho'i gru'i gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs sna tshogs kyis bri'o// de nas byang gi grwa
342b4(rgyud): bri ba ni rdo rje'i rig kyi dkyil 'khor tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis rnam par bkra bar bri'o// de nas nub kyi grur bri rab ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyis rnam
342b5(rgyud): par bkra bar bri'o// de nas shar gyi grwar glang po che'i ri/ gas kyi dkyil 'khor tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis rtag tu shin tu mdzes pa dang / shin tu gsal bar bri'o/ 
342b6(rgyud): shar phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgor ri bo Ta la me tog dang shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis legs par rgyan pa ri'i lha dang btsas pa bri'o// lho phyogs kyi sgor ri rab klu'i rgyal po dga'
342b7(rgyud): bo dang nyi dga' bos kun nas dkris pa dang / sum cu gsum pa'i ris kyi lha bri'o// byang phyogs kyi sgor ni spos kyi ngad ljang dri za'i tshogs kyis gang ba shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis
342b8(rgyud): shin tu mdzes pa bri'o// nub phyogs kyi sgor ri ti se lha rnams kyis gnas me tog sna tshogs dang / khri shing dang / shing ljon pa sna tshogs mchog gis rtag tu gang ba bri'o// legs
343a1(rgyud): par zin nas kun tu ni mdung rtse gsum pa'i bar phreng ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigasu de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje'i rigs nyid gzhag go// nor bu'i rig/ 
343a2(rgyud): su de bzhin gshegs pa gzhag cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / thams cad rdo rje 'dzin pa gzhag na spyi'i rigs grub bo// lha mo sgrol ma ni ri bo po Ta la la gzhag go// ri/ 
343a3(rgyud): rab la ni gos dkar mo'o// dpe med ma Ni ti se'i rtse mor ro// sgrol ma bdun ni spos kyi ngad ldang la gzhag go/ shar phyogs kyi sgor pho nya mo bdun gyis yongasu bskor ba'o// lho
343a4(rgyud): phyogs kyi sgor ni srin mor ral pa gcig srin mo bdun gyi yongasu bskor ba'o// nub phyogs kyi sgor rdo rdorje lu gu brgyud bdun gyis yongasu bskor ba'o// byang phyogs
343a5(rgyud): kyi sgor khro gnyer can mo khro gnyer can bdun gyis yo/ ngasu bskor ba'o// de nas 'jig pa med pas ma/ gon po 'jig rten gyi bla ma'i gzugs gser gyi mdog
343a6(rgyud): can ring srel dang ldan pa don yod pa'i rgyal po rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po pad+ma rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor du gzhag par bya'o// grur rgyal po chen po bzhi
343a7(rgyud): stobs po che go cha bgos pa/ drag shul gyi gzugs can/ mtshon cha 'bar ba thogs pa bzhag par bya'o// gang zhig thub pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sprul pa/ spyi'i rigs
343a8(rgyud): yang dag par 'byung ba/ don yod pa'i rgyal po rnam par 'phrul pa/ 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa dang bcas pa/ don yod pa'i zhags pa rnam par 'phrul pa sgrub pa'i ched
343b1(rgyud): du cho ga sna tshogs dran pa bya'o// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// rnam thar dkyil 'khor de nyid ni// legs par sgrub pa mthong tsam dang / bklags pas dngos grub bla med 'gyur/ 
343b2(rgyud): de bas rtag tu 'bad pa yid// sgrub par byed pa ni mkhas so// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pa shin tu khrus byas pa gos gtsang ma bgos pas dar dang ba dan sna
343b3(rgyud): tshogs bzang pos dkyil 'khor brgyan par bya'o// ro bro ba'i mchog rgya chen pos snod sna tshogs legs par bkang ba dang / gser dang dngul gyi snod du mchod yon 'bul
343b4(rgyud): zhing ro sna tshogs kyi gtor ma bzhag par bya'o// dedebazhin 'bras bu sna tshogs bzhag par bya'o// gdazugs rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i kha zas kyi gtor ma ya
343b5(rgyud): sgrub po me tog sna tshogs dkram zhing gtor ma sna tshogs kyis bkang ba dang / bum pa dang / rdze'u dang / por zlum dang / kham po dang / dbyib mo dag kyang dgang
343b6(rgyud): kun tu dri chus bsgos pa yi// rgya chen gtor ma kun tu'o// sna tshogs pa yi pog por nas/ sna tshogs bdug spos dbul ba ni/ a ga ru dang / tsa no dan dang / sprig ka dang / 
343b7(rgyud): du rus ka dang / kun tu ru dang / gu gul dang / sgron shing dang / shrib+h+re Sh+Ta ka dang / sa ra dang / sar dza ra sa dang / de bzhin du ga pur dang / gla rtsi dang / gur gum dang / sha kha ra'i
343b8(rgyud): 'dug pos 'di dag ni rab tu phul/ thams cad du sgrub pa bla na med pa yin no// sna tshogs pa yi dri dag dang // phye ma byug pa sna tshogs nyid// shes rab can gyis kun tu ni// 
344a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dag la bzhag par bya// lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / zangs kyi me tog dang / byi ru dang ni mu tig dang / oMn tra ni la
344a2(rgyud): ngag dang ni// pad+ma mar gdag kyang ngo // gser dang dngul gyi bum pa rin po che sna bdun can yang gru bzhir bzhag par bya'o// 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang bsres pas
344a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du kun tu gtor ro// kun nas me tog phreng ba ni// rmad byung dkyil 'khor la bdag cing // kun nas mar me'i phreng ba yang // dkyil 'khor rmad du byung la bzhag
344a4(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang nyid zhag cig gnas par gyur pas yang bzlas brjod rgya cher byas la cho gas srung ba/ de dang phyogs bcing ba dang / kun nas dkyil 'khor
344a5(rgyud): bcing ba byas la dkyil 'khor gyi las bya'o// de nas sla ba ma bzhugs par bya ste/ bla ma mkhan po'am/ sgra ba dpon nam/ pa 'am/ rgyal po'am/ blon po chen po
344a6(rgyud): la dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gsang ba bstan te/ mgon po 'jig rten gyi bla ma mthong zhing dkyil 'khor rmad du byung ba mthong nas phyag bya zhing mchod pa dang
344a7(rgyud): me tog dang / bdug spos dbul bar byas la bskor ba bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis thams cad la byams pa'i sems mnyam par bzhag ste/ dkyil mo krung bcas
344a8(rgyud): nas 'dug la mi smra bar yam tshan du snang bar mthong gi bar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod byas la dkyil 'khor kun tu khro bo'i rgyal pos lan brgya rtsa brgyad
344b1(rgyud): dbang bskur zhing yungs kar dang / chu dang me tog gis dkyil 'khor kun tu lan brgya rtsa brgyad gtor ba'i modo la rtag tu phyag rgya lan brgya rtsa brgyad bcings la dkyil 'khor du
344b2(rgyud): me tog dang / bdug sdes dang / dri phul nas mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa mthong na don yod pa nyid mchod par bya'o// de nas mgon po phyag na rdo rje dang / 
344b3(rgyud): rig sngags kyi rgyal po bla na med pa mchod pa byed do// de nas lha mo sgrol ma dang / kun tu lha mo thams cad la'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad la'o// de nas ro'i rgyal
344b4(rgyud): bo rnams la gnas pa'i ro'i lha thams cad la'o// tha mas cad dang sgo bsrungs la rtag tu mchod pa bya'o// de nas phyogs bzhi kun tu rig sngags 'chang gis
344b5(rgyud): rtag tu mchod nas dkyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la 'jig/ sa pa med pas lag pa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o// byams pa'i sems dang snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pa
344b6(rgyud): nyid kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa rtag tu dran par bya zhing sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa sgom mo// gsang sngags brjod ma thag tu dkyil 'khor dang sa gzhi g.yo zhing gang dkyil
344b7(rgyud): 'khor du zhugs pa'i mo la snying dga' ba dang / sems bde ba thob po// 'od zer bya ba kha dog sna tshogs rnam par bkram pa 'byung zhing dkyil 'khor gyi snying po na don yod pa'i
344b8(rgyud): zhags pa 'gul bar 'gyur dkyil 'khor gyi snying po 'bar bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / de bzhin du phyag na rdo rje 'bar bar 'gyur/ dkyil 'khor la
345a1(rgyud): gnas pa'i lha dang / lha mo thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur/ lha g.yo bar 'gyur zhing dkyil 'khor kun nas leg so zhes sgra grags par 'gyuraro// de nas ji ltar gse
345a2(rgyud): bkod pa de ltar dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po dang / mgon po de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / 
345a3(rgyud): sgrol ma dang / dkar mo gser gyi mdog gis bkod pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor nang nas bzhengs par 'gyur/ sku gser mdog can gzugs bzang pos/ bdag nyid kyi rang gi
345a4(rgyud): ngo bo ston pa snang bar 'gyur/ phyogs bcu kun tu rtag tu gzigs par 'gyuraro// thams cad tu rtag tu se mas brtan por bya ste/ rig sngags 'chang byams pa
345a5(rgyud): dang bcas pa'i sems brtan por gyur pas me tog dang / rol mo'i sgra dbul zhing don yod pa'i rgyal po ya nga dran par bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pas phyag
345a6(rgyud): gser gyi mdog can brkyang ste/ rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor bzhag nas legaso zhes bya ba sbyin par mdzad cing rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dang / 
345a7(rgyud): cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba grub ste/ skyes bu dam pa khyod bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su lung bstan gyis rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis
345a8(rgyud): yongasu dag nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du skyes bu dam pa khyod rang gi ngo bo phyir mi ldog pa dang / don yod pa'i rig
345b1(rgyud): sngags 'chang gis 'khor lo bsgyur bar 'gyur bar byos shig/ dkyil 'khor 'di la brten pa'i skye bo dge ba dang lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa/ sems can thams cad bla na
345b2(rgyud): med pa'i mya ngan las 'das par lung bstan gyi bar du phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// ji ste sems can ngan pa rig sngags kyi gdol pa smad pa dag der zhugs na gzugs brnyan lnga
345b3(rgyud): khrag 'dzag cing sgra mi bzad pa 'byung ste/ mgon po 'di mi mthong / sa 'di g.yo bar mi 'gyur// dkyil 'khor 'di 'bar bar mi 'gyur te/ de'i tshe reg sngags 'chang la rmi la
345b4(rgyud): du ston te de nyid kyang gzhan du mi 'gyur// ji ltar mngon sum de bzhin du rmi lam du ston cing yid la bas dam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// de lta bu
345b5(rgyud): na rig sngags 'chang legs par btag cing so sorartag tu sems can dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa ra bya'o// sgrub pa po bden par smra ba dang / dbang po yang
345b6(rgyud): dag par bsdams pa/ sems can bdal bya bla na pa brtse ba can gzhan la yang dag par smra ba/ tshig brtags pa dad pa can/ gus pa dang ldan pa nyid/ mer 'dzin pa/ phar
345b7(rgyud): 'dzin pa/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabasu song ba/ rtag tu bla ma la gus pa nyid kyi sems can 'di dag gzhugs par bya'o// rab tu bag yod pa dang / rtag tu gtsang zhing gtsang // 
345b8(rgyud): sgra dang ldan pa dang / kha zas ngan pa dang / lhag ma dang / 'bags pa dang / 'dres pa dang / gcig tu bsres pa dang / chung zad bkrus pa dang / chang dang / sha dang / snyun dong dang / 
346a1(rgyud): sgog skya dang / ke'u dang bsres pa'i kha zas dag spang bar bya zhing / rang gi kha 'phro yang spang bar bya'o// lhag ma ni rtag tu spang bar bya ste/ 'di dag sgrub pa'i cho ga la
346a2(rgyud): dran par bya'o// lag pa 'bags pas gdong la reg par mi bya/ lhung bzed dor bar mi bya'o// rtag tu kham phyed phyed du gcod pa dang / mchog tu 'bags pa 'di dag nam yang
346a3(rgyud): bza' bar mi bya'o// gtsang mas zas gtsang ma bza' zhing lag pa'i sor mo bsdams pas kha gdong las gos pa la mi reg par 'di dag za ba nyid ni mchog tu mdzes shing // 
346a4(rgyud): blo dang ldan pa yin no// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis la sa shin tu yongasu rdzogs par byas shing dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba legs par rdzogs na de la khrag 'dzag
346a5(rgyud): par mi 'gyur ro// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyag brkyang bas rig sngags 'chang gi lag pa nas bzung nas dkyil 'khor gyi nang
346a6(rgyud): du 'jug par mdzad cing shin tu dri ma med par snang ba zhes bya ba'i nor bu nyid kyi mgul pa nas bkrol te rig sngags 'tshong gi 'gul du 'dogs par mdzad do// spyi bor phyag
346a7(rgyud): 'jog par mdzad cing 'di la sras kyi mthu bo zhes gsung ngo // mgul par nor bu bcings pa tsam gyi mod la de na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
346a8(rgyud): kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig dang dkyil 'khor mthong bar gyur/ byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du rigs thams cad du don yod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po 'khor
346b1(rgyud): los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor chen po rtag tu mngon du 'gyur zhing rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo nyid smin mtshams na 'dug par 'gyur
346b2(rgyud): rgya chen po dri ma med par snang ba don yod pa'i ye shes rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob ste/ gang ting nge 'dzin rje su thob pas 'jig rten pa thams cad
346b3(rgyud): kyi dngos grub rnam par rgya wa ston par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / sgrub pa dang / dam tshig dang gsang ba thams cad kyi mthu chen po ston
346b4(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// don yod pa chen po'i 'khor los bsgyur pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad ston par dgyur ro// don yod pa'i dam tshig gi byin gyis brlabs
346b5(rgyud): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig ma tha' yas pa 'thob ste/ gang dam tshig thob pas dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
346b6(rgyud): dam tshig dang mtshungs par shes par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig mnyam pa nyid kyi rnam par 'phrul pa ston par 'gyuraro// de nas rig sngags 'chang dkyil 'khor
346b7(rgyud): gyi cho ga'i bya ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byas nas spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ring bsrel dang bcas pa de yang sa phyogs dben pa'i gnas gtsang mar gos gtsang
346b8(rgyud): ma'i gdan bshams la de yi steng du bzhag par bya'o// a ga ru'i bdug spos 'bul zhing nyin gcig bzhin du nang par sngar gzhan mi smra bar bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bya ste/ 
347a1(rgyud): rig sngags kyi rgyal pos mchod pa dbul bar bya'o// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs brnyan 'bar bar 'gyur te/ nyin gcig
347a2(rgyud): bzhin du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzugs brnyan smra bar 'gyur/ tshig 'byin par 'gyur ro// da ltar gyi bzhin du de thams cad smra bar 'gyur te dge ba dang mi
347a3(rgyud): dge ba dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba de thams cad smra bar 'gyuraro// tshe ring ba'am/ tshe yongasu zad pa de thams cad ston cing smra bar 'gyuraro// rgyal po rjeb
347a4(rgyud): 'am/ dgra 'thab pa'am/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'a zab pa 'am/ le nyos pa dang / mings pa dang / dgon pa dang / nad dang / na ba dang / gdon dang / gnod pa dang // 
347a5(rgyud): 'tshe ba dang / grang ba dang / rlung dang tsha ba dang / ser ba dang / chom po'i 'jigs pa dang / rkun po'i 'jigs pa dang / gcan zan gtum po'i 'jigs pa dang / 
347a6(rgyud): sbrul gdug pa'i 'jigs pa dang / bde ba dang lo legs pa dang / 'bras bu 'phel ba dang / 'bru 'phel ba de thams cad smra bar 'gyur zhing de'i thabs thams cad kyang rab tu ston par
347a7(rgyud): 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang la nyin gcig bzhin du/ khyad par du gyur pa rnam pa mang po rab tu ston par 'gyuraro// kha cig la bstan par mi bgyi ste/ sdang sems can rig sngags
347a8(rgyud): kyi gdol pa/ rkun ma/ byas pa mi bzo ba blang ba/ 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la 'khu ba/ 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la 'phrog pa/ bslab pa ni 'dod pa dang yang dag par ldan pa de dag
347b1(rgyud): gi lag tu bstan par mi bgyi/ rna bar bsgrags par mi 'gyi/ skra'i rtse mo tsam du snang ba yang bstan par mi bgyi'o// cho ga zhib mo 'di ni yi ge'i 'bru gcig yang bstan par mi
347b2(rgyud): bgyi'o// rjesu 'jug par mi bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang dngos grub mchog thob par 'gyur te/ mchog tu yid brtan pa/ rnam par thar pa mchog gi dkyil 'khor
347b3(rgyud): gsang ba thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi drung nas rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor chen po lag tu 'thob par 'gyur ba de la ston pa dang / bla ma'i 'du shes bskyed
347b4(rgyud): par bgyid/ bdag dang 'dra bar mchod pa sna tshogs kyis dgus par bgyid na bdag la gus pa dang / bla mar ba gyis pa lags/ mchod pa dang / brjed pa bgyis pa
347b5(rgyud): lag so// de lta bas na dad pa'i rjesu 'brang bas byams pa bsgoms pa dang / snying rje bskyed pas dngos grub chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// ji ste bgyi ba 'di las 'da'
347b6(rgyud): bar mi bgyid pa'i sems can de la bdag gis rtag par rgyun mi chad par dran pa dang / bdag brjod pa tsam gyis rang gi shin tu yongasu dag pa'i rang gi ngo bos bdag mdun nam
347b7(rgyud): ches par bgyi zhing / yid la re ba thams cad dang mchog yongasu rdzogs par bgyi'o// ji ste bdag ji ltar dam bcas pa las gzhan du bgyi na bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom
347b8(rgyud): ldan 'das de dag la bslus pa lag so// rig sngags kyi gdol pa rkun mar gyur pa la ni mi bgyid de/ dam bcas pa bzhin du smra bar mi bgyid de/ rig sngags 'chang gis
348a1(rgyud): rtag tu gtsang bar bgyid// rtag tu 'dzum pa dang / rtag tu byams pa dang / snying rje sgom pa yid la bgyid na/ de la bdag gis rtag tu yon tan phun sum tshegs/ 
348a2(rgyud): pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur bar bgyi/ de dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad dang ldan par bgyi/ don yod pa yangs pa chen po'i dngos grub rjesu stsal bar bgyi'o// sems
348a3(rgyud): can thams cad kyi bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bgyi ba la/ rgya mtsho'i dus brlabs ltar thams cad kun tu mchi bar bgyi'o// ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / 
348a4(rgyud): log par ltung ba thams cad yongasu zad par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag dga' bas kun tu mchi bar bgyi'o// / sems can gang la byams pa dang / snying rje mchis
348a5(rgyud): pa'i sems can pha rol de rnams kyi bsam pa phun su/ ma tshogs pa yongasu rdzogs par bgyi'o// de lta bas na rig sngags 'chang gis shin tu sdoms pas
348a6(rgyud): bsdam zhing rig sngags brjod par bgyi'o// yongasu gtong ba'i lag par bgyi zhing spar chungs par mi bgyi ste/ lag pa brkyang bar bgyi'o// gtong ba mang bas de bzhin gshegs
348a7(rgyud): pa dam tshig la gnas par bgyi'o// sngar legs par spyad par bgyi ste/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i spyad pa bgyi zhing rtag tu yid la bgyi'o// de nas bdag dang chos kyi mchog la
348a8(rgyud): dga' ba zhes bgyi'o// rang gi gzugs brnyan bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// des khro bo'i rgyal po bshad par bya ste/ don yod rgyal po rmad byung tshe// kun tu dngos grub thogs
348b1(rgyud): med cing // dkyil 'khor kun la dbang skur ba// sdang ba thams cad rab tu 'joms// bdud dang bgegs ni rnam par 'jig/ gnod sbyin srin po gsang ba pa// 'byung po thams
348b2(rgyud): cad rab tu 'bros// gdon gyi gtso bo sked byed cing // sdang ba thams cad rab tu 'joms// sdang ba'i klung rnams rnam 'jig cing // 'dzag 'phongs rnams la mi 'jigs stsol// 
348b3(rgyud): rig 'dzin rnams la grub stsol pa// don yod zhags pa'i dngos grub mchog/ dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas ston// spyi yi rigs ni rab ston pa// don yod spyi yigs
348b4(rgyud): ba ni/ rtag tu gzhan mon snying po nyid// khro bo'i rgyal po bla med pa// de ni bdag gis rab tu bshad// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar byang chub sems dpa' sems
348b5(rgyud): dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugadon yod pa'i rgyal pos khro bo'i gzugasu gan sa te sdang ba thams cad 'jigs par byed par 'gyur
348b6(rgyud): cing lag na zhags pa thogs te khro bo 'di smras so// na maHsarba ta thA ga ta/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra badz+ra d+ha re b+h+ya/ oM tsar tsa ra/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma hA kA ru ni ka/ tsi ri tsi ri/ bai ri bo ri/ 
348b7(rgyud): mahA pad+ma hasta/ ka la ka la/ ku lu ku lu/ ma hA sta/ ma prAp+ta/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsir ni shA tsa re/ shA ra e h+ye hi/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ d+hU ba d+hA ba/ kar+Na kiNi/ pa ra ma shud+d+ha satwa/ ka ra ka ra/ ki
348b8(rgyud): ra ka ra/ mahA pa shub te/ bai'i chung / 'a dzi'i \u0f7f/ e kar brang+ga be 'gyur/ sa ris ra/ ba bar kha nga / sh+lau shi ta se ha sre/ prang ti maN+Data/ shan rje ya/ dz+wa la dz+wa la su/ 
349a1(rgyud): ru surba/ mu ru mu ru/ san ku m+ba ra/ ru tra biSh+Nu bA sa pa/ d+ha nang / r-i Sha Na ya ka/ bahu bi bid+ha/ be ra d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa man+ta/ a ba lo ki ta/ bi lo ka ta/ log shwar
349a2(rgyud): ma he shwa ra/ mu ya mu ya/ mum tsa mu ma tsa/ b+han d+ha b+han d+ha na tA Da na tardzan/ rA dza taskar/ ag+ni ud ka/ bi Sha shasta par mi mo tsa ka/ ka Na ka Na/ tsa la tsa la/ bo d+h+ya ga/ la tu rAr+ya sa sat+ya
349a3(rgyud): si pra kA sha ka/ ta ma ta ma/ sa ma sa ma/ ma sa ma sa/ ma hA ta mo d+ha kA ra/ pra sha ma na/ mi li mi li/ e Ne ya/ tsarme pa ri ka ra/ e h+ye hi/ ma Ta ma Ta/ bi shud+d+ha biM Sha ya ni bA si na/ ma hA
349a4(rgyud): kA ru Ni ka/ shwe ta ya dz+nye ba bi ta/ rat+na ma ku Ta mA lA d+ha ra/ sa rba dz+nyA shi ra si pri ta/ ka ra pu Ta/ sa mA d+hi a pra kam bya/ Sha Ta pA ra mi ta/ pa ri pU ra kaM/ ma hA sarba satwa san+na/ 
349a5(rgyud): ti pa ri pA tsa ka/ sarba ma ra duSh+Ta pra marda ka/ sarba sid+d+ha A shA pa ri pU ra ka/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu mA/ sarba ta thA ga tA/ bi Shi kai ra/ b+ha ga bAn/ a mo g+ha rA dza hUM phaT/ na mo stu te/ 
349a6(rgyud): swA hA/ khro bo'i rgyal po don yod pa'i zhags pa'o// oM bi kr-i ta daM Sh+Te/ a me g+ha sa ma ye a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ sarba bad+ya a mo g+ha a b+hi Shi kair/ hu mi li mi li swA hA/ de khro bo'i rgyal ba'i/ 
349a7(rgyud): snying po'o// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa chen po'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu de nas rin chen po po Ta la rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yo bar brtsams
349a8(rgyud): te klu'i tshogs ni 'khrug so// lha'i tshogs thams cad ni dga' bar gyur to// sdang ba'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / bgegs dang log 'dren ni 'bar bar gyur to// bdud la sog/ 
349b1(rgyud): bsdang ba ni yang dag par rab tu zhi bar gyur to// ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad ni rab tu zhi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad ni mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur ro// sdang
349b2(rgyud): ba dang / rab tu sdang ba thams cad dang / thams cad ni mi snang bar gyur to// nad thams cad ni rab tu zhi'o// rim thams cad las ni rnam par grolo// nyon mongs pa'i sgrib
349b3(rgyud): pa thams cad las ni grolo// me tog gi char chen po rab tu bab te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par gyur to// sems can thams cad ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams
349b4(rgyud): cad las yongasu grol bar gyur to// de nas dus gsu dam du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / dkyil 'khor la rten pa'i lha rnams kyis byang chub
349b5(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ra sa gzigs dbang phyug la tshig gcig leg so zhes bya ba byin te leg so lag so// snying rje chen po can
349b6(rgyud): mchog tu don yod pa'i rig sngags 'di smras zin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad dang / rigs spyi'i dam tshig dang / snying po dang / khro bo'i de kho na nyid gsang
349b7(rgyud): ba dang / dkyil 'khor dang / sgrub pa'i cho ga don yod pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor rab tu smros shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
349b8(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po khro bo'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar bshad do// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa shin tu
350a1(rgyud): mdzes pa ko la'i tshad tsam shin tu mdzes pa'i gru bzhi dang / sgo bzhi dang / them skas bzhi dang / rta babs dang / mda'i kha khyer dang / kun na rdo rje'i rnam pa dag
350a2(rgyud): kyang bya ste/ tshon rtsi sna tshogs rnam par mdzes pa'i thig skud kyis dkyil 'khor thig gdab par bya'o// ri mo mkhan gtsang mas snod sar pa dang por gtsang mas dkyil
350a3(rgyud): 'khor dam pa legs par bri ba'o// dkyil 'khor snying po rnam dbye ba// dbusu legs pa rnam phye la// kun nas pad+ma'i phreng ba dang // rdo rje mdung rtse gsum pa dgod// dbus
350a4(rgyud): 'khor lo rta bri ba// shin tu lta sdug 'khor lo dgod// dbus der rgyal ba bzhag par bya// shAkya'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs// g.ya su khro bo'i rgyal po yi// 
350a5(rgyud): 'jig rten dbang phyug 'dren pa po// g.yon du rdo rje 'a dzin bzhag pa// rnga yab rdo rje lag thogs bzhag/ de'i 'og tu 'od zer dang ldan par bya ba ni lcags kyu dang / 
350a6(rgyud): dgra sta dang / go cha dang / dbyug pa dang zhags pa dang / dgra sta lu gu rgyud can dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / glegs bam mo// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og
350a7(rgyud): tu dkar sham chen mo dang / gos dkar mo dang / dkar mo chen mo ral pa can dang / dbyug pa dang / ril ba spyi blugs phyag na thogs pa bya'o// de'i 'og tu srin mo ral pa gcig
350a8(rgyud): ma zhes bya ba ni mche ba gcig pa 'jig su rung zhing mi sdug pa sbrul re ral khar thogs pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ g.yas pa na rdo rje dang / dgra sta/ g.yon pa'i sor mo gcig lha ma yin
350b1(rgyud): dang / log 'dren la bsdigs shing khrag 'dzag pa'i mgo bo'i tsai to nas 'dzin pa dang / khrag gi snod yongasu 'dzin pa/ glang po che'i lpags pa rlon pa'i stod g.yogs 'phyang
350b2(rgyud): ba dang / smad g.yogs can bya'o// mtha'i grwa pad+ma dang / rdo rje bzhag pa ni 'bar ba'i phreng ba can shin du bzang po bzhag par bya'o// shar phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje 'jigs byed
350b3(rgyud): mig de'i sku 'bar ba'i phreng ba can bzhag par bya'o// lho phyogs kyi sgor ki la ki la zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i log 'dren de nyid rdo rje dang dgra sta dang / zhags pa phyag na thogs
350b4(rgyud): par bya'o// nub phyogs kyi sgor pad+ma chen po'i rigs mdzes ma zhes bya ba'i pho nya mo bya ba ni phyag na pad+ma za gas par bya'o// byang phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje chen po'i rtsa
350b5(rgyud): mo zhes bya ba'i tsho gas rdo rje dang zhags pa phyag na r+tha/ gas pa'o// de nas 'jug pa'i sgor tsan dan gyi chu/ gur gum dang / gla rtsi dang / ga pur gyis bsgos pa'i
350b6(rgyud): chus bum pa bkang la ras dkar pos bkris shing rgyan pa rin po che sna bdun can rtag tu bzhag par bya'o// ji snyed pa'i gtor ma sna tshogs yongasu bshams pas kyang
350b7(rgyud): mchod par bya/ rnam pa sna tshogs pas dkyil 'khor legs par brgyan par bya'o// gdug spos kyis bkang ba dang / mar me'i phreng ba dang / me tog dang dri dang / byug pa
350b8(rgyud): mchod par bya'o// ji srid 'jug gi bar du slob ma rnams cho gas bsrungs la de nas don yod pa'i snying po bzlas brjod bya zhing don yod pa'i khro bos dbang bskur bar
351a1(rgyud): bya'o// dbang bskur ba tsam gyis kyang dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongasu gzungs par 'gyuraro// 'jig rten gyi mgon po'i byin gyi
351a2(rgyud): brlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rje su zhugs par 'gyuraro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig dang / dngos grub thang
351a3(rgyud): mngon du 'gyuraro// gang bsam pa dang gang bcol ba de thams cad 'byor par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du dam tshig thams cad kyi rje su zhugs par 'gyuraro// dam tshig dang dkyil
351a4(rgyud): 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang cho ga zhib mo thams cad mngon du 'gyuraro// sdig pa dang / gdug pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par
351a5(rgyud): grol bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan tha/ mas cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro// lha dang lha ma yin dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / gsang ba pa
351a6(rgyud): dang / rig sngags 'chang gi nas khang phug dri ma med pa dang / na mkha'i rje su rgyu ba dang / chu na rgyu ba dang / nags dang / bskyed mos tshal na spyod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los
351a7(rgyud): bsgyur ba'i drug cha la thams cad du dbang bar 'gyur ro// gsang ba pa thams cad kyang 'di'i mngag gzhug par 'gyur ro// gang zhig de la mi phan par 'dod pa'i lha dang klu dang / gnod/ 
351a8(rgyud): sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa gang rig sngags 'chang la mi phan par sems pa de thams
351b1(rgyud): cad kyi de dag gi gnas dang lus nyid rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir sdig pa rnams 'bab par 'gyur ro// de nas dngul las khro bo'i rgyal po sor bcu gnyis kyis tshad tsam byas te/ shin
351b2(rgyud): tu mdzes pa/ shin tu tshad dang ldan pa/ zhal gsum pa ral pa'i thor tshugs bcings pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rgyal ba 'od dpag tu med pa'i dbu rgyan can/ zla ba dbul
351b3(rgyud): thogs pa/ zhal dang po khro bo'i gzugs g.yon pa dang g.yas pa zhi ba'i gzugs zhal cung zad 'dzum pa/ spyan gsum pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ pad+ma 'dzin pa/ zhags pa 'dzin pa/ 
351b4(rgyud): ral gri dang mdung rtse gsum pa 'dzin pa'o// g.ya su lha mo sgrol ma ma me tog 'bul ba/ rgyan thams cad kyi sa brgyan pa'o// g.yon du lha mo rig sngags kyi rgyal
351b5(rgyud): mo nor bu rin po che chen po 'bul ba/ rgyan thams cad/ kyos brgyan pa'o// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi zhabs/ kyi drung du rig sngags 'chang pus mo btsugs pa/ 
351b6(rgyud): lag na pog por dang bgrang phreng thogs te bcom ldan 'das la blta'o// gzugs brnyan de nyid kyi mdun du tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bya zhing gur gum gyis mchod pa
351b7(rgyud): bya'o// dkyil 'khor de'i steng du khro bo'i rgyal po zhag ste/ de'i spyan sngar bzlas brjod stong phrag brgya bya'o// de nas gzugs brnyan de 'gul zhing g.yo bar 'gyur/ 'chag pa
351b8(rgyud): 'gyur/ 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur/ tshig 'byin par 'gyur/ leg so zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur/ phyag g.yas pa spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur/ yid la bsam pa dang mchog zad
352a1(rgyud): yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang de yang bdag nyid 'bar bar 'gyur/ namakha' la 'phags par 'gyur zhing don yod pa yangs par snang ba/ 
352a2(rgyud): dngos grub dri ma med par grags pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba brgya stong phrag drug cu
352a3(rgyud): rtsa brgyad po rnams kyi gtso bo dang rgyal por 'gyuraro// che lha'i bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis su 'gyuraro// bskal pa'i mjug rdzogs te de nyid kyi mtshan
352a4(rgyud): mo 'das pa dang / byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// ji ltar bde ba can bzhin du 'jig/ rten gyi khams 'di gzhal med khang gi rnam par
352a5(rgyud): 'phrul bar 'gyur zhing tshe yi tshad bskal pa dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i rnam par tharapa'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / cho ga zhib mo
352a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi chos ston par 'gyuraro// de'i 'og tu 'jig rten pa'i sgrub pa ni de nyid kyi spyan sngar bzlas brjod brgya stong bya'o// bzlas brjod rdzogs pa'i mong la 'phags
352a7(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug khro bo'i rgyal po rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na/ bzhugs par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten pa'i cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang sngags dang / 
352a8(rgyud): phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / mig 'phrul dang / bzhad gad dang / phur pas gdab pa dang / sreg pa dang / 'phang ba dang / bsad pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / 
352b1(rgyud): sgyu ma bstan pa dang / bdag srung ba dang / gzhan srung ba dang / mi snang ba'i cho ga smra ba dang / nor bsgyur ba smra ba dang / sa gzhi smra ba dang / rgyu ba dang / na mkha' la 'gro ba dang / chu
352b2(rgyud): rgal ba dang / me dang chu dang / dug dang / mtshon cha las rgal ba dang / rmongs byed dang / rmugs byed dang / rengs byed dang / bcing ba dang / rgya mtsho chen po bskyod pa dang / ro
352b3(rgyud): langs bslang ba dang / shi ba gso ba dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dbab pa dang / dgug pa dang / bden pa bstan pa dang / nad la sogs pa thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang / dgos pa
352b4(rgyud): thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dgug par dang / srin po dgug pa dang / klu dang / lha dgug pa dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dgug
352b5(rgyud): pa dang / btang ba dang / dgos pa la sogs pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// dran pa tsam gyi mod la/ dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// las thad
352b6(rgyud): byed par 'gyuraro// bklags pa tsam gyis las dang / dngos grub dang / sgrub pa thams cad ston par 'gyur/ phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshegs dang / 
352b7(rgyud): 'thab pa dang / brtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / sdang ba'i sems can thams cad phyir bzlog par 'gyur ro// dran pa tsam gyis mchog tu 'grub par 'gyur te/ skal pa ngan
352b8(rgyud): pa dang / nor chud zab dang / mi 'grub pa dang / sdig pa'i rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / sgrub pa dang / sdig pa gzhig par bya ba la mchog tu grub pa yin no// 
353a1(rgyud): po'i rgyal po'i zhabs nas bzung ste/ bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas na sngon bsags pa'i bsod nams dang bskal pa mngon du 'gyur te/ tshe'i
353a2(rgyud): mthar thug gi bar du dpal chen po dang / che ba nyams su myong bar 'gyuraro// zhal du bltas te bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas na dbang phyug chen po'i dngos grub thob par
353a3(rgyud): 'gyuraro// rkeng pa'i gnas nas bzung ste/ bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas na sngon gyi tshe rabs rjesu dran par 'gyur/ rgyal po btsun mo dang / 'khor dang bcas pa rnams
353a4(rgyud): dbang du gyur nas gnas te/ bdag nyid dang nor gyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas par 'gyuraro// cod pan la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongasu bzlas te/ khro
353a5(rgyud): bo'i rgyal po'i dbu la bcings na nges par dbang bskur ba/ 'thob par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tsom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// 'phags pa don yod pa'o// 
353a6(rgyud): zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// // bam po nyi shu gcig pa// de nas phyag na rdo rje don yod pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul gyi 'khor gyi
353a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor der na mkha' las babs nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i mdun du bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po dang / bkur sti mngon du bya ste/ bcom
353a8(rgyud): ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas phyag 'tshal te
353b1(rgyud): song nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang na ba der logasu song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
353b2(rgyud): chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la lha rdzas kyi mchod pa chen pos mchod pa byas so// me tog dang / bdug spos dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gos
353b3(rgyud): dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod nas lan bdun bskor ba byas so// ri po Ta la'i gzhal med khang na gnas pa'i lha
353b4(rgyud): dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto'aphya/ chen po de dag gis kyang mchod pa byas so// dkyil
353b5(rgyud): 'khor gyi lha de dag la yang mchod pa byas so// 'khor che/ na po de dag la yang mchod pa byas so// lhan ci ga lhags pa'i 'khor de dag thams cad la yang mchod
353b6(rgyud): pa dang / mngon du bstod pa dang / phyag byas nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje yud tsam zhig cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na
353b7(rgyud): rdo rje 'gying bag can/ brjid bag gi 'gros kyis langs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logasu song ste phyin nas rdo rje gsor zhing bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
353b8(rgyud): bskor ba byas nas zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
354a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag gyis pa
354a2(rgyud): rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo 'di shin tu zab pa/ shin tu rtogs par dka' brgya mtsho chen po lta bur shin tu zab pa/ ri rab chen po lta bur shin tu mi g.yo
354a3(rgyud): zhing mi skul ba/ mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba/ shin tu bzung bar dka' ba'i phyag rgya mang po dang / gsang sngags mang po dang / dkyil 'khor sgrub pa mang po dang / ri mor sku
354a4(rgyud): gzugs bri ba ma po dang / sgrub pa gsang ba rnam pa mang po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa/ mang po dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
354a5(rgyud): phyug gi rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa glags pas 'a/ grub par 'gyur ba mang po la bcom ldan 'das bdag mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur na ji ltar sgrub par
354a6(rgyud): rngo thogs/ ji ltar nges par gzung ba rje thogs lags/ gsang sngags tha dad pa dang / phyag rgya tha dad pa dang / dkyil 'khor sgrub pa tha dad pa dang / ras kyi ri mo'i sku gzugs
354a7(rgyud): tha dad pa dang / gtor ma tha dad pa dang / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil dang / spyan drang ba dang / gshegs
354a8(rgyud): su gsol ba dang / dgug pa dang / dam tshig dang / khrus dang / bsnyung ba dang / phyag rgya bcing ba dang / rab tu 'jug pa dang / bzlas brjod dang / sbyin sreg dang / slar gash+ye
354b1(rgyud): su gsol ba 'am/ nges par bzung ba 'am/ dran par bgyi bar rngo thog/ bcom ldan 'das rmongs pa chen po sems kyi spyod pa rmugs par gyur pa'i rigs kyi bu rnams/ rigs kyi
354b2(rgyud): bu mo rnams dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ rig sngags
354b3(rgyud): sam/ rig sngags 'chang de rnams kyis don yod pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po 'dis nges par gzung bar ji ltar rngo thog/ rig sngags 'chang de rnams kyis ji ltar sgrub par
354b4(rgyud): rngo thog/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis snying la mchog tu ya mtshan skyes pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis the tsom bcad pa'i slad du bka' stsal du gsol/ btsa
354b5(rgyud): ldan 'das the tsom bcad pa'i slad du zhus pa lung bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga shegs pa shAkya thub pas/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon
354b6(rgyud): chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje dngos grub kyi spyod pa gsang ba rnam pa sna tshogs gsang sngags sgrub pa po sgrub pa la gang gi tshe dngos grub las
354b7(rgyud): dbugs phyung ba de yi tshe blo gros chen po'i chen por 'bogs par 'gyur/ dngos grub chen po'i 'grub par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i chen po rab tu skye bar
354b8(rgyud): 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po'i chen po dang / ldan par 'gyur/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi dngos grub chen po'i chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom
355a1(rgyud): ldan 'das dngos grub gang gis sgrub pa'i cho ga dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ba'i dngos grub dam pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
355a2(rgyud): stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje gang la yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam gyi byang chub kyis sa bon gyi 'bras bu thob pa yod pa de la lag na rdo rje dngos grub dam pa mchog tu 'gyuraro// lag na rdo rje
355a3(rgyud): rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu me 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs
355a4(rgyud): sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan yang su yang rung ba dbud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo gang do gi lag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i ring bsrel
355a5(rgyud): yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam cig thob par gyur la des ring bsrel de za ma tog gi nang du bcug ste nyin gci ga bzhin du mchod pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / khrus
355a6(rgyud): la sogs pa byed cing bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dngal phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis mchod pa byed na/ lag na rdo rje rig
355a7(rgyud): sngags 'chang de dngos grub dam pa dang / mchog dang / bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du dgos par sbyar ba de dang der dngos grub chen po mchog tu 'gyur ro// / 
355a8(rgyud): ring bsrel yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam gcig la mchod pa byas pa rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge sbyong ngamatsha ma 5/ dmangs rigs sam// gzhan bu
355b1(rgyud): med dam/ skyes pa 'am khye'u 'am/ bu mo de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang ga'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa la skad cig gcig gis mchod pa byas
355b2(rgyud): par 'gyur/ brjed pa dang / gus pa dang / bstod pa dang / phyag byas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par 'gyur/ de dag gis drung du bso// 
355b3(rgyud): nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi drung du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ 
355b4(rgyud): dge bsnyen ma 'am/ gzhan gang su yang rung ba/ dge sbyong ngangam bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rig/ sa sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ skyes pa 'am/ bud
355b5(rgyud): med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis byurlabs par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan pa
355b6(rgyud): 'gyuraro// shes rab dang thabs la mkhas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang chen po'i dngos grub dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i
355b7(rgyud): cho ga zhib mo'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags kyi dngos grub dpag tu med pa thob par 'gyuraro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa'
355b8(rgyud): thams cad kyis phyag byas pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po'i rig sngags rim par phye ba'i dngos grub dpag tu med pa 'thob par 'gyuraro// 
356a1(rgyud): lag na rdo rje de ltar ring bsrel yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam gcig la mchod pa byed pa de yon yo chen por brjod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyis brlabs
356a2(rgyud): kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin 'thob par yang dag par 'gyuraro// de ltar dngos grub chen po 'thob par 'gyuraro// de lta mod kyi lag na rdo rje khyod song la byang chub sems dpa'
356a3(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la yongasu dris shig/ dris pa de'i lan ldon par 'gyuraro// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo/ 
356a4(rgyud): rje dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yid rangs pa dang / rab ba tu dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas bcom lda dan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// / 
356a5(rgyud): song nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang na bde log su song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
356a6(rgyud): dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bzhin 'dzum pa dang / gdong khro gnyer
356a7(rgyud): med pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mig mi 'dzum par blta zhing 'bogs pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du 'dug nas rdo rje gsor zhing
356a8(rgyud): gdong du bltas te rtog cing 'dug go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po
356b1(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// lag na rdo rje khyod mi g.yo bar mdun du 'dug te rdo rje gsor zhing ngal ci zhig blta/ ci zhig yongasu dri bar 'dod/ ci zhig gsol ba 'debs
356b2(rgyud): par 'dod/ lag na rdo rje deng la smros shig/ lag na rdo rje khyod la skabs phyes yongasu dris shig dang / dris pa de thams cad lung bstan pas/ khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// 
356b3(rgyud): de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom
356b4(rgyud): ldan 'das don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhi dab mo shin tu rtogs par dka' ba shin tu zab pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ 
356b5(rgyud): rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gsang sngags mang po nga / phyag rgya mang po dang / dkyil 'khor sgrub pa ma nga po dang / ras kyi sku gzugs brib mang po yongasu bsgrag
356b6(rgyud): pa'adi bcom ldan 'das ji ltar nges par gzung bar nus/ dngos grub ji ltar shes par bgyi/ rgya mtsho chen po ltar zab che ba/ ri rab dang / mtshungs par mi g.yo ba/ nam mkha' ltar
356b7(rgyud): mthar thug ma mchis pa/ shin tu rtogs par dka' ba/ 'di ji ltar shes par bgyi/ gnas ni gang / 'gro ba ni gang / 'byung ba ni gang / sgrub pa'i gnas ni gang / dngos grub dam/ 
356b8(rgyud): pa'i gnas ni gang / snga ma ni gang / phyi ma ni gang / dbus ni gang / tha ma ni gang lags// mang du yongs su zhu'o// dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang / gsang sngags
357a1(rgyud): dang / sgrub pa'i cho ga dang / dam tshig so so tha dad pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gidon yod pa'i rgyal
357a2(rgyud): bopo chen po'i cho ga zhib mo// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po rim par phye ste rjesu gzung ba de nges par gzung bar
357a3(rgyud): ji ltar nus/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi the tsom chen po dang / mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur pa de thugs rje chen pos bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ ji ltar grub na phyag rgya dang
357a4(rgyud): gsang sngags dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang / ras kyi ri mo'i cho ga mtha' dag nges par bzung bar 'gyur ba/ the tsom bcad pa'i slad du'o// sems
357a5(rgyud): dpa' chen pos bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gos gnod sbyin gyi
357a6(rgyud): sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// lag na rdo rje yun ring po gcig nas spobs pa gang zhig skyes te/ ngal yongasu 'dris/ lag na rdo rje nyon cig dang bsha
357a7(rgyud): par bya'o// gang yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing thams cad kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni kha dog gcig pa/ rtags gcig pa chos gcig la zhugs pa/ 
357a8(rgyud): dbyings dang / khams dang / snying po gcig pa sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba gcig pa'o// de lta mod kyi lag na rdo rje gang 'das pa dang / ma
357b1(rgyud): byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs pa nyid dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / 
357b2(rgyud): sku tshe'i 'du byed sna tshogs pa nyid dang / sems can yongasu smin par mdzad pa sna tshogs pa nyid dang / lung bstan pa sna tshogs pa nyid dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi
357b3(rgyud): dge 'dun sna tshogs pa nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs sna tshogs pa nyid dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi sku tha dad pa nyid du yang dag par shes so// de lta mod kyi
357b4(rgyud): lag na rdo rje de bzhin du 'phags pa spyan ras gzi dgas dbang phyug gi snying po don yod pa'i zhags pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ 
357b5(rgyud): rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di yang gcig nyid las de thams cad rje su 'gro'o// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyis rnam par
357b6(rgyud): 'phrul pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub kyi gnas dang / sems can yongasu smin par byed pa'i gnas/ bsam pa yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa la ji lta ji ltar dul bar byed
357b7(rgyud): pa de lta de ltar dngos grub rje su 'thob cing de lta de ltar bsam pa dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// de lta de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba chen pos bskyed par 'gyuraro// de lta de ltar bsod nams
357b8(rgyud): kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyuraro// de lta de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyuraro// de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i yul la rnam par
358a1(rgyud): 'phrul pa sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang ldan par 'gyuraro// de lta de ltar gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin yongasu dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// 
358a2(rgyud): de ltar dpa' bar 'gro ba'i tong nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro// rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa spong ba'i
358a3(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'thar pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba spong
358a4(rgyud): pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / stobs bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos la rnam par blta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lag na rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma
358a5(rgyud): med pa'i 'byung gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par sna nga mdzad kyi snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyi ma rab tu grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin po che'i snying po ting
358a6(rgyud): nge 'dzin dang / zla ba'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu blta ba'i 'od zer gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
358a7(rgyud): spyi gtsug la rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yul la rnam par 'phrul pa kun tu bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgron ma 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chags pa med de
358a8(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i 'byung gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ 
358b1(rgyud): dang / shin tu rab tu sangs rgyas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas dkyil 'khor 'gro ba yong su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyi ma kun tu lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yid gnyis
358b2(rgyud): yang dag par 'joms pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu phyag rgya'i rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas dkyil 'khor yongasu dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid la/ 
358b3(rgyud): kun tu lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dkyil 'khor yongasu dag pa yang dag par 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu lta ba'i 'od zer gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / pad+ma bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin
358b4(rgyud): dang / don yod pa kun tu lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu don yod pa dri ma med pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge
358b5(rgyud): 'dzin dang / rgya chen po dbugs 'byin pa don yod paran po che'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dpung brgyan gyis ting 'dzin dang / dpung rgyan gyi rgyal mtshan gyi ting nge 'dzin
358b6(rgyud): dang / rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ting nge 'dzin dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / pad+ma'i lcags
358b7(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas 'dren pa'i lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa'i 'od zer gyi lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun
358b8(rgyud): tu lta ba'i gzi brjid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rtogs pa dri ma med pa thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu lta ba rab tu gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs
359a1(rgyud): pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi gtso bo lnga bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag 'thob par 'gyur te/ ting nge 'dzin re re la yang 'khor byed pa brgyad stong phrag gang+gA'i klu
359a2(rgyud): gi bye ma dang mnyam pa de thams cad rje su 'thob par 'gyuraro// lag na rdo rje don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par 'phrul par 'di'i byin gyis brlabs kyis kyang don yod pa'i zhags/ 
359a3(rgyud): pa'i snying po klog pa dang / 'chang ba dang / brjod pa dang / sgrub pa dang / phyag rgya 'ching bas yon tan de dag 'thob par 'gyuraro// lag na rdo rje don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'chang ba
359a4(rgyud): dang / brjod pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum dran par byed lag na rdo rje sems can de dngos grub don yod pa 'thob par
359a5(rgyud): 'gyur te/ rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa lta ba don yod pa 'thob pa dang / gzu ngas don yod 'thob pa dang / ting nge 'dzin don yod pa 'thob
359a6(rgyud): pa dang / bsod nams sogs pa don yod pa 'thob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yul la rnam par 'phrul pa
359a7(rgyud): don yod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs pa don yod pa dang / byang chub kyi snying
359a8(rgyud): por 'gro ba don yod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba don yod pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas su 'gro bdon yod pa dang / blo rgyas pa don yod pa dang / shes rab zab mo rnam
359b1(rgyud): par 'phel ba don yod pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yong su rdzogs pa don yod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang / rim gro dang / bla ma la gus par bya ba don yod/ 
359b2(rgyud): pa de yi phyir lag na rdo rje don yod pa'i zhags pa zhes mang du gdags pa byas pa na lag na rdo rje rig sngags 'chang rnams la ji ltar rmongs pa skye ba 'gyur sems 'khrug par 'gyur// dran
359b3(rgyud): pa dang blo gros rmongs par 'gyur te/ de'i gnas na mi snang na su zhig smras par nus/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes ni don yod pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes
359b4(rgyud): gang yin pa de don yod pa zhags pa'i ming du dmigs so// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes ni don yo/ dad pa ste/ ye shes don yod pa gang yin pa de don yod pa'i
359b5(rgyud): zhags pa'i snying po'i ming du dmig so// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/ po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rnam pa
359b6(rgyud): 'phrul ba'i don yod pa ste/ sgyu ma lta bu gang yin pa de don yod pa'i zhags pa'o// ye shes gang yin pa de zhags pa'o// de'i snying po'o// snying po gang yin pa de don yod pa'i zhags bI/ 
359b7(rgyud): snying po ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po zhes don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i ming du dmig so// gang yid
359b8(rgyud): la sems pa dang / gang don du gnyer ba de thams cad 'dren par 'gyur/ 'gugs par 'gyur/ len par 'gyur te/ shin tu ring po nas kyang ye shes kyi zhags pas 'gugs par
360a1(rgyud): 'gyuraro// lag na rdo rje de bas na do don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snang po'i mang dung dmag so// lag na rdo rje gang gis ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob pa de la ji ltar rmongs pa skye
360a2(rgyud): 'gyur/ blo dman par 'gyur te gnas 'di ni mi snang ngo // lag na rdo rje gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo du ma 'thob ste/ gang gis gzungs 'thob pa des don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i
360a3(rgyud): cho ga zhib mo 'di'i gsang sngags mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / dkyil 'khor kha ton nyid du gnas te/ thams
360a4(rgyud): cad so sor yang dag par shes so// 'di lta ste don yo pa'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i pad+ma'i
360a5(rgyud): lcags kyu zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod par rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs dang / 
360a6(rgyud): don yod pa lhun po'i snying po yangs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa dri ma med pa'i pad+ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i 'od zer rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs
360a7(rgyud): dang / don yod pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'od zer zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i phyag rgya zhes
360a8(rgyud): bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod par rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa yangs pa snang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / 
360b1(rgyud): don yod pa'i dngos grub ces bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa dri ma med pa'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i blo rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod
360b2(rgyud): pa'i 'bar ba'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dkyil
360b3(rgyud): 'khor gsang ba don yod pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'thob ste/ gang gis gzungs de rnam thos pa tsam gyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
360b4(rgyud): kyis phyag byas pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi/ phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba'i dkyi/ dal 'khor mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang / gsang sngags dang
360b5(rgyud): cho ga dang / cho ga zhib mo rgya chen po kha ton gnas shing thams cad so sor yang dag par shes te/ gang gi sa mthu 'di rab tu thob pa'i rmongs pa skyes par 'gyur// 
360b6(rgyud): dran pa nyams par mi 'gyur/ dran pa zhan par mi 'gyur/ dran pa rmugs par mi 'gyur/ dran pa 'khums par mi 'gyur/ dran pa mi brtan par mi 'gyur/ dran pa gzhan du rgyu bar
360b7(rgyud): mi 'gyur/ 'dod chags dang // zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / ser sna dang / phrag dog gi rje su 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ dran pa sdig pa can du mi 'gyuraro// 'dron pa 'jig
360b8(rgyud): rten pa'i mi dge ba byed par mi 'gyur te/ rtag tu blo yangs shing rab tu gsal bar 'gyuraro// rtag tu mi nyam pa dang mnyam pa'i dran pa dang / blo rgya mtsho lta bur 'gyur ro// rtag tu dran
361a1(rgyud): bzab cing rgya mtsho chen po bsags pa lta bur 'gyuraro// lag na rdo rje don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i gzungs cho ga zhing mo'i rgyal po de ltar go skabs yangs
361a2(rgyud): la gang gis gzungs 'di thob pa de lag na rdo rje ji ltar dran pa rmongs par 'gyur/ gzhan yang tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa'i lus yongasu dag pa dang / yid yongasu dag
361a3(rgyud): pa dang / sems yongasu dag pa dang / mdangs yongasu dag pa dang / mig yongasu dag pa dang / rna ba yongs su dag pa dang / sna yongasu dag pa dang / lce yongasu dag pa 'thob par 'gyur/ 
361a4(rgyud): don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bklags pa tsam dang / mnyan pa tsam dang / mthong ba tsam dang / lhag pa'i dbasam pa tsam gyis de rnams yon tan gyi phan yon
361a5(rgyud): chen po'i 'di 'thob ste/ gang gis mthu 'di rab tu tho ba pa de la ga lag na rdo rje ji ltar rmongs pa skye bar 'gyur/ de lta mod kyi lag na rdo rje yud tsam zhig sdod
361a6(rgyud): cig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor mang po'i dbus su ji ltar mngon sum du 'gyur ba bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bab par bstan par bya'o// don yod pa'i zhags
361a7(rgyud): pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul gyi rdzu 'phrul dam pa'i yul gyi mthu
361a8(rgyud): chen po'i chen po bstan par bya'o// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
361b1(rgyud): gi drung nas don yod pa'i yon tan bkod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di dag dang / gzungs kyi sgo 'di dag mngon du thos nas dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yi rangs
361b2(rgyud): dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ snying dga' bas dga' ba chen po nyid thob par gyur nas smras pa/ bdag lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pas/ yongasu dga' ba
361b3(rgyud): yid la bgyid pas nges par gnas par bgyi'o// yid la bgyid pa mchog tu dga' ba dang / ngo mtshar du gyur pa dang / som nyid du gyur pa dang / bral ba dang / 'gyod pa ma
361b4(rgyud): mchis pas gnas par bgyi'o// rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa' thams cadakyis phyag bgyis pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
361b5(rgyud): dbang phyug gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i mthu'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'di ni mchog tu rnyed pa ra dka' ba'o// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po
361b6(rgyud): phyag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dri ma med par kun tu snang ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po chos kyi
361b7(rgyud): dga' bar phul nas rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas song ste ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod cing 'gying bag dang / brjid bag gi
361b8(rgyud): 'gros kyis song nas rang gi stan la 'dug ste/ bzhin 'dzum pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas nas snying yongasu dga' bas bcom ldan 'das la rtog cing 'dug go// de
362a1(rgyud): nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ngo mtshar mchog du rmad du byung ba/ snying rje dam pa rgya chen po'i lhag
362a2(rgyud): pa'i bsam pa'i dmigs pas/ sems can thams cad sgul ba'i phyir/ 'od zer dri ma med par snang ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po/ de phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa zad
362a3(rgyud): la phul te/ nam mkha' la 'phag so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis nor bu rin po che de na mkha'i dkyil du 'phags
362a4(rgyud): ma thag tu/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di cher g.yos par gyur to// 'od ze dar gyi snang ba chen po nyi ma bye ba brgya stong pas lhag pa'i 'od
362a5(rgyud): zer byung bar gyur to// snang ba gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad kyis lus la re ga pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad dang / dmyal ba dang / 
362a6(rgyud): yi dgas dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du ngan song gi 'gro bas yongasu grol bar gyur to// gang yang gling bzhi pa'i yi dgas dang / dmyal ba de dag
362a7(rgyud): la yang snang ba des snang bar gyur pas nyi tshe ba'i dmyal ba rnams kyi gtub pa med par gyur te/ sems can de dag kyang yongasu thar nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su
362a8(rgyud): skal ba mnyam par skyes te/ lus yongasu dag par gyur to// gang yang mnar med pa'i dmyal ba chen po bcu drug po de dag 'od zer gyi snang ba des reg pas dmyal ba de
362b1(rgyud): ngag thams cad du pad+ma'i mtsho byung bar gyur te/ sems can de dag kyang yongasu thar nas rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu skal ba mnyam par
362b2(rgyud): pad+ma las brdzus te skyes so// grang ba'i dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag kyang dro zhing bde ba dang / reg na bde bar gyur to// tsha ba'i dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag kyang bsil bar gyur cing / 
362b3(rgyud): reg na bde ba dang / rab tu dga' bar gyur to// gang yang dud 'gro'i skyes gnasu song ba ri dgas dang / bya dang / tha na sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang dag kyang 'od zer des reg pas dud 'gro'i
362b4(rgyud): skyes gnas su song ba de dag thams cad dga' ldan du lnga rnams kyi nang du skyes so// sems can ga/ nga dag bcings par gyur pa de dag kyang 'od zer des reg
362b5(rgyud): pas sems can bcings pa las yongasu grol ba gyur to// su mi 'dod pa dang / lcags sgrog dang / lcags kyu lu gu rgyud kyi bcings pa de dag kyang dum bur
362b6(rgyud): gyur to// gang snod ma yin pa de yang 'od zer des phog pas mthong ba yongasu dag pa 'thob bo// gang sha bkra dang mdze'i nad kyi lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / rna ba dang / sna tshangs pa
362b7(rgyud): yang 'od gzer des phog pas lus yongasu rdzogs pa dang / lus yongs su dag par gyur to// gang 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa dang / me tog gi shing ljon pa yongasu bskams
362b8(rgyud): par gyur pa yang 'od zer des reg pas/ me tog dang / mdab ma dang / 'bras bu byung bar gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa gang du 'od gzer bab pa'i sangs rgyas
363a1(rgyud): kyi zhing du gtogs bde na yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing so so'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya
363a2(rgyud): stong phrag gang ga'i klung gi bye ma dgu bcu rtsa dgu snyed bzhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa so so'i rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzhal med dang / seng ge'i khri dang
363a3(rgyud): bcas pa'i gzhal meng khang byung bar gyur to// nam mkha'i dkyil gang du 'od zer gyis snang bas reg pa'i nam mkha'i dkyil der yang phyogs bcu kun tu rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi
363a4(rgyud): sprin brtsegs pas khebs par gyur te/ lha rdzas kyi no// dar bu rin po che chen po sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'a dbab po// lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang / cod pan dang / dpung
363a5(rgyud): rgyan dang / gdu bu dang / do shal dang / sen do dang / rna rgya na dang / gser gyi skud pa sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab bo// tshen kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i lha rdzas
363a6(rgyud): kyi gos rmad du byung ba sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab po// lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab bo// lha rdzas kyi byugs pa sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab po// 
363a7(rgyud): lha rdzas kyi bdug pa sna tshogs dang / tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i char rab tu 'bab po// tshe na kha dog sna tshogs pa'i lha rdzas kyi gos dang / ba dan sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab
363a8(rgyud): po/ lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs pad+ma dang / ku mud dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / ud pa la sngon po dang / pa ru sha ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / a d+hi muk+ta ka dang / a sho ka dang / s+ya/ 
363b1(rgyud): snar dang / ka dam pa dang / man dar ba dang / man da ra ba chen po'i me tog gi char rab tu babs te/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las byed do// 
363b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i yang rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa yang dag par gnas par gyur te/ gru bzhi pa ka bzhi dang / sgo bzhi dang ldan pa shin tu 'bar ba/ 
363b3(rgyud): lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs la lan kan gyis yongasu bskor cing mu tig gi dra ba sna tshogs kyos rgyan pa gser gyi dril bu sna tshogs 'phyang ba gos sna tshogs kyi phreng bas mdze/ 
363b4(rgyud): par byas pa/ chu shing gi rgyal mtshan sna tshogs sgreng ba/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs bkram pa/ grur lha rdzas kyi rnga yab sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas/ go skabs
363b5(rgyud): rgya che ba'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'byung zhing / snang ngo // na mkha'i dkyil na yang lha rnam lha rdza sa kyi me tog dang / gdug spos dang / dri dang / phreng ba
363b6(rgyud): dang phyug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rol me'i sgra sna tshogs dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pas bcom ldan 'das
363b7(rgyud): mchod pa byed cing 'khod de/ de ltar don yod pa'i cho 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin brlabs gyis brlabs rmad du byung ba chen po'i chen po rab tu bstan cing ya mtshan rmad
363b8(rgyud): du byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i chen por bstan to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
364a1(rgyud): phyug gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul 'di bstan nas rnam par 'phrul pa'i bkod pa chen pos rang gi stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das
364a2(rgyud): ga la bde log su song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon du bltas nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ 
364a3(rgyud): dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
364a4(rgyud): 'das bdag la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam/  par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems da dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ phyag rgya dang / 
364a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba/ gsang sngags kyi snying po gsang ba rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po bdag gi snying po gsang ba/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod
364a6(rgyud): po'i lcags kyu dang / don yod pa'i khro bo'i lcags kyu dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod par 'dren pa nor bu rin po che chen po gsum mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag
364a7(rgyud): gis de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor mang po'i nang du yongasu skrag par bgyi'o// gang gis dran pa tsam gyis don yod pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo phyag rgya dang / dkyil
364a8(rgyud): 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / cho ga rim par phye ba mtha' dag rdzogs par mngon du gnas par 'gyur te/ thams cad so so nyid du gnaso// gsang sngags 'dis gzir
364b1(rgyud): bas thams cad du mngon du gnaso// de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la leg so zhes
364b2(rgyud): bya ba byin te/ sems can dag pa chen po khyod kyis spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod pa'i lcags kyu smras pa leg so leg so// rig sngags
364b3(rgyud): 'chang thams cad kyi don dang / sems can thams cad kyi don chen po'i phyir sems can dag pa chen po khyod kyis de yi dus la bab par shes na da smros shig/ de nas byang
364b4(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul bar rig nas bzhin 'dzum zhing mig
364b5(rgyud): mi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logasu mngon du phyogs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis smra/ na sder 'khor mang po'i nang du 'phags pa spyan ras
364b6(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i lcags kyu don yod pa'i zhags pa 'di smras so// dus gsum du gshegs shing so so na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub
364b7(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin rig sngags kyi dbang po chen po 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshalo// dkyil 'khor gyi rig
364b8(rgyud): sngags kyi lha thams cad dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos
365a1(rgyud): kyi dge 'dun 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa dga' ldan gyi byang chub sems
365a2(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor gyi tshogs la phyag 'tshalo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med bde ba can na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen
365a3(rgyud): po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs la phyag 'tshalo// phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang / dkyil 'khor gsang ba dang / phyag rgya
365a4(rgyud): rim par phye ba cho ga zhib mo dang bcas pa thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// dkon mchog gsum la phyaga'atshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
365a5(rgyud): po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras ga/ zigs dbang phyug rig sngags dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sku sems can thams cad
365a6(rgyud): la byams pa kun nas don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rig sngags kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / sdang ba dang / bdud la sogs pa thams
365a7(rgyud): cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa'i sems dpa' chen po mchog sbyin lcag kyu la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ oM A kaR+Sha ya/ pad+ma hasta/ ma hA a mo gA aM ku shi/ tsa ra tsa ra/ 
365a8(rgyud): tsa tsa ra/ saM tsa ra/ sa man+te na/ ma hA pA sha/ aM ku sha/ b+hu dza ba ra da b+hu dza a ku sha pA sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa man+ta mu dra/ man+ta muN+Da la/ ba Ta la/ d+ha ra aM ku sha/ pA she na/ 
365b1(rgyud): d+ha rA ya/ hUM hUM ma hA brah+ma/ beSha d+ha ra/ a mo g+ha rU pa/ aM ku sha d+ha ra/ ta ra ta ra/ ta ta ra/ sa man+t+ra rA ya/ ma hA mu dra/ maN+Da la/ a mo g+ha aM ku sha ba ra nga / ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ tri la
365b2(rgyud): tsa na/ pa shu pa ti/ be sha d+ha ra/ I shwa ra ma he shwa ra/ pa ra ma kA ru Ni ka/ ma hA b+hu taM/ shwa ra ya ma ba ru Na/ na ma skr-i ta/ ku mA ra/ tai lo kya ba rad ma hA ka sha ma ka/ shA sa ka/ rak+Sha/ 
365b3(rgyud): ka/ ma hA bid+yA/ a mo g+ha/ maN+Da la/ pU dzi ta/ rat+na ma ku Ta/ mA lA d+ha ra/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ma hA aM ku sha a k+Sha d+ha ra hUM hUM/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra/ sa man+ta mu tra meN+Da la pU ra/ 
365b4(rgyud): ya/ hUM hUM/ hr-i da ya aM ku shi/ a ba laM kA ya/ men sA/ da d+ha ya sid d+hi ra/ A kaR+Sha ya mu dra man+ta/ maN+Da la/ pa Ta laM/ big+h+nAn pra sA d+ha ya mA raM/ ha ra ha ra/ sarba pA/ 
365b5(rgyud): pa kil+li Shi ma la/ mAd sar+ya/ hu ru hu ru/ ma hA a ku shi hU hU/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ tu ru turu/ ma hA bo d+ha satwa aM ku sha rat+na pA sha d+ha ra/ nA nA
365b6(rgyud): bi tsi tra/ A b+ha ra Na bi b+hu Shi ta/ a mi tA b+hU/ dzaM na ma ku Ta d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ pad+ma pA sha aM ku sha d+ha ra/ sarba bi d+yA man+ta mu tra maN+Da la/ pra ba ra sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ bi shwa ru be
365b7(rgyud): d+ha ra/ sa ha sra b+hu dza/ sa ha sra ne tra/ so so ma mu kha pa ra ma kA ru Ni ka satwa bta sa la/ sarba man+ta mu dra pra sa ha ka/ pade ma ba ra da sa twa na mo stu te/ a mo g+ha a ku sha/ pad+ma b+hu dza
365b8(rgyud): swAhA// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di smras ma thag tu ri bo po Ta le chen po brag dang / nags tshal dang
366a1(rgyud): bskyed mos tshal du bcas pa'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/ lha rdzas kyi me tog gi char chen po 'bab bo// don yod pa'i nan
366a2(rgyud): pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor rim par
366a3(rgyud): phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo 'di yang so sor le'ur phye ba mtha' dag rdzogs par na mkha' la gnas so// gang gsang sngags kyi yig 'bru yang gser la bai DUr+ya sa yi ger bris
366a4(rgyud): pa sprin gyis rim pa na snang ste/ yi ge'i phreng ba mnyam zhe/ dang gsal la zur phyin par bris pa/ thig gi phreng dbag shibs pas rgyan pa snang ngo // gang lag pa'i
366a5(rgyud): phyag rgya yang pad+ma'i nang nas byung ba/ phyag rgya bcing ba sna tshogs 'od zer 'bar ba na mkha' la gnas so// gang mtshan ma'i phyag rgya yang rin po che sna bdun
366a6(rgyud): gyi pad+ma la rab tu gnas pa'i na mkha' la gnas par gyur to// gang ras kyi ri mo'i sku gzugs/ gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs 'dzin pa/ rnam par bkra ba/ cho ga dang / ye/ 
366a7(rgyud): byad dang bcas pa rim par phye ba bris pa yang na mkha' la gnas so// gang dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba de dkyil 'khor rnam pa sna tshogs gru bzhi pa/ gru bzhi cha mnyam
366a8(rgyud): pa rnam par phye ba/ dkyil 'khor shin tu spras shing rgyan pa/ gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mdzes pa'i gzhal med khang yang na mkha' la gnas pa'o// dkyil
366b1(rgyud): 'khor chen po na gnas pa'i rig sngags kyi lnga pho nya dang / khro bo dang bcas pa gzhal med khang na rje su rgyu bdag kyang na mkha'i dkyil na gnas te/ bcom ldan 'das la
366b2(rgyud): mchod pa byed do// phyogs so so'i de bzhin gshegs pa mang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang phyogs bcu kun gyi na mkha'i dkyil na de bzhin
366b3(rgyud): gshegs pa'i sku bzhugs par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs po'i sku de dag thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan
366b4(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ spya na ras gzigs dbang phyug leg so legaso// rig sngags kyi mchog dam pa/ don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i
366b5(rgyud): rig sngags kyi rgyal po mtha' dag rdzogs par smras pa/ gang gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mor gas
366b6(rgyud): sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba de dag thams cad don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i gsang sngags kyi zhags pas kun nas drangaso// 'khor 'di'i nang na nam
366b7(rgyud): mkha'i dkyil na rab tu gnas pa de phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ 
366b8(rgyud): dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan su yang rung ba bud med dam/ skyes pa'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo rig sngags 'dzin
367a1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i gzungs 'di dran par byed na lan gcig dran pa tsam
367a2(rgyud): gyis kyang mod la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po rnam par thar pa'i
367a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo de thams cad so sor de la kha ton nyid du gnas te/ de dag thams cad rim
367a4(rgyud): gyis dran pa dang / blo rgya mtsho bsags pa dang / shes rab 'phel bar 'gyuraro// gsang sngags dang / phya dag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba so so la blo
367a5(rgyud): 'jug par 'gyuraro// nam yang blo dman par mi 'gyur/ zhing nam yang brjed ngas par mi 'gyur ro// de nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub
367a6(rgyud): pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ mchog chen po sbyin pa/ lag na pad+ma mchog tu
367a7(rgyud): snying rje can khyod kyis cho ga rgya chen po smras pa leg so leg so// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul gyi yon tan
367a8(rgyud): mtha' yas pa 'di mthong nas dbugs cher 'byin par gyur cing mchog tu dga' ba thob bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
367b1(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor 'di'i nang du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i bya ba'i yo byad dang cho ga
