367b2(rgyud): bshad do// bcom ldan 'das de nas rig sngags 'chang gang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po don yod pa'i zhags pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad/ 
367b3(rgyud): kyis phyag bgyis pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di sgrub par 'tshal ba dang / gang yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong pa'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge
367b4(rgyud): bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram da ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dam dngas rigs sam/ gzhan su yang rung ba bud med dam/ 
367b5(rgyud): skyes pa 'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'am/ don yod pa'izhags pa'i snying po 'di klag par 'tshal ba dang / bstan par 'tshal ba dang / bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bgyi
367b6(rgyud): bar 'tshal ba dang / mtha' dag rdzogs par sgrub par 'tshal ba des sngon rol tu phyogs bcur thal mo sbyar te/ phyag 'tshal nas shar phyogasu kha bltas te mchis la gzhan
367b7(rgyud): mi smra bar don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i snying po 'di lan gsum dran par bgyi zhing / yang thal mo sbyar te phyag bgyi'o// des na dran pa tsam gyi mod la byang chub sems dpa' sems/ 
367b8(rgyud): dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bkug par 'gyur te/ ri bo po Ta la'i gzhal med khang dang bcas pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang lha dang / klu
368a1(rgyud): dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang bcas pa bkug par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa don
368a2(rgyud): yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// // bam po nyi shu gnyis pa// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ 
368a3(rgyud): rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang / bcas pa gsang sngags rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo dang / sgrub pa'i cho ga'i rnam pa rgya chen po mtha' dag rdzogs pa 'di yang
368a4(rgyud): bkug par 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor gnas pa'i rig sdugs kyi lha 'khor dang bcas pa bkug par 'gyur te/ thams cad yid rab tu dga' bar gyur pas dngos
368a5(rgyud): grub dam pa rje su stsol bar 'gyur ro// de nas don yod pa rgyal po'i snying po dran par bgyi ste/ ji ltar shin tu rgya cher yid la bgyis pa de ltar sgrub par 'gyur ro// / 
368a6(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid kyi kha nas dran pa mnyan zhing rgya che ba dang / blo dang mdangs dri ma ma mchis pa 'jug par bgyid de/ zhugs pa tsam gyi mod la lce
368a7(rgyud): pad+ma'i mdab ma lta bur 'jam par 'gyur zhing / kha nas ud pa la'i dri 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dbyangs snyan cing mnyen pa dang / 'jam pa dang / zab pa dang / tshig rnam par dag par
368a8(rgyud): 'gyuraro// mi 'am ci'i dbyangs dang / sgra snyan pa dang / dbyangs mnyen pa dang / dga' bar byed pa'i dbyangasu 'gyur zhing ka la bang ka'i dbyangasu 'gyur ro// ji ste dus gsum du dran
368b1(rgyud): par bgyid na/ gsang sngags dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang / cho ga thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs spya
368b2(rgyud): dngos grub de rdzogs par 'gyur zhing spyod par 'gyur ro// bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / bdud la sogs pa sdang ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyuraro// sngon gyi
368b3(rgyud): sgrib pa dang / dmyal bar mchi ba'i sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po// rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po don yod
368b4(rgyud): pa'i lcags kyu 'di lan gsum dran par bgyis pa tsam gyis skad cig de nyid kyi mad la bdag rang dang / rang gi gnas kyi khang pa dang / slob ma dang / bsnyen bkur
368b5(rgyud): dang / 'khor dang bcas pa mi gtsang ba yang gtsang bar 'gyur/ yongasu ma dag pa yang shin tu yongasu da ga par 'gyuraro// dri ma dang bcas pa yang shin tu
368b6(rgyud): dri ma ma mchis par 'gyuraro// zhe sdang dang bcas pa yang zhe sdang dang bral bar 'gyur ro// gti mug dang bcas pa yang gti mug dang bral bar 'gyur ro// 'dod chags dang
368b7(rgyud): bcas pa yang 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyuraro// sgrib pa dang bcas pa yang sgrib pa dang bral bar 'gyuraro// bgegs dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang log 'dren gyis yod/ 
368b8(rgyud): su zin pa yang / bgegs dang log 'dren dang / bdud la sogs pa dang / bral bar 'gyur ro// sems kyi sdig pa yang sdig pa dang bral bar 'gyuraro// thun mongs ma yin pa ya
369a1(rgyud): thun mongs du gyur cing srung bar 'gyuraro// mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs ma mchis pa yang mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs chen po dang ldan par 'gyuraro// bsrung ba ma bgyis pa
369a2(rgyud): bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyuraro// rig sngags kyi gnas dang yul dang dkyil 'khor thams cad du tshangs par mi spyod pa yang tshangs par spyod pa chen por 'gyuraro// tshangs pa'i
369a3(rgyud): gnas chen po la gnas par 'gyur ro// dge ba mi spyod pa yang dge ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// chos mi spyod pa yang chos spyod pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyuraro// bsod nams mi
369a4(rgyud): bgyid pa yang bsod nams kyi phung po 'phel bar 'gyur// / dul ba'i spyod pa ma mchis pa yang dul ba'i spyod pa/  chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor dang phyag
369a5(rgyud): rgya dang / gsang sngags mi mthong ba dang / dam tshig ma mchis pa yang dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags mthong ba dang / dam tshig 'tshal bar
369a6(rgyud): 'gyuraro// rig sngags kyi gnas dang / 'khor thams cad du sangs rgyas dang / chos mthong bar mi 'tshol ba yang byang chub dang / chos dang / dam tshig dang ldan par 'gyur ro// byang
369a7(rgyud): chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ma bsams pa yang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bsams par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas kyi sa bon gyi yul du ma gyur pa yang byang
369a8(rgyud): chub kyi sa bon dang ldan par 'gyuraro// pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi spyod pa dang mi 'bral zhing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs par bgyi ba la mkhas par 'gyuraro// tshul khrim
369b1(rgyud): dang mi 'bral zhing ting nge 'dzin rab tu 'thob par 'gyuraro// sbyin pa dang yongasu gtong ba dang mi 'bral zhing / sbyin pa dang / yongasu gtong ba dang / sbyin pa'i tshogs chen po dang ldan par
369b2(rgyud): 'gyuraro// bzod pa dang / mi 'bral zhing bzod pa chen po'i bzod pa'i rje su spyod par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus dang mi 'bral zhing brtson 'grus kyi stobs chen po'i go cha bstan pa
369b3(rgyud): bgos par 'gyuraro// bsam gtan dang mi 'bral zhing bsam gtan chen po 'thob pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang ldan par 'gyuraro// shes rab dang thabs la mkhas pa rgya chen por
369b4(rgyud): 'gyuraro// rig sngags dang / gsang sngags nyam+ba pa ya dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya yongasu tshang ba dang / cho ga la mkhas par 'gyuraro// dge ba'i bshes
369b5(rgyud): gnyen dang bral ba yang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen chenapo'i lam la rab tu gnas par 'grub par 'gyuraro// 'jig rten thams cad du snying du sdug pa dang / bla
369b6(rgyud): mar bgyis par 'gyuraro// sems can thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / mngon du phyag bgyi bar 'gyuraro// tshig brdzun par 'gyuraro// bsam pa yongasu dag par yang 'gyur// 
369b7(rgyud): de ltar don yod pa chen po'i cho ga rgya chen po 'di dag ni thams cad du dngos grub don yod pa/ mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba/ dge ba don yod pa 'di don yod pa'i lcags kyus
369b8(rgyud): 'dren par bgyid do// dngos grub thams cad 'gugs par bgyid do// sgrub pa thams cad 'dren par bgyid ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ji snyed pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i stong/ 
370a1(rgyud): bcu dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang / 
370a2(rgyud): dag pa'i mtha' dang / don dam pa dang / stong pa nyid 'dren par bgyid de don yod pa'i lcags kyus 'dis 'dren par bgyid/ yangs par bgyid/ dngos grub mchog 'dren par bgyi/ 
370a3(rgyud): do// de ltar mthu che ba dang / phan yon che ba dang / yon tan chen por brjod pas/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu chen po stsol bar bgyid do// de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan zhing kun
370a4(rgyud): tu sogs par bgyid pas rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yo dad pa'i lcags kyu/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po ni mchog tu grub pa bla na med pa
370a5(rgyud): lags so// de nas rig sngags 'chang rigs kyi bu 'am// rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dge
370a6(rgyud): sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan su yang rung ba/ bud med dam/ skyes pa'am/ khye'u 'am bu mo 'phags pa spyan
370a7(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyi dgug par 'tshal ba dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid kyi rang gi gzugasu mthong bar 'tshal na des
370a8(rgyud): cho ga 'di bgyi'o// gtsang ma shin tu khrus bgyis pa/ gos gtsang ma bsgos pa/ ba'i rnam lnga'i chus bsang ba'i mchod phyir thogs btags pas ras dmar po'i
370b1(rgyud): skud pa'i mchod phyir thogs kha dog bzang po gnas bdun du yongasu gzung ste/ mchogs ma dang / spyi gtsug bcing ba dang / gnas gsum po dpung pa gnyis su bcing ba
370b2(rgyud): lag ngar gnyisu bcing ba dang / de nas rked par bcings pas phyogs gtsang mar 'dug nas sam/ gnas gzhan gang yang rung ba dben zhing 'khrugs pa ma mchis pa
370b3(rgyud): dang / dkyil 'khor gyi stegs gru bzhi pa shin tu rnam par mdzes pa gru bzhi'i tshad tsam la 'phang sor brgyad kyi tshad tsam kun nas zlum po legs par byugs pa shin tu
370b4(rgyud): 'jam par bgyi'o// de nas tshon sna tshogs kyi skud pa rnam par mdzes par thig gdab cing tshon rtsi sna de tshogs kyis bri bar bgyi'o// snying po'i dkyil
370b5(rgyud): 'khor ni khru gang tsam gyi tshad la gru bzhi pa rnam par phye ba/ shin tu mdzes pa/ gru bzhi kun kha khyer gyi rnam pa can bgyi'o// dbus su pad+ma bgyi'o// mdab
370b6(rgyud): ma brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ mdab ma thams cad la lcags kyu bri zhing dbus kyi snying po ge sar dang bcas pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis rgyan pa bgyi'o// 'od kyi phreng zlum po tshon rtsi sna tshogs
370b7(rgyud): kyis rnam par mdzes par bgyi'o// snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhir lcags kyu dang zhags pa kun nas zlum po yang bgyi'o// phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor kun tu mtshan ma'i
370b8(rgyud): phyag rgya sna tshogs kyang bri bar bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhir rnam par phye bar rgyal po chen po bzhi 'bar ba'i nang na go cha bgos pa/ drag shul gyi gzugs can
371a1(rgyud): // 'jigs par bgyid pa bri'o// sgo bzhi rnam par phye bar yang dkyil 'khor gyi lha bri bar bgyi ste/ shar phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje 'chang zhi ba'i gzugs can bzhin 'dzum pa/ rdo rje bgying bag can
371a2(rgyud): du 'dzin pa/ ri rab kyi steng na 'bar ba'i nang na/ mchis pa bri'o// lho phyogs kyi sgor khro bo'i rgyal po drag shul gyi gzugs can 'jigs par bgyid pa/ pad+ma dang zhags pa thogs pa/ me tog kha phye ba'i steng / 
371a3(rgyud): na 'bar ba'i nang na mchis pa'o// nub phyogs kyi sgor dbang po rdo rje thogs pa/ mig gsum pa ri'i steng na 'bar ba'i nang na mchis pa bri'o// byang phyogs kyi sgor don yod pa'i zhags pa gdong khro gnyer
371a4(rgyud): can pad+ma dang / zhags pa thogs pa/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i steng ngan 'bar ba'i nang na lcags kyu dang / lhan cig mchis pa bri'o/ 8dkyil 'khor khor khor yug tu gos dang / ba dan dang / mda' dang / 
371a5(rgyud): rgyal mtshan kun gyis rgyan par bgyi'o// mtshon sna lnga'i sku/ dpas kho ra khor yug tu bkri bar bgyi'o// gtor mtha/ mas cad dkar po bzhago// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol kun tu dngul
371a6(rgyud): dang / gser gyi snod rnam pa sna tshogs pa bzhago// snying po'i dkyil 'khor kho ra khor yug tu dngul gyi snod bkang ba bzhi/ 'o mas bkang ba bzhi dang / mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil ba'i snod bzhi dang / 
371a7(rgyud): dri'i snod bzhi dang / dris bkang ba'i snod bzhi dang / dngul gyi pog phor a ga ru dang / tsan dan dang / du ru ka'i bdug spos bsregs pa bzhi bzhago// phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor khor khor yug tu
371a8(rgyud): sa las byas pa'i snod bkang ba dang / gtor ma'i snod bum pa yongasu bkang ba drug cu rtsa bzhi dang / 'dug pa sna tshogs bsregs pa'i pog phor brgyad 'jigs pa med par bzhag par bgyi'o// 
371b1(rgyud): de nas rig sngags 'chang gis tshes bcu bzhi nas zla ba nya tshes bco lnga'i bar gyi nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis pas/ 'bras yos dang / yungs dkar la don yod pa'i rgyal po'i
371b2(rgyud): snying pos lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongasu bzlas pas dkyil 'khor du gtor bar bgyi'o// yungs dkar dang / dri chab la khro bo'i rgyal pos lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas
371b3(rgyud): pas dkyil 'khor kun tu gtor zhing dkyil 'khor dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du mar me drug cu rtsa bzhi spar bar bgyi'o// me tog ji snyed pa
371b4(rgyud): mang po bkram zhing kho ra khor yug tu phreng ba bzhag/ dpar bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i lcags kyus yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
371b5(rgyud): yongs su bzlas pas dkyil 'khor kun dang / phyogs bzhi dang / steng dang / 'og tu gtor na dkyil 'khor bcing ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// phyogs
371b6(rgyud): bcing ba dang / spyi gtsug bcing ba dang / bdag srung ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// bgegs dang log 'dren dang / 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 
371b7(rgyud): bdud la sogs pa thams cad bcings par 'gyuraro// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang
371b8(rgyud): dag mthong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi 'dzin pa de thams cad bkug par 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor kun nas srung ba'i slad du gshin rje dang chu lha/ 
372a1(rgyud): dang / gzhon nu dang / ku be ra dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang / 'khor dang bcas pa/ lcags kyu dang zhags pas bkug par 'gyur te/ dkyil 'khor
372a2(rgyud): kun nas srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba bgyod par 'gyuraro// 'og gi sa'i lha mo sa'i 'og na gnas pa rnams dang / lhan cig dkyil 'khor srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba
372a3(rgyud): ba'i slad du mchis par 'gyuraro// steng nas na mkha' la tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / brgya byin dang / mtshan mo'i lha dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba rgyu skar bcas
372a4(rgyud): par srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gos phyag bgyi dpa'i las bgyi ste/ rig sngags 'chang gis rtswa ku sha'i
372a5(rgyud): steng du/ shar phyogs kyi sgor dkyil 'khor la mngon tu phyogs par skyil mo krung bcas te mtshos lag zhan mi smra bar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan
372a6(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad yongasu bzlas pa bgyis la/ dkyil 'khor gyi snying por 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzhag par bgyi zhing me tog re re la bzlas brjod bgyis pas
372a7(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du dor bar bgyi'o// de nas khro ba'i rgyal pos yungs dkar gyi 'bru re re la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis pas
372a8(rgyud): gtor bar bgyi'o// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyus bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bgyis pas dbul bar
372b1(rgyud): bgyi'o// ril bu re re la bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i bdug spos dbul bar bgyi'o// yungs kar re re la bzlas brjod pa gyos la/ snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du dor bar bgyi'o// 
372b2(rgyud): stong rtsa brgyad rdzogs pa dang / thun tha ma'i nam nongs kar gya nom pa/ yid du 'ong zhing dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' bar bgyid par sa g.yo bar 'gyur zhing / sgra gnyen pa dang / snyan
372b3(rgyud): tsang 'jebs pa dang / yid du 'ong ba zab mo zab mo dang / ka la bing ka dang / mi 'am ci'i sgra dbyangs lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gi sems brtan por bgyi zhing mchog
372b4(rgyud): tu dga' bar yid la bgyid pas bzlas brjod bgyi'o// / de nas dkyil 'khor gyi snying po nas 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs mang po 'byung zhing phyogs dang / phyogs
372b5(rgyud): mtshams kun tu mchi zhing snang bar 'gyur te/ nam mkha'i dkyil na sprin brtsegs pa'i phung po bzhin du 'od zer gyi gdug su gyur nas gnas par 'gyuraro// de nas sngon ma
372b6(rgyud): byung ba'i dri zhim po rmad du byung ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing lha'i tsan dan dang / gor shi sha'i tsan dan dang / tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po dang / ga pur dang / gla rtsi 'dri 'byung ste/ dpag tshad
372b7(rgyud): brgya kho ra khor yug tu dri gnas par 'gyuraro// lha rdzas kyi bdug spos kyi dri zhim po sngon ma byung ba slad du byung ba bai DUr+ya sngon po'i sprin brtsegs pa lta bu'i bdug spos kyi sprin na mkha'i
372b8(rgyud): dkyil na gnas par yang 'gyur te/ phyogs bcu kun tu bdug spos kyi dri rgyas par 'gyuraro// de nas snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dpa
373a1(rgyud): phyug bdag nyid kyi rang gi gzugs kyis 'byung bar 'gyur te/ tshangs pa bzang po'i cha lugs can/ ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis rgyan pa/ don yod pa'i
373a2(rgyud): zhags pa'i gzugasu lag pa bzhi pa/ pad+ma dang / zhags pa thogs pa/ rgyal ba 'od dpag tu med pa'i dbu rgyan can/ dbu rgyan zla ba ches pas rgyan pa/ mdung rtse gsum pa
373a3(rgyud): thogs shing dbugs 'byin pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rgyan pa/ rang gi 'od dang gzi brjid kyis shin tu 'bar ba/ bzhin 'dzum zhing
373a4(rgyud): nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od zer gyi snang ba dang ldan pa/ khru brgyad tsam lus bzang pos dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i pad+ma'i stan las langs te/ nam mkha' la
373a5(rgyud): mchis nas zhi ba'i gzugs can byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje chen po yid la bgyis pas dkyil 'kho/ ra kun tu lta zhing phyogs bcur rtog par bgyid do// de
373a6(rgyud): nas rig sngags 'chang la leg so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung ste/ rig sngags 'chang chen po legaso leg so// lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ba'i lag mthil shin tu bzang po 'od zer
373a7(rgyud): bye ba brgya stong phrag stong gis legs par rgyan pa'i lag pa rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis lag pa spyi bo
373a8(rgyud): bzhag ma thag tu de nas rig sngags 'chang de na mkha' la mchis te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa dang / lcags kyu rgya chen po 'od zer snang ba bkod pa rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya
373b1(rgyud): bsgyu ma lta bu'i shugs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob ste/ ting nge 'dzin gzhan yang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bye ma snyed 'thob bo// kun tu don yod par
373b2(rgyud): lta ba nor bu'i snying po rgya chen por grags pa don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i gzungs/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i gzungs 'thob par 'gyur te/ ga
373b3(rgyud): gis gzungs thob pa'i mod la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag
373b4(rgyud): bgyis pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag rdzogs par kha ton nyid du gnas so// gzhon yang pad+ma rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag dang // 
373b5(rgyud): rdo rje'i rigs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs dang / glang po che'i rigs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam
373b6(rgyud): tshig dang / gsang ba chen po'i snying po dang / phyag rgya dang bcas pa'i gsang sngags rim par phye ba gsang ba dang / cho ga zhib mo'i rnam pa thams cad kha ton nyid du gnaso// 
373b7(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang gi klung gi bye ma dgu bcu rtsa gnyis pa rnams kyi gtso bo dang / mchog dang rig sngags 'chang gi
373b8(rgyud): 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyuraro// de nas rig sngags 'chang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rig sngags 'chang de la smras pa/ rig sngags
374a1(rgyud): 'chang ji ltar yid la byed pa dang / bsam pa smros shig dang / mchog de thams cad rje su sbyin par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar yid la
374a2(rgyud): bsams pa dang / mchog mngon par 'dod pa de thams cad smra zhing mchog yid la re ba thams cad byin par 'gyuraro// gzhan yang 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das
374a3(rgyud): pa'i dgos pa sna tshogs da ltar byung ba rnams smra zhing 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba smra'o// lo legs pa dang / lo nyes pa dang / bde ba dang / nad dang / 'jigs
374a4(rgyud): pa dang / lhag par 'jigs pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshe/ gas dang / rang gi dmag tshegs dang / phyir no/ dal ba dang / dgra bo dang / yams kyi nad dang / mi ngas dang / 
374a5(rgyud): gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'tshe ba dang / gza' la/ thab pa dang / thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / mtsha nga 'dru ba dang / 'gyed pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / char
374a6(rgyud): ches pa dang / char dkon pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i char dang / tshe ring ba dang / tshe 'thung ba dang / tshe yongasu zad pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / 'byor pa dang / rgud pa dang dge
374a7(rgyud): ba dang / mi dge ba dang / skye ba dang / 'gag pa dang / 'grub pa dang / mi 'grub pa dang / bgegs dang / bgegs med pa dang / bdud kyi bar chad dang / 'bru 'phel ba dang / nor
374a8(rgyud): 'phel ba dang / nad mang ba dang / nad dang bral bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
374b1(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang la smra bar 'gyuraro// sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / grul
374b2(rgyud): bu ma dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / dud 'gro'i skyes gnas pa ri dgas dang / bya'i skye ba dang / 'chi ba de thams cad phyin ci ma logs par
374b3(rgyud): smra zhing de dag gi thabs thams cad kyang ston par 'gyuraro// lhar skye ba dang / klur skye ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing skye ba dang / rgyal po nyid dang / bud med dang / skyes
374b4(rgyud): pa nyid dang / bu rnyed pa de thams cad smra bar 'gyuraro// bra dam ze'i rigasu skye ba dang / rgyal rigasu skye ba dang / khyim bdag gi rigs shing sa la chen po lta bur skye
374b5(rgyud): bde thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rigs 'a thon po dang / dma' ba dang / smad pa'i rigs su skye ba sna tshogs de dag thams cad ston cing smra la/ phabra
374b6(rgyud): kyang ston par 'gyuraro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar bsams pa'i don de thams cad 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang mngon sum du smra zhing thams
374b7(rgyud): cad gtam zer ro// gzhan yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'jig rten pa'i mchog sna tshogs dang / sgrub pa dang / grub pa de thams cad de la stsol ba
374b8(rgyud): bgyid de/ 'di lta ste nor bsgyur ba smra ba dang / zhing smra ba dang / mig sman gyi dngos grub dang / mi snang ba dang / mig 'phrul dang / gter smra ba dang / phug tu 'jug pa dang / nag su
375a1(rgyud): 'jug pa dang / spo ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / dbab pa dang / ro langs pa dang / nad zhi bar bya ba dang / gos 'thob pa dang / grong 'thob pa dang / yul gyi bdag po
375a2(rgyud): nyid dang / chu klung chen po rgal ba dang / dug bza' ba dang / gsang sngags sna tshogs sgrub pa'i dngos grub dang / 'jigs pa chen po brgyad zhi bar bya ba dang / dgug pa dang / dran
375a3(rgyud): pa de thams cad stsol bar bgyid do// gzhan yang ji ltar yid la bgyid pa de thams cad stsol bar bgyid do// de dag thams cad kyi dgos pa thams cad don yod pa'i zhags
375a4(rgyud): pa'i lcags kyu'i snying pos 'dren cing / don yod pa'i zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ro// bsam das pa dang / don du gnyer ba dang / yid la re ba'i dgos pa
375a5(rgyud): de thams cad shin tu ring po nas kyang don yod pa'i zha gas pas bcings nas thams cad drangs te/ lag tu thob par 'gyuraro// sgrub pa mchog gi dngos grub
375a6(rgyud): kyi de kho na nyid thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/ mi snang bar gyur/ rig sngags 'chang na mkha' la mchi bar 'gyuraro// 'jig rten gyi khams gang du sangs rgyas kyi zhing
375a7(rgyud): khams gang dang gang du mchi 'tshal ba de dang de thams cad du 'chi bar 'gyur te/ thams cad du gtso bor 'gyuraro// thams cad du mchod par 'gyur ro// ji ste rmi lam
375a8(rgyud): mthong bar 'tshal na gu gul la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongasu bzlas nas/ nyal dkar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'dug spos su phul te nyal na/ 'phags
375b1(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rgyal po'i cha byang du mthong ba stsol cing / gang bsams pa dang / gang dris pa de thams cad smra bar 'gyuraro// ji ltar bsams pa'i mchog stsol
375b2(rgyud): cing sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad ma mchis par 'gyuraro// stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / mdangs 'jug par 'gyuraro// tshangs pa dgug par 'tshal zhing mthong bar
375b3(rgyud): 'tshal na/ de'i tshe shing arga'i 'o ma dang / gu gul dang / rgya skyegs ril bur bgyis pa la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis la/ tshangs pa la bdug spos su phul na/ tshang
375b4(rgyud): pa rang gi gzugs mdun na mchis shing mchog 'cha dal ba thams cad rje su stsol to// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten la thugs pa'i bar gyi tshangs pa'i gnas dang
375b5(rgyud): gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyur zhing tshangs pa'i ga zugs kyi cha byad 'chang ba'i mchog stsol ba/ ra 'gyur ro// lha'i gnas thams cad du mes po yin no zhes
375b6(rgyud): tshig mngon par brjod par 'gyuraro// 'jig rten thams cad dang / 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang bram ze dang / rgyal
375b7(rgyud): rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmang rigs de thams cad thams cad du tshangs pa'o zhes sems par 'gyur ro// rgyal po btsun mo dang / 'khor du bcas pas mchod pa'i sprin
375b8(rgyud): chen po bgyid par 'gyuraro// de nas sred med kyi bu dgug par 'tshal na des lha'i gnasu sred med kyi bu'i gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du nye bar sbyin sreg gi cho ga bgyi ste/ rig sngags 'chang
376a1(rgyud): gtsang mar gyur pa shin tu khrus bgyis pa gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ sna ma dang shing arga'i yam sreg shing gi me sbar ba la gu gul dang / yungs dkar dang / sbrang rtsi
376a2(rgyud): dang zhun mar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg brgya stong bgyi'o// brgya stong rdzogs pa dang / sred med kyi bu rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis shing rig sngags 'chang legaso legaso// zhes
376a3(rgyud): smra'o// sgrub pa dam pa 'di don yod pa'i lcags kyus 'gugs shing rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i chos lugs chen pos bkug na rig sngags 'chang ci zhig bya/ dgos pa ni ci zhig yod/ 
376a4(rgyud): mchog ni ci zhig don du gnyer ba de smros shig dang / tha mas cad rje su sbyin par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis don gang yid la bsams te smras pa de thad
376a5(rgyud): stsol bar 'gyur/ gzugs sna tshogs pa'i mchog kya nga rje su stsol bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gzugs sna tshogs pa mchog gtso bo dang / dgos pa'i las
376a6(rgyud): sgrub pa'i mchog rje su stsol bar 'gyuraro// de nas lha chen po dgug par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma shin tu khrus bgyis pa gos gtsang ma dgos pa des lha'i gnasu
376a7(rgyud): mchis pa la lha chen po'i mdun du gu gul dang / pad+ma'i phye ma dang zhun mar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad bgyi'o// stong rtsa brgyad rdzogs pa dang / lha chen po rang gi gzugs
376a8(rgyud): kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyuraro// de nas nag po chen po dgug par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang shin tu khrus bgyis pa gos gtsang ma bgos pas dur khrod du mchis la/ zla ba
376b1(rgyud): mar gyi ngo'i tshe sa bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis pas pad+ma sar pa'i phye ma dang / gu gul dang / ra'i khrag dang / yungs dkar dang / zhun mar dar sbyar ba brgyad stong don yod
376b2(rgyud): pa'i lcags kyu'i bzlas brjod kyis dur khrod kyi shing gi me la bzlas brjod bgyi'o// ra khrag gi gtor ma dang 'bras thug po che'i chan gyis lha bshos dang / me tog dmar po dbul
376b3(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// las 'di yongasu rdzogs par bgyis na nag po chen po ma me'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa mdun na mchis shing rig sngags 'chang la legaso zhes bya ba gsol
376b4(rgyud): te/ rig sngags 'chang legase leg so// sgrub pa'i tshe/ ngag bzang po 'dis bdag yongasu mgus rig sngag/ das 'chang spros shig dang / mchog rjesu sbyin par bgyi
376b5(rgyud): mchog 'dod pa thams cad rje su long shig dang / ji lta/ ra yid la byed pa re ba de thams cad rje su sbyin par bgyi'o// khyod srung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba'i don du
376b6(rgyud): bdag rtag tu rjesu 'brang bar bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mchod yon dang zhabs bsil dbul bar bgyi'o// ji ltar bsams pa de mngon sum du smras na/ gang don
376b7(rgyud): du gnyer ba de thams cad 'thob cing thams cad du rje su 'brang bar 'gyuraro// thams cad du thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// dran pa tsam la sogs pas las thams cad bgyid
376b8(rgyud): cing nye bar gnas par 'gyuraro// rtag tu lta zhing spyir thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs dang / las su bgyi ba bgyid par 'gyuraro// ma mo'i tshogs
377a1(rgyud): kyi 'khor thams cad dbang du gyur nas gnas te/ las thams cad bsgo ba bzhin du bgyid par 'gyur te/ nam yang nyams par mi bgyid do// thams cad
377a2(rgyud): rjesu 'brang zhing las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// ji ste 'dod pa'i gzugs can ma dgug par 'tshal na de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma shin tu khrus bgyis pa gos gtsang ma
377a3(rgyud): bsgres pas shin tu dri zhim po'i dris lus lhag par bsgos la/ gang na me tog gi shing ljon pa mchis pa der mchis la zla ba mar gyi ngo'i tshe sa bcu bzhi'i nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyi
377a4(rgyud): pas shin tu dri zhim pa'i dri'i shing gi me sbar ba la pu shel/ tsi dang / ta ka ra dang / spang spos dang / yungs kar/ dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / zhun mar dang / sbyor ba'i sbyin
377a5(rgyud): sreg lan stong rtsa brgyad bgyi'o// gla rtsi dang / ga pur dang / tsan dan gyi chus bsgos pa'i 'bras yos dang / me tog gis bkang ba'i mchod yon gyi snod bum pa sar po
377a6(rgyud): brgyad stsal lo// dkar gsum gyi gtor mas bkang ba ga pur gyis bsgos pa'i gtor ma'i bum pa gsum stsal lo// me tog shin tu dri zhim po sprul bar bgyi zhing gla rtsi dang / 
377a7(rgyud): tsan dan dang / ga pur dang / kun tu ru'i bdug spos sprul bar bgyi'o// de nas las yongasu rdzogs pa dang / 'dod pa'i gzugs can ma gzang mo de lha'i gzhal med khang du
377a8(rgyud): mchi zhing mdun na mchis te de mthong nas ma 'am/ sring mo 'am/ chung ma'am/ las byed pa'om/ mngag gzhug ma 'am/ po nya ma rnams ji lta bur ji ltar tshig tu brjod pa de
377b1(rgyud): smros shog dang / ji ste mar gyur na de'i che bu bzhin du snying nas yongasu skyong bar byed do// nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / gser dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub dang / 
377b2(rgyud): mal chas yongasu skyong bar bgyid do// ji ste sring mor gyur na de'i tshe longs spyod thams cad kyis yong su skyong bar bgyid do// ji ltar yid la bsam pa'i bud med dpag tshad
377b3(rgyud): brgya yi pha rol nas kyang bkug ste/ yongasu longs spyad pa'i phyir yongasu spyod par bgyid cing / phyir yang de nyid du gtong bar bgyid do// ji ste chung mar gyur na de dang / lha rdzas
377b4(rgyud): kyi gzhal med khang dam pa yongasu long spyod pa'i gzhal med khang mthong ste/ lha rdzas kyi bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / long spyod stsol bar bgyid do// ro bro ba'i
377b5(rgyud): mchog ro brgya dang ldan pa ches khyad par du 'phags pa 'i long spyod stsol bar bgyid do// mchog tu dag 'ba'i rtsed mos 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i longs spyod
377b6(rgyud): par bgyid ngo // lha rdzas kyi dri dang / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / byugs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub kyis rgyan pa'i gzhal med khang du 'gyuraro// nor dang / 
377b7(rgyud): 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba yongasu gang zhing mchis par 'gyuraro// nor bu dang / gser dang / rdo rje dang / bai DUr+ya dang / gser dang / shang ka shil dang / byi ru dang / 
377b8(rgyud): dngul dang / sa la sbram dang / dngul sgyogs dpag tu med pa thob pa'i gter stsol bar bgyid do// rta dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang / phyugs dang / bran po dang / bran mo rab tu mad
378a1(rgyud): bo mang por 'phel zhing mchis par 'gyur ro// mal cha'i long spyod sna tshogs stsol bar bgyid do// lha rdzas kyi chung ma'i long spyod bud med gzugs sna
378a2(rgyud): tshogs pa'i 'khor brgya dang ldan pa nyin gcig bzhin du gnas par 'gyuraro// yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs pas ji srid 'tshe'i bar du gnas par 'gyuraro// tshe lha'i
378a3(rgyud): lo stong thub par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gis bag yod par bgyid ste/ dkon mchog gsum la mchog tu gus pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
378a4(rgyud): dang / rdo rje 'dzin la mchog tu gus par bgyi'o// rtag tu de sbyin pa la mngon par dga' bar bgyi zhing semanas can thams cad la mchog tu snying brtse bar bgyi'o/ 
378a5(rgyud): gzhan du mi smra bar bgyi'o// gal te las byed par gyur na de'i tshe rgyal po la bgyi ba bzhin du las thams cad bgyid de/ shin tu yongasu rdzogs kyi bar du las la
378a6(rgyud): mngon par brtson par 'gyur ro// ji ste mngag gzhug mar gyur na gnas gang du mngags pa de'i gnas thams cad du mchis te/ dpag tshad stong gi pha rol tu mtsho zhing / skad
378a7(rgyud): cig gis slar yang mchi'o// thams cad du gter chen po 'byin par bgyid/ 'dren par bgyid do// dpag tshad stong gi pha rol nas bud med 'gugs par bgyid cing / nor
378a8(rgyud): dang / 'bru dang / glang po che dang / ma he dang / rta dag 'gugs par bgyid do// slar yang gtong bar bgyid do// bag yod pas bsgo bar bgyid ste/ bdag nyid shin tu ring por
378b1(rgyud): yul dang / gnas su 'phen par bgyid/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / lha ma yin gyi gnas su 'degs par bgyid de/ der srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur bar
378b2(rgyud): bgying ngo // ji ste pho nya mor gyur na phyogs bcu thams cad du mchi ste/ lho'i 'jig rten du mchi'o// klu'i 'jig rten du mchi'o// lha ma yin gyi gnas su mtsho'o// nam mkha'
378b3(rgyud): lding gi gnas su mchi'o// mi 'am ci'i gnas su mchi'o// lto 'phye chen po'i gnas su mchi'o// gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gnas su mchi'o// 'byung ba'i gan su mchi zhing
378b4(rgyud): thams cad du po nya'i bya ba bgyis nas slar mchi'o// skadad cig gis dpag tshad stong du mchi zhing slar mchi da'o// skad cag gis dpag tshad stong du thams cad du
378b5(rgyud): phyin nas pho nya'i bya ba bgyid do// ji srid sa'i 'og gi ba ra du 'jug cing phyir yang mchi'o// bya ba shin tu yong su rdzogs par bgyis nas bag yod pas yang/ 
378b6(rgyud): las thams cad bgyi ste/ nyin gcig bzhin du mchod yon dang / rkang pa bkru ba stsal bar bgyi'o// thams cad kyi gnas thams cad du phyin cing bya ba 'grub pa/ bla na ma mchis
378b7(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin mo dgug par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang des gzhan gyi ma reg pa'i shing leb sar pa la gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyin mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan
378b8(rgyud): pa bri bar bgyi zhing gnas dben zhing 'khrug pa ma mchis pa gtsang ma'i gnas su bzhag par bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma shin tu khrus bgyis pas gos gtsang ma
379a1(rgyud): bgos pas 'o ma dang / 'bras thug po che'i chan gyi gtor ma stsal bar bgyi'o// shing ka ra bi ra'i me sbar ba la/ yungs kar dang / gu gul dang / ra
379a2(rgyud): khrag dang / zhun mar dang / bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad bgyi'o// stong rtsa brgyad rdzogs pa dang / me tog dmar po su la na gnod sbyin mo de yang rang gi gzugs kyis
379a3(rgyud): mdun na mchis te/ rig sngags 'chang slongs shig ces smra bar 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang gis khyod nga yi ci bgyi zhes bya ba byed pa yin no// nga'i las thams cad byed pa
379a4(rgyud): yin no// nga la dbyig mang po byin cig ces brjod parabagyi'o// de'i tshe gnod sbyin dang gnod sbyin mo/ de ltar leg so zhes smras nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro// gang
379a5(rgyud): gi tshe dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe yungs kar dang / gu gul la yongasu bzlas nas mer gtor na de mchi zhing cibargya zhes bya ba thams cad bgyid par 'gyur/ dbyig stong
379a6(rgyud): stsol bar 'gyur ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur/ rtag tu ci bgyi ba'i bya ba bgyid par 'gyuraro// de nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo dgug par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des
379a7(rgyud): spra tshol las lha ma yin gyi bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis gnas 'khrug pa ma mchis pa dang / dben pa dang / sa phyogs gca
379a8(rgyud): ma'i gnas su gzhag par bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma shin tu khrus bgyis pa gos gtsang ma bgos pas zhag gsum zan bcad par bgyis la/ de'i mdun du
379b1(rgyud): skyil mo krung bcas te mchis la gu gul gyi bdug spos stsal cing dkar gsum gyi gtor ma su la bar bgyi'o// don yod pa'i lcags kyu bzlas brjod yungs kar la bzlas pra
379b2(rgyud): bu mo de la lan stong rtsa brgyad brdeg par bgyi'o// las yongasu rdzogs pa dang // de nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo de rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis te/ gang dang gang du dgos
379b3(rgyud): pa de dang der dgos pa'i rje su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// de las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur/ thams cad du mchi bar 'gyur ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyuraro// ji ste srin
379b4(rgyud): bo dang / srin mo 'gugs par 'tshal na/ gu gul dang / dab glang gi sha skam po dang lhan cig bsres pa la don yod pa'i lcags kyus lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod
379b5(rgyud): bgyis pas dur khrod du mtshan thog thag bdugs na sri/ na po'i gnas thams cad kyi sgo phye bar 'gyur te/ srin po dang / srin mo rnams dbang du gyur nas gnas/ 
379b6(rgyud): te/ ci bgyi ba'i bya ba bgyid par 'gyur/ ci bsgo ba de bgyid par 'gyuraro// rtag tu phyi bzhin 'bra'o zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyuraro// gdugs gcig bzhin du
379b7(rgyud): dngul chu srang khri stsol bar bgyid do// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis cha gsum du dbye bar bgyi ste/ cha gcig ni dkon mchog la mchod par bgyi'o// cha gnyis pa ni nyin
379b8(rgyud): gcig bzhin du sbyin par btang ngo // srin mo rnams la zan dang / tshod sngon rnon po'i gtor ma stsal bar bgyi'o// de nas srin po 'khor dang bcas pa de rnams tshim par
380a1(rgyud): 'gyuraro// de nas 'khor dang bcas pa shin tu mgyogs par 'gyur te/ shugs chen pos dgos pa thams cad sgrub cing nam yang gzhan du bgyid par mi 'gyur
380a2(rgyud): gtor ma gtsang ma stsal bar bgyi'o// ji ste sha za dang / sha za mo dgug par 'tshal na ba lang gi mkhris pa dang / de'i so dang / gu gul dang / shong arga'i 'o ma sbyar te/ lam gyi
380a3(rgyud): bzhi mdor bdug par bgyi zhing / lhag ma dang 'phags pa'i gtor ma spru la na/ sha za mo de mchi zhing rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis te/ ci bgyi ba'i bye ba bgyid pa'i
380a4(rgyud): bran du 'gyur/ las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur// / dpag tshad stong gi pha rol tu mchi zhing / skad cig/ gis slar yang mchi'o// dgos pa thams cad sgrub par
380a5(rgyud): bgyid do// dus gsum du gtor ma lhag ma'i gtor/ ma sgo drung du stsal bar bgyi'o// nyin gcig bzhi na du gser gyis dong rtse brgya rangasu 'jog par 'gyur te/ 
380a6(rgyud): des thams cad zad par bgyis na/ phyir zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ro// ji ste rgyal po'i btsun mo dgug par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma shin tu khrus bgyis pa gos
380a7(rgyud): gtsang ma bgos pa des yungs kar dkar po dang / ske tshe'i sa bon dang / gi'u wang dang / pad+ma'i mdab ma dang / rgya mtshwa dang / lan tshwa bsres pa lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongasu
380a8(rgyud): bzlas nas/ phye ma'i rjes su bgyis la yungs kar dang / ske tshe'i sa bon dang / sbrang rtsi'i sa bon lan gcig mnyes la yang lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ rgyal
380b1(rgyud): be'i sgo 'am/ lam gyi bzhi mdo'am/ lam po che 'am/ grong khyer gyi sgor gtor na gang der gom pa bor ba tsam gyis dbang du gyur nas gnas te ci bgyi ba'i bya ba bgyid do// rgyal
380b2(rgyud): po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa bkug cing dbang du 'gyur ro// thams cad du ci bgyi ba bya ba bgyid cing / bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyuraro// gang bslangs pa de ster te dngul
380b3(rgyud): dang / gser dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub dang / spud pa dang / gzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / 'bru la sogs pa stsol bar bgyid do// gang smras pa de bgyid cing gang bsku
380b4(rgyud): ba bgyid par 'gyuraro// de'i yul gcig tu yang 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyis mchod pa chen po ba dgyid par 'gyur zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyuraro// de nas/ 
380b5(rgyud): bram ze dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'a chang des nas dang / til dang / 'bras sA lu dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / zhun mar dang bsres pa'i sbyin sreg
380b6(rgyud): stong rtsa brgyad bgyis nas/ rig byed bzhi dang ldan pa'i bram ze thams cad kyis spyi bor bkur ba gcig pur 'gyuraro// thams cad du mchod pa bgyid par 'gyur zhing bram ze
380b7(rgyud): thams cad la dbang bgyid pa thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// rgyal rigs dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal na til dang / 'bras thug chen po dang / sran mud ga dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / 
380b8(rgyud): zhun mar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg bgyi ste/ sbyin bsreg stong rtsa brgyad kyi bar du bgyis na thams cad la dbang bsgyur zhing mchod pa'i 'os chen por 'gyuraro// thams cad dbang du
381a1(rgyud): 'gyur bar bgyid do// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bgyid de ci bgyi ba bgyid cing bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro// de nas dmangs rigs dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal
381a2(rgyud): na lan tshwa dang / 'bras sa lu'i phub ma dang / su mu kha'i sa bon dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / zhun mar sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg brgya stong bgyis na dmangs rigs thams cad bran du
381a3(rgyud): gyur nas gnas te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyuraro// dgra dang phyir rgol ba dang / phas kyi dgra thams cad bzlog par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des shing mngar
381a4(rgyud): gyi shing gi me sbar la/ sa bon bdun dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / zhun mar dang / sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg pa/ da rgyad stong bgyi'o// brgyad stong rdzogs pa dang / dgra dang

381a6(rgyud): 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang // zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg brgyad stong bgyi'o// brgyad stong rdzogs na pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad
381a7(rgyud): bzlog par 'gyuraro// g.yul 'gyed pa bzlog par 'tshal na ske tshe'i sa bon dang / gu gul dang / b+hang gi'i sa bon dang / zhog chu dang / zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg brgyad stong
381a8(rgyud): bgyis na g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du son pa'i sems can thams cad slar bzlog par 'gyur zhing thams cad du rgyal ba thob par 'gyur// de nas gdon thams cad las thar pa/ 
381b1(rgyud): bgyi bar 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang des bdug pa 'di sbyar bar bgyi bar 'tshal ste/ k+She ma ka dang shing mngar dang // tsa rong dang ni gu gul dang // mu ra yak+Sha mu ra dang // b+hu ta ke sha
381b2(rgyud): mnyam par gzhal// phub ma dang ni bal ka/ khyim bya'i sgo nga'i shun lpags dang // sbrul lpags dang ni yungs rnam gnyis// b+ha ga'i sa bon ba lang mkhris// nya dang legs par
381b3(rgyud): sbyar bgyis te// ra yi gcan gyis bsgos pa la// lcags kyu'i gsang sngags bzlas pa yis// bdug pa dam pa'i gtso bo 'di // thams cad du ni rigs pa ste// stong phrag brgyad
381b4(rgyud): cu rtsa bzhi gdon// gang dag sa steng gnas pa rnams // bdug pa'i dri 'dis 'jig 'gyur zhing // mib zad gdon rnams 'bros par 'gyur// phyogs bcu dag
381b5(rgyud): na g.yo 'gyur zhing // sum cu'i lha dang ri rab g.yo// / gnod sbyin srin po'i gnas dag dang // sdang ba 'i srog chags chen po'i tshig/ gzhan yang sna tshogs
381b6(rgyud): dug bcas pa'i// srog chags thams cad 'jig 'gyur ba// dri tsam gyis ni dogs pa med// bdug pa 'dis ni bdug byas na// der ni rims nang mi gnas te// nyin gcig
381b7(rgyud): pa yi rims dang ni// nyin gnyis pa dang bzhi pa'i rims// gang yang mi bzang khyab 'jug rims// de dag thams cad 'jig 'gyur zhing // skad cig gis ni gtan nas 'dzems
381b8(rgyud): 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// // bam po nyi shu gsum pa// de nas mig bsku ba'i sman brjod par bya/ gdon thams cad
382a1(rgyud): 'joms pa gang gis mig la bskus pa tsam gyis gdon ma rungs pa 'bros par 'gyuraro// ro stod kyi nad thams cad 'joms par 'gyur te/ mig la bskus pa/

382a7(rgyud): pa/ sems can thams cad la dbang byed pa/ thams cad du rgyal bar byed pa/ mig sman rtag tu mchog tu dkon pa/ bsad pa la thug pa thar par byed pa/ btsen ra nas gong

382b7(rgyud): bsngal thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// mun pa thams cad kyi nang du nyi ma bzhin du skye bo thams cad kyi nang du mdzes par 'gyur ro// de nas ril bu bshad par bya ste/ sdig/

383a2(rgyud): las rgyal ba sbyin zhing dge ba/ dgra thams cad rab tu 'joms pa/ rtag tu dug thams cad rab tu 'joms pa/ rgyal po'i sgor mdzes par 'gyur ba/ nor dang 'bru 'phel bar
