383b8(rgyud): dang / rdza rnga ji srid du thos pa de srid tsam du 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro// dug dang bcas pa ni thams cad dug med par 'gyur te/ dogs pa mi bya'o// nad thams cad dang
384a1(rgyud): mi ngas thams cad dang / yams kyi nad dang / lo nyos thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// bde zhing lo legs pa nyid du 'gyuraro// gang dag mtshams
384a2(rgyud): med pa byed pa'i sems can sdig pa can dmyal ba la gzhol ba dag gis sgra thos pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad byang ste/ bde bar 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bde ba can du
384a3(rgyud): skye bar 'gyur ro// gos la bdugs na bdag nyid mchod pa chen po 'thob cing thams cad la dbang byed par gnas pa dang / don grub pa bla na med pa yin no// nor dang 'bru rab
384a4(rgyud): tu 'phel zhing / dgos pa sgrub pa bla na med pa yin no// tha/ mas cad mchod pa dang / rtag tu tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyuraro// rgyal po gang la khros pa las
384a5(rgyud): rgod cing smra bar 'gyur ro// bud med rnams kyi gnad chen du 'gyur zhing rtag tu nad med par 'gyur ro// rtag tu brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / stobs dang ldan
384a6(rgyud): pa dang / rtag tu dpal dang ldan pa dang / gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu glang po che bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa dang / shi nas mtho ris su skye bar 'gyuraro// byang chub sems
384a7(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la mchis pa
384a8(rgyud): ni don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i gzungs chen po'i cho ga zhib mo'i dkyil 'khor dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dang / 
384b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po lta ba dang / sgrub pa dang / bklags pas 'grub pa/ don yod pa chen po rnam par 'phrul pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs
384b2(rgyud): kyi dam tshig grub pa lagaso// gang gis pad+ma rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po mtha' dag dang / phyag rgya dang / rim par phye ba dang / gsang sngags dang / cho ga dang / 
384b3(rgyud): bde bar sgrub pa mtha' dag ni rigs kyi spyi thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po'i rjesu 'jug pa 'grub par 'gyur ba lagaso// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang
384b4(rgyud): pad+ma'i rigs dang / rdo rje'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rog/ sa kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'od dpag tu med pa'i snying po mchog dang po rdo rje rin po che rtse mo'i mchog
384b5(rgyud): dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig la thams cad rjesu zhugs shing dam tshig shes par 'gyur ba dang / thams cad du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ba de
384b6(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang ba de thams cad mchog tu grub par bgyi ba'i phyir dang / sems can thams cad la rje su brtse ba'i slad du bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ag
384b7(rgyud): mang po'i dbus su bsgrags par bgyi'o// rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams kyi sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par
384b8(rgyud): gzhig pa'i phyir bshad par bgyi'o// grub pa yang dag pa rjesu stsal bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa'
385a1(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems can dag pa chen po khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dag ci
385a2(rgyud): shin tu yongasu dag pa yin te/ lagaso legaso// rig sngags 'chang ba thams cad dang / sems can thams cad dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u
385a3(rgyud): rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams la bstan par bya ba shod cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis spyan ras
385a4(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug la rigs thams cad kyi spyi'i grub pa dam tshig gi rje su 'jug par byin gyis brlabs so// ngas kyang de bzhin du de dag byin gyis brlabs so// / 
385a5(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'pha gas pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar don yod pa'i rgyas pa'i pad+ma'i
385a6(rgyud): snying po'i dkyil 'khor chen po bshad pa/ don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i yang dag pa mchog grub pa/ sgrub pa dam pa ni sa dang ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi bya ba ni shin tu mdze
385a7(rgyud): pa shin tu 'jam por bya'o// tshen sna lngas rnam par dbye ba ni/ grwa dang bcas par rnam par dbye bar bya'o// tshen sna tshogs kyis bri ba dang / dkyil 'khor gru bzhir thig gdab pa
385a8(rgyud): ni mnyam par thig gis dbye bar bya ste/ sgo bzhir cha dbye bar bya'o// chu zheng du khru bzhi tshad tsam du dbye bar bya'o// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po ni tshad khru do par byas la
385b1(rgyud): tshon sna lnga'i sgal bu dang / tshon sa las dbye bar bya'o// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po la pad+ma dkar po kha bye ba zlum por bya'o// pad+ma bye ba'i dbus su zhags pa dang / lcags kyu
385b2(rgyud): dang / pad+ma gnas par bya ba ni klu mgo gdengs ka 'dra ba lcags kyu dang bcas pa dang / lag pa dang bcas pas pad+ma'i lcags kyu 'dzin pa dang / 'bar ba'i nang na 'dug par bya'o// tshon
385b3(rgyud): sna tshogs kyis bri'o// pad+ma kha phye ba'i phyi rol gyi sgal bu ni lcags kyu dang / bcas pa'i sgal bur bya'o// nang dang phyi'i bar du ni rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bya'o// lcags
385b4(rgyud): kya'i phyi rol gyi sgal bu ni zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i ma tog gis bya'o// zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i/ phyi rol gyi sgal bu ni mdung rtse gsum pa bri bar bya'o// 
385b5(rgyud): mdung rtse gsum pa'i phreng ba'i phyi rol gyi sgal bu ni phya/ ga rgya phyag na thogs pa bri bar bya ste/ mtshon cha sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs dang / kun la 'bar
385b6(rgyud): ba'i phreng ba dang / 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs bri bar bya'o// phyag gi phyag rgya'i phyi rol gyi sgal bu ni stegs bu dang 'dra bar bya'o// stegs bu'i phyi rol gyi sgal bu ni 'khor bar
385b7(rgyud): lcags kyu bri bar bya'o// snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi grwar ni rgyal po chen po bzhi go bgos pa lcags kyu dang / mdung rtse gcig pa thogs pa 'bar ba'i nang na 'dug pa rgyan thams cad
385b8(rgyud): kyis brgyan pa skyil mo krung byed du bcas te/ pad+mo'i gdan la 'dug par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol thog thag tu 'jigs pa med pas phyag mtshan rnams thams cad pad+ma la
386a1(rgyud): 'dug pabri bar bya'o// sgo bzhi'i gnas su pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams bri ba ni shar gyi sgor lag na rdo rje/ lhor ral ba gcig ma/ nub tu rdo rje lcags
386a2(rgyud): sgrog ma/ byang du pho nya mo dang / rig sngags kyi lha mo rnams bri bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi sgal bu ni me tog gi stegs bu 'dra bar bya'o// phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor ni kun
386a3(rgyud): tu ba'i lci bas bya'o// phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor de la nas phyes pad+ma bri bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor kun tu bum pa gang ba dang / dar btags pa'i mda' dang / dri'i snod bkang bas rgyan
386a4(rgyud): cing brug pa'i chu dgang ba dang / bdug spos snod kyis rgya ngan pa dang / me tog sna tshogs kyis rgyan pa dang / dri cha da ba dang / mchod yon gyi chab dang / 'bras bu dang / yon
386a5(rgyud): cha ba dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / gser gyi me tog dang / zangs kyi me tog gis 'jigs pa med par brgyan par bya'o// mu tig dang / byi ru dang / rin po che bai DUr+ya ston
386a6(rgyud): po dang / mar gang dang / pad+ma rA ga rnams kyis de bzhin du brgyan to// dkyil 'khor kun tu dung dang / bil ba dang / rtsa dar b+ha dang / gser dang / dngul gyis brgyan par bya'o// 
386a7(rgyud): 'khor gyi don du mchod pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi lha bkra shis pa rnams dang / sgo bzhi'i gnas su dri chab kyi bum pa dar gyis rgyan te/ bzhag par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol
386a8(rgyud): thog zag tu ra sna tshogs kyi gtor ma gzhag pa dang / bum pa dang / bya ma bum dang / bum pa dang / rta gu dang / kham por dang / bum pa gang ba rnams byas te bzhag go// pog por
386b1(rgyud): dang / gtor ma bzang po sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs dgram par bya/ phreng ba bzang pos brgyan par bya/ tshon sna lnga pa'i ba dan gdags/ tshon sna lnga pa'i srad bu seng ldeng gi pur
386b2(rgyud): pa la btags pa gzugs par bya'o// kun tu mar me phreng ba dang / mar me'i sdong bu bzhi yang de bzhin no// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor gyi nang du bdug pa dbul ba ni a ga ru dang / 
386b3(rgyud): tsan dan dang / du rus ka dang / spr-i ka rnams kyis bdugs pa ga pur dang / gla rtsis bsgos pa bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi bdug pa ni gu gul dang / sa la ki dang / kun tu ru
386b4(rgyud): bdug pa dbul bar bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang ba das gos sar pa bgos te/ gtsang mar byas nas ma daN+Dal gyi las su bya ba'i cho ga dang / lcags kyu'i rig
386b5(rgyud): sngags bzlas brjod bya ba dang / slob ma gzhug cing da kyil 'khor gyi dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / ba'i rnam lnga la reg par bya ste/ mkhas pas phyag rgya dang / 
386b6(rgyud): gsang sngags brjod cing don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig sngags chen mo ni thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// mtshams bcing ba dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / spyi gtsug bcing ba dang
386b7(rgyud): 'jug pa dang / dam tshig dang / khrus bya ba dang / gos bgo ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / bskor ba dang / de dag thams cad las sbyar bar bya'o// sbyin sreg dang / bzlas brjod
386b8(rgyud): kyi cho ga zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / mngon spyod dang / dgug pa dang / spyan drang ba dang / gshegasu gsol ba dang / de bzhin du yang dag par sprul pa dang / las thams cad la rig
387a1(rgyud): sngags 'chang bas thams cad du sbyar na myur zhing rdzogs par 'chang zhing des na grub pa bla na med par 'gyuraro// bgrang phreng dang / mkhrig ma'i gdu bu dang / 
387a2(rgyud): srad bu se ral kha gtsang ma dang / rtswa dar b+ha dang / yungs kar dang / chu dang bsre ba dang / rtsa dar b+ha'i stan la mchod phyir thogs te skyil mo krung bcas nas las bya zhing pad+ma dang / 
387a3(rgyud): mchod yon gyi dkyil 'khor la dbul ba dang / de dag rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par dus thams cad du nges par bya'o// don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig sngags dran par bya ste/ grub
387a4(rgyud): pa mchog dang / las thams cad sgrub pa dang / gang dadang gang dgos pa la dran par bya'o// gsang sngags de nyid kyis slar gsheg su gsol lo// gsang sngags
387a5(rgyud): gzhan dang bsre bar mi bya ste/ phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags 'di ni dpa' bo gcig tu bklags pas gru ba pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub/ 
387a6(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ yang dag par 'grub cing mchog sbyin par
387a7(rgyud): byed pa yin no// don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i dkyil 'khor dam pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di mthong ba ni sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'dag cang sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad dang / 
387a8(rgyud): sngon gyi sgrib pa mi bzang ba rnams sngar bsags pa rnams rnam parazhig par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa'i grub pa bde ba dang / 'jig rten pha rol tu 'bras bu chen po/ 
387b1(rgyud): bde ba dang / shi ba'i dus byas nas bde ba can du seng ste/ pad+ma'i nang nas rgyal ba'i spyan sngar brdzus te skye ba dang / kha ton byed na tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ba dang / gang zhig
387b2(rgyud): 'chad pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bye ba khrag khrig snyed thams cad kyi sgo phye ste 'dug cing gang du 'dod pa der 'jug par 'gyuraro// rgyal bzang
387b3(rgyud): kyis rnam par gzigs shing spyi bor phyag bzhag ste/ dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing dus kun tu bla na med pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur ro// 'di ni skye ba'i tha ma yin te/ 
387b4(rgyud): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar dang / byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du yin gyi/ gzhan du skye ba dar mi 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di na dga' bar 'gyur zhing bla/ 
387b5(rgyud): ma dang / chos can dang / nor gyi mchod pa dang / sem sa can kun gyis mchod par 'os pa ni ston pa de bzhi na gshegs pa bzhin du 'gyur ro// nor dang 'bru 'phel ba
387b6(rgyud): dang / gos dang brgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / rgyal po dang / btsun mor bcas pa thams cad bya ba ci yod ces bran bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro// lcags kyu'i dkyil 'khor du/ 
387b7(rgyud): zhugs pa ni phyir mi ldog pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'di ngan 'gror yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing rtag tu bde zhing dga' ba dang / sems can thams cad dga' ba dang / byams par 'gyur// 
387b8(rgyud): lha thams cad kyis lus can shin tu srung bar 'gyuraro// tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams kyis mchod par 'gyuraro// bsod nams kyi phung po 'phel
388a1(rgyud): bar 'gyur zhing nyi ma bzhin du gzi brjid 'bar bar 'gyuraro// sdug cing bzang ba mchog tu blta bar 'os par 'gyur ro// dpal gyis dus rtag tu 'bar zhing shin
388a2(rgyud): tu rgyas par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis gang ga'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi drung nas/ 
388a3(rgyud): dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po yongasu bzung bar 'gyur ro// bsod nams chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// lcags kyu'i dkyil 'khor du gang zhig zhugs pa tsam dang / dkyil 'khor de lta bu
388a4(rgyud): la me tog gcig dbul ba dang / ril bu gcig tsam gyis 'dug pa 'bul ba'i sems can de dag ni ga dang ga'i klung gi bye ma dgu bcu rtsa dgu pa 'bum phrag bye
388a5(rgyud): ba khrag khrig snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi me tog sna tshogs kyis legs par rgyan par 'gyuraro// sang sa rgyas kyi zhing re rer yang gang ga'i klung gi bye ma dgu
388a6(rgyud): bcu rtsa dgu/ 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la sna tshogs kyi mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// bdug pa mang po rnam par phye ba'i sprin las tsan
388a7(rgyud): dan sbrul gyi snying po dang / gau shirang sha'i bdug pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i sprin rim par phye ba rab tu 'khrigs par 'gyuraro// de la/ 
388a8(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis leg so zhes bya bab tu sbyin par mdzad de/ rigs kyi bu leg so legs// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa 'din
388b1(rgyud): mchog tu grub pa bla na med pa yin no// de dag gis me tog dang / bdug pas dkyil 'khor mchod pa ni bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yong su rdzogs pa dang / 
388b2(rgyud): rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sgrub pa chen po 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mchog sbyin pa mdzad par 'gyur ro// rtag
388b3(rgyud): tu mthong bar bzhed par 'gyuraro// rtag tu rje su 'brang bar 'gyuraro// rtag tu don yod pa'i lcags kyu grub pa grub par 'gyuraro// tshig bzung bar bya bar 'gyuraro// rtag tu bzhin 'dzum
388b4(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gshin rje da chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / gzhon nu dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i bu rnams srung
388b5(rgyud): ba dang / sbed pa dang / skyob pa'i phyir rjesu 'brang ba chen por 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rgyus phyag rgyas btab cing byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ 
388b6(rgyud): de'i sa phyogs kyang mchod rten snyam du sems shing mchod rten ring bsrel can du 'gyuraro// sems can gang dag de la blta ba'i phyir song ba'i sems can de dag sdig pa dang / sgrib pa
388b7(rgyud): dang drug thams cad las yongasu thar par 'gyuraro// 'jigs pa dang / rims dang / mya ngan thams cad las bral bar 'gyur// nad dang bral bar 'gyuraro// rtag tu sangs rgyas dang / 
388b8(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyuraro// rtag tu 'jig rten thams cad kyis tha mar 'gyuraro// dgra thams cad las phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / mi mdzar
389a1(rgyud): pa'i 'jigs pa las thar par 'gyur ro// dus ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa las yongasu thar par 'gyur ro// 'di nas shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu
389a2(rgyud): skye bar 'gyur ro// tha na ri dgas dang / bya dgas gnas te phyogs su nye bar song ba de dag sgrib pa thams cad dang / de yi sngon gyi tshe la yongasu bsags pa de dag lhag ma ma lus par
389a3(rgyud): yongasu byang bar 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad bde 'gro la gzhol bar 'gyur ro// ngan song dang ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa med par mthar byang chub la thug gi bar du'o// de nas don yod pa'i
389a4(rgyud): lcags kyu ra sa la sku gzugs bri ba'i cho ga brjod par bya/ ste/ gnas thams cad du bla na med pa 'grub pa ni sdig pa thams cad mod la sreg par byed pa dang / nyon
389a5(rgyud): mongs pa thams cad 'phrog pa de bzhin du nad thams cad sel ba/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba 'jig sa pa thams cad las rnam par thar pa/ sems can
389a6(rgyud): thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir gang dkyil 'khor chen por kun tu lung bstan pa/ mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ mchog tu dkon pa yid la re ba thams cad 'phral du yongasu rdzogs
389a7(rgyud): par 'gyur ba/ bkra shis thams cad sgrub pa/ bsod nams thams cad sogs pa/ myur du nor dang 'bru sbyin par mdzad pa/ sgrub pa yang dag par grub par bya ba'i phyir gsang sngags
389a8(rgyud): 'grub pa/ bzlas brjod 'grub pa/ yid la re ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'grub pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yongasu rdzogs pa de kho na nyid rnam par mthong ba zhes bya ba'i bsod nams
389b1(rgyud): chen po skye bar 'gyur ro// nam byang chub yang dag par 'thob kyi bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po rab tu skye bar 'gyuraro// don yod pa'i lcags kyu cho 'phrul chen po'i ras kyi sku gzugs chen
389b2(rgyud): po mthong ba la sogs pa ni phyis ngan 'gro'i gnas su mi 'gro zhing sdig pa'i las kyis mi gos pa dang / sngon gyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'jigs pa dang / sdig
389b3(rgyud): pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / ngan song las thar par 'gyur ba dang / dmyal ba mi zad pa rnams las thar par 'gyuraro// tshe rabs kun tu bde ba dang / da ltar gyi 'di la
389b4(rgyud): mchog tu dkon pa'i bde ba lhun gyis grub pa thob par 'gyur ro// bkren pa yang longs spyod dang / phyug po mtshungs dab med pa mchog mod la thob par 'gyur ro// lha'i dab
389b5(rgyud): la thob par 'gyur ro// 'khor bzang po bdog par 'gyur// // rgyal po rnams kyis bla mar bya zhing rtag tu dus tha mas cad du mchod par 'os par 'gyuraro// dge sbyong
389b6(rgyud): dang bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / bud med dang / skyes pa rnams rtag tu dbang du bya ste/ 'dug cing thams cad bsnyen bkur byed cing 'dug
389b7(rgyud): pa ni ras kyi sku gzugs la mchod pa bla na med pa yin no// ras gru bzhi khyon kun khru gang ngam/ khru do pa la legs par brtags pa/ ras 'jam po thag ran bzang po mnyen po shin
389b8(rgyud): tu dag par bkrus pa gtsang mar byas pa'am/ yang na dang yug gam/ yang mon dar ram/ shun phrags la zla ba yar gyi tshes bco lnga tshang ba'i bar du ras kyi sku gzugs bla na med pa
390a1(rgyud): bri bar bya'o// snod gtsang ma sar pa'i nang du tshon lhag ma ma yin pa blugs te/ ras kyi sku gzugs gsal bar bri bar ni tshon sna tshogs kyis rnam par dbye
390a2(rgyud): bar bya'o// dbus su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mgon po bri ba ni skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs pa/ spyan gsum pa/ zhal gsum pa mchog tu bzang ba// zhol
390a3(rgyud): dang po ni mdzes shing sdug pa/ dbu lcang lo dang / thor tshugs kyis rgyan pa/ cod pan la 'od dpag med kyis rgyan pa/ dbu skra 'khyil bar bya'o// me tog gi 'phreng ba bcing bar
390a4(rgyud): bya'o// phreng ba'i gong du 'od dpag med bya'o// cod pan de la zla ba phyed pa dang / 'od 'dom gang bya'o// kun tu lhag das kyu bya'o// kun tu 'bar ba'i phreng ba bya'o// phyag bzhi la phyag
390a5(rgyud): g.yon na pad+ma'i lcags kyu/ g.yas na mdung rtse gsum pa'i lcags kyu/ g.yon gcig na don yod pa'i zha gas pa'i lcags kyu/ g.yas gcig na rdo rje lcags kyu
390a6(rgyud): dbugs 'byin par bya'o// gdan seng ge'i pad+mo bya'o// g.yon du lha mo sgrol ma'o// g.yas su dkar mo ste/ me tog sna tshogs thogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du lta ba rgyan thams
390a7(rgyud): cad kyis brgyan/ pad+ma la bzhugs pa/ 'bar ba'i nang na bzhugs par bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rgyab tu rin po che'i shing lcug phran dang / yal gdang
390a8(rgyud): chas pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras par bya'o// ne co dang / r-i skyegs dang / shang shang ti'u dang / rma bya dang / bya ka la bing ka rin po che'i gseb na rgyu bar bya'o// shing gi gong rgya
390b1(rgyud): bol khang bu rtsegs ma dang bcas pa'i gzhal med khang gi nang du de bzhin gshegs pa gsum rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bzhugs par bya'o// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi
390b2(rgyud): g.yon du srin mo ral pa gcig ma bya'o// g.yas su lag na rdo rje khros pa'i gad mo 'byin pa'i gzugs mche ba gtsigs pa/ skra gyen du rjes pa/ ljang lo dang cod pan gyis brgyan
390b3(rgyud): pa/ rdo rje thogs shing rdo rje gser ba/ na mkha' la lta bar bya'o// smad du gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / gzhon nu dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi bya'o// gong du dbang po
390b4(rgyud): dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po lha'i bu bco ma ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o// g.yas phyogs su tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug
390b5(rgyud): chen po rnams btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa'o// g.yon du dga' bo dang / bsnyen dag/ 'bo dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho rnams bcom ldan 'das
390b6(rgyud): la mchod pa byed pa'o// g.yas kyi gnas gcig tu rig sngags 'chang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du pus mo btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
390b7(rgyud): zhal du lta zhing me tog sna tshogs kyi sdong bu dang pog por dang / bgrang phreng lag na thogs par bya'o// phyogs bzhi ngos kun tu ris bskor ba la ri dgas kyi tshogs sna tshogs kyi
390b8(rgyud): gang ba shing sna tshogs me tog dang / lcug ma can bya'o// rdzing bu chu zag pa bya'o// 'bras bu sna tshogs can gyi shing dang lcug ma bya'o// gnas so sor drang srong rnams dang / grul bu
391a1(rgyud): gyi shing bya'o// tshul de ltar don yod pa'i lcags kyus ras la bris te gnas gtsang ma dben par bzhag la rig sngags 'chang bas 'bad pa chen pos
391a2(rgyud): mchod par bya'o// a ga ru dang / du ru sa ka dang / tsan dan gyi gdug pa dbul bar bya'o// ci nus par don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rigs pa'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bya'o// nyi
391a3(rgyud): ma re re ras la sku gzugs bris pa mthong ba tsam gyis mod la mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa'i sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / mnar med par gzhol ba dang / dam pa'i chos
391a4(rgyud): spong ba rnams yongasu dag cing zad par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / sdug pa sbrul gyi 'jigs pa mi bzad pa dang / nad thams cad
391a5(rgyud): yongasu zad pa dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// rnam par 'jig par 'gyuraro// dri ma dang bral bar 'gyu ro// sna dang phrag dog dang bral bar 'gyur ro// gzungs
391a6(rgyud): grub pa chen po so sor thob par 'gyur ro// mthong ba tsam gyis mod la de ma thag tu 'bras bu chen po rnyed pa rgya chen por 'gyur ro// lan 'ga' yang log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ro// 
391a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ba thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyuraro// lha thams cad kyis rgyun tu bsrungs shing
391a8(rgyud): rje su bzung bar 'gyur ro// ras kyi sku gzugs 'di'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ba tsam gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal mngon tu/ 
391b1(rgyud): mthong ba dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o// gang zhig ras kyi sku gzugs 'di la legs par 'gyur ba'i tshul gyis bya ba byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa de ni
391b2(rgyud): phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing la
391b3(rgyud): mchod par 'gyuraro// de nas rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/ rab tu bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongasu gzung bar 'gyuraro// 
391b4(rgyud): dge ba'i rtsa ba brgya chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i ga nas thob par 'gyur ro// dge ba bsam pa yongasu dag pa
391b5(rgyud): chen po dang ldan par 'gyuraro// de nas byang chub sems dang / 'a sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras ga/ zigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
391b6(rgyud): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rig sngags 'chang thams cad grub par bgyi ba'i phyir dang / sems can gyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar bgyi ba'i phyir dang / 
391b7(rgyud): sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad las yongasu grol bar bgyi ba'i phyir don yod pa'i lcags kyu rig sngags kyi rgyal po rim par phye ba rnams bstan pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das
391b8(rgyud): yang bdag la mchis pa ni don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i khro bo'i rgyal po dkyil 'khor te/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad khro bo chen po'i las grub pa mchog tu 'gyur ba dang / 
392a1(rgyud): bsam pa dang / yid la re ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / ma rungs pa brtson pa med pa/ brtse ba'i bsam pa med pa ni gnod sbyin dang / srin po thad
392a2(rgyud): dang / 'byung po dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad thag 'jug pa/ ma rungs pa'i bgegs dang / log 'dren
392a3(rgyud): thams cad rab tu dul bar mdzad pa/ bdud la sogs pa ma rungs pa thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang phung bar byed pa/ sems can ma rungs pa thams cad skrag par byed pa/ phyir rgol ba dang / 
392a4(rgyud): dgra thams cad 'ching ba dang / gcod pa dang / 'bigs pa ra dang / rdung ba dang / gtor ba dang / lus rnam par zhig pa/ dar byed pa de ni bcom ldan 'das 'dir bdag gis pad+mo
392a5(rgyud): rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po/ cho ga zhib mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi skabasu bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor mang po'i nang du don yod pa'i
392a6(rgyud): khro bo'i lcags kyu brjod par bgyi ste/ dkyil 'khor dang cho ga zhib mo thams cad du srung bar byed pa/ 'chos par byed pa/ dam tshig 'dzin pa/ gnas thams cad la rjesu skyong ba ste/ 
392a7(rgyud): de ni sgrub par byed pa/ sgrub pa 'grub par byed pa'i mchog de bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba chen po'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po chen po byin gyis brlabs
392a8(rgyud): shing rjesu gnang ba mdzad cig dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad mchog tu 'grub pa'i snying po dag sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du/ ba
392b1(rgyud): ldan 'das rjesu stsal bar bgyi'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dpa
392b2(rgyud): phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag rgya chen pos phyag rgyas btab stengs kyang byin gyis brlab so// sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
392b3(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang phyag rgyas btab cing byin gyis brlabs kyis spros shig/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags 'chang thams cad gsang ba
392b4(rgyud): lag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'chang ba dang / rdo rje'i snying po tham/ sa cad dam tshig la gnas pa'i lha dang / klu dang / ga/ nod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
392b5(rgyud): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyis yongasu bzung ba smros shig/ spyan ras gzigs dpa' phyug rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi bsams pa
392b6(rgyud): yongasu rdzogs pa'i go skabs dang / mchog grub par byos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan
392b7(rgyud): 'das kyis bkas bsgo zhing dbugs phyung ba thos nas snying dga'/ smin ma bskums/ dpral ba phyed khros par byas/ gdong khro gnyer du byas/ mche ba ni gtsigs/ spyan ras gzigs
392b8(rgyud): kyis lus 'khor mang po'i nang du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas don yod pa'i zhags pa khro bo'i rgyal po 'di smras pa/ dus gsum na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs
393a1(rgyud): pa la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ba dang / dkyil 'khor chen po'i lha rnams la phyag 'tshalo// 'das pa
393a2(rgyud): dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams la phyag 'tshalo// yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tsha lo// yang dag par
393a3(rgyud): zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu blo gros can la phyag 'tshalo// drang srong chen po'i tshogs la phyag 'tshalo// rgyal tsha ba du dbang bskur ba byams pa la sogs
393a4(rgyud): pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la phyag 'a tshal// khams gsum pa'i bdag po nag po chen dpom mo'i tshogs kyis bskor ba la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhi/ 
393a5(rgyud): gshegs pa 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshalo// khro bo'i rgya la po rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po'i tshogs la phyag 'tsha lo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// 
393a6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal// tad+ya thA/ oM bikr-ita/ bad na ma hA kro d+ha rA dzA/ b+ha ya ka/ 
393a7(rgyud): ra ma hA daSh+Ta/ aT Ta hA san/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ma hA dz+wa la/ mA la ma hA rotra/ rUpa pa b+hA ya ka ra na/ ha na ha na/ sarba duSh+Ta/ yak+Sha rAk+Sha san/ da ha da ha/ sarba duSh+Te/ nA gA nan/ btsa
393a8(rgyud): patsa/ sarba dweSh+Tha/ big+h+nAn/ bi nA ye/ kAn pA ta ya/ pA ta ya/ sarba da?Sh+Ta sa twa n+da/ b+ho b+ho ma hA kro d+ha rAng / ma Ni kan ke badz+ra/ bcur+ya/ a lang kro ta sha rI ra ne/ badz+ra pa shu
393b1(rgyud): bas+t+ra ya/ ma hA pad+ma a ku sha d+hu dzA ya/ mahA pad+mA A sa nA ya/ ma hA pad+ma bi ka tsag d+hA ya/ a mo g+ha a pra ti hata/ bal pa ra kra mA ya/ sarba sra/ bi drA ya/ sarba d+hAta/ b+ha ya ka rA ya/ 
393b2(rgyud): sarbe de ba b+ha ba ne/ ka ma ba ud b+ha bA ya/ ma hA bi kr-ita/ be da na ya/ na ra saM hi mu khA ya/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ badz+ra dz+wa la/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ma hA tsat+ta/ be ga d+ha ra/ tse ra tsa ra/ tsa tsa ra/ tsa tsa ra/ ni
393b3(rgyud): shA tsar/ I shwa ra/ b+h+r-i ku Te mu kha/ dzu hUM phaT/ sa ra sa ra/ pra sa ra pra sa ra/ sarba pA pa/ kaul+li Sha ha ra/ ma hA ma NaM/ te dza d+ha ra/ pad+ma hasta/ oM pad+ma a ku sha/ b+hu dza/ ta
393b4(rgyud): ya/ man+t+ra ma ya/ big+h+na/ shA sA ya/ duSh+TA na/ nA sha ya/ da sarba pA pa ba raN/ hUM phaT sA hA/ pA sha hastA ya daM sAhA/ pad+ma d+ha rA ya sUhA/ sa mA shA sa kA ya swA hA/ a
393b5(rgyud): mo g+ha b+ha re d+ha rA ya swA hA/ kr-i d+ha rA dza b+ha yi ka rA/ ya swA hA/ brah+ma be Sha d+ha rA ya swA hA/ trai lokya pU dzi tA ya swAhA/ ya ma ba ru NA/ ku be ra/ na maHkr-i tA ya swA hA/ badz+rad+ha/ 
393b6(rgyud): ra pU dzi tA ya swA hA/ ma hA kA la ma tri ga Na/ ban di ta/ pU dzi tA/ ya sA hA/ de ba ga Na/ ban di tA ya swA hA/ nA ge a kaR+Sha ya sA hA/ oM b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ sarba
393b7(rgyud): maN+Da la a d+hiSh+NI ta sa ma ya swA hA/ sarba mu dra a d+hiSh+Thi ta mu drA ya swA hA/ oM a mo g+ha ba ra de/ ma hA daMSh+Ta/ a ku sha badz+ra hUM/ ma hA pad+ma/ a shwa sa d+ha ra/ na mostu te/ a mo g+ha
393b8(rgyud): aM ku sha hUM phaT swA hA// khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i gzungs 'di smras pa dang / lha'i gnas dang bcas pa dang / ri rab dang bcas pa'i rgya mtsho gnas dang bcas pa dang / gzhal
394a1(rgyud): med khang rnams kun tu 'gul lo// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// ma rungs pa'i klu dang / lha ma yin dang / gnod
394a2(rgyud): sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za thams cad dang / bdud la sogs pa dang / log 'dren ma rungs pa dang / gdon ma rungs pa rnams kha sbub tu 'gyel lo// ma rungs pa thams
394a3(rgyud): cad kyi khyim kun tu tshig te 'bar ba/ kun tu 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur cing bsregs pa dang / ngu zhing 'dre log ste/ tshor ba drag po mi bzad pa chen po myong ngo // lha thang
394a4(rgyud): shin tu 'khrugs shing skrag go// bdud kyi rigs rnams bredanas khas gtag so// 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po thams cad kun tu 'khrugaso// rgya mtshor gnas pa'i
394a5(rgyud): klu dang / rgya mtsho'i klu chen po dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo dag kyang kun tu 'khrugs shing shin tu skrag ste snying 'dar ro// gzhan yang sa'i steng na klu stong phrag
394a6(rgyud): brgya gnas pa dang / rgya mtsho'i chu'i nang gi klu gang dag dang / ri la gnas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kun tu 'khrug skrag cing gcig tu 'bar bar gyur cing gdungs so// rgyal po
394a7(rgyud): chen po bzhi rnams gnas na 'dug na yang skrag go// nag po chen po dang / tshogs chen po'i gtso bo dang / ma mo'i tshogs kyis bskor ba de dag thams cad skrag cing rtsing 'ang ro// gnas la brten
394a8(rgyud): pa'i bdud kyi gnas rnams 'dar ro// 'bar kun tu 'bar te gnas dang bcas par sreg go/ de nas 'khor de'i nang gi lha dang / klu rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi steng rol nas bcom ldan
394b1(rgyud): 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir me tog sna tshogs 'thor ro// lha rdzas kyi rgyan spud pa sna tshogs dang / chos gos kyi chas 'bebs so// mchod pa'i las byed cing tsan dan gyi chu'i char pas sal
394b2(rgyud): chag chag 'debs so// lha rdzas kyi gser dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / rin po che sna bdun rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do// de nas gnod sbyin
394b3(rgyud): gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje lus 'bar zhing rdo rje gsor te/ shin tu 'gying bag tu seng ge'i 'gros kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
394b4(rgyud): dbang phyug ga la ba de log su song ste nye bar phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bcom lnga na 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs la
394b5(rgyud): mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa 'i me tog gi rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i phreng ba bcom ldan 'das phyag na pad+ma la phul te/ zla ba
394b6(rgyud): yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog gi phreng ba rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa 'di dbul la long spyod pa'i phyir dang / bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du thugs rje chen pos bzhes su
394b7(rgyud): gsol/ gang gis bdag yun ring por phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur lagaso// khro bo chen po'i yang chen po bshad cing gang dran pa tsam gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
394b8(rgyud): gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// gang dag bdud ma rungs pa dang / gang dag klu ma rungs pa dang / gnod sbyin dang srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za ma rungs pa dang / log 'dren
395a1(rgyud): ma rungs pa rnams khyim dang bcas te/ lus kun tu tshig cing rab tu 'bar nas kha sbub tu 'gyel cing sreg go// shi la thug pa dang srog bskams par 'gyur/ 
395a2(rgyud): ba'i don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i khro bo'i rgyal po ni dus thams cad du mgo'i spyi bor blang bar bgyi'o// bcang ngo sgom mo// mchod do// rgyas par bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang gang gi lag na khro
395a3(rgyud): bo'i rgyal po 'chang bar 'gyur ba dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal
395a4(rgyud): rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs kyi lag na thogs pa'am/ lus la thogs pa 'am/ lta ba'i ma/ dri ba 'am/ tha na khro bo'i rgyal po nyan pa tsam de yang
395a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis khur du bskur bar bgyi'o// spyi bos blang bar bgyi'o// srung bar bgyi'o// yod/ su bskyab par bgyi'o// bsam pa dang / yid la re ba
395a6(rgyud): thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bgyi'o// grub pa chen po'i chen po rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren ma rungs pa thams cad
395a7(rgyud): so sor bsal bar bgyi'o// rtag tu rjes su 'brang zhing srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// rtag tu dus thams cad du mthong ba rje su stsal bar bgyi'o// rtag tu rgyun mi
395a8(rgyud): 'chad par yo byad thams cad kyi mi brel cing phun sum tshogs par yongasu bskyang bar bgyi'o// lus la stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / gzi brjid bskyed cing bsod nams/ 
395b1(rgyud): dang / ye shes kyi grogs bgyi'o// dgra thams cad so sor gsal bar 'gyu'o// nor dang 'bru dang / bza' ba dang / btang ba dang / gos dang / spung pa dang / rgyan rje su sbal bar
395b2(rgyud): bgyi'o// bu gcig pa 'dra bar rje su bskyang bar bgyi'o// dad pa dang / gus pas dus kun tu mchog tu mos par bgyi'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
395b3(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces khyod kyis khas blangs pa mchog tu bzang po byas pa 'di legasolags
395b4(rgyud): zhes smras te/ lag pa g.yas pa brkyang nas zla ba yid du/ de'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog gi phreng ba rin po che/  sna tshogs kyis spras pa blangs te/ lag na rdo rje la
395b5(rgyud): rje su brtse ba'i phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongasu long spyod pa'i phyir dang / ngargya la 'khor na ni gnas pa'i lha thams cad kyis yongasu
395b6(rgyud): longs spyod pa'i phyir dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thad
395b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gang yin pa 'dir 'dug cing dam tshig la gnas pa rnams yongasu longs spyod pa'i phyir ji lta ba bzhin du 'dug te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu'i gong du
395b8(rgyud): gtor ro// de nas phreng ba de na mkha' de la gtor ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbu'i steng du zla ba yid du 'ong ba/ dri ma med pa'i me tog
396a1(rgyud): de khang bu brtsegs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis smras pa/ 'od 'tsher ba/ ka ba bzhi dang / sgo bzhi legs par rnam par 'byes 'gru bzhi lham pa/ chu zheng
396a2(rgyud): shin tu rgya che ba/ shin tu nang yangs pa/ me tog kang l+ya dag gis mdzes pa/ gzhal med khang sna tshog su gyur te gnas so// de dag byang chub sems dpa'i dbu'i steng
396a3(rgyud): thad kar de bzhin du zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog rin po che sna tshogs smras pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa'i gzhal med khang du shin tu gnas so// de lag na rdo rje
396a4(rgyud): dbu'i steng gi thad kar yang zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa/ me tog khang bu brtsegs par shin tu gnas so// de 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi
396a5(rgyud): steng thog thag tu yang / zla ba yid du 'ong ba'i dri ma med pa/ 'i me tog khang bu brtsegs pa nor bu rin po che/ chen po sna tshogs kyis spras pa me tog ka ta lcis
396a6(rgyud): mdzes par byas te gnas so// khang bu brtsegs pa'i nye 'khor kun gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang
396a7(rgyud): phyug chen po lha'i bu dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams lag na rnga yab thogs nas g.yob cing 'dug go/ de dag kyang 'khor 'dus pa chen
396a8(rgyud): po mang pos yongasu bskor cing mdun du byas so// dkyil 'khor gyi rig pa'i rgyal po'i lha de dag thams cad kyang na mkha' la zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog khang
396b1(rgyud): bu brtsegs pa'i phreng ba rin po che sna tshogs kyis sbas pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa'i nang na 'khod pa ni nyi ma dang zla ba smra ba bzhin dang / na mkha' la zla ba nyab na rgyu skar dang / skar/ 
396b2(rgyud): ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba sba ba bzhin du sba bar gnas so// me tog de dag gi nang na lha rdzas kyi zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog sna tshogs dang / lha rdzas
396b3(rgyud): kyi pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pu Na Da ri ka dang / man da ra ba dang / ma hA man da ra ba dang / me tog ro tsa dang / ma hA ro tsa dang / me tog sa la dang / tA la ka dang / me tog ta ma la dang / 
396b4(rgyud): tsam pa ka dang / me tog a d+ha mu ka ta dang / me tog a sho/ ra ka dang / me tog pa ta la dang / me tog nI la dang / mA/ da hA nA la dang / me toge gan d+ha b+haR+Sha ka dang / me tog
396b5(rgyud): sum na dang / ta ra Na dang / ku ya ka'i me tog gi char gyi rgyun phab bo// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa da / nga / dkyil 'khor chen po la mchod pa'i phyir dang / 
396b6(rgyud): lha rdzas kyi chos gos spud pa dang rgyan sna tshogs kyi char 'bab cing phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod do// de ltar na cho 'phrul che ba'i che ba dag snang // 
396b7(rgyud): rol mo'i sgra yan lag lnga pa dag kyang ma brdungs par na mkha' lo sgra byung ngo // 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i tshe ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// / 
396b8(rgyud): bam po nyi shu bzhi pa// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
397a1(rgyud): dbang phyug la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ sems can dag pa chen po mchog tu dkon pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po 'di smras te/ rig sngags 'chang thams
397a2(rgyud): cad mchog tu grub par bya ba'i phyir ma rungs pa thams cad 'joms pa/ sdig pa thams cad sreg pa bshad pa leg so lag so// 'di ni phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na rig
397a3(rgyud): sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis lan cig dran pa tsam gyis dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// yid la re ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan
397a4(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ba'i sbyin par 'gyur// gnas thams cad gtogs pa'i grub pa chen po rab tu ston par 'gyur/ rig sngags 'chang ba rnams
397a5(rgyud): kyis yangs shing rgya che ba'i chen po thams cad/ byed par 'gyur/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na 'di/ ni 'jig rten las 'das pa gcig po mchog 'grub
397a6(rgyud): par 'gyur te/ las sgrub pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i phyir ro// de nas khros pa'i gang rgyangs spyi gtsugs 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gnod sbyin
397a7(rgyud): chen po stong phrag brgya'i bdag po stobs po che ba/ dpung che ba brtan zhing pha rol gnon pa chen po gang gi lag mthil gcig gis ri'i rgyal po lhun po chen po 'gul
397a8(rgyud): bar byed pa/ lha'i gnas gzhal med khang dang bcas te/ rgya mtsho chen po na gnas te/ 'khor bye ba phal po che dang ldan pa/ drag po gzi brjid drag pa stobs che ba/ pha rol
397b1(rgyud): gyi dpung 'joms par byed pade stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logasu song ste nye bar phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ brtsa
397b2(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la btud de 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
397b3(rgyud): chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i gzungs rig sngags kyi rgyal po shin tu mi bzad pa'i gsang sngags bshad pas ni bcom ldan
397b4(rgyud): 'das gzhal med khang dang bcas pa bsreg so// gno dad sbyin du ma stong phrag bye ba khrag khrig 'khor dang ba ces pa 'bar ba gcig tu gyur te bsreg so// bcom ldan
397b5(rgyud): 'das bdag ni zhig te tshig cing zhu bar gyur to// ba com ldan 'das de la bdag gis ji ltar sgrub par bgyi/ bdag la skyob pa su lags/ dpung gnyen du 'gyur ba
397b6(rgyud): su lags/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni srog rnam par zhig pa'o// dus kyi zhags pas bcing so// bcom ldan 'das bdag la phan gdag su gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bdag
397b7(rgyud): la bskyab du gsol/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas khros pa'i gang rgyangs spyi gtsug 'bar ba gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po la 'di skad ces
397b8(rgyud): bka' stsal to// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po khyod ma 'jigs par khri bo'i rgyal po lcags kyu'i dkyil 'khor gyi rjesu song shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
398a1(rgyud): po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la skyabs su nye bar song shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
398a2(rgyud): phyug 'di ni khyod kyi skyabs dang / dpung gnyen dang / skyob pa dang / rten du 'gyur te/ gang gis 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa'i gnod sbyin stong phrag brgya'i srog dang bral bar mi 'gyur
398a3(rgyud): ba yin no// kye gnod sbyin chen po myur ba myur ba song ste skyabs su 'gro bar byas shig/ de nas khros pa'i gad rgyangs can gtsug phud 'bar ba'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcom ldan
398a4(rgyud): 'das kyis dbugs phyung ba rtogs nas byang chub sems da dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzi gas dbang phyug ga la ba de logasu song ste/ byang chub
398a5(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras/ gzigs dbang phyug la ngu zhing rgyal nas lag pa/ brkyang te/ zhabs la btud nas 'di skad ces gsol
398a6(rgyud): to// bcom ldan 'das bdag skyabs du gsol/ thugs rje chen po bdag la skyab tu gsol/ bdag la srog stsal bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bsregs shing
398a7(rgyud): gcig tu 'bar bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin du ma stong phrag brgya bye ba 'khor dang bcas pa srog dang 'bral bar 'gyuraro// shes pa ni gtor/ stobs dang brtson 'grus
398a8(rgyud): spro bar byed pa ni nyams na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis lus su zhig gso bar bgyid/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis khros pa'i gad rgyangs spyi
398b1(rgyud): gtsug 'bar ba'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyon cig/ 'ji srid ston gyi bar du yud tsam zhig sdod cig/ gnod/ 
398b2(rgyud): sbyin gyi bdag po khyod kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can mang po la rnam par gtse bar byas/ khyod kyis bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo mang po ni zos na khyod kyis 'phags
398b3(rgyud): pa'i spyan mang po ni nyams par byas/ khyod kyis rig sngags dang / dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga zhib mo mang po'i bar chad ni byas/ grub pa rnams ni med par byas/ ma grub pa rnams kyang // 
398b4(rgyud): med par byas/ skal pa can mang po ni med par byas/ skal da ba med pa ni yod par byas/ mi 'tshe ba dang srog dang /  long spyod kyi bde ba ni med par byas/ 'tshe ba dang / srog
398b5(rgyud): rnam par 'jigs pa ni 'phel bar byas/ khyod kyis leg sa par bshad pa ni yongs su bor// khyod kyis nyes par bshad pa dang / ser sna ni mang du byas// 
398b6(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang thams cad dang / sems can thams cad la khyod nag po dang / rnam par 'jig pa rab tu gnas/ khyod kyis ngan sems thams cad ni 'phel/ khyod kyis
398b7(rgyud): dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ni nub par byas/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na khyod shin tu mi bshad pa sdig pa can yin/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi gnas dang bcas/ bdud dang bcas
398b8(rgyud): tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i nang na khyod gcig pu ngan sems can bar chad byed par skyes pa yin te/ rgyu des na gnas skabs 'di 'dra ba thob pa yin pas kye gnod sbyin gyi bdag po
399a1(rgyud): dam tshig dang / bslabs pa dang / sdom pa khas blang ba dang / dge ba'i chos byos shig/ 'on tang kho bo khyod kyis skyabs dang / dpung gnyen du 'gyur
399a2(rgyud): bar bya'o// khyod sdug bsngal bas nyams thag pa dang / bcings pa mi bzad pa dang / me 'bar ba mi bzad pa'i 'jigs pa las ngas yongasu thar par bya'o// mtho ris kyi la
399a3(rgyud): du 'jug par bya'o// des nas khros pa'i gang rgyangs spyi gtsug 'bar ba gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'khor gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas byang chub sems
399a4(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzi gas dbang phyug gi zhabs gnyis la btud nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags/ 
399a5(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces gas la to// bcom ldan 'das deng slan chad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa
399a6(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug khyod kyi bka' lung bzhin bgyis te dam tshig la gnas par bgyi'o// chos kyi rjesu sems dpa' dang / dkon mchog gsum la skyabasu mchis
399a7(rgyud): pa la gnas par bgyi'o// khro bo'i rgyal po 'di dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po lcags kyu'i gzungs dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / gang yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dang / 
399a8(rgyud): dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams yongasu bskyang bar bgyi'o// don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i gzungs rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa
399b1(rgyud): dang 'don pa dang / bzlas brjod kyi cho ga kun spyod pa de la ni bdag gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma rnams kyis 'og dang / bla dang / phyogs bzhi kun tu bsod nams su dmigs te/ 
399b2(rgyud): srung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyab par bgyi'o// yongasu bskyang bar bgyi'o// lus la stobs dang / spro ba dang / gzi byin mang du skyed par bgyi'o// de'i yul phyogasu 'thab pa
399b3(rgyud): dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / 'tshang 'dru ba dang / ma legs pa dang / lo nyes dang / mi ngas dang / rims dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / nyams thag par byed pa'i gdon
399b4(rgyud): dang bcas pa dang / nad dang / gcong dang / nyon mongs pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// rab tu dgasal bar bgyi'o// rkun po dang / zol po dang / mi
399b5(rgyud): rgod dang / gcan zan khro bo'i 'jigs pa rnams bsal/ bar bgyi'o// dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jig/ sa pa las so sor bzlog par bgyi'o// rmi lam
399b6(rgyud): ngan pa dang / stas ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis pa byung ba thams cad so sor bzlog par bgyi'o// char ches pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i char dang / 
399b7(rgyud): sad dang / than pa dang / byi ba'i 'jigs pa rnams so sor bsal bar bgyi'o// dben pa dang / nyams dga' ba dang / lo legs pa dang / 'byor pa sbyar bar bgyi'o// sems
399b8(rgyud): can mi dge ba spyod pa las bzlog par bgyi'o// dge ba la sbyor bar bgyi'o// sems can dge ba spyod pa rnams kyi grogs bdag 'khor dang bcas pas bgyi'o// yang dag pa
400a1(rgyud): dad pas rjesu 'brang bar sgrub par bgyi'o// bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / sems can thams cad bu
400a2(rgyud): gcig pa bzhin du yongasu bskyang bar bgyi'o// chos la zhugs pa'i yid dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pas gnas par bgyi'o// thams cad du bdag mchi bar
400a3(rgyud): bgyi'o// ji ltar rang gi srog 'di yongasu bskyang ba bzhin du gzungs dang / rig sngags grub pa 'di yang yongasu bskyang bar bgyi'o// spyi bos blangs par bgyi'o// khur du
400a4(rgyud): bskur bar bgyi'o// sgrub par 'grub pa chen po stsal ra bar bgyi'o// bgegs dang log 'dren thams ca dodo dang / sems can ma rungs pa dang / gnod sbyin chad pas
400a5(rgyud): gnod pa so sor bzlog par bgyi'o// de nas byang chu/ ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis khros pa'i gad rgyang
400a6(rgyud): spyi gtsug 'bar ba gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po legaso leg so// khyod kyis de bzhin du bya bar rig so// sen
400a7(rgyud): thams cad rje su bzung ba chen pos bzung bar bya'o// rig sngags 'chang ba la bdag nyid kyis srung ba dang / bcang bar bya'o// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po de skyabs
400a8(rgyud): gsum pa la gnas shing dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa'i tshig 'dzin po la gnas par gyur to// rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig
400b1(rgyud): dang ldan par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ 
400b2(rgyud): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yon tan gyi phung po mchog tu bzang ba la gnod sbyin gyi bdag po khas len du bcug cing gzhag pa leg so leg so// khro bo'i rgyal po'i cho ga
400b3(rgyud): nye bar spyad pa de smros shog/ rig sngags 'chang de rnams ji ltar mchog 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / lan gcig dran pa tsam gyis ji lta ji ltar myur ba myur bar las sgrub pa
400b4(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar dran pa tsam gyis ji ltar bsams pa dang / yid la re ba 'byor par 'gyur ba dang / don yod pa'i lcags kyu khro bo'i rgyal po 'di
400b5(rgyud): myur du 'grub par 'gyur ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs kyi byin gyis rlobs shig/ de nas byang chub semasas dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
400b6(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' lung stsal pa rtogs nas nye bar bshad pa'i cho ga smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'chang ba/ rigs kyi bu'am
400b7(rgyud): rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang yin pa'am/ gzhan dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / bud
400b8(rgyud): med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams khro ba'i rgyal po 'di sgrub par 'dod na/ de zla ba yar gyi nga'i tshes bco lnga la 'bras chan dang / 'o ma za zhing nang par sngar lang
401a1(rgyud): la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas mi smra bar gaN+DI brdung ba'i dus la bab kyi bar du
401a2(rgyud): 'bras chan khyor ba bkang ste/ gtor ma brgya rtsa brgyad dbul ba byas na/ des khro bo'i rgyal po sgrub pa'i cho ga de dag 'grub par 'gyur zhing mchog tu 'grub par 'gyuraro// de ltar
401a3(rgyud): bsgrubs nas bzlas brjod gcig dang / dran pa gcig gis thams cad du 'grub par byas na thams cad du bya ba thams cad mchog tu 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags
401a4(rgyud): 'chang ba las byed par 'dod cing / don yod pa'i zhag ngas pa'i snying po sgrub par 'dod na/ khro bo'i rgyal po dalan gcig dran par bya'o// dran pa tsam gyi mod la bgegs
401a5(rgyud): dang / log 'dren thams cad skrag par 'gyur zhing / dang / ga tshad tshun chad du rig sngags 'chang ba'i drung du 'ong bar mi nus te/ rgyang ring po na 'dug go// 'di lan gcig
401a6(rgyud): dran pa tsam gyis bzlas brjod dang / cho ga dang / sgrub pa bde bar 'grub cing dgos pa sgrub pa thams cad grub pa bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
401a7(rgyud): phyag mchog sbyin par mdzad par 'gyur ro// dpag tshad tshun chad du 'bar ba'i lcags kyu chen po 'phang du ri chen po tsam 'byung bar 'gyur te/ dpag tshad gsum gyi tshad
401a8(rgyud): tsam dang / 'og tu g.yang sar gyur te/ su yang 'ong mi nus so// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am tsaM dang / lte 'phye chen
401b1(rgyud): po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / bcas pas gnas der 'ong bar mi nus na/ mi ma yin pa ngal ba dang / bgegs dang log 'dren rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos te gnas
401b2(rgyud): med do// rig sngags 'chang ba 'jigs pa med par yang dgos pa thams cad grub pa sgrub par byed pa/ bgegs med par thams cad du sgrub pa 'grub pa 'thob par 'gyuraro// 
401b3(rgyud): de nas rig sngags 'chang las thams cad bya bar 'dod cing gdon bsal bar 'dod na/ gu gul dang / yungs kar la lan gcig zlas brjod byas te/ gdon la bdug pa sbyin
401b4(rgyud): par bya'o// yungs kar gyis brdeg par bya'o// la/ na gcig dran par bya'o// lag pa g.yas pa'i ma dadzum mo khros pas bsdigs par bya'o// bdug pa dang /

401b6(rgyud): gcan nam/ 'jigs byed kyang 'jig par byed na/ gdon gzhan 'ong bar lta ga la 'gyur te/ mod la gcig tu 'jigs par 'gyuraro// 'byung po dang / gdon gyis yongasu zin
401b7(rgyud): pa thams cad la dur khrod kyi thal ba lan gcig bzlas brjod byas te/ spyi bor gtor zhing lan gcig dran par byas na/ mod la 'byung po dang gdon 'bros par 'gyur ro// na la
401b8(rgyud): da dang / an da ni draka ba tsa dang / gu gul dang / ha sa dang / bal ka dang / ma ta la dang / pad+ma dang / kuShA rnams gnyis dang / ra dza ni dang / yungs kar dang / shing kun dang // 
402a1(rgyud): nar pad+ma dang / bi shar dang / tsan tri ka rnams ri gcin gyis sbrus te/ ril bu nas kyi 'dzel ma tsam byas te/ grib ma la bskams la/ lcags kyul lan
402a2(rgyud): bdun bzlas pa byas nas las thams cad la bdug pa mchog gi ril bu gcig bdug pa byas na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ri dang / nags tshal dang / 
402a3(rgyud): gtsang rong dang bcas pa rnams 'gul lo// rgya mtsho chen po ni 'khrugs so// ri rab chen po ni g.yos so// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas gzhal med khang dang bcas pa ni cher
402a4(rgyud): g.yos te 'gul lo// lha thams cad skrag go// lha ma yi dan thams cad ngu zhing phyogs phyogasu 'bros so// da/ sa ni g.yos so// klu gang dag rgya mtsho na gnas pa dang
402a5(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung ba dang / yi dgas dang / brjed byed dang / gsang ba dang / tshangs pa'i srin po dang / bgegs dang / gdon mi bzad pa
402a6(rgyud): gzhan ma rungs pa de dag thams cad dri tshor ba tsam gyis rnam par zhig par 'gyur te/ dogs par mi bya'o// lus rnam par zhig par 'gyur/ bcom ste rus pa lhags par
402a7(rgyud): 'gyur// 'chi bdag gi zhags pa'i khar 'gro bar 'gyur/ des rnam par zhig par 'gyur ba de la dogs par mi bya'o// dug dang bcas pa ni mod la dug med par 'gyur ro// klu 'jog/ 
402a8(rgyud): bo dang / nor rgyas kyis gal te zin pa 'am/ sbrul gyis zin pa la bdug pa dang / blugs pa tsam gyis thams cad du dug med par 'gyuraro// gang dag 'jig rten na dug sna tshogs
402b1(rgyud): mi bzad pa yod pa la bdug pa'i 'dri tsam dang bskus pa dang / ril bu tsam gyis mod la dug thams cad med par 'gyur te/ the tsom mi bya'o// 'bras dang / phol mig dang / lu ta/ 
402b2(rgyud): dang / shu ba dang / sha bkra dang / rkang shu dang / mdze dang / 'brum bu dang / lhog pa rnam pa mang po dang / nad mched pa dang / lba ba'i phreng ba dang / khong 'bras dang / rku ba na ba dang / 
402b3(rgyud): skran dang / 'khru ba dang / rtsib legs na ba dang / snying ka na ba dang / gre ba 'gags pa dang / rna ba na ba dang / so na ba dang / mig na ba dang / mgo bo na ba dang / gzhogs phyed na ba
402b4(rgyud): ril bus bskus pa tsam dang / chu dron 'thungs pa tsam da dang / bdugs pa tsam dang / bsnams pa tsam gyi sa thams cad de ma thag tu zhi bar 'gyur te/ thams
402b5(rgyud): cad la ril bu dam pa lan gcig bzlas brjod byas te/ byin na thams cad du dgos pa thams cad byed pa/ bla na med pa yin no// shin tu char che ba dang / char mi
402b6(rgyud): 'bab pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i char dang / rlung dang / ser ba dang / 'byung po dang / ma mo'i tshogs dang / mtsho'i klu de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyuraro// char dus su 'bebs
402b7(rgyud): me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / me tog yod par 'gyuraro// phyis ser ba mi 'bebs po// sad dang / rlung dang than pa mi 'byung ngo // phun sum tshogs pa thams cad grub par
402b8(rgyud): byed cing bkra shis pa thams cad grub par byed do// rims drag po ma rungs pa kun tu 'jug pa'i rims mi bzad pa dang / 'das pa mi bzad pa drag po'i rims dang / rims
403a1(rgyud): drag po'i 'jigs pa chen po dang / me 'bar ba shin tu che ba dang / zhag bzhi pa'i rims mi bzad pa dang / glang ba'i rims sdug bsngal chen po dang / 
403a2(rgyud): rims gang dag 'chi ba'i zhags pa 'bar ba/ 'khrugs pa drag po mi bzad pa dang / zlos pa'i rims gso dka' ba dang / nyin gcig pa'i rims dang / nyin gnyis pa'i
403a3(rgyud): rims dang / nyin gsum pa'i rims dang / de bzhin du rlung las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / mchil ma las gyur pa'i rims dang
403a4(rgyud): rims snying pa dang / zug zer dang / gzhang 'brum dang / gcin sgri ba mi bzad pa dang / rims thams cad dal bdugs pa tsam gyis the tsom med par rnam par
403a5(rgyud): 'jigs par 'gyuraro// nam mkha' lding gi gdon dang / gang dag mi 'am ci'i gdon dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang / mi ma yin pa'i gdon dang / gang dag gzhan
403a6(rgyud): mi'i gdon thams cad bdug pas bdugs pa des mod la thams cad rnam par bral bar 'gyur ro// lcags kyu'i gsang sngags dam pa lan gcig dran par byas na skom byed dang / 
403a7(rgyud): bskams pa dang / brjed byed dang / gdon ra za yag sh+ma dang / bdag nyid ngan par byung ba dang / grib gnon dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa gang du skye bo zhe sdang ba rnams 'byung ba
403a8(rgyud): dang / gang du gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / nyon mongs pa mang po rnams la yid du 'ong ba bdug pa tsam gyis thams cad las de thar bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po khros pa dang / 
403b1(rgyud): gang zhig rkun po dang / mi rgod kyi nang du song ngam/ gcong reng bgrod dka' ba'i nang du seng ngam/ dog pa mi bzad pa'i nang du chud pa la lcags kyu lan gcig dran pa dang / bdug pa
403b2(rgyud): mchog gis bdugs na thams cad du rtag tu bde bar 'gro ba dang / gang dang gang du 'gro ba na bde bar 'gyur ro// de'i lus la mes mi tshugs/ chu chen pos khyer bar mi 'gyur// 
403b3(rgyud): lcags kyu'i rig sngags dran pa dang / bdug pa mchog gis bdugs na thams cad du pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bde zhing legs pa shin tu rgyas par 'gyur ro// de'i lus la mtshan gyi
403b4(rgyud): mi tshugs/ dug gis ma yin/ gsang sngags mchog tu drag pos ma yin/ de la byad kyis mi tshugs/ na dad kyis ma yin/ nyon mongs pa drag pos ma yin no// 
403b5(rgyud): gsang sngags dran pa tsam dang / bdug pas bdag pa dug pa ni thams cad du 'jigs pa thams cad la sa thar par 'gyur te/ 'di la dogs pa mi bya'o// dgra
403b6(rgyud): dang phyir rgol ba'i mi sems can ma rungs pa mi bzad pa rnams dang / 'thab mo 'gyed cing g.yul 'gyed pa na bdag nyid bdug pas bdug cing rig sngags lan gcig dran
403b7(rgyud): par byas nas thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur te/ mthong ba tsam la dogs par mi bya'o// gang zhig rig sngags 'grub par mi 'gyur ba dang / gang zhig bgegs kyis zin te
403b8(rgyud): nyams pa dang / blo zhan cing le lo can la bdug pa 'di sbyar bar bya zhing gsang sngags lan gcig bzlas brjod byas na des mchog tu dkon pa 'grub par 'gyuraro// bskal pa
404a1(rgyud): med pa bdag nyid 'dug pa dang / ril bu mchog gis bkru ba dang / mig bsku ba dang / mchog thig le byas na thams cad du skal ba can dang / dga' ba
404a2(rgyud): dang / dbang phyug mtshungs pa med par 'gyuraro// nor dang 'bru 'phel zhing rgyal po dang 'dra bar 'gyuraro// thams cad du stobs thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// thams cad du
404a3(rgyud): mchog grub pa dang / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par dus thams cad du gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bzhis srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bya ba'i phyir nyin mtshan du rje su
404a4(rgyud): 'brang zhing gnas par 'gyuraro// srung ba'i phyir rgyal dpo chen po bzhi dpung 'khor dang bcas pa rig sdugaras kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// bde ba thams cad
404a5(rgyud): kyis tshim par thob par 'gyur ro// gnas gcig nas ril bu bdun blang ba las khro bo'i lcags kyu lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas rig
404a6(rgyud): sngags 'chang ba'am/ gzhan gang rung ba nas/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze bkren pa sdug phongs pa'i bud med dam/ skyes pa'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo'i don du ril bu gcig
404a7(rgyud): gis khrus bya/ gcig gis bdag bdug/ gcig gis gos bdug/ gcig ni ba'i rnam lnga dang / sbyar te btung bar bya// gcig ni mgo'i spyi bor bzhag/ gcig ni dpung pa g.yas
404a8(rgyud): par gdags/ ril bu gcig ni rked par btags na thams cad du 'byor pa thob par 'gyur zhing thams cad du mchog bla na med pa 'grub par 'gyuraro// bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur/ 
404b1(rgyud): rgud pa thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyu ro// rma dang nyam chung ba dang / de bzhin du chags grugs dang / bgegs kyis zin pa dang / gdon za yag shwas zin pa de dag thams ca
404b2(rgyud): rab tu sbyar ba tsam gyis rnam par zhig par 'gyur te/ dogs par mi bya'o// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyur te/ sngon bsags pa'i sgrib pa thams cad mod la rnab
404b3(rgyud): zhig par 'gyur te/ gsang sngags pa ston pa dang / gsang sngags dran cing dran pa dang / bdug pa mchog gis bdugs par byas pas dogs par mi bya'o// mnar med pa dang / 
404b4(rgyud): mi bzad pa'i sdig pa dang / dug dang sems can ma rung renges pa dang / las ngan pa dang / phung ba rnams tham sa cod mod la med par 'gyur ro// mes phye ma leb bzhin
404b5(rgyud): rtag tu myur du sreg par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags lan gcig dran par bya zhing bdug pa 'dis bdugs na dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad zhig par 'gyur ro// 
404b6(rgyud): thams cad du sbyar ba la dogs par mi bya'o// 'khor los bsgyur ba thams cad kyi khro bo'i lcags kyu spyi gtsug 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i bdug pa'i rgyal pos khyim dang / sgra chen
404b7(rgyud): por nam langs ka dang / mun bsros khar bdug cing gsang sngags lan gcig dran par byas na/ khyim gyi nang der gang dag mi snang bar 'dug par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin
404b8(rgyud): dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang sha za dang / brjod byed dang / grib gnon ma rungs pa dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad snang bzhin du phyir 'byung zhing ngus te/ kyi hud zer ba'i
405a1(rgyud): sgra 'byin par 'gyuraro// khyim gang yin pa 'gul ba dang / khyim dang rta babs 'babs par 'gyur zhing dmyal ba'i srung ma mi bzad pa thams cad phyogs/ 
405a2(rgyud): bslad par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / klu mthu bo che thad
405a3(rgyud): bdug pa'i dri bla na med pas skrag par 'gyur ro// bsam pa ngan pa gang dag gnas pa'i khyim thams cad 'bar ba dang / lus bsregs pa dang / phyogs dang phyogs mtshams
405a4(rgyud): 'khrul pa dang / bdug pa'i rgyal po'i mthus 'jig/ das pa mi bzad pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// g.yul 'gyed pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsed pa dang / 
405a5(rgyud): 'thab cing 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ zhing rtag tu rgyal bar 'gyur ro// bde zhing legs par rgyal ba 'grub pa dang / thams cad du dpal thob/ 
405a6(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// lha dang / lha ma yin dang / dri za dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / klu rnams kyis srung ba'i phyir nyon mtshan du rje su 'brang bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin du rje su skyong
405a7(rgyud): ba dang / dus thams cad bla na med pa'i gzi byin skyed par byed do// khro bo'i lcags kyu bla na med pa grub pa'i thog le brjod par bya'o// thig le skar ma lta bu ni/ lha'i nyi ma bzhin
405a8(rgyud): du dpa'/ nyi ma bye ba'i 'od dang mtshungs// bsod nams gzi brjid dag gis 'bar// mun khrod sgron chen 'od bzhin du// mun pa'i nang na snang bar 'gyur// tshogs kyi dkyil
405b1(rgyud): na mdzes pa ni// ma'i tshogs ldan zla ba bzhin// bsod nams bye ba stong phrag dang // dpag med gzhal du med pa yis// lus 'di dag ni brgyan par 'gyur// na mkha' la rin
405b2(rgyud): chen mchod sdong ltar// mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan// ra'i bu bston pa byas na ni// lus ni bsod nams tshogs kyis bskyeng // gang zhig lus ni 'bar ba dang // shin
405b3(rgyud): tu bzang po kho nar 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon po dus rtag tu// phyag ni spyi bar 'jog par mdzad// rtag tu mchog ni sbyin pa dang // kun tu bla med grub par 'gyur// cho ga zhib
405b4(rgyud): mo 'grub pa dang // gsang sngags 'grub cing phyag rgya dang // dkyil 'khor 'grub cing dkyil 'khor gyi// rim par phye ba 'grub 'gyur te// kun tu 'grub
405b5(rgyud): pa bla na med// gi'u wang dang / gur gum dang / ru rta cha snyams te sbyar la khro bo'i lcags kyu'i gsang snga gas brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ tshangs
405b6(rgyud): par spyod pa mnyam par gzhag pa/ khrus legs par byas pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos shing gtsang mas zla ba yar gyi ngo tsha sa bcu gsum skar ma rgyal la bab pa'i tshe
405b7(rgyud): chu gtsang ma dang zhib tu btags la rgyab shug gi 'bru tsom byas te grib ma la bskalas pa la// gang gis che dgos pa rtsom pa de'i tshe/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i lcags kyu la
405b8(rgyud): lan nyi shu rtsa gnyis bzlas brjod byas te smin mtshams su thig le bya'o// smin mtshams su thig le bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs
406a1(rgyud): kyi byin gyis brlabs pa mtshan nyid bzhin du thig le byas te byin gyis brlabs pa byas pa'i mod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi mtsha
406a2(rgyud): nyid rnam par mdzes pa'i thig le dang / mnyam par mtshungs par rgyan par 'gyuraro// thams cad du mchod par bya ba dang / rtag tu bla ma la gus pas dam tshig ma nyams pa dang / 
406a3(rgyud): rgyal po dang mtshungs pa'i blon po dang / btsun mo'i nang du song na thams cad dga' bar 'gyur zhing thams cad du mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro// sems can kun gus pa dang / 
406a4(rgyud): dga' ba ji ltar 'jig rten 'dren pa la bya ba bzhinabyed do// nor dang 'bru dang / lha'i dpal thob par/ 'gyuraro// lha thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur// dbang
406a5(rgyud): po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyung ga chen po dang / 'jig rten skyong ba grags chen dang klu rnams kyis rtag tu mchod par 'os pa chen por
406a6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / gsang ba pa dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis rtag tu mchod pa chen por
406a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / tshe 'phel bar 'gyuraro// nad med pa dang / rims nad med pa dang / sdig pa thams cad spangs pa dang / 
406a8(rgyud): sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang / sdig pa dang / dgra thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dang / dmag gi g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang
406b1(rgyud): du rtag tu thams cad du rgyal bar sbyin par 'gyur ro// dgra dang / phyir rgol ba rnams las gnas thams cad du rtag tu kun du rgyal ba chen po sbyin par 'gyuraro// thig le de
406b2(rgyud): lta bu byas te khro bo'i lcags kyu lan gcig dran par byas la yungs kar la lan gcig bzlas brjod byas te phug gi sgor gtor na phug thams cad sgo gdangs par 'gyur/ 
406b3(rgyud): ji ltar dga' bar 'jug par 'gyur ro// lan gsum zhugs kyi bar du sgo gtan 'jug pa'i gnas su khro bo'i lcags kyu 'bar shig bzlas brjod byas na/ de'i tshe lha'i bu
406b4(rgyud): mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bzang zhing mdze das pa blta bar 'os pa/ mchog tu mdog sdug ci dang 'khrig pa dang ldan pa/ dpal gyis shin tu dpa'
406b5(rgyud): zhing 'bar ba/ bzhin 'dzum pa/ lus ngo tsha tsa lta/ ra byed pa/ 'gros 'gying bag tu 'ong bar 'gyur/ te/ spyi bo yid tsam btud nas gser gyi snod rin po
406b6(rgyud): ches bkang ba thogs te rig sngags 'chang la 'bul bar byed do// rig sngags 'chang bas cang mi smra bar bya'o// rin po che'i snod kyang blang bar mi bya'o// gsang
406b7(rgyud): sngags 'ba' shig dran par bya zhing / yungs kar gyis brdeg na gzhon nu ma la brdeg par bya'o// tsi ste me sdug pa 'byin cing bzhin bsgyur ba khro bo'i gzugs mchu
406b8(rgyud): 'phyang ba/ mche ba gtsigaso pa/ ska ral pa ser la gyen du brdzes la rol pa cod pan gyis rgyan par ston ni rig sngags 'chang bas sreg par mi bya'o// khro bo'i
407a1(rgyud): lcags kyu 'ba' zhig dran par bya'o// yang yungs kar gyis mgo'i spyi bor brdeg cing khros pa'i gzugs kyis dran par byas na/ de'i tshe
407a2(rgyud): de sa la 'gyel te/ 'dre ldog cing kye rig sngags 'chang thugs rje can khyed rig sngags 'chang khyab 'jug gi gzugs can gum gum mo zhes sgra 'byon to// de nas
407a3(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang bas rje su brtags te gal te/ kha chu dbu bar 'byung na/ rig sngags 'chang bas de blangs la rkang pa dang byin pa bskus na rlung gi phung po bdun pa'i
407a4(rgyud): rlung la zhon te na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang ba'i 'khor lo sgyur bar 'gyur zhingad rig sngags 'chang ba'i 'khor brgya phrag bye ba dgu
407a5(rgyud): bcu rtsa dgus bskor bar 'gyuraro// skad cig tu ste/ nga gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mtha' song zhing slar yang 'ong bar 'gyur// gal
407a6(rgyud): te reg na ni skyes nas le bcu drug lon pa dang 'dra zhing skra yid tsam 'khril zhing 'khril ba/ rna cha gdu bu dri ma med cing spen tog 'phyang ba dang / 'khrig ma gdu bus brgyan pa
407a7(rgyud): lus pad+ma 'dra zhing dkar sham du 'gyuraro// che bskal pa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis thub par 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang ba'i 'o khor los bsgyur ba stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa
407a8(rgyud): gnyis kyi 'khor gyis bskor bar 'gyur ro// gnas thams cad du dpon por 'gyur ro// gal te thig le byas te mi snang bar gyur na gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po zad
407b1(rgyud): kyi khyim sge bye ste 'dug par 'gyuraro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad bgyi ba ci mchis zhes dbang du 'gyur zhing bka' bzhin du
407b2(rgyud): 'jug go/ mngags pa'i dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// khyim thams cad du re rer yang dpon po dang / dga' bzhin byed pa'i rgyal por 'gyuraro// gal te mtshogs
407b3(rgyud): mar thig le byas na brgya byin dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris bdag po'i lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu dang bcas pa thams cad kyis/ 
407b4(rgyud): mchod par 'gyur te rig sngags 'tshang ba la bya ba thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// shin tu mthong ba'i lha'i rigs kyi lha rnams dang
407b5(rgyud): lhan cig tu rtse dga' kun tu spyod par 'gyur ro// tshe lha'i lo stong legs par thub par 'gyur ro// lte ba'i gnas su thig le byas te klu mtsher zhugs
407b6(rgyud): pa tsam gyis mod la klu'i rgyal po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas chung ma dang / bu mo gzhon nu ma 'am/ thams cad mdun na 'dug cing 'di skad ces smras te
407b7(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang ba bka' stsol cig dang / las bgyi ba dang / dgos pa thams cad bgyi zhing nam mtsho'i bar du nye bar gnas par bgyi'o// ye
407b8(rgyud): byad thams cad kyis mi brel bar sgrub par bgyi'o// klu'i lha'i longs spyod mchog tu longs spyad pas brtse bar bgyi'o// lha'i lo stong gi bar du rjes su
408a1(rgyud): gnas par bgyi'o// nor thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o// rin po che sna tshogs gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUr+ya dang
408a2(rgyud): shang ka shi la dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / gser dang / mu tig dang / in dra nI la dang / ma ra ka ta dang / pad+ma ra ga dang / bai DUr+ya dang / shin
408a3(rgyud): tu bzang po rnams su stsal bar bgyi'o// lha rdzas kyi bza' ba mchog dang / lha rdzas kyi nor gyi phung pos bang mdzod rnams rab tu dgang bar bgyi'o// shin tu
408a4(rgyud): char ches pa bcad par bgyi'o// char dkon pa na char dbab par bgyi'o// dus ma yin pa'i char ba cad par bgyi'o// dus su char dbab pa dang / 
408a5(rgyud): dus su char pa'i rgyun 'byung bar bgyi'o// lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs dang / lha rdzas kyi 'bras bu sna tshogs nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o// nam mtsho'i
408a6(rgyud): bar du gnas te bsnyen bkur bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang ba'i rkang pa spyi bos blang bar bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang ba de'i tshig dang bsam pa rjes su bskyang bar bgyi'o// 
408a7(rgyud): dpung pa gnyis kyi bar du thig le byas na glang po che stong gi stobs yod par 'gyur te/ phyir rgol ba dang / dgra thams cad kyi stobs kyi mi thub par 'gyur ro// 'thab
408a8(rgyud): cing dmag gi g.yul 'gyed pa thams cad kyi nang du pha rol gnon pa'i stobs thogs pa med pa rgyal ba sbyin par 'gyur ro// lha ma yin kun las kyang rgyal bar
408b1(rgyud): 'gyur ro// lha thams cad 'di la srung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyang ba'i phyir rtag tu na 'bring du 'brang bar 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed
408b2(rgyud): pa dang / dngogs 'byin pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / g.yul 'gyed pa thams cad du rgyal ba sbyin par 'gyu ro// lto bar thig le byas te/ khro bo'i lcags kyu'i rig sngags lan cig
408b3(rgyud): dran par byas la yid la ji ltar bsams pa ji bzhin byas na ci 'dod pa'i kha zas thob par 'gyur te/ 'khor nyi shu dang bcas pas ji ltar 'dod pa thob par 'gyuraro// sker thig le byas te khro ba
408b4(rgyud): lcags kyu sker lan gcig bzlas brjod byed cing rgyal po'i pho dbrang du song na ji tsam 'dod pa'i gos dang / spyad pa dang / rgyan thob par 'gyur ro// rtag tu rgyal po dang / btsun mo'i
408b5(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas pas mchod par 'os pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// dbang phyug chen po'i chen po thob pa grub pa ra 'gyuraro// lag mthil du thig le byas te lan gcig
408b6(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas na gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyuraro// gang 'dod pa de thad sbyin zhing bsgo ba de thams cad byed par 'gyuraro// lag pa g.yas pa la bskus la lan gcig bzlas brjod byas
408b7(rgyud): te/ grong khyer gyi sgo la brdabs na grong khyer na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/ mdun na gnas shing de zad bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro// grong de na skye bo
408b8(rgyud): gang dag gnas pa bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo de thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/ mdun na gnas shing ji sring grong khyer der 'dug par 'od pas de srid du thams cad ci bya ba thams
409a1(rgyud): cad byed cing gnas pa dang mdun na 'dug par 'gyuraro// lag pa g.yon pa la bskus te rgyal po'i sgo la brdabs na ji srid 'dug par 'dod na de srid du thams cad dbang du gyur
409a2(rgyud): pa sbyin par 'gyur ro// lag pa g.yas pa la bskus zhing lan gcig bzlas brjod bya ste/ phug gi gsang ba'i sgo la brdab pa byas na gsang ba'i khyim thams cad sgo phye ste 'dug cing khyim na gan+da
409a3(rgyud): ba de dag thams cad dbang du gyur te 'dug go// rkang pa gnyis la bsku zhing gsang sngags lan gcig dran par byas te dur khrod du song na dur khrod na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 
409a4(rgyud): 'byung po dang / sha za thams cad mdun na gnas shing dbangad du 'gyur ba dang / khyim gyi sgo thams cad phye ba dang / tha/ dmas cad bya ba ci yod pa byed par 'gyuraro// brla gnyis la
409a5(rgyud): bskus te nags tshal gyi nang du zhugs pa tsam gyis khyim na gnas pa thams cad mdun na gnas shing khyim gyi sgo thams cad phye ste 'dug par 'gyur ro// sman gyi rdzas
409a6(rgyud): thams cad dang / rtsa dang / shing gel ba'i sman dang / rtsa dang / mgo spogs kyi nags tshal gyi rang gi ngo bo thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa blang ba bzhin du mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro// dpa
409a7(rgyud): lha mo chen mo'i nu ma'i bar du bsku zhing khros pas gsang sngags lan gcig bzlas brjod byas shing gu gul la bzlas brjod byas te bdug pa dbul zhing mig mi 'dzums par bltas
409a8(rgyud): na dpal lha mo chen mo bka' stsol cing mchog thams cad sbyin par byed do// nor shin tu mang po rnyed pa sbyin par mdzad do// dpal lha mo chen mo rtag tu khyim na gnas par 'gyuraro// yo byad
409b1(rgyud): rnams zad kyis yongasu skyong bar 'gyu ro// nam 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyu ro// ma'i 'o ma dang lhan cig tu bdar la lan gcig bzlas brjod byas te mig la bskus na gter thang mthod
409b2(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// mtshan me yang nyin par bzhin mthong bar 'gyur ro// mchu'i thor to la thig le bya zhing lan gcig bzlas brjod byas na gang la smra ba de dbang du 'gyur zhing gang 'dod pa de zad
409b3(rgyud): thob par 'gyuraro// tshig gzung bar bya bar 'gyur ro// kha nas ut+pa la'i dri mnam par 'gyuraro// gdon la thig le byas na zin pa dang / ma zin pa 'bab par 'gyuraro// gdon zad la thig le byas/ 
409b4(rgyud): zhing lan gcig gsang sngags dran por byas na mod la tshangadas pa'i srin po la sogs pa'i bar du thams cad du zhing 'bros par 'gyur ro// thig le tsam dang dran pa tsam gyis
409b5(rgyud): thams cad las yongasu thar par 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa tham sa cad la thig le byas na yongasu thar par 'gyu ro// phra ga pa gnyis la thig le bya zhing khro bo lan gcig dran par
409b6(rgyud): byas na phrag pa gnyis 'bar bar 'gyuraro// mtshal dang sbyar te dri chab dang bsres nas lag pa dang rkang pa la bsku zhing gsang sngags lan bdun dran par byas nas phu zhes byas na me
409b7(rgyud): 'bar bar 'gyur te/ ji tsam 'dod kyi bar du 'bar ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mchu la bsku zhing bzlas brjod byas na dbugs rgyu ba rnams me 'bar ba 'byung bar 'gyur// lus mtha' dag bsku
409b8(rgyud): zhing gsang sngags mang du bzlas brjod byas na lus mtha' dga'abar bar 'gyur ro// chu dang / nyungs kar gyis bskrad nas bum pa dang / bum pa la zhi ba'i thig le byas te/ dri chus steng du
410a1(rgyud): // gtor ba dang bcas pa byas na phyir yang gnas par 'gyuraro// ral gri dang / btun shing dang / drag sta dang / 'khor lo dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / rdo rje dang / tho ba dang / mda' bo che dang / 
410a2(rgyud): gdung la sku zhing rje su dran par byas na skad cig du thad 'bar bar 'gyu ro// lhung bzed la bskus na 'bar bar 'gyuraro// mgo la bskus na skra 'bar bar 'gyur ro// dung la bskus te gnas mthon por bus na/ 
410a3(rgyud): sgra gang thos pa tsam gyis sen thams cad kyi khro ba thams cad dang / sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// ngan pa dang / ma rungs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// sprin log su bus na rlung sprin
410a4(rgyud): dang ser ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyu ro// grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir dbus na/ byur dang gnod pa thams cad dang / lo nyes da dang / nad ma rungs pa dang / 'thab pa dang / brtsod pa dang 'gyed/ 
410a5(rgyud): pa dang / 'tshang 'dru ba dang / mi bde ba dang / 'khrugs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin bu dang / sha za dang / yi dgas dang / skem byed dang /
