410a7(rgyud): pa zad las yongasu thar bar 'gyuraro// rgyal po'i sgor bus na pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'jigs pa thams cad dang / dgra dang / phyir rgol ba'i 'jigs pa thaMd rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing lan
410a8(rgyud): 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur// ba lang 'chi ba dang / phyugs 'chi ba dang / mi 'chi ba dang / rta 'chi ba dang / glang po che 'chi ba dang / rnga ma'i che ba dang / byung dang / lo nyes pa dang / nad dang / mig nad dang / nad/ 
410b1(rgyud): thams cad kyi 'jigs pa che po 'byung ba la khang pa'i steng du skad drag po lan gcig dung bud cing bzlas brjod byas na/ bus pa tsam gyi modo la thad rab tu zhi bar 'gyuraro// char mi 'bab pa'i tshe/ klu'i
410b2(rgyud): gnas 'tsho 'gram du bus na mod la klu'i rgyal po rnams char pa'i rgyun gtong bar 'gyur ro// char ches pa'i tshe sprin logasu bus na shin tu char che ba zhi bar 'gyur ro// lan 'ga' yang mtshan ma ngan
410b3(rgyud): pa dang / bkra ma shis pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// mtshams chen po bcad na ri mthon po'i khar bus te/ ji tsam dung sgra thos pa de tsam du tshun chad mtshams chen po bcad pa byas par 'gyuraro// 
410b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor mtshams bcad na bskor zhing bus na dkyil 'a khor gyi mtshams bcad par byas par 'gyur ro// de na sa khro bo'i rgyal po'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga sgrub pa bla na med pa
410b5(rgyud): thams cad bya ba la sems can thams cad zhi bar bya ba la nas dang nyungs kar mar dang bsres la shing arga'i me bus te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas pa tsam
410b6(rgyud): gyis dpag tshad kyi nang kun tu zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// yams kyi nad kyi gnod pa thams cad dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// lan
410b7(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na dpag tshad brgya tshun chad kun tu zhi ba chen po'i las byas par 'gyuraro// rgyas pa byas na yungs kar dang / 'bras sA lu dang / khar dang / sbrang rtsi dang / 
410b8(rgyud): mar dang bsres te/ sbyin sreg bya ba ni lan bdun sbyin sreg byas na dpag tshad brgya kun tu rgyas pa chen por 'gyuraro// lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na dpag tshad brgya tshun chad rgyas
411a1(rgyud): pa chen por 'gyur ro// lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na dpag tshad brgya stong kun tu rgyas pa chen por 'gyuraro// shing dri mi zhim pa'i me bus te/ 'bras kyi phub ma dang / lan
411a2(rgyud): tshwa dang / yungs kar mar dang bsres te shing tsher ma can gyi yam sregs shing gi me sbar te sbyin sreg lan bdun nam/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ brgya rtsa brgyad byas na yid la ji ltar sems shing 'dod/ 
411a3(rgyud): pa thad du mngon spyod kyi las rnams byed par 'gyuraro// gsang sngags grub par 'dod na 'bras yos dang / nyungs kar dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te/ shing arga'i yam sreg shing / 
411a4(rgyud): gis me sbar te sbyin sreg lan bdun byas na rang gi khro bo'i gas dang sngags sgrub pa 'grub par 'gyuraro// lan bcu bzhi bya das na don yod pa'i lcags kyu grub par 'gyur ro// nyi shu rtsa
411a5(rgyud): gcig bzlas brjod dang sbyin sreg byas na don yod pa'i zhag sa pa'i snying po 'grub par 'gyuraro// lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod sbyin sreg byas na de bzhin gshegs pa thad
411a6(rgyud): kyi rigs kyi spyi grub par 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs dang / pad+ma'i rigs dang / rdo rje'i rigs rnamaso// gzhan yang khro bo chen po stong phrag brgya
411a7(rgyud): mchog tu grub pa chen por 'gyur ro// til dang / 'braso ba dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar rnams sbyar te/ char pa bdun sbyin sreg byas na bram ze thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// lan brgya rtsa brgyad
411a8(rgyud): sbyin sreg byas na/ brgya byin la sogs pa lha thang lha'i tshogs dang bcas pa yang 'ong zhing rig sngags 'chang ba la bsnyen bkur byed cing dbang du 'gyuraro// nyi ma dang zla ba dag kyang 'ong bar
411b1(rgyud): 'gyur zhing rig sngags 'chang ba'i rkang pa la 'dud par 'gyu ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dbang du byan 'bras sa lu dang / til dang yungs kar dang / gu gul dang / zho dang sbrang rtsi rnams
411b2(rgyud): mar dang bsres te sbyin sreg lan nyi shu rtsa gcig byas na gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i tshogs rnams dbang du 'gyur ro// klu char 'bebs par byas na 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / 
411b3(rgyud): nA ga puSh+pa dang / zho dang sbrang rtsi rnams pa mar dang sbyar te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na klu rnams char pa'i rgyun chen po 'bebs par 'gyur te/ ji tsam 'dod par char pa'i
411b4(rgyud): rkyen gtong zhing 'beb so// shin tu char che ba gcod na de nyid kyi thal ba na mkha' la gtor na shin tu char che bgacod par 'gyur ro// pha rol gyi g.yul bzlog par 'dod
411b5(rgyud): na ske tshe'i 'bru dang / zho dang sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bya'o// 'thab pa dang rtse da pa dang / 'gyed cing 'tshang 'dru ba thams cad la spri yang
411b6(rgyud): ku'i me tog dang / zho dang sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na/ thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyuraro// 'thab rtsod dang 'gyed pa rnams kyi smra ba'i lan
411b7(rgyud): thebs par 'gyuraro// nad thams cad zhi bar bya ba la sran ku lan tha dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te sbyin sreg lan nyi shu rtsa gcig byas na nad
411b8(rgyud): thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// bud med dbang du bya na sum na'i me tog gis lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na bud med zad mchog tu dbang du byed pa'i dam
412a1(rgyud): pa yin zhing thams cad du mchog grub par 'gyur ro// de nas sdig pa thams cad rnam par sbyang bar 'dod na rigs sngags 'chang ba de 'bras sA lu dang / til dang / 
412a2(rgyud): yungs kar dang / pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// 'on te khrob
412a3(rgyud): rgyal po sgrub par 'dod na seng ldeng gi phye ma dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul rnams mar dang sbyar te sbyin sreg byas na thams cad du khro bo'i gsang sngags grub pa chen po 'grub par 'gyur zhing khro
412a4(rgyud): bo'i gsang sngags thams cad spyan drangs par 'gyur ro// / 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i da rgyal po// bam po nyi shu lnga pa rdzogas+ho// // de nas
412a5(rgyud): hUM zhes bya ba dran pas khro bo'i rgyal po gshegs par 'gyuraro// las 'grub pa ston pa dang / mthong ba sbyin pa dang nga / 'dod pa'i mchog thams cad rab tu sbyin par 'gyuraro//

412a8(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang khro bo'i rgyal po'i sku mdun na bzhugs shing rigs sngags 'chang ba dbugs 'byin par mdzad do// mchog gang 'dod cing gsol ba'i mchog de
412b1(rgyud): thams cad sbyin par mdzad do// phyag g.yas pa mgo bar spyi bor 'jog par mdzad do// gal te skal pa chung ba zhig ste mngon duzhal mi mthong na de'i tshe rmi lam du bstan te thams cad bka'
412b2(rgyud): sbyor cing ji ltar 'dod pa'i mchog sbyin te/ gsang sngags grub pa chen po dang / cho ga zhib mo grub pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya dang / rim par phye 'a grub par smin no// dam
412b3(rgyud): tshig grub pa chen po rab tu ston to// dbang phyug thob par bya na/ 'bras so bstu ra sa dang / zho dang sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na dbang phyug so sor thob par
412b4(rgyud): 'gyur// grong thob par bya na/ tan tu li ya kha dang zho dang da sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin de srogs byas na grong thob par 'gyur ro// yul gyi bdag
412b5(rgyud): por bya na 'bras sa lu dang ras bal sa bon rnams dang bsres te brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin bsregs byas na yul thob par 'a gyuraro// mi snang bar byas na/ ske tshe dang ldan tshwa'i sbyin bsreg
412b6(rgyud): bya'o// na mkha' la 'gro bar bya na/ shA ta pad tri ka'i me tog gi sbyin bsreg bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi sku mthong bar bya na/ shi li dang tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / du ru ka rnams til dang sbyar to lan brgya
412b7(rgyud): rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po mthong bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rig sngags 'chang ba legaso leg so zhes gsungs zhing dbugs 'byin to// de
412b8(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis mgo'i spyi bor phyag 'jog cing mchog grub pa chen po rtsol bar mdzad// thams cad du mchod pa 'os par chen por 'gyuraro// shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi
413a1(rgyud): kham su skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe ngas dran par 'gyu'o// 'jig rten kun gyi bla mar 'gyuraro// dgra thams cad gzhos par 'dod na 'bras mgrugs ngas sbyin pas
413a2(rgyud): la gta bsgral na / sa ngon med pa chen po'i spyan brjo par bya ste// khra bar rgyal po'i dis gru chen de sgyu ma'i ngos gru blan med pa/ grags pas grub bams pa stan pa'i sa gru tham
413a3(rgyud): med pa/ grub pa rigs sngags 'chang gi rnam par 'phrul pa ston pa lhur len pa bde bskyed pa la mkhas pa rnams kyi rig sngags 'chang gi dngos grub kyi de kho na nyid// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
413a4(rgyud): kyi de kho na nyid mchog tu gsang ba/ byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa/ ngog su zhugadas pa rnams kyi rab tu sgrub pa/ dang pa'i rjesu 'brang ba rnams na
413a5(rgyud): par sel ba// don gyi stegs mchog tu grub pa/ mal cha dang gtan med pa rnams kyi gos sems can thams cad kyi chod par bya ba chen po/ thams cad lu las thams cad lags
413a6(rgyud): par grub pa/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad 'phrog pa/ btug pa thams cad 'joms pa/ rgyal po mnyes par byed pa/ rnam par thar pa dang dul ba'i grong khyer nyid de/ dge bsnyen rnams kyi mchog tu skyid pa/ 
413a7(rgyud): dge bsnyen ma rnam kyi dga' ba 'phel bar byed pa// rigs pa'i rgyal po'i yon tan rma du byung ba'i de kho na nyid sgrub pa grub pa rnams gtsang ma gtsang sbrar spyod pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos te/ bza' ba
413a8(rgyud): mchog shin tu gsang ba dang / bag yod cing bden par smra ba/ dkon mchog gsum la mchog tu dad pa/ bla ma la gus pa/ rtag par rgyun tu byams pa'i sems la mnyam par gzhag pa/ sems can
413b1(rgyud): thams cad la brtse bar gyur pa/ sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba'i yid can/ 'byung po thams cad la brtse ba'i sems dang byams pas bla na med pa'i sgrub pa 'di bya'o// bslab pa dang sdom pa blangs pa
413b2(rgyud): don yod pa chen po'i sgyu ma bla na med pa ni 'di'o// gi wang dang / smi ka dang / pu shel rtse dang / tsan dan dang / ldong ros dang / shing kun dang / spang spros dang / na lang dang / ru ta dang bcas pa dang
413b3(rgyud): de bzhin du 'bras dgang te 'di rnams thams cad cha mnyam ste/ phye mar byas nas thams cad zhib mor btags la/ ga pur dang / glartsis dgos te/ snyigs ma 'di dag tsha ba'i til mar gyis
413b4(rgyud): bcos pa/ nye'u shing dang / ba'i ba dang / me tog brgya pang do/ puSh+kar dang / gan+d+ha pri yang gu dang / rgya spos dang / sa dmusta dang / pra pud+d+ha rI ka dang / shing mngar rnams chu bre bdun ga
413b5(rgyud): bar sbyin par bya ste drug chu lhag mar lus pa dang / snyigs ma be gang dang 'o mi'i snyigs ma bor te/ til mar srang ga nyis la rtag tu brtso bar bya'o// legs par grub pa'i gsang
413b6(rgyud): sngagaso bzlas brjod byas la gtor ma dang / dkyil 'khor du me tog dang / dri bzang po'i bdug pa dang / til mar brtse ba'i cho ga bzhin du rab tu sbyar la gang las grub pa khyad par du bskyed cing
413b7(rgyud): babs pa'i til mar byis pa srung ba'i cho ga bya ste/ gnod gtsang ma bkang nas slar yang gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas brjod byas nas gsang ba'i gnasu bzhag par bya'o// de nas
413b8(rgyud): las thams cad byed du gzhug ste/ rig sngags 'chang khrus legs par byas pa/ dris bsgos pa'i til mar rtag tu lus la byugs pa 'ongs/ lus de mi snang shing dngos po med par ston/ 
414a1(rgyud): par byed/ gzos la reg par ma byed do// gang gis lus khrus ma byas kyib ji sring du bdag nyid mi snang ste lus ma mthong ngo // dpral ba cig le byas nas
414a2(rgyud): yan lag dang nying lag rnams la reg te/ gsang sngags lan cig bzlas brjod byas na na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur te/ skad cig la dga' bar byed pa dang / lha dang bcas pa'i rig sngags
414a3(rgyud): 'chang gi dbang po mkha' la spyod pa rnams kyis lhan cig tu til mar mgo la byugs pas mdog sngo ba dang / skra cung zad li zhing 'khyil bar 'gyur ro// til mar grub pa'i rig sngags
414a4(rgyud): 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i mnga' bdag tu 'gyuraro// reg pa tsam gyis tshe bskal pa khri thub par / ro// lus pad+ma kar sham lta bur 'gyur// lus rdo rje ltar brta/ 
414a5(rgyud): pa dang / gnas kyi sgo thams cad bye te 'dug// gang du 'dod pa/ ra 'jug par byed do// dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'i dus/ su rig sngags 'chang la thig le byas nas lag du rdo rje dang / 
414a6(rgyud): nor bu byas na/ na mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur te/ maud la dkyil 'khor grub pa ston par byed do// til mar gyis rkang pa la byugs na// nam mkha' la 'ong bar byed// lus la byugs na/ mi snang bar ston
414a7(rgyud): bar byed do// mtshal dang til mar lhan cig sbyar te/ yan lag dang / nying lag la thig le byas na/ lus 'bar ba'i snying po mthong bar byed do// 'di dag rig sngags 'chang gi rnam 'phrul so sor
414a8(rgyud): bstan pa'o// yungs kar la bzlas te/ lan cig bskus sam/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gtor na/ dkyil 'khor g.yo bar 'gyur te/ 'khor lo bzhin du bskor bar bye'o// gtor ma'i snong gang ba
414b1(rgyud): rnams dang / bus pa gang ba rnams sor mo brgyad kyi tshad kyi na mkha' la phags te 'dugo/ rang shing se gol gyi sgras yongasu 'don par byed na// slar yang snod na mkha' 'phags te 'dug par rang ra
414b2(rgyud): gnas par 'gyur ro// 'di rnams dkyil 'khor dgos pa bla na med pa'i dngos grubo// de nas seng ge'i khrag dang til mar lhan cig sbyar te/ bdag nyid kyi lus la byugs na/ mi yi seng ge chen po'i gzugs
414b3(rgyud): su mthong bar 'gyur te/ ji srid lus khrus ma byas pa de srid mo'i seng ger kun tu gan so// gzhan yang ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du// na mkha' la 'phags te 'dug pa dang / mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang / me
414b4(rgyud): 'bar ba ston par byed do// phag gi khrag dang sbyar na/ phag gi dgazugasu ston par byed de/ shugs dang stobs chen poston par bye'o// glang po che'i khrag dang sbyar bas tshogs kyi dbang
414b5(rgyud): phyag chen po'i gzugasu ston par byed// rti'i khrag dang sngon po lhan cig sbyar ba lus la byugs pa tsam gyis rta ma grin gyis gzugasu ston par byed ji srid khrus ma byas pa de
414b6(rgyud): srid du mthong bar byed do// ba lang gi mkhris pa dang lhan cig sbyar na/ khyu mchog chen po la zhon par mthong bar 'gyur ro// nyi'i mkhris pa dang lhan cig sbyar na/ klu'i rgyal po chu bdag chen po'i
414b7(rgyud): gzugasu mthong bar 'gyur ro// sbrul dmar mo'i khrag dang / bsres nas sbyar na/ sbrul chen po gzugasu mthong bar 'gyur ro// ra'i khrag dang bsres pas/ ra tshan po'i gzugasu mthong bar 'gyuraro// 
414b8(rgyud): pad+mo'i lo ma dang / phye ma dang / rtsa ba dang / bcas pa dang / mdab ma dang / me tog dang / sdong bu dang bcas pa til mar gyi lhan cig sbyar bas yungs kar la bskus te lus la byugs la til mar gyi thag
415a1(rgyud): le byas/ mkhas pas yan lag dang nying lag la byug pa byas na rgyal po chen po'i cha lugasu mthong bar 'gyur te/ ma mo'i tshogs dang bcas pas yongasu bskor bas dgos pa
415a2(rgyud): sna tshogs pa dang / rgyal po'i dgos pa rnams byed par 'gyuraro// yid la bsams pa'i dgos pa thams cad sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro// ldong ros kyi mig sman dang lhan cig bsres nas mig la byugs
415a3(rgyud): na/ 'khor chen po'i dbusu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugasu mthong bar 'gyur ro// rig pa'i rgyal po bzlas te yungs kar de na mkha' la gter na/ 'bras bu sna tshogs kyi char 'bab par mthong bar 'gyur
415a4(rgyud): pad+ma'i snying pos sbyar na/ pad+ma chen po'i char 'byung bar 'gyuraro/ 8/ ud pa la sngon po'i khu bas sbyor na/ ud pa la sngon po che dan po'i char 'byung ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar me tog gi lu
415a5(rgyud): bas sbyar ba de lta de ltar me tog gi char chen po 'byung bar 'a/ gyur ro// ji ltar yid la 'dod pa'i gzugs dang / kha dog dang / rtags dang / dbyingasu mthong bar 'dod pa de lta de ltar
415a6(rgyud): lha'i til mar snying pa dang lhan cig sbyar nas/ da lta de ltar ngo dang de nyid kyi gzugasu mthong bar 'gyur ro// gzhal yas khang yang mthong bar 'gyuraro// lag pas nor bu gcig blangs te// yid la
415a7(rgyud): rjesu dran par byas na/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa du ma'i bdag nyid du mthong bar 'gyur ro// gos dang / rgyan sna tshogs pa rnams ston par byed do// lag pas snod la gzung na/ snod sna tshogs pa
415a8(rgyud): bton par byed do// lag pas bum pa la bzung na/ bum pa brgya stong phrag ston par byed do// rkang pa'i mthil la bskus na/ gang du rdo ba la rkang pa bzhag pa de dang de nyid du rkang pa'i rjes
415b1(rgyud): 'jog par byed de/ mar gsar la nye bar 'jog ji lta ba bzhin du/ mar gsar mnyen pa bzhin du rdo ba yang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// gtun shin la byugs na/ rtags 'thung bar 'gyur ro// ma
415b2(rgyud): mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi gnas zhugs na/ ma mo'i lha rnams kyi so so tha dad pa'i rdul gzung te til mar dang lhan cig sbyar nas so so'i gdong la byugs na/ lha de dang de lta bu'i gzugasu ston
415b3(rgyud): par byed do// gzhan yang dgos pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams rang gi 'dod pa'i blos las bya'o// de nas blo 'phel bar byed pa ni// til mar dang / 'o ma lhan cig zos na/ blo dang dran pa chen
415b4(rgyud): po 'phel bar 'gyuraro// nub gsum gyi sbyor bas tshigasu ban da pa stong klog par byed cing 'dzin par byed do// zhag pa dun gyi sbyor bas blo gros rgya mtsho chen po lta bu 'phel bar byed
415b5(rgyud): cing sogs par byed do// zhag bcu bzhi'i sbyor bas che lha'i lo steng du 'gyur ro// zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi sbyor bas bcud lon sgrub pa'i dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur te/ ga
415b6(rgyud): ma dang / ska dkar spangs la dang / skra chung zad 'khyil bar 'gyuraro// lus 'jam zhing mnyen pa dang / pad+ma'i kha dog dang 'dra bar 'gyuraro// skyes nas lo bcu len pa dang 'dra bar gzugs dang lang
415b7(rgyud): mtsho dang / ldan par 'gyur ro// glang po che stong phrag bcu'i stobs 'gyur ro// zhag nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi sbyor bas glang po che sa srang gi stobasu 'gyuraro// gsum nu so lnga'i sbyor bas na mkha' lding chen po
415b8(rgyud): stobasu 'gyur ro// zhag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi sbyor bas lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang 'dra bar brtson 'grus dang stobs chen por 'gyuraro// zhag bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i sbyor bas ri rab lhun po
416a1(rgyud): chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' ngos yongasu bskor ba/ mi g.yo zhing mi skul/ reg par bya ba ma yin zhing mi mthong ba/ 
416a2(rgyud): mi ma yin pa rnams kun tu spyod pa/ lha rnams thams cad kyi phyag byas shing / phag bya ba'i 'osu gyur pa// drang srong rnams kyis bstod pa'i 'os gyur pa/ gnod sbyin dang srin po rnams kyi
416a3(rgyud): bya ba'i 'os gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rab tu bsngags pa'i 'osu gyur pa/ rig sngags
416a4(rgyud): 'chang ba'i dbang po thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig grub dpa/ lha'i dbang po rnams kyis lhan cig 'gran pa'i 'os gyur pa/ tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug
416a5(rgyud): chen po rnams kyi mngon du smra ba'i 'osu gyur pa klu'i dbang po/ thams cad kyi nye bar bskyod par bya ba ste/ de ltar don/ yod pa'i lcags kyu'i khro bo'i rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya
416a6(rgyud): ba til mar gyi rgyal po'i rnam par 'phrul pa yon tan chen po rmad du byung ba brgya stong phrag gis gang pa'o// til mar gyi rgyal po'i rig sngags 'chang 'dis/ til mar gyi rgyal po ral gri la byugs
416a7(rgyud): na byugs pa tsam gyis ral gri 'bar bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te/ ral gri'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba thams cad kyi mchog tu
416a8(rgyud): 'gyuraro// rdo rje la byugs na rdo rje 'bar bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur ba na mkha' la 'gro zhing rdo rje rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro// 
416b1(rgyud): 'khor lo la byugs na 'khor lo 'bar bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// blta na sdug pa'i 'khor lo'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur bar
416b2(rgyud): mo la 'gyur ro// dgra thams cad rab tu 'joms so// btung rtse gsum pa la byugs na 'bar bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur te/ na mkha'
416b3(rgyud): la gnas par byed do// stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa dbang phyug chen po dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// 'bras dang / phol mig dang / lhog pa dang / mi dpal dang / shu ba dang / 
416b4(rgyud): mdze dang / rkang shu dang / rtsi'i rma dang / mgul pa 'ag/ gas pa dang / rna ba'i rtsa nang dang / mtshan par rdol bad/ dang / rmu chu dang / sman dang / rlung dang / mkhris pa dang // 
416b5(rgyud): bad kan dang / 'dus pa nyid la yang / mkhas pas chu rdza na mo 'thungs pa tsam dang / byugs pa tsam gyis nang thams cad sel lo// til mar gyis nad thams cad sel
416b6(rgyud): ba de bzhin du/ rtsibs logs na ba dang / tshad pa dang / snying na ba dang / mchin pa na ba dang / bshang ba 'khyim pa dang / pho ba'i nad kyi nyes pa de rnams thams cad 'thungs pa tsam gyis
416b7(rgyud): rnam par 'jig par the tsom med do// nyams pa dang / zad pa dang / de bzhin du rgyal po'i dpal bcom pa dang / gsos spyad ngan pa rnams bskus pa tsam mam zos pa tsam gyis stobs
416b8(rgyud): dang ldan par 'gyuraro// lus rnams rgyas pa dang / mgu ba dang / spro ba chen por 'gyuraro// gdon rnams pa sna tshogs par gsung ba dang / brjed byed mi bzang ba la yang reg pa tsam gyis de
417a1(rgyud): ngag thams cad rnam par 'jig par the tsom med do// byad mi bzang ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / dug dang / sbyar dug nyid kyang reg pa tsam gyis rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// 
417a2(rgyud): brtan pa dang / g.yo ba'i dug gang yin pa dang / mche ba dang / sbrul go Na sa dang / sdig pa yang rung / srin bu dang / phye ma le ba gdug pa'am/ nor rgyas kyi bu dang / 'jog po 'am/ sbrul
417a3(rgyud): gyis mthong ba'i dug gam/ dbugs kyi dug mi zad pa gang yin pa dang / reg pa'i dug gang yin pa dang / hA lA ha lI'i bdug pa gang yin pa dang / gzhan da ra nga'i dug gang yin pa dang / 
417a4(rgyud): rtsa ba'i dug gang yin pa dang / sdong bu'i dug dang / 'dab ma/ de'i dug dang / me tog gi dug dang / mdangs kyi dug/ gang yin pa dang / gzhan dug rnam pa sna tshogs pa de rnams
417a5(rgyud): thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyuraro// til mar reg pa tsam gyis lam mchog dang / lam gol bar so ba rnams dang / rgyal po'i sgo drung du song ba yang rung / bsang
417a6(rgyud): par 'os par gyur pa gang yin pa dang / bcings par gyur pa gang yin pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa dang / gzhan yang dgra'i gze ba dang / pha rol gyi dmag/ 
417a7(rgyud): tshogs kyi 'jigs pa nyid dang / mi mdza' ba dang / phyir rgol ba gang yin pa yang til mar 'di mngon par sbyar bas skad cig de la thams cad 'jom so// rgyal po khros pa gang yin pa
417a8(rgyud): 'dzum bzhin du bka' stsol to// g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du 'am/ phan tshun mtha' bzhin pa thams cad la til mar rgyal po bla na med pas rtag tu rgyal ba gter ro// mkhas pas mig
417b1(rgyud): la byugs na/ mi thub cing thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyuraro// gzhan gyis kyang dgos pa thams cad la rab tu sbyar bar bya ste/ dngos grub kyi gnas thams cad kyi mchog yin pa'i phyir ro// de nas khro
417b2(rgyud): po lcags kyu bla na med pa/ sdig thams cad sel ba/ mod la gdug pa thaMd 'jigs par byed pa/ nad pa de rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ med la thams cad du grub pa bla na med pa nad thams cad zhi ba/ de kho na nyid khro bo lcags
417b3(rgyud): kyu bla na med pa'i/ ras ris kyi sku gzugs brjod par bya ste/ ras ris kyi sku gzugs bla na med pa 'di mthong ba tsam gyi mong la/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po thob pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba
417b4(rgyud): chen po bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / rig pa'i gnas thams ca dang rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
417b5(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis mthong ba dang / ma chod pa dang / rim gror bya ba dang / zhe sar bya ba dang / bla mar
417b6(rgyud): byas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi spyan sngar bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / ras ris kyi sku gzugs gang yin pa 'di mthong ba
417b7(rgyud): tsam gyi mod la/ mthas klas pa tsam dang 'di mtshungs par 'gyur te/ 'di dang mtshungs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 
417b8(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro ras gru bzhi pagru bzhir cha mnyam pa/ shin tu thags bzang ba/ shin tu gas rab/ shin tu 'jam pa mchog tu mdzes pa/ khru
418a1(rgyud): gnyis pa'i tshad kha tshar ma bcad pa/ skra dang bral ba 'am/ yang na dar gtsang ma gru bzhi shin tu rnam par 'byes pa la/ ri mo mkhan gtsang ma smyung bar gnas pas/ 
418a2(rgyud): lhag ma ma yin pa'i tshe na snod gsar par bzhag la/ tshon sna tshogs rnam par 'phyes pas/ 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i khro bo lcags kyu bri bar bya'o// 'phags pa sman
418a3(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal bzhi pa/ zhal dang po ni zhi ba/ spyan gsum pa/ ral pa'i cod pan gyis rgyan pa/ 'od dpag med cod pan du 'chang ba/ zla bas nye bar mdzes pa/ 
418a4(rgyud): phyag bzhi pa rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par rgyan pa/ g.yas pa'i zhal drag po'i gzugs can 'jigs/ par byed pa/ tshems kyis ma mchu mnan pa/ 
418a5(rgyud): do bu skra gyen du brdzes pa'i ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis rgyan pa/ g.yon pa drag po chen po mche ba gcig sa pa/ zhal rnam par 'gyur ba/ dbu skra 'khyil zhing
418a6(rgyud): gyen du brdzes pa'i ral pa kun tu bcings pa 'od dpag med kyi cod pan can/ drag tu bzhad pa'o// zhi ba'i zhal ral pa'i cod pan gyi rgyan pa'i steng du/ sku phyed pa'i khro
418a7(rgyud): bo'i rgyal po 'bar ba'i snying por chud pa bya ste/ sku ud pa la sngon po'i kha dog can dbu skad mar po cung zad 'khyil ba/ 'od dpag med kyi cod pan can/ rgyan thams cad kyis
418a8(rgyud): rnam par brgyan pa/ phyag gnyis kyi/ gcig gis ral gri dang / gnyis pas tho ba 'bar ba can bya'o// phyag gcig gis pad+ma 'chang ba ste/ pad+ma'i ge sar 'bar ba'i snyen
418b1(rgyud): pa can no// gnyis pas lcags kyu dang mdung rtse gsum te/ g.yas pa na'o// g.yon pas khro bo chen po drag po drag tu rgod pa'i gzugs can/ don yod pa'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// 
418b2(rgyud): g.yas pa dbugs 'byin pa'o rin po che chen po'i char 'bebs pa/ phyag thams cad 'bar ba'i snying po 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs pa bya ste/ pad+ma'i gdan la skyil mo krung gis bzhugs
418b3(rgyud): pa bya'o// rgya mtsho'i snying por ri rab la gnas pa/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bos dkris pa bya'o// nya dang chu srin dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyis kris pa/ pad+ma dang / ung
418b4(rgyud): pa la dang / ku mu dang / pad+ma dkar pos/ btsal du bkram pa/ ngang pa dang / bzhad dang / ngur ba dang / shang shang te'us khyab pa'o// g.yas logasu lta
418b5(rgyud): mo sgrol ma/ dbu cung zad dud pa/ thal mo sbyar ba 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ 'dzem bag dang bcas pa bya'o// dkar sham chen mo thal
418b6(rgyud): mo sbyar te cung zad 'dud pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ 'dzem bag dang bcas pa bya'o// srin mo chen mo ral pa gcig ma khrag 'dzag pa'i thod pa dang / drag mo drag tu rgod pa bya/ 
418b7(rgyud): ste/ 'bar ba'i snying por khro bo lcags kyu la lta bzhin pa/ lag pa bzhi pa/ lag na ral gri dang / dgra sta dang / zhags pa dang / rdo rje thogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan par bya'o// 
418b8(rgyud): g.yon phyogasu gnod sbyin gyi dbang po bya ste// zhal khro gnyer can drag po// dbu skra gyen du brdzes pa/ 'jigs par byed pa/ 'bar ba'i snying por dbus mo g.yas pa gtsugs pa/ ral gri dang / ngag
419a1(rgyud): sta thogs pa/ phyag gnyis thal mo sbyar ba 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ khro bo'i rgyal po lcags kyu la nges par blta bzhin pa/ kho ra khor yug
419a2(rgyud): tu 'od 'dom gang ba/ 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba bya'o// lcags kyu dang bcas pa'i kho ra khor yug gi steng du / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin rje da
419a3(rgyud): chu lha dang / lus ngan po bya ste/ me tog sna tshogs kyi phur ma thogs te/ mchod pa byed bzhin pa bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal po don yod lcags kyi'o rgyab tu/ rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i shing ljon
419a4(rgyud): pa bya ste/ yal ga dang / mdab ma dang / lo ma rnam par dkra bar bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal po'i zhabs kyi drung du/ rig sngags 'chang bya ste/ pus mo gtsugs pa me tog sna tshogs
419a5(rgyud): thogs shing / lag na bgrang phreng 'dzin pa/ khro bo'i rgyal po la steng du blta bzhin pa bya'o// zhabs gnyis pa'i drung gi gnasu pho nya mo bya ste/ zur mig can drag mo// lag na
419a6(rgyud): ral gri thogs pa/ rnam par 'gyur ba phyag thal mo sbyar brgyan thams cad kyi rnam par brgyan pa bya'o// ras ris kyi sku gzugs kyi bya ba yongasu mthar phyin nas/ byin gyis brlabs te/ 
419a7(rgyud): de'i 'og tu gsang ba'i gnasu bzhag par bya'o// de'i drung du gtsang mas zas mi bza' bar/ de'i spyan sngar khro bo lcags kyu brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya ste/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / 
419a8(rgyud): mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil ji ltar rnyed pa dbul bar bya'o// ras ris kyi sku gzugs sgrub pa'i cho ga 'dis sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa gzhan yang bya'o// de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis
419b1(rgyud): nyi ma re rer ras ris kyi mdun du/ gtsang mas zas mi za bar/ de'i spyan sngar me tog dang / bdug spos phul nas/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan gcig bzlas par bya'o// de nas las thams cad dang
419b2(rgyud): dgos pa thams cad bya'o// 'di ni de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub bklags pas 'grub pa ste/ rig sngags 'chang gis gsang ba mchog gi las bsgrub par bya'o// de nas sku gzugs
419b3(rgyud): mthong ba tsam la sogs pas mtshams med pa lnga dang / mnar med pa la gzhol ba dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams/ 'di mthong ba tsam gyis thams cad yongasu dag par 'gyur ro// 
419b4(rgyud): sdig pa thams cad dang / sgrib pa thams cad dang / sngon gyi sgrib pa bsags pa dang bcas pa dang / bskal dpa brgyar bsags pa'i sdig pa de dag thams cad rnam par
419b5(rgyud): 'dzegs par 'gyuraro// nang dang 'jigs pa thams cad la sa yongasu grol bar 'gyuraro// sdig pa thams cad dang / dgra thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / mi mdzan
419b6(rgyud): ba rnam par 'jigs par 'gyuraro// ras ris kyi sku gzugs shin tu chung ba byed pa gang yin pa de yang phan par byed par 'gyur te/ me tog gam/ bdug pa dang / dri 'am/ byugs pa 'am/ dkyil 'khor
419b7(rgyud): dang bcas pa byed pa 'am/ khrus kyi bum pa gang bkod pa'am/ rdul sel bar byed pa tsam yang rung ste/ rig sngags 'chang de'i/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge
419b8(rgyud): slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen mas/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba chen
420a1(rgyud): po bskyed par 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongasu 'dzin par 'gyuraro// pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs par yang 'gyur ro// mtshams med pa lnga rnam par
420a2(rgyud): sbyangs shing bskal pa'i mthar thug par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis gzigs 'dod par 'gyuraro// skye ba brjes nas kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams bde
420a3(rgyud): ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ pad+ma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// skye ba'i skye ba dran par yang 'gyur ro// rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor/ don yod zhags
420a4(rgyud): pa'i snying po/ don yod pa'i kho bo lcags kyi'i gzungs 'a/ di yang mtha' dag yongasu rdzogs par kha ton du gnasad par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang
420a5(rgyud): ba'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba rnams dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang snga/ gas dang / dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo
420a6(rgyud): thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyuraro// yon tan thams
420a7(rgyud): cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par yang 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sdud par yang 'gyuraro// bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po dang ldan par 'gyur// 'jig rten thams
420a8(rgyud): cad kyi bla mar yang 'gyu ro// tshig btsan par yang 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad dga' bar yang 'gyur ro// thams cad du mchod par 'os par yang 'gyuraro// rig sngags thams cad grub par 'gyuraro// yid la
420b1(rgyud): bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur zhing / dgos pa thams cad grub par yang 'gyuraro// thams cad du thogs pa med pa mkhas pa'i blo ru 'gyur ro// de nas khro bo'i lcags kyu'i dkyil
420b2(rgyud): 'khor/ cho ga zhib mo thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang / gsang ba'i phyag rgya bla na med pa bshad par bgyi'o// 'khor yug tu them skas bzhi dang ldan pa/ sa dang ba byung bsres pa'i dbyas
420b3(rgyud): 'khor gru bzhi pa bya ste/ gzings kyi rgya dang tshad mnyam pa/ shin tu tshad la bab cing legs par rnam par 'byes pa/ legs par byugs shing shin tu 'jam pa/ 'jam shing mnyen
420b4(rgyud): pa dang ldan pa'o// tshen sna tshogs pas rnam par phye ba dang / dkyil 'khor mchog gi thig btab la/ sna da tshegs tshon rtsis rnam par dbye// sgo bzhi shin tu rnam 'byes
420b5(rgyud): bta 'khor yug them skas bzhi dang ldan// rta babs bzhis yis rgyan pa ste// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor snying po ra yang // shin tu rnam 'byes tshad la bab// khru yi tshad du bya ba'o/ 
420b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gru bzhi mnyam pa yi// snying po'i dkyil 'khor dbus yang // mkhas pas shin tu rnam 'byes pa'i// pad+ma mdab ma bcu gnyis bya// lcags kyu phyogs dang rtse gsum dang / 
420b7(rgyud): ge sar pad+ma'i khor yug tu// snying por gyur pa'i dbu mchog la// khro bo zhags pa yang bya'o// drag po'i gzugs can 'jigs par byed// ral gri dang ni dgra sti'i phyag/ ral pa'i cod pan gyis
420b8(rgyud): rgyan cing // rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par rgyan// lus byed pa dang / zhags pas kun nas dkris pa/ mdung rtse gsum pa na mkha' la phyir phyogs pa/ pad+ma dang bcas pa byas pa la/ gra grwar
421a1(rgyud): 'bar ba'i gdong bya'o// mdung rtse gsum dang pad+ma la rab tu gnas pa/ drag po'i zhal 'jigs par byed pa chen po mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa/ zhal 'jig su rung ba 'bar
421a2(rgyud): ba'i snying por chud pa'o// nang gi ri mo laM/ lcags sgrog dang / mdung rtse gsum pa'i gdong bri bar bya ste/ 'bar ba'i snying po dang bcas pa/ kha dog sna tshogs pa'i tshon rtsis bya'o// ri mo gnyis
421a3(rgyud): pa'i nang du pad+ma kha phyed bye ba ge sar 'bar ba dang bcas pa'i pad+ma bya'o// ri mo gsum pa'i nang du 'khor lo'i rnam pa'o// mu khyud kyi phyi rol tu lag pa'i phyag rgya yang bri bar bya ste/ 
421a4(rgyud): mtshon cha sna tshogs pa 'dzin pa'o// ral gri dang zhag/ das pa dang / mdung rtse gsum dang / tsa ba la dang / mdung rtso gnyis// dung dang // tir+ya dang / 'khor la dang / 
421a5(rgyud): rtse gsum khe gdengs dang / tho ba dang / mdung dang / ral gri/ dang / nor bu dang / mdung rtse gsum dang mnga' bo che dang / las kyi rdo rje dang / rtse lnga dang / ban sA
421a6(rgyud): la dang / rdo rje zur gsum dang / pad+ma dang / rtse gsum dag kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba khor yug tu yongasu bskor ba bri bar bya'o// kha khyer gyi rnam pas brgyan pa le kha khyer gyi
421a7(rgyud): phyi rol dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su mtshan ma sna tshogs bri bar bya ste/ rigs chen po bzhi thun mong ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya bri bar bya'o// shar gyi gnas de bzhin gshegs
421a8(rgyud): po'i rigs kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya yang bri bar bya'o// lho ru pad+ma yangs pa'i mtshan ma dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'o// nub kyi gnas kyi dkyil 'khor du/ nor bu'i
421b1(rgyud): rigs kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rnams kyang bri bar bya'o// byang du rdo rje'i rigs kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya yang dag par bri'o// shar gyi sgo ru/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi khro bo'i rgyal po
421b2(rgyud): sgo ru bri bar bya'o// lho ru pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi khro bo rnams so// nub tu nor bu'i rigs kyi khro bo'o// byang du rdo rje'i rigs kyi khro bo bri bar bya'o// khro bo thams cad kyi gzugs
421b3(rgyud): 'bar ba'i snying po// rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ lag pa bzhi pa mtshon cha sna tshogs pa 'dzin pa bya'o// ri rab la gnas pa/ skyil mo krungs phyed pa lus cung zad bskum
421b4(rgyud): pa bya'o// phyi'i ri mo'i dkyil 'khor du/ nor bu dang /  rdo rje dang / me tog dang / mdung rtse gsum bdag go// 'khor yug tu kha khyor 'bar bso// dkyil 'khor gyi khor
421b5(rgyud): yug tu brgyan pa'o// lhab lbu ba dang / ba dan dang / rgyal mtshan dang / tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pas kun na sa dkyil 'khor la yang dag par rgyan pa'o// ro bro ba'i mchog
421b6(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i gtor mas gang ba'i snod ci 'byor pa dang / gtor ma'i las kyi tsho gas 'byor pa dang / rjesu 'thun par bzhag par bya'o// bum pa gang ba dang / pog phor dang / bum bu dang / bum
421b7(rgyud): pa dang / gtor ma dkar pos bkang ba dang / 'bras bu rnam sna tshogs pa nyid dang / dri dang phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / me tog kun nas gcal du dkra mo// 'bras yos dang / yungs kar gyis
421b8(rgyud): gtor bar bya'o// snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi grar/ mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil gyi snod dang / rin po che sna bdun rab tu dgram mo// dri'i chus bkang ba'i bum pa dang / legs par rgyan
422a1(rgyud): pa'i bum pa byas nas/ mkhas pas ngar bzang po bcings te/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du bzhag par bya'o// sgo bzhir dri chab kyi gang ba'i bum pa dar gyis bci
422a2(rgyud): pabazhag par bya'o// mkhas pas sgo dang / sgo ru ni bu ram dang / sha kar dang / sbrang rtsi'i ro dang / gtor ma bzhag par bya'o// mdung rtse gsum la/ zho dang / 'o ma dang / zan dang / mchog gi bza' ba
422a3(rgyud): ma nyams pas/ shin tu mdzes pa'i gtor ma bzhag par bya'o// de bzhin du 'khur ba dang / 'khur ba zlum po nyid dang / snum 'khur dang / be Ti ma ka dang / sa rA'i la du dang / mud ga'i la
422a4(rgyud): du dang / hwags dang / kha y+Ya ni bzang po rnams bzhag/ par bya'o// gtor ma'i las la khor yug tu me togabazang po dgram zhing / phreng bas brgyan par bya'o// 'bru'i
422a5(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs pa bzhag par bya'o// 'bras bu'ingo bo rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / na'u seng sngo bas/ ngas dang / lo ma mdzes pa bkram ste bzhag par bya'o// 
422a6(rgyud): khur yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dang // de bzhin du a ga ru dang / tsan dan spri k+ka dang / tu ruSh+ka dang / dpal gyis dkris pa dang / gu gul dang / kun tu ru dang / sbrang rtsi dang / hA gos sbyar
422a7(rgyud): ba'i bdug pa ste/ bdug pa 'di dag dbul bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug du bdug pa 'thul ba'i pog phor bzhag par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha la bdug pa dbul bar bya'o// 
422a8(rgyud): phyogs bcings pa dang / dkyil 'khor bcing po bya ste/ gtsug tor bcing zhing / bdag srung ba dang / gzhan bsrung ba bya'o// de'i 'og tu 'jug par bya'o// rig sngags dkyil 'khor
422b1(rgyud): mthong ba dang / phyag bya zhing / bskor ba nyid dang / dam tshig kyang sbyin par bya'o// rtag tu gsang ba'i las byas te/ de kho na bzhin du gsang sngags bzlas pa yang bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi
422b2(rgyud): cho ga tshad ma las/ dgos pa 'di dag thams cad byas nas/ de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis las thams cad kyi dngos grub bla na med pa'o// rgyal ba rigs bzhi'i yongasu bskor ba'i
422b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa de dag thams cad ni/ 'gro ba bzang por skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du bde ba can du/ 'od dpag med kyi spyan sngar pad+ma las brdzus te skye bar the tsom med do// 
422b4(rgyud): lha'i gzugs shin tu mdzes pa rgyan thams cad kyis rna dam par brgyan pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tsom mi bya'o// 
422b5(rgyud): 'jig rten pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub bla na med pa/ dang / cho ga zhib mo'i dngos grub dang / phyag rgya'ing nges dang / khro bo'i rgyal po dngos grub bla na med pa dang / 
422b6(rgyud): sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad sel ba dang / mong la gdug pa thams cad 'jig pa dang / dgra thams cad bzlog pa dang / mod la nad thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang / dgos pa thams
422b7(rgyud): cade dang / thams cad du dngos grub bla na med pa gang yin pa grub par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad kyi mnga' bdag dang rtag tu dga' bar 'gyu ro// de rtag tu rje su 'brang bar 'gyu ro// rtag tu rgyal
422b8(rgyud): po dang blon por bcas pa rnams kyis dus rgyun tu bla na med pa'i mchod pa'i gnasu 'gyuraro// gzhan yang ljongs thams cad blta zhing mchod pas rjesu 'brang bar 'gyuro// de bzhin nyid du yang / 
423a1(rgyud): dge sbyong rnams dang / bram ze rnams dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje rigs dang / dam sa rigs dang / skyes pa dang / budud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad kyang dga' ba
423a2(rgyud): 'gyuraro// rtag tu tshig btsan pa dang / rtag tu lha rnams kyis mngon par bsrungs pa dang / skabs gsum gyi dbang po dang / rdo rje 'chang ba nyid dang / rdo rje snying po bdag nyid chen po dang / 
423a3(rgyud): tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gzhon nu dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha nyid dang / de bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams rtag tu rjes
423a4(rgyud): su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du zhug/ das shing mthong ba la yang dus rtag tu srung ba dang / rje su 'brang bar 'gyur te/ the tsom mi bya'o// yun ring du
423a5(rgyud): 'tsho bar 'gyur/ rtag tu smra ba nyung zhing mkhas pa dang / thams cad du dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro// dkyi la 'khor mthong ba dang / 'jug pa la dga' bar 'gyur/ 
423a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang dgyes pa dang bcas pas byin gyis rlob par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas rnams dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / de bzhin gabye/ 
423a7(rgyud): pas dbugs 'byin par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs las skyes pa'i sras ji lta ba bzhin no// 'di ni de rnams kyi mngal gyi gnasu skye ba'i tha ma yin no// rtag tu skye ba dran
423a8(rgyud): par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tshom mi bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu 'gro ba dang / rtag tu rgyal ba rnams kyi de kho na nyid mthong ba dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad la mngon sum du chos nyan
423b1(rgyud): par the tsom med do// 'di ni skye ba'i tha ma yin te/ ji srid du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyu ro// dgos pa gzhan rnam sna tshogs pa dang / khro bo lcags kyu'i las ba
423b2(rgyud): phrag stong rnams rang gi 'dod pa'i blos bya'o// thams cad du lan gcig bzlas brjod byas la/ thams cad du las thams cad bya'o// bklags pas 'grub pa'i cho ga'o// // de nas
423b3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas te/ bzhin 'dzum pas khro bo chen po lcags kyu'i gzung
423b4(rgyud): kyi kun tu snang bzhin pa'i 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba'i snying po lus las phyung ngo // gang gis stong gsumagyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu snang bar byas// 
423b5(rgyud): 'od zer gyi snang ba gang gis/ stong gsum gyi stong che na po'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'bab pa'i snying po rab tu 'bebs par 'dod pa'i don dang / 
423b6(rgyud): lha'i me tog sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs pa'i don dang / lha'i dri dang 'thun par gsal ba'i dri dang / rje su 'thun pa'i dri rnam par bkra ba'i char rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das dang
423b7(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phab bo// rab tu dgyes pa'i thugs kyis lha'i chu gsal zhing rgya che ba/ dri 'pho bas rnam par 'dzes pa'i dpral ba'i chu mu tig dang / 
423b8(rgyud): mnyam zhing mtshungs pa/ dza ta'i 'bras bu dang 'dra bar rnam par mdzes pa'i dpral ba'i lha'i chus yongasu dbang bskur te/ thigs pa na mkha' dang mnyam pa bzhu ba'i mig 'bras
424a1(rgyud): las ltung ba'i chu skar ma las rab tu ltung ba'i gos/ de lta bu'i dpral bar theg le 'bar ba nyi ma dang / smig rgyu rnam par mdzes pa'i 'od zeras la ltung te/ bcom
424a2(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar zhabs kyi drung du lhung ngo // pad+ma'i mdab ma brgya stong phrag kha bye ba ltar rab tu 'dzum pas rnam par mdzes pa/ pad+mo ze 'bru ltar mnyen pa byung bar gyur to// baiDUr+ya'i
424a3(rgyud): sdong bu nyi ma brgya stong phrag pas lhag pa'i mthu stobs dang ldan pa'i 'od zer snang bas 'bar bzhin pa/ bcom ldan 'das la mi gang gi cheng lta bur gnas par gyur to// de nas rigs pa
424a4(rgyud): 'dzin pa'i dbang po chen po rdo rje 'chang gis/ chu'i thig ngas pa mdab ma mnyam pa/ baiDUr+ya mchog tu mdzes shing 'bar ba pad+ma khabye ba de mthong nas/ thugs ngo mtshar dang
424a5(rgyud): yamatshan skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sa mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phags paspyan ras gzigs dbang drug gi zhabs gnyis la dag 'tshal te/ 
424a6(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// sems dpa' chen po shin tu ngo mtshar ba mthong lag so// rngang ngadu byung ba'i cho 'phrul chen po mthong lagaso// sems dpa' chen po bdag gis// ltang mi'i mchog mdzod
424a7(rgyud): lags so// sems dang 'phrab chen po// khyod kyis bdag gi ljang mo'i the tshom med par mdzod cig ceso// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa sman dmags/ 
424a8(rgyud): dbang phyug gis gnod sbyin gyi sdeng pon chen po lagan rdo rje la 'di skad ces smra'o// lag na rdo rje bdag la don yod pa pod+ma dri ma med pa chu skyes kyi zhabs kyi lcags kyu zhes bya ba/ don yong/ 
424b1(rgyud): zhags pa'i snying po/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor chen po dang / phyag rgya dang lha rnams yod de/ de bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor chen po'i dbus su/ de bzhin
424b2(rgyud): gshegs pa'i spyan sngar yongasu bsgrag par bgyi'o// de'i mthu dang rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i/ mthu stobs kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa 'di mthong ngo // de'i mthus
424b3(rgyud): pad+ma 'di byung ngo // rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di bdag gi dpral ba nas phyung bas cho 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya che zhing che dang yang dag par ldan par gyur to// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon
424b4(rgyud): chen po lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' sems da dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyungag gi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ lan
424b5(rgyud): gsum bskor ba byas te/ mchos pa byas nas song / ngo // bcom ldan 'das go la ba de log su song na/ sa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug te/ byis pa'i
424b6(rgyud): cha byad bzung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bsil yab g.yob par byed bzhin du 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa
424b7(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems dpa' chen po don yod pa pad+ma dri ma med pa chu skyes kyi zhags pa'i snying po zhes
424b8(rgyud): bya ba don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor chen po dang / phyag rgya dang / lha rnams smos shig/ gang gis smras pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams
425a1(rgyud): cad rig sngags kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags 'di rnam par dbye ba byas par 'gyuraro// sgribs pa med par gyil
425a2(rgyud): 'khor mthong ba kun tu gnas par byed do// cho ga zhib mo thams cad dang / gsang sngogs dang / dam tshig dang / phyag rgya rnams rjesu 'thun par phyogs te gnas par byed do// dkyil 'khor
425a3(rgyud): gyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i lha thams cad mdun na nye bar gnas par byed do// sgrub pa'i de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub mthong bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang phyis
425a4(rgyud): kyang rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyuraro// las thams cad sgrub dpa'i cho ga rnams la legs par sgrub pa'i cho gar ya dang 'gyuraro// rtag tu rig sngags 'chang gis rje su 'brang zhing
425a5(rgyud): phyi bzhin phyi bzhin lhan gcig rje su 'brang bar 'gyur zhe sa so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan
425a6(rgyud): 'das kyis gnang bar rig nas/ sems can thams cad la rje su brtse ba'i don du/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi mchog gi sgrub pa bklags pas grub pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
425a7(rgyud): sngar 'khor chen po'i dbus su/ bzhin 'dzum zhing mig mi 'dzum pas rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di smra so// dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems da
425a8(rgyud): rab 'byam thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang gsang sngags rab 'byam rgya mtsho rnams la phyag 'tshalo// 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin pa
425b1(rgyud): rigs thams cad kyi gsang ba dang / rig sngags 'chang gi dbang por bzhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshalo// 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams
425b2(rgyud): dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba thams cad dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po'i sgrub pa grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog/ 
425b3(rgyud): gsum la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po can/ rig sngags thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po'i
425b4(rgyud): bdag nyid chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa grub pa rnams da dang phyag rgya thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ oM bi ma le/ bi ma la gar+b+he/ bi ma la am+bu dza pad+me sUr+ya
425b5(rgyud): bar+Na se/ sa ha sra rasmi ki ra Ne ma hA rasmai dzA la a ba b+hU ShI/ te/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ sany+tsa ra pad+mo da ri pad+ma gar+b+he/ pad+ma b+hu dze/ su bi ma la am+bu dza bi ma le ma Ni ka na ka badz+ra
425b6(rgyud): DUr+ya in+di ni la ma ra ka ta/ pad+ma rA ga bi bi d+hi ma hA ma Ni rat+na la kr-i ta sha rI re/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma hA pad+ma d+ha ra/ pa ra pa ra ba ra shu pA sha d+ha ra/ sa ra sa ra sa man+ta bai ro tsa na/ sarba ta thA ga ta gu h+ya a d+hidz+dza/ 
425b7(rgyud): te/ ku la sa ma ya pa ri pU ra Ni/ ba ra ba ra/ badz+ra dz+wa la mA lA gar+b+he/ badz+re badz+re badz+ra a d+hiSh+Thi ta pad+me hUM hUM/ ma Ni ma Ni ma hA ma Ni tsin+tA ma Ni pA sha d+ha ra/ hu ru hu ru pad+ma pad+ma go re pad+ma pA Ni ba ra de/ a mo g+ha pad+me/ 
425b8(rgyud): oM ng+gi ni patwa ma ni badz+ra d+hi rA/ sarba ta thA ga ta ku la sA na mya sa ma ya a d+hiSh+Te te/ ma hA bi pul b+hu dzo/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sam+b+ha ra/ b+hu ru b+hai ru pU riNi/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ sa man+ta a ba lo ki ti bAd+ya ra rje pras rapras ras
426a1(rgyud): di ma le/ sarba bad+hi maN+Da la de ba tA na maskr-i te/ ta ra ta ra/ tA ra ya tA ra ya/ sa man+ta pa ri pU ra Ni sarba bo d+hi satwA a b+hi Shetsa ni sarba ta thA ga ta a mo g+ha a b+hi Shik+ti a b+hi Shiny+tsa ya me sarba bad+d+hi maSh+TA/ 
426a2(rgyud): ku la sa ma ya a b+hi She kaM/ sarba ta thA ga ta pA Ni ba ra de/ pad+ma gau rai pad+ma pra b+he/ pad+ma bi ka tsam+bu dza gar+b+he/ hUM hUM/ badz+re badz+re/ badz+re pad+ma ta thA ga ta ku la a d+hiSh+Thi te/ a mo g+ha ba ra de/ sarbA sA pa ri pu ra Ni sarba pA
426a3(rgyud): pa dur kha pra sha ma ni/ a mo g+ha hri da ya sid+d+hi sA d+ha ya bi ma le hUM phad/ oM ba ra de pad+ma b+hu dze na mosta taM pad+ma su te swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dab
426a4(rgyud): phyug gis don yod pa dri ma med pa pad+mo'i chu skyes kyi pad+ma'i lu gas kyu don yod zhags po'i snying po rigs kyi rgyal po gzungs chen po kun nas rnam par snang bar byed pa/ de bzhin gabye
426a5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi thun mong gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i// snying po 'di smras pa'i de ma thag gi 'og tu pad+ma ze 'a/ khru dang bcas pa'i ge sar gsal bar rnam par bya ste/ dper na
426a6(rgyud): grong khyer gyi phyogs gcig gi sgo bye nas rgyal mo byung ba bzhin du/ lha'i gzugs blta na sdug pa 'od mtha' yas pa phyag bzhi pa rgyan gyis rnam par rgyan pa/ phyag na pad+ma don yod zhags pa'i ngo// 
426a7(rgyud): bo'i zhigs pa'i phyag dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rin po che'i rgyal mtshan chen po'i phyag dang / mdung rtse gsum pa'i phyag/ spyan gsum pa zla ba'i cod pan 'chang ba zhi pa/ zhi zhing 'dzum pa'i
426a8(rgyud): zhal/ sku la 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba'i snying po pad+ma dang seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs pa// pad+ma kha bye ba'i snying por bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
426b1(rgyud): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ mgo bos phyag 'tshal zhing thal mo sbyar ba btung te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug te/ mig mi 'dzum
426b2(rgyud): par blta zhing 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ don yod pa pad+ma dri ma med pa chu skyes kyi zhags pa'i lcags kyu rig sngags kyi rgyal po bud med kyi gzug
426b3(rgyud): 'dzin pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems can dag pa chen po khyod ci'i phyir mi 'dzum par blta/ mchog ci don tu gnyer bzhin du 'khod ces so// rig sngags kyi rgyal mos gsol
426b4(rgyud): pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pa tham/ sa cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams kyi spyi'i phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / dam tshig gsang ba'i rjesu 'jug
426b5(rgyud): par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo nyon cig/ khyod de bzhin gags pa thams cad kyis thams cad du/ dam tshig kyi dkyil
426b6(rgyud): 'khor dang / phyag rgya'i gsang bar lung bstan cing / khyod de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi mchog tu lung bstan no// ngas kyang de bzhin gshegs
426b7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi gsang ba dang / dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya'i dam tshig thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur bar lung bstan no// tut+tA dang / kar sham dang / sgrol ma dang / khro gnyer can dang / pad+ma
426b8(rgyud): rigs mdzes ma dang / lha mo chen mo ki lI ki lA dang / rdo rje pho nya mo dang / dri med byed ma dang / pad+ma'i spyan ma dang / rdo rje lu gu rgyud me dang / rdo rje khro gnyer can dang / lha mo pad+ma rab snang ma dang / 
427a1(rgyud): badra skyong ma dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo don yod pa'i phyag dang / longs spyod ldan ma dang / dpal mo dang / 'jigs ma dang / dpe med ma dang / dbyangs can ma dang / ral
427a2(rgyud): gcig ma spyan stong pa/ phyag stong pa/ dbu stong pa/ don yod pa'i pad+ma dang / rin chen lha mo dang / rin chen 'byung gnas dang / 'jig rten dbang phyug nyid dang / rig pa'i dbang phyug nyid dang / lha mo
427a3(rgyud): chen mo phyag rgya'adabang phyug dang / rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha mo dang / hu ha bzlas pa'i sbyin sreg dang / zhi ba'i las dang / lha mo rigs mdzes ma dang / rig sngags 'chang chen mordo
427a4(rgyud): mdzes ma nyid dang / phyag na 'khor lo grub pa dang / de ba/ bzhin du ral gri bzang po'i rig pa 'dzin pa dang / khro bo nyid dang / khro bo'i rgyal po dang / dus kyi mtshan mo dang / 
427a5(rgyud): zhal rnam par 'gyur ma dang / mche ba gtsigs ma dang / ser skya ma nyid dang / rang gsal ma dang / phyag na rin cha nam nyid dang / sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha mo dang / de bzhin
427a6(rgyud): du rdzas yongasu 'dzin pa'i lha mo dang / mchod yon dang / zhabs bsal dang / gtor ma nyid kyi lha dang / a gri Ni dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa'i lha dang / 
427a7(rgyud): thams cad du rdzasu song ba'i lha mo khyod dang / gsang sngags thams cad la dbang bsgyur ma dang / bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i mchog sgrol bar byed pa dang / 
427a8(rgyud): bdag gi gsang sngags thams cad 'dzin pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i mchog ma dang / rig sngags 'chang gi dbang mo dang / rigs kyi gsang sngags dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
427b1(rgyud): thams cad kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mongs par sbyin pa 'jig rten dbang phyug skyes pa nyid dung dral ba'i sprin ma'i bar du lha'i chu'i dngul las nges par skyes shing byung ba/ skar ma'i rnam pa
427b2(rgyud): dang mtshungs pa/ sna tshogs pa'i gzugs can du gyur pa'o// zhes las sna tshogs dang / dbyangs can gang yin pa 'di 'chang bar byed do// zhes de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan pa dang
427b3(rgyud): du blangs nas gsungs so// rig sngags thams cad kyi dngos grub mnyam par sgrib pa thob pa dang de bzhin tu cho ga zhing mo'i sgrub pa dang // phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags thams cad kyi dngos grub
427b4(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / don yod pa'i dngos grub kyang thob par byed do// don yod pa'i 'bras bu mthong ba dang / bklags pas grub pa'i rgyu mtshan gzhan dang / thams cad du
427b5(rgyud): rigs spyi'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi/ phyir dang / spyi'i dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya'i dam tshig nya da kyang 'di dran pa tsam gyis thams cad thob par byed do// dkyil
427b6(rgyud): 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang lha de dag thams cad kyang dran pa tsam gyis rjesu 'brang bar 'gyur bar the tshom med do// rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor dang lha rnams
427b7(rgyud): dam tshig la kun tu gnas par byed do// de lta bas na/ 'bad pa thams cad kyis zung cig/ de bzhin du thub pa rnam par mdzad dang / shAkya'i rgyal pos rig sngags kyi rgyal por lung bstan pa
427b8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ming kun tu gzigs shing thams cadadu rjesu 'gro ba ste/ de'i phyir spyan ras gzigs pad+ma zhes bya ba rig sngags kyi rgyal po bla na med pa/ rdo rje'i dngos
428a1(rgyud): grub dngos grub chen po pad+ma'i rigs kyi dngos grub bla na med pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub sgrub pa grub pa/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i rigs dang / 
428a2(rgyud): nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub sgrub pa grub pa/ don yod pa'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du mchog gi dngos grub/ mchog gi dang po rdo rje'i rigasu bstan pa/ rdo rje
428a3(rgyud): rtse mo chen po'i lha dang / de bzhin du rdo rje sa 'og dngos grub kyi phyir rdo rje phreng ba rim par phye ba'i grangs dang rdo rje mchu'i mchog gi dngos grub rnams la spyan ras gzigs pad+ma dang / pad+ma mdzes
428a4(rgyud): pa dang / de bzhin du 'am/ ming smos pa tsam gyis mod la rje su 'brang zhing 'ong bar byed do// de bzhin du rdo rje dbang dpo dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / lag na rdo rje dang / dbang phyug
428a5(rgyud): chen po rnams rtag tu rjesu 'brang bar 'gyur ro// de ltabs na/ rtag tu shes pas rig sngags smra ba dang ming gang gi mchog 'dzin pa la/ de bzhin gshegs
428a6(rgyud): pas rtag tu rnam par gzigs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin nyid du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / thub pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis rtag tu lung ston par 'gyur bar the tshom
428a7(rgyud): med do// bcom ldan 'das kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di lung bstan ma thag tu sa rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g.yos so// g.yos rab tu g.yos/ mgul rab tu 'gul/ 
428a8(rgyud): ldeg rab tu ldeg/ 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ure 'ur/ chem chem rab tu tshim chem mo// lha'i me tog gi char bab te/ 'di lta ste/ zla ba mdog mdzes pa dang / dri med
428b1(rgyud): mdog mdzes dang / mdog mdzes chen po dang / man da ra ba dang / mnad rab chen po dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / ud pa la sngon po dang / ud pa la dmang po dang / mya ngan chang dang /

428b3(rgyud): puSh+pa dang / sna ma dang / yU thi ka dang / na ba mA li ka dang / ta ra Na dang / ma ru ba ka dang / ku bya ka'i me tog gi char 'bab pa'i don dang / tshon rtsi sna tshogs pase btses pa'i gos kyi char 'bab
428b4(rgyud): pa'i don dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi lha'i rgyan dang / lha/ ba lhub dang / rgyan cha'i char 'bab pa'i don dang / dalha'i gser gyis me tog gi char 'bab pa'i do dang / lha'i
428b5(rgyud): dri tsan dan dang / ta mA la dang / ga pur dang / gla rtsi dang / gur gum dang / lha'i gos dang / dri bzang pos bgos pa'i phye ma'i char 'bab pa'i don dang / lha'i dri chab kyi char 'bab
428b6(rgyud): pa'i don dang / ma sgrol bar na mkha'i mthil du rol mo'i sgra 'byung ba dang / sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'i ris kyi lha'i bu me tog sna tshogs 'thor bar byed pa dang / gos dang rin po che sna tshogs 'chor
428b7(rgyud): pabar byed pa dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i ris kyi lha'i mu tig gi do shal dang / gdu bu dang dpung rgya dang / rgyan zla gam can dang / mu tig dmar po dang / ka shi ka'i gos sna tshogs pa 'thor bar byed par
428b8(rgyud): gyur to// lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / gzhon nu dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / dbang phyug la sogs pa
429a1(rgyud): lha'i bu 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus lha'i gzhal yas khang rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / lha'i gos dang me tog dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang byug pa rnams dang / rin po che sna
429a2(rgyud): bdun las byung ba'i gdugs sna tshogs pa rnams na mkha'i mthil tu kun tu gtor nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / 
429a3(rgyud): rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i 'khor mchod pa'i sprin chen por gyur te mchod pa chen po byed par gyur to// rdzu 'phrul chen po'i cho 'phrul chen po mthong bar gyur to// dngos grub chen po'i mtshan ma
429a4(rgyud): byung bar gyur pa rnams yang dag par mthong ngo // phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag par mthong bar
429a5(rgyud): gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i da kyil 'khor rnams kun tu yang dag par bya'o// lha'i/ gzhal yas khang sna tshogs pa byung bar gyur pa mthong ngo // de
429a6(rgyud): nas yang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logasu song nas lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag
429a7(rgyud): 'tshal te rdo rje gsor bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas bzhin 'dzum pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par
429a8(rgyud): 'chal pa che zhing che ba yang dag par snang ba dang / mchod pa'i sprin gyi char che zhing che ba rab tu 'bab pa dang / bcom ldan 'das dngos grub kyi mtshan ma che zhing che ba snang ba dang / lha dang / 
429b1(rgyud): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lA ma yin dang / nam par lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi yin pa'i 'khor chen po 'dus par gyur pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po skyes par mtsha
429b2(rgyud): bar snang ba dang / cho 'phrul che zhing che ba snang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
429b3(rgyud): gi rig sngags chen po 'byung bar snang ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das rgyu ci lags/ rkyen ci lags 'di ci'i mthus sngon gyi mtshan ma yang dag par snang ba lags/ 'di rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par
429b4(rgyud): 'phrul pa gang zhig yang dag par snang ba lags/ bcom da ldan 'das bdag gis sems la the tshom de skyes par gyur pas/ de nges par bstan du gsol/ shu ba lung
429b5(rgyud): ston par 'gyur ba gang gis/ bdag gis dogs pa rnam par sel ba dang / som nyi rnam par sel bar byed pa sa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs dbye ru gsol/ 
429b6(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje nges par bstan par bya yi nyon cig/ 
429b7(rgyud): lag na rdo rje 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa sprin ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'o// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin
429b8(rgyud): dang / rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa/ ting nge 'dzin gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsi dgus rnam par 'phrul
430a1(rgyud): pa'o// lag na rdo rje spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mthus rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul snang bar byed do// don yod pa rnam par 'phrul pa/ kun tu snang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen
430a2(rgyud): po dang / phyag rgya dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang sngags dang / gzungs dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rig sngags kun tu snang ba dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po rnam par
430a3(rgyud): snang bar byed do// de'i mthus snang ba 'di dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul 'di snang ngo // lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di mthong ba dang / ming bzung ba
430a4(rgyud): tsam gyis kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ya/ dang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung gi dbye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi
430a5(rgyud): rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa mngon sum du mthong ba dang / ma tshan bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i bsod nam sa kyi phung po dang ldan pa yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de
430a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig dang / rig sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / snying po'i mthu rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ro// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor
430a7(rgyud): gsang bar rab tu zhugs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi cho ga zhib mo'i rjesu 'jug par 'gyur ro// rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di lan gcig bzlas pa de rnams kyang // de bzhin
430a8(rgyud): gshegs pa rnams kyi drung du/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi snying po dang / phyag rgya dang gsang

430b2(rgyud): te/ 'di lta ste/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du snying po dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang / dkyil

430b4(rgyud): gcig po 'di rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo'i rje su zhugs pa da'o// des na lag na rdo rje khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal po
430b5(rgyud): 'di/ kun nas rje su 'jug pa zhes bya'o// lag na rdo rje rgyu des na/ rigs kyi bu 'am// rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slongangam/ dge slong ma'am/ ngage bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma rig/ 
430b6(rgyud): sngags kyi rgyal po 'di/ ming lan gcig gzung ba tsam gyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi drung du// gsang ba thams cad kyi snying po dang / gzungs
430b7(rgyud): dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo rab tu ston pa dang / mtshan gzung bar byas par 'gyuraro// dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi drung
430b8(rgyud): du/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongasu gzung bar 'gyuraro// dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyuraro// dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams dang / byang chub
431a1(rgyud): sems dpa' leg so zhes bya ba rtsol bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa yangs pa chen po'i dngos grub rab tu rtsol bar 'gyuraro// mchog tu grub pa chen por 'gyu ro// de bzhin ga
431a2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi spyi'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub so sor rnyed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rig sngags kyi snying po dang / ting 'dzin dang / rdzu
431a3(rgyud): 'phrul gyi yul dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi rgyan dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rjesu song bar 'gyuraro// rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad rjesu sbyor zhing dam
431a4(rgyud): tshig gi rje su 'jug par 'gyur// lag na rdo rje de bzhin du/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i mthu chen po rnam par 'phrul pa/ de ba bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa/ byang chub
431a5(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'o// lag na rje rje de bas na/ de rnams rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i mthu chen po'o// lag na rdo rje/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di/ me tog gas
431a6(rgyud): bdug pa'am/ dri dang byugs pa dang / rol mo gcig gis mchod pa dang / lan gcig tsam gyis kyang / dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi snying po gsang ba dang / mchod
431a7(rgyud): ba rnams byas pa dang / mnyes par byas pa dang / klog par byas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang
431a8(rgyud): sngags dang / gzugs dang / rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po mchod pa byas par 'gyu ro// rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di dran pa tsam gyis// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / bgegs dang / log
431b1(rgyud): par 'dren pa dang / bdud kyi rigs kyi lhad rnams thams cad phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnamasu 'bros par byed do// yams thams cad dang / nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad dang / nad 'gro ba thams cad dang / 
431b2(rgyud): gdon thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa rnams thams cad dang / gtam ngan gyi 'jig pa rnams rab tu zhi bar byed do// bdug pa thams cad
431b3(rgyud): dang phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / mi 'dza' ba rnams rab tu zhi bar byed do// sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par grol bar byed do// mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / 
431b4(rgyud): nyon mongs pa rnams rnam par grol bar byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbugs 'byin par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur/ 
431b5(rgyud): lha rnams thams cad kyis kyang kun tu srung bar 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje rig sngags 'chang gi dbang po rje su 'brang bar 'gyur/ zhing / srung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / sbeng bar byedo// gnod sbyin gyi sde
431b6(rgyud): dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bcu rtag tu rjesu 'brang bar 'gyuraro// rgyal po chen po bzhi yang dpung dang bcas 'khor dang bcas pas kun nas phyogs bzhir srung bar byed do// thams cad tu cho ga zhib mo dang / 
431b7(rgyud): gsang sngags dang phyag rgya'i dngos grub mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub chen po sbyin par 'gyuraro// pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di dang
431b8(rgyud): don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba don yod pa'i de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin da / 
432a1(rgyud): namakha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po thams cad kyang rtag tu rje su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi drung du mchod pa chen po
432a2(rgyud): byed par 'gyuraro// bkra shis dang yid la bsams pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gshed byed dang / byang stems dang / gsang sngags dang / ro langs dang / sems bsgyur ba dang
432a3(rgyud): spod gtong gi sbyor ba dang / mkha' 'gro ma rnams thams cad 'byer bar byed do// dug dang / sbyar dug dang / phye ma'i sbyor ba rnams thams cad 'byar bar byed do// rims thams cad 'byer
432a4(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / de nyin gsum dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / mtshan gcig da pa dang / nyin gcig pa dang / grang ba'i rims dang / rlung las
432a5(rgyud): gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan la sa gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa dang / mgog zer dang / phol mig dang / g.yan pa dang / mig nad dang / 
432a6(rgyud): gzhog phyed na ba dang / ma ro tsa ka dang / mtshan par rdol ba dang / pho ba'i nang dang / bshang ba lakhyil ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / son pa dang / rtsib logs na ba dang / mchin pa na ba dang / tshad pa
432a7(rgyud): dang / gcin nad dang / gsud pa dang / lto ba na ba dang / lag pa na ba dang / rkang pa na ba dang / yan lag na ba dang / nying lag na ba de dag thams cad dran pa tsam gyis rnam par 'jig par byed do// 
432a8(rgyud): sha bkra dang / mdza dang / 'bras dang / phol mig dang / lhog pa dang / rkang shu dang / me dpal dang / shu ba dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang / rma dang / mgrin pa 'gags pa de dag thams cad bya bas pa tsam gyis rnam
432b1(rgyud): par 'jig par byed do// phyis kyang nam yang tshugs par mi 'gyur ro// 'di de ltar go skabs yangs la rgya che ba yin no// lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod pa pad+ma dri ma med pa'i chus
432b2(rgyud): kyi zhags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal po// don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba// dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa// rdo rje gsang ba'i snying po/ 
432b3(rgyud): dam tshig byin gyis rlob pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya'o// de nas yang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar zhus pa'i dge mtshan dang / bkra shis pa
432b4(rgyud): gsang ba byin gyis rlob pa rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen pornam par 'phrul pa thos nas tshim po dang / mgu ba dang / yi rangs pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba dang yid bde
432b5(rgyud): ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rig sngags kyi rgyal po yon+ta na phun/ sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi mchog sbyin par byed pa 'di ni
432b6(rgyud): shin tu dkon no// bcom ldan 'das rig sngags kyi rgyal po// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad dang / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig gi dngos grub bla na med pa tham
432b7(rgyud): cad yang dag par rdzogs par byed pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po mchog tu dkon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang mnyam par blta bar bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po dang / dam
432b8(rgyud): pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang mnyam pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dpral ba'i bar na sa nges par byung ba ni// rig pa
433a1(rgyud): 'dzin pa de dag thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / dngos grub mthong ba'i de kho na nyid kyi sgrub pa grub pa'i ched du 'gyuraro// dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog tu nye bar bsags par 'gyur
433a2(rgyud): ba las gzhan ma yin no// rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di dran pa tsam gyis bsod nams kyi phung po dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs gzhal du med pa dang / tshad med pa dang / grangs med pa nye bar bsags
433a3(rgyud): par 'gyur gyi gzhan du ma yin no// bcom ldan 'das nyin mtshan du yang rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di dran par bgyi skad cig kyang mi brjed par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das ci ste slar yang snga/ 
433a4(rgyud): dro 'am/ nyin mo 'am mtshan mo 'am/ zla ba 'am/ lor yang rung ste/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di brjed na/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad brjod par
433a5(rgyud): 'gyur/ yongasu dor bar 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi tshogs tha mas cad yongasu dor bar 'gyu ro// bcom ldan 'das de ba zhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas bka' stsal pa/ lagan rjo shin/ ji ltar
433a6(rgyud): byed de smras pa de bzhin te/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di lag tu son par 'gyur ba'i sems can de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu skyed pa ma yin no// lag na rdo rje gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
433a7(rgyud): phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma mthong ba dang / bsnyen bkur ma byas pa dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / dam tshig dang / gsang sngags rim
433a8(rgyud): par phye ba dang / rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po ma thos shing ma zhugs pa gang yin pa des na/ lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di de'i lag tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro// mi thos shi/ 
433b1(rgyud): mi mthong la/ ming gi sgra grags pa tsam du'ang mi 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di/ gang gi lag tu son par 'gyur ba des ni/ lag na rdo rje gang+ga'i klu gi khyim bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
433b2(rgyud): dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams de'i lag tu son par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi drung du/ 
433b3(rgyud): rigs kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / snying po dang / gsang ba'i cho ga zhib mo thams cad lag tu son par 'gyuraro// gnas thams cad du song zhing
433b4(rgyud): rjesu zhugs par 'gyur ro// thams cad rjesu song zhing / dam datshig shes par 'gyuraro// rig sngags thams cad dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / phyag rgya yang dag par spyod
433b5(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi mchogadang / gtso bo dang / thu bor 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams thams cad kyi drung na/ sras kyi gtso bor dus
433b6(rgyud): gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lung ston par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar ston pa dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs yongasu 'dzin par 'gyuraro// lag na rdo rje rig
433b7(rgyud): sngags kyi rgyal po 'di/ gang gi lag tu son cing thob par 'gyur ba'i sems can gang yin pa de ni/ de'i yon tan dang / phan yon gzhal du med pa thob par 'gyuraro// rig sngags kyi rgyal po
433b8(rgyud): 'di/ gang gi lag tu son par 'gyur ba de/ sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad so sor rnyed par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa
434a1(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di smras nas/ rang gi gzugs kyi bdag nyid kyi dngos po pad+ma'i ze 'bru'i dbus rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'phags pa
434a2(rgyud): bltas nas/ don yod pa yid bzhin nor bu'i 'od ces bya ba nor bu rin po che chen po rig sngags kyi rgyal po bcom ldan 'das la phul bar gyur to// oM a mo g+ha tsin+ta ma Ni ba ra da pad me dz+wa la dz+wa la na b+hu dze hUM/ 
434a3(rgyud): 'di ni don yod pa pad+ma dri ma med pa'i chu skyes kyi zhags pa'i rtsa ba'i snying po'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la phul ba'i de ma thag pa de nas rig sngags kyi rgyal
434a4(rgyud): po thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na/ bcom ldan 'das la spyan mi 'dzum par blta zhing 'kho // bcom ldan 'das da shAkya thub pas don yod pa yid bzhin nor gyi 'ad rig sngags kyi
434a5(rgyud): rgyal po nor bu rin po che chen po de la yang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po sa spyi bo nas dbang bsku ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis rig snga gas kyi rgyal po 'dis dbang bskur ma thag tu/ stong gsum gyi
434a6(rgyud): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ri dang / nags dang 'grog dgon par bcas pa rnams rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g.yo so// phyogs bcu kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar gyur to// 
434a7(rgyud): des na dus gsum du bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad na mkha'i dbyingasu rdzu 'phrul gyis bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga
434a8(rgyud): pa shAkya thub pa la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ shAkya thub pa mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba'i mngon par dbang bskur nga'i rgyal po 'dis mngon par dbang bskur ba 'di legaso leg so// dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de 'i
434b1(rgyud): gshegs pa snga ma rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du rig pa'i rgyal po 'dis dbang bsku ro// nged thams cad kyis kyang tshig gcig tu 'thun pas don yod pa yid bzhin nor bu'i 'od la rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen pos
434b2(rgyud): mngon par dbang bskuro// dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyang phyag gser gyi kha dog can brkyang nas// de rnams thams cad la rig pa'i rgyal pos spyi bo'i gtsug nas mngon par
434b3(rgyud): dbang bsku ro 'di ni mngon par dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya mngon par dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa'o// oM a mo g+ha bai ro tsa na ma hA mu drA ma Ni pad+me dz+wa la pra brda ya hUM/ phyag rgya chen pos mngon par dbang bskur ma
434b4(rgyud): thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ rang da rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gshegs nas mi snang bar gyur to// de nas rig pa'i rgyal po de de bzhin gshegs pa
434b5(rgyud): thams cad kyis phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yasu bskor ba gsum byas nas thal/ mo sbyar ba btung ste/ phyag byas nas spyan sngar 'dug te sems
434b6(rgyud): par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'chang de'i rig pa'i rgyal po sems par gzigs nas/ ji ltar de ltar yod la byed pa yang dag par rab tu gsal bar mdzad do// 
434b7(rgyud): oM a mo gA maN+Da la pad+me a bi She ke ma Ni badz+re sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ke hUM/ rig pa'i rgyal po des dkyil 'khor du mngon par dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur ma thag tu/ de bzhin ga
434b8(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rigs thun mong ba'i dam tshig rdo rje chen po'i tshul gyis sa bzhi byin gyis brlabs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / pad+ma rigs dang
435a1(rgyud): rdo rje'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs rnam par thar pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar cher 'khrigs pa'i dkyil 'khor du brtags pa mthong ngo // rang
435a2(rgyud): rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas rig pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor ba'i lha thams cad mthong ngo // rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul che zhing che ba dag byung ngo // don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po shin tu ngo mtshar
435a3(rgyud): bdag mthong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dkyil 'khor chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'di lta bu mthong nas don yod pa'i
435a4(rgyud): mchod pa'i nor bu rdo rje byin gyis rlobs pa de bzhin gshegs dpa'i mngon par dbang bskur ba bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes gnang ba dang ldan pa'o// oM a mo gA pU dza ma Ni pad+ma badz+re ta
435a5(rgyud): za ga ta bi lo ki te sa man+ta pra sa ra hUM/ 'phags pa spyan ra/ sa gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa mchod pa'i nor bu 'i snying po byin ma thag tu mchod pa rgya chen po rnam pa sna tshog
435a6(rgyud): padu ma rab tu byung ste/ ji ltar rang rang gi cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du mchod pa chen po rnams byung ngo // lha rdzas rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnam par bkra ba yangs pa rgya chen po go skabs kun tu gnas par gyur/ 
435a7(rgyud): to/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa che zhing che ba'i byin gyis brlabs kyi bkod pa rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor chen po yang dag par mthong ngo // de nas rig pa'i rgyal po don yod pa
435a8(rgyud): pad+ma dri ma med pa bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das las ring por 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
435b1(rgyud): las mngon du phyogs nas stan la 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sdeng pon chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rnam
