435b2(rgyud): par 'phrul pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs byin gyis rlob pa'i khyad par phyag rgya chen po dang / gsang sngags dang / gzungs dang / cho ga zhib mo'i mthu stobs pad+ma yangs pa chen po'i gsang ba don
435b3(rgyud): yod zhags pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rig pa'i rgyal po'i de gnyid kyi snying po grub pa dam tshig dang rje su 'thun pa mthu stobs dang yon tan 'byung ba la phan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying
435b4(rgyud): po'i rnam par 'phrul pa yid kyi shing rta re ba thams cad kyi ma cho ga rab tu sbyin pa la ltos/ 'phags pa spyan ras ga/ zigs dbang phyug gis re ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs par
435b5(rgyud): rjesu sbyin te rig pa'i rgyal po 'di/ phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro// reg pa'i rgyal po 'di sems can thams cad kyi snang bar byed par 'gyu
435b6(rgyud): ro// skyabs dang / dpung gnyen dang / 'khras dang / yid kyi shing rta re ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed do// sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do// dgra thams cad rab tu 'dul bar byedo// bgegs
435b7(rgyud): dang log 'dren pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed do// char ches pa rab tu zhi bar byed do// char med na char 'beb so// rlung dang / sad dang / ser pa ldog par byed do// mu ge'i dgon pa rab tu zhi bar bya/ 
435b8(rgyud): nad thams cad ldog par byed do// gdug pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do// tshe dang nad med pa 'phel bar byeda'o// bsod nams sbyin pa dang / dbang phyug sbyin pa dang / nor sbyin pa dang / 'bru 'phel bar bye'o// de nas bya/ 
436a1(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa dri ma med pa'i chu skyes kyi gzungs kyi snying po'i yo byad dang / cho ga bklags pas 'grub
436a2(rgyud): pa'i dngos grub gsung so// de nas snying po 'di bklags pas 'grub par 'gyur te/ rig pa'i rgyal po bklags pas dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad 'gugs par 'gyuro// stong phrag brgya bzlas pas pad+ma ya
436a3(rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / gzhal med khang gyi rgyan mtha' dag dang / rig pa'i rgyal po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
436a4(rgyud): phyug gi gzhal med khang dang dkyil 'khor dang gzhal med khang mtha' dag mthong ngo // de la lha rnams rab tu 'jug par byed do// dam tshig shes par yang 'gyu ro// rig sngags kyi
436a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du mngon par dbang bskur bar yang 'gyuraro// phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang rje su 'thun par yang 'gyu ro// dang po rma/ lam mthong ba tsam gyi 'gro'o// gnyis par rmi lam mthong ba
436a6(rgyud): la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshegs thams cad dang / rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rang gi rgyan dang dkyil 'khor
436a7(rgyud): brtags pa mthong ngo // gzhal yas khang rgya chen po dang bcas pa yang mthong ngo // der yang rab tu 'jug par byed de dam tshig kyang 'dzin par byed do// phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / gsang
436a8(rgyud): sngags dang / mngon par dbang bskur ba yang so sor thob bo// rig sngags dang bcas pa'i dngos grub rab tu thob bo// gsum par rmi lam mthong ba na/ rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mthong ste de bzhin
436b1(rgyud): gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad dang rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams dang bcas pa rang gi rgyan dang dkyil 'khor tu brtags pa dang / gzhal med khang rgya chen po
436b2(rgyud): dang bcas pa mthong ngo // de la yang rdo rje 'chang rab tu 'jug par byed do// dam tshig gi phyag rgya sbyin par byed do// mngon par dbang bskur bar bas mngon par dbang bskur bar byed do// rig sngags
436b3(rgyud): thams cad dang / don yod pa'i rim par bye ba'i dngos grub chen po dang / ngon pa dang sbu sa na pa dang bskur bar byed// rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub chen po dang / dam tshig thams cad so sor thob bo// bzhi par
436b4(rgyud): rmi lam mthong ba na/ nor bu'i rigs chen po'i dkyil 'khor du da gnas pa'i lha dang / rigs pa'i rgyal po yang mthong te// de la yang rab tu 'jug par byed do// phyag rgya dang / dam
436b5(rgyud): tshig dang / cho ga dang bcas pa rje su thob te/ mngon par dbang bskur ba yang rab tu thob bo// dngos grub chen po dang ma cho ga sbyin yang so so thob cing thams cad du mngon par dbang
436b6(rgyud): bskur bar yang 'gyur ro// lnga par rmi lam mthong ba na rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor du brtags pa dang / don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor du brtags pa dang / po Ta la ki'i ri'i gzhal med
436b7(rgyud): khang dang bcas pa mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad dang / lha dang bcas pa dang / rig pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams mthong te/ 
436b8(rgyud): de la yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang nyid sems can de la rab tu 'jug par byed do// dam tshig dang phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang gsang sngags dang gzugs kyi dngos
437a1(rgyud): grub so sor thob bo// rang nyid kyang don yod pa'i rig sngags kyi dbang gis mngon par dbang bskur te mngon par dbang bskur bar byed do// cho ga zhib mo thams cad dang / dngos grub kyang
437a2(rgyud): rjesu stsol bar byed do// mchog thams cad rab tu sbyin pa so so thob bo// drug par rmi lam mthong ba na/ dkyil 'khor chen po mthong te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong pa mtho
437a3(rgyud): ngo// gzhal med khang dang bcas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po mthong te de
437a4(rgyud): la yang rab tu 'jug par byed do// phyag rgya dang gsang sngag/ sa dang dam tshig dang mngon par dbang bskur ba so sord thob te/ rig sngags thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi mchog sbyin
437a5(rgyud): pa so sor thob bo// bdun par rmi lam chen po mthong bas de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying por gshegs nas rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs pa mthong te/ chos kyi 'khor lo bsku
437a6(rgyud): ba dang / bdud 'dul ba mthong ngo // de la yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad phyag gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste/ rang nyid phyag gis gzung nas/ rab tu 'jug par byed do// rang nyid
437a7(rgyud): mngon par dbang bskur zhing mngon par dbang bskur bar byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyis dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags kyi dngos grub kyi mchog sbyin pa rjes
437a8(rgyud): su stsol bar byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ston par byed do// nang sna tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten pa thams cad rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po gcig po/ 
437b1(rgyud): 'gyur ro// skye ba rje ba 'chi 'pho ba'i dus su dran pa nye bar gnas shing dus byed par 'gyur ro// bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu pad+ma las rdzus te skye ba'i skal ba dang bcas par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i
437b2(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur bar skye bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus mchod par byed do// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
437b3(rgyud): mngon sum du mthong nas nye bar ston par byed do// thams cad du yang de rnams rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nye bar ston par byed do// thams cad du yang / rang gi gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
437b4(rgyud): par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig nye bar ston par byed do// bsku dal pa brgya stong phrag gi bar du yang / sngon gyi skye ba rje su dran par byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog thams
437b5(rgyud): cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gsang ba'i dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor gyi rim/ par phye ba dang / gsang sngags dang / gzungs sngags rnams
437b6(rgyud): mngon tu phyogs par 'gyu ro// skye ba skye bar yang rang gi bsod nams kyi las kyi tshogs dge ba'i rtsa ba rjesu dran par 'gyuraro// thams cad du gnas thams cad yong su dag pa'i las kyi sgrub thabs
437b7(rgyud): kyi cho ga'i dngos grub tu 'gyu ro zhes rtsa ba'i snying po'i dngos grub bla na med pa bklags pas 'grub pa'o// de nas 'di'i yo byad dang cho ga sems can thams cad kyi re ba yongasu rdzogs par byed
437b8(rgyud): pa'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad/ nges par sreg pa la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do// gang dang gang gi las kyi
438a1(rgyud): sgrib pa rnams rjesu bcings par 'gyuraro// de yang nyi ma bdun gyis rang gi lus des rang gi gzugs kyis nges par 'gro ste mdun du nye bar 'dus te sbyin par byed pa dang / sngon gyi
438a2(rgyud): spring pa nye bar bsags pa 'di dang / sdig pa thams cad yongasu zad pa nyid dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa dang / bdag zhum pa dang 'khrugs pa mtha' dag bzlas pa tsam gyis yang
438a3(rgyud): dag par smra bar byed cing mi snang bar byed do// rims thams cad la skud pa dkar po la mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bya ste/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas rims thams cad yongasu grol bar
438a4(rgyud): byed do// nad thams cad la byabs pas yongasu grol bar dbyed do// mtshon chas sam rma bya'i spros sam/ mngad yis yang rung te nad thams cad las yongasu grol bar byed do// 
438a5(rgyud): gdon thams cad la tshon srung sA lA'i skud pa la mdud pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig byas te bzlas brjod lan brgya du/ rgyang byas te gdon gyis zin pa de'i mgul par bcings te la
438a6(rgyud): bdun du byab par bya'o// gro gul bdug pa sbyin par bya/ bzlas brjod lan bdun bya bzhin pa dang bcas pas gang dang gang gi gdon gyis zin par gyur pa de yang rang gi lus kyis nges par
438a7(rgyud): ste/ rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du nye bar 'dug nas thams cad smra bar byed do// rang gis dris pa de thams cad smra bar byed do// dka' bsko ba thams cad byed par 'gyu ro// 'thab pa dang / 
438a8(rgyud): 'thab rtsod dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa rnams thams cad la smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyuraro// gzhan yang bsam gtan dang / sbyin sreg gis yongasu grol lo// khar mur te/ rgyal po khang du zhugs
438b1(rgyud): na rgyal ba 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas gnas so// dug 'thungs pas chu la yongasu bzlas te sbyin par bya ste dug med par 'gyur ro// dug gi zos pa la byab par bya ste/ dug med par 'gyur ro// dgang
438b2(rgyud): byad stems dang / gsang sngags dang / phye ma'i sbyor ba thams cad la dri dang bsres pa'i bum pa la stong phrag brgyad yongasu bzlas pa byas la bkru bar bya ste/ bkrus pa tsam gyi mod la thams cad nyams
438b3(rgyud): par byed do// gang yang lus zad pa dang / nyams pa dang / bskams pa dang / rgyal po'i dpal med pa dang / lus yongasu gdungs pa la rig sngags 'chang des ma reg pas dri'i chus yongasu gang ba'i
438b4(rgyud): bum po dgu yungs kyis gtor te stong phrag brgyad yongasu bzlas pa rjod bya'o// de nas An+ta ra sap+ta dang / bI ka dang / A Ta dang / bil ba dang / shu ti dang / nye'u shing dang / e kas+thA na dang / 
438b5(rgyud): mo lo kya dang / lus kyi mar gyis bsku mnye byas nas lan brgya/ rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te/ A Ta byug par bya'o// / gzugs brnyan bya ste/ gong bu de mtshon chas dum bu brgyad
438b6(rgyud): du bya ste/ snod yongasu gang ba bzhir 'phang bar bya zhing / snod gang po bzhi mtshams bzhir 'phang bar bya'o// de nas snying pos lan brgya rtsa brgyad du byab par bya'o// de nas ne'u sing sngon po gang du chu
438b7(rgyud): rgyun 'bab par dri'i chu'i bum pas khrus byas zhing gos dkar po dgus g.yogs par bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bya zhing / dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa
438b8(rgyud): bya'o// ji ltar 'byor pa'i bram ze'i ston mo yon dang bcas pa bya'o// de nas rang nyid byams pa dang ldan par bya'o// ji ltar 'byor pa gyi nom pas dkar ba'i zas kyi bza' ba dang / btung bas tshim par
439a1(rgyud): bya'o// de nas dpal med pa thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / bgegs dang / log par 'dren pa thams cad kyis mi reg pa dang / 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / 
439a2(rgyud): srin po dang / grib gnon dang / brjed byed dang / gza' dang log 'dren gyi zin pa las yongasu grol lo// gza' nyes dang / 'ogo mnyes dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las yongasu grol bar byed/ 
439a3(rgyud): do// lus kyi phung po yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thams cad du 'jigs pa 'jigs par byed pa'i 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro// sdig pa dang sgrib pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad
439a4(rgyud): las yongasu grol bar 'gyur ro// ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// / nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyuraro// skye ba rjes nasabade ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu skye bar 'gyuraro// skye ba'i skye
439a5(rgyud): badran par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ sa rtag tu yang dgongs par 'gyuraro// byang chub sem/ sa dpa' dang lha thams cad kyi ji srid byang chub tu mngon par/ 
439a6(rgyud): rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du de 'dzin par 'gyuraro// mig na ba la pa lA sha'i chu dang / shing mngar gyi chu dang / dri ma med pa'i chu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongasu bzlas tau sbyar bar bya ste mig nad
439a7(rgyud): 'phral du zhi bar byed do// mgo bo'i zug rngu dang / gzhogs phyed na ba la/ mar dang til mar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongasu bzlas nas 'jam par sros pas sman shu ti la bsgos nas mgo la bsku
439a8(rgyud): mnye byas na/ mgo bo'i nad thams cad dang / gzhogs phyed na pa'i nad thams cad yongasu grolo// so'i zug rdul me tog sna ma dang / so shing la lan brgya rtsa brgyad du yongasu bzlas nas
439b1(rgyud): baba' bar byas na so'i zug rngu yongasu grol lo// rna ba'i zug rdul shu ti dang til mar la brgya rtsa brgyad yongasu bzlas pas bkang bar bya ste rna ba'i zug rngu thams cad yongasu grol lo// kha na pa la/ sman ma
439b2(rgyud): shU re'i chu dang / mar la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas 'jam par bsros pa btung bar bya ste kha'i nad thams cad yongasu grol lo// lte ba'i zug rdul lan tshwa dang chu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongasu bzlas
439b3(rgyud): nas btung bar bya ste lto ba'i zug rngu yongasu grol lo// snying gi zug rngu la/ so so rtsal ma dang / go snyod dang pu sku ra'i rtsa ba rnams bzhi 'gyur gyi chu yis sum cha lhag mar lus kyi bar du bskol bar
439b4(rgyud): byas nas btung bar bya'o// lan brgyad bzlas pas snying gi zug rngu dang / gzhogs na ba dang / mchin pa na ba dang / mtshan par rdol ba dang / gsung ba dang skyug khro ba dang
439b5(rgyud): gcin nad rnams te/ de bzhin du nad thams cad 'phral tu sa la bar 'jig rten gyi mgon pos 'di gsungs so// rgyal po'i 'jigs pas 'jigs pa rnams kyis yungs ka/ 
439b6(rgyud): la yongasu bzlas nas rgyal po rnams kyi sgor gtor bar bya ste/ rgyal po'i 'jigs pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad yongasu grol bar 'gyur te/ thams cad du yang rgyal ba ster 'gyur ro// na le sham
439b7(rgyud): la stong rtsa brgyad yongasu bzlas te/ na le sham gyi 'bras bu kha'i rtse mor bcug te bcangs na/ gang smras pa de dbang 'gyur ro// gang blangs pa de so sor rnyed do// gnas thams cad du 'gro ba rnams la
439b8(rgyud): rgyal ba'i mchog chen po sbyin par 'gyuraro// klu'i char 'bebs pa la bal po se'u'i lcug mas bye ste gang du 'dod pa der / klu'i char 'bebs so// klu'i mtsher song nas mtshan mo bdun du zho dang / 
440a1(rgyud): sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang / sungs kar gyi sbyin sreg lan stong rtsa brgyad du byas na/ gter chen po rnyed par 'gyur ro// dbang phyug thob pa la 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / mar dang / 
440a2(rgyud): bsres pas sbyin sreg lan stong rtsa brgyad du byas na dbang phyug chen po so sor thob par 'gyur ro// dgra 'joms pa la sA lu'i phub ma dang / lan tshwa dang / tsha ba'i til mar dang / bsres pas lan
440a3(rgyud): stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na dgra thams cad med par 'gyur ro// dgra rnams thams cad rab tu 'dul bar 'gyur ro// skrod par 'dod pas/ de nyid kyi thal ba las lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas te/ 
440a4(rgyud): dgra'i sgor gtor bar bya ste/ mtshan mo gcig tu mi gnas te/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshamasu 'bros par byed do// / 'khrug pa'i g.yul ngor 'jug par 'dod pas yungs kar
440a5(rgyud): la lan stong phrag brgyad du yongasu bzlas te/ 'khrug pa'i ga yul ngo'adabus su gtor bar bya ste/ thams cad du rmA gas pa dang / rengs pa dang / rmongs par 'gyur te thams cad
440a6(rgyud): du rgyal ba ster bar 'gyur zhing / thams cad phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su 'bros par byed do// gnas na gnas pa thams cad kyi yang rgyal ba ster bar 'gyuraro// thams cad du thogs
440a7(rgyud): pa med pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon par 'gyur ro// ldong ros la lan stong phrag brgyad yongasu bzlas te/ mig gi mig sman du byas na mi snang bar 'gyur te/ 'byung po
440a8(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad kyis mi mthong bar 'gyur ro// gi he la lan stong phrag brgyad yongasu bzlas te thig le byas nas bu ga thams cad rab tu 'jug par byed cing / bu ga'i sgo thams cad
440b1(rgyud): bye ste sgor gnas par byed do// gang du 'dod pa der 'jug par byed do// gitsi gis snying khar thig le byas nas/ gang du 'jug par byed pa de dang de nyid du/ mchod pa chen por 'gyur te/ nor che ba dang / 
440b2(rgyud): 'bru 'brel ba thob bo// lag pa gnyis la byug pas gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur te/ gang blangs pa de thams cad so sor rnyed do// rgyal po dbang du byed par 'dod pas/ lag pa g.yas pa
440b3(rgyud): la gi tsaM gis phyugs nas lan stong rtsa brgyad yongasu bzlas te/ rgyal po'i sgo la thal lcag sbyin par bya ste/ rgyal po dang btsun mo sras dang 'khor dang bcas pa bdag nyid dang nor gyis kyang dbang
440b4(rgyud): du 'gyur ro// bud med dbang du byed pa la me tog dang 'bras dbu la lan stong phrag brgya rtsa brgyad du yongasu bzlas nas spyi dran par bya/ yang na mngag par bya ste/ 'phral nyid du dbang
440b5(rgyud): du byed par 'gyur ro// gang du 'dod pa de dang de nyid du 'gro'o// slar yang 'ong ngo // yang na ming smos pas na mkha' la 'phang bar bya ste/ gang gi mying smos pa de 'gugs par 'gyur
440b6(rgyud): zhing / mtshan mo 'ong bar byed do// mthu stobs kyis slar yang phyir ldog te 'gro'o// skyes pa dbang du byed pa la/ dza ti dang snga ma'i me tog la lan bdun yongasu bzlas te sbyin par bya'o// yang na
440b7(rgyud): mngag par bya ste/ reg pa tsam gyis bdag nyid dang nor gyis kyang dbang du byed par 'gyur ro// gang smras pa dang / gang blangs pa de thams cad byed do// 'bangs dang ci sgo ba byed par 'gyur ro// 
440b8(rgyud): gzhon nu ma dbang du byed pa la/ 'bras bu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongasu pozlas te sbyin par bya ba'am/ Sham ngag par bya ste gzung ba tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur ro// grib ma bzhin du rje su 'brang bar
441a1(rgyud): bar 'gyur zhing ji srid 'tsho bar nye bar gnas par 'gyu ro// rje rigs dbang du byed pa la ba sha ka'i me tog la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongasu bzlas te/ sbyin par bya ste dbang du gyur nas nye
441a2(rgyud): bar gnas so// bram ze dbang du byed pas zho dang 'o ma'i bza' ba la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongasu bzlas nas sbyin par bya ste/ bram ze dbang du byed pa grub bo// rgyal rigs dbang du byed pa la/ bu ram dang / 
441a3(rgyud): 'o ma la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongasu bzlas nas sbyin par bya ste dbang du 'gyur ro// rmangs rigs dbang du byed pa la gang dang gang gi bza' ba la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongasu bzlas te sbyin par bya ste/ 
441a4(rgyud): zos pa tsam gyi modo la dbang du 'gyu ro// rang gi 'dod pa'i bya nga ba gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs pa bya ba rnams ni bklags dpas grub par 'gyur ro// don yod pa pad+ma'i chu skyes kyi rtsa
441a5(rgyud): ba'i snying po'i yo byad dang cho ga'i sgrub thabs so// de nas dza/ na yod pa'i phyag rgya dbang bskur ba'i gzungs kyi ro/ byang dang / cho gar 'gyur te gzungs 'di'i rig sngags
441a6(rgyud): gis dran pa tsan dang bklags pa dang phyag rgya bzung ba tsam gyis ngo bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya dang / dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya dran par 'gyur ro// 
441a7(rgyud): rig pa'i rgyal po'i gzungs stong phrag bzlas pa 'dis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// 
441a8(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang des kyang dang por rmi lam gyi nang du mthong ngo // dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis rnam par snang mdzad yid bzhin nor bu'i phyag
441b1(rgyud): rgya'i dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur bar byed do// de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mngon par dbang bskur ba dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya la rab tu 'jug par byed do// 
441b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rang rang rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba rjesu sbyin par 'gyuraro// leg so zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad
441b3(rgyud): sgo rnams bye ba gyur pa'i sgor mthong ngo // gang du 'dod pa der 'jug go/ des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang mnyam
441b4(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rig sngags 'cha dang de srid 'tsho'i bar du rtag tu rjesu 'brang bar 'gyur ro// // rtag tu mthong ba dang ldan par gnas so// stong phrag
441b5(rgyud): gnyis pa bzlas pas/ gnyis par rmi lam mthong bar blta'o// pad+ma rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gang la yang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya dang / gzungs dang
441b6(rgyud): gzhal med khang mtha' dag yongasu rdzogs par mthong ngo // der yang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i gzhal med khang thams cad mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhal med khang mthong ngo // de la
441b7(rgyud): yang de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i rigs thams cad kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya'i dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// rang rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i phyag
441b8(rgyud): rgyas mngon par dbang bskur ba dang / dkyil 'khor rnam ston par mdzad do// rig sngags 'chang rang nyid la yang mngon par dbang bskur bar byed do// legaso legaso zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod par
442a1(rgyud): byed do// pad+mo yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du yang phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin gyis rlob pa yid bzhin gyi
442a2(rgyud): nor bu chen po'i phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur bar mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur zhing / yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur ro// stong phrag gsum pa bzlas pas rmi lam chen po gsum pa bstan
442a3(rgyud): pa mthong ste/ gzhal med khang mtha' dag tu rab tu gnas pa'i rdo rje'i rigs kyi phyag rgya dang / mngon par dbang bskur brjesu rtsol bar mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dus gsum
442a4(rgyud): du gshegs shing rab tu bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa da'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa'i mngon par dbang bskur ba dang phyag rgya yang mthong ngo // de yang dus
442a5(rgyud): gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams tha/ mas cad rig sngags 'tshang la rdo rje'i phyag rgyas mdzo na par dbang bskur ba dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag
442a6(rgyud): rgyas mngon par dbang bskur bas/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur bar mdzad do// rang rang rnams kyang rdo rje'i phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur ba rje su stsol bar
442a7(rgyud): mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje'i dam tshig la rab tu 'jug par mdzad do// rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa'i mngon par dbong bskur ba legs so legs zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod
442a8(rgyud): par mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje'i rigs yang dag par byin gyis rlob pa'i dngos grub nye bar ston par mdzad do// thams cad du rdo rje'i rigs kyi phyag rgyas mngon pa
442b1(rgyud): dbang bskur bar 'gyu ro// stong phrag bzhir pa bzlas pas nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba thob bo// de la yang nor bu'i rigs chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'i
442b2(rgyud): dbang bskur ba thob bo// rmi lam ston pa de yang dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams mthong ngo // dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs
442b3(rgyud): pa de rnams thams cad kyang / rig sngags 'chang de la nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / mngon par dbang bskur bas yang mngon par dbang bskur
442b4(rgyud): bar byed do// rang rang rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de na dmas kyi nor bu gsang ba'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba ga/ tsug gi nor bu byin gyis rlob pa dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu
442b5(rgyud): phyag rgyas mngon par dang/ bskur bar byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nor bu'i dkyil 'khor rnams
442b6(rgyud): bar ston par mdzad do// yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i dngos grub kyi dam tshig gi dbang bskur ba dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o// legaso legaso zhes bya ba'i
442b7(rgyud): sgra brjod par byed cing rtag tu rjesu 'brang bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyang ji srid sangs rgyas kyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa byin gyis rlob
442b8(rgyud): par yang dag par dgongs par 'gyur ro// yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rigs chen po'i phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu'i rigs kyi
443a1(rgyud): gsang ba'i snying po'i mchog tu 'gyuro// bzlas pa lnga las rmi lam chen po'i phyag rgya ston par byed pa ni/ dkyil 'khor chen po mtha' dag rdzogs par phyir mi ldog pa'i
443a2(rgyud): gnas kyi mngon par dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur bar mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang phyir mi ldog pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor chen por mngon par dbang
443a3(rgyud): bskur bar mdzad do// dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / phyag rgya chen po mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// bzlas pa drug pas rmi lam yang dag par ston pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa
443a4(rgyud): thams cad byang chub kyi snying por gshegs te rdo rje'i gdan byin dgyis rlobs pas byin gyis brlabs te/ mngon par da dbang bskur bar 'gyur// dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs
443a5(rgyud): pathams cad bzhugs pa mthong te seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyang rang rang gi ga sngags 'chang phyir mi ldog par mngon par dbang bskur
443a6(rgyud): mdzad do// leg so leg so zhes bya ba'i gsung brjod par mdzad// dgongs pa cher brtan pas dgongs par 'gyu ro// ji srid sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la mthar thug gi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa
443a7(rgyud): thams cad rjesu 'brang bar 'gyu ro// bzlas pa bdun pas rmi lam chen po ston pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / 
443a8(rgyud): dam pa'i chos kyi char 'bebs pa dang / chos kyi sgron me spor ba dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng ba dang / dam pa'i chos kyi dung 'brang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyag rgya chen pos ma/ 
443b1(rgyud): par dbang bskur ba mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis kyang phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / phyag rgyas dbang bsrung bas
443b2(rgyud): mngon par bskur bar mdzad do// legaso legaso zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod par mdzad do// phyag rgya chen po dang dkyil 'khor dang kun nas gsang ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor ngo kho na nyid
443b3(rgyud): kyi dngos grub dang mngon par dbang bskur bar mdzad do// de bzhin du bklags pa dang / bzlas pa tsam gyis cho ga dang las kyi 'bras bu ston par mdzad do// don yod pa'i nor bu rnam par snang
443b4(rgyud): mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po'i gzungs kyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshi ga 'di yang rnam par spyod par 'gyuraro// 'di bklag/ pa dang dran pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
443b5(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor chen por rjesu 'jug para'agyur ro// thams cad du gnas la gnas pa'i dam tshig shes par 'gyuraro bzlas pa tsam gyi mo la dus gsum
443b6(rgyud): du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mtshan nas smos nas mngon sum du ston par mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ston par mdzad par 'gyur ro// mtshan
443b7(rgyud): smos nas 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya 'dzin par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i mchog tu 'gyur// sdig pa
443b8(rgyud): dang sgrib pa dang / bdug pa thams cad dang / mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa sprin gyi sdig po dang / sgrib pa rnam par 'joms par byed// klags pa tsam dang / lan gcig bzlas pa tsam gyimade mas
444a1(rgyud): cad yongasu zad pa dang / yongasu gtugs par 'gyu ro// sems can gyi sdig pa'i chos gang cung zad kun tu spyad pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga byed nga mnar med pa la mchog tu gzhol ba'i
444a2(rgyud): sems can de'i mdun du lan gsum dbyangs gsangs stod pas brjod cing / dran par bya ste de'i sgra thos pa tsam gyis mod la sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad dang / mtshams med par song ba thams
444a3(rgyud): cad dang / mnar med pa la mchog tu gzhol ba rnams yongasu dag par 'gyur ro// sems can de yang sdig pa thams cad las yongasu grol bar 'gyu ro// yang na sdig pa can gyi sems can shi bar gyur
444a4(rgyud): pas bsod nams kyi don du bsod nams 'dod pas sems can de de'i don du yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongasu bzlas te/ sems can de'i don du ro bsregs pa'am// ma chad pa 'am/ 
444a5(rgyud): sbas pa 'am/ rus pa'i rkang rus sam/ dur khrod kyis dbus su de/ 'i steng du gdab cing der gtor bar bya'o// gtor ba tsam/ gyis mod la sems can de gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang
444a6(rgyud): de nyid du sems can de'i lus la byang chub chen po'i yan lag gi chu'i dri'i mchog bgos par 'gyur ro// 'phral nyid du dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten
444a7(rgyud): dang / lha ma yin gyi lus las yongasu grol bar 'gyu ro// sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongasu zad par 'gyu ro// der yang ngan 'gro rnams las 'phos par 'gyur zhing bde ba can gyi 'jig rten
444a8(rgyud): gyi khamasu skye ba 'gyu ro// 'di la som nyi dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// gang gi tshe nang drag pos thabs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ rig sngags 'chang gis rna bar bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin par bya ste/ 
444b1(rgyud): de yang nad yun ring po las grol te rang gi gnasu 'gyur ro// nad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad las yongasu grol bar 'gyuraro// spyi bo'i gtsug tu phyag rgyas btab te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod par bya ste/ 
444b2(rgyud): 'phral nyid du yongasu grolo// gal te nag po chen pos rang gi phyag rgyas btab na de ltar de nyid la bltas pas phyag rgya thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro// gal te yun ring du ma grol na gang gis phyag rgyas
444b3(rgyud): btab par gyur pa de mig gnyis po dag 'byin par 'gyur ro// gdon gyis zin pa thams cad la tshon skud sna lnga'i skud pa la bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig byas nas mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig byos la
444b4(rgyud): bcing bar bya ste/ gdon dang brjed byed thams cad las yongasu grol par 'gyur ro// nad thams cad la skud pa dkar pos bcing / par bya ste nad thams cad las yongasu gro'o// 'thab pa dang / 
444b5(rgyud): 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa rnams thams cad du 'gro ba la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongasu bzlas te kha ton tu bzung ba thams cad du sme ba'i mchog tu 'gyur// na le sha ma dang / 
444b6(rgyud): rgya spos dang / ru ta dang / yungs pa gnyis dang / ro'i mig sman la sngags stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas la phye ma zhib mor byas te/ mig sman dang mnyam par sbyar nas gdon gyi zin pa rnams kyi mig la bskus
444b7(rgyud): na/ bskus pa tsam gyis mod la gdon thams cad yongasu gro'o// gal te yun ring por ma grol na gdon gyi mig gnyis 'byin par 'gyuraro// rims nyin bzhi pa la mig gnyis la bsku bar bya'o// 
444b8(rgyud): gal te yun ring du ma grol na mgo bo tshal pa bdun du 'gas par 'gyuraro// lus la me 'bar bar 'gyur rims thams cad la bskus pa tsam gyis yongasu grolo// gal te yun ring du ma grol na mgo bo dum bung/ 
445a1(rgyud): du 'gas par 'gyuraro// dug gis zos pa'i mig la bsku bar bya zhing mngag gzhugs par bya'o// dug 'thungs pa la bskus na dug med par 'gyuraro// shi ba'i mig la bskus na ldang ba
445a2(rgyud): 'gyur te/ de smra bar byed// chu dang yungs kar bsngags na slar yang 'gyel bar byed// mgo bo'i zug rngu dang / gzhogs phyed na pa rnams kyi mig la bsku ste/ phyag rgya thams cad 'jig par byed do// 
445a3(rgyud): rgyal po khros pa gang gis skye bo gnas nas 'byin pa dang / de bzhin du mtshon cha mang po 'bab pa dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dgra bo nyid la yang 'dis bskus pa'i mig gis bltas na thams cad dga' ba
445a4(rgyud): 'gyu ro// de rnams thams cad rtag tu dbang du gyur nas gnas te/ da'adi la the tshom mi bya'o// don yod pa'i phyag rgya'i dbang ba da skur ba'i snying po dang gzungs kyi cho ga'i sgrub thab so// 
445a5(rgyud): de nas don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po pad+ma'i dbang bskur ba'i nor bu'i gzungs kyi snying po'i yo byad du 'gyur te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rigs sun
445a6(rgyud): mongs par rjesu 'jug par 'gyur ro// stong rgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas mi 'pham pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor pad+ma chen po'i dbang bskur ba yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i pad+ma bcings
445a7(rgyud): pas spyi bor mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// de nas dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la de'i rmi lam mthong ba nye bar ston par byed do// dkyil
445a8(rgyud): 'khor chen po yangs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par mthong ba dang cho 'phrul ston par byed do// gzhal yas khang dang bcas/ rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas/ lha'i tshogs dang bcas
445b1(rgyud): pa'i rig pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor ba'i lha rnams nye bar ston par byed do// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dang / pad+ma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dang / rdo rje'i rigs kyi/ 
445b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dang / nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dang / don yod zhags pa'i snying po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi kyi 'khor chen po dang / rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor chen po de rnams
445b3(rgyud): thams cad kyang so so so so'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bsku ro// rig pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams mtha' dag nye bar ston par byed do// ji srid du byang chub kyi
445b4(rgyud): snying por gshegs pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / ba dud 'dul ba'i bar gyi dkyil 'khor nye bar ston par byed do// dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis
445b5(rgyud): kyang dkyil 'khor chen po de rnams kyis so so so so'i dkyil 'gro/ ra du mngon par dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur/ bar mdzad do// dkyil 'khor gyi mchog thams cad du
445b6(rgyud): mngon par dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur bar mdzad do// de nas rig sngags 'chang de de lta bu'i rmi lam chen po mthong ngo // dga' ba chen po rgyas par 'gyur ro// dga' ba rab tu 'gu ba'i
445b7(rgyud): snying nges kyang don yod pa pad+ma dri ma med pa'i mngon par dbang bskur ba'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis kyang / rig sngags 'chang de la legaso legs so// 
445b8(rgyud): zhes brjod par mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i rigs thun mongs pa'i dam tshig gis mngon par dbang bskur bas khyod mngon
446a1(rgyud): par dbang bskur ro// grub pa thob pa de rnams rig sngags 'chang chen po dang dkyil 'khor gi gsang ba'i rjesu 'jug cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras kyi
446a2(rgyud): por 'gyuraro zhes so sor sad do// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis/ bzlas pa tsam dang bklags pa tsam gyis de ma thag par rgya chen po'i yon tan gsal ba de lta bu skye bar 'gyu ro// slar yang 'di'i gong nas gong
446a3(rgyud): du rnam par 'phrul pa ston par byed do// rig sngags 'chang gang yang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang yang rung bar gyur kyang rung / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen
446a4(rgyud): mar gyur kyang rung ste dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa tha/ mas cad la mchod pa dang / dbang bskur ba byed par 'a dadod pa des gzungs kyi snying po 'di'i bgrang phreng ngam/ cod pan
446a5(rgyud): nam/ dar dbyangs sam/ dbu rgyan la lan stong rtsa brgyad du yong su bzlas te de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu lo bcings na/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis mngon par dbang bskur
446a6(rgyud): te/ rig sngags 'chang de 'am/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen mas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po re re'i
446a7(rgyud): dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying
446a8(rgyud): po'i nor bu rin po che'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rin po che'i dbu rgyan 'od zer sna tshogs brgya stong phrag 'bar bas yang dag par rgyan pa'i dbu rgyan chen po dang / dar dbyangs kyis dbang bskur
446b1(rgyud): bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyuraro// de ltar rgya che zhing yangs pa
446b2(rgyud): che ba'i gzhal med khang 'di mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur ba nye bar gnas par 'gyuraro// gang gis dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dang
446b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la dbang bskur ba dang mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba chen por byas par 'gyur ro// snying po 'di bzlas pa tsam gyis rig sngags 'chang gi sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / 
446b4(rgyud): gdug pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ rnam par nyams par byed/ rnam par zhog par byed/ lus dang ngag dang / da yid yongasu dag par 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa dang / sgrib pa
446b5(rgyud): dang bral zhing nges par grol bar 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi phung po chen po sogs par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dngos grub chen po 'di mchog
446b6(rgyud): tu 'gyur ro// thams cad du thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// mchod pa dang gnyen bskur ba dang / tshig btsun par 'gyur ro// sdig pa thun tshags dang bral bar 'gyur ro// lus la dri bzang po 'byung
446b7(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// rtag tu de dran pas kha nas ud pa lI dr-i 'byin no// lus tsan dan gyi dris bgos par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad mchog tu byams pa dang / mchod pa'i 'o su 'gyur ro// thams
446b8(rgyud): cad du dngos grub chen po'i mchog tu 'gyu ro// bgegs dang log par 'dren pa thams cad rab tu 'dul bar 'gyur ro// 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za thams
447a1(rgyud): cad mthong ba tsam gyis ring du 'bros par 'gyur ro// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog gi sbyin par 'gyur ro// rtag
447a2(rgyud): tu yang mthong bar 'byung bar 'gyuraro// rig pa'i rgyal po yang rtag par rgyun tu rje su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// dus rgyun tu rtag tu mthong ba rje su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu rje su 'brang ba dang / dngos grub tu
447a3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// thams cad du dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon du mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du don yod pa'i dngos grub kyi mchog tu 'gyu re don yod pa pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang
447a4(rgyud): bskur ba'i gzungs so// // de nas don yod pa'i nor bu'i ma dachod pa'i sprin gyi nye bar spyod pa'i cho gar 'gyur te/ dran pa dang / bklags pa dang / bzlas pa tsam gyis gzhal med khang
447a5(rgyud): chen po rgya che ba yangs pa'i mthu stobs yangs pa 'byung bar 'a gyur ro// mthu stobs chen po'i yon tan 'byung zhing mtsho da pa'i sprin gyi char chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro// de bzhin
447a6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i sprin gyi char chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshogs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rig pa'i rgyal po 'di dran
447a7(rgyud): pa tsam dang bzlas pa tsam gyi mong la/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen por mchod pa'i sprin gyi char chen po 'bab par 'gru
447a8(rgyud): ro'adi lta ste/ pad+ma dang // ud pal dang / ku mu dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / mAn dA ra ba dang / mAn da rab chen po dang / mdog mdzes dang / mdog mdzes chen po dang / many+dzu Shaka dang / zla ba mdzes
447b1(rgyud): pa dang / dri ma med pa ste lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs kyi char 'byung bar 'gyu ro// 'di lta ste/ skams las skyes pa'i me tog/ sA la dang / ta mA la dang / tsam pa ka dang / mya ngan 'tshang dang / a ti muk+ta ka dang / 
447b2(rgyud): s+ya nar dang / mthon ka dang / mthon ka chen po dang / ka dam pa dang / dong ka dang / sin d+ha bA ri ka'i me tog dang / sna ma'i me tog dang / yU thi ka dang / mA li ka gsar pa dang / ta ra Na dang / ku pya ka dang / mu ru ba
447b3(rgyud): ka'i me tog gi char 'bab par 'gyu ro// lha rdzas sna tshogs pa rnams dang / ku mu de'i rigs rnams dang / gzugs dang / kha dog sna tshogs pa dang / ri dang chu dang / dgon gdung dang / thibs pa dang / chu
447b4(rgyud): rlabs dang / nags dang / nags 'dab dang / bskyed mos tshal dang da/ chu klung dang / lteng ka dang / rdzing bu dang / a sA hi ta dang // phug dang / dgon par 'bab pa'i sa las skyes pa'i me
447b5(rgyud): tog dang / dri ma med pa'i lha rdzas dang / lha rdzas kyi dri bzang da nga / yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs dang / kha dog dang / shin tu gzhon sha chags pa dang / rab tu sim par byed pa'i reg
447b6(rgyud): pa las skyes pa'i char 'bab par byed do// me tog chen po dang / me tog skyes pa rnams kyi phung po chen po btsal du bkram pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchod pa'i sprin du 'byung
447b7(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du dran pa dang bsams pa tsam gyis me tog gi mchod pa chen po byed do// 'di lta ste/ dran pa dang bsam pa tsam gyis gos dang rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par bkra ba'i
447b8(rgyud): mchod pa'i sprin chen po phyogs bcu kun tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod par 'byung bar 'gyuraro// 'di lta ste/ do shal dang / gdu bu rgyan can dang / dpung rgyan dang / rna rgyan dang / gse
448a1(rgyud): skud dang / mu tig gi dra ba dang / rked chings pa dang / nyis bskor dang / skar ma'i phreng ba dang / gtsug tor 'ching ba dang / zla ba phyed pa can dang / gser byed pa dang / gdu bu rgyan can
448a2(rgyud): zla ba phyed pa dang / shing shang te'u can dang / dbu rgyan dang / cod pan gyi dra ba dang / gser gyi dra ba dang / a bi ka dang / kaR+Sha pha la ka dang / pre tsa kaM dang / tAm+ba'i skud pa dang / mchod phyir thogs
448a3(rgyud): dang / kos+tha'i phreng ba dang / gser gyi phreng ba dang / rin po ches spras pa'i phreng ba dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi dril bu dang / rna ba gang ba dang / gtsug gtor 'ching ba dang / yongasu bkri ba dang / 
448a4(rgyud): gtsug gi nor bu'i char rab tu 'bab par 'gyu ro// de bzhin ga/ shegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i sprin du 'gyur ro// // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gas/ 
448a5(rgyud): ba rnams kyi mchod pa'i sprin chen por 'gyur ro// de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gsang ba rnams kyi mchod pa'i sprin chen por gyur nas/ rang rang gi gzhal med
448a6(rgyud): khang gi 'byor par rab tu 'gyur ro// char dang / tshon sna tshogasu bcos pa'i phyogs bral gyi gos sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa'i sprin du 'gyu ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
448a7(rgyud): thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams dang rjesu 'thun pa'i ri mo'i gos dang / ri mo'i gzhal med khang gi mchod pa'i sprin gyi char 'beb so// 'di lta
448a8(rgyud): ste/ yul ka shi ka'i gos tshon sna tshogasu btsos pa dang / gos kyi gzhal med khang dang / dar gos rnams kyi char 'beb so// 'di lta ste/ nyi ma'i 'od dang / zla ba dang / seng ge skyes dang / dar thod/ 
448b1(rgyud): dang ka shi dang / ko sa la ba'i ma'i dbang po dang / nyis dang / zla ba'i snang ba dang / pad+mo dang // rung pa la can gyi kha dog dang / ko dr-i kA dang / gser gyi gdu bu dang / mu tig gi 'bras bu dang / klu'i go
448b2(rgyud): dang / rnam par snang ba dang / lha'i rgyan dang / me tog snam dang / ko sha dang / tsam pi ka dang / kha dog can dang / dang thong can dang / gan+d+ha ri'i tshogs dang / zla ba'i rgyun can dang / dong ka'i me tog can
448b3(rgyud): dang / pad+ma dkar po can zhes bya ba dang / ba ma la ka dang / ko shA ta ki dang / rdzogs par 'phel bar byed pa can dang / sngon gyi yul dang gling dang ldan pa kun nas 'od gsal ba dang / gdu bu ring
448b4(rgyud): po dang / dga' ba 'khyil pa dang / rgyan bskor ba dang / sna ma'i me tog gi kha dog can dang / kan da'i mdab ma can dang / dak+Shi NA ki dang / kany+tsA nA sa'i kha dog can nam bskor ba
448b5(rgyud): dang / gser mdog dang / rin po che'i mdog dang zla ba'i kha dog gi lag pa dang / me'i kha dog can dang / bai DUr+ya'i kha dog can dang / na mkha'i kha dog
448b6(rgyud): can dang / ka nag ni shu ke dang / kun nas 'khyil zhing yid bde ba'i ba spu rnam par snang zhing rnam par gsal ba can dang / kun nas 'od gsal zhing dri ma med pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi cod pan/ 
448b7(rgyud): can yang ngo zhes so// gos rnam pa sna tshogs pa gzhal du med pa'i char 'bebs te/ bcom ldan 'das rnams gzhal du med pa'i mchod sprin dang bcas pa'i char 'beb so// de bzhin gshegs
448b8(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du gnas pa'i rig sngags kyi lha thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams dang / rdo rje 'chang dang / rig sngags 'chang gi dbang po
449a1(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba'i mchod pa'i sprin du 'gyu ro// de ltar rig sngags dran pa tsam gyis de bzhin du rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mchod par 'gyur ro// 
449a2(rgyud): dri sna tshogs pa'i chu gzhal du med pa dang / dri'i phye ma gzhal du med pa dang / bdug pa gzhal du med pa'i mchod par 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ tsan dan go shiR+Sha dang ta ma lI mdab ma dang / tsan dan dang / 
449a3(rgyud): tsan dan dmar po dang / pad+ma can dang / dri zhim pa dang / sa ra lam dang / gur gum dang / gos dang ldan pa dang / dri dang ldan pa dang / pu shel rtse dang / rgyas spos dang / tu ru ka dang / sprik+ka dang / bo la
449a4(rgyud): dang / sra rtsi pog dang / na me ru dang / shrI biSh+Ta ka dang / dog dang / sal+la ki dang / gu gul gyi bdug pa dang / hwags dang / sbrang rtsi dang / lnga bskor ba dang / ka dzo ka dang / bal+li ka'i
449a5(rgyud): shing dang / bal+li ka dang / ga pur dang / gla rtsi dang / rnam pa sna gas rnam par bkra ba'i bdug pa gzhan sbyar ba rnam sa dang / dri yi chu'i rnam pa rnams dang / rnam pasna tshog
449a6(rgyud): pas bsgos pa'i phye ma dang ldan pa 'byung bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod sprin gyi char 'beb so// sgren ma'i shing sna tshogs pa/ sbyar ba gzhal du med pas snang bar byed bzhin
449a7(rgyud): pa 'bar bar byed do// phyogs bcu rnamasu kun nas sgron ma'i shing gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dang mnyam pa'i sgron ma'i shing rab tu 'byung ngo // 'di lta ste tu ru ka'i ti
449a8(rgyud): mar dang tsam po ka'o to la mar dang / ud pa la'i til mar dang / sna ma'i til mor dngong / baR+Sha ka'i ti la mar dang / kon+ti'i til mar dang / a ti muka ka'i til mar dang / bal sha'i til mar
449b1(rgyud): dang tsan dan gyi til mar dang / dzA ti'i 'bras bu'i til mar dang / bal+lI'i til mar dang / a sho gan+d+ha la sogs pa'i til mar la sgron me rab tu byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod
449b2(rgyud): pa'i sprin tu 'gyu ro// 'di lta ste/ ro brgya pa'i kha zas rnams phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yul dang dusu nye bar bzhugs pa rnams kyi
449b3(rgyud): spyan sngar rab tu 'byung bar 'gyuraro// 'di lta ste/ ro bro ba'i mchog rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs dang / rnam pa dang / zhim zhing mngar ba myang bar 'os pa dga' bar bya ba yid dga' ba/ tse le dz+ha/ 
449b4(rgyud): dang tshim par 'os pa dang / dri'i rigs lha rdzas rnam pa sna/ tshogs pas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i bcom da ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs po 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas
449b5(rgyud): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang / rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha dang bcas pa rnams kun
449b6(rgyud): tu tshim par byed pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / ro bro ba'i mchog rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / sbrang rtsi mngar po'i ro myong ba dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi tshogs dang
449b7(rgyud): bcas pa'i spyan sngar rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad tshim par byed pa'i mchod pa'i sprin chen por 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sgra rnam
449b8(rgyud): pa sna tshogs pa/ dga' bar 'os pa'i rol mo'i pheg rdob pa rnams dang / 'di lta ste/ dbyangs kyi yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i mi 'am ci dang / dri za'i klu dbyangs rnam pa sna tshogs
450a1(rgyud): pa dang bcas pa dang / klu'i bu mo dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo dang / lha'i bu mo dang / chu las byung ba'i bu mo rnams kyis rnam pa tha dad pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gsang sngags kyi glu
450a2(rgyud): dbyangs kyi rol mo'i sgra rab tu 'khrol bzhin pa rnams kyis phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams thams cad kyis dus gsum pa'i rol mo chen po'i mchod pa'i sprin du 'gyur ro// rnam
450a3(rgyud): pa sna tshogs par mdzes pa'i bstod pa'i rnam pas rol mo'i cho ga zhib mo ji lta ba bzhin du gsang ba'i phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gyi rim par phye ba dang / rje su 'thun pas yang dag par bstod
450a4(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa da'i rig sngags kyi lha dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lhas rje su'adzin par 'gyur ro// yang dag par bstod pa rnams kyang
450a5(rgyud): mtshan smos pas yang dag par bstod pa byas par 'gyur/ ro// de bzhin du yangs pa dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsungs pa/ mchog
450a6(rgyud): thams cad du mchod pa'i sprin du gyur pa/ bla na med pa dpag bsam gyi shing lta bu'o// sna tshogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rlob pa'i rnam par
450a7(rgyud): 'phrul pas rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi rmad du byung ba'i mchog gi dngos grub ster bar byed pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi ma dang phar 'gyuro// sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yang
450a8(rgyud): dag par gyur pa'o// gsang sngags 'dzin pa thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub dang bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi sdig pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / sgrib pa
450b1(rgyud): thams cad yongasu sbyong bar byed pa'o// nad thams cad sel bar byed pa'o// sdug bsngal mi zad pa gdug pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa'o// bkra shis pa dang / yid kyi shing rta thams cad yongasu rdzogs
450b2(rgyud): par byed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yang dag par bskul bar byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbugs 'byin par byed pa'o// rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha/ 
450b3(rgyud): thams cad spyan 'dren par byed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang po'i dkyil 'khor rnams ston par byed pa'o// klu thams cad 'grogs por byed pa'o// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 
450b4(rgyud): 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / bgegs dang / logad par 'dren pa thams cad ldog par byed pa'o// sems cadan thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub sbyin par byed pa'o// / 
450b5(rgyud): dbugs ma phyin pa rnams kyi dbugs 'byin par byed pa'o// ma grol ba rnams grol bar byed pa'o// skyabs med pa rnams kyi skyabaso dpung gnyen med pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen
450b6(rgyud): mgon med pa rnams kyi mgon du gyur pa'o// 'khras med pa rnams kyis 'khra sa'o// bsnyen gnas ma byas pa rnams la bsnyen gnas sbyin pa'o// gtsang sbra ma byas pa rnams la gtsang sbrar spyod pa'o// 
450b7(rgyud): mi tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas la zhen pa rnams la tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas sbyin pa'o// thub pa'i brtul zhugs ma byas pa rnams la thub pa'i brtul zhugs sbyin pa'o// chos ma yin pa la
450b8(rgyud): spyod pa rnams chos la sbyor ba'o// mi dge ba'i las kyi lam la spyod pa rnams dag ba'i chos la sbyor ba'o// 'jigs pas nyams thag pa rnams la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'o// dngul po rnams la
451a1(rgyud): nor sbyin pa'o// bru dang bza' ba dang bral ba rnams la 'bru 'phel ba chen po sbyin pa'o// mugs nyams zag pa rnams la sa rgyal gyis tshogs pa la nges par sbyong bar byed pa'o// 4
451a2(rgyud): nyams pa rnams kyi lam ston par byed pa'o// dus ma yin par 'chi bar 'gyur ba rnams kyi dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba so sor 'gog pa'o// long ba rnams kyi mig sbyin par byed pa'o// 'on pa rnams na
451a3(rgyud): basbyin par byed pa'o// sna nyams pa rnams kyi sna rnam par sbyong bar byed pa'o// reg pa med pa rnams kyi bde ba'i reg pa la nges par sbyor bar byed pa'o// long spyod kyi nyams thag pa rnams kyi long
451a4(rgyud): spyod sbyin par byed pa'i// dran pa nyams pa rnams kyi dran pa yongasu sbyong bar byed pa'o// bsam pa nyams pa rnamasadakyi bsam pa yongasu dag par byed pa'o// tshul khrims nyams
451a5(rgyud): po rnams kyi tshul khrims sbyin pa'o// sbyin pa las rgyab kyi phyogs pa rnams la pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdza gas par byed pa'o// brtson 'grus nyams pa rnams la stobs
451a6(rgyud): dang brtson 'grus kyi mchog sbyin pa'o// bzod pa dang bral ba rnams la bzod pa dang zhi ba sbyin pa'o// bsam gtan nyams pa rnams la bsam gtan dang ting 'dzin ni yongasu rdzogs par
451a7(rgyud): byed pa'o// shes rab nyams pa rnams la shes rab kun tu snang ba dang / blo gsal ba dang / shes rab chen po'i snang ba yongasu rdzogs par byed do// dam tshig mi shes pa rnams la dam tshigs sbyin
451a8(rgyud): po'o// phyag rgya dang bral ba rnams kyi phyag rgya yongasu sbyor bar byed pa'o// rig sngags dang / gsang sngags la mi mkhas pa rnams la/ rig sngags dang / gsang sngags rab tu sbyin pa'o// mu stegs
451b1(rgyud): nams la/ mu stegs smra ba dang / 'jug ngogs bzang po dang lam rab tu sgrub par byed pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las rgyab kyi phyogs pa rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub chen po'i mchog ste/ 
451b2(rgyud): pa'o// 'khor ba las mi bsgral ba rnams sgrol bar byed pa'o// mun pos long bar byed cing bsgribs po rnams la/ myos po'i mun pa sel ba sbyin par byed pa'o// sgrib par bya ba rnams kyi slob
451b3(rgyud): pa dang bral bar byed pa'o// mtshams med pa lnga'i 'gro ba rnams kyis mtshams med pa lnga sbyong bar byed pa'o// ngag nyams pa rnams kyi ngag rnam par dag par byed pa'o// ma grub pa rnams la
451b4(rgyud): mchog gi dngos grub sbyin pa'o// thun tshags dang bcas pa rnams kyi thun tshags dang bral zhing yongasu dag par byed/ dpa'o// ngan pa rnams la mchog sbyin pa'o// mya ngan las ma 'das
451b5(rgyud): pa rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchog go// brda mi phra/ dpa rnams la brda' sprod par byed pa'o// kun nas 'khru gas pa rnams kyi sems gnas pa'i mchog go// mchog
451b6(rgyud): med pa rnams la mchog sbyin pa'o// rmi lam ngan pa mthong ba rnams la rmi lam chen po'i mchog ston pa'o// bkres pa rnams la kha zas kyi mchog sbyin pa'o// skom pa rnams btung ba chen
451b7(rgyud): po'i ro la yongasu long spyod par byed pa'o// gcer bu rnams kyis gos dang bsgo ba so sor thob cing grub pa'o// mdze can rnams kyi 'dze dang bral bar byed pa'o// sha bkra can rnams kyi sha bA/ 
451b8(rgyud): yongasu spong bar byed pa'o// rims kyis btab pa rnams kyi rims dang / bral bar byed pa'o// gdon gyis zin pa rnams kyi gdon dang gshed byed dang / gdul dka' ba rnams 'dul bar byed
452a1(rgyud): nga'o// dgra bo phyin ci log pa rnams kyi dgra rnams dang bral bar byed pa'o// dbul po rnams la nor sbyin par 'gyuraro// bu bza' can rnams kyi bu gza' cher 'phel bar 'gyur ro// mun pa
452a2(rgyud): longs par byas pa thams cad kyi sgron ma'i shing dang / nyi ma'i 'od zer stong gis kun tu snang ba'o// rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das rnams la long spyod rgya chen po cher byin pa'o// 'khon pa rnams cigatu
452a3(rgyud): byed pa'o// ser sna can rnams kyi ser sna shin tu 'joms pa'o// 'dod chags la chags pa rnams kyi 'dod chags rab tu 'joms pa'o// rmongs pa chung ba ma yin pa rnams kyi rmongs pa
452a4(rgyud): dang bral bar 'gyur ro// mi dge ba'i lam gyis rab tu nyams pa rnams kyis dge ba'i lam gyi yid chos kyi nang du chud par 'gyuraro// gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa'i sems can
452a5(rgyud): rnams kyi 'jigs pa med par 'gyur zhing yid chos kyi nang / du chud par 'gyur ro// log par ltung ba rnams kyis shes rab dang / blo dang / shes bzhin dang / brkam pa rnams
452a6(rgyud): kyi blo bsnyen par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas ma mthong ba rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'dod par 'gyuraro// chos thos pa dang bral ba rnams kyi/ chos chen po'i ro rgya chen po thos
452a7(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang bral ba rnams kyis lha dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyuraro// dbang po nyams pa rnams kyi/ dbang po yongs su
452a8(rgyud): rdzogs par 'gyuro// yan lag rnam par nyams pa'i sems can rnams kyi so so'i yan lag yong su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang bral ba rnams kyi byang chub sems na
452b1(rgyud): tshegs chen po mthong bar 'gyur ro// lhas yongasu spangs pa rnams kyi lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa dang sgrib pas dkris pa'i sems can rnams kyi nyon
452b2(rgyud): mongs pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad las yongasu grol bar 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rje don yod pa'i mchod pa'i nor bu'i snying po'i gzungs spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsungs pa ni de ltar rdzu 'phrul
452b3(rgyud): che ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i sprin/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mchod pa'i sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod pa'i sprin gyi char 'bebs
452b4(rgyud): pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / mtshungs par dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhug/ rnas pa rnams kyi dpag bsam gyi shing chen po'i mchod pa
452b5(rgyud): sprin gyi char 'bebs par byed pa'i sprin 'byung bar 'gyu ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshi ga rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid sgrub par
452b6(rgyud): byed pa/ rmad du byung ba'i dngos grub yang dag par ston par byed pa'o// rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad dang / rig pa'i rgyal po'i lha rnams dang / gsang sngags kyi lha thams
452b7(rgyud): cad spyan 'dren zhing 'gugs par byed pa'o// 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// 'di ni thams cad du gsang ba'i sgo ston par byed pa'o// lag na rdo rje don yod pa'i mchod pa'i snying po'i
452b8(rgyud): gzungs 'di ni dus ma yin pa'i char dang / mu ge dang / dus kyi chu rnam par nyams pa la so sor bskyed pa'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas khrus byas gos gtsang ba bsgos te/ yid rtse gcig
453a1(rgyud): tu byas na sems can thams cad la mchog tu brtse ba dang byams pa'i sems bsgom par bya'o// mchod rten gyi yan lag dang nye ba 'am/ khang stong ngam/ ri bo 'am/ nags thibs po dang / 
453a2(rgyud): dgon pa dang / bskyed mos tshal lam/ dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba 'am/ chu klung ngam/ 'tshe'u 'am/ rdzing bu 'am/ klu gnas pa'i mtsho 'am/ lha'i gnas sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang yang rung ste/ der rig sngag
453a3(rgyud): 'chang gtsang mar gnas pas sa gzhi yongasu brtags pa cha mnyam pa mdzes par khru gnyis kyi tshad kyi dkyil 'khor byas las dang ba byung du ldan pas/ gru bzhi par cha gzhal ste/ legs par byi der/ 
453a4(rgyud): byas la shin tu 'jam par bya'o// der de'i steng du tsan+dan dang / dri'i da chus byug par bya'o// gur gum gyis rnam pa sna tshogs dpa'i mtshan ma dang phyag rgya rnams ri mor 'bri'o// de la dkyil
453a5(rgyud): 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying po/ klu mgo bo dgu pa skyil mo krung gis 'dug pa bri'o// gro bzhi'i nang du chud par don yod zhags pa bri'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi khor yug tu ji ltar thob
453a6(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rnams bri bar bya'o// bsgo bzhi rnam par dbye bar bya ste/ ji ltar 'byor pa'i gtor ma sna tshogs pa'i ro'i gtor ma dkar po dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / mar
453a7(rgyud): ma dang / gang ba'i bum dang / gtor ma dang / bdug pa'i pog phor gyis nye bar mdzes par bya'o// rig sngags 'chang gis ches mngon du/ don yod zhags pa lan bdun bzlas par bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal
453a8(rgyud): po la lan cig bzlas pas mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o// don yod pa'i lcag skya dang / khro bo lcag skye dus cig tu brjod do// rig sngags kyi rgyal po lan gsum du brjod par bya'o// de nas rig sngags
453b1(rgyud): 'chang gis dkyil 'khor la mngon tu phyogs te bzlas pa'i cho ga bya'o// don yod pa'i mchod pa nor bu'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas brjod bya'o// nA ga ge sar dang / na la di na dang / rgya spos dang / 
453b2(rgyud): gur gum dang / tsan dan dang / yungs kar dang / li khar mnyam par sbyar ba'i 'dug pa la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bya ste/ klu'i dkyil 'khor du bdug pa dbul bar bya'o// klu'i lte ba'i steng du bdug spos
453b3(rgyud): kyi spog phor gang ba bzhag par bya ste/ lan stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa'i mod nyid la/ klu'i zhags pa chen po las char gyi rgyun chen po 'byin ste ji srid 'dod pa'i bar du char 'beb so// klu'i rgyal po'i ming
453b4(rgyud): nas gzung te bzlas par bya'o// klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / dag da' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / nor rgyas kyi bu dang / 'jogapo dang / hu lu dang / u lam bu la dang / chu lha dang / yid ldan
453b5(rgyud): dang / e la'i mdab ma dang / klu'i rgyal po kun nas 'khor ba'i gdugs te/ klu'i rgyal po rnams las cig smos par bya ste/ klu'i rgyal po de rnams kyi bden par dam bcas pas
453b6(rgyud): rnam par gzhag pa'i mo nyid la char gyi rgyun 'byin par byed de ji srid 'dod kyi bar du kun nas sbyor bas char stong phrag 'beb so// yang na yungs kar la stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas pas/ klu'i rgyal po'i snying
453b7(rgyud): kha'i steng du sbyin bsreg bya'o// sbyin sreg byas pa tsam gyis mod la 'phral nyid du stong phrag du mor a bi rA ye char gyi rgyun 'byin par byed do// sngar mo gang gis nyin mtshan gcig tu rgyun mi 'chad par
453b8(rgyud): char 'beb so// spar mo gsum gyis nyin mtshan gsum du 'beb so// spar mo bdun gyis nyin mtshan bdun du char gyi rgyun chen po klu'i rgyal pos 'byin par byed do// yang dag pa kho nar char gyi
454a1(rgyud): rgyun ltung ngo // yang na klu'i ras ris bya ste/ khru gang gi tshad la kun nas gru bzhi pa'i tshad kyi ras la ri mor bya'o// de'i dbus rig pa'i rgyal po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bri
454a2(rgyud): bar bya ste/ skyil mo krung gis 'dug pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ ral gri dang / rtse gsum dang / zhags pa dang / pad+ma thogs par bya'o// zhal khro gnyer can rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ ral pa'i
454a3(rgyud): cod pon gyis smad pa/ 'od dpag med kyi cod pan ral pa zla phred pas nye bar mdzes pa/ 'od mdom gang pas yang dag par brgyan pa/ chu dang bcas pa'i pad+ma'i gdan pa'o// klu'i rgyal po de dag
454a4(rgyud): dbus mo g.yas dang g.yon pa gtsugs pa bya'o// klu'i gdengs ka dang bcas pa/ thal mo 'chang bas skyabasu 'gro de bar bya'o// de nas rig sngags des ras ris de la mngon du
454a5(rgyud): phyogs de smra ba bcad nas don yod pa'i mchod pa'i nor/ bu'i snying po gzungs stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya ste/ yungs kar la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas klu'i rgyal po
454a6(rgyud): rgya mtsho la bsnun par bya'o// stong rtsa brgyad rdzogs pa dang / char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par byed do// gal te lo stong du char mi 'bab par 'gyur ba las 'phral nyid du lhas char 'bebs par byed
454a7(rgyud): bar the tsom med do// rlung dang / sad dang / ser ba'i dus su de'i ras ris khang pa'i steng du bzhag ste/ rlung dang sad dang ser ba thams cad phyir zhing mi 'byung ngo // phyogs gang du ras ris rnam par lta
454a8(rgyud): bar byed pa de'i phyogs kyi gnas su// rlung dang / sad dang / ser ba mi 'bab te/ ri 'am dgon gdung 'khrigs par yang mi 'bab bo// yang na rig sngags 'chang gis ras ris de bzung nas/ 
454b1(rgyud): klu'i gnas kyi mtshor song nas/ gnas kyi mtsho der bzhag par bya'o// don yod zhags pa'i mchod pa'i nor bu'i snying po'i gzungs stong rtsa brgyad du chu la bzlas te gnas pa'i mtshe ru 'phang bar byan/ 
454b2(rgyud): 'phangs pa tsam gyi mod la/ gnas der gnas pa'i klu khye'u'i gzugs kyis lus phyed gnas de nas mthong te ras ris de la phyag 'tshal bar byed do// rig sngags 'chang ba la smras pa/ rig sngags/ 
454b3(rgyud): 'chang gi bka' bsgo ba ci yin pa bdag gis bgyi'o zhes so// rig sngags 'chang gis smra bar bya ste/ klu chen po 'dzam bu'i gling kun tu lta bar gyis shig/ khye'u de yang phyogs bzhi kun tu rnam par lta ba
454b4(rgyud): byed do// ji lta ji ltar mtshan ma mthong ba de lta de ltar rig snga gas 'chang la mtshan ma smra bar 'gyur te/ legs pa/ dar byas pa'am/ nyes par byas pade thams cad smra bar byed do// 
454b5(rgyud): / de nas rig sngags 'chang gis brjod par bya ste/ klu chen po char phob la tshim par gyis shig 'dzam bu gling ba'i rtsi dang nags kyi bdag po dang / ri dang tshang tshing dang dgon pa dang
454b6(rgyud): zhing dang kun dga' ra ba rnams thams cad du/ char gyi rgyun 'byin par gyis shig/ lha'i chus kun nas char phob cig/ sems can thams cad kyi lha'i chu'i char gyi rgyun chen po phob cig/ klu'i khye'u
454b7(rgyud): la smras pa/ kye bcud len mchog tu gya nom pa'i rig sngags kyi gzhi byin cig ces/ rig sngags 'chang gis brjod par bya'o// klu'i khye'u bdud rtsi bcud kyi len gyi mchog zung cig zhes so// 
454b8(rgyud): de nas klu'i khye'u de rig sngags 'chang la mngon du phyogs de thal mo sbyar nas nye bar 'dug go// rig sngags 'chang gis klu chen po nyon cig ces brjod par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'a
455a1(rgyud): gis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bstan par bya/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgya
455a2(rgyud): pa bstan par bya'o// don yod zhags pa'i mdo yang bstan par bya'o// gang gi tshe rig sngags 'chang de lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos ston bzhin pa na/ klu'i lus la bdug pa 'khrigs pa
455a3(rgyud): sprin chen po nges par 'thon te/ nam mkha'i dkyil du g.yog par byed cing gnas so// chos ston pa'i skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la/ char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par byed de/ sa'i mtsho der char/ 
455a4(rgyud): pa 'bab pa ma yin no// rig sngags 'chang dang / ras ris kyi steng du/ klu'i khye'u de ras ris de la mchod pa byed de/ rig sngags 'chang de la yon dang bcas pas chos la
455a5(rgyud): mchod pa 'bul bar byed de/ rig sngags 'chang gis smras pa/ rig sngags 'chang gi sar khyod zhugs shig/ de rnams 'di skad ces/ rig sngags 'chang rang gi khyim
455a6(rgyud): gyis mchog go// rig sngags 'chang gis smra bar bya ste/ gal te dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'khor dang bcas pa/ yang dag par len par byed na/ de'i tshe nga khyod kyi gnas mchog tu 'jug par
455a7(rgyud): bya'o// gal te mi byed na 'jug par mi bya'o zhes so// de nas khye'u gal te byed na/ dge ba ston pa mthong ba de'i tshe rang gi gzugs kyi gnas par byed de/ lha rdzas kyi rna rgyan dri ma med pa g.yo ba
455a8(rgyud): sgra'i cod pan 'chang brgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa'o// gal to ma byed na khye'u de'i gzugs mi snang bar 'gyur te/ slar yang mi mthong ngo // yang na rdzu 'phrul chen po can gyi klu'i rgyal
455b1(rgyud): po mthong bar 'dod pa'i rig sngags 'chang des/ zangs kyi mngab ma la don yod 'i mchod pa'i nor bu'i snying po'i gzungs de'i steng du bri bar bya ste sbrang rtsis byug par bya'o// yungs kar la lan
455b2(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad du yongasu bzlas te gtor bar bya ste gnas pa'i mtsho der 'phang bar bya'o// gu gul zho gcig tshad kyis mchod nas bdug pa sbyin par bya'o// ji srid du gu gul phyed kyi cha shas kyi/ 
455b3(rgyud): lhag ma las kyi bar du bsreg par bya'o// skad cig yud tsam thang cig de la klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho bram ze'i gzugs kyis klu'i mtshor nye bar 'dug ste/ rig sngags 'tshang la shis pa brjod pa/ 
455b4(rgyud): byed do// rig sngags 'chang gis kyang // nang med par gyuradag ces brjod par bya'o// kye chos kyi don gyi tshig nyon cig/ chos dang 'jig rten mang po yang skyongs shig ces so// 
455b5(rgyud): bram ze de yang dga' ste/ rig sngags 'chang ci 'dod pa'i nga na gang yin pa'i don de smos shig dang / thams cad ste bar 'gyuraro// zhes brjod par bye'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs
455b6(rgyud): nga chen po bdun dang byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdun dang / nyan thos chen po bzhi'i mtshan nas smos par bya'o// de nas bram ze de rnam pa de lta bu'i tshig gi sgra zos nas/ yid rab tu dga' ste/ 
455b7(rgyud): snying mgu ba chen por gyur nas rig sngags 'chang la leg so zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod par bya'o// legaso legs zhes sgra 'byin par byed do// mtshan shin tu bsngags pa gang yin pa de/ khyod kyi
455b8(rgyud): yongasu 'dzin pa dang / legs par yongasu grags pa'i shin tu mnyan par 'os pa mchog tu brnyed par dka' ba ste/ mtshan khyod kyi yongasu bsgrags pa mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba nyid rig sngag
456a1(rgyud): 'chang gang gis/ 'di lta ste/ sems can de rin po che don yod pa chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i mtshan 'dzin par byed pa sems can rnams kyi mchog thos par byed do// zhes so// de
456a2(rgyud): nas bram ze de bram ze'i gzugs kyi cha byad de mi snang bar byas nas/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gzugs kyi cha byad dang / rtags kyis ji lta ba bzhin du/ rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du 'dug te smra bar yang
456a3(rgyud): byed do// rig sngags 'chang mchog ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa smos shig de thams cad rjesu brtsal bar bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gi ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i mchog thams cad brjod
456a4(rgyud): pade ster bar 'gyur ro// yang na mchog tu 'jug par byed do// klu rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du gyur/ nas nye bar gnas so// las thams cad dka' bsgo bcam
456a5(rgyud): gyis byed par 'gyur te/ 'di la dogs pa dang / yid gnyis bskya dpar mi bya'o// sbyar ba tsam gyi mo la bya ba 'di rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ de nas ras ris blangs te/ 
456a6(rgyud): rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags par byas nas/ zhing dang kun dga' ra ba thams cad la g.yas phyogasu bskor bar bya ste/ rlung dang / tshad pa dang / sang dang / ser ba dang / sbrang bu dang / sbrang bu maH
456a7(rgyud): rings dang / chag pa dang / byi ba dang / ne la dang / khyi dang / lce spyang dang / grog sbyar dang / sbrul go Na sa dang / sdig pa dang / sbrang bu tre ma bug dang / sbrang bu tri la Ta dang / sbrul bdug pa dang / dug gi 'jig
456a8(rgyud): pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ 'phral nyid du yongasu grol bar 'gyuraro// lo theg dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams legs par yongasu smin par 'gyuraro// ro bzang ba dang / legs par smin par 'gyuraro// 
456b1(rgyud): don yod pa'i nor mchod pa'i snying po'i char 'bebs pa'i cho ga'o// de nas 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / 'brog dgon pa'i 'jigs pa rab tu zhi bar 'dod pa'i
456b2(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang des rig pa'i rgyal po 'ba' zhig ras la bri bar bya ste/ dpal lha mo'i gzugs dang / kha dog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs dang / rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ 'od dpag med
456b3(rgyud): kyi cod pan 'chang ba'i rgyal po chen po bzhi bri bar bya'o// tshon sna tshogs pa rnam par dkra ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi mchog gdags par bya'o// klu'i rgyal po'i pho brang du 'jug par bya'o// don yod pa'i
456b4(rgyud): zhags pa'i nor bu'i snying po'i gzungs 'di brjod par bya zhing 'ju dag par bya ste/ dang por rgyal mtshan gyi mchog mthong ba tsa dam gyi mod la bud med dang skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thad
456b5(rgyud): kyi nad thams cad dang / 'jigs pa thams cad dang / sgrib pa thams cad dang / sdig pa thams cad dang / nad thams cad yongasu gro lo// nyes pa byas pa dang / sdig pa thams cad yongasu gro'o// dug
456b6(rgyud): dang bang snyems dang / phye ma'i sbyor ba'i dug dang / dug gi 'jigs pa thams cad yongasu gro'o// dgra'i 'jigs pa thams cad yongasu gro'o// sdig pa thams cad yongasu gro'o// rgyal mtshan gyi mchog la btags pa/ 
456b7(rgyud): mthong nas mthong ba tsam gyi maung kho na la/ sngon gyi sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga'i 'gro ba rnams las/ yongasu grol bar 'gyur te/ 'di la the tsom dang / yid gnyis skyed par mi bya'o// dang por
456b8(rgyud): grong khyer gyi rgyal po'i pho brang du rgyal mtshan gyi mchog 'di zhugs pa tsam gyi mod la mings dang / mu ge dang yams kyi nad dang / 'brog dgon pa'i nye bar 'tshe ba dang / 'go ba'i nod dang / 'khrug pa thad dang / 
457a1(rgyud): gdon dang / 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / grib gnon dang / brjed byed thams cad dang / log par 'dren pa'i 'jigs pa mi bzad pa thams cad
457a2(rgyud): rab tu zhi bar byed/ sa pa dang / thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do// pha rol gyi dmag tshegs dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dgra'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do// 
457a3(rgyud): chom rkun dang / g.yon can dang / rkun mo'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do// rmi lam ngan pa dang / mtshan ma ngan pa bkra mi shis pa'i dngos po thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do// yul
457a4(rgyud): dang grong dang / dgon pa pa dang / nags tshang tshing dang / grong khyer dang / rgyal po'i pho brang rnams thams cad du yang / bde ba byed par 'gyuraro// lo legs pa dang / dga' bar 'os pa dang / 
457a5(rgyud): sems can thams cad nye bar 'tshe ba med pa dang / nad med par/ 'gyur ro// sems can de rnams thams cad du yang // phan tshun du dga' ba dang / rab tu mgu ba chen pos phan tshun
457a6(rgyud): byams pa'i semasu 'gyu ro// don yod pa'i mchod pa'i nor bu'i snying bu'i gzungs 'di/ yid rtse gcig pas tshes bco lnga'i nya la nyin mtshan theg thag tu spang bar gnas pas gtsang ma gos gca
457a7(rgyud): ma bgo bar bya'o// ba byung lnga'i nye reg gis gtsang sbra dang / khrus dang / dri'i chu tsam gyis rje su 'thun pa'i byug pa byas te/ skyil mo krung du 'dug nas rig pa'i rgyal po la mngon du phyogs nas bzlas
457a8(rgyud): brjod bya'o// mtshan thog thag tu mchod pa chen po rgyun mi 'chad par bsgrub par bya'o// dri'i til mar gyi me dbul bar bya zhing / bgrang phreng dpag tu med pa byas pa'i bzlas brjod dbul bar bya'o// 
457b1(rgyud): lan re re bzlas pas lan brgya stong phrag yongasu bzlas par 'gyu ro// ji srid du rig pa'i rgyal po'i bris sku 'bar bar byed de/ 'di lta ste/ 'od zer sna tshogs pa 'byin par byed do// rig sngags 'chang / 
457b2(rgyud): bar byed cing / spyi bo'i gtsug nas 'bar bar byed do// nam mkha' nas rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis bzlas brjod kyi cho ga mchog tu byas pa legaso leg so zhes sgra 'byin par byed do// 'di ni rig
457b3(rgyud): sngags 'chang rnams kyi mchog gi bzlas pa'i cho ga ste/ khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas par grub bo// 
457b4(rgyud): khyod kyis don yod pa'i mchod pa'i nor bu'i snying po'i gzungs kyi dngos grub kyang gru'o// khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa/  thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par
457b5(rgyud): phye ba dang / thun mong gi snying po dang gzungs smras pas/ rig pa la dzin pa'i mchog de thams cad rje su 'thun par stsol ba ra 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ gsang sngags kyi dngos grub bam/ 
457b6(rgyud): gzungs kyi dngos grub bam/ cho ga zhib mo'i dngos grub bam/ rigs thun mong pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub bam/ phyag rgya'i dam tshig gi dngos grub pam// nam mkha' la
457b7(rgyud): 'gro ba 'am/ mi snang ba'am/ gzugs sna tshogasu bsgyur ba 'am/ mig 'phrul lam/ rdzu 'phrul ston pa 'am/ klu'i gzhal med khang ngam/ lha'i gzhal med khang ngam// gnod sbyin gyi gzhal med khang
457b8(rgyud): ngam/ dri za'i gzhal med khang ngam/ lha ma yin gyi gzhal med khang ngam// na mkha' lding gi gzhal med khang ngam/ mi 'am ci'i gzhal med khang ngam// lto 'phye chen po'i gzhal med khang ngam/ nyi ma'i gzhal
458a1(rgyud): med khang ngam/ zla ba'i gzhal med khang ngam/ skar ma'i tshogs kyi gzhal med khang ngam/ rgyu skar gyi gzhal med khang ngam/ srin po'i gzhal med khang ngam/ 'dod pa'i gzugs kyi gzhal
458a2(rgyud): med khang rung ste de thams cad rje su 'dzin// 'di ni khyod kyis bya ba thams cad bklags pas 'grub cing bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyu ro// kye rig sngags 'chang bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa de rnams rjesu
458a3(rgyud): 'dzin no// 'di lta ste/ nor sgyur bar smra ba dang / zhing smra ba dang / nor bu smra ba dang / zhags pa'i dngos grub dang / mig sman sgrub pa dang / theg le sgrub pa dang / dbang phyug dang / blon pa dang / bkrabs pa dang / 
458a4(rgyud): mdun na 'don nyid dang / stobs che ba nyid dang / longs spyod la dmigs pa dang / yul gyi bdag po nyid dang / dbang phyug dang / nor 'phel ba dang / gter g.yo ba dang / nyo tshong gi
458a5(rgyud): grogs byed pa dang / 'gugs pa dang / khung du 'jug pa dang / ri la 'jug pa dang / nag su 'jug pa dang / me la'/ jug pa dang / sa 'og tu 'jug pa dang / klu'i char 'bebs pa dang / 
458a6(rgyud): char gyi rgyun dang / sar ba'i rgyun dang / ser ba 'bebs pa dang / grong lta ba dang / g.yul du 'jug pa dang / rig sngags 'chang nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong ba nyid dang / ldong ros kyi mig
458a7(rgyud): sman sgrub pa dang / ral gri sgrub pa dang / rdo rje sgrub pa dang / rtse gsum sgrub pa dang / 'khor lo sgrub pa dang / dung sgrub pa dang / btun shing sgrub pa dang / dgra sta sgrub pa dang / mda' bo che sgrub pa dang / 
458a8(rgyud): zo ba sgrub pa dang / dril bu sgrub pa dang / rdzas sgrub pa dang / sman sgrub pa dang / bcud kyi len sgrub pa dang / ro langs slong bar byed pa dang / rang gi gnas 'bebs pa dang / gos 'bebs pa dang / rims
458b1(rgyud): 'bebs pa dang / shi ba slong bar byed pa dang / gdon thams cad 'bebs pa dang / thod pa 'bebs pa dang / bum pa 'bebs pa dang / bum bu 'bebs pa dang / lteng ka 'bebs pa dang / dril bu 'bebs pa dang
458b2(rgyud): tho ba 'bebs pa dang / ral gri 'bebs pa dang / me longs 'bebs pa dang / pad+ma 'bebs pa dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo 'bebs pa dang / mdzes par byed pa dang / gar byed pa de rnams
458b3(rgyud): thams cad bklags pas grub pa dang bzlas pas 'grub pas rig sngags 'chang rje su 'dzin te/ don mtha' yas shing don mtha' yas pa de rnams thams cad grub pa'i ched du gyis shig ces// 
458b4(rgyud): dgos pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed de rig sngags 'a chang khyod dge ba 'grub cing rig pa ste/ rig sngags 'chang grub pa khyod kyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das
458b5(rgyud): pa'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang khyod shi 'phos nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu 'gro'o// dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis khyod
458b6(rgyud): phyir mi ldog par lung bstan no// 'di ni skye ba tha ma ste/ mngal gyi dri mas ma gos par pad+ma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyuraro// skye ba'i skye ba dran par yang 'gyuraro// khyod dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la
458b7(rgyud): mngon par phyogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / gzungs kyi rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo la/ ji srid byang chub
458b8(rgyud): la mthar thug pa'i bar du mngon du phyogs par 'gyuro// de bzhin du sgra yis lung ston par byed pa smras nas mi snang bar 'gyuro// de nas rig pa'i rgyal po'i ras ris de'i smin ma'i bar nas 'od
459a1(rgyud): zer kha dog sna tshogs pa rnam par bkra zhing bkra ba 'byin par byed de/ de ma thag tu kun nas snang bar byed do// kun nas snang bar byas nas kyang / rig sngags 'chang gi lus la ba
459a2(rgyud): ste mi snang bar 'gyur ro// mi snang bar gyur pa'i de ma thag tu/ rig sngags 'chang des ting 'dzin stong phrag brgya thob par 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ pir mi ldog pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par snang bar
459a3(rgyud): byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas sgo'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa rnam par 'phrul
459a4(rgyud): pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa mchod pa'i nor bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa'i nor bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'ad dzin dang / dngos grub gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 
459a5(rgyud): kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dkyil 'khor gsang ba 'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa'i gzungs kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / 
459a6(rgyud): kun tu gzigs pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dus kyi rjesu 'brang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / pad+ma mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / pad+ma rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
459a7(rgyud): dang zhags pa rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtag par khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal ba'i 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyu skar kun tu gzigs pa zhes pa
459a8(rgyud): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dngos grub kyi 'od zer dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas nor bu'i gzi brjid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang phyug gi mthu stobs dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting
459b1(rgyud): nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer kun nas snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / blo yang dag par dzin pa zhes bya 'i ti 'dzin dang / gsal bar khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya kun tu gzigs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
459b2(rgyud): dang / phyag rgya kun tu gzigs pa'i pad+ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtag par char 'bebs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dngos grub yangs pa zhes bya
459b3(rgyud): ba'i ting 'dzin dang / me tog ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas kun tu rnam par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lce'i
459b4(rgyud): mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge rnam/ par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chu yongasu spyod da ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang // gzi brjid dang ldan pa zhes bya
459b5(rgyud): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yangs par byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba 'i ting nge 'dzin dang / blo 'gugs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i/ ting nge 'dzin dang / me tog mngon par bkram pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
459b6(rgyud): 'dzin dang / rnam par 'phrul pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs rnam par dag cing dri ma med po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzi brjid yan lag ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / thams
