459b7(rgyud): cad yongasu dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob bo// mdor bsdu na ting nge 'dzin 'di rnams bklags pa tsam dang bzlas pa tsam gyis 'jig rten pa'i sgrub pa'i dngos grub so sor thob bo// gang zhig bzlas
459b8(rgyud): pa tsam gyis// 'jig rten pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gsang sngags dang rnam par 'phrul pa rnams so sor thob bo// ting nge 'dzin gzhan de rnams ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i dngos grub so sor thob bo// 
460a1(rgyud): lag na rdo rje 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ting nge 'dzin gzhan yang bklags pas grub pa dang / bzlas pa tsam las so sor thob bo// gang gis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub
460a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang ba rim par phye ba dang / dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs thun mongs par gyur pa mthong ba'i dngos
460a3(rgyud): grub so sor thob bo// ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dus gsum pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya
460a4(rgyud): dang / spyi gtsug kun tu gzigs par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor dang cho gzhib mo gang yin pa de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi
460a5(rgyud): gsang po'i rgyal mtshan gyi mchog tu kun tu gnas so// gang gis skye ba brjes pa'i mong dang / bsgoms pa'i me nga la rgyal mtshan gyi mchog dang ldan pa'i sgo mchog tu gnas/ 
460a6(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ don yod pa'i ye shes bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi
460a7(rgyud): bdag po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dge ba'i me tog gtsang ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyi gtsug kun tu rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dong / seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba/ 
460a8(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin dang // 'od 'bar bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzi brjid ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi phyag rgya zhes bya
460b1(rgyud): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nor bu rin po che chen po'i char 'bebs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
460b2(rgyud): 'dzin dang / don yod pa dri ma med pa'i bdag po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa zab mo'i sgra sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa'i dngos grub kyi zhogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
460b3(rgyud): 'dzin dang / don yod pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i 'od kyi snang ba rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ste/ 'di rnams la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin mang po rnams
460b4(rgyud): so sor thob cing tingange 'dzin gzhan 'jig rten las 'das pa ba/ rgya stong phrag bklags pa dang / bzlas pa tsam gyis gru/ ba par 'gyuraro// rig pa'i rgyal po'i gzungs kyi snying po 'di
460b5(rgyud): yon tan che ba dang / phan yon che ba dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa che ba ste/ don yod pa lcags kyu'i cho ga zhib mo la/ don yod pa nor bu'i mchod pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
460b6(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i gzungs gsungs pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa rjesu 'brang ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad skye bar byed pa/ 
460b7(rgyud): sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong bar byed pa/ gzungs kyi tshig gi snying po gang zhig bklags pa tsam dang bzlas pa tsam gyis 'di rnams byed pa'i dngos grub so sor thob po'o// sgrub
460b8(rgyud): pa 'di rnams thams cad na las kyi rnam por 'phrul du 'gyur ba ma yin no// de nas rig sngags 'chang de spang bar gnas te bzlas pa gcig dang // bklags pa'i dngos grub kyis/ de lta bu'i
461a1(rgyud): rgyas shing gsal ba thob bo// de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub yang so sor thob te/ don rgya che ba dang / long spyod dang ldan pa dang / gzungs kyi dngos grub chen po so sor thob bo// bkod pa yangs
461a2(rgyud): pa rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi gsang ba so sor thob bo// dpag bsam gyi shing yang dag par gang ba'i char 'bebs pa dang / gzungs kyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i bkod pa so/ 
461a3(rgyud): sor thob bo// yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i rgya mtsho dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'bebs pa dang / kun nas kun tu gzigs pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi gzungs kyi gsang ba'i char 'bebs pa'i dngos grub so
461a4(rgyud): sor thob bo// kun nas gser gyi rgyal mtshan gyi char 'bebs pa de'i gzungs kyi bkod pa rnam par bltas pa dang / don yo dad pa'i bkod pa rab 'byam gyi dngos grub rab tu thob bo// de bzhi
461a5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par lta ba'i rgyal ma tshan gyi gzungs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa so sor thob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying po dang / 
461a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rnam par blta ba'i dngos grub so sor thob bo// rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor yangs pa thams cad so sor thob bo// phan yon chen po dang / rnam par 'phrul pa chen po byin gyis brlabs pa
461a7(rgyud): 'di rnams so sor thob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlob pa byin gyis brlabs pas don yod pa'i nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs gang bklags pa tsam gyis yon tan dang / 
461a8(rgyud): ngan yon rje su bsngags pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa chen po so sor thob bo// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje mchog tu dga' ba skyes shing mchog tu kyi bung zhes byed pa skyes nas/ 
461b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zhabs la btud de 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsungs pa'i don yod pa'i
461b2(rgyud): nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs gang yin pa 'di mchog tu rnyed par dka'o// yid bzhin gyi nor bur gyur pa'i snying po'i gzungs gang yin pa ni mchog tu rnyed par dka'o// mthu chen po dang / phan
461b3(rgyud): yon chen po dang / yon tan chen po skyed pa dang / 'thun pa rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul che bar blta bar bya'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal po dang / rigs kyi bu 'am
461b4(rgyud): rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge ba snyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ bud med dam/ skyes pa'am/ khye'u
461b5(rgyud): 'am bu mo yang rung ste/ lan gcig bzlas pa 'am/ dran pa rtsa/ ma dang / bklags pa tsam gyis bsod nams kyi phung po dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das
461b6(rgyud): sdig pa thams cad zad par gyur pade ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa rnams grub par 'gyur ba ci lags/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam yongasu dag par 'gyur ba ci lags// 
461b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs par 'gyur ba ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtag tu mchog stsol ba de ci lags
461b8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bdag la de'i skabs dbye bar mdzad du gsol/ de lta bu'i phan yon phul du byung ba ni bcom ldan 'das mchog tu ngomatsha par gyur pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
462a1(rgyud): lag na rdo rje leg so leg so// lag na rdo rje mchog tu rnyed par dga' ba'i dri ba dris pa dengs ji lta ba bzhin dung lta bshad par bya yi nyon cig/ lag na rdo rje 'din
462a2(rgyud): bklags pa tsam gyi mdo dang / brjod pa tsam gyi mod la byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu dga' ba dang bcas pas phyag g.yas pa spyi bor 'jog par
462a3(rgyud): byed do// mngon sum du rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na nye bar gnas te dbugs 'byin par yang byed do// de ci ltar zhe na/ 'di ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang bzhin gyis lus
462a4(rgyud): yongasu dag pa gzungs pa'i gzungs kyi snying po'o// // 'di ni don yod pa'i rang bzhin gyi snying po'o// 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi rnam par 'phrul
462a5(rgyud): pa'o// 'di ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dang nga phyug gi rang bzhin mthong ba'o// 'di ni bcu gcig/ zhal mthong ba'o// 'di ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
462a6(rgyud): dbang phyug gi sna tshogs pa'i gzugs mthong ba'o// 'di ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sprul pa'i sprin mthong ba'o// 'di ni mgrin pa sngon po dang / sred med
462a7(rgyud): kyi bu'i gzugs mthong ba'o// 'di ni 'jig rten gsum mthong ba'o// rta 'grin mthong ba'o// 'di ni pad+mo yangs pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba'o// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
462a8(rgyud): cad kyi mchod pa'i sprin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'o// 'di ni rdo rje'i snying po chen po mthong ba'o// 'di ni mgo'i snying po chen po'o// 'di ni sna tshogs pa'i gzugs kyi rang bzhin mthong ba'o// 
462b1(rgyud): 'di ni don yod pa'i gzugs dang don yod pa'i dngos grub kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'o// 'di ni nges thams cad du 'gugs pas na zhags par brjod par bya'o// don yod pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i
462b2(rgyud): mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungasu brjod par bya ste/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dam par gyur pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi sku gzhan du gyur pa mthong ba mtshungs
462b3(rgyud): pa ste/ don yod pa'i nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs 'di dag mthong ba dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro// bklags pa dang / brjod pa tsam gyi mod la dus gsum du gshegs pa de bzhin ga
462b4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi sras gcig pur 'gyur ro// / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yongasu dag pa'i sku shi ngan tu dri ma med cing yongasu dag pa dang mnyam par 'gyur te/ de bzhin
462b5(rgyud): gshegs pa'i snying po'i skur yang 'gyur ro// dus pa/ sum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyir/ mi ldog par lung ston cing / bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang
462b6(rgyud): chub tu lung ston par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mthong bar 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyis yang dag par dbugs 'byin par 'gyuro// bdud la sogs
462b7(rgyud): pa dang / gdug pa'i rmi lam dang / log par 'dren pa thams cad tshar bcad par byas par 'gyu ro// bcing pa lngas bcings shing gzir ba dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za
462b8(rgyud): dang / yi dgas dang / grul bum dang / brjed byed/ tshangs pa'i srin po rnams thams cad ring du 'bros par 'gyuraro// rims thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / 'bras dang / phol mig dang / 
463a1(rgyud): rtsog shu dang / lcogs pa dang / mtshan par rdol ba dang / g.yan pa dang / mdze dang / rkang shu thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do// lus kyi gzer thams cad nye ba bzhi par
463a2(rgyud): byed do// ji ltar shel yongasu dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yongasu dag par 'gyur ro// tshig btsan par yang 'gyur ro// gsang sngags dang / cho ga zhib mo thams cad kyi dngos
463a3(rgyud): grub tu yang 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad dga' bar yang 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / khyim bdag gis cher mchod par bya bar 'gyu ro// sems can thams cad
463a4(rgyud): kyi mchod par 'os pa gcig pur 'gyur ro// nor dang 'bru 'phel bar yang 'gyu ro// bsam pa dang yid kyi shi dang rta thams cad yongasu rdzogs par yang 'gyu ro// chom rkun dang / 
463a5(rgyud): g.yo can dang / rkun pos rnam par skrag pa dang / gcan zan khro bo dang / g.yang sa dang / khyim sgrib pa dang / gsod pa dang / 'chi ba dang / gcan zan khro bo'i 'jigs pa rnams
463a6(rgyud): thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// me dang chus dus byed pa dang / rlung dang / tshad pa dang / sad dang / ser ba rnams kyi mi tshugs so// dgra thams cad kyis 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro// thams
463a7(rgyud): cad byams pa'i yid du 'gyur ro// bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad dbang du gyur par byed do// 'di ni bklags pa tsam gyis 'jig rten pa rnams kyi yon chen po bskyed
463a8(rgyud): bdango // rnam par 'phrul par 'gyuraro// de 'chi 'pho bo'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu
463b1(rgyud): tshur shog/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams song dang / khyod kyis lam yongasu dag par byas pa'o// 'chi ba'i dus su gyur pa na bsams pa nyid kyi mod la pad+ma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// 
463b2(rgyud): rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang / tshe rabs dran par yang 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med mngon sum du mthong ba tsam gyis phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/ bla na med pa
463b3(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor dang pad+mo yangs pa'i gsang ba mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang / don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga
463b4(rgyud): zhing mo mngon du 'gyur zhing kha ton du kun tu gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'idal 'khor rjesu dran par byed do// thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi
463b5(rgyud): zhing kun tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mdze na sum du mtshungs par lhan cig lung ston pa so so/ thob ste/ nam du yang phyir zhing rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba
463b6(rgyud): ji srid du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu bstan pa'i ba dang / ji srid du yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i lus su gyur gyi bar du// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phan yon dang / rnam par 'phrul pa
463b7(rgyud): bklags pas grub par 'gyuraro// de nas bzlas pa tsam gyis/ dngos grub bshad par bya ste/ snga gro gcig bzlas pa tsam gyi mo la/ mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa dang / mnar med pa
463b8(rgyud): mthar gtugs pa'i sdig pa dang /  rab lhun po chen po bdun gyi tshad tsam pa spu'i khong bu re rer slob pa bsags pa dang / bskal pa stong phrag tu bsags pa'i sngon gyi sdig pa dang snang
464a1(rgyud): pa de rnams thams cad snga gro gcig bzlas pa tsam gyi sdig pa dang las kyi sgrib pa rnam par nyams par byed ste/ zad pa dang yongasu gtugs par 'gyu ro// dmyal ba'i 'gro ba
464a2(rgyud): chen po bcu drug tu gzhol ba de rnams thams cad skad cig gcig gis yongasu grol lo// smyung bar gnas pa gcig gis bzlas pas dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
464a3(rgyud): rnams kun tu bzang po chen po nyid thob bo// gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / pad+mo yangs pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / don yod zhags pa'i snying po thams cad du dngosu
464a4(rgyud): rjesu 'jug par byed do// thams cad du dam tshig chen po/ yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyu ro// 'phags pa spyan ras/ gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyi dngos mthong ba sbyin pa
464a5(rgyud): byed do// dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rang gi gzugs kyis dngos su mthong bar nye bar gnas par byed do// dkyil 'khor ba'i lha thams cad dngosu rjesu 'brang
464a6(rgyud): zhing gnas te/ rtag tu rnam par blta bar 'gyur zhing cher bcings par 'gyur ro// rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyang rtag tu rje su 'brang zhing dngosu mthong bar gnas par byed do// brgya stong phrag bzlas
464a7(rgyud): pa tsam gyi lce rdo rje ltar bstan par 'gyur zhing / rdo rje'i snying po dang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa dang / pad+ma'i mdab ma lta bu'i kha dog dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/ phyir zhing de'i lus la reg pa ngan pa 'byung
464a8(rgyud): bar mi 'gyu ro// phyir zhing lus 'pho bar yang mi nus shing / yongasu dag cing dri ma med pa'i lus su 'gyur ro// lus pad+ma dkar po'i kha dog dang mtshungs par yang 'gyur ro// gdug pa thams cad dang / 
464b1(rgyud): phyir rgol ba dang / dgra thams cad dang / 'thung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad dang / dgegs dang / log pa 'dren pa rnams dang / klum bus pa mi bzang ba dang / bdung gyi ris kyi lha thams
464b2(rgyud): cad kyis lus dang phung po la bza' bar mi 'gyur ro// lus pad+ma dkar po'i kha dog dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro// lha rnams lhan cig tu rjesu rgyu bar byed do// kha nas lha rdzas kyi ud pa la sngon po'i
464b3(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lus la lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi dris bsgos par 'gyur ro// rkang pa dang lag pa gzhon sha can du 'gyur ro// mig gis logs par mthong bar 'gyur ro// gzhan gyi dkyil 'kho
464b4(rgyud): yongasu rgyas par 'gyur ro// snyan pa thos par yang 'gyu rar zhing lha rdzas kyi tshor bar yang 'gyur ro// bzang po la re dag pa'i lus su yang 'gyur ro// skra bung ba dang mtshungs pa li zhing
464b5(rgyud): 'khyil ba'i sgra ru 'gyur ro// nam yang phyir zhing lus kyi nang gi rlung gi las dang / dri ngan pas bsgos par mi 'gyu ro// dri ma thams cad bsal bar 'gyu ro// 'jam pa dang / snyan
464b6(rgyud): pa dang / mnyan pa'i ngag tu yang 'gyur ro// lha'i nga ro dang / nga ro bzang ba dang / nga ro zab pa snyan cing mnyen pa dang / mi 'am tsi'i sgra lta bu dang / ka la bing ka'i sgra dbyangasu 'gyur ro// mdzes par
464b7(rgyud): 'gro ba dang / zab par 'gro bar yang 'gyur ro// lag mthil shin tu 'jam pa dang / sor mo ring ba dang / lag pa'i ri mo shin tu rnam par bkra bar yang 'gyur ro// seng ge'i 'gros dang rtsal gyis
464b8(rgyud): 'gro bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i 'gro su 'gyuro// sems can thams cad kyi gtso bo gcig pur mchod pa'i 'os yang 'gyur ro// dpal rnam thos sras rjesu 'thun par
465a1(rgyud): rjesu 'brang bar 'gyur ro// tshig mi 'thun pa yang rje su 'thun par 'gyur ro// thams cad du dag rnam par dag par yang 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa'i bzlas pa'i dngos grub bo// 
465a2(rgyud): 'jig rten las 'das pa ni skye ba brjes nas/ lpags pa gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang / bsams pa nyid kyi mod la skye bar 'gyur te/ 'od dpag med kyi spyan sngar mdun gyi pad+ma'i snying po las
465a3(rgyud): brdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing / rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang // tshe rabs dran par yang 'gyur ro// dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
465a4(rgyud): kyis lung bstan pa dang / mngon par dbang bskur ba'i mcho dag byang chub tu lung ston pa dang / mngon par dbang ba skur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa byin
465a5(rgyud): gyis rlob pas kyang byin gyis brlab so zhes pa 'jig rten la sa las pa'i 'as pa'i cho ga'i dngos grub bo// de nas bso de nams kyi phung po brjod par bya ste/ 'di bzlas pa tsam
465a6(rgyud): gyis bsod nams kyi phung po dang dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam// dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang yang rung
465a7(rgyud): bas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams/ nor bu rin po che chen po che sna bdun gyis yongasu bkang bar byas pa dang / gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog gis yongs
465a8(rgyud): su bkang nas/ dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ nyi ma re re shing de bzhin gshegs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang bral/ nor bu rin
465b1(rgyud): po che chen po sna bdun dang / gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog gis bkang nas phung bde bas kyang / dge ba dang bsod nams kyi phung po ches mang bar bskyed do// gang zhig dus gsum
465b2(rgyud): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa mchod cing / nyi ma re re zhing de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa de kho na bzhin du 'di bzlas pa tsam gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur
465b3(rgyud): de rnams gang gis nor bu rin po che chen po byin pas de rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bcu drug gi char yang mi phong ngo // de bzhin du bsod nams kyi phung po dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'gyur/ 
465b4(rgyud): zhes so// 'jig rten pa'i cho ga sna tshogs po'i tshogs dang / 2'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya stong/ 
465b5(rgyud): phrag rnams nor bu rin po che chen po sna bdun gyis bkang ba/ rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog dang / gser dang / dngul gyi me tog gis bkang ba rnams kyis dus gsum pa'i de
465b6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re zhing la yang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu bkang nas phul bar 'gyuraro// mchod pa'i sprin chen por 'gyu/ 
465b7(rgyud): te/ ji srid byang chub snying po la mthar thug gi bar du mi zad te de lta bu'i bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur zhing / bsod nams kyi phung po chen por yang 'gyur te/ bsod
465b8(rgyud): nams kyi phung po dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bzlas pa'i dngos grub dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du phan
466a1(rgyud): sen chen po dang / sbyin pa yongasu gtong ba chen po gang yin pa dang / bzlas pa'i cho ga chen po dang / mchod pa'i sprin chen por 'gyur ro// de bzhin du yon tan bskyed pa dang / 
466a2(rgyud): rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshi ga'i khyad par so sor thob bo// dus rtag par rgyun tu bzlas pa'i cho ga dang ldan par 'gyur bar bya'o// rtag tu yang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mthong 'dod par 'gyur// 
466a3(rgyud): rtag tu yang dge ba'i rtsa ba dang yang dag par 'grogs par 'gyu ro// lag na rdo rje gang yang rig pa'i rgyal po'i tshi ga zhib mo 'di don yod po'i nor bu'i snying po 'di/ tha na sgra tsam yang rna ba'i bu ga
466a4(rgyud): ltung bar 'gyur ba dang / bris pa rnams blta ba dang kho ti'am/ yi ge 'am/ rtsig pa'am gyeng la bris pa blta bar byed pa de/ mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa thams cad
466a5(rgyud): yongasu zad cing / yongasu gtugs par 'gyur ro// sngon bsag sa pa'i mnar med par gzhol ba'i sdig pa dang / sgrib pa de thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do// 
466a6(rgyud): yongasu gtugs par 'gyur ro// shi 'phos nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu skye bar 'gyur te/ pad+ma las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// nam yang phyis mngal du gnas pa'i dri mas gos
466a7(rgyud): par mi 'gyur ro// ji srid du byang chub la mthar thug gi bar du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du pad+ma las skye bar 'gyur zhing tshe rabs
466a8(rgyud): dran par yang 'gyu ro// phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar cho ga zhing mo'i rgyal po don yod pa'i nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs 'di bri bar bya/ bcom ldan 'das 'dri
466b1(rgyud): bzhin pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu bskyed pa ci lags/ dge ba'i rtsab ci dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyu ro// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje'i di'i yon tan dang phan
466b2(rgyud): yin dpag tu med de/ don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig pa'i rgyal po 'di'i don yod pa'i nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs 'dri bzhin pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu skye ste/ phan yon dag meng
466b3(rgyud): ba das 'dapa rgya ba nam dang 'phrul pa sa ser thob pa// gang yang na yong ba'i zhags pa'i lcags su rig pa'i rgyal po don yod pa'i nor bu'i mchong pa'i snying po'i gzungs 'di 'drib
466b4(rgyud): 'gyur ba nyon cig/ lag na rdo rje/ rgya mtsho chen po'i 'og tu dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi pa mchu dang / dang du dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi pa de las chu'i
466b5(rgyud): thigs pa'i tshad kyi thigs pa re re'i grangasu byed par 'dod pa 'am/ de lta bu'i tshad kyi ngos gnyis par mtsho chen po las thigs pa re re nas bcu par bya ste/ de la thigs pa
466b6(rgyud): re re nas bgrangs te gtor bar bya'o// de nas rgya mtsho chen po chu'i thigs pa'i grangs kyis zad par 'gyur zhing chu skam par byed do// mtsho chen po gnyis pa las chus yongasu gang ba
466b7(rgyud): 'gyur gyi/ don yod pa'i lcags kyu rig pa'i rgyal po 'di dang / don yod pa'i nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs kyi cho ga zhib mo de 'dri bzhin pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni
466b8(rgyud): gzungs par nus pa ma yin no// de ltar rgya che ba/ de ltar zab pa/ de ltar yangs pa'i yon tan bskyed par bya ba ni don yod pa nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs kyi cho ga zhib mo'i cho ga'i
467a1(rgyud): rgyal po'o// lag na rdo rje 'on kyang ri'i rgyal po ri rab chen po ni dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi 'og tu rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du nub bo// dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad cu
467a2(rgyud): bzhi steng nyid du gnas so// skyes bu stobs chen po dang ldan par gyur pa gang la la ri'i rgyal po ri rab chen po gang yin pa yang / yungs kar gyis 'bras bu'i tshad tsam du byed pa dang ngos gnyis
467a3(rgyud): par rgya mtsho chen po'i ri'i rgyal po ri rab chen po cho ga de lta bus yungs kar gyi 'bras bu tsam du byas pa las slar yang ri'i rgyal po ri rab tu rab tu gnas par byed par nus kyi cho ga zhib
467a4(rgyud): mo'i rgyal po gang yin pa 'di 'dri bzhin pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni mi nus te/ de bzhin gsheg/ nges pa thams cad kyis spyan dang / de'i gsung gi tshad gzung
467a5(rgyud): bar mi nus so// de bzhin du yon tan dang / phan yon rgya che zhing / bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongasu 'dzin te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par byin gyis brlabs par
467a6(rgyud): 'gyur zhes so// rdo rje 'dzin pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo dang / phyag rgya 'di ci ltar dri bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/ lag na rdo rje nyon
467a7(rgyud): cig/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje rigs sam/ dmangs rigs
467a8(rgyud): sam/ bud med dam/ skyes pa'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo gang la la cho ga zhib mo 'di 'dri bar byed ba de/ phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rims par phye ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi las dang / yo byad
467b1(rgyud): dang bcas pa'i cho gas/ don yod pa'i nor bu'i pad+ma zhags pa'i snying po'i gzungs/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'khor
467b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor chen po'i klu'i zhags pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dri bar byed do// des yongasu dag pa'i ngag dang yid kyis dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa
467b3(rgyud): dang / gus pa dang / bcas pa dang / yid der gyur pa dang / mchod pa'i mchog dang / gus pa la sogs pa'i 'dri mkhan gyi bri bar bya'o// mchog tu gus pa dang / zhe sa dang bcas pas kha zas mi
467b4(rgyud): mthun pa spangs te/ legs par yongasu rdzogs pa'i kha zas ro/ bro ba'i mchog dang / legs par 'dus byas shing yi/ rade dga' ba'i me tog dang / 'bras bu'i btung ba gus pa dang
467b5(rgyud): bcas pas/ gnas su gi baM gi dkyil 'khor dang / me tog gca la du bkram nas dri yis bdugs te/ dar gyis spras pa'i chos kyi stan la 'dug pas bri bar bya'o// legs
467b6(rgyud): par khrus byas shing / mgo la dris byug/ lus la gos bsgos la mchod par bya'o// tshes brgyad dam bco lnga la so so'i cha shas dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par phye nas gtor ma dang
467b7(rgyud): nye bar spyod pa dbul bar bya'o// mchog tu dga' ba'i yid kyis bya ste/ yon dang bcas pas gser gyi sna rgyan sbyin par bya'o// bri bar bya ba yongasu ma spangs par don yod par bya'o// lag
467b8(rgyud): pa brkyang bas bya'o// legs par sbyangs pa byas pas byas so// 'di yi tshogs 'dri bar byed pa gang yin pa des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig dang / 
468a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang / gsang 'bris par 'gyuro// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs dang / pad+ma'i rigs dang / rdo rje'i
468a2(rgyud): rigs gang ci yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor chen po de thams cad 'dri bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ chu gang yin pa thams cad chu klung chen po
468a3(rgyud): dang / rgya mtsho chen po'i rje su zhugs nas ro gcig tu 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ nyi ma shar ba na/ mun pas ldongs pa thams cad kun tu snang bar byed do// de kho na bzhin du don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig pa'i
468a4(rgyud): rgyal po'i snying po 'di dang / don yod pa'i nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po 'di dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i nor bu pad+ma'i snying po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying
468a5(rgyud): po dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / dkyi// la 'khor chen po dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor/ pa'i klu'i zhags pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'di thams cad
468a6(rgyud): du mtshungs par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rjesu 'jug go// dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / snying po rnams mtshungs par/ dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i
468a7(rgyud): rigasu rab tu skyes pa'o// thams cad du mtshungs par mchod pa'i sprin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'o// gong yang dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdul phra rab dang lhan cig pa'i de
468a8(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi tha snyad de kho na nyid yang dag par snying po'o// don yod pa nor bu mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs dang / don yod pa nor bu pad+ma'i zhags pa'i snying pod
468b1(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po dang / gzungs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / 'khor lo dang / dkyil 'khor chen po dang / phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor ba dang / klu'i zhags
468b2(rgyud): pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs pa de thams cad gsang ba'i dam tshig gcig tu byin gyis brlab so// rgyu de'i phyir 'di ni don yod zhags
468b3(rgyud): pa'i don yod pa'i las sgrub par byed pa'i mthu stobs kyi dngos grub te/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po dang / don yod zhags pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'o// zhes brjod par bya'o// de bzhin du
468b4(rgyud): 'dri bzhin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / bsod nams kyi phung po da yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba dang / mtshungs po cig gis
468b5(rgyud): mtshungs pa'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mor byin gyis brlabs so// 'dri bar bya da pa dang / 'don par byed pa dang / klog par byed pa dang / 
468b6(rgyud): bzlas pa ni mchod pa'i sprin du byin gyis brlab so// de'i phyir 'di ni rig sngags 'chang gis legs par rab tu dang ba dang las la spro zhing brtson pas ba'o// shin tu gsal ba dang / 
468b7(rgyud): spro ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / dad pas bri bar bya'o// shin tu 'bad pas phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyi snying po dang / gzungs dang / phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dang klu'i zhags pa'i rnam
468b8(rgyud): 'phrul pa bri bar bya/ bklag par bya mnyan par bya'o// mthu stobs kyis mnyan par bya'o// mthu stobs kyi bri bar bya/ mthu stobs kyis mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur bya'o// mthu stobs kyi
469a1(rgyud): dam pa'i chos mchod pa dang / gus pas 'dri bar byed pa po dang / 'dri bzhin pa la bsnyen bkur dang / bla ma la srid zhu byed par bya'o// 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba'o// don yod
469a2(rgyud): zhags pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba'o// nor bu rin po che chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gzungs kyi gsang
469a3(rgyud): ba byin gyis brlabs pa ni gnyis ste/ gcig ni don yod pa'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungaso// gnyis pa ni don yod pa'i nor bu'i pad+ma zhags pa'i snying po'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
469a4(rgyud): dbang phyug gi snying po rnam par 'phrul pa dang / 'khor lo/ dang / dkyil 'khor chen po'i snying po dang / phyag rgya dang /  dkyil 'khor chen po'i klu'i zhags pas rnam par 'phrul pas
469a5(rgyud): sprul pa'o// 'di ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che chen por 'gyur ba ste/ don yod pa'i dpag bsam gyi shing gi mchod pa chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying
469a6(rgyud): po don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dam par gyur pa'i snying po don yod pa'i
469a7(rgyud): yid bzhin gyis nor bu ste/ 'di ni gnyis par rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi nor bu rin po che chen po ste/ don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa
469a8(rgyud): yin no// de nas phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dbang po du ma rig sngags 'chang brgya stong phrag gis yongasu bskor ba dang / rig pa'i rgyal po'i lha brgya stong
469b1(rgyud): phrag du ma dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha brgya stong phrag du ma dang / dbang po dang lha'i dbang po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gtsang ma'i gnas kyi ris kyi lha'i bu
469b2(rgyud): brgya stong phrag rnams dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la
469b3(rgyud): tshogs stong phrag rnams kyis de lta bu'i gsung gi sgra dbyangs zos nas/ dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yi rangs pa dang / rab tu 'gu ba dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes par gyur to// 
469b4(rgyud): de bzhin du gnyis par nor bu rin po che chen po nyan pa de la de rnams thas cad lhan cig tu 'thun par rgyal po chen po bzhi sngon du 'gro bas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
469b5(rgyud): der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / rol mo// dang / pheg rdob pa sna tshogs pas mchod pa byed par gyur
469b6(rgyud): to// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de la yang mchod par gyur cig/ rig pa'i rgyal po de la yang mchod par byed do// bcom ldan 'das la lan brgyad stong phrag ngo mar bskor/ 
469b7(rgyud): ba byas nas/ leg so zhes brjod par byed de/ bcom ldan 'das legaso legs so// bcom ldan 'das mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba gang yin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das gnyis par nor
469b8(rgyud): bu rin po che chen po don yod zhags pa'i snying po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dzam bu'i gling du rab tu bzhago zhes so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang byin gyis brlab so// 'phags pa
470a1(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsungs pa'o// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying por gyur pa thun mong bar mtshungs pa'o// thams
470a2(rgyud): cad du gsang ba phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i sprin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mchog tu
470a3(rgyud): rnyed par dka' ba ro gsungs pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bdog de dag thams cad 'thun par gyur pas lhan cig pa kho nar rtag tu rjesu 'brang zhing / rig pa'i rgyal po 'di yang dag par rje su 'brang
470a4(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// 'di yongasu srung bar bgyi'o// 'di lta ste/ 'dzin pa dang / 'don pa dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen dbakur byed pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / 
470a5(rgyud): nyan pa dang / bzlas pa'i las su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang de la yang rtag tu rgyun mi 'cha par spong ba dang / sgrub pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// dngos
470a6(rgyud): grub kyang rtsal bar bgyi'o// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal
470a7(rgyud): rigs sam/ bud med dam/ skyes pa'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo gang yin pa de'i yang cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po 'di'i ming thos pa tsam gyis kyang / de la bdag cog thams cad 'thun par rtag tu/ 
470a8(rgyud): rjesu 'brang bar bgyi/ srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / mdangs dang / dga' bsgrub par bgyi/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi/ 
470b1(rgyud): nad thams cad bsal bar bgyi// 'jigs pa dang / 'thab mo dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyi/ yams dang / nye bar 'che ba dang / nad 'gro ba dang / 
470b2(rgyud): 'khrug pa dang / mu ge dang / mings dang / 'bog dgon pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad so sor phyir bzlog par bgyi/ bde ba la yang dag par reg pa dang / mchog tu dga' ba sgrub par
470b3(rgyud): srung bar bgyi/ yongasu bskyang bar bgyi/ don med pa yang so sor bzlog par bgyi don la yang dag par sbyar bar bgyi/ don thams cad rje su brtsal bar bgyi/ ngan thams cad rdzas su
470b4(rgyud): brtsal bar bgyi/ rtag tu mchog rtsal bar bgyi'o// / bcom ldan 'das shin tu rgyas pa'i cho ga cho ga zhib mo'i yo byad du dgongs pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan
470b5(rgyud): 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje sngon du 'gro bas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / rig pa'i rgyal po'i lha de rnams dang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / na mkha'
470b6(rgyud): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye rnams la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ legaso legaso drang srong chen po/ de lta bu byed pa de rnams yongasu bskyab par bya/ bsrung bar bya/ dngos
470b7(rgyud): grub kyang sbyin par bya'o// ngas cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo 'di yongasu srung ba'i ched dang / sems can
470b8(rgyud): de rnams thams cad yongasu srung ba'i ched dang / sems can thams cad srung ba'i ched dang / yingasu bskyang ba'i ched du grogs po rnams la rjesu gtang ngo // 'di yang bsrung bar bya/ 
471a1(rgyud): zhes so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gyi rim par
471a2(rgyud): phye ba'i cho ga smros shig/ don yod pa'i nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs kyi gsang ba dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi snying po'i gsang ba mchog gi dngos grub 'di/ thams
471a3(rgyud): cad du thun mong ba'i snying po grub pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa lcags kyu'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po'i rig pa'i/ 
471a4(rgyud): rgyal po den yod pa nor bu mched pa'i snying po'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dang / ras ris rnams gsungs pa/ de nas 'di'i dkyil 'khor bshad par
471a5(rgyud): bya'o// don yod pa mchod pa'i nor bu'i snying po bla na med/ pa ni/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas te/ kun nas shin tu rnam par phye ba/ sa dang ba byung gis legs par byugs
471a6(rgyud): shing shin tu 'jam pa la/ tshen sna tshogs pas bkra ba'i srad pus char gzhal cing bcad la dkyil 'khor bla na med pa'i dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por bdag gi khru'i tshad kyis kun
471a7(rgyud): nas khru bzhi pa sgo bzhi rnam par phye ba bya'o// thams cad du gsang ba thun mong pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por yang pad+ma bya ste/ pad+ma stong phrag gi shin tu mdzes
471a8(rgyud): pa lnga lnga'o// pad+ma dkar po bla na med pa la ze 'bru dang / ge sar gyi tshad la bab pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i ge sar dang / ze 'bru bkra ba'i dra ba'i snying po lus dang lag tu 'chang zhing / lag
471b1(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya g.yon pa dang g.yas pas bya'o// dar dpyangs dang 'khyil pas smra ba/ zur zur du dpag bsam gyi shing shin tu tshang la bab pa cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du byed du gzhug go// snying po'i kho
471b2(rgyud): gyi re kha yang cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du shin tu tshad dang ldan par bya'o// me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs pa bya zhing de nas me tog gi bar du re kha bya'o// rgyan sna tshogs kyi rnam par brgyan pa/ 
471b3(rgyud): gos sna tshogs pa mdzes pa'o// sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyi phyi rol tu pad+ma dang / ud pa la sngon po'i phreng ba'i ri mo'o// ud pa la sngon po'i phyi rol tu nor bu rin po che sna tshogs pas rnam
471b4(rgyud): par bkra ba'i ri mo 'bar ba'i phreng bas mdzes pa'o// me tog sna ma dang tsam bka'i phreng ba dag la sngags kyi ni ra bu'i ri mo yang bya'o// de'i phyi rol gyi 'khor yug tu snum
471b5(rgyud): bu'i rnam pa bya'o// ri bo la sna tshogs pa'i ljon shing da nga lcug ma bkram pa dang / me tog sna tshogs kyis nye bar/ mdzes pa'o// khor yug tu chu 'bab pa'i snying po'i dkyil
471b6(rgyud): 'khor 'di 'bri zhing / phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu'ang bri bar bya ste/ kyil 'khor bran med pa/ phyag rgya sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs dang / bum pa dang mchod pa'i rin po che'i
471b7(rgyud): snod sna tshogs pa dang / gang ba'i bum pa sna tshogs pa bri'o// mtshan ma dang / phyag rgya dang / rin po che sna tshogs pa'i yal ga dang / pad+ma dang / ud pa la 'chang ba dang / gos dang rgyan sna
471b8(rgyud): tshigs pa thogs pa bya'o// phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu/ me tog sna tshogs pa/ ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / mAn dA ra ba dang / a ti muk+ta ka dang / wAR+Shi ka dang / tsam pa ka dang
472a1(rgyud): ud pa la sngon po dang / snga ma dang / spyanar dang / yA thi ka dang / kadam pa'i me tog gi phreng bas mdzes par bya'o// sgo bzhi'i gnas su rgyun thams cad kyis rnam par brtan
472a2(rgyud): par bya ste/ rin po che'i lcug ma sna tshogs pa dang / bum po gang ba thogs par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi snying por ba dan gyis bo rgyan par bya'o// gang ba'i bum pa yongasu bsags pa dang / 
472a3(rgyud): me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs pa dang / sna tshogs pa'i gzugs dang / bza' ba'i kha zas ro bro ba'i mchog bzhag par bya// sna tshogs pa'i bdug pas bdug la/ bdug pa'i srog
472a4(rgyud): phog yongasu bsham par bya'o// rig sngags 'chang ga/ tsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya/ legs par khrus byas shing / dri bzang po'i dris bsgos te/ rnam pa sna tshogs
472a5(rgyud): pa'i bdug pas bdug la/ ba byung lngas nye reg bya ste/ don yod pa nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs 'di lon stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya'o// dus gsum du
472a6(rgyud): gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rdul phra rob kyi grangs dang mnyam pa yid la bya/ mchod pa'i sprin chen po yid la bya zhing bzla ste/ phyogs bcu kun nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
472a7(rgyud): cad kyi nang du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re'i dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rdul phra rab rnams/ de bzhin gshegs
472a8(rgyud): pa'i mchod pa'i sprin gyis ji ltar dkyil 'khor du yongasu bsags shing rnam pa sna tshogasu gzhal du med pas ji lta ba bzhin du yengasu bsags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa re re yang
472b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po gzhal du med pa brgya stong phrag yongasu bsagasangs bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchod pa'i sprin chen po byed do// sna tshogs pa'i gos dang / sna tshogs pa'i rgyan dang / 
472b2(rgyud): lta ba lhung dang / lha rdzas kyi me tig sna tshogs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi dri sna tshogs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi bdug spos sna tshogs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi 'bras bu dang / me tig sna tshogs pa dang / 
472b3(rgyud): ro brgya pa'i kha zas kyi mchog ro bro ba'i mchog rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / sgron ma'i shing sna tshogs pa brgya stong phrag rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
472b4(rgyud): dang bcas pa la mchod pa'i sprin chen po byed do// yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sgra rnams kyi mchod pa'i sprin byed do// de lta bu'i cho ga rnams phyogs
472b5(rgyud): bcu rnamasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re'i de bzhin gshe/ gas pa re re'i mchod pa'i sprin chen pos dus ga/ sum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rdul phro rab kyi/ 
472b6(rgyud): grangs rnams mchod par 'gyur te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad du lhun grub tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor chen po gzhal du med pa'i mchod pa'i sprin gyis mcho
472b7(rgyud): par byed do// gang yang dkyil 'khor chen po der rje su zhugs pa'i sems can dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / 
472b8(rgyud): khye'u dang / bu mo gang yin pa de rnams thams cad pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de la mthong bar 'dod pa dang / rje su yi rang ba dang / lhan cig 'gro ba 'am/ tha na thos
473a1(rgyud): pa tsam gang yin pa de thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur shing pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// sbyin pa chen po yongasu gtong ba yongasu gtang ba
473a2(rgyud): ro/ bsod nams kyi phung po dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyu ro// sems can re re'i yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang mnyam pa de'i drung
473a3(rgyud): du dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / bsod nams kyi phung po bskyod par 'gyuraro// dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyi mod dang / rje su yi rang ba tsam gyi mod la/ 'phral nyid du mtshams med pa lnga'i
473a4(rgyud): sdig pa yongasu zad par 'gyur ro// nad thams cad las yongasu grol bar yang 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi bla ma gcig pur 'gyu ro// 'chi 'pho zhing skye ba rje
473a5(rgyud): ba'i dus su son te 'chi ba'i mthar thug na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis mngon/ sum du ston zhing snang bar 'gyu ro// lam nye bar ston par byed
473a6(rgyud): cing dbugs 'byin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs pa rnamasu skal po mnyam pa nyid kyi skye bar byed do// rgyan thams cad kyi rgyan par pad+ma la brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// 
473a7(rgyud): skyes pa tsam gyi med la/ skye ba thams cad rjesu dran par byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib me da/ 
473a8(rgyud): don yod zhags pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag rdzogs par kha ton du gnas par byed do// ji srid sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la mthar thug gi bar du thams cad
473b1(rgyud): rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor bcings te gnas par byed do zhes// 'di ni skye ba'i tha mar 'gyur te/ mchod pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'di/ tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnasu song ba'i ri dgas da
473b2(rgyud): byed dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur shing pha rol tu phyin pa drug yong su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ mir gyur pa rnams kyi lta ci smos so// de ltar yon tan dang phan yon chen po'i mcho
473b3(rgyud): pa chen po dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// don yod pa nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / phan yon gyi cho ga'i sgrub thabs so// // de nas rig pa'i
473b4(rgyud): rgyal po'i ras ris bshad par bya ste/ sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa/ sdig pa thams cad sel rab 'phral du nad thams cad bzlog par byed pa/ dngos grub
473b5(rgyud): thams cad byed pa'i gnas mchog thams cad sbyin pa bshad par bya'o// ras same gos gzhan nam/ rgya dang kun nas khru bzhi pa la gtsang mos gtsang ma'i gnas
473b6(rgyud): su ri mo mkhon gtsang ma nyid kyis khrus byas gos gtsang ma bsgos te dri sna tshogs pas bdugs la// tshen sna tshogs pa rnam par bkra shing / lhag ma ma yin pa stong gsar par
473b7(rgyud): bzhag pas/ ras ris bla na med pa bri bar bya'o// dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa bya ste/ gzhal yis khang gi khang pa brtsegs par seng ge'i khri la pad+ma'i rdzing bur
473b8(rgyud): klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la me tog 'thor bar byed bzhin pa'o// g.yon du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bya ste/ 
474a1(rgyud): don yod zhags pa'i skyil krung byed pas bzhugs pa/ ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ 
474a2(rgyud): 'od dpag med kyi cod pan can phyag bzhi pa/ spyan gsum pa/ mdung rtse gsum 'dzin pa dang / pad+ma 'dzin pa dang / zhags pa 'dzin pa dang / nor bu rin po che 'dzin pa/ bcom ldan 'das la
474a3(rgyud): nye bar 'dud par byed bzhin pa'o// g.yasu rig pa'i rgyal po bya ste/ phyag bzhi pa 'phags ma sgrol ma'i cha bad 'chang ba 'od dpag med kyi cod pan can/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan
474a4(rgyud): pa/ sna tshogs pa'i gos 'dzin pa pad+ma dang / zhags pa dang / ral gri 'chang zhing / nor bu rin po che chen po'i rgyal mtshan thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la nye bar 'dud
474a5(rgyud): par byed pa/ skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rgyab tu lha mo sgrol ma bya ste/ thal mo sbyar ba smad pa rgyan thams cad
474a6(rgyud): kyis rnam par brgyan pa'o// lha mo sgrol ma'i rgyab tu gos dkar mo bya ste rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ rab tu bzhad cing / smin ma dpal bar g.yo zhing / bcom ldan 'das
474a7(rgyud): la zur mig gis blta bar byed pa bya'o// rig pa'i rgyal po'i rgyab tu 'phags pa dpal mdzes pa bya ste/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ bcom ldan 'das la blta bar byed
474a8(rgyud): bzhin pa sna tshogs pa'i me tog gi phur ma 'chang bar byed pa'o// thams cad la pad+ma'i gdan bya ste/ skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa bya'o// gos dkar mo'i rgyab tu/ khro bo chen po
474b1(rgyud): lcags kyu bya'o// dkar po'i gzhog su don yod pa'i lcags kyu bya'o// rig pa'i rgyal po'i 'og tu ral pa gcig ma bya ste/ phyag brgyad pa// zhal mche ba gtsigs pa/ ral pa gyen du brdzes
474b2(rgyud): pa/ rgyan thams cad kyi rnam par brgyan pa/ mtshon cha sna tshogs pa 'dzin pa ste/ ral gri dang / dgra sta dang / zhags po dang / rol gri dang / mdung rtse gsum dang / rdo rje dang / pad+ma 'chang ba bya zhing
474b3(rgyud): bsdigs mdzub byed par bya'o// steng du phyogs pa/ skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa/ bcom ldan 'das la blta bar byed bzhin pa'o// khang pa brtsegs pa'i steng du/ de bzhin
474b4(rgyud): gshegs pa bdun bya ste/ 'od dpag med kyang dbus su bya'o// / lhas mchod pa byed bzhin pa bya'o// phyag g.yon da dang g.yasu rdo rje 'dzin pa/ bcom ldan 'das la zas
474b5(rgyud): gsar pa 'dren par byeng bzhin pa'o// gzhogs g.yas dang ga yon du khro bo'i rgyal po rdo rje 'tshong ba bya'o// 'og gi gzhogs g.yasu rgyal po chen po bzhi bya'o// 
474b6(rgyud): gzhogs g.yon du gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / gzhon nu rnams rang rang gi mtshon cha 'dzin pa bya ste/ thams cad kA len bzhin pa bya'o// bcom ldan 'das 'og phyogs
474b7(rgyud): kyi rdzing bu'i g.yas logasu rig sngags 'chang pus mo gtsugs pa bya ste/ bdug pa'i srog phor dang / me tog 'dzin cing bgrang phreng thogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das la blta bar byeng
474b8(rgyud): bzhin pa bya'o// ras ris kyi kho ra khor yug tu ri bo bri bar bya ste/ sna tshogs me tog gi mgo logs bkram zhing / rin po che'i ljon shing sna tshogs pas rgyan pa/ chu bo 'bab cing rjesu spyod
475a1(rgyud): ri dgas dang / byas yang dag par brgyan par bya'o// sna tshogs pa'i ri'i lha dang / shang shang te'us kun tu khyab pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i klu'i gdengs ka dang
475a2(rgyud): mtshungs pI gnasu gnas pa bya'o// de nas yongasu spang ba byas pa zin pa dang / ras ris la tshon sna tshogs pas bkra bar bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma
475a3(rgyud): bgo bar bya'o// legs par khrus bya ste/ skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste/ smra ba bcang la don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad dang / rig pa'i rgyal po'i gzungs lan brgya
475a4(rgyud): rtsa brgyad du bzlas so// de'i tshe ras ris 'bor bar 'gyuraro// 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs pa 'byin par byed de/ phyogs bcu kun tu snang bar byed do// rig sngags 'chang
475a5(rgyud): dga' zhing 'dod par 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gi/ sa bdag gi don yang zhags pa'i snying po dang // don yod zhags pa'i lcagaso kyu dang / rig pa'i rgyal po'i
475a6(rgyud): snying po 'di'i dngos grub tu shes par bya'o// de nas las thams cad byed byed du gzhug cing 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das po'i mchog 'grub par 'gyur// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi
475a7(rgyud): bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ rgyal po 'am// blon po 'am/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ khyim bdag gam/ dge bsnyen nam/ 
475a8(rgyud): dge bsnyen ma'am/ bud med dam/ skyes pa 'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo gang ras ris chen po 'di mthong nas// mthong ba tsam gyi mod la mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa rnam par sbyangs
475b1(rgyud): shing thun chagasu 'gyur ro// mnar med pa'i sdig pa dang sgrib pa gasgrib pa rnams 'bral du yongasu grol lo// bsod nams kyi tshogs dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'gyur ro// rig pa'i rgyal
475b2(rgyud): po'i dkyil 'khor 'dod pa thams cad dang yid kyi shing rta dang / 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad dang / rigs thun mongs pa la 'jug pa'i thams cad du thun mongs pa'i dam tshig dang
475b3(rgyud): de kho na nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlob pa dang / thams cad du dngos grub byed pa'i gnas/ rdo rje'i gdan gyi dkyil 'khor mchog byang chub kyi snying po nye bar
475b4(rgyud): bskyod par byed pa de kho na nyid kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor da par byed pa'i dkyil 'khor phyir mi ldog par 'ju/ ga par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
475b5(rgyud): gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor/ gnas thams cad du son pa'i dngos grub/ cho ga zhib mo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug par byed pa// phyag rgya thams cad 'gugs par
475b6(rgyud): byed pa'i phyag rgya dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rab tu 'jug par byed pa bshad par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gi gnas yongasu rtags te/ sa'i cha mdzes par/ 
475b7(rgyud): gtsug log khang ngam/ dgon pa'am/ gnas nyid dam/ ri phug gam// tshang tshing ngam/ rgyal po'i gnas ma lam gyi gzhi mdo 'am/ gzhan yang brangs 'am/ dge 'dun gyi kun
475b8(rgyud): dga' ra ba 'am/ skyed mod 'tshal lam/ nags 'dab nyid dang / kun dga' ra ba'am/ chu klung ngam/ steng ka 'am/ 'bab chu'i dngo 'am// mtsho phran nam/ 'tshe'u dag dang / rdzing bu rnam
476a1(rgyud): ba bkra ba'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshen nam/ ne'u sing sngon po 'am/ me tog skye ba'i gnas sam/ thams cad du rje su 'thun par brtag par bya'o// gnas gtsang
476a2(rgyud): mar ma nyams pa'i mod la/ dkyil 'khor der dgod par bya ste/ sa dang / ba byung dang yang dag par ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi bya'o// khor yug tu khru bzhi pa/ legs par byugs shing
476a3(rgyud): shin tu 'jam pa/ bai DUr+ya'i kha dog tu bya'o// dkyil 'khor la tshon sna tshogs pa mdzes pas phye ba'i thig gdab te/ cha mnyam par phye nas zur bzhi pa logs bzhi pa sgo bzhi rnam par
476a4(rgyud): phye ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog gi thig gdab po// dbu sa kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por yang / dkyil 'a/ khor khri'i tshad la re kha lnga byas pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs
476a5(rgyud): mdzes pas thig gdab bo// pad+ma'i ri mo dang / mdung / rtse gsum dang / rdo rje'i ri mo gsum pa dag go/ ud pa la bzhi pa 'am/ nor bu rin po che chen po ni lnga
476a6(rgyud): par bshad do// snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu 'bar ba'i phreng ba byed du gzhug go/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su/ pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba 'dab ma sum cu rtsa
476a7(rgyud): gnyis pa/ ge sar dang / ze'u 'bru dang / bcas pa'i pad+ma bya ste/ de la rig pa'i lha mo gzugs ji ltar mdzes par dgod par bya'o// ji ltar ras ris 'di la gzugs pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba
476a8(rgyud): de lta bu bris nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams mdzes pa dang / zhi ba dang / khro gnyer can dang / drag po sna tshogs pa'i gzugs 'chang ba/ mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pa dkyil 'khor
476b1(rgyud): gyi tshad ji lta ba bzhin du'o// rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ gos sna tshogs pa 'chang ba skyes pa lo bcu drug pa'i gzugs dang / bud med lo bcu drug pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa bsres
476b2(rgyud): pa rtag tu bris nas/ pad+ma'i gdan gyis rgyan cing / thams cad pad+ma 'chang ba byed du gzhug go/ snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhi ru rgyal po chen po bzhi byed du bzhugs te/ go cha dang ya
476b3(rgyud): lang bsgos pa/ drag po'i gzugs 'jigs par byed pa'o// phyi'i dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba bya ste/ khor yug tu mtshan ma'i phyag rgya thams cad la pad+ma'i gdan 'chang ba'o// sgo
476b4(rgyud): bzhi'i gnas rnamasu dkyil 'khor gyi lha bya'o// gang ga dang / shI tA dang / 'jigs mo dang / dpe med ma dang / nor bu bzang po dang / ki lI ki la dang / gtsigs
476b5(rgyud): zhal ma ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha 'di rnams bri bar bya'o// phyi rol gyi khor yug tu ri bo'i phreng ba dag la me to/ ga dang / ljon shing sna tshogs pa'i lcug mas khyab cing / 
476b6(rgyud): tshon sna tshogs pas rnam par 'byes pa bri bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba legs par mthar phyin pa dang / de nas dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan la khi ra khor yug tu tshon sna lngas mdzes pa'i ba
476b7(rgyud): ngan brgya dang / sna tshogs pa'i gzugs mdzes pa dang / rnam par bkra ba'i bum pa gang ba dang / gtor ma dang / dril bu mdzes pa dang / gang ba'i dum pa dang / bum bu dang / dri sna tshogs kyi
476b8(rgyud): chus yongasu gang ba dang / ro sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma bzhag nas/ kham phor dang / ril ba gang ba dang / dri sna tshogs kyi byug pa dang / bdug pa sna tshogs pa bzhag nas/ 'bras busna/ 
477a1(rgyud): tshogs mdzes pa rnams bzhag ste/ khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dang / gser dang / dngul las byung ba'i snod dris gang ba rnams bzhago// thams cad ji ltar 'byor pa
477a2(rgyud): bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gzhal du med pa las dman pa nyid du mi bya'i lhag pa nyid byed du bzhug go/ dkyil 'khor gyi las rnams ji lta ba bzhin du gus pa dang / stobs dang brtson 'grus
477a3(rgyud): kyis bya'o// rig sngags 'chang gis gtsang bar gyur nas/ legs par khrus byas te gos gtsang ma bgos nas/ srung ba'i cho gas phyogs bcing ba dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang
477a4(rgyud): mtshams bcing ba dang / srung ba chen po yang byed du gzhug go// / de nas gsong sngags kyi las dang / phyag rgya'i las bla na med par bya'o// de nas sems can gzhug par bya ste/ 
477a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gang 'dod par bcug nas thams cad kyi dam tshig dang / phyag rgya sbyin du gzhug gi/ phyag bya ba dang bskor ba la thams cad bcug nas/ snyan gson
477a6(rgyud): dbab pa dang spyan drang bar bya/ las kyi tsho gas gtor ma sbyin par bya// me tog dang bdug pa dbul bar bya/ bzlas pa'o las rnams dang / las thams cad mdor bsdus pa byas
477a7(rgyud): nas gshegasu gsol ba 'dir bya'o// dkyil 'khor na gnas pa'i lha rnams la gtor ma'i las kyi cho ga dang / de bzhin du me tog dang bdug pa phul ba nas dkyil 'khor na gan/ 
477a8(rgyud): pa rnams gshegs gsol lo// gang gi tshe gsang sngags rnams dang / cho ga zhib mo chen po'i gzungs rab tu 'jug pa na sa'i mthil du ras ras 'bar ba'i mod la 'od zer
477b1(rgyud): 'byin par byed de/ dkyil 'khor mtho shing rig sngags 'chang yang bar snang la gnas so// de skad cig la ting nge 'dzin thob te/ dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i mod la/ cho ga zhib mo'i dngos grub
477b2(rgyud): bla na med pa dang / dngos grub thams cad rtag tu myur du 'byung la rigs pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas leg so zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// rig pa'i rgyal po'i dngos
477b3(rgyud): grub bla na med pa dang don yid zhags pa'i dngos grub brjod do// ji ltar yid la byed pa thams cad myur du 'dzin to// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub thob te 'di la the tshom
477b4(rgyud): med do// sems can dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa gang yin pa de rnams thams cad phyir mi ldog pa dang / bla na med dpa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par yang
477b5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying por 'dug nas chos kyi 'khor/ lo bskor bar byed do// sems can gang dkyil 'a khor de mthong nas sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad dang / 
477b6(rgyud): mtshams pa med pa lnga la sogs pa rnams dang / mnar med par gzhol ba de thams cad rnam par nyams par byed cing bde blag tu sangs rgyas nyid du 'gro'o// 
477b7(rgyud): de nas don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i cho ga zhib mo chen po dang / khro bo lcags kyu dang / rig pa'i rgyal po dang / don yo zhags pa'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor chen po ru/ de bzhin gshegs
477b8(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rigs thun mong ba'i phyag rgya dge ba'i las thams cad byed pa/ 'byung po thams cad skrag par byed pa/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad 'bros par byed pa/ 
478a1(rgyud): bgegs thams cad rnam par bsgrag par byed pa/ 'dod pa'i ris rnams sreg par byed pa/ gdug pa'i klu rnams 'khrug par byed pa/ sa'i mthil g.yo bar byed pa
478a2(rgyud): lha'i me tog dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyis mdzes pa dang / lha'i gos dang lta ba lhub kyi char 'bebs par byed pa/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yang dag par bskul bar
478a3(rgyud): byed pa/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la snyan gsan 'bebs par byed pa/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas na gnas pa'i lha thams cad spyan 'dren par byed pa/ byang chub sems/ 
478a4(rgyud): dpa' thams cad kyi dbugs 'byin par byed pa/ rigapa'i rgyal po dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cada'agugs par byed pa/ bde ba thams cad dang phyir mi ldog
478a5(rgyud): pa'i gnas thob par byed pa/ bla na med pa byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar byed pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed pa/ chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar byed pa/ chos kyi
478a6(rgyud): dung 'bud par byed pa/ phyag rgya dang chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng bar byed pa/ cho ga zhib mo dang gsang sngags bla na med pa thams cad grub pa/ 'dod pa thams cad rab tu smyon pa/ phyag rgya
478a7(rgyud): dang / mchog thams cad sbyin par byed pa/ gsang sngags thams cad 'chang ba/ gzungs rnams kyi khyad par grub pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thun mong gi gsang ba'i dkyil
478a8(rgyud): 'khor thams cad du 'jug par byed pa/ gang gis rnam par snang mdzad dang / thub pa brgyad pa'i dam tshig gi gnas thams cad la gnas pa/ sdig pa thams cad nyams par byed pa/ 
478b1(rgyud): sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams sreg par byed pa/ rtag tu 'khor ba las 'don par byed pa/ bdud dang ma rungs pa rnams las sgrol ba po// rtag
478b2(rgyud): tu chos kyi zam stegs mchog/ rga ba dang / skyes pa dang / 'chi ba las grol bar byed/ srid pa mi bzad pa ston par nus pa/ tshul khrims dang / gtong ba dang / brtson 'grus
478b3(rgyud): dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi dri zhim po sbyin zhing srung bar byed pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs par byed pa/ sbyin pa'i rin po che'i
478b4(rgyud): phung po chen po rtag tu sbyin pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / lha thams cad la ma chod par byed pa/ bsam pa thams cad yong su rdzogs par
478b5(rgyud): byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya byin gyis rlob pa/ sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rna ma par 'phrul pa thams cad ston par byed pa/ gzugs sna
478b6(rgyud): tshegs dang / rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs kyi rnam por 'phrul pa mthong bar byed pa/ rdzu 'phrul yongasu rdzogs par byed pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya rab tu ston par byed pa/ chos
478b7(rgyud): kyi dbyings kyi snying po 'di la gnas par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa/ ma rungs pa thams cad dang / gdon dang nad thams cad rtag tu rnam
478b8(rgyud): par 'jig par byed pa/ phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad bzlog par byed pa/ sgrub par byed pa'o// 'jigs pa rnams thams cad dang / 
479a1(rgyud): 'jigs pa mi bzad pa brgyad po rnams kyis 'jigs pa med pa'o// dug dang byang stems dang / phye ma'i sbyor ba thams cad nyams par byed par the tshom med pa zhes bya ba
479a2(rgyud): bshad par bya'o// lag pa gnyis bzlog nas lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bo'i sor mo dang / bsdigs mdzub nyid bskumaso la sor mo gsum brkyang la snying khi'i gnas su bzhag par bya ste/ 
479a3(rgyud): 'di ni don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang mnyam par mchog sbyin pa ste/ phyag rgya brgya stong phrag bye ba gnyis tsam du bcings par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang
479a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya dang / pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya gang yin pa da dang / rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang / nor bu'i
479a5(rgyud): rigs kyi phyag rgya gang yin pas te/ phyag rgya so so// so so ba 'di rnams thams cad phyag rgya bye ba brgya ste/ nga phrag rnamasu 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu
479a6(rgyud): byed do// phyag rgya 'di ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i mchog sbyin pa po 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon po don yod pa'i snying po'o// shin tu gsang ba'i las thams cad du don yod pa'o// 
479a7(rgyud): dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa dang / rigs thun mongs pa'i gsang ba dang / dam tshig thams cad du mthong ba'o// phyag rgya 'di'i da ltar ba'i
479a8(rgyud): 'dod pa thams cad dang / yid kyi shing rta yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o// mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ba'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid kyis/ gung mo'i sor mos mthe bong gi/ 
479b1(rgyud): sor mo bskums la bsdigs mdzub kyis bsdigs par bya/ ming med dang / mthe chung ngag gcig tu brkyang la/ sen mos sen mo mnyam par bzhag nas/ snying kha'i gas
479b2(rgyud): su bzhag ste/ khro bo'i blta ba dang mtshungs par bzhag pas hUM yig gis btsir bar bya'o// 'di ni khro bo lcags kyu'i phyag rgya khro bo thams cad kyi mchog dang gtso bor brjod pa
479b3(rgyud): bya ste/ rigs bye ba brgya stong phrag rnams kyi thun mong ba'i phyag rgya thams cad rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya 'dzin pa tsam gyis khro de'i phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs/ 
479b4(rgyud): po'i rig su brjod pa dang / de bzhin du pad+ma'i rigs gang yin pa dang / rdo'i rigasu brjod pa gang mi ngan pa dang / khro bo'i rdo rje drog pas 'jigs par byed do// 
479b5(rgyud): khro bo'i rgyal po 'di ni thams cad du khro bo'i rgyal pobarjod par bya ste/ nor bu'i rigs gang yin pa 'i khro bo rnams kyi phyag rgya rnams gdug pa rnams 'jigs
479b6(rgyud): pa sbyin pa'o// thams cad du phyag rgya'i gtso bo zhes bya ba/ khro bo'i rgyal po bla na med pa'o// de bzhin du khro bo lcags kyu'i phyag rgya 'di 'chang bzhin pa/ ri rab lhun po brgya stong
479b7(rgyud): phrag dang / rgya mtsho yang bskams par byed do// ri rob lhun po'i ri ni rdul phra rab ji lta bar rnam par 'thor bar byed do// rgya mtsho thams cad kyang bskams par byed de// ri dang ra/ 
479b8(rgyud): bo yang nyams par byed do// lha ma yin ma rungs pa rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang / de'i gnas kyi klu ma rungs pa rnams sreg par byed do// de bzhin du gnod
480a1(rgyud): sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / gdon ma rungs pa dang / gegs byed pa'i lAm rungs pa gang yin pa dang / bdud kyi rigs rnams gcig tu 'bar ba
480a2(rgyud): 'gyur la/ phyag rgya 'dzin pa tsam gyis de lha rnams thams cad rtag tu nyams par byed cing / skad cig de la 'jigs par byed do// phyag rgya 'dzin pa tsam gyis phyir rgol ba
480a3(rgyud): dang / dgra dang / de bzhin du ma rungs pa'i sems can 'jigs par byed pa de rnams thams cad skyabasu 'gro bar byed do// phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang dkyil 'khor thams cad
480a4(rgyud): du/ bya ba thams cad 'grub par byed do// thams ca dad 'grub pa don yod cing dge ba thams cad 'grub da par byed do// phyag rgya 'di nyid las bsdigs mdzu ba gnyis
480a5(rgyud): rdo rje'i rnam par bskums la/ gung mo yid tsam bskums te/ ming med dang / mthe bong gis sor me'i sen mos sen mo mnyam par gzhag ste/ 
480a6(rgyud): mthe'u chung brkyang nas snying kha'i gnas su bzhag pa 'di ni rig pa'i phyag rgya chen po don yod pa'i phyag rgya mang du byung ba chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du rigs thun mong
480a7(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyi bla na med pa 'jig rten gyi khams mgon pos snyan paro brjod cing lung bstan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis de bzhin
480a8(rgyud): gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gtso bo zhes brjod pa/ de bzhin du pad+ma'i rigs kyi gtso bo dang / rdo rje'i rigs kyi gtso bo zhes brjod pa dang / de bzhin du nor bu'i rigs kyi gtso bo dang
480b1(rgyud): rigs pa'i rgyal po dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad du gtso bo ste/ gang gis phyag rgya 'di 'ching ba de gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba brgya stong phrag
480b2(rgyud): gi phyag rgya rnams ji lta ba bzhin du bcings par 'gyur ro// sdig pa dang / nyon mongs pa mi bzad pa dang / gdug pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do// bsod nams kyi phung
480b3(rgyud): po brgya stong phrag bskyed par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kun nas bskyed par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya 'dzin pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rnam par gzigs
480b4(rgyud): par byed cing dgongs par byed de the tsom med do// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad du mchog sbyin par 'gyur ra ro// lha rnams kyis rtag par rgyun tu bsrung bar byed do// 
480b5(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di'i phan yon sngar brjod pas gzhal du med/ cing grangs med la tshad med par rab tu bsgrags shing the tsom med do// phyag rgya 'di mthong ba dang / bcings pa
480b6(rgyud): tsam gyis bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu bskyed do// lag pa g.yas pa'i mthil tu gcig brkyangs la/ dpung pa brkums te/ ming med dang / mthe bong gi sor mo 'dud la mthe
480b7(rgyud): chung brkum par bya'o// ming med kyi mthar rig la/ gung mo brkums la bsdigs mdzub rab tu brkyangs te/ snying kha'i gnasu 'di g.yo ba tsam mo// me tog gam/ dri dang bdug
480b8(rgyud): pa dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gos sam/ rgyan dang / spud pa rnams kyang lag pa g.yon du bzung nas dbul bar bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems
481a1(rgyud): dpa' thams cad dang / lha rnams dang / de bzhin du rig pa'i rgyal po rnams dang / de bzhin du dkyil 'khor ba'i lha rnams kyi de rnams thams cad mchod par 'gyur ro// 
481a2(rgyud): lha rdzas kyi mchod pa bla na med pa dang / mchog dang / rab mchog dang / gya nom pa'i mchod pa 'di rnams byed de/ ro sna tshogs pa'i bza' ba rnams dang / ro brgya pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshog
481a3(rgyud): pa dang / btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa bdud rtsi bcud kyi len gyi mchod pa 'di rnams byed do// phyogs bcu rnams kun nas rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'byung ngo // gser dang dngul gyi me tig
481a4(rgyud): bla na med pa dang / rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par ba dkra ba nyi ma dang gzi brjid mtshungs pas/ 'bar bar byed do// phyag rgya 'dzin pa tsam gyis don yod pa mchod
481a5(rgyud): pa'i nor bu zhes bya ba 'di yid bzhin gyi nor bu ste/ rtag/ tu phyag rgya'i gsang ba dang / gsang sngags rna/ mas/ yid kyis bsams pas de rnams thams cad
481a6(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dpag bsam gyi shing dang mnyam zhing mtshungs par ji ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin du mchod pa thams cad byed de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye
481a7(rgyud): ma bye ba brgya stong phrag stong rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyang re re'i dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams phyag rgya 'di'i mthus bla na med pa'i mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod par byed/ 
481a8(rgyud): ngode'i phyir phyag rgya 'di rtag tu byed pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya bzung bzhin pa na/ mchod pa bla na med pa dang / tshegasu chung ngus
481b1(rgyud): mchod pa chung ngu yang chad med par rab tu 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtshungs pa med pa byed do// ri ba lhun po bye ba brgya stong phrag rnamasapa/ 
481b2(rgyud): rin po che sna bdun gyi phung pos/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bka te/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re la phul ba de bzhin du/ phyag rgya 'dzin bzhin pas/ 
481b3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa re re la de lta bu mchod pa'i cho ga byed do// de lta bu'i phyag rgya'i cho ga'i rnam par 'phrul pa ni/ 'dren pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gis byin gyis brlabs pa'o// 
481b4(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di nyid las bsdigs mdzub gung mo la reg pa ni/ dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba dang / mtsha/ mas bcing ba dang / spyan drang ba dang / dam tshig la
481b5(rgyud): 'jug pa dang / bskor ba byed pa dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / de bzhin du dro dang mar me dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gtor ma 'bul bar byed pa
481b6(rgyud): dang de bzhin du khrus dang / nye reg nyid dang / gos bsgo ba dang / gtsug tor bcing ba dang / srung ba dang / gzhan srung ba dang / de bzhin nyid du grogs srung ba dang / bzlas
481b7(rgyud): bzhin pa dang mnyam pa nyid dang / skyil mo krung bcing ba dang / sbyin sreg gi las dang / gzhan spyan drang ba nyid dang / gsang sngags spyan drang ba nyid dang / dngos grub
481b8(rgyud): sgrub pa nyid dang / thams cad nas thams cad du bya ba thams cad phyag rgya 'dis byed/ gnas thams cad du song ba dang / gnas grub pa dang / bya ba thams cad legs par
482a1(rgyud): bsngags pa dang / thams cad du mchog gi phyag rgya don yod pa'i las rab tu grub pa dang / yon tan thams cad dang bskyed pa dang / thams cad du rigs thun
482a2(rgyud): mongs pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ don yod pa sgrub pa po'i phyag rgya don yod pa'i cho ga zhib mo sgrub par byed pa'o// don yod pa'i las zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di don yod pa'i
482a3(rgyud): mchog sbyin pa zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o// phyag rgya chen po lnga po 'di rnams rmad du byung ba'i de kho na nyid mthong ba dang / don yod pa thos pa nyid dang / don yod pa'i
482a4(rgyud): 'bras bu mthong ba dang / don yod pa'i bsod na/ mas bsags pa'i de kho na nyid dngadon yod par sdig pa nyams pa dang / sgrib pa thams
482a5(rgyud): cad zad pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam/ par 'joms pa'i phyag rgya dang / don yod pa/ ra sangs rgyas rnams mthong ba dang / don yod par
482a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong ba dang / don yod par cho 'phel bar byed pa'i phyag rgya dang / don yod par dngos grub kyi mchog sbyin par byed pa mchog tu gyur pa'o// 
482a7(rgyud): snying po dang / phyag rgya 'di 'jig rten dbang phyug gis sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du bsgrags pa'o// rig sngags 'chang rnams kyis khyad par du
482a8(rgyud): nyin mtshan du dang / thun mtshams su yang phyag rgya 'di 'ching na/ bkra shis pa'i mchog/ bsod nams dang / dag pa dang / sdig pa nyams
482b1(rgyud): pa dang / don yod pa'i dngos grub ngas par gyur pa'i mchog sbyin par byed do// 'don par ba mchog gi gnas mya ngan las 'das pa mchog tu dge ba'o// 
482b2(rgyud): rgya'i gsang sngags rnams su 'gyur te/ oM a mo g+hA ku sho dz+wa la hUM/ oM a mo gA kro d+ha Sh+Ton+da/ oM bad+ya rA dza pang me dzi la nAM/ oM a mo
482b3(rgyud): g+ha bi bi d+ha a mo g+ha tsan+d+ra ma Ni pra bar+t+ta ya hUM/ oM a mo g+ha sarba tre sA d+hA ya shi di n+d+ra/ phyag rgya 'dzin po'i sngags so// de nas dge ba'i las thams cad
482b4(rgyud): byed pa'i gsang sngags thams cad du sgrub pa'i tha bas kyi de kho na nyid kyi gnas thams cad la 'jug par byed pa bshad par bya ste/ oM a
482b5(rgyud): mo g+ha maN+Da le hUM/ dkyil 'khor bcing ba 'o// oM sa man+ta shu b+hi pri thi bI sa hA n+tu sa yongs su sbyong ba'i sngags so// 
482b6(rgyud): oM a mo g+ha pa ri sho d+ha ni hwA/ dkyil 'khor yongasu sbyong ba'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha pre thi bI sa rasA le hUM/ sa dang ba byung gi sngags so// 
482b7(rgyud): oM a mo g+ha dza la/ shra ba Ne nA/ chu'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha a mri ta ba re swA hA/ dbang bskur ba'i sngags so// oM a mo gA bi bAH
482b8(rgyud): b+ha ba na ba re hUM/ thig rnam par dbye ba'i sngags so// oM nA nA rat+na ba re dz+wa la hUM/ tshon rtsi'i ri mo'i sngags so// oM dz+wa la bi ma le a mo shud+d+he nA
483a1(rgyud): khrus kyi sngags so// oM sid+d+hi dza le a mo gA bud+d+hi hUM/ nye reg gi sngags so// oM a mo g+ha bste ts+tshad hUM/ gos bsgo ba'i sngags so// 
483a2(rgyud): oM a mo gA ma Ni hU/ gtsug tor bcing ba'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha rak+Sha Na ba ra da nAM/ bdag srung ba'i sngags so// oM satwa rak+Sha Ni a mo g+ha daMSh+TenU
483a3(rgyud): thams cad srung zhing bde ba'i ched du srung ba'i sngags so// oM a mo gA pra biM sha b+hu ba ne hUM/ gnas su 'jug pa'i sngags so// oM na mo a mo g+ha ba ti nU/ bag
483a4(rgyud): byed pa'i sngags so// oM a mai gA tsakre hUM/ bskor ba'i sdigs so// oM sa ma ya sid+d+ha/ a mo g+ha ba tin+na/ dam tshig gi sngags so// 
483a5(rgyud): a me g+ha puSh+pe pra ba tsagan+ti ni dza ya swA hAM/ met+ta ga dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa nga/ bdug pa'i sngags so// o a mo ga sar sa
483a6(rgyud): pU ra/ ras ras gra tin+da/ thams cad du gtor ma'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha tu Ti swAhA/ mar me'i sngags so// e a mo gA pa ti tsi ra bi tsa
483a7(rgyud): sany+tsa ra swA hA/ thams cad du gnas pa dang / gnas thams cad du song ba ni rig pa'i rgyal pos bya'o// thams cad du las thams cad byed pa rig pa'i gsang sngags sbyar bar
483a8(rgyud): bya'o// gshegasu gsol ba nyid kyang sngags 'dis bya'o// las shin tu rgyas pa gzhan thams cad ni rig pa'i rgyal pos bya'o// legs par byas pa'i las dang / 
483b1(rgyud): bya ba rnams dang / bya ba thams cad sgrub par byed pa gzhan rnams ni don yod pa'i lcags kyu dang / khro bo lcags kyu dang / rig pa'i rgyal po'i gsang sngags chen po dang / 
483b2(rgyud): dpa' bo gcig pa'i gsang sngags 'di rnams dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi las rnams bya'o// rtsa ba'i rig pa 'di nyid kyis las thams cad bya'i/ 
483b3(rgyud): de las phyi rol tu gyur pa'i rig pa gzhan ni med do// rig pa 'di ni bklags pas grub pa'o// de nas de la yongs shing rgya che ba'i brtson pa bya ste/ 'byor pa ji lta ba dang
483b4(rgyud): chad ji lto ba dang / ji ltar gsal ba rnams/ 'byor pa dang bcas shing yong su rdzogs pa dang shin tu gsal por bya ba rnams bya'o// gtsang / 
483b5(rgyud): ma gtsang mas khrus byas te ges gtsang ma bsgo b.rabya/ dad pa dang / gus pa dang / mchog tu dang ba bskyed par bya/ bden par smra ba
483b6(rgyud): bya bden par phyi rol tu 'byung bar bya/ bden par spro ba dang / brtson pas 'thung bar bya/ lkog tu smra ba dang / phra ma dong ser sna med par 'gyur ba
483b7(rgyud): bya/ lag yangs por bya/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi lam dang / bklags pas grub pa'i rig pa 'ong sgrub par byed par 'gyur bar bya
483b8(rgyud): sems can thams cad la brtse ba mchog tu bya bri bar bya 'drir gzhug par bya/ bklag par bya/ kha ton du bya/ mchod par bya
484a1(rgyud): ri mor bya/ kun chub par bya/ tshig zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po 'di gsungs pa dang / don yod zhags pa'i rnam par thar pa'i
484a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor yang dag par rmad du byung ba 'di byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi phyag byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dmatshig thun
484a3(rgyud): mong gi gsang ba dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba thams cad kyi gsang ba phyag rgya dang / gosang sngags thams cad kyi gsang ba'i cho ga zhib mo 'di 'phags pa
484a4(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsungs so// / de nas yong lha dang / klu dang / gnod spyi na dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang
484a5(rgyud): na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi gang yin pa rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
484a6(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang bcas pa ga la ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du gyur pa ga la ba der dong ste lhag
484a7(rgyud): nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar song ste/ zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal/ 
484a8(rgyud): te thal mo sbyar bar gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di bdag gis gzungs par bgyi'o// don yod pa'i lcags kyu tsho ga zhing mo'i
484b1(rgyud): rgyal po yang // lhag pa'i rgyal po cho ga zhing mo 'di yongasu srung ba'i don dang / mi nub cing rgyas par 'gyur ro// cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po ji lta rnyed pa de bzhin bris pa 'di
484b2(rgyud): yongasu rdzogs s+ho// / 'di ni sngon gyi lo tsA ba mkhas pa bzhi tsam gyis bgos nas bsgyur ba la/ bar skabs par skabs
484b3(rgyud): su chad cing mjug ma tshang ba las/ bla ma dus kyi 'khor lo pa chen po chos grags dpal bzang po'i phyag nas rgya dpe byung zhing / chad pa slob pa dang / mjug
484b4(rgyud): bsgyur cig ces bkas bskul ba la brten nas bam po bcu pa'i nang du/ las kyi don kun sgrub par byed ces pa nas/ gsang sngags bzlas pa
484b5(rgyud): mtshig gyis shig ces pa'i bar dang / bam/ po bcu gnyis pa'i nang du/ bcom ldana' ngas 'on kyang don khyad par can gyi ched du zhes pa nas/ 
484b6(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gi lus 'bar bar 'gyur te/ zhes pa'i bar dang / bam po bcu gsum pa'i nang du/ dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'di thos pa tsam
484b7(rgyud): dang zhes pa nas/ mi gang tshad du bsko bar bya zhes pa'i bar dang / bam po bcu bzhi nang du/ pad+ma dang / chu dang yungs dkar la yongasu bzlas te zhes pa
484b8(rgyud): nas/ ras dkar pos bkru bar bya zhing / lan bdun du zhes pa'i bar dang / bam po bcu bzhi pa dang / bco lnga pa'i mtshams su
